40014009	Ɔci Hiruuduc yomɛ yaaññi. Yeti acaan ɛkɛ jiek naŋɛ i ṭɔɔl dokiyɛ, ɔci moki acaan maka wɛlg maka bala omi iki ɛkɛ tieŋŋin jyek ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi, “Dala Yɔhanna nogdɛ ma.”
40014010	Ɛkɛ men gɛɛl cuuññɛ ciginji Yɔhannati, ɔci Yɔhanna wyeñɛ ŋwonnɛ bora,
40014011	ɔci oonɛ te ḍwan ɔci ‘wonnɛ ṭɔɔlo. Ɔci ṭɔɔl wyeñ Yɔhanna eññɛ mɛɛgɛnti, ɔci ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ.
40014012	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yɔhannayɛ, ɛkkɛn ati ciginji ɔci war Yɔhanna eyɛ, ɔci jokci iñɔ koolji. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati Yaccu myetkɛ te jyeka neeni.
40014013	Ɔci ne Yaccu tieŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bana neeni dalnɛ ɔci ɛkɛ taapcin murkaji ati kuocɔ nona wɔɔganti parɛ. Ne maka a polla tolan neeni tieŋki agi Yaccu attɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn yiŋi booti te ciegɛn, yiŋi nona atti Yaccu neeni. Ɔci maka ciyi yomɔ bonka ḍyɛrintiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ati daŋkun.
40014014	Ɔci ne Yaccu tonni bora kwoña parɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ ma mɔŋnɛ a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ wiak te ɛkkɛn. Ɔci maka coŋɔn neeniyɛ, gɛɛg waakɛn yeyɔ, ɔci ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ.
40014015	Ɔci ne oŋ unniyɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu bɛɛn ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Nona neeni a wɔɔŋ jiñɛ budan. Ɔci ma ɛɛnɛ coodi doki. Dala i ɛkkɛn cuña ooddi bonka ḍyɛrinti aŋka ɛkkɛn wɛrdi oomdin aŋka amtan ɛkkɛn.”
40014016	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ma ooddi ɔntɔ ogo? Dala ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ waka amtan.”
40014017	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ikin balkin byedg ne dɔɔyɔ budan, ɔci yak ṭɔlgɛn a ‘yɛggin ne yyɛɛwɔ.”
40014018	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Waka wanna oodɛ ‘yati wɛnni.”
40014019	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mati, ɔci ma cooccin iñɔ lwoma ṭeyan neeni wyeñɛti, ɔci Yaccu byedga ne dɔɔyɔ, ɔci yak ṭɔlgɛnn a ‘yɛggin ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, luullɛ bieŋɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ñorcin ñaalɔ pɔliji ɔci cɔkcin Juaŋti. Ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ byedg wɛɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci ‘wonnɛ maka laldɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ‘woñgi ɛkkɛn maka ciyi iñɔ coŋin neeni.
40014020	Ɔci ma omjin waakɛnda ne ɛkkɛn yɔmki ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkkɛn tiɛdɛ oomdin, ɔci oomdin ɛkkɛn tiɛtki neeniyɛ, limɛyɔ ma ɔdin kumgin a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ te byedga ne dɔɔyɔ ɔci te yaka ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni.
40014021	Maka omi oomdin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Maka ‘uay bala a alpn ne dɔɔyɔ (5,000), ɔci moong bala daŋkun, i kɛɛgin moki.
40014022	Ɔci ne pɛñan Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛkkɛ ɔgdɛ ooddɛ ñamu taaptɛ murkati. Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ kuocɔ, ɔci ‘ya polla tolan neeni cuoñña baanji.”
40014023	Ɔci ne Yaccu ma cuuññi baanji dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ poom wyeñɛti parɛ aŋka cɔki Juaŋti. Ɔci ne oŋ waŋɛ unniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala nona neeniti parɛ.
40014024	Ɔci murkayɛ, ɛkɛ bala yeccu galŋ yiɛŋɛji. Ɔci pɔɔgi pieg bala toñi murka ne pɛñan, acaan jwami tol tolo.
40014025	Ɔci ne tinnɔyɛ, Yaccu bala ati ñaalɔ pieg wyetkɛnti ooddi nona ɛkkɛnti.
40014026	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ yuarkiti baali ati ñaalɔ pieg wyetkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn buayi ne tolan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaadan gɔki agi, “Gena ‘yeeññan!”
40014027	Ɔci ne pɛñan Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya! Naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ. Gena ‘ya!”
40014028	Ɔci Butruc ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, kan gena i awarɛyɛ, dala i gɔkka ‘yati aŋka ‘ya bɛɛd iti ñaalɔ pieg wyetkɛnti.”
40014029	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Bɛɛdi.” Ɔci Butruc kooyin bora te murkaji ɔci bala ati ñaalɔ pieg wyetkɛnti noŋi ooddi Yaccuti.
40014030	Yeti ne ɛkɛ gɔrni jwami tolla toliyɛ, ɛkɛ buañi, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi luutti iñɔ pietin. Ɔci ɛkɛ yaajjin agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ‘ya magda, hay!”
40014031	Ɔci ne pɛñan Butruc muŋŋɛ Yaccu te bieŋɛ doki. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I jyetti ‘yati ne ḍiɛran budan, hay! I buay a ɔɔn ogo?”
40014032	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn taapki murkajiyɛ, jwami yɔɔni doki.
40014033	Ɔci ɛkkɛn morcin Yaccuti, ɔci gɔki agi, “I a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ hay!”
40014034	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ne dɛñki kwoña parɛti ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkkɛn totcin bora ban Gɛnɛɛcarɛt.
40014035	Ɔci maka bana neenitiyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn ma ñiikitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ma gɛɛg cuuñɛ bonka bala ban ɛkkɛn toŋkɛtiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn eccin maka waakɛn yeyin.
40014036	Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin Yaccuti agi dala ma bɛya topti bworŋ iti. Ɔci ma bɛɛn ɔci ma topcin bworŋ ɛkɛti ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn pwadgin waakɛnda.
40015001	Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti ma Pɛriciin ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Urcaliimji, bɛɛn nona Yaccuti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi,
40015002	“Maka lala iyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi ba jyek yɔrg ikin bɛɛ ogo? Kan ɛkkɛn bala omiyɛ, ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛn luaktan ñamu bɛɛ.”
40015003	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Oŋ ɛkkɛ, ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ bɛɛññɛji ɔci ɛkkɛ tiecɛ gena jyek yɔrg ikin waakɛn budan ogo?
40015004	Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek weyi ɛkkɛ ɔci jyek mɛyi ɛkkɛ ne pwadan.’ Ɔci agi, ‘Kan men gɛɛl gɔki ɔṭi weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛnyɛ, agi dala ɛkta tuudɔ.’
40015005	Yeti ɛkkɛ loṭɛ ma agi kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti balki genga aŋka ɛkɛ weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛn magdɛ, oŋ yeti kan ɛkɛ gɔkti agi, ‘Gena neeni a gen Jwaŋa Tolan dokiyɛ,’
40015006	ɛkɛ yaakinti weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛn magdɛ te gena neeni moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn daldɛ amaam budan ɔɔn. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyek Juaŋ aŋi ba jyeka budan ɛkkɛti doki te naŋki jyek yɔrg ɛkkɛ neeni.
40015007	Ɛkkɛ agɛ laaban! Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Icaaya te baaṭi te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, yɔmjin te ɛkkɛ awarɛ!
40015008	Icaaya gɔki agi, ‘Maka neeni gɔki jieyi ‘ya te tuggɛn budan, yeti ɛkkɛn yomgɛn lonɔ ɔntɔ te ‘yati.
40015009	Ɛkkɛn moṭi ‘yati te labjo, ɔci ɛkkɛn loṭi ma te jyeka naŋi ma baan budan, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi jyeka neeni agi jyek Jwaŋa Tolan!’”
40015010	Ɔci Yaccu maka coŋin bornɛ ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn nona ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ne pwadan!
40015011	Waka amtan ma a waka ooddi ma korkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ma cuultanyɔ bɛɛ. Gena jiek ɔci naŋka bɛya bora te ma yomgɛntiyɛ, gena ɛkkɛn aŋka ma cuultanyɔy.”
40015012	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu bɛɛn ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Çeej i boki ne ma Pɛriciin looñki te jwalla guaŋŋi i ɛkkɛnti wannayɛ?”
40015013	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Janga piinnɛ Wey ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn dɔɔddɛ ɛkɛ bora aŋka baadi.
40015014	Ma Pɛriciin neeni ɛkkɛn daltin ikin! Acaan ɛkkɛn bala ba maka ñingɛn ulan ne ɛkkɛn lɔtki yɔtin pookɛn atki amaam ɔci ḍɛɛmki koolji nona ne cyɛɛlɔy.”
40015015	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ɔɔn lwogdɔn te jwalla a caagɔn guaŋŋi i neeni.”
40015016	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jiek ne pwadan men bɛɛ?
40015017	Kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ ne waka amtan ma ootti ma korkɛnti ɔci ootti te pɔy ɛkkɛnyɛ?
40015018	Jyeka yeyin bɛya te yoma yaayanti. Ɔci jyeka yeyin neeniyɛ, mena gɔki ɛkkɛn neeni cuultanyɔ Jwaŋa Tolan ñamuti.
40015019	Waka bɛya bora te ma yomgɛntiyɛ, gena paŋŋa yaayan, ɔci jyek nooŋi mako, ɔci jyek tomi moongo, ɔci jyek wɛljo, ɔci jyek kali waako, ɔci jyek jomi maka pookɛn waakɛn.
40015020	Naŋka neeniyɛ, ma yiegdi te naŋki ɛkkɛn. Yeti kan men gɛɛl omdi genga ne ɛkɛ byeŋkɛ luaŋŋɛ men bɛɛyɛ, men yaaya te naŋka neeni bɛɛ.”
40015021	Ɔci Yaccu jɔŋŋin te aŋan i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ɔci ati nona balki bonka ne yyɛɛwɔy. Gena Tayir ɔci Ciḍɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ciyi bonka neeni toŋkɛnti yaakkɛn wɛnan.
40015022	Ɔci ɛŋ maka ban Kɛnan gɛɛl bɛɛn ɔci bala yaadan boor Yaccu agi, “Ciɛggɔn, Kaci Daawud, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati! Kaci ‘ya, kacca ɛɛŋ muŋŋɛ jwaŋa yaayan. Ɔci jwaŋa yaayan neeni bala noŋi ne yaayan ɛkɛti.”
40015023	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i ɛŋa neeni cuuñjayɔ ɔga ooddi ɔntɔ te wɛnni. Ɛkɛ wiak poṭi ikin waakɔ.”
40015024	Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛɛŋti agi, “‘Ya, cuonna Juaŋ aŋka mok gena ma Icrayiil maka yien ba kulin neeni pookɛn.”
40015025	Ɔci ɛŋa neeni orcinti ɛkɛti ɔci morcin ɛkɛti gɔki agi, “Ciɛggɔn, dala ‘ya magda i!”
40015026	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan oomdin kɛɛgin yɛɛptin gɔkiyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin bɛɛ.”
40015027	Ɔci ɛɛŋ ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “A warɛ Ciɛggɔn, yeti gɔkiyɛ, ɛkkɛn omi oomdin ṭɔlgɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te weyyɛn byeŋkɛnti bɛɛ?”
40015028	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛŋo, jyenna jyetti i ‘yati neeniyɛ, tolla tollo hay! Naŋka i buagi neeniyɛ, dala bala iti.” Ɔci kaci ɛkɛ warɛ pwani ne pɛñan doki.
40015029	Ɔci Yaccu jɔŋŋin te aŋan ɔci ɛkɛ ati dɔɔki Galŋ Jaliil ati poom jitin, ɔci cooccin iñɔ ñaalɔ poom ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl wyeñɛti aŋan.
40015030	Ɔci maka coŋin bɛɛn ɛkɛti eccin maka ŋɔr, ɔci maka miŋki maka lɛpɛn yaakinti jiek bɛɛy, ɔci maka pwotko. Maka neeni ḍuacci ma iñɔ Yaccu ñamɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ.
40015031	Ɔci maka coŋin neeniyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki maka miŋki maka lɛpɛn yaakinti jiek bɛɛ, ɔci maka byeŋkɛn puottin ɔci maka ciegɛn puottin waakɛn pwatki, ɔci maka ŋɔr atki, ɔci maka ullin balki gɔrki noon dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi noon pwatcin bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋ ma Icrayiil.
40015032	Ɔci Yaccu borcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi bɛɛdɔ nona ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya yomu wiak te maka coŋin neeni acaan ɛkkɛn balgin iki ‘ya wɛnni nink aŋi ne ḍoogɔ doki, ɔci waka amtan ɛkkɛn baaw ɛkkɛnti. ‘Ya ɛkkɛn cundi bonk ɛkkɛn ne ɛkkɛn amɛ koñ a ɔɔn bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdi yomu te koñ dita.”
40015033	Ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ikin maka coŋin neeni ‘wontin oomdin te aŋɛ ne nona neeni niin a wɔɔŋ budan ɔɔn?”
40015034	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Byedg bala ɛkkɛti a ñiṭin?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Bala ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci yak ṭɔlgɛnn a ‘yɛggin gɛɛg bala ne ḍiɛkan daŋkun.”
40015035	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi dala ma coottɔ iñɔ.
40015036	Ɔci Yaccu byedga ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni luullɛ byeŋkɛti iki yak ṭɔlgɛn daŋkun. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a pwatcin Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ byedg iki yak ṭɔlgɛnn a ‘yɛggin wɛɛnnɛ jitin oŋo. Ɔci ‘wonnɛ maka laldɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci oomdin eekɛ ma maka ciyi iñɔ neeni.
40015037	Ɔci ma omi waakɛnda ne ɛkkɛn korkɛn yoŋki ɔɔn. Ɔci oomdin tɛɛti neeniyɛ, limiyɔ ma ɔdin kumgin ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ.
40015038	Maka omi te oŋŋa wannatiyɛ, ɛkkɛn kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Maka ‘uay bala alpn ne ŋaanɔ (4,000). Ɔci moong bala daŋkun i kɛɛgin.
40015039	Ɔci maka coŋin neeni cuuññɛ Yaccu baanji, ɔci ɛkɛ taapcin murkaji, ɔci ɛkɛ ati ban Magadɔn taaŋɛti.
40016001	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin ɔci ma Cadyuciinyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tooci yieci ɛkɛ a yiiñño. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn lɛɛrtɛ naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ naŋka tɛyan te ñaalɔ pɔliji.
40016002	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Te oŋ unniyɛ, kan pɔli tid tidyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi, ‘Ne liidɔyɛ, jwami bala bɛɛ.’
40016003	Ɔci te liidɔyɛ, kan pɔli tid tid ɔci kan pɔli wyeñɛ balayɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi jwami bɛya te oŋi i ñaalo. Jyek waka bala pɔlitiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, yeti jyek naŋka bɛɛn mati acca neeni aŋka kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ!
40016004	Hay ɛkkɛ maka yeyin maka jyeni ɛkkɛn baaw Juaŋti nɛ! Ɛkkɛ buagɛ lɛɛrtin ‘ya naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ‘ya? A’a, ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ bɛɛ. Acaan jyek Yunaan mena a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan bala doki, ɔci yɔmjin doki.” Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ maka neeni dalnɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ati nona parɛ.
40016005	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati kuocɔ iki maka laldɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ wierɛ byedgo.
40016006	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki te galŋji murkaji menyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te ñamg ma Pɛriciin, ɔci moki te ñamg ma Cadyuciin daŋkun.”
40016007	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Ikin byedg oonin wɛnni bɛɛ.”
40016008	Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔrni ɛkkɛn gɔɔki yɔtin pookɛn te byedg a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ maka jyeni ɛkkɛn a ḍiɛran nɛ! Te gena yeti ɛkkɛ gɔwwɛ agi byedg baagɔy?
40016009	Ɛkkɛ naŋki ‘ya kwoyɛ men? Ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te byedga ne dɔɔyɔ wɛɛni ‘ya jitin ɔci ‘woñgan ‘ya maka coŋin, maka a alpn ne dɔɔyɔ (5,000) wanna bɛɛ? Ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ yien te ɔdin coŋin ɔdin kumgin te waka ɛkkɛ tiɛtki wanna?
40016010	Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te byedga ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ wɛɛni ‘ya jitin, ɔci ‘woñgan ‘ya maka a alpn ne ŋaanɔ wanna bɛɛ? Ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ yien te ɔdin coŋin ɔdin kumgin te waka ɛkkɛ tiɛtki wannayɛ?
40016011	Ne ‘ya gɔŋna ɛkkɛti te jyek ñamg ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ‘ya gɔkcɔ te jyek byedg woodgɛn ogo? Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya ṭɛr ɛkkɛ waakɔ a ṭyɛli te ñamg ma Pɛriciin ɔci te ñamg ma Cadyuciin!”
40016012	Ɔci ɛkkɛn oŋ jwali jiñɛ yuarcɛ oŋo. Çeecɔn ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ gɔki ɛkkɛnti te ñamg byedg woodgɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn tiittan te lali ma Pɛriciin ɔci ma Cadyuciin lalla a damgɔn neeni.
40016013	Ɔci Yaccu jɔŋŋin te aŋan, ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnni ban Cɛcariiya Pilibbi taaŋɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ tooccin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Ma gɔki agi ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan agji menɛ?”
40016014	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ma gɛɛg gɔki agi i agji Yɔhanna mena buoṭi ma, ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg gɔki agi i agji Iliiya, ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg gɔki agi i agji Jɛramaaya, ɔci ma gɛɛg gɔki agi i agji bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan bɔwa pardan gɛɛl moki.”
40016015	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti daŋkun agi, “Oŋ ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ ‘ya ag menɛ daŋkun?”
40016016	Ɔci Cimaan Butruc ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a Kiṭɔ Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, Jwaŋa tɛɛti neeni.”
40016017	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Cimaan kaci Yɔhanna, pwatcin ne tolan. I lɛɛrni men baan gɛɛl jwalla neeni bɛɛ. Gena Wey ɔɔn ñaalɔ pɔliji i lɛɛrni jwalla neeniy.
40016018	’Ya gɔkka iti Butruc, ka i ag poomo. Ɔci poma neeni wyeñɛtiyɛ, ‘ya cɔtca kaniica ‘ya. Ɔci kaniica ‘ya neeni war tɛɛn lien bwandɛ.
40016019	’Ya i ‘wondin mɔpta ban cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan. Jyeka ḍyɛga i iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni agi naa ma noŋdɔ bɛɛyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan daŋkun ɛkkɛn ḍyɛgdɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci jyeka pɔkka i iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni agi dala ma noŋdɔyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan daŋkun ɛkkɛn pɔktɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji.”
40016020	Ɔci ɛkɛ maka laldɛ ɛkɛ myennɛ agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ ma nɔɔttɛ a ‘ya a Kiṭɔ bɛɛ.”
40016021	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, Yaccu jɔɔtcin te miti maka laldɛ ɛkɛ te naŋka bɛya ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya ootta ban Urcaliim, ɔci maka ḍwaŋin aŋan ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋdi ne yaayan ‘yati. Ɔci ‘ya nokta ɛkkɛn. Yeti gɔṭṭɛ! Ne nink akti ḍoogɔyɛ, ‘ya jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ te lienti moki.”
40016022	Ɔci Butruc Yaccu eññɛ nona parɛ ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti ne pɛñan agi, “Ciɛggɔn, a’a! Naa naŋka neeni bɛya iti oŋgati bɛɛ.”
40016023	Yeti Yaccu warɛ yallɛ ɔci gɔkcin Butructi agi, “Hay! Dala i ootta ɔntɔ te ‘yati wɛnni, i gɔk ba Jwaŋa Yaayan! I dɛy ‘ya a ɔɔn ogo? I buagi naŋki Juaŋ bɛɛ. I buagi naŋki ma baan budan!”
40016024	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Kan men gɛɛl buagɔn bootti ‘yatiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ mwondi te caŋti ñingɛ te war ɛkɛ parɛ, ɔci dala ɛkɛ kakan ɛkɛ luldɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bɛya bootti ‘yati ne lien bɛɛdi ɛkɛti ɔɔn.
40016025	Kan mena boottin ‘yati gɛɛl jyek ‘ya daldɛ aŋka naa ɛkɛ nogditi ma bɛɛyɛ, mena neeni yɔɔrdi tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni bɛɛ. Yeti kan men gɛɛl boottin ‘yati, ɔci noŋdi ba jyek ‘ya, ɔci jyek ‘ya tiidiyɔ, oŋ kan te ɛkɛ noktan ma ɔɔnyɛ, mena neeni aŋka yɔɔrdi tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni.
40016026	Kan men gɛɛl balki waka coŋin iñɔ baanji wɛnni ɔci ɛkɛ ḍakti ooddi bana a maañy, oŋ waka bala ɛkɛti neeni yɔmdi te gena? Tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni ma wɛɛṭi boki?
40016027	’Ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛd balka war tɛɛn ba war tɛɛn bala Wey ɔɔntiy. Ɔci ‘ya bɛɛdin iki malɛɛkan ‘ya. Ɔci ‘ya ma ‘woñga waak ba naŋki ɛkkɛn, menga da ba naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da ba naŋki ɛkɛ.
40016028	Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ ka ma gɛɛg bala yɔdgi iki ɛkkɛ wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tuwa bɛɛ. Yeti te ñamu ɛkkɛn gɔrti oŋŋa ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛda agda Ciɛggɔn Tolan.”
40017001	Ɔci ne nink ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛki borayɛ, Butruc ɔci Yaakub ɔci Yɔhanna mod Yaakubnyɛ, ɛkkɛn eññɛ Yaccu poom wyeñɛti pookɛn. Poma neeniyɛ, beñña beñño.
40017002	Ɔci ɛkɛ aaŋŋɛyɔ Jwaŋa Tolan warɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ñingɛ galla gali ba oŋ waŋɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci bworŋin ɛkɛ bɔɔna bɔɔn ne pɛñan cier ma ñingɛn ba maaño.
40017003	Ɔci Iliiya yaakkɛn i Muucayɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn lɛɛllɛ bora ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ iki Yaccu.
40017004	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, kan ikin cietin wɛnni oŋkanda a ɔɔn pwatcin hay! Kan pwatcin itiyɛ, dala ‘ya noŋja doŋki ne ḍoogɔ, ɛka ne cyɛɛlɔ te i, ɔci ɛka ne cyɛɛlɔ te Muuca, ɔci ɛka ne cyɛɛlɔ te Iliiya.”
40017005	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ men baali gɔki jiekyɛ, pɔlla bɔwan gɛɛl bɛɛn ɔci ɛkkɛn kwommɛyɔ. Ɔci pwan gɔkkin te pɔliti agi, “Mena neeniyɛ, gena Kaci ‘ya Kacca ana ‘yay. ‘Ya yomu pwanna pwani te ɛkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkɛ!”
40017006	Ɔci ne maka laldɛ Yaccu tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdin korkɛn baamjɛ iñɔ ṭɛɛrji acaan ɛkkɛn buayi ne pɛñan.
40017007	Ɔci Yaccu bɛɛn ɔci topcin ɛkkɛnti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jɔŋdɛ ñaalɔ, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ!”
40017008	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ñorki ñaalɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn menga yuarcɛ bɛɛ. Yaccu aŋka bala yɔɔd parɛ.
40017009	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki kooti iñɔ te ñaalɔ poom wyeñɛti menyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ men gɛɛl myettɛ te naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ neeni bɛɛ. Yeti ne ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan jɔlda ñaalɔ te lientiyɛ, ɛkkɛ oŋ ma myettɛ oŋo.”
40017010	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Ne maka loṭi worga Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkki agi Iliiya aŋka bɛɛdɔ ñamu wannay, jyek ɛkkɛn neeni bala a ɔki a ɔɔn?”
40017011	Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Iliiya bɛya ñamu awarɛ. Ɛkɛ bɛya yɔŋi jiek waakɛnda.
40017012	Ɔci ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ka Iliiya bɛɛn doki. Yeti ɛkɛ ñiyɛ ma bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ɛkɛti ba yomg ɛkkɛn buagɔn. Ɔci ‘ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘ya da naŋta ma ne yaayan ba naŋka naŋɛ ma Iliiyati neeni.”
40017013	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu jyek ɛkɛ jitkɛn yuarcɛ. Ɔci ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn Yaccu bala gɔki te jyek Yɔhanna mena buoṭi may.
40017014	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn dɛñki non polla tolantiyɛ, mena ‘uan gɛɛl bɛɛn Yaccuti ɔci ḍwoñjin iñɔ ɛkɛ ñamɛti ɔci gɔkcin Yaccuti agi,
40017015	“Ciɛggɔn, dala i yomu pɔkka kaci ‘yati. Acaan ɛkɛ naŋi amji leyyo, ɔci ɛkɛ taabbin ne pɛñan. Acaan oŋkanda ɛkɛ warɛ yiɛptɛ maccu ɔci pietin moki.
40017016	Ɔci ɛkɛ owwan ‘ya maka lala iti, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti ɛkɛ ywaŋtan bɛɛ.”
40017017	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mati agi, “Hay, ɛkkɛ maka ati a damgin maka jyennɛn baaw nɛ, ɛkkɛ baltin iki ‘ya wɛnni yuong aga ne ñiṭin moki? ‘Ya kɛɛjja naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka pwadin yuong aga ne ñiṭin moki? Kaci owwa ‘yati wɛnni poca!”
40017018	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin jwaŋa yaayanti ne pɛñan agi, “Kooya bora te kaci yomɛti!” Ɔci jwaŋa yaayan kooyin bora te kaciti doki. Ɔci kaci warɛ pwani ne pɛñan doki.
40017019	Ɔci ne jiek baakiyɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu bɛɛn nona ɛkɛti lieda ɔci tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɔɔn kookɔnti te kooyin jwaŋa yaayan bora ogo?”
40017020	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ kookɛti acaan jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati neeni a ḍyɛṭ ṭɔɔlɛ budan. ‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, kan jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati ḍiɛrcin bala ba kɔba waŋɛ ḍiɛran neeniyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ poma neeniti agi dala ɛkɛ dɔtti ñaalɔ te wɛnni ooddi warɛ cɔɔttɛ iñɔ aŋanyɛ, ɛkɛ ooddi, genga ɛkkɛ bwandɛ bɛɛ! [
40017021	Jɔkin yeyin ba jɔkin neeniyɛ, kootan ma bora budan bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn kootan ma bora te cɔŋi ɔci gworŋ koño.]”
40017022	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki atki a cyɛɛlɔ ban Jaliilyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘wonta ma ma byeŋkɛnti,
40017023	ɔci ‘ya nokta ɛkkɛn, yeti ne nink ne ḍoogɔ baatiyɛ, ‘ya jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ te lienti moki.” Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu bala yomgɛn wiak ne pɛñan te jwalla neeni.
40017024	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn atki dɛñki ban Kapɛrnyamtiyɛ, maka lyemi bilka ḍuatan ma on Juaŋ ona tolan bɛɛn Butructi, ɔci tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi ɛkkɛ neeni ɛkɛ ḍɔci tulba ḍuatan ma on Juaŋ ona tolan neeni boki?”
40017025	Ɔci Butruc ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ.” Ɔci ne Butruc bɛɛni baanjiyɛ, Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti ñamu agi, “Cimaan Butruc, i poŋ gɔk jiek bala a ɔki? Maka ḍwaŋin iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy, ɛkkɛn lyemi tulba te maka bɛti? Ɛkkɛn lyemi tulba te kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn woodgɛnti boki? Walla te maka pookɛnti?”
40017026	Ɔci Butruc ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛkkɛn lyemi tulba te maka pookɛnti.” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin woodgɛn ciyi budan te wanna neeni daŋkun.
40017027	Yeti acaan ikin noŋtin aŋka naa ɛkkɛn wookti ikin bɛɛyɛ, dala i ootta galŋji ɔci jibaada yiɛpca pietin. Ɔci yeñña muga i ñamuyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ pɔkka tukɛti ɔci bilk yuara i ɛkɛ tukɛti. Ɛkkɛn eya ḍuacca te tulba ikin yaakkɔ.”
40018001	Te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu bɛɛn ɛkɛti ɔci tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “A menɛ a mena tolan te ɔɔn ñaalɔ cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolantiy?”
40018002	Ɔci Yaccu kaci gɛɛl bornɛ ɔci yɔɔnnɛ ɛkɛ yeccu ma ñomgɛnti. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mati agi,
40018003	“‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, kan ɛkkɛ waakɔ yaldɛ agdɛ ba kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin yomgɔti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti kaattɛ ñaalɔ non cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ!
40018004	Kan men gɛɛl ḍiɛṭ ḍyɛr yomɛti ba kacca neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tolan ban cyɛgja ñaalɔ pɔliji.
40018005	Kan men gɛɛl kaci gɛɛl mugdɛ ba kacca neeni te yenti ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ da ‘ya mugda.
40018006	“Kɛɛgin neeni jyeti ‘yati, ɔci kan men gɛɛl noŋdi gena yaayan gɛɛl ɛkkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn noŋdi nɔjiyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin bɛɛ yaayɛ. Jyeka bɛya mena neeni wyeñɛtiyɛ, pɛñcin ne yaajan te bolji mena ḍɛktan ma poma tolan pom jien ḍwaŋɛti ɔci yiɛptan ma galŋa tolanjiy.
40018007	Hay ɛkkɛ maka bala ṭɛra neeni ŋoyɛti nɛ, ɛkkɛ waakɔ gootti te maali nɔjja neeni ne pɛñan. Ɛɛ! Maali nɔjja neeni bɛya awarɛ. Yeti mena etti jyek maalla neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun konɛ ñakti ne tolan.
40018008	“Kan nɔji bala iti te naŋki byeŋ i, walla te naŋki ciy iyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ ŋutca ɔntɔ. Kan war i warda ooddi maccu te gena naŋŋɛ byeŋ i walla ciy iyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin bɛɛ. Maña neeni baadi oŋgati bɛɛ. Kan byeŋ i ŋunni ɔntɔ, ɔci i ootta ban Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, a ɔɔn aŋka pwatcin.
40018009	Kan nɔji bala iti te naŋki waŋ iyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ dɔdda bora yiɛpca ɔntɔ. Kan war i warda ooddi maccu te gena naŋŋɛ waŋ i neeniyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin bɛɛ. Kan waŋ i dɔnni bora ɔci i ootta ban Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, a ɔɔn aŋka pwatcin oŋkanda.
40018010	“Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin ɛkkɛn a waka budan bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ka malɛɛkan ɛkkɛn bala ñaalɔ pɔliji ciyi Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti. [
40018011	Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛn aŋka ɛkɛ yuoci maka yieny.]
40018012	“Ɛkkɛ poŋɛ a ɔki? Kan mena ‘uan gɛɛl balki kulin a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ (100) ɔci kalŋ gɛɛl te makɛn neeniti jyetcin ɔntɔ yieny, ɛkɛ kulin a ma baan ne ŋaanɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (99) neeni daldɛ ɛkɛ te poom jitin, ɔci ɛkɛ ooddi lieṭi ɛka yien neeni bɛɛ?
40018013	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, ne ɛkɛ kalŋ yuardɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya ñɔɔn ne tolan, yom ñɔɔna ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔyi te kulin a ma baan ne ŋaanɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (99) neeniyɛ, bwandɛ yom ñɔɔna ɛkɛ kalŋa neeni yuardɛy.
40018014	Mena neeni ani kulin ɛkɛ ne tolan hay! Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek Wey ɔɔn ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɛkɛ ani kɛɛgin ne tolan ɔci buagɔn naa kacca ḍiɛran gɛɛl ḍakti bɛɛ.
40018015	“ ‘Ɔci moki kan mod ɛkkɛ men Juaŋ gɛɛl noŋi ne yaayan itiyɛ, dala i ootta ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ coottɛ iki ɛkɛ ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ. Ɔci i ɛkɛ nɔɔtka te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan neeni.’ Kan ɛkɛ tieŋŋin jyek iyɛ, ɔci mena neeni aŋi ba mod ɛkkɛ doki.
40018016	Yeti kan ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyek i bɛɛyɛ, ‘dala i men gɛɛl eya ne cyɛɛlɔ, walla ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda. Ɔci jyek ɛkkɛ ŋeettan ma ne pwadan te naŋka wanna.’
40018017	Kan ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ma kaniica myettɛ. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyek ma kaniica bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ daldɛ ɛkkɛ aga ba mena ciyi budan mena jyek Juaŋ kwoyɛ walla maka yeyin a ɛyi maka lyemi tulbay.
40018018	“‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, jyeka ḍyɛgdɛ ɛkkɛ iñɔ wɛnni agi naa ma noŋdɔ bɛɛyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan daŋkun ɛkkɛn ḍyɛgdɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci jyeka pɔktɛ ɛkkɛ iñɔ wɛnni agi dala ma noŋdɔyɛ, Juaŋ daŋkun ɛkkɛn pɔktɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji.
40018019	“Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki, kan magga te ɛkkɛti wɛnni ne yyɛɛwɔ buagi genga Juaŋti, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn tootti Juaŋti te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋo.
40018020	Kan ma ne yyɛɛwɔ walla ne ḍoogɔ wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ te yenti ‘yayɛ, ɔci ‘ya baal yeccu nona ɛkkɛnti doki.”
40018021	Butruc bɛɛn ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, kan mod ɔɔn men Juaŋ gɛɛl noŋi ne yaayan ‘yatiy, ‘ya ɛkɛ bɔɔka oŋki ne ñiṭin? ‘Ya ɛkɛ bɔɔka oŋki ne coŋɔn ba oŋki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ?”
40018022	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya gɔkka iti, naa i ɛkɛ bɔɔka oŋki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ budan bɛɛ. Dala i ɛkɛ bɔɔka oŋki a ma baan ne ḍoogɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ (77).
40018023	“Jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba jyek mena a ḍuaŋa tolan gɛɛl ne ɛkɛ balki yɔŋki jyek dɛn bilk iki maka kanŋan ɛkɛtiy.
40018024	Ne ma coocki iñɔ aŋka gɔrti jiekyɛ, mena balki dɛn bilk ne coŋɔn neeni owwi ma ḍuaŋa ñamɛti.
40018025	Ɔci mena neeni yaakinti ḍuaŋa tolan ‘wondɛ bilka neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin mati agi dala ‘wana neeni eetan wiɛltanyɔ ma iki ɛŋ ɛkɛ ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛ ɔci mal ɛkɛ waakɛnda aŋka dala ḍuaŋa tolan neeni bilk ɛkɛ dɔɔdɛ bora.
40018026	“Ɔci ne mena kanŋan ɛkɛti neeni tieŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin iñɔ ḍuaŋa tolan ñamɛti, ɔci ḍɔnjin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa tolan, dala i ‘ya ‘wonda wɔɔka ṭɔɔlɛ ne ḍiɛran lakun, acaan ‘ya lierca ɔci i ‘wondin wak i waakɛnda.’
40018027	Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci ‘uan bɔɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ te dɛɛn waakɛnda.
40018028	“Ɔci ‘wana neeniyɛ, ne ɛkɛ kaanni bora te on ḍuaŋa tolantiyɛ, ɛkɛ koogjin iki ‘wana noŋi i ɛkkɛn kanŋa ɛka parɛ. Ɔci ‘wana parɛ neeni balki dɛn bilk ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ɛkɛti budan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘wana neeni muŋŋɛ te pwanɛ ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘‘Ya ‘wonda bilk ‘ya!’
40018029	“Ɔci ‘wana parɛ neeni ḍwoñjin iñɔ ɛkɛ ñamɛti, ɔci ḍɔnjin ɛkɛti agi, ‘‘Ya ‘wonda wɔɔka ṭɔɔlɛ ne ḍiɛran lakun, ɔci i ‘wondin bilk i waakɛnda!’
40018030	“Ɔci ɛkɛ yookɔn. Ɔci ‘wana parɛ neeni olnɛ ɛkɛ ciginji ɔci buagɔn ɛkɛ ciya ciginji ne dɛɛn baadi ɔɔn.
40018031	“Ɔci ‘uaya noŋi kanŋa ḍuaŋa tolan ɛkkin pookɛnyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yeyɔ ne tolan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ḍuaŋa tolanti, ɔci mena neeni tiagiyɔ ɛkkɛn te jyeka neeni waakɛnda.
40018032	“Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan ‘wana neeni bornɛ nona ɛkɛti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I ag ‘wana yaayan hay! I bɔɔŋnin ‘ya te dɛn i waakɛnda acaan i baal wiak ‘yati.
40018033	Oŋ ba i yomu pɔŋni ɛkɛti daŋkun ba bɔɔkin i bɔɔŋnin ‘ya neeni bɛ?’
40018034	Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan neeni looñi ne pɛñan te naŋki ‘wana neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ olnɛ ḍuaŋa tolan jiju ciginji, ɔci gɔkcin maka gɔṭi ciginti agi, ‘Dala ɛkɛ ciya jiju ne ‘ya ‘wondata ɛkɛ bilk ‘ya waakɛnda ɔɔn.’
40018035	“Gɔṭṭɛ jwali konɛ waanɛti, kan ɛkkɛ modg ɛkkɛ bɔɔktɛ te yoma pwadan bɛɛyɛ, ɔci Wey ɔɔn noŋdi ɛkkɛti ba naŋki ḍuaŋa tolan neeni daŋkun.”
40019001	Ɔci ne Yaccu ḍookki te lali jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ban Jaliil dalnɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ati Tol Urdun jyɛnnɛji ati ṭɛr Ma Yahuudiya nona bala tool taaŋŋa waayitiy.
40019002	Ɔci ma bootcin ɛkɛti kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Ɔci maka waakɛn yeyin ɛkkɛn ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ bana waayiti.
40019003	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin bɛɛn ɛkɛti, ɔci bala tooci yieci ɛkɛ. Ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan mena ‘uan ɛŋ ɛkɛ daldɛ te jwali gɛɛly, a ɔɔn bala ba jyek ganuun Muuca bɛɛ?”
40019004	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ pokkɛ jyeka kiigin boki? Jyeka neeni gɔki agi, ‘Oŋŋa ma aŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a ‘uan ɔci mena parɛ aŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a ɛɛŋo.’
40019005	Ɔci jyeka kiigin moki gɔki agi, ‘A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne mena kaalgɔn ḍɛɛdi ɛɛŋyɛ, ɛkɛ on weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛn daldɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ciyi iki ɛŋ ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ.
40019006	Acaan, ɛkkɛn yaakkɛn aŋi ba mena ne cyɛɛlɔ doki, a yyɛɛwɔ moki bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka ñaaŋŋɛyɔ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, naa menga ɛkkɛn kɛbdɛ jitin moki bɛɛ.”
40019007	Ɔci maka neeni tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Oŋ Muuca gɔki agi kan mena ‘uan ɛŋ ɛkɛ dalnɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛn tantan ɔci ɛkɛ ɛɛŋ ‘wondɛ worga doortin ogo?”
40019008	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Muuca jyek doortin i moong neeni kiinɛ ɛkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ tɛy tɛyo. Yeti te ñamu jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ.
40019009	Ɔci ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, kan ɛɛŋ noŋi tomi bɛɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ daldɛ ‘war ɛkɛ te jwalla parɛ gɛɛl, ɔci ‘wana neeni ḍɛɛdi ɛŋa parɛyɛ, a ɔɔn ɛkɛ noŋi tommo. Ɔci kan ɛŋa dalnɛ ‘war ɛkɛ neeni ḍɛɛnɛ ‘wana parɛyɛ, ‘wana parɛ neeni noŋi tomi ɛŋa neeniti.”
40019010	Ɔci ne Yaccu ḍookkiyɛ, maka laldɛ ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Oŋ kan jiek bala a ɔɔn te mena ‘uan ɔci ɛŋ ɛkɛy, coodda ma cieti budan te ḍɛɛn aŋka yɔmjin bɛɛ?”
40019011	Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ma waakɛnda yaakinti jyeka neeni muktan bɛɛ. Gena maka ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka neeni aŋka noŋdi ba jyeka neeniy.
40019012	Maka ‘uayi gɛɛg ḍɛñi bɛɛ acaan naŋki jitkɛn bala coŋɔ. Ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ḍɛñi bɛɛ acaan ɛkkɛn jiedɛ ma a luoko, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ḍɛñi bɛɛ acaan ɛkkɛn yuyɛ mako, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ḍɛñi bɛɛ te jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn noŋdi kanŋa ne pwadan. Mena lalla neeni mugdɛ yomɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi a ɔɔn.”
40019013	Ɔci ma bala etti kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin Yaccuti. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ordɛyɔ. Yeti maka laldɛ Yaccu kɛkcin maka neeniti.
40019014	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn kɛkki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan agi, “Dala kɛɛgin daldɛ bɛya ‘yati. Naa ɛkkɛ kɛkɛ ɛkkɛn a ɔɔn bɛɛ, acaan jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, gena jyek maka bala ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.”
40019015	Ne Yaccu byeŋkɛ tannɛ kɛɛginti dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ ati bana parɛti oŋo.
40019016	Ɔci ‘wana ḍiɛran gɛɛl bɛɛn Yaccuti ɔci tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, ‘ya noŋja naŋka pwadan naŋka ɔki aŋka tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni bɛɛdi ‘yatiy?”
40019017	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “I tooc ‘yati te jyek naŋka pwadan neeni ogo? Mena pwadan gɛɛl bala boki? Gena Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ aŋka pwadany. Kan i buagi tɛɛtin wannayɛ, dala i jyek ganuun jitkɛn tiyayɔ.”
40019018	Ɔci ‘uan tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Ganuun jitka bɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “ ‘Naa i menga noga bɛɛ, naa i noŋja tomi bɛɛ, naa i kor waak bɛɛ, naa i men gɛɛl jomgayɔ bɛɛ.
40019019	Dala i noŋja ne pwadan weegɔti ɔci mɛɛgɔti.’ Ɔci ‘Dala anna i ani mena parɛyɛ, yoomdi i anna i ani war iy.’”
40019020	Ɔci ‘wana ḍiɛran neeni gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “‘Ya baal tiec jyeka neeni waakɛn ne ‘ya wona ḍiɛra men ɔɔn. Jiek tiiñiyɔ ‘ya waakɛnda, jwali gɛɛl daljan ‘ya ɔntɔ te tiit bɛɛ. Ɔci acca jwalla parɛ gɛɛl bala boki?”
40019021	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan i buagi pwadi ne tolan Juaŋ ñamɛtiyɛ, dala i ootta wak i wiɛlja ñin waakɛnda ɔci bilk ḍierga maka bɔwan aŋka i balti maal ñaalɔ pɔliji, hayya i oŋ bɛɛd bootta ‘yati oŋo.”
40019022	Yeti ne ɛkɛ tieŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ yaañi ɔci ɛkɛ Yaccu dalnɛ ɔci ɛkɛ atti. Ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɛ acaan ɛkɛ balki waak ne coŋɔn, ɔci buagɔn ɛkkɛn wiɛldɛ ñin bɛɛ.
40019023	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Maka cyɛganyɛ, bolja ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan naŋtiti agdi Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛnyɛ, tɛy tɛyo.
40019024	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki, ka wɔtcin kolŋan wɔtti ibra waŋɛtiyɛ, koocin te bolja mena maalɛ tolan Jwaŋa Tolan naŋdi agdi Ciɛggɔn ɛkɛy.”
40019025	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi ne pɛñan, ɔci tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Oŋ kan a ɔɔny, a menɛ uday?”
40019026	Ɔci Yaccu gɔrcin ɛkkɛnti ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Ma baan yaakinti waakɛn ootan iñɔ bɛya ɛkɛ bieŋɛti pookɛn bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka yaakinti ɛkkɛn magdɛ. Acaan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ tɛɛkti genga bɛɛ.”
40019027	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Gɔṭṭi, ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn waak dalnɔn waakɛnda, ɔci ɔɔn boonnɔn iti doki. A gena a gena pwadan bɛya ɔɔnti te naŋka neeniy?”
40019028	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, ne ṭɛɛr agdiyɔ Juaŋ agdi ṭɛra woonɛ, ɔci ne ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan cootta kaakci ‘ya kaakci cyɛgjiti ñaalɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ da coottɛ kokin ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋinti kokin a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniti. Ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ jyek ma ikin ma Icrayiil maka kɛɛna a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniy.
40019029	Ɔci maka oorg ɛkkɛn dalji ɔci modg ɛkkɛn dalji, ɔci kowi ɛkkɛn dalji, ɔci weyi ɛkkɛn dalji, ɔci mɛyi ɛkkɛn dalji, ɔci yelk ɛkkɛn daljɛ te jyek ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋ waak ne coŋɔn. Ɔci tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛyɛ, bala ɛkkɛnti.
40019030	Maka coŋin maka bala ñamu accayɛ, ne baaṭi ɛkkɛn gɛɛg bala ŋoyɔ. Ɔci maka bala ŋoyɔ accayɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka gɛɛg bala ñamu.
40020001	“Jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba jyek mena jɔŋŋin ati te liid ṭɔɔl ḍiɛran ati lieṭi maka noŋi kanŋa bal ɛkɛ bal luutkiny.
40020002	Ɔci ma gɛɛg yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ jiek naŋɛ iki ɛkkɛn agi te oŋ jiña ne cyɛɛlɔ agi ɛkɛ ɛkki ‘woñji ḍeyyan mɛɛgdan ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn jiek ḍaakkitiyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ ɛkkɛn cuuññɛ balji oŋo.
40020003	Ɔci ne oŋ waŋɛ kuani ñaalɔyɛ, ɛkɛ ati lieṭi ma kanŋa moki. Ɔci ma gɛɛg mɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ bala yɔdi a yɔɔdi budan dukkan jitin.
40020004	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ ‘ya noŋdata kanŋa bal ‘ya daŋkun. Ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛ ‘wondin bilk ne pwadan.’ Ɔci ɛkkɛn atti.
40020005	Ɔci ne oŋ waŋɛ yɔɔnni yeccu moki, ɛkɛ ati bora ɔci gɔkcin mati a ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeti moki. Ɔci moki ne oŋ warɛ yiɛnnɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ati bora ɔci gɔkcin maka pookɛnti a ɔɔn moki ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeti daŋkun.
40020006	Ɔci moki ne oŋ waŋɛ unniyɛ, ɛkɛ ati bora moki, ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg mɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ yɔdi a yɔɔdi budan moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Ɛkkɛ yɔdgɛ a yɔɔdi budan a ɔɔn ogo?’
40020007	Ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Men gɛɛl ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn kanŋa bɛɛ.’ Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Dala ɛkki ɔgdɔ ooddɔ kandɔ bal ɛkɛti daŋkun.’
40020008	“Ɔci ne oŋ waŋɛ unniyɛ, bal weegɛn gɔkcin mena gɔṭi ma kanŋa neeniti agi, ‘Dala ma kanŋa ‘woñga bilk waakɛnda. Dala i jɔɔtca ‘woñja te maka bɛɛn ne ŋoyɔ, ne maka bɛɛn ñamuti ɔɔn.’
40020009	Maka bɛɛn kanŋati ne oŋ utcinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ ḍeyyan mɛɛgɛn ne cyɛɛlɔ waakɛnda.
40020010	Ɔci ne maka ñamu bɛɛkiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala poŋi gɔki agi ɛkkɛn dita eedinti bilk ne coŋɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn waakɛndayɛ, menga da eci ḍeyyan mɛɛgɛn ne cyɛɛlɔ budan.
40020011	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bilk eyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala wooki on weegɛn agi,
40020012	‘Maka bɛɛn ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi kanŋa ba oŋ waŋɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Ɔci ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn kanŋɔn kanŋa tɛyan, ɔci oŋ waŋɛ moki myɛlla myɛli ɔɔnti. Oŋ i ɔɔn ‘wondɔn pordɔn a porti i ɛkkɛn ogo?’
40020013	Ɔci on weegɛn gɔkcin men gɛɛlti te maka neeniti agi, ‘Mug ɔɔn, ‘ya noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl iti bɛɛ. Ikin jyek bilk naŋŋin a cyɛɛlɔ te ñamu te ḍeyyan mɛɛgɛn bɛɛ?
40020014	Dala wak i lula ɔci i ɔgdi ootta, ‘ya buaga mena bɛɛn ŋoyɔ neeni ‘woñga ba ‘woñgin i ‘wonnin ‘ya neeni ɔɔn.
40020015	’Ya yaakati noŋja ba yom ‘ya paru te wak ‘ya bɛɛ? Kan ‘ya yomu pɔkkan mena parɛ neenitiy, a jyek i?’”
40020016	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Ba naŋka neeniyɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, ma gɛɛg a maka te bala ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka bala ŋoyɔ, ɔci ma gɛɛg a maka te bala ŋoyɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka bala ñamu.”
40020017	Yaccu bala pɔɔjɔ ooddi ban Urcaliim. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali yomɔ menyɛ, ɛkɛ maka laldɛ ɛkɛ a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ eññɛ nona parɛti pookɛn. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi,
40020018	“Gɔṭṭɛ, ikin oottin ne dɛntin ban Urcaliimyɛ, ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ‘wonta ma gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud, ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ byeŋkɛnti doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi godan ‘yati, ɔci te jyek godan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi dala ‘ya tuudjɔ.
40020019	Ɔci ‘ya ‘wonta ɛkkɛn ackan ma Ḍɔɔm byeŋkɛnti moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñieddi te ‘ya ɔci ‘ya ḍuata ɛkkɛn. Ɔci ‘ya ŋaapta ɛkkɛn. Yeti ne nink ne ḍoogɔ bɛɛti borayɛ, ‘ya jɔlla ñaalɔ te koolji moki. Gena jyek ‘ya neeni.”
40020020	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛŋ Jɛbadi bɛɛn Yaccuti iki kɛɛgin ɛkɛ kɛɛgin a ‘uayo. Ɔci ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin iñɔ Yaccu ñamɛti ɔci tooccin Yaccuti te jwali gɛɛl.
40020021	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛɛŋti agi, “I buagi gena?” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Oŋŋa i agdi Ciɛggɔn Tolanyɛ, dala i kɛɛgin ‘ya neeni naŋa a ma i waru, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ te byeŋa byerɔn, ɔci mena ne cyɛɛlɔ te byeŋa aamo.”
40020022	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay, taata toocɛ ɛkkɛ neeni jiek jitkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ yaakɛti mottɛ kubaaya taab kubaaya maadi ‘ya neeni boki?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛ, ɔɔn yaakɔnti.”
40020023	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ mottɛ kubaaya taab ‘ya awarɛ, yeti a ‘ya ɛkkɛ ‘wondin jyek coodda ɛkkɛ coottɛ ‘ya byeŋkuti bɛɛ. Maka buagɛ Wey ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ nona neeni.”
40020024	Ɔci ne maka laldɛ ɛkɛ maka a inyaakkɛn neeni tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn looñi modga neeniti.
40020025	Ɔci Yaccu ma bornɛ agi dala ɛkki bɛɛdɔ nona ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati nona ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, paŋi ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ḍuaŋan keedin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ boki? Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍwaŋin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ma waakɛnda noŋdi ba jyek ɛkkɛn. Ɔci maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki mati ne pɛñan te jyeka ɛkkɛn buagiti naŋtan may.
40020026	Yeti naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka neeni a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti buagɔn aga mena tolanyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba ne ɛkɛ agi mena kanŋan ɛkkɛti ɔɔn.
40020027	Ɔci kan mena buagɔn aga mena bala ñamu ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba mena kɛɛngɔn ma waakɛnda.
40020028	Bala ba ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ne bɛɛna iñɔyɛ, naŋki ‘ya bala a ɔɔn daŋkun. ‘Ya bɛɛn aŋka ma moki ‘ya bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya bɛɛn aŋka ‘ya mok mako. ‘Ya bɛɛn won maka coŋin te yimg ‘ya.”
40020029	Ɔci ne Yaccu kaanni bora te ban Jɛrikɔyɛ, ma bootcin ɛkɛti kɔɔna kɔɔnno.
40020030	Ɔci maka ullin bala ciyi pɔy taaŋɛti ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki agi Yaccu bɛɛdɔ gordɔ te pɔya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaajjin ne tolan agi, “I, Ciɛggɔn, Kaci Daawud, dala i yomu pɔkka ɔɔnti ɔci ɔɔn pɔktɔn ñingɔti!”
40020031	Ɔci polla tolan neeni bala dɛyi ɛkkɛn agi dala ɛkki ciedɔ lieda. Yeti ɛkkɛn cien lieda bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala yaadan a yook ɔɔn agi, “I Ciɛggɔn, Kaci Daawud, dala i yomu pɔkka ɔɔnti!”
40020032	Ɔci Yaccu yɔɔni, ɔci ɛkɛ maka ullin neeni bornɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ɛkɛti. Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya noŋja a ɔki ɛkkɛti?”
40020033	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, dala i ɔɔn pɔktɔn woŋgɔti!”
40020034	Ɔci Yaccu yomɛ wiak te ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ topcin ɛkkɛn woŋgɛnti, ɔci ne pɛñan ɛkkɛn yaakinti gwali noon doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bootcin Yaccuti doki te pɔɔjɔ ɔɔn.
40021001	Ɔci ne Yaccu i maka laldi ɛkɛ cɔɔlki ban Urcaliimyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn baan gɛɛl bala yomɔ pom Jɛtuun taaŋɛti yenti Bɛtpɛɛj. Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu gɛɛg cuuññɛ ɛkɛ ne yyɛɛwɔ.
40021002	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɔgdɛ ooddɛ pɔya eetan ma bana neeniti, ɔci ne ɛkkɛ dɛndɛ bana neenitiyɛ, tɔɔrɔn mɔktɛ ɛkkɛ i ṭɔl ɛkɛ bala wiɛntan ma aŋan. Dala ɛkkɛ tɔɔrɔn neeni gwottɛ ɔci oodɛ ‘yati.
40021003	Ɔci kan men gɛɛl tootti ɛkkɛti agi ɛkkɛ noŋjɛ agi ɔɔn ogoyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn buagɔn ɛkkɛn,’ ɔci tɔɔrɔn dɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ ne pɛñan.”
40021004	Jyek naŋka neeni bɛɛn bora ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolany. Bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi,
40021005	“Dala ɛkkɛ ma Urcaliim myettɛ agi, ‘Gɔṭṭɛ, Ciɛggɔn Tolan ɛkkɛ bala bɛya ɛkkɛti. Ɛkɛ noŋi warɛ bɛɛ, ɛkɛ bala taap te tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ.’”
40021006	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu atti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu ɛkkɛntiy.
40021007	Ɛkkɛn tɔɔrɔn owwɛ i ṭɔl ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci bworŋin ɛkkɛn ḍuacci tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ ŋoyɛti. Ɔci Yaccu taapcin ñaalɔ.
40021008	Ɔci maka coŋin maka pookɛn bworŋin ɛkkɛn cyɛtci pɔy konɛti aŋka noŋdi ɛkɛti ba mena tolan. Ɔci maka pookɛn lɛɛwin aamk jang te bora, ɔci owwɛ cyɛtci ma pɔɔjɔ pɔy konɛti aŋka noŋdi ɛkɛti ba mena tolan.
40021009	Ɔci ma gɛɛg bala wɛɛyi ñamu. Ɔci maka pookɛn bootcin ɛkɛ ŋoyɛti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaadan gɔki agi, “Mena bala ñaalɔy, dala i yuoc ɔɔn acca! Dala ma jieyi i! I a Kiṭɔ Kaci Daawud! Mena bɛya te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, dala i cied ne pwadan! Dala i yuoc ɔɔn acca! Dala Juaŋ jiɛtan ma!”
40021010	Ɔci ne Yaccu dɛnni ban Urcaliimyɛ, maka ciyi aŋan bala gɔki te jyek Yaccu waakɛnda agi, “Mena neeni a menɛ?”
40021011	Ɔci ma bala gɔki agi, “Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan. Gena Yaccu mena bɛɛn te ban Najarɛt ban Jaliiljiy.”
40021012	Ɔci Yaccu kaaccin orɔ on Juaŋ ona tolan. Ɔci ɛkɛ maka wɛɛṭi waak neeniyɛ, ŋualnɛ bora. Ɔci ɛkɛ tarabɛɛcan ḍorki ma girin neeniyɛ, jitkɛn baamnɛ iñɔ. Ɔci wak maka wɛɛṭi boobgyɛ, jitkɛn moki baamnɛ iñɔ.
40021013	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki worgaji agi, ‘On ‘ya a ona cɔkki may,’ yeti ‘On ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ a ona cieki maka ɛyyo!’”
40021014	Maka ullin ɔci maka ŋɔr ɛkkɛn bɛɛn Yaccuti on Juaŋ ona tolan ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ywaŋŋɛyɔ.
40021015	Yeti ne gaciicin ḍwaŋin ɔci maka loṭi worga Jwaŋa Tolan gɔrki naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu pwadan, ɔci moki ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki kɛɛgin balki yaadki agi, “Hay i kaci Daawud! Dala ma jieddi i,” Ɛkkɛn looñi ne pɛñan te naŋka neeni.
40021016	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “I tieŋni jyeka guaktan kɛɛgin te i neeni bɛɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘ya tieŋŋan. Ɛkkɛ pokkɛ jyeka kiigin jyeka gɔki te naŋka neeni bɛɛ? Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, ‘Te naŋki Juaŋyɛ, kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin kɛɛgin niɛd mɛyyɛnti menyɛ, ɛkkɛn jieddi Juaŋ ne pwadan te tugi ɛkkɛn.’”
40021017	Ɔci Yaccu maka neeni dalnɛ ɔci ɛkɛ ati kaaccin bora te bana tolan neeniti, ɔci ɛkɛ ati ban Bɛtani ɔci ɛkɛ niini wɛnan.
40021018	Ɔci oŋŋa parɛ te liidɔyɛ, Yaccu bala pɔɔjɔ noŋi dɔɔkti bana tolanti moki, ɔci ɛkɛ amɛ koño.
40021019	Ɔci ɛkɛ ŋuami gɛɛl yuarnɛ pɔy taaŋɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ati orcinti ŋuamiti, ɔci bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yɔṭi ŋuami ṭɔlgɛ gɛɛg bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yɔṭi gena jyeyi budan. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin jaanti agi, “Naa i jiedi ṭɔlgi ywongati moki bɛɛ.” Ɔci ne pɛñan jaan iini.
40021020	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Jana neeni iin ne pɛñan a ɔɔn ogo?”
40021021	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, kan ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ne pwadan ɔci tiekɛ jiek yomgɔti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti noŋdɛ ba naŋka naŋi ‘ya ŋuamiti neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti naŋka neeni parɛ bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ne pwadan ɔci gɔktɛ poma neeniti agi ɛkɛ dɔddɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñaalɔ ɔci yiɛptɛ galŋjiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan noŋdi awarɛ.
40021022	Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti, ɔci toottɛ ɛkɛti te genga, ɔci kan ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ yomgɔti agi ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ gena neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ gena neeni doki.”
40021023	Ɔci ne Yaccu kaanni kaañji kañ on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ, gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud ɔci cyekin bɛɛn ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi. “Ɔɔn myettɔn, i noŋ naŋka neeni te jyek menɛ? A menɛ i ‘wonni naŋka neeniy?”
40021024	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya da buaga toocca ɛkkɛti te jwali gɛɛl daŋkun. ‘Ya ṭwoktata ɛkkɛ ñamu parun oŋ ɛkkɛ oŋ myettin ‘ya daŋkun oŋo.
40021025	Bulti Yɔhanna bɛɛn te aŋɛ? Ɛkɛ bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantɛ? Walla bɛɛn te ma baanti budan?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Kan ikin gɔktin agi bulti Yɔhanna neeni bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, ɔci Yaccu tootti ikinti dita agi, ‘Oŋ kan a ɔɔny, ba ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyek ɛkɛti bɛ?’
40021026	Yeti kan ikin gɔktin agi bulti Yɔhanna bɛɛn te ma baanti budanyɛ, ikin buayin maka coŋin acaan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda gɔki agi Yɔhanna agi bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan.”
40021027	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin Yaccuti agi ɛkkɛn bulti Yɔhanna neeni ŋeejinti ne bɛɛnda te aŋɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin te naŋka naŋdi ‘ya neeni daŋkun bɛɛ.”
40021028	Yaccu gɔkcin maka yoyi ñin iki ɛkɛti moki agi, “Ɛkkɛ poŋɛ a ɔki? Gɔṭṭɛ jwalla a caagɔn neeni poca. Mena ‘uan gɛɛl balki kɛɛgin a ‘uay ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci weegɛn ati kacca ñamuti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Kaci ‘ya, ‘ya buaga i ootta kanŋati te oŋi balji bal luutkin.’
40021029	Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin weegɛnti agi ɛkɛ ootci bɛɛ. Ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkɛ poŋjin yomɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ dɔki atti.
40021030	Ɔci weegɛn ati kacca parɛti kacca akki yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti ba jwalla guaŋnɛ ɛkɛ kacca ñamu neeniti ɔɔn. Ɔci kaci ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ɛɛ.’ Yeti ɛkɛ ati bɛɛ.
40021031	Te kɛɛgin ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniy, ba kacca noŋi ba jyek weegɛn neeni bɛ?” Ɔci ma ṭwokcin Yaccuti agi, “Gena kacca ñamu.” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “A warɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, maka lyemi tulba ɔci moonga tobinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ooddi cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanti ñamu te ɛkkɛ.
40021032	Acaan Yɔhanna Mena Buoṭi Ma bɛɛn ɛkkɛti doki, ɔci ɛkɛ bala mieti ɛkkɛ te jyek pɔya a tyɛlga neeni, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Yeti maka lyemi tulba ɔci moonga tobinyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ gɔrnɛ maka pookɛn neeni jyetki jyek Yɔhannayɛ, ɛkkɛ yookɛ men ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyek ɛkɛ men bɛɛ.”
40021033	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jwalla a caagɔn ɛka parɛ neeni. On weegɛn gɛɛl bala, ɔci ɛkɛ ati pieti luutkin, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi kaañ bal warɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi gena tooñki ma luutkin. Ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi ona beyan ona lɛɛlki ma noono. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala neeni ‘wonnɛ maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti ɔci ɛkɛ ati bana parɛ.
40021034	Ɔci ne pana pwonki ma luutkin ṭɔlgɛn bɛɛniyɛ, bal weegɛn maka kanŋan ɛkɛti gɛɛg cuuññɛ nona maka gɔṭi bal neeniti aŋka ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ wɛttan jang ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg ootan baanji ɛkɛti.
40021035	Ɔci maka gɔṭi bal neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn maka cuuññɛ bal weegɛn neeni muogɛyɔ. Ɔci maka neeni gɛɛl jiebɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛka parɛ gɛɛl nogɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛka parɛ gɛɛl moki yepci ɛkkɛn te gwoyyo.
40021036	Ɔci bal weegɛn maka kanŋan ɛkɛti gɛɛg cuuññɛ moki. Maka kanŋan ɛkɛti maka cuuññɛ ɛkɛ ŋoyɔ neeni a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn coŋɔ te maka ñamuy. Yeti ɛkkɛn naŋɛ ma ne yaayan ba maka ñamu wanna ɔɔn.
40021037	Ɔci ne ŋoyɔ bal weegɛn kaci ɛkɛ cuuññɛ nona mati. Weegɛn poŋi gɔki agi ne kaci ɛkɛ oottayɛ, agi maka neeni tieŋdɔ jyek ɛkta.
40021038	“Ɔci ne maka gɔṭi bal ɛkɛ yuarkitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, ‘Mena neeniyɛ, gena mena bal weegɛn luldɛ ɛkɛ ne baaṭiy. Bɛɛdɛ ikin oottin ɛkɛ noktin, ɔci wak weegɛn waka te ooddi ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, aga wak ikin.’
40021039	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ mugɛ eyɛ bora te balji, ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ nogɛ ɛkkɛn bora oŋo.
40021040	“Oŋ ne bal weegɛn dɔɔdi ban ɛkkɛny, ɛkkɛ poŋɛ ɛkɛ noŋdi a ɔki ɛkkɛnti?”
40021041	Ɔci maka neeni ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Bal weegɛn ooddi ban ɛkkɛn dita, ɔci maka yeyin neeni nogdɛ ɛkɛ te yom yoñ ɛkɛ neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ bal ‘wondɛ maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bal weegɛn ‘wontan jang ṭɔlgɛn ɛkɛ daŋkun.”
40021042	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Oŋ ɛkkɛ, ɛkkɛ pokkɛ jyeka kiigin neeni bɛɛ? Jiek gɔki agi, ‘Poma guaktan maka cɔti oorg agi ɛkta yaayɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi poma pwadan on warɛti doki. Naŋka neeni naŋŋɛ Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkɛ pwanna pwani ikin ñinguti!’
40021043	“A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, Jwaŋa Tolan jyek cyɛgji ɛkɛ eedɛ ɔntɔ te ɛkkɛti ɔci ‘wondɛ maka pookɛn gɛɛg maka noŋi ba jyek ɛkɛ ba naŋki maka gɔṭi bal maka pwadin ne ɛkkɛn bal weegɛn ‘wontɛti jang ṭɔlgɛny. [
40021044	Kan men gɛɛl twordɛ poomyɛ, ɛkɛ nuudɛji poomo. Ɔci kan poom ḍɛmdi men gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ mena neeni ñoottɛ iñɔ.]”
40021045	Gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud ɔci ma Pɛriciinyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyeka a caagin guaŋŋɛ Yaccu ɛkkɛnti neeniyɛ, ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ne Yaccu baali gɔki jyeka neeni te ɛkkɛn acaan jyeka neeni a caagin te ɛkkɛn.
40021046	Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud ɔci maka loṭi worga Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn Yaccu muktan acaan ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn Yaccu gɔkcin jwalla a caagɔn neeni ɛkkɛnti te naŋki ɛkkɛn, yeti ɛkkɛn buayi maka coŋin neeni, acaan maka coŋin neeni gɔki agi Yaccu agi bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan.
40022001	Ɔci Yaccu moki gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti te jyeka a caagin gɛɛg.
40022002	Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, bala ba jyek mena a ḍuaŋa tolan gɛɛl ne kaci ɛkɛ ḍɛññi ɛɛŋ ɔci noŋni ɛkɛ jumay.
40022003	Ɔci ɛkɛ maka kanŋan ɛkɛti cuuññɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn ma myettan agi, ‘Juma cɔɔlin doki, dala ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ jumati.’ Yeti ma bɛɛn jumati bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn.
40022004	Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolanyɛ, maka kanŋan ɛkɛti ɛkkin pookɛn cuuññɛ moki gɔki agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ ma myettɛ ‘ya oomdin ḍaaŋi te naŋki doki. Yotk ɔci neek ṭɔlgɛn cagin ɛkkɛn ŋaarŋ ‘ya doki! ‘Ya waak ḍaaŋi waakɛnda doki. Dala ɛkkɛn bɛya jumati.’
40022005	Ɛkkɛn yookɔn ṭwokcin genga ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati nona ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buagitiy. Mena ne cyɛɛlɔ ati yel ɛkɛ, ɔci mena parɛ ɛkɛ ati non kanŋa ɛkɛ.
40022006	Ɔci maka bornɛ ḍuaŋa jumati neeni ɛkkɛn maka kanŋan ḍuaŋa tolanti muogɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋjin ne yaayan maka neeniti acaan ɛkkɛn yookɔn te borti ḍuaŋa. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛn nogɛ.
40022007	Ɔci ne ḍuaŋa tolan tieŋni jyek naŋka naŋɛ maka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ looñi ne pɛñan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ackan ɛkɛ cuuññɛ ban maka nokkin maka neeniti ɔci ackan ma nogɛ ɔci ban ɛkkɛn toñgɛ maaño.
40022008	“Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti neeni agi, ‘‘Ya wak juma ḍaaŋi doki, yeti maka borkan ‘ya te ñamu neeniyɛ, ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛn bɛya ‘yati moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn pwadɔ bɛɛ.
40022009	Dala ɛkkɛ ɔgdɛ ooddɛ pɔɔk jitin, ɔci maka mɔktɛ ɛkkɛ pɔɔk jitinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn oodɛ ɛkkɛ ona noŋki ma jumati waakɛnda.’
40022010	Ɔci maka kanŋan ɛkɛti neeni ati bora pɔɔk jitin, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala boori ma waakɛnda, maka pwadin iki maka yeyin ɔɔn. Ɔci maka neeni eyɛ ɛkkɛn jumati. Ɔci ona noŋki ma juma neeniyɛ, kuumi te maka wɛlgo.
40022011	“Ɔci ne ḍuaŋa tolan bɛɛni orɔ aŋka gɔrti wɛlgyɛ, ɛkɛ mena ‘uan gɛɛl yuarnɛ bala ciyi ma jitin, ɛkɛ bala ɛŋi bworŋ juma warɛti bɛɛ.
40022012	Ɔci ḍuaŋa gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Muka maam, i kooni orɔ wɛnni ne bworŋa ‘yɛŋa i a bworŋ juma baaw ogo?’ Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin genga moki bɛɛ.
40022013	Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin ma kanŋati agi, ‘Ɛkɛ ḍɛgdɛ byeŋkɛti ɔci ciegɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ yiɛptɛ bora nona mielti.’ Ɔci ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, ka aŋanyɛ, ma wiak ɔci ŋɛyi lɛkɛn te yom yoño.
40022014	“Acaan ma ne coŋɔn bornɛ Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka bɛya ɛkɛti, yeti ma gɛɛg ne ḍiakan aŋka aga ma ɛkɛ woodgɛn.”
40022015	Ɔci ma Pɛriciinyɛ, ɛkkɛn Yaccu dalji ɔci ɛkkɛn atti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin te jyek Yaccu. Ɛkkɛn bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkkɛn Yaccu muktitiy. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn jwalla guagdɛ Yaccu gɛɛl aktanyɔ ɛkkɛn te jwalla yaayan.
40022016	Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn maka laltan ɛkkɛn gɛɛg cuuñɛ nona Yaccuti, ɔci ma Hiruuduc gɛɛg cuuññɛ daŋkun. Ɔci maka neeni tooccin botcin Yaccuti agi, “Mena loṭi may, i ŋeecki ɔɔn i a mena gɔki awarɛ, ɔci i lor ma te jyek Juaŋ te yoma pwadan. Ɔci i buay ma ñingɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci i an menga ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. I an ma waakɛnda.
40022017	Dala i ɔɔn myettɔn te jwali gɛɛl. Yaayɛ ne ikin Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm ‘wontin bilk tulbayɛ?”
40022018	Yeti yomg ɛkkɛn ŋeejɛ Yaccu ne ɛkkɛn balki gɔkki jyek labjiy, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay ɛkkɛ maka noŋi ma ñingɛny, ɛkkɛ poccɛ ‘ya a poccin a ɔɔn ogo?
40022019	Ḍeyyan tulba gɛɛl oodɛ wɛnni ‘ya gɔrca!” Ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍeyyan gɛɛl owwɛ Yaccuti.
40022020	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ḍeyyan neeni, ɛkɛ balki pɔɔyama menɛ? Ɔci a yenti menɛ bala ɛkɛti nɛ?”
40022021	Ɔci ma ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gena Kɛɛcar.” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Wak Kɛɛcaryɛ, ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci wak Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun.”
40022022	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi ɔci ɛkkɛn Yaccu dalji ɔci ɛkkɛn atti.
40022023	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ma Cadyuciin bɛɛn ɛkɛti. Maka neeni loṭi agi ne ma tuudiyɛ, ma jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ɔci tooccin Yaccuti te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl. Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi,
40022024	“Mena Loṭi Ma, Muuca gɔki agi, ‘Kan men gɛɛl ḍɛñi ɛɛŋ ɔci tuun ne ɛŋ ɛkɛ jieni kɛɛgin men bɛɛyɛ, agi dala ɛŋa neeni ḍɛɛdɛ mod ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkɛ jieda kɛɛgin jyettɛ mena tuun neeni.’
40022025	Oŋ gɔṭṭi, maka ‘uay gɛɛg bala ban ɔɔn a dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɛkkɛn a modin waakɛnda jiennɛ mɛya ne cyɛɛlɔ. Moda tolan ñamuyɛ, ḍɛñi ɛɛŋo. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ tuuniyɛ, kɛɛgin ɛkɛ baaw men. Ɔci moda bootcin moda tolan ŋoyɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛɛŋ ḍɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ moki.
40022026	Ɔci ɛkɛ tuun moki. Ɔci moda akki ne ḍoogɔ ɛɛŋ ḍɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ tuun moki. Ɔci moda akki ne ŋaanɔ ɛɛŋ ḍɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ moki. Ɔci moda akki ne dɔɔyɔ ɛɛŋ ḍɛɛnɛ moki. Ɔci ɛka akki ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ ɛɛŋ ḍɛɛnɛ moki. Ɔci ne ŋoyɔ moda akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ ɛɛŋ ḍɛɛnɛ moki. Yeti ɛkkɛn waakɛnda tuun ɔci jieni kɛɛgin gɛɛg men bɛɛ.
40022027	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tuuki waakɛnda a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛɛŋ daŋkun tuuni.
40022028	Oŋ ne oŋŋa ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te lientiy, ɛŋa neeni aga ɛŋ moda ɔki ne ɛkɛ ḍɛyɛ ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ɔɔny?”
40022029	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jiek dammɛ ɛkkɛ hay! Acaan jyeka kiigin kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci moki war tɛɛn Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
40022030	Acaan ne ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te lientiyɛ, ma ḍɛɛwɔ moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala ba malɛɛkan ñaalɔ pɔliji.
40022031	Jyeka kiigin jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛti te jyek jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te lienti neeni paŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ oŋgati boki?
40022032	Juaŋ gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya a Jwaŋ Abrahim ɔci Icaak ɔci Yaakub.’ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a Jwaŋ maka tuutan boki? A’a. Ɛkɛ a Jwaŋ maka tɛɛtan.”
40022033	Maka coŋinyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi te lali ɛkɛ.
40022034	Ma Pɛriciinyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki agi ma Cadyuciin buanda Yaccu te jiekyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ bala gɔṭi jyeka yiecki Yaccuy.
40022035	Ɔci men ma Pɛriciin gɛɛlyɛ, ɛkɛ ati tooccin Yaccuti te jwali gɛɛl. Mena neeni jyek ganuun ŋeejɛ ne tolan. Ɛkɛ bala poci Yaccu a poccin agi,
40022036	“Mena loṭi may, ba jwalla bala ñamu te jyek ganuun Muuca jitka pookɛn neeni bɛ?”
40022037	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Jwalla bala ñamu te jyek ganuun jitka pookɛn neeniyɛ, gɔki agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ anɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛ neeni ne tolan. Dala ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ waakɛnda, ɔci te coodi ɛkkɛ moki waakɛnda, ɔci te paŋi ɛkkɛ moki waakɛnda.’
40022038	Jwalla neeni tol tolo. Ɛkɛ bala ñamu te jyek ganuun jyeka pookɛn waakɛnda.
40022039	Ɔci jwalla bootti jwalla neeni ŋoyɛtiyɛ, gɔki agi, ‘Dala anna i ani mena parɛyɛ, yoomdi i anna i ani war iy.’
40022040	Jyek ganuun ɔci jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, gena kon ɛkkɛn jyeka ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniti.”
40022041	Ne ma Pɛriciin wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlkiti nona ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi,
40022042	“Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ Kiṭɔ a menɛ? Ɛkɛ a kaci menɛ?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛkɛ a kaci Daawud.”
40022043	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Oŋ kan Kiṭɔ a kaci Daawud, oŋ ɛkɛ barŋɛ Daawud te baaṭi agi Kiṭɔ agi Ciɛggɔn ɛkɛ ogo? Acaan Daawud gɔki a ɔɔn te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan agi,
40022044	‘‘Ya tieŋŋan Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ‘yati agi, “Dala i coocca ‘ya taaŋuti taaŋŋa byerɔn ne maka yookɔn te i bwanda ‘ya ɔɔn.”’
40022045	“Kan Kiṭɔ barŋi Daawud agi Ciɛggɔn ɛkɛy, oŋ ɛkɛ a kaci ɛkɛ moki a ɔki?”
40022046	Ɔci maka yookɔn te Yaccu neeni menga yaakinti ṭwokti jwali gɛɛl moki bɛɛ. Ɔci te oŋŋa wanna ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, ma buayi. Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti te jwali gɛɛl moki bɛɛ.
40023001	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka coŋinti ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi,
40023002	“Maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci ma Pɛriciinyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyek ganuun Muuca jitkɛn ootan bora mati.
40023003	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ɔci noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkkɛn oŋkanda. Yeti naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn loṭi ma te tuggɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn tieci jiek waakɛn bɛɛ.
40023004	Ɛkkɛn ganuun jitka tɛyan umtan ma ḍɔɔggɛnti aŋka naŋtan ma, yeti ɛkkɛn woodgɛn daŋkun noŋi ba jyeka ‘womki ɛkkɛn ma wanna bɛɛ.
40023005	“Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ‘wota te maka neeni. Naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛnti budan. Worgan ‘yɛŋtan ɛkkɛnyɛ, ḍwaŋgin a ḍwaŋgin, ɔci jibban ‘yɛŋtan ɛkkɛn becinyɛ, cɔɔrtan waka becin lɛkɛnti.
40023006	Kan juman bala ɛkkɛn buagɔn ciyi nonka pwadinti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛn ani coodi nonka pwadin oorga morki ma Juaŋti.
40023007	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ani ñiebbin nonk dukkan. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛn bartan ma agi, ‘Mena loṭi may.’
40023008	“Naa ɛkkɛ bartɛ ma a ‘Maka loṭi ma’ bɛɛ. Acaan ɛkkɛ balkɛ mena loṭi ma ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ waakidayɛ, ɛkkɛ agi modin.
40023009	Naa men baan gɛɛl bardɛ ɛkkɛ iñɔ baanji wɛnni agi wey ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ balkɛ Wey ɛkkɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Gena Weya ñaalɔ pɔliji.
40023010	Naa ɛkkɛ bartɛ ma a ḍuaŋan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ balki Ciɛggɔn ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Gena Kiṭɔ.
40023011	Mena tolan te ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ aga ba mena kanŋan ɛkkɛti.
40023012	Kan mena kooŋi war ɛkɛ parɛyɛ, ɛkɛ aga mena ḍiɛran budan. Kan men gɛɛl tolcin yom ɛkɛti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka aga ba mena tolan.
40023013	“Hay, ɛkkɛ maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci ma Pɛriciin maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ! Maka pookɛn buagɔn ka bɛya cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanti, yeti pɔy uullɛ ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛ woodgɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ pɔya neeniti bɛɛ. Ɔci maka buagɔn bɛya pɔya neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn kaagɛ ɛkkɛ! [
40023014	“Hay ɛkkɛ maka loṭi worga Juaŋ, ɔci ma Pɛriciin maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ, mal moonga ‘uayɛn tuun ɔci oorg ɛkkɛnyɛ, amɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ cɔkɛ cɔŋŋa beyan aŋka naŋki ɛkkɛ cogdɛyɔ ɛkkɛ te naŋka neeni. Jyeka bɛya ɛkkɛ wyetkɔti te naŋki ɛkkɛyɛ, bwantan jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg bɛɛ.]
40023015	“Hay, ɛkkɛ maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci ma Pɛriciin maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ! Ɛkkɛ atɛ bootɛ baan konɛ warda, ɔci jieddɛ galŋin jitkɛn oŋkanda buagɛ loṭi ma, ɔci kan men gɛɛl tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛ ɔci mali ɛkɛ daldɛ ɔci jyek ɛkkɛ aŋka mugdɛyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin ɛkkɛti. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ aŋi men ɛkkɛ dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ bwandɛ ɛkɛ ne tolan te naŋka yeyin, ɔci ɛkkɛ waakida ooddɛ bana maañti neeni i ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ maka noŋi ma ñingɛn.
40023016	“Hay! Ɛkkɛ maka bala ba maka wɛɛyi maka a ullin nɛ! Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi kan men gɛɛl gɔkti awarɛ te yenti on Juaŋ ona tolan te genga, ɔci kan ɛkɛ dɔki jyeka neeni tiiññɛyɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi genga baalɔ bɛɛ, baatɔ. Yeti agi kan men gɛɛl gɔkti genga awarɛ te yenti dahab bala orɔ on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi naa mena neeni jwali gɛɛl agdɛyɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba jyeka wanna.
40023017	Ɛkkɛ maka amgin maka ñingɛn ulan nɛ! Pari dahab aŋi gena pwadan ne ɛkɛ olkiti ma orɔ on Juaŋ ona tolan bɛ? Oŋ ba gena pwadan ne tolan bɛ? Dahab, walla on Juaŋ ona tolan?
40023018	Ɔci ɛkkɛ moki gɔkɛ agi, kan men gɛɛl gɔkti genga awarɛ te yenti gena ɛrki ma waak ɔci ɛkɛ dɔki jyeka wanna tiiññɛyɔy bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi genga baalɔ bɛɛ, baatɔ. Yeti agi kan men gɛɛl gɔkti genga awarɛ te yenti gena ‘yɛri ma wannayɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi naa mena neeni jwali gɛɛl agdɛyɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba jyeka wanna.
40023019	Ɛkkɛ ‘uaya ñingɛn ulan nɛ! Pari gena ‘yɛri ma neeni pwani ne ɛkɛ olkiti ma gena ɛrki ma waak neeni wyeñɛti bɛɛ? Oŋ ba gena pwadan ne tolan bɛ? Gena ‘yɛri ma? Walla gena ɛrki ma waaky?
40023020	Kan men gɛɛl gɔkti genga awarɛ te yenti gena ɛrki ma waak neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkti te yenti gena neeni iki waka bala ɛkɛ wyeñɛti waakɛnda.
40023021	Ɔci kan men gɛɛl gɔkti genga awarɛ te yenti on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ gɔki awarɛ te yenti on Juaŋ ona tolan ɔci te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan mena ciyi orɔ on Juaŋ ona tolanti neeni.
40023022	Ɔci kan men gɛɛl gɔkti genga awarɛ te pɔlla ñaalɔyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ gɔki awarɛ te yenti kaakci Juaŋ, ɔci te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan mena ciyi kaakci ɛkɛti neeni.
40023023	“Hay, ɛkkɛ maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci Ma Pɛriciin maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ! Ɛkkɛ ‘woññɛ Juaŋ te wak ɛkkɛ waka ḍyɛrin oŋkanda. Gena naanna ɔci lɛlŋ ɔci kamuun. Kan janga neeni bala a inyaakkɛnyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun gɔ Juaŋ ‘woñgi oŋkanda ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔɔn. Yeti naŋka ḍwaŋin naŋki ganuunyɛ, aŋka dalnɛ ɛkkɛ. Gena naŋka awarɛ naŋka a tyɛlga, ɔci yom pɔkkin maka aninti, ɔci tiit jyek Juaŋ waakɛn ne pwadan. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ tiecɛ jyek Juaŋ awarɛ ne pwadan bɛɛ. Dala te ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ waka neeni waakɛnda. Naa te gɛɛl daldɛ bora bɛɛ.
40023024	Ɛkkɛ maka ñingɛn ulan nɛ! Ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba mena wyeñɛ baaw moti waak oŋ miyyan ḍɛɛmdinti waka maaddɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn toomdɛ bora, ɔci gena tolan ba kolŋan ɔɔnyɛ, aŋka lannɛ ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ i waka maaddɛ ɛkɛ neeni!
40023025	“Hay, ɛkkɛ maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci ma Pɛriciin maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ! Ɛkkɛ yɔŋɛ ḍwayi waakɛn te bora budan. Yeti ḍwayi ɛkkɛ korkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn kuumi te waka yeyin ba ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ne kuumki te naŋka yeyin ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ anɛ eñi wak maka pookɛn ɔci yomgɔ ḍwaŋɔ waakti.
40023026	Ɛkkɛ ma Pɛriciin maka ñingɛn ulan nɛ! Te ñamu dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ luagdɛ te waka yeyin parun. A ɔɔnyɛ, coodi ɛkkɛ oŋ pwada Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋo!
40023027	“Hay ɛkkɛ maka loṭi worga Juaŋ, ɔci ma Pɛriciin maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ! Ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba oorga jokki ma maka a tuutan ne naŋkiti ma te tolla bɔwan waakɛntiy. Oorg waakɛnti borayɛ, ɛkkɛn pwanna pwanno. Yeti jiju korkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn kuumi te owi ma baan ɔci te waka yeyin waakɛnda.
40023028	Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun balgɛ a ɔɔn. Ma gɔrti ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi ɛkkɛ pwadjɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛ yomgɔti jijuyɛ, ɛkkɛn kuumi te naŋka noŋɛ ɛkkɛ ma ñingɛn neeni, ɔci ɛkkɛn kuumi te naŋka yeyin naŋka pookɛn daŋkun.
40023029	“Hay ɛkkɛ maka loṭi worga Juaŋ, ɔci ma Pɛriciin maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ! Ɛkkɛ cɔti oorga jokki ma maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛ yɔŋɛ waka cɔttan ma waka ma ñingɛn ñiektiti te maka pwadiny. Waka neeni ywaŋdɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan oŋkanda.
40023030	Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi kan te gena ɛkkɛ aŋka balgɛ te baaṭi ba yɔrg ɛkkɛ wannayɛ, te ɛkkɛ bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan noŋŋɛ bɛɛ.
40023031	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ waakɔ yiɛptɛ maccu pookɔ agi ɛkkɛ agji kɛɛgin maka nokkin maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolany.
40023032	Kanŋa naŋɛ yɔrg ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, dala cwamdɛ ɛkkɛ acca ‘yati!
40023033	“Hay ɛkkɛ! Ɛkkɛ korkɔ kuumi te jyek nooŋi ma ba koggo. Pɔya yooŋdɛ ɛkkɛ ɔntɔ te bana maañti bala boki?
40023034	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ cuondin maka a bɔwan ‘ya ɔci maka ñingɛn tɛyan, ɔci maka loṭi worga Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg nogdɛ ɛkkɛ. Ɔci moki gɛɛg ŋaaptɛ ɛkkɛ ñaalɔ. Ɔci maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan gɛɛg ḍuadɛ ɛkkɛ te woong orɔ oorga morki ma Juaŋtiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛ atɛ boottɛ bonk korkɛnti lieṭɛ ma aŋka noŋdɛ ne yaayan ɛkkɛnti.
40023035	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyek lyen maka pwadin waakɛnda, maka nogɛ ma te ñamu ne acca ɔɔnyɛ, bɛya ɛkkɛ wyetkɔti. Maka nogɛ ma neeniyɛ, gena Habiil ɔci maka pookɛn, ɔci ne Jakariyati ɔɔn. (Jakariya neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a kaci Bɛrakaaya.) Jakariya bala yɔɔd yiika on Juaŋ ona tolan i gena ɛrki ma waaky. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali wɛnanyɛ, ɛkɛ nogɛ ma.
40023036	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, jyeka neeni waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛya maka yookɔn te ‘ya maka ciyi acca neeni wyetkɛnti.
40023037	“Hay! Ma Urcaliim, ma Urcaliim! Maka noki bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan maka yebi maka cuonnɛ Jwaŋ ɛkkɛnti nɛ! Bala ba aakṭi mɛɛgɛn ne boori ṭɔlg ɛkɛ ɔci ṭɔlg ɛkɛ wɔtti ɛkɛ bɔggɛtiyɛ, yom ‘ya buagɔn ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ ‘yati a ɔɔn daŋkun. Yeti ɛkkɛ yookɛ te ‘ya!
40023038	Gɔṭṭɛ, on ɛkkɛ on Juaŋ ona tolan dalnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan doki.
40023039	Tieŋdɛ ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛ, ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ oŋgati moki bɛɛ. Yeti ne oŋ gɛɛlti ne ‘ya bɛɛdayɛ, ɛkkɛ oŋ gɔktɛ agi, ‘Mena neeni bɛɛn te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Dala ɛkɛ magdɛ Juaŋo!’”
40024001	Yaccu kooyin bora te on Juaŋ ona tolanti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ati a woono. Ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛn ɛkɛti buagɔn ɛkɛ gɔrti oorga bala on Juaŋ ona tolan toŋkɛtiy.
40024002	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ poŋɛ a oorga neeni ḍwaŋɔ pari bɛɛ? ‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin gena neeni ne pwadan! Guonan ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl niindi ɛka parɛ gɛɛl wyeñɛti ne baaṭi bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yieptan ma iñɔ waakɛnda.”
40024003	Ɔci ne Yaccu atti coonni iñɔ Pom Jɛtuun wyeñɛtiyɛ, maka laldɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛn nona ɛkɛti pookɛn. Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Ɔɔn myettɔn ne pwadan, naŋka guaŋŋi i te on Juaŋ ona tolan neeni bɛya ne tua? Ɔci oŋŋa i bɛɛdi ŋiitan ma te gena? Ɔci oŋŋa wɔɔka ciyin acca neeni baadi bala ne tua?”
40024004	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ menga ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
40024005	Maka coŋin gɛɛg bɛya ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn aginti ‘ya Kiṭɔ awarɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn maka coŋin jyɛttan ɔntɔ.
40024006	Ne ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ agi lañ baalɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jiek agi ma baalɔ ooddɔ lañtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ. Jyeka neeni bɛya awarɛ, yeti jiek wyetkɛn bawwin men bɛɛ.
40024007	Keedin wɛɛn warda noogdi yɔtin pookɛn. Bonka ḍyɛrin noogdi yɔtin pookɛn ɔci bonka ḍwaŋin da noogdi yɔtin pookɛn. Ɔci bonka coŋin gɛɛgtiyɛ, koñ bɛya mati, ɔci ṭɛɛr warɛ ḍieddi ne pɛñan.
40024008	Yeti taab neeniyɛ, gena taab ñamu.
40024009	“Ɛkkɛ mwoktɛ ma ɔci ‘wontɛ ma maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛti. Ɔci ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg noktan mako. Keedin waakɛnda yooktan te ɛkkɛ acaan yenti ‘ya bala ɛkkɛti.
40024010	Te wɔɔka wannayɛ, ma ne coŋin ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ ɔci ɛkkɛn yoddi ñin pookɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn ma ɛkkɛn ‘wontan maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti.
40024011	Maka gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛya ne coŋɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn a bɔwan Juaŋ awarɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ma jyɛttan ɔntɔ a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ.
40024012	Nɔji tola gɔ moki toli ɔɔn, ɔci ma gɛɛg buayi nɔji moki bɛɛ, ɔci gɛɛg nɔñji yiegdi ne tolan. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka coŋin mwondi te anna ɛkkɛn anki Juaŋy.
40024013	Yeti mena yɔɔda ne tɛyan ne oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka yɔɔdɛ Juaŋo.
40024014	Jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan eetan ma baan konɛ warda. Gena jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɔci kan ma tieŋŋin waakɛndayɛ, ɔci oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔ oŋ bɛya oŋo.
40024015	“ ‘Ɛkkɛ maka poki worga nɛ, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ne pwadan. Ne naŋka yaayan ne yaajan,’ naŋka guaŋŋɛ Danyal mena a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan agi bɛɛdɔ neeni yuartɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛti on Juaŋti dokiyɛ,
40024016	dala ɛkkɛ maka ciyi ban Yahuudiya yooŋdɛ poom jitin ne pɛñan.
40024017	Kan men gɛɛl bala ñaalɔ on wyeñɛti te wɔɔka wannayɛ, naa ɛkɛ koodi iñɔ aŋka kaatti orɔ wak ɛkɛ gɛɛgti moki bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ aŋka yooŋdi ne pɛñan.
40024018	Kan men gɛɛl bala yieljiyɛ, naa ɛkɛ yooŋdi nona bworŋ ɛkɛ ḍuannɛ ɛkɛ wanna moki bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ aŋka ɔga yooŋdi ne pɛñan doki.
40024019	Maka laci ɔci maka balki kɛɛgin ḍyɛrinyɛ, oŋŋa wanna tɛy tɛy ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan!
40024020	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti, ɔci tootti ɛkɛti te jyeka neeni aŋka naa naŋka tɛyan neeni bɛya ɛkkɛti te ponk jwamma luyan bɛɛ, walla te Oŋ Cabit gɛɛl bɛɛ! Kan a ɔɔnyɛ, woon tɛy tɛy ne pɛñan.
40024021	Te oŋŋa bɛya wannayɛ, taab pɛñ pɛño. Oŋŋa Juaŋ okki noon, ɔci ne acca ɔɔnyɛ, taab ba taab neeniyɛ, gɛɛl bɛɛn oŋgati men bɛɛ. Ɔci ne baaṭi taab bala ba taab neeniyɛ, gɛɛl bɛya moki bɛɛ.
40024022	Kan te Juaŋ oŋŋa neeni naŋŋi ne ḍuulan bɛɛyɛ, te menga yaakinti uda bɛɛ. Juaŋ poŋi te jyek maka kɛnnɛ ɛkɛ bora, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi dala nink taab neeni ḍuldɔ.
40024023	“Ɔci te oŋŋa bɛya wannayɛ, kan men gɛɛl gɔkti ɛkkɛti agi, ‘Gɔṭṭɛ, Kiṭɔ bala wɛnni!’ Wwalla moki agi, ‘Gṭṭɛ, Kiṭɔ bala aŋanyɛ,’ naa ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ bɛɛ!
40024024	Maka gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti Kiṭɔ ɔci maka gɔki moki agi ɛkkɛn aginti bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛya, yeti ɛkkɛn men gɛɛl a Kiṭɔ waanɛ bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn a bɔwan Juaŋ awarɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋki ɛkkɛn, naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkkɛn aŋka ma gɔrti ɛkkɛn ɔci bootti ɛkkɛnti amaam ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala maka kɛnnɛ Juaŋ bora neeniyɛ, waakɛn yaltan bootti ɛkkɛnti.
40024025	’Ya ṭɛr ɛkkɛ waakɔ te jyeka neeni waakɛnda ne jyeka neeni men baakiy!
40024026	“Kan ma gɔkti ɛkkɛti agi Kiṭɔ baalɔ wɔɔŋjiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ ooddɛ liertɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ! Ɔci kan ma gɔkti agi Kiṭɔ baalɔ orɔ on ṭɔla jijuyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ bɛɛ!
40024027	Bala ba ñaal ne wildiyɛ, ɛkɛ wildan noon dyɛgdɛ pɔli ŋwayɛ warda te pɔya tyɛrñanti ne pɔya koriiyati ɔɔn, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba bɛɛna bɛɛda ‘ya Kaci Ma Baano. ‘Ya yuarta ma noon warda.
40024028	“Kan gena tuun bala niin noongatiyɛ, ɔci wɛjjin omi ɛkɛ bɛya nona ɛkɛti kɔɔna kɔɔnno. (Naa ɛkkɛ liertɛ nona baala ‘ya bɛɛ! Acaan ne ‘ya bɛɛdayɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ yuardin lakun bala ba wɛjjin ne yɔrki waka tuutan te nonka ninki ɛkkɛn noongatiy.)
40024029	“Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ne taab pɛñan neeni baadiyɛ, ‘Oŋ waŋɛ ula, ɔci paan moki dɛkti bɛɛ. Ɔci kɛltan ḍɛɛmdi te ñaalɔ gɔ ɛkan moki ḍɛmmi ɔɔn. Ɔci waka bala ñaalɔ waakɛn ḍieddi waakɛnda.’
40024030	“Ɔci te wɔɔka wannayɛ, ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan oŋ waru lɛɛlla bora mati oŋ te pɔliji oŋo. Ɔci keedin waakɛnda baan wardayɛ, ɛkkɛn wiakti. Ɛkkɛn ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan yuarta ne bɛɛda pɔɔldin wyetkɛnti ñaalɔ pɔliji te war tɛɛn ɔci pwanna pwaniy.
40024031	Ɔci ṭuoŋ wiakti ɔci malɛɛkan ‘ya cuoñña baan warda ñaalɔ ɔci iñɔ pɔli ŋwayyɛti ne pɛñan. Ɔci maka kɛññan ‘ya borayɛ, ɛkkɛn limtanyɔ malɛɛkan ‘yati nona ne cyɛɛlɔ.
40024032	“Jyek ŋuami bala a ɔki? Jyek ŋuami ne pwordiyɛ, ɛkɛ etti jyeyya wonkɛn, ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ noon aŋi ḍuoŋ tukɛ doki.
40024033	Ne ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ naŋka neeni bɛɛti borayɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ oŋŋa ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdayɛ, cɔɔllin doki, looncin moki bɛɛ.
40024034	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan! Maka accayɛ, ɛkkɛn tuwa bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn ciya ne jyeka neeni bɛɛti bora waakɛnda ɔɔn.
40024035	Pɔli ɔci ṭɛɛryɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi. Yeti Jyek ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi bɛɛ.
40024036	“Oŋŋa ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdayɛ, ŋeejɛ menga bɛɛ. Ɔci kwoyɔn malɛɛkan ñaalɔ daŋkun. Ɔci moki kwoy ‘ya Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan daŋkun. Oŋŋa neeni ŋeejɛ gena Wey ɔɔn parɛ.
40024037	Ɔci ba naŋka bɛɛn mati te oŋŋa Nɔwa baali menyɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa ‘ya bɛɛdayɛ, ɛkɛ bala a ɔɔn daŋkun.
40024038	Ne Nɔwa baaliyɛ, ma bala ñingɛn juadan te kanŋa waka amtan ɛkkɛn ɔci waka maattan ɛkkɛny. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ñingɛn juadan te jyek ḍɛɛwin moki. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te tol bɔrda bɛya ɛkkɛnti neeni bɛɛ.
40024039	Ɔci ne Nɔwa kaanni murkaji dokiyɛ, tol bɔrda bɛɛn ɔci maka bala bora neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍakcin waakɛnda. Bɛɛna bɛɛda ‘yayɛ, bala a ɔɔn daŋkun.
40024040	Kan maka ‘uay bala yielji te oŋŋa wanna ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, men gɛɛl eetan malɛɛkan ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɛka parɛ ḍakti.
40024041	Ɔci kan maka moong bala ooṭi pok ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛɛŋ gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ eetan malɛɛkan, ɔci ɛŋa parɛ ḍakti.
40024042	“Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ kɛɛyɛ a kɛɛn ɔɔn, acaan oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, gɔ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
40024043	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te mena waakɛ kali may! Kan te oŋ waŋɛ bɛɛdi mena ɛɛn neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkɛyɛ, te ɛkɛ on kɛɛññɛyɔ ne pwadan ɔci mena ɛɛn neeni te yaaktanti kaatti orɔ bɛɛ.
40024044	Ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun kɛɛddɛ ɔci yomgɔ tiektɛ. Acaan ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ŋeeddata ɛkkɛ oŋŋa ‘ya bɛɛda bɛɛ.
40024045	“Gɔṭṭɛ ‘wota, mena gɔṭi on ne pwadan mena ñingɛ tɛyan a menɛ? Ɛkɛ a mena ‘wondɛ on weegɛn kanŋa ɔci naŋdɛ a ḍuaŋa makɛny. On weegɛn gɔkti ɛkɛti agi dala ɛkta ma kanŋa ‘wonda ɛkta oomdin oŋkanda ne pwadan.
40024046	Men kanŋa mena nɔttɛ weegɛn jyek kanŋa neeni kan bala noŋi kanŋa ɛkɛ neeni ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada pwanno.
40024047	Awarɛ, ne baaṭi ɛkɛ naŋdɛ weegɛn aga mena tolan te ma kanŋa maka pookɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔrti wak weegɛn waakɛnda.
40024048	Yeti kan ɛkɛ a mena yaayanyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkti yomɛti parɛ agi, ‘Wey ɔɔn kwaci a ɔɔn ogo? Ɛkɛ dita bɛya acca men bɛɛ?’
40024049	Ɔci ɛkɛ doki ḍwaddi ma kanŋa maka pookɛn neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ omdi ɔci motti iki maka yeyin maka nokkin mooy oŋkanday.
40024050	Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛlti ne ɛkɛ baali poŋi te weegɛn bɛɛyɛ, weegɛn bɛya ywortiti,
40024051	ɔci mena yaayan neeni ḍuadɛ weegɛn ne pɛñan, ɔci yiɛptɛ ciginji nona maka noŋi ma ñingɛnti, ɔci ɛkɛ ñoodi i ɛkkɛn te naŋka bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛntiy. Ɔci maka neeni wiakti a joono, ɔci ɛkkɛn lɛkɛn tiittanti te yom yoño.
40025001	“Cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ bala ba jyek maka ṭɔlg gɛɛg ne inyaakkɛn maka eci dyɛkan ati kookcin ‘war ñoonitiy.
40025002	Ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ne dɔɔyɔ ñingɛn morŋ. Ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn ne dɔɔyɔ mokiyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka ñingɛn tɛy tɛyo. Šɔlga ne dɔɔyɔ ñingɛn morŋan neeniyɛ, eci ñɔdg dyɛkan ɛkkɛn jitkɛnti, ɔci yeti ɛkkɛn eci gɛɛg bora bɛɛ.
40025004	Yeti ṭɔlga pookɛn ne dɔɔyɔ ṭɔlga ñingɛn tɛyan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka eci ñɔdg dyɛkan ɛkkɛn jitkɛnti ɔci eci gɛɛg bora moki.
40025005	Ɔci ‘wana ḍɛyiyɛ, ɛkɛ kwaccin. Ɔci ṭɔlga kɛɛy ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buanɛ nink ɔci ɛkkɛn wiccin.
40025006	“Ɔci ne ween jiña tuodanyɛ, ma bala boorɔ agi, ‘‘War ñooni bɛɛni! Koodɛ bora ooddɛ kooktɛ ɛkɛti!’
40025007	“Ɔci maka ṭɔlg jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ, ɔci bala yɔŋi twalg dyɛkan ɛkkɛn waakɛn.
40025008	Ɔci maka ñingɛn morŋan neeniyɛ, gɔkcin maka ñingɛn tɛyanti neeni agi, ‘Ɔɔn noŋdɔntɔ ñɔdg ɛkkɛ hay! Acaan dyɛkan ɔɔn ñɔdgɛn bawwin doki.’
40025009	“Ɔci maka ñingɛn tɛyan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn kɛkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘A’a. Ɛkkɛn yɔmdi te ɔɔn ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ɔgdɛ ooddɛ dukkanji pookɔ ɔci wɛrdɛ ñɔdg ɛkkɛ pookɔ.’
40025010	“Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki atki ootti wɛɛrki ñɔdgyɛ, ‘war ñooni dɛññin bora ɔci maka bala kɛɛy ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ati a cyɛɛlɔ iki ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn kaaccin orɔ ona noŋki ma juma, ɔci on weegɛn ‘yeŋi tukɛ cieŋnɛti.
40025011	“Ɔci ne baaṭi ṭɔlga pookɛn bɛɛn daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala boor agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn, i Ciɛggɔn, ɔɔn pɔktɔn on tukɛ!’
40025012	“Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ ŋeejin bɛɛ.’ ”
40025013	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun woŋgɔ tiittɛ, acaan oŋŋa ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdayɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
40025014	“Ɛkkɛ maka laldin ‘yayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ ne pwadan ne ‘ya oodda ɔntɔ te ɛkkɛti wɛnniy. Gɔṭṭɛ, jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek mena ‘uan gɛɛl! ‘Wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn woon ooddi bana parɛ gɛɛlti, ɔci ɛkɛ borcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti. Ɔci bilk ‘wonnɛ ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛnti aŋka dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi kanŋa ɔci bilk cɔttanyɔ ne pwadan.
40025015	Ɛkɛ maka kanŋan ɛkɛti gɛɛl ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ kiicin bilk ne dɔɔyɔ. Ɔci ɛka parɛ gɛɛl ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ kiicin bilk ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci ɛka parɛ ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ kiic bilk ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkɛ ma ‘wonnɛ bilka neeni ba ñing tɛɛn ɛkkɛn, menga da ba ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da ba ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ atti.
40025016	Ɔci mena ‘wonnɛ kanŋa weegɛn kiicin bilk ne dɔɔyɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ne pɛñan, kwaccin bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bilka neeni cɔnnɛyɔ ne bilka pookɛn bɛɛki kiicin ne dɔɔyɔ moki ɔɔn.
40025017	Ɔci mena ‘wonnɛ weegɛn kiicin ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun bala cɔti bilk ne bilka pookɛn bɛɛki kiicin ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔɔn.
40025018	Yeti mena ‘wonnɛ men kiic bilk ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, bilk ɛkɛ eññɛ, ɔci joŋnɛ iñɔ ṭɛɛrji.
40025019	“Ɔci ne maka neeni weegɛn ɛɛni coodi bana atti ɛkɛ waayitiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn dɔɔkkin baanji, ɔci ɛkɛ bala yɔŋi jiek iki ɛkkɛn te jyek bilko.
40025020	’Wana ‘wonnɛ weegɛn kiicin bilk ne dɔɔyɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn nona weegɛnti eccin kiicin bilk ne dɔɔyɔ ba bilka ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ weegɛn te ñamu wanna neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ eccin kiicin bilk kiicin pookɛn ne dɔɔyɔ moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin weegɛnti agi, ‘‘Ya ‘wonna i kiicin bilk ne dɔɔyɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔniyɔ ‘ya, ɔci eccin bilka pookɛn kiicin ne dɔɔyɔ moki.’
40025021	“Ɔci weegɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Pwatcin. I noŋŋi ne pwadan. I ag kɛɛngɔn pwadan. Acaan i waŋu tiinni te gena ḍiɛran neeniyɛ, ɔci acca i ‘wondin ‘ya kanŋa tolan neeni. Dala i yomu ñɔya ba ‘ya ɔɔn!’
40025022	“Ɔci mena ‘wonnɛ weegɛn kiicin bilk ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ orcinti weegɛnti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘‘Ya ‘wonna i kiicin bilk ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔniyɔ ‘ya! Ɔci bɛɛn kiicin pookɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ moki.’
40025023	Ɔci weegɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Pwatcin, i noŋŋi ne pwadan. I ag kɛɛngɔn pwadan! Acaan i waŋu tiinni te gena ḍiɛran neeniyɛ, ɔci acca i ‘wondin ‘ya kanŋa tolan neeni daŋkun. Dala i yomu ñɔya ba ‘ya ɔɔn!’
40025024	“Mena ‘wonnɛ weegɛn kiic bilk ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn warɛ bɛrtɛ te jwali gɛɛl weegɛnti. Ɔci gɔkcin weegɛnti agi, ‘Çeej ‘ya i a mena jiekɛ tɛyan oŋkanda. I dwok pok bɛɛ. Yeti ne pok ñingɛn bɛɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn aga pok i. Ɔci moki i kuay pok bɛɛ. Yeti ne ma pok kuatitiyɔyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn limayɔ i aga pok i.
40025025	Ɔci ‘ya buañi ka ‘ya dita bilk i gɛɛg yiedo, ɔci ‘ya ati bora bilk i neeniyɛ, jokcan iñɔ. Anti bilk i!’
40025026	“Ɔci weegɛn ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I yaayi hay! I a kɛɛngɔn warɛ pɛñan hay! Kan ‘ya ŋeeja i ne ‘ya aga mena dwoki bɛɛy, yeti ne pok ñingɛn bɛɛti ɛkkɛn aga pok ‘ya, ɔci kan ŋeej i moki ne ‘ya kuaya pok bɛɛy, yeti ne ma pok kuatitiyɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn limdiyɔ ‘ya aga pok ‘ya.
40025027	Oŋ ba i bilk ‘ya eññi twoñi bilkji aŋka ɛkkɛn mɔkcan ‘ya aŋan iki bilk wyetka jiettanti ma twoñi bilkji bɛ?’
40025028	“Ɔci mena neeni gɔkcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti agi, ‘Kiic bilk luldɛ te ɛkɛti, ɔci ‘wondɛ mena balki kiicin bilk ne inyaakkɛny.
40025029	Naŋka neeni pwatcin maka woŋgɛn a tiicin ne ɛkkɛn ‘wontɛti ma waka coŋin a ɔɔn bɛɛ? Gɔṭṭɛ, maka balki waakyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘uottanti ma waak moki. Yeti maka balki waak oŋ woŋgɛn a tiicin bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkin bala ɛkkɛnti ne ḍiɛkan wanna lultan ma te ɛkkɛnti.
40025030	Kɛɛngɔn yaayan neeniyɛ, yiɛptɛ weegɛn ciginji nona ulanti aŋan. Nona ulanti neeniyɛ, ma lɛkɛn tiittanti te yom yoño.’
40025031	“Ne ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdayɛ, bɛɛna bɛɛda ‘ya neeni pwanna a pwanno. ‘Ya bɛɛdɔn iki malɛɛkan waakɛnda ɔci ‘ya coocca kaakci ‘yati. Kaakci ‘ya neeni pwanna pwanno.
40025032	Ɔci ma waakɛnda baan konɛ wardayɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn limtan ‘ya ñamuti. Ɔci ‘ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘ya maka coŋin neeni kɛbdi jitin ba naŋki mena balki kulin ɔci ḍɛɛko.
40025033	Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ daŋkun, maka pwadinyɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔɔtca ‘ya byeŋa byerɔn, yeti maka yeyinyɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔɔtca ‘ya byeŋa aamti.
40025034	“Ɔci ‘ya gɔkca maka ciyi ‘ya byeŋa byerɔn neeniti agi, ‘Hay, ɛkkɛ maka maŋŋɛ Wey ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan nɛ, dala ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan mugdɛ ɛkkɛ! Jyeka neeni naŋŋɛ Juaŋ noŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te baaṭi te oŋŋa ɛkɛ okki ṭɛɛry.
40025035	Oŋkanda ne ‘ya amata koñyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘woññɛ ‘ya te oomdin. Ɔci ne ‘ya amata yiɛn mokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘woññɛ ‘ya te pyega maadi ‘ya. Ɔci ne ‘ya aga wɛliyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘ya eññata oorg ɛkkɛ.
40025036	Ɔci ne ‘ya balkata bworŋin bɛɛyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya kɛnnata bworŋin. Ɔci ne ‘ya waru yaayɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ bɛɛdɛ ḍieŋdɛ ‘yati. Ɔci ne ‘ya baala ciginjiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ bɛɛdɛ gɔrtɛ ‘yati.’
40025037	“Ɔci maka pwadin ṭwokti ‘yati agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn, i yuarki ɔɔn oŋgati ami koñ ɔci ‘woñki ɔɔn waka amtin gɛɛg te tua? Ɔci i ami yiɛn ɔci i ‘woñki ɔɔn pieg gɛɛg te tua?
40025038	I yuarki ɔɔn oŋgati i a wɛli ɔci i ooki ɔɔn ban ɔɔn te tua? I yuarki ɔɔn ne bworŋin baaki iti ɔci i ‘woñki ɔɔn bworŋin te tua?
40025039	I yuarki ɔɔn waru yaayɛ oŋgati ɔci ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ḍieŋnɔn iti te tua? Ɔci walla ne i baali ciginji ɔci ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ḍieŋnɔn iti te tua?’
40025040	“Ɔci ‘ya ṭwokca ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Tieŋdɛ ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan. Kan ɛkkɛ menga te maka neeniti naŋŋɛ ne pwadan, kan ɛkɛ a mena ḍiɛran te modg ɔɔn neenitiyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba gena ‘ya naŋŋata ɛkkɛ ne pwadan wanna!’
40025041	“Ɔci Ciɛggɔn Tolan gɔkti maka yɔɔd ɛkɛ byeŋa aamti neeni agi, ‘Ɛkkɛ maka yeyin nɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɔgdɛ ooddɛ ɔntɔ te ‘yati wɛnni! Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ maccu, maña baadi bɛɛy! Maña neeni naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te Jwaŋa Yaayan ɔci te jɔkin ṭɔlgɛn moki, ɔci yɔmjin te ɛkkɛ daŋkun.
40025042	Ne ‘ya amata koñyɛ, ɛkkɛ menga ‘ya ‘wonna genga aŋka amdi ‘ya bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ‘ya amata yiɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛ menga ‘ya ‘wonna pieg gɛɛg aŋka maani ‘ya bɛɛ.
40025043	Ne ‘ya aga wɛliyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘ya eññata orɔ oorg ɛkkɛ bɛɛ. Ne ‘ya balkata bworŋin bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘wonnata bworŋ gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ne ‘ya waru yaayɛ, ɔci moki ne ‘ya baala jiju ciginjiyɛ, ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ ḍieŋnɛ ‘yati bɛɛ.’
40025044	“Ɔci maka neeni daŋkun ṭwokti ɛkɛti agi, ‘I Ciɛggɔn, i yuarki ɔɔn oŋgati ami koñ boki, ɔci walla i ami yiɛn boki, ɔci walla i ag wɛli boki, ɔci walla i at waru budan oŋgati boki, ɔci walla i waru yaayɛ oŋgati boki, ɔci walla i baal ciginji oŋgati boki ɔci i dalki ɔɔn budan te jyeka tɛyan neeni oŋgati boki?’
40025045	“Ɔci Ciɛggɔn Tolan ṭwokti ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Tieŋdɛ ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan, oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ maka neeni dalnɛ budan, kan a mena ḍiɛran te modg ɔɔnti gɛɛl dalnɛ ɛkkɛyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba gena ‘ya waanu dalnata ɛkkɛ wanna.’
40025046	“Ɔci maka noŋi ne yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ooddi nona yaayanti te ywobji Juaŋ ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci ywobji Juaŋ baadi ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci maka pwadinyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka balki tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeniy.”
40026001	Ɔci ne Yaccu ḍookki te jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi,
40026002	“Gɔṭṭɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne nink ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛti borayɛ, ɔci Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi a Gorŋ bɛya. Ɔci ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ‘wonta ma maka yookɔn te ‘ya byeŋkɛnti ɔci ‘ya ŋaapta ɛkkɛn ñaalɔ jana kakanti.”
40026003	Te oŋŋa wannati ɔɔnyɛ, gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud ɔci maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ nona gaciic tolan Ma Yahuudti. Gena on mena bartan ma agi Kayapac.
40026004	Ɛkkɛn bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkkɛn Yaccu muktiti lieda ɔci noktitiy.
40026005	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Naa ɛkɛ muktin noktin te oŋ iid bɛɛ, acaan maka coŋin neeni nuula dita ikinti.”
40026006	Yaccu bala ban Bɛtani ban Cimaann mena naŋŋɛ cyɛc te ñamuy.
40026007	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki cieki omki menyɛ, mena ɛɛŋ gɛɛl bɛɛn Yaccuti. Ɛŋa neeni eccin piinŋan wiɛlɛ tɛyan te luañgɔn ṭɔɔlɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ piinŋan neeni pwoŋnɛ Yaccu wyeñɛti ne Yaccu baali omi men ɔɔn.
40026008	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn looñjin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Ɛkɛ piinŋan neeni ñiennɛ ɔntɔ budan ogo yeti?
40026009	Dala te piinŋan neeni wiɛlji ma bora te bilk ne coŋɔn aŋka mokki ma maka bɔwan.”
40026010	Paŋi ɛkkɛn neeni ŋeejɛ Yaccu. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ ɛɛŋ daldɛ hay! Ɛkkɛ wookɛ ɛkɛ budan a ɔɔn ogo? Ɛkɛ noŋi gena pwadan ‘yati.
40026011	Maka bɔwan balgi iki ɛkkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn. Yeti ‘yayɛ, balkin iki ɛkkɛ yuonginda bɛɛ.
40026012	Naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ‘ya juonatayɔ te piinŋan neeniyɛ, bala ba naŋka naŋtan ma maka tuwatiy.
40026013	Tieŋdɛ ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan! Noon warda nona maka loṭi ma te jyek ‘ya oottiyɛ, ɔci jyek ɛŋa neeni ooddi daŋkun. Ɔci ma ñingɛn ñiektan te naŋki ɛkɛ.”
40026014	Ɔci Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti mena akki Ma Ne Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛkɛ ati gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuudti.
40026015	Ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ‘ya Yaccu byeŋkɔtiy, oŋ ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘wondata gena?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I ‘wonti ɔɔn bil pɔddan a men baan mena parɛ byeŋkɛ (30).”
40026016	Ɔci te oŋŋa wanna ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, Yahuuja bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkɛ ma ‘wondɛ Yaccuy.
40026017	Ɔci oŋ Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi a Gorŋ bɛɛni. Ɔci iid neeni gena Iid Ma Omki Byedga Polany. Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I buagi ɔɔn ooddɔn wak iid ywaŋdɔnyɔ wɛnɛ te ikin?”
40026018	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ bana tolan Urcaliimji, ɔci ooddɛ on ‘uan gɛɛl bala wɛnan. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ ɛkɛti agi, ‘Mena Loṭi Ma gɔki agi oŋ ɛkɛ cɔɔlnɔ doki. Ɔci agi ɛkɛ buagiti noŋji iid ban ɛkkɛ iki ɔɔn maka lalji ɛkɛy.’ ”
40026019	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu jɔŋŋin, ɔci ati ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn wak iid ywaŋɛyɔ.
40026020	Ɔci ne oŋ waŋɛ luunni iñɔyɛ, Yaccu cooccin iñɔ omi iki maka laldɛ ɛkɛ, maka ne inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni.
40026021	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki omki menyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, men gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛti wɛnni ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda maka yookɔn te ‘ya byeŋkɛnti.”
40026022	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yiegin te jwalla guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tooci Yaccuti waakɛnda agi, “I Ciɛggɔn, a ‘ya?” Gɔ menan moki toocci ɔɔn.
40026023	Ɔci Yaccu gɔki agi, “Mena omin iki ‘ya ḍwana ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, gena ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda ma byeŋkɛntiy.
40026024	’Ya Kaci Ma Baan tuud ba jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ‘ya. Yeti mena ‘ya ‘wonda ma byeŋkɛnti neeniyɛ, taab bɛya ɛkɛtiyɛ, tol tolo! Naa te ɛkɛ jiennɛ mɛɛgɛn bɛɛ!”
40026025	Ɔci Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti mena Yaccu ‘wonnɛ ma byeŋkɛnti neeniyɛ, tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Mena loṭi may, a ‘ya?” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛ, gena i.”
40026026	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki omki menyɛ, Yaccu byentan luullɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ cɔkcin Juaŋti. Ɔci ɛkɛ am wɛɛnnɛ jitin. Ɔci ɛkɛ maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ amo. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Antɛ omdɛ. Gena war ‘ya.”
40026027	Ɔci ɛkɛ kubaaya pyeg luutkin luullɛ daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin a pwatcin Juaŋti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ma ‘wonnɛ kubaaya, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ waakida mottɛ waka bala kubaaya konɛti neeni.
40026028	Waka neeni bala ba yimg ‘ya ne kɛɛti iñɔ te ma waakɛnda aŋka dɛn nɔji ɛkkɛn baadi. Acaan Juaŋ gɔki agi te yimg ‘ya neeni ɛkɛ ma bɔɔkcɛ te nɔji ɛkki.
40026029	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, ‘ya motca pyeg jang ṭɔlgɛn acca wɛnni moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya cied budan ɔɔn ne ‘ya motta ɛkkɛn wonkɛn iki ɛkkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ non cyɛgji Wey ɔɔnti.”
