42012033	Dala ɛkkɛ wak ɛkkɛ wiɛldɛŋɔ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ maka bɔwan ‘wondɛ bilka neeni. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ baltɛ waka pwadin ñaalɔ ban Jwaŋa Tolan. Waka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi oŋgati bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛyi gɛɛg bala ñaalɔ aŋan bɛɛ, ɔci waka ḍyɛrin ba bɔŋni ɛkkɛn baaw moki. Wak ɛkkɛ ñaalɔ ḍakti te naŋki waka neeni bɛɛ.
42012034	Nona ḍɔccɛ ɛkkɛ waakyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala aŋan ne tolan daŋkun.”
42012035	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga ywaŋgin,
42012036	ɔci kɛɛddɛ ‘ya ba maka noŋi kanŋa ne kɛɛki weegɛn bɛɛdi dɔɔkti baanji te nona atti ɛkɛ jumatiy. Ɛkkɛn kɛɛy aŋka ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔci borti on tukɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ pɔktan ne pɛñan doki.
42012037	Tieŋdɛ, maka noŋi kanŋa neeni kan ɛkkɛn mɔktɛ wey ɛkkɛn ne tɛɛtki ɔci waakɛn a ywaŋgɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔya ñɔɔno. Acaan weegɛn warɛ ywaŋdɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti ma kanŋati agi dala ɛkkɛn cootti iñɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn eektɛ weegɛn oomdin.
42012038	Kan weegɛn bɛya te ween jiñɛ tuodan walla kan bɛya ne tinnɔ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn mɔktɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛti menyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔya ñɔɔno.
42012039	Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan on weegɛnyɛ, kan te oŋ waŋa bɛɛdi mena ɛɛn neeni te ŋeejɛyɛ, ɛkɛ te wiccin bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ te bala kɛɛy ɔci te mena ɛɛn neeni te kaaccin orɔ bɛɛ.
42012040	Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ywaŋdɛ ne pwadan acaan ba oŋ waŋa guaktan ma agi ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdjɔ bɛɛ neeniyɛ, ‘ya dita bɛɛd ywoṭṭati dɔki.”
42012041	Ɔci Butruc tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Hay, i Ciɛggɔn! Jwalla caagɔn neeni mienni i bora te ɔɔn Maka A Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔ neeni pookɔ, walla te ma waakɛnda?”
42012042	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin Butructi agi, “Gɔṭṭi ‘wota, mena gɔṭi on ne pwadan mena ñingɛ tɛyan a menɛ? Ɛkɛ a mena naŋdɛ weegɛn a ḍuaŋa ma kanŋa aŋka gɔṭi ɛkkɛn ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wonda oomdin oŋkanda ne pwadany.
42012043	Mena nɔttɛ weegɛn jiek neeni kan bala noŋi kanŋa ɛkɛ neeni ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada pwanno.
42012044	Awarɛ, ne baaṭi ɛkɛ naŋdɛ weegɛn aga mena tolan te maka pookɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ aga mena mwoki wak weegɛn waakɛnda.
42012045	Yeti kan mena neeni gɔkti yomɛti agi, ‘Wey ɔɔn kwatti aŋan, ɛkɛ bɛya ne pɛñan bɛɛ.’ Ɔci ɛkɛ jɔŋdi jiebdi ma kanŋa maka pookɛn maka ‘uayi ɔci maka a moongo. Ɔci ɛkɛ moki omdi ɔci motti ɔci noktan mooyo.
42012046	Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛlti ne baaṭi weegɛn bɛya ywortiti a ywoṭṭin ɔci mena yaayan neeni woottɛ poŋi te bɛɛn ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ, ɔci walla da oŋa bɛɛdi weegɛn ŋeejɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci mena yaayan neeni ḍuadɛ weegɛn ne yaajan, ɔci ɛkɛ yiɛptɛ weegɛn ciginji i maka yeyin.
42012047	Men kanŋa mena jyek weegɛn ŋeejɛ ne pwadan ɔci ɛkɛ waŋɛ a tiicin bɛɛ, ɔci walla noŋdi ba jyek weegɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍuadɛ weegɛn ne pɛñan.
42012048	Yeti kan mena neeni jyek weegɛn ŋeejɛ ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋka yaayanyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍuadɛ weegɛn ne ḍiɛran daŋkun. Acaan kan men gɛɛl bala ñamu te naŋki gengayɛ, ma gɔki ɛkɛti agi dala naŋki ɛkta pwaddɔ ne tolan. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ‘woñgi ma kanŋa tolanyɛ, ɔci ma gɔki ɛkɛti agi dala ɛkɛ kanŋa naŋdɛ ne pwadan daŋkun.
42012049	“‘Ya bɛɛn aŋka ṭɛɛr toñga maaño. Dala te ‘ya maañ toñgan omjin doki.
42012050	Taab pɛñan bala bɛya ‘yati, ɔci ‘ya muldawi taab neeni. Acca ‘ya yomu noki warɛ ne tolan ne naŋka neeni cɔmdi bora ɔɔn.
42012051	Ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi te bɛɛna bɛɛna ‘ya neeni ma ciya ne pwadan iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnnɛ? Hayɛllɛ! Gɔṭṭɛ, te bɛɛna bɛɛna ‘ya neeniyɛ, ma kɛɛpti jitin.
42012052	Te acca neeniti ne ñamu ɔɔnyɛ, maka ciyi ona ne cyɛɛlɔ kɛɛpti jitin. Kan ma bala ne dɔɔyɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn yoddi ñino, ɔci maka ne ḍoogɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn maka ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni yooktan ñino, ɔci maka ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn da yooktan te maka ne ḍoogɔ neeni.
42012053	Kɛɛgin weyyɛn yooktan te kɛɛggɛn acaan ɛkkɛn a ma ‘ya, ɔci kɛɛgin da yooktan te weyyɛn acaan ɛkkɛn a ma ‘ya. Kɛɛgin mɛyyɛn yooktan te kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin a moongo, ɔci kɛɛgin a moong yooktan te mɛyyɛn daŋkun acaan ɛkkɛn a ma ‘ya. Ɔci marin da yooktan te moong kɛɛggɛn acaan ɛkkɛn a ma ‘ya, ɔci moong da yooktan te marŋgɛn acaan ɛkkɛn a ma ‘ya.”
42012054	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka coŋinti daŋkun agi, “Ne ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ pɔli wyeñɛ baali yɔɔdi pɔya koriiyatiyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi, ‘Ñaal noŋi bɛya,’ ɔci ñaal bɛya awarɛ.
42012055	Ne ɛkkɛ gɔṭɛ jwami yoŋdi te pɔya cuayati mokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi, ‘Te oŋi noon myɛlcin,’ ɔci bala a ɔɔn doki.
42012056	Hay, ɛkkɛ maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ, jyek waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛr ŋoyɛti ɔci pɔliji ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, yeti jyek naŋka bɛɛn mati acca aŋka ñyecki ma bɛɛn Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ ogo? Ɛkkɛ yiegɛ ne tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛ wookɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
42012057	“Dala ɛkkɛ pottɛ jyek ɛkkɛ ywaŋdɛ pookɔ.
42012058	Kan i baal pɔɔjɔ ootta non godanti, ɔci i yɔɔrni iki mena tɛki i waruyɛ, dala i toocca ɛkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ jiek ywaŋdɛ wona men ɛkkɛ dɛndɛ mena gɔṭi jiek ñamɛti bɛɛy. Kan a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, i wanti ma ɔci olti ma ciginji dita.
42012059	Te jyeka awarɛ, i dita kooya bora te ciginji a ñaccu bɛɛ. I cied ne i ḍɔtti bilka ma buagi waakɛnda ɔɔn.”
42013001	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ma gɛɛg bɛɛn ɔci ɛkkɛn bala mieti Yaccu te naŋka naŋŋɛ Bilaatuc mena a ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ ma Jaliiltiy. Acaan ne ɛkkɛn balki ɛrki waak Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋŋɛ Bilaatuc, ɔci yimg ɛkkɛn ñaaŋŋɛyɔ ɛkɛ iki yimg mal ɛkkɛn.
42013002	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ, oŋ ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi naŋka neeni bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti acaan nɔji ɛkkɛn tol tol te nɔji ma ban Jaliil maka pookɛn waakɛnda?
42013003	A’a! ‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin. Ɛkkɛ daŋkun, kan ɛkkɛ waakɔ yaldɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍaktɛ daŋkun.
42013004	Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ poŋɛ agi maka ne inyaakkɛn om ne cyɛɛlɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ (18), maka ona ban Cilɔɔwam ona beyan ḍɛmnin ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti neeni, nɔji ɛkkɛn tol tol te nɔji ma ban Urcaliim maka pookɛn waakɛnda?
42013005	A’a! ‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin. Ɛkkɛ daŋkun, kan ɛkkɛ waakɔ yaldɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍaktɛ daŋkun waakida ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.”
42013006	Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn myennɛ te jwalla a caagɔn neeni agi, “Mena ‘uan gɛɛl balki ŋuami gɛɛl bala kaañji kañ ɛkɛ.
42013007	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin mena gɔṭi balti agi, ‘Gɔṭṭi, ‘ya bɛɛn yuong ne ḍoogɔ doki aŋka gɔrca ŋuami ṭɔlgɛ, yeti ŋuami ṭɔlgɛ gɛɛg bala bɛɛ. Dala i jaan tɔcca iñɔ hay! Te gena aŋka ɛkɛ yɔɔdi kɛki non budan a ɔɔn?’
42013008	Yeti mena gɔṭi bal neeni gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Yɔɔdi lakun. Jaan dalja, dala yɔɔda ba ywoni ne cyɛɛlɔ moki, ɔci tuagdi ŋwayɛti lakun ɔci noŋga ‘yɛt doko.
42013009	Ɔci ikin gɔrtin kan ne jaan jieddi ṭɔlgɛ boki no. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ jieda bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ tɔcca i iñɔ ne ywoniti oŋo.’ ”
42013010	Ɔci Yaccu bala loṭi ma ona morki ma Juaŋ gɛɛlti te Oŋ Cabit.
42013011	Ɔci ɛɛŋ gɛɛl bala wɛnan, ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɛ te baaṭi doki te naŋki jwaŋa yaayan ɛkɛti. Yuonga wooci ɛkɛ aŋi inyaakkɛn ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ (18) doki. Ɛkɛ puonnɛ waja pwomgɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ati geyi a geen yaakinti warɛ mɛɛdɛ ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
42013012	Ɔci ne Yaccu ɛŋa neeni yuarnɛyɛ, ɛkɛ borcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! Ɛɛŋo, waja i neeniyɛ, bawwin doki.”
42013013	Ɔci Yaccu byeŋkɛ tannɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛɛŋ doki warɛ mɛɛnɛ ñaalɔ ne pɛñan. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala jieyi Jwaŋa Tolan.
42013014	Yeti ḍuaŋa ona morki ma Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ looñi ne pɛñan acaan Yaccu mena neeni ywaŋŋɛ te Oŋ Cabit. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka orɔ neeniti agi, “Tieŋdɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan. Nink kanŋa bala a dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ te ninka neeni te jyek ywaŋi ma waakɛn, naa ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ te jyek ywaŋi waakɔ te Oŋ Cabit bɛɛ!”
42013015	Ɔci Ciɛggɔn Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti doki agi, “Hay, ɛkkɛ maka noŋi ma ñingɛn nɛ! Ɛkkɛ waakidayɛ, ɛkkɛ yotk ɛkkɛ ɔci tɔrin ɛkkɛ pɔktɛ te Oŋ Cabit eedɛ moottɛ pieg bɛɛ? Ɛɛ, ɛkkɛ wak ɛkkɛ eedɛ pietin te Oŋ Cabit daŋkun.
42013016	Ɛŋa muŋŋɛ jwaŋa yaayan ba yuong ne inyaakkɛn om ne cyɛɛlɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ (18) neeniy, ɛkɛ a kaci Abrahim daŋkun ba ikin bɛɛ? Oŋ kan ɛkɛ pɔkkan ‘ya te Oŋ Cabit te waja ɛkɛ neeniy, jyeka neeni yeyɔ ɛkkɛti a ɔki?”
42013017	Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, maka yookɔn te ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, waakɛn aŋi lɔɔno, ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔkti genga moki bɛɛ. Ɔci maka coŋin yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te naŋka coŋin naŋka naŋdɛ Yaccu pwadin neeni.
42013018	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu tooccin mati agi, “Cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bala a ɔki? ‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ka ɛkɛ bala ba bolji gena yeti?
42013019	Ɛɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba kardala waŋɛ. Ñing kardala neeni ḍyɛrgin a ḍyɛrgin ba ñing kɔba ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ piinnɛ men gɛɛl bal ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ ḍiɛṭ ḍyɛro, yeti ne ɛkɛ yulliyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi jana tolan ɔci kɛrkɛ kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Ɔci ḍiirg bɛɛn bala eyi kwork ɛkɛ kɛrkɛti ne coŋɔn. (A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyek cyɛgji Juaŋ daŋkun. Jyek cyɛgji Juaŋ ɛkkɛn jɔɔtcin ne ḍiɛran te maka ne ḍiɛkan, ɔci ɛkɛ poni jitin ne ma coŋki a coŋgin ɔɔn.”)
42013020	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin mati moki agi, “Cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bala ba bolji gena ɛkkɛti yeti?
42013021	Ɛɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba jyek ñamgo. Ɛɛŋ gɛɛl bala noŋi byedgo, ɔci ɛkɛ ñamg ñaaŋŋɛyɔ i ḍuobja a waagɔn ne ḍiɛkan ɔci ḍuannɛ, ɔci bala niin lieda ne ñamg atki ḍuobjiti warɛ warda ɔɔn.”
42013022	Ɔci Yaccu bala ati booti bonk korkɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ bala loṭi ma bonka neeniti ne ɛkɛ baali ooddi ban Urcaliimy.
42013023	Ɔci men gɛɛl tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “I Ciɛggɔn, oŋ maka yɔɔdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛn a ḍiɛkan budan?” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi,
42013024	“Gɔṭṭi, pɔya ootti ma pɔliji ɛkɛ tukɛ ciɛṭin bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ pottɛ oŋkanda kaattɛ orɔ te on tuka ḍiɛran neeni. Naa ɛkkɛ pɔɔd daldɛ bɛɛ. Acaan ne baaṭi maka coŋin potti ka kaatti orɔ, yeti ɛkkɛn yaaktanti bɛɛ.
42013025	Kan on weegɛn on tukɛ wiɛnnɛ te orñi doki ɔci kan ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ boottɛ ne ŋoyɔ ɔci yɔɔttɛ on tukɛti bora ɔci bortɛ agi, ‘I Ciɛggɔn, on tukɛ pɔkka ɔɔn koodɔnyɛ,’ Ɛkɛ ṭwokti ɛkkɛti agi, ‘Hay! Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ te aŋɛ? Ɛkkɛ ŋeejin ‘ya bɛɛ.’
42013026	Ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ ɛkɛti agi, ‘Pari ɔɔn a maka bala omin iki i bɛɛ? Ɔci ne i baali loṭi ma pɔɔk ban ɔɔn jitinyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn iki i moki.’
42013027	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti ɛkkɛti moki agi, ‘Gɔṭṭɛ ɛkkɛ myennin doki ka ɛkkɛ ŋeejin ‘ya bɛɛ. Yoñ ɛkkɛ bala ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti. Dala ɛkkɛ ɔgdɛ ooddɛ ɔntɔ te ‘yati wɛnni.’
42013028	Ɛkkɛ wiaktɛ a joono, ɔci ɛkkɛ lɛkɔ tiittɛti te yom yoñ ne ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ Abrahim ɔci Icaak ɔci Yaakub, ɔci maka bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan waakɛnda ne ɛkkɛn kaatti cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolantiy, yeti ɛkkɛ aŋka ŋualdɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ.
42013029	Ɔci ma bɛya te pɔli ŋwayyɛti waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛn cootti iñɔ non juma ban cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan.
42013030	Ɛkkɛ maka cooŋi ñingɛn te wak ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ, ɔci boottin ‘yati acca te yoma awarɛ bɛɛ neeniyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ ‘wondin genga ñaalɔ pɔliji bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛ maka waka iñɔ wɛnni kuoŋnɛ ŋotkɔ waakɛnda, ɔci boonnɛ ‘yati acca te yoma awarɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋka ‘wondin ‘ya waak ne coŋɔn ba yomg ɛkkɛ ‘yati.”
42013031	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ma Pɛriciin gɛɛg bɛɛn Yaccuti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i jɔlla ñaalɔ te bana neeniti wɛnni ookca bora ootta bana parɛ aŋka i uddi, acaan Hiruuduc Antipac buagɔn noki i.”
42013032	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ Hiruuduc Antipac mena labjɛ tolan ba wɛɛw neeni myettɛ agi ‘ya tieŋjɔ. Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya baal koocca jɔkin yeyin bora ɔci yɔŋ ma waakɛn te oŋi ɔci ne liidɔ ɔci ne oŋiti moki ɔɔn. ‘Ya kanŋa ‘ya cwamja.
42013033	Ɛɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya baal pɔɔjɔ, acca ɔci ne liidɔ ɔci ne oŋiti ɔɔn. ‘Ya kanŋa ‘ya cwamdo. ‘Ya tuud bora bɛɛ, ‘ya nokta ma aŋan ban Urcaliimji ba bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan bɔwan nogɛ ɛkkɛn ñamu, wanna ɔɔn.
42013034	“Hay! Ma Urcaliim, ma Urcaliim, maka noki bɔwan Juaŋ, maka yebi maka cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛti te gwoyi nɛ. Bala ba aakṭi mɛɛgɛn ne boori ṭɔlg ɛkɛ, ɔci ṭɔlg ɛkɛ wɔtti ɛkɛ bɔggɛtiyɛ, ɔci oŋkanda yom ‘ya buagɔn ka da ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ ‘yati a ɔɔn daŋkun, yeti ɛkkɛ yookɛ te ‘ya!
42013035	Gɔṭṭɛ, on ɛkkɛ on Juaŋ ona tolan dalnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan doki. Tieŋdɛ! ‘Ya yuardata ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ, yeti ne ‘ya bɛɛda kooda ban ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ ‘yati agi, ‘Mena bɛɛn te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Dala ɛkkɛ jieyɛ ɛkɛ!’”
42014001	Oŋ gɛɛlti te Oŋ Cabityɛ, Yaccu ati omi on mena ḍuaŋa gɛɛlti. Ḍuaŋa neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a men ma Pɛriciin. Ɔci ma Pɛriciin bala gɔṭi booti Yaccu warɛ.
42014002	Ɔci mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala wɛnan ɛkɛ warɛ kottin ñaalɔ.
42014003	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin maka loṭi worga Juaŋti ɔci ma Pɛriciinti daŋkun. “Kan men gɛɛl ma ywaŋdɛ te Oŋ Cabity, ɛkɛ jyek ganuun bɛɛññɛji te naŋka neeni doki?”
42014004	Yeti ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin genga ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn cien lieda. Ɔci Yaccu mena warɛ yaayan neeni muŋŋɛ ɔci ywaŋŋɛyɔ. Ɔci Yaccu mena neeni cuuññɛ bora.
42014005	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin mati agi, “Oŋ naŋki ɛkkɛ bala a ɔki? Kan kaci gɛɛl walla kan a yaan gɛɛl ḍɛmdi jiidɔ te Oŋ Cabity, ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ oodɛ bora ne pɛñan bɛɛ?”
42014006	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti ṭwokcin ɛkɛti moki bɛɛ.
42014007	Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔrni ma balki bɛɛti on mena ḍuaŋa neeni gɔ ɛkkɛn moki coockin nonka pwadin neeni pookɛn a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ma myennɛ te jwalla a caagɔn gɛɛl agi,
42014008	“Kan men gɛɛl boor i agi i bɛɛdji nona jumatiyɛ, ɔci ne i ooddi jumatiyɛ, naa i coocca nona pwadanti ñamu te yom i paru bɛɛ. Acaan kan mena tolan te i
42014009	gɛɛl bortɛ juma weegɛn agi bɛɛdɔ coottɔ nona pwadanti nona coonni i neeni, ɔci i aŋka jɔɔlti ma ñaalɔ te nona neeniti ɔci ootta coocca nona iñɔyɛ, naŋka neeni yaayɛ, a lɔɔno.
42014010	Yeti kan men gɛɛl boor i agi i bɛɛdjiyɛ, ɔci ne i ooddiyɛ, dala i coocca nona iñɔ, aŋka ne juma weegɛn bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkti iti kaapun agi, ‘Mug ɔɔn, bɛɛd coocca nona pwadanti.’ Ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋjin iti ne pwadan nona maka coŋin ñomgɛnti.
42014011	Acaan maka waakɛn naŋtan ba maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn naŋdɛ Juaŋ aga ba maka ḍyɛrin. Ɔci maka waakɛn dɔɔtan iñɔ ba maka ḍyɛrinyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka aga maka ḍwaŋin.”
42014012	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mena ɛkɛ bornɛ neeniti agi, “Kan i boor ma agi ma bɛɛdɔ amti te liidɔ walla te oŋ unniyɛ, naa i boor gena mung ɛkkɛ ɔci walla gena modg ɛkkɛ, ɔci walla ma ɛkkɛ, ɔci walla maka ciyi iki i maka balki waak neeni pookɛn bɛɛ. Kan i boor maka neeniyɛ, ɔci ne baaṭi i borti ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba wak i dɔɔkti iti moki.
42014013	Kan i boor ma amti on iyɛ, dala i boorja gena maka bɔwan, ɔci maka byeŋkɛn ɔci bɔggɛn yiegin, ɔci maka ŋɔr, ɔci maka ullin.
42014014	Ɔci kan i noŋja a ɔɔnyɛ, i yomu ñɔya, acaan maka neeni yaakinti wak i dɔɔtan iti moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ne oŋŋa maka pwadin jɔŋti ñaalɔ te kolk jitinyɛ, i ‘wondi Jwaŋa Tolan waka pwadin ba naŋki i wanna.”
42014015	Ɔci maka omi iki ɛkkɛn men gɛɛl ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ne ɛkɛ tieŋni jyeka guagdɛ Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena omdi juma ban Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya, hay!”
42014016	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Oŋ gɛɛlti mena ‘uan gɛɛlyɛ, noŋi juma, ɔci ɛkɛ maka coŋin myennɛ te juma neeni.
42014017	Ɔci ne oŋ juma bɛɛniyɛ, juma weegɛn mena kanŋan ɛkɛti gɛɛl cuuññɛ mati agi dala ma bɛɛdɔ, ɛkɛ waak ḍaaŋjɛ doki, ɔci ɛkɛ atti.
42014018	Yeti ma waakɛnda bɛɛr jieko, ɔci ɛkkɛn kɛkcin ɛkɛti. Mena ‘uan gɛɛl gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya wɛɛṭi bal gɛɛl ɔci buaga ootta gɔrca balo. ‘Ya bɛɛd bɛɛ.’
42014019	Ɔci mena parɛ gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya wɛɛṭi yotka ooṭi noon ne inyaakkɛn, ɔci ‘ya buaga ootta ɛkkɛn pɔɔcca kanŋati. ‘Ya bɛɛd bɛɛ.’
42014020	Ɔci mena parɛ gɛɛl gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya ḍɛñi ɛɛŋ a ñooni ɔci waru a cuul men, ɔci ‘ya yaakati bɛɛd bɛɛ.’
42014021	“Ne mena neeni tuokiti mayɛ, ɛkɛ dɔɔki baanji weegɛnti, ɔci ɛkɛ weegɛn myennɛ te jyeka guagɛ ma ɛkɛti neeni. Ɔci on weegɛn looñi, ɔci gɔkcin mena kanŋan ɛkɛti neeni agi, ‘Gɔṭṭi poca, dala i ɔgdi ootta bodda ne pɛñan pɔɔka neeniji waakɛnda. Dala i lierca gena maka bɔwan, ɔci maka byeŋkɛn ɔci bɔggɛn yiegin, ɔci maka ŋɔr, ɔci maka ullin. Maka neeniyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn aŋka owwa amti.’
42014022	Ɔci ne mena neeni kanŋa guaŋŋɛ weegɛn neeni naŋŋɛ dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin weegɛnti agi, ‘Wey ɔɔn, jyeka guaŋŋi i ‘yati neeniyɛ, naŋi ‘ya doki, ɔci on kuumi men bɛɛ. Noon bala men.’
42014023	Ɔci weegɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ɛɛ, dala i ɔgdi ootta bodda ne pɔɔka eetan ma bora baan ŋoyɛti, ɔci ne pɔɔka eetan ma ḍyɛrin yelk jitin, ɔci maka bala aŋanyɛ, myetka ne pwadan ɛkkɛn bɛya wɛnni amti, aŋka dala on kuma te mako.
42014024	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, maka borkan ‘ya te ñamuyɛ, ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛn men gɛɛl bɛya wɛnni dɛtti wak juma ‘ya neeni bɛɛ.’ ”
42014025	Oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, pooldin ḍwaŋin bala ati i Yaccu, ɔci Yaccu warɛ yallɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi,
42014026	“Kan men gɛɛl bɛya ‘yatiyɛ, dala anna ɛkɛ ani ‘yayɛ, bala ñamu te anna ɛkɛ anɛ weegɛn, ɔci mɛɛgɛn, ɔci ɛŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛ, ɔci modgɛn, ɔci kowwɛn ɔci war ɛkɛ waanɛ daŋkun. Kan a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti aga men ‘ya bɛɛ.
42014027	Mena mwondi te war ɛkɛ ɔci bootti ‘yati bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti aga men ‘ya bɛɛ.
42014028	“Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti buagɔn cɔti ony, ɛkɛ cootti iñɔ ñamu parun, ɔci gɔrti ne waka cɔti ɛkɛ on neeni yɔmki waakɛnda bɛɛ?
42014029	Kan ɛkɛ poŋdi ñamu bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ poccin cɔtcin on ŋwayɛ doki, ɔci kan waka cɔti ɛkɛ on bɔɔnjinyɛ, ɛkɛ on daldɛ te cɔnno. Ɔci ne ma bɛɛti gɔrti ne on ŋwayɛ niini parɛ budanyɛ, ɛkkɛn lɛɛrti ‘wana neeni agi,
42014030	‘Gɔrtɛ poca, ɛkɛ poccin cɔtcin on ŋwayɛ, yeti ɛkɛ on ḍaaŋŋɛ bɛɛ.’
42014031	“Tieŋdɛ ‘wota, kan ḍuaŋa tolan gɛɛl buagɔn noowɔ iki ḍuaŋa tolan parɛ gɛɛly, ɛkɛ cootti iñɔ ñamu parun ɔci poŋdi ne ackan ɛkɛ ackan a alpn ne inyaakkɛn (10,000) neeni yɔmti boki no. Ɛkɛ poŋdi ñamu acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ ackan ḍuaŋa tolan parɛ neeni a alpn a men baan ne cyɛɛlɔ (20,000).
42014032	Ɔci kan ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi ma ɛkɛ bwandi ma ditayɛ, ɛkɛ men gɛɛl cundɛ ḍuaŋa tolan parɛti neeni ne ɛkɛ looni men te ban ɛkkɛn aŋka gɔkti ɛkɛti te jyek ŋɛyo.
42014033	A ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ñamu ne pwadan ne ɛkkɛ agdɛ ma ‘ya awarɛ boki no. Kan anna ɛkkɛ anɛ ‘ya bala ñamu te anna ɛkkɛ anɛ waka pookɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti agdɛ ma ‘ya bɛɛ.
42014034	“Toli killan pwad pwado. Yeti kan toli poli dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ moki coda a ɔki?
42014035	Ɛkɛ pwada moki bɛɛ. Kanŋa ɛkɛ bala moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ oltan ma ṭɛɛrji pietki ma waak moki bɛɛ, walla oltan ma waka piidi ma ŋwayyɛnti aŋka pworki waak moki bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ balkɛ jyetkɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka guaŋi ‘ya neeni ne pwadan.”
42015001	Ɔci te oŋŋa parɛyɛ, maka lyemi tulba ɔci maka pookɛn maka yeyin daŋkun bala. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ḍwoṭṭinti nona Yaccuti aŋka tieŋdi jyek ɛkɛ.
42015002	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala wooki Yaccu agi, “Oŋ ‘wana neeni ani maka nɔɔtk ɔɔn ogo yeti? Ɔci ɛkɛ omi iki ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ ogo?”
42015003	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu ɛkkɛn myennɛ te jwalla a caagɔn agi,
42015004	“Gɔṭṭɛ, kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti balki kulin a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ (100) ɔci kan kalŋ gɛɛl yien ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, mena neeni kalŋ daldɛ bora ḍakti boki? A’a. Daldɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ kulin a ma baan ne ŋaanɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (99) neeni daldɛ wɔɔŋji, ɔci ɛkɛ ooddi lieṭi ɛka yien ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni ne ɛkɛ kalŋ yuardɛ ɔɔn.
42015005	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ kalŋ yuardiyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya ñɔɔno, ɔci ɛkɛ kalŋ cyɛrtɛ ḍwaŋɛti
42015006	ɔci eedɛ baanji. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛndi baanjiyɛ, ɛkɛ borti mung ɛkkɛnti ɔci maka cieki iki ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi iki ‘ya acaan kalŋ ‘ya kalŋa yien neeni yuarŋ ‘ya doki.’
42015007	Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ma baan daŋkun. Kan ma bala a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ (100) ɔci kan men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ yaayiyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ paŋi ɛkɛ agdiyɔyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ ñɔya ne tolan nɔñji te mena warɛ yaldɛ te nɔji ɛkɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni te yom ñɔɔn ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔyɛ te maka a ma baan ne ŋaanɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (99) neeni.”
42015008	“Ɔci moki kan ɛɛŋ gɛɛl balki ḍeyyan a inyaakkɛn ɔci kan ḍeyyan mɛɛgɛn gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ yienyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍeyyan mɛɛgɛn daldɛ budan boki? A’a. Ɛkɛ dyɛka tondɛ ɔci ɛkɛ on jiñɛ wiɛdɛji, ɔci ɛkɛ lierti ne pwadan ne ɛkɛ ḍeyyan mɛɛgɛn yuardɛ ɔɔn.
42015009	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ḍeyyan mɛɛgɛn yuardiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñarg ɛkkɛn bortiti, ɔci maka cieki iki ɛkɛ bortiti daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi iki ‘ya acaan ḍeyyan mɛɛgɛn ‘ya ḍeyyan yien neeni yuarŋ ‘ya doki.’
42015010	Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, kan mena nɔɔdɔn gɛɛl warɛ yaldɛ nɔji ɛkɛ daldiyɛ, malɛɛkan Jwaŋa Tolan yomgɛn ñɔya te ɛkɛ ne tolan.”
42015011	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mati agi, “Tieŋdɛ ‘wota, mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala, ɔci ɛkɛ balki kɛɛgin a ‘uay ne yyɛɛwɔ.
42015012	Ɔci moda ḍiɛran ŋoyɔyɛ, gɔkcin weegɛnti agi, ‘Wey ɔɔn, ‘ya ŋwotta taaŋi mal ‘ya bora acca.’ Ɔci weegɛn kɛɛgin ŋuonnɛ maal jitkɛn.
42015013	“Ɔci ne nink gɛɛg bɛɛki borayɛ, kacca ḍiɛran neeni wak ɛkɛ wiɛlnɛyɔ waakɛnda, ɔci bilk olnɛ kuñŋanji eññɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ati bana loonan gɛɛlti. Ɔci aŋan bana atti ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bilk ɛkɛ cyɛnnɛji ne pɛñan waakɛnda acaan ɛkɛ bala noŋi amaamo.
42015014	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bilk waakɛnda ḍaaŋŋɛyɛ, ɔci koñ bɛɛn bana neeniti ne tolan. Ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi mena bɔwan. Ɛkɛ dorki genga bieŋɛti bɛɛ.
42015015	Ɔci ɛkɛ ati tooccin maka ciyi bana neeni gɛɛlti te kanŋa. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ men gɛɛl kanŋa omti kwotin.
42015016	Ɔci ɛkɛ amɛ koñ ne pɛñan. Ɔci ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi baali ba ɛkɛ ŋɛddinti iki kwotin kulk no. Yeti ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ men gɛɛl gena amdɛ ɛkɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ.
42015017	“Ne ɛkɛ poŋnɛ warɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin yomɛti parɛ agi, ‘Hacc, ɛkkɛ! Wey ɔɔn balki maka kanŋan ɛkɛti kɔɔna kɔɔnno, ɔci waka amtan ɛkkɛn kɔɔna kɔɔni moki. Ne ɛkkɛn balki omki oomdinyɛ, gɔ ɛkkɛn tiɛtkin oomdin moki ɔɔn. Yeti ‘ya baal nogda koñ wɛnni ogo!
42015018	Hay, a’a! ‘Ya jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ ootta dɔwwa wey ɔɔnti, ɔci ‘ya gɔkca ɛkɛti agi, “Wey ɔɔn, ‘ya domi naŋki Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci noŋi amaam iti moki.
42015019	’Ya baal ba kaci i moki bɛɛ. Dala ‘ya naŋda i agdi ba mena kanŋan iti te bilk budan.” ’
42015020	Ɔci ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ɔci ati dɔɔki weegɛnti. “Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali bɛɛdi te nona loonan menyɛ, ɛkɛ yuartɛ weegɛn. Ɔci weegɛn yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ yiŋi kookcin ɛkɛti pɔɔjɔ, ɔci weegɛn ɛkɛ muŋŋɛyɔ ɔci ñiimmɛ te tukɛ.
42015021	“Ɔci kaci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Wey ɔɔn, ‘ya noŋi nɔji Jwaŋa Tolanti ɔci iti daŋkun. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya baal ba kaci i moki bɛɛ.’
42015022	“Yeti weegɛn borcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Ba ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yooŋdɛ ettɛ bworŋa pwadan ɔci oodɛ ɛɛŋdɛ ɛkɛ warɛti, ɔci ḍejja pwadan ɛɛŋdɛ ɛkɛ bieŋɛti, ɔci wɛyi ɛɛŋdɛ ɛkɛ ciegɛti daŋkun.
42015023	Ɔci naañ ṭɔɔlɛ caagan ŋardɛ, ɔci dala ikin noŋtin juma, ɔci dala ikin yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi!
42015024	Acaan kaci ‘ya neeni ɛkɛ bala ba ne ɛkɛ tuuni doki no, ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala tɛɛti men. Ɔci ɛkɛ yien doki, ɔci acca ɛkɛ warɛ yuarŋɛ dɔki.’ Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋjin juma doki, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
42015025	“Ɔci te oŋŋa wannati kacca tolan bala bora balji, ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni cɔɔlniti baanjiyɛ, ɛkɛ tieŋŋin waka ñiɛlki ma ne balki wiakkiy, ɔci ɛkɛ tieŋŋin ɔɔlg ma ne ma balki ñiɛlkiy.
42015026	Ɔci ɛkɛ borcin ma kanŋa gɛɛlti, ɔci tooccin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Hay! Ɛkkɛ lyɛlɛ a ɔɔn a gena yeti?’
42015027	“Ɔci mena neeni gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I gɔrni bo, mod ɛkkɛ bɛɛn dɔɔkkin baanji, ɔci wey ɛkkɛ naña caagan neeni ŋaarŋɛ ŋoornɛ ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ bɛɛn dɔɔkkin baanji weegɛnti doki. Ɛkɛ ḍakcin ɔntɔ bɛɛ.’
42015028	“Ɔci moda tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ looñi, ɔci ɛkɛ yookɔn te kaaccin orɔ. Ɔci wey ɛkkɛn kooyin bora nona ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I bɛɛd oottin kaattin orɔ yɔŋ. Naa i noŋ a ɔɔn bɛɛ.’
42015029	Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin weegɛnti agi, ‘Gɔṭṭi, hay! Yuong aŋi ñiṭin ne ‘ya baala noŋa kanŋa iy! Ɔci jyek i bɛɛnji ‘ya oŋgati bɛɛ. Ɔci i ‘ya ‘wonna genga ba ñuaŋ ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl ɔɔn bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya noŋna i juma ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl aŋka ‘ya yomu ñɔɔdɛ i mung ɔɔn bɛɛ!
42015030	Yeti ne kaci i, mena mal i ḍaaŋŋɛ waakɛnda amaam te naŋki moonga tobin neeni ne bɛɛniyɛ, i ɛkɛ aŋka ŋoorni naña caagan!’
42015031	Ɔci weegɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Kaci ‘ya, a gena ɔɔn, ikin balkin iki ‘ya oŋkanda, ɔci wak ‘ya a wak i waakɛnda.
42015032	Yeti ikin yaakinti cietin budan te naŋki juma te oŋŋa pwadan neeni a ɔki? Acaan mod ɛkkɛ neeni bala ba ne ɛkɛ tuuni doki no. Yeti acca ɛkɛ bala tɛɛti dɔki! Ɔci moki ɛkɛ yieni. Yeti ɛkɛ warɛ yuarŋɛ dɔkɔ!’ ”
42016001	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala, ɛkɛ a mena cyɛgan. Ɛkɛ balki mena gɔṭi mal ɛkɛ. Ɔci mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tiagiyɔ ma kanŋa weegɛnti agi, ‘Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ wak i ḍagdɛ te naŋka amaamo.’
42016002	Ɔci kanŋa weegɛn borcin ɛkɛti tooccin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Hay i! Jyeka tieŋŋan ‘ya te i neeni jitkɛn bala a ɔki yeti? Dala i jyek wak ‘ya kiijja worgaji waakɛnda. Acaan ‘ya buaga i kooya bora te kanŋa ‘yati. Ɔci agdi mena gɔṭi mal ‘ya oŋgati moki bɛɛ.’
42016003	“Ɔci mena neeni bala poŋi yomɛti agi, ‘Acca ‘ya noŋja a ɔki? Kanŋa weegɛn mwonnin te ‘ya doki, ɔci ‘ya yaakati pien luom bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya yaakati ñuon waak bɛɛ, acaan ñuon waak neeniyɛ, a lɔɔn ‘yati.
42016004	Ɛɛ, naŋka naŋdi ‘ya ŋeej ‘ya doki, aŋka mung ɔɔn ‘ya dalta bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘ya borta oorg ɛkkɛn jitin.’
42016005	“Mena gɔṭi maal neeni borcin maka balki dɛɛn kanŋa weegɛnti neeni ne cyɛɛlɔ ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin mena bɛɛn ñamɛti agi, ‘Dɛn i bala a ɔki i wey ɔɔn?’
42016006	“Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, ‘‘Ya balka dɛɛn ñɔdg capiiyan a ma baan ne ŋaanɔ (800).’ “Ɔci mena gɔṭi maal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Anti worga i. Coocca iñɔ ne pɛñ ɔci kiejja a dɛn i a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (400) budan.’
42016007	“Ɔci mena gɔṭi maal tooccin mena parɛti agi, ‘Oŋ i daŋkun balki dɛɛn ne ñiṭin?’ “Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, ‘‘Ya balka dɛɛn pok cowaaln a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000).’ “Ɔci mena gɔṭi maal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Anti worga, ɔci i kiejja a dɛn i a cowaaln ma baan ne ŋaanɔ (800) budan.’
42016008	“Ɔci kanŋa weegɛn ne ɛkɛ tieŋni naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin mena gɔṭi mal ɛkɛ mena yaayan neeniti agi, ‘I ñingu tɛy tɛyo hay!’ Kanŋa weegɛn gɔki a ɔɔn te naŋki mena kanŋan ɛkɛti naŋka naŋŋɛ te ñing tɛɛn neeni. Awarɛ, maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki ñing tɛɛn ṭɛra neeni ŋoyɛ ne tolan te maka a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolany.
42016009	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin moki agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ ma magdɛ te mal ɛkkɛ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni aŋka ne mal ɛkkɛ baati ne baaṭiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ bortɛ Juaŋ ban ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ciedɛ iki ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn.’
42016010	“Kan mena waŋɛ tiittɛ te gena ḍiɛranyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti waŋɛ tiittɛ te gena tolan daŋkun. Ɔci kan mena noŋi ma ñingɛn te gena ḍiɛranyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋdi ma ñingɛn te gena tolan daŋkun.
42016011	Kan i waŋu tiicca te waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bɛɛyɛ, a menɛ i ‘wondi waka pwadin waka awarɛy?
42016012	Oŋ kan i noŋi ne pwadan te wak maka pookɛn bɛɛy, oŋ a menɛ i ‘wondi waak aŋka aga wak iy?
42016013	“Mena noŋi kanŋayɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋdi kanŋa maka ne yyɛɛwɔti bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ dita yooktan te jyek weya parɛ neeni dita, ɔci andi gena jyek weya parɛ neeni dita. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti noŋdɛ ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolan yaakkɛn iki jyek yoma buagɔn waka budan neeni bɛɛ.”
42016014	Ma Pɛriciin maka ani bilk neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛn wooki Yaccu.
42016015	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka noŋi ba ɛkkɛ agɛ maka pwadin ma ñomgɛnti, yeti yomg ɛkkɛ ŋeejɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ne ɛkkɛn yiekiy. Waka guaktan ma agi pwadgiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yeyɔ Jwaŋa Tolanti ne tolan.
42016016	“Tieŋdɛ, ne Yɔhanna baawi menyɛ, jyek ganuun Muuca ɔci jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan bala kanŋan mati doki. Ɔci te oŋŋa Yɔhanna bɛɛni ɔci ne acca ɔɔnyɛ, jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, bala mati doki. Ɔci ma bala loṭi ma te ɛkkɛn. Yeti ma waakɛnda buagɔn aga ma cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋki ɛkkɛn budan ɔɔn.
42016017	Kan ṭɛɛr baadi walla kan pɔlla ñaalɔ baadiyɛ, jyek ganuun waŋɛ gɛɛl baadi bɛɛ. A’a!
42016018	“Kan mena ‘uan ɛɛŋ daldɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdi ɛŋa parɛ gɛɛlyɛ, naŋka neeni a tommo. Ɔci kan ɛɛŋ gɛɛl dalnɛ ‘war ɛkɛ, ɔci kan ɛŋa neeni ḍɛɛdɛ ‘wana parɛyɛ, naŋka wanna a tomi moki.”
42016019	“Mena ‘uan mena cyɛgan gɛɛl bala ɛŋi bworŋa wiɛlɛ pɛñan bworŋa buol oŋkanda. Ɔci ɛkɛ ciyi te yoŋni oŋkanda, lieṭi genga bɛɛ.
42016020	Ɔci kaañ tukɛ mena cyɛganti neeniyɛ, mena bɔwan gɛɛl bala niin iñɔ. Ɛkɛ yenti Lajarac. ‘Wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ gwottin ñaalɔ. Ɔci waak tuggɛn ṭoontin, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ niin a ṭuoṭ warɛ warda.
42016021	Ɔci ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi kan ɛkɛ omji waka mena cyɛgan tiɛdɛ ḍwayi ŋwayyɛnti neeniyɛ, agi te ɛkɛ yɔmji doki te ɛkki. Ɔci gɔṭṭi, gɔki daŋkun bɛɛni, ɔci bala noṭi ɛkɛ warɛ.
42016022	“Ɔci oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, mena bɔwan neeni tuuni, ɔci ɛkɛ eyɛ malɛɛkan nona Abrahim taaŋɛti ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci mena cyɛgan neeni tuun daŋkun, ɔci ɛkɛ jokci ma koolji.
42016023	Ɔci Non Lien nona ootti maka tuwa neeniyɛ, mena cyɛgan neeni bala wooci a waañi ne tolan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ñorcin ñaalɔ ɔci Abrahim yuarnɛ ɛkɛ ciyi nona loonan, ɔci Lajarac bala ciyi ɛkɛ taaŋɛti.
42016024	Ɔci ɛkɛ bala boori yaadan agi, ‘Abrahim, wey ɔɔn, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati. Dala i Lajarac cuoñña ɔci ɛkɛ bieŋɛ oldɛ pietin ɔci oldɛ ‘ya lɛmmuti, acaan ‘ya waru nokɔ ne pɛñan te maña neeni!’
42016025	“Yeti Abrahim kɛkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Hay, kacco! Dala i poŋja te coodda cieni ɛkkɛ ṭɛɛrjiy. I balki waka coŋin waka pwadin waakɛnda, yeti Lajarac balki gena waka yeyin waakɛnda. Ɔci acca coodi ɛkɛ aŋka pwanni, ɔci i aŋka wooc a waañi ne tolan.
42016026	Ɔci moki, kola tolan bala yeccu ikin kɛɛmminji. Kan ma gɛɛg bɛya te wɛnni bɛya ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaaktanti bɛɛ. Ɔci moki kan ma bɛya te aŋan bɛya ɔɔnti wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaaktanti bɛɛ.’
42016027	“Ɔci ‘wana cyɛgan gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Wey ɔɔn, oŋ kan bala a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala i Lajarac cuña ban ɔɔn,
42016028	acaan ‘ya balka modg ɔɔn ne dɔɔyɔ aŋan. Dala ɛkkɛn miettɛ ɛkɛ te naŋka neeni, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ṭeedɛ ɛkɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛn bɛya wɛnni nona wooca ‘ya neeni bɛɛ.’
42016029	“Yeti Abrahim gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ɛɛ, gɔṭṭi pocca, ɛkkɛn balki worga Muuca, ɔci worgan maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan. Dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi gena jyek ɛkkɛn.’
42016030	“Yeti ‘wana cyɛgan kɛkcin agi, ‘A’a, a’a! Yɔmjin a ɔɔn bɛɛ! Hay, wey ɔɔn Abrahim, acaan ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn a tiicin te jyek ganuun Muuca bɛɛ. Yeti kan men gɛɛl jɔŋdi te lienti ooddi ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋdi ɔci paŋi ɛkkɛn aktanyɔ.’
42016031	“Yeti Abrahim gɔkcin ɛkɛti moki agi, ‘A’a. Kan ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek Muuca ɔci jyek maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛyɛ, kan men gɛɛl jɔŋdi te lienti ɔci ɛkkɛn myettɛ jiekyɛ, ɛkkɛn yooktan men ɔɔn.’ ”
42017001	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Jyeka ma ḍɛɛmti iñɔ noŋtɛ nɔji neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛya awarɛ. Yeti mena etti jyeka neeniyɛ, taab bɛya ɛkɛti te naŋka wannayɛ, pɛñcin ne tolan.
42017002	Bolja pom jien poma tolan ḍyɛktiti ma ɛkɛ ḍwaŋɛti ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ yiɛptiti ma galŋa tolantiyɛ, a ḍiɛran te yoña bɛya ɛkɛti te naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ mena ḍiɛran gɛɛlti aŋka dala mena ḍiɛran neeni noŋdi nɔjiy.
42017003	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ! “Kan mod ɛkkɛ gɛɛl noŋdi nɔjiyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ ṭeya, ɔci kan ɛkɛ warɛ yaldɛyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ bɔɔka.
42017004	Kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan iti oŋki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ te oŋ jiñɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci kan ɛkɛ dɔɔkti gɔkti iti agi ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɔ te naŋka pɔɔñjɛ ɛkɛyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ bɔɔka doki.”
42017005	Ɔci Cuudan Yaccu neeniyɛ, gɔkcin Ciɛggɔnti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, dala i ɔɔn ‘uottɔnti jyenna ɔɔn jyettɔn iti neeni.”
42017006	Ɔci Ciɛggɔn ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati ne ḍiɛran bala ba kɔba waŋɛ ḍiɛran neeniyɛ, ɔci kan ne ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ jana waayiti agi dala ɛkɛ dɔtti ñaalɔ ooddi warɛ cɔɔtti galŋjiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛ doki.
42017007	“Oŋ ɛkkɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛ bala a ɔki? Kan ‘uan gɛɛl ɛkkɛti balki mena kanŋan ɛkɛti, ɔci kan mena kanŋan ɛkɛti neeni bala bora ooṭi yiel, walla kan bala cieti kuliny, ɔci kan ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi baanjiy, weegɛn gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Dala I kooya orɔ, ɔci coocca iñɔ omja amɔ? A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ.’
42017008	Gena weegɛn aŋka gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Dala i bworŋ kanŋa ‘yɛɛŋja ɔci ‘ya noŋda am omja. Ne ‘ya ḍoodayɛ, i oŋ omja daŋkun oŋo.’
42017009	Ɔci ne mena noŋi kanŋa neeni kanŋa ɛkɛ ḍagdiyɛ, weegɛn gɔkti a pwatcin ɛkɛti te kanŋa ɛkɛ wanna bɛɛ, acaan gena kanŋa naŋdɛ ɛkɛ weegɛnti naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ wanna.
42017010	Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun, kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek wey ɛkkɛ waakɛndayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ te waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ agi ɛkkɛ agɛ ma kanŋa budan. Ɔci agi ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ genga bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ noŋŋɛ gena pwadan gɛɛl te yomg ɛkkɛ budan bɛɛ.”
42017011	Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti ne Yaccu baali pɔɔjɔ ooddi ban Urcaliimyɛ, ɛkɛ goṭi wɔɔka ban Camɛɛrya ɔci ban Jaliil.
42017012	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnni baanjiyɛ, ɛkɛ koogjin iki maka naŋɛ cyɛc gɛɛg ne inyaakkɛn. Ɛkkɛn bala yɔɔd lonɔ ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ.
42017013	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala yaadan boorɔ te pwana tolan agi, “I Yaccu, Ciɛggɔn, dala i yomu pɔkka ɔɔnti!”
42017014	Ne ɛkɛ gɔrni ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɔgdɛ ooddɛ gaciicin ma Icrayiilti acaan ɛkkɛ ywaŋŋin ‘ya doki. Dala ɛkkɛn gɔrti waak ɛkkɛ.” Ɔci ɛkkɛn atti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ywaŋŋɛyɔ doki.
42017015	Yeti men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ne ɛkɛ gɔrni ɛkɛ warɛ pwanni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bɛɛn dɔɔkkin nona Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala jieyi Juaŋ te pwana tolan.
42017016	Ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin iñɔ Yaccu ciegɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Yaccuti a pwatcin. Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a men ma Camɛɛrya.
42017017	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Maka ywaŋi ‘ya bala a inyaakkɛn bɛɛ? Oŋ ba maka ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ neeni bɛ?
42017018	Maka neeni ɛkkɛn menga dɔɔkkin nona ‘yati aŋka gɔkti a pwatcin Juaŋti bɛɛ? Gena buñgɔn aŋka bɛɛn dɔɔkkin parɛ?”
42017019	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ ɔci ɔgdi ootta. Te jyeni i neeniyɛ, i waru pwani doki.”
42017020	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin gɛɛg tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ne tua?” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Bɛɛna bɛɛdi cyɛgji Juaŋyɛ, yuartan ma te woŋgɛn bɛɛ.
42017021	Ɔci men gɛɛl yaakinti gɔki agi cyɛgji Juaŋ baalɔ wɛnni, walla baalɔ aŋan bɛɛ, acaan cyɛgji Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛti wɛnni doki.”
42017022	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka laldi ɛkɛti agi, “Ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ agi dala te ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan baljɔ ɛkkɛnti wɛnni. Yeti ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ.
42017023	Ɔci ma gɔkti ɛkkɛti agi, ‘Ɛkkɛ gɔrcɛ ɛkta baalɔ wɛnni!’ Walla agi, ‘Ɛkkɛ gɔrcɛ ɛkta baalɔ aŋan!’ Yeti naa ɛkkɛ ooddɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ bootti jyek ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
42017024	Bɛɛna bɛɛda ‘ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘ya bɛɛd ne pɛñan bala ba ñaal ne wildi noon dyɛgdɛ pɔli ŋwayɛ warday.
42017025	Yeti te ñamuyɛ, ‘ya taabba ne tolan, ɔci maka bala ciyi accayɛ, ɛkkɛn yooktan te ‘ya.
42017026	Ɔci ba coodda cieki ma te oŋŋa Nɔwa baali menyɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdayɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛn bala a ɔɔn daŋkun. Ma myeldɛ coodi ɔci powa ne ‘ya ywoṭṭanti doki.
42017027	Te wɔɔka wannayɛ, ma bala ñingɛn juadan te kanŋa waka amtan ɛkkɛn ɔci waka maattan ɛkkɛny, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ḍɛɛwɔ oŋkanda, ɔci bala poŋi te tol bɔrda bɛya ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ, ne oŋŋa Nɔwa kaanni murka tolanji ɔɔn, ɔci tol bɔrda bɛɛni, ɔci maka bala bora neeni ḍakcin waakɛnda.
42017028	Ɔci moki ne Lut baaliyɛ, ma bala omi ɔci moti ɔci wɛɛṭi waako, ɔci waak moki wiɛltanŋɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala pieti waako, ɔci cɔti oorgo.
42017029	Yeti ne oŋŋa Lut kaannɛ bora te ban Caduumyɛ, maañ ɔci gwoyya koldan bɛɛn iñɔ te ñaalɔ ba pɔllo, ɔci maka bana wannati ammɛ waakɛnda.
42017030	Ɔci ba coodi ma Caduum te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan waru lɛɛlda borayɛ, ‘ya ma mɔkca ciyi ba coodda wanna daŋkun.
42017031	“Ɔci te oŋŋa wannatiyɛ, kan men gɛɛl bala bora ne naŋka neeni bɛɛdiyɛ, naa ɛkɛ kaatti orɔ aŋka waak oodɛ bora moki bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl bala yieljiyɛ, kan ɛkɛ wierŋɛ genga yieljiyɛ, naa ɛkɛ dɔɔdi gena neeniti moki bɛɛ.
42017032	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyek ɛŋ Luut!
42017033	Kan mena boottin ‘yati gɛɛl jyek ‘ya daldɛ aŋka naa ɛkɛ nogditi ma bɛɛyɛ, mena neeni yɔɔrdi tɛɛtin bala ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni bɛɛ. Yeti kan men gɛɛl boottin ‘yati ɔci noŋdi ba jyek ‘ya, oŋ kan te ɛkɛ noktan ma ɔɔnyɛ, mena neeni ɛkɛ aŋka yɔɔrdi tɛɛtin bala ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni.
42017034	’Ya ɛkkɛ myettin ka te ween jiñɛ wannayɛ, kan ma gɛɛg ne yyɛɛwɔ bala niin aŋgantiyɛ, men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ eedɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ɔci mena parɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka yada.
42017035	Ɔci kan maka moong gɛɛg ne yyɛɛwɔ moki bala jieyi nona ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ eedɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ɔci ɛka parɛ neeni aŋka yada.
42017036	Kan ma gɛɛg ne yyɛɛwɔ bala yielji te oŋŋa wannayɛ, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ eedɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ɔci ɛka parɛ neeni aŋka yada.”
42017037	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Naŋka neeni bala wɛnɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ agi, “Nona niini gena tuutayɛ, wɛjjin bɛya ḍwortiti aŋan.”
42018001	Ɔci Yaccu bala loṭi maka laldɛ ɛkɛ te jwalla a caagɔn gɛɛl agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ oŋkanda, naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ toga bɛɛ.”
42018002	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Oŋ gɛɛlti mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala baan gɛɛlti. Ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa godan. Ɛkɛ buayi Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci men baan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ tieŋdi jyek menga bɛɛ.
42018003	Ɔci ɛŋa cieñ gɛɛl bala bana tolanti neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ ooddi nona ḍuaŋa godanti gɔ ɛkɛ moki ati ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛŋa neeni gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Dala ‘ya magda te mena yookɔn te ‘ya neeni.’
42018004	Ɔci te ñamuyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛŋa neeni maŋŋɛ bɛɛ. Yeti ne baaṭi ɛkɛ bala gɔki yomɛti parɛ agi, ‘‘Ya buay Juaŋ bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya buay ma baan bɛɛ.
42018005	Yeti ɛŋa cieñ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala poṭi ‘ya waru, ‘ya ɛkɛ magdo, hay! Kan ‘ya ɛkɛ dalja a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bɛya a ñaccu ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya kwandaji nɔñji.’ ”
42018006	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mati agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jyek ḍuaŋa godan ḍuaŋa yaayan neeni.
42018007	Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka yomɛ pwad pwad ma ɛkɛti. Oŋ ɛkɛ ma ɛkɛ maka wiak ɛkɛti te oŋ konɛ ɔci te weenji neeni magdɛ ɛkɛ awarɛ bɛɛ?
42018008	Tieŋdɛ! Juaŋ kwaci te maŋi ma bɛɛ. Yeti ne ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛdayɛ, ya ma mɔkca jyeti ‘yati ne pwadan boki?”
42018009	Ɔci ma gɛɛg bala poŋi gɔki agi ɛkkɛn pwadginti te naŋki ɛkkɛn pookɛn. Maka neeni yookɔn te maka pookɛn waakɛnda. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti te jwalla a caagɔn agi,
42018010	“Gɔṭṭɛ, oŋ gɛɛlti maka ‘uay gɛɛg ati on Juaŋ ona tolan ne yyɛɛwɔ. Men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ ɛkɛ a men ma Pɛriciin. Ɔci mena parɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena lyemi tulbay.
42018011	“Ɔci men ma Pɛriciin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala yɔɔd ñaalɔ cɔki Juaŋti te yom ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki Juaŋti agi, ‘Jwaŋa Tolan, ‘ya gɔkka iti a pwatcin, ‘ya baal ba maka ani eñi wak maka pookɛn neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya waru ḍig ḍig bɛɛ. Ɔci ‘ya a tomma bɛɛ. Walla ‘ya baal ba mena lyemi tulba yɔɔd wɛnni neeni bɛɛ.
42018012	Yeti ‘Ya gwor koñ oŋki ne yyɛɛwɔ te Juaŋ jiñɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci ‘ya ‘woñ i te gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti oŋkanda.’
42018013	“Yeti mena lyemi tulba neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala yɔɔd te ɔntɔ nona loonan. Ɛkɛ wyeñɛ luoŋnɛ iñɔ. Ɛkɛ ñoṭi ñaalɔ pɔliji bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala poomi korkɛ, ɔci gɔki agi, ‘Hay! I Jwaŋa Tolan, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati, ‘ya a nɔɔdɔn, hay!’ ”
42018014	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ‘wota agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin, mena lyemi tulba neeni bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkɛ a lyɛlta, ɔci ɛkɛ ati baanji te yoma pwadan. Yeti ‘wan ma Pɛriciin neeni bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ. Acaan maka waakɛn naŋtan ba maka ḍwaŋin pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn naŋdɛ Juaŋ aga ba maka ḍyɛrin. Ɔci maka noŋi ba ɛkkɛn akki maka ḍyɛrinyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka naŋdɛ Juaŋ aga maka ḍwaŋin.”
42018015	Ɔci ma bala etti kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin nona Yaccuti. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala Yaccu kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn ordiyɔ ɔci gɔkti ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ coodɛ ne pwadan.” Yeti maka laldɛ Yaccu ɛkkɛn kɛkcin maka neeniti.
42018016	Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔrni ɛkkɛn kɛkki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ looñi ɔci gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Dala kɛɛgin bɛya ‘yati! Naa ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn dɛɛdɛ a ɔɔn bɛɛ, acaan jyek cyɛgji Juaŋyɛ a jyek maka bala ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
42018017	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ne pwadan acca! Kan men gɛɛl jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan mugdɛ ɛkɛ te yoma pwadan ba kacca ḍiɛran bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti dɛndi non cyɛgji Juaŋti bɛɛ.”
42018018	Ɔci ḍuaŋa ma Icrayiil gɛɛl tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Hay, mena loṭi ma mena pwadany, ‘ya noŋja a ɔki aŋka tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni bɛɛdi ‘yatiy?”
42018019	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! I ‘ya barda a mena pwadan ogo? Mena pwadan gɛɛl bala bɛɛ, gena Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ aŋka pwatciny.
42018020	Jyek ganuun ŋeej i doki ne ɛkkɛn gɔkki agi, ‘Naa i noŋja tomi bɛɛ, naa i menga noga bɛɛ, naa i kor waak bɛɛ, naa i men gɛɛl jomgayɔ bɛɛ, ɔci dala i noŋja ne pwadan weegɔti ɔci mɛɛgɔti.’”
42018021	Ɔci ḍuaŋa neeni ṭwokcin gɔkcin agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal tiec jyeka neeni waakɛn ne ‘ya wona ḍiɛra ne acca men ɔɔn.”
42018022	Ne Yaccu tieŋni jwalla neeni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gen gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ men. Dala i bootta ‘yati. Ne i bootti ‘yatiyɛ, dala i mal i wiɛlja ñin, ɔci bilk ‘woñga maka bɔwan.”
42018023	Yeti ne ‘wana neeni tieŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ wiak poŋi jiek acaan ɛkɛ balki waak ne coŋɔn.
42018024	Yaccu bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ yomɛ yaaññiy, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Maka cyɛganyɛ, owwin ɛkkɛn waakɛn ootiti iñɔ bɛɛti Jwaŋa Tolan bieŋɛtiyɛ, tɛy tɛyo.”
42018025	Ɔci Yaccu jwali dɔŋŋɛji moki agi, “Wɔtcin kolŋan wɔtti ibra waŋɛtiyɛ, koocin te owwin mena maalɛ tolan warɛ oodɛ iñɔ bɛɛdɛ ban cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolany.”
42018026	Maka tieŋŋin jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Oŋ kan a ɔɔny, a menɛ uday?”
42018027	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Waka ma baan yaakinti te naŋki ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka yaakinti te naŋki ɛkkɛn.”
42018028	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gɔṭṭi, ɔɔn wak ɔɔn dalnɔn doki aŋka boottɔn iti.”
42018029	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan. Kan men gɛɛl anna ɛkɛ anɛ ‘ya bala ñamu te anna ɛkɛ anɛ on ɛkɛ, walla ɛŋ ɛkɛ, walla modgɛn, walla mɛɛgɛn ɔci weegɛn, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛyɛ,
42018030	ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ waka neeni moki ne coŋɔn ne ɛkɛ baali iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni meny, ɔci te coodda cieki ma ne baaṭiyɛ, tɛɛtin baadi ywongati bɛɛyɛ, bala ɛkɛti.”
42018031	Ɔci acca Maka A Inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn Ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, eññɛ Yaccu bora. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ! Acca ikin oottin ban Urcaliim. Ɔci jiek waakɛnda jyeka kiiwɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te ‘ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, bɛya bora waakɛnda dɔki.
42018032	’Ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘ya ‘wonta ma Icrayiil ackan ma Ḍɔɔm byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñieddi te ‘ya, ɔci juoldi ‘ya, ɔci ma noŋdi ‘yati ne yaayan. Ɔci ñaang ŋuultan ‘yati.
42018033	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘ya ḍuata te woonto, ɔci ‘ya nokta ma. Yeti ne nink ne ḍoogɔ bɛɛti borayɛ, ‘ya oŋ jɔlla ñaalɔ tɛɛt moki. Gena jyek ‘ya neeni.”
42018034	Yeti ɛkkɛn jiek jitkɛn neeni tieŋjɛ ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jiek jitkɛn kuoli ñin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeka guagdɛ Yaccu neeni mugɛ bɛɛ.
42018035	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ cɔɔlnɛti ban Jɛrikɔyɛ, mena ‘uan mena ulli gɛɛl bala ciyi pɔy taaŋɛti ñwoyi waako.
42018036	Ɔci ɛkɛ bala tyeŋi ne poli maka coŋin balki atki gorki pɔɔjɔ nona ɛkɛ warɛtiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin agi, “A makɛ goṭi wan?”
42018037	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ myetki agi, “Gena Yaccu men ma Najarɛt, ɛkɛ ati goṭi i taaŋuti wanna.”
42018038	Ɔci mena ulli yaajjin agi, “I Yaccu Kaci Daawud! I a Kiṭɔ mena pwadany. Dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati ɔci ‘ya pɔkta ñinguti!”
42018039	Ɔci maka bala ati iki Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn mena neeni dɛɛjiti agi naa ɛkta yaadɔ bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ jyeti jyek maka neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yaajjin ne tolan moki ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ yaadan gɔki agi, “I Yaccu Kaci Daawud, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati, ɔci ‘ya pɔkta ñinguti!”
42018040	Ɔci Yaccu yɔɔni ɔci gɔkcin mati agi, “Dala ɛkɛ oodɛ ‘yati wɛnni.” Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni nona Yaccutiyɛ, ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi,
42018041	“I buagi ‘ya noŋja a ɔki iti?” Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin Yaccuti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ‘ya buaga dala i woŋgu ‘ya pɔkka aŋka ‘ya noon yuarca.”
42018042	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i ñingu pɔkka. Ɔci dala i waru pwada te jyenna i jyetti ‘yati neeni.”
42018043	Ɔci ne pɛñan ɛkɛ yaakinti gwali noon doki. Ɔci ɛkɛ bootcin Yaccuti te oŋŋa wannati ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala jieyi Juaŋo. Ɔci ma waakɛnda ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Juaŋ daŋkun.
42019001	Ɔci Yaccu dɛñjin ban Jɛrikɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ati goṭi baan konɛti.
42019002	Ɔci men gɛɛl bala a ‘uan yenti Jakka. Ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa maka lyemi tulbay. Ɔci ɛkɛ cyɛg cyɛg te maal ne tolan.
42019003	Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn gɔrti Yaccu ne Yaccu baali a ɔkiy. Yeti ɛkɛ yaakinti Yaccu yuarti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ ḍuul ḍul ɔci ma coŋɔ.
42019004	Ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yiŋi ñamu, ɔci kaaccin ñaalɔ jaanti, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn gɔrti Yaccu te ñaalɔ a ɔɔn, acaan Yaccu bala bɛya ati ooddi te pɔya neeni.
42019005	Ɔci ne Yaccu bɛɛni nona neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔrcin ñaalɔ ɔci borcin Jakkati agi, “Jakka, kooya iñɔ ne pɛñ. ‘Ya buaga ootta ban ɛkkɛ te oŋŋo.”
42019006	Ɔci ɛkɛ kooyin iñɔ ne pɛñan, ɔci Yaccu eññɛ on ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
42019007	Ɔci ne maka coŋin neeni gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda bala wooki Yaccu. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Yeti Yaccu ooddi on mena nɔɔdɔn neeniti aŋka aga wɛli ɛkɛ ogo?”
42019008	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki on ɛkɛyɛ, Jakka jɔllin ñaalɔ ɔci gɔkcin Ciɛggɔnti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, gɔṭṭi, taaŋi wak ‘yayɛ, gɛɛg wɛtka maka bɔwan. Ɔci kan gen menga eñi ‘ya budan amaamyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ ‘woñga ‘uotkati ne ŋaanɔ.”
42019009	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “A’a, a ɔɔn moki bɛɛ, acaan te oŋŋa neeniyɛ, yɔɔt Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn ma ona neeniti acca doki. Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a kaci Abrahim, mena a men Juaŋ neeni daŋkun.
42019010	’Ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛn aŋka lier ɔci yuoc maka yieny.”
42019011	Ɔci ne ma balki tyeŋki jyek Yaccu neeni menyɛ, ɛkkɛn myennɛ ɛkɛ te jwalla a caagɔn neeni. Te wɔɔka wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn cɔɔllinti ban Urcaliimti doki, ɔci ma bala poŋi gɔki agi Yaccu agdi Ciɛggɔn Tolan ne cwakanti, ɔci agi ɛkkɛn cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan yuardinti ɛkkɛn ne cwakanti.
42019012	Jwalla a caagɔn guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni, ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Mena ḍuaŋa gɛɛl jɔllin ati bana loonan aŋka ɛkɛ naŋtan ma a mena ḍuaŋa tolan, ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkɛ dɔɔkti baanji moki.
42019013	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ jɔŋni men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ borcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti, maka a inyaakkɛn neeniti, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ bilk gɛɛg byeŋkɛnti aŋka cɔttanyɔ. Ɛkɛ menga da ‘wonnɛ ḍeyyan naŋɛ ma te dahab, ɔci menga da ḍeyyan naŋɛ ma te dahab. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ bilka neeni wyɛldɛ cɔddɛyɔ te waak ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɔɔn.’
42019014	Yeti maka ciyi ban ‘wana neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn te ɛkɛ, ɔci ne ɛkɛ jɔŋni atti dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛn men gɛɛl cuuñɛ bana ooddi ɛkɛ neeniti. Ɔci mena cuuñɛ ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, gɔkcin mati agi, ‘Maka ciyi iki ‘wana neeni baanjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn naa ‘wana neeni aga ḍuaŋa tolan ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.’
42019015	“Yeti ‘wana neeni naŋɛ ma aŋi ḍuaŋa tolan ɔɔn. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɔɔŋni baanjiyɛ, ɛkɛ borcin maka kanŋan ɛkɛti, maka ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ bilk neeniti. Ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin ɛkkɛnti te waka cɔdɛ ɛkkɛn te bilka neeniy.
42019016	Ɔci mena ñamu bɛɛn nona ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa, gɔṭṭi, ḍeyyan i neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn cɔniyɔ ‘ya ɔci eccin ḍeyyan makɛn ne inyaakkɛn.’
42019017	Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan gɔkcin mena neeniti agi, ‘I noŋŋi ne pwadan hay, i a mena pwadan. Gɔṭṭi, acaan i kanŋa ḍiɛran neeni naŋŋi ne pwadanyɛ, i da naŋdin ‘ya agdi ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ bonka ḍwaŋin ne inyaakkɛn neeni.’
42019018	Ɔci mena akki yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛn ɔci gɔkcin agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa, gɔṭṭi, ḍeyyan i cɔniyɔ ‘ya ɔci eccin ḍeyyan makɛn ne dɔɔyɔ.’
42019019	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I noŋŋi ne pwadan hay, gɔṭṭi! I naŋdin ‘ya agdi ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ bonka ḍwaŋin ne dɔɔyɔ daŋkun.’
42019020	“Ɔci mena parɛ gɛɛl daŋkun bɛɛni, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa, gɔṭṭi, ḍeyyan i nɛ. Ɛkɛ koniyɔ ‘ya te bworŋ ṭɔɔlɛ, ɔci ḍuaccan ‘ya bala niin a nink ɔɔn.
42019021	’Ya noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya buay i, i a mena jiekɛ tɛyan. Acaan oŋkandayɛ, waka cɔdayɔ i bɛɛyɛ, lula i te mati, ɔci waka bɛya te yielji waka dɔŋŋi i bɛɛyɛ, aga wak i.’
42019022	Ɔci ḍuaŋa tolan neeni gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘I a mena yaayan hay! Ba jyeka gɔwwɔ i bora te tuk iti neeniyɛ, dɔwwan ‘ya i wyeñuti doki, acaan ‘ya looñ te naŋki i neeni. Çeej i ne ‘ya aga mena jiekɛ tɛyan. Ɔci ŋeej i waka cɔdiyɔ ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn luldi aga wak ‘ya, ɔci waka bɛya te yielji waka dɔŋi ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, aga wak ‘ya moki.
42019023	Oŋ ba i bilk ‘ya eññi ‘wonni mena parɛ aŋka ɛkɛ bilk ‘ya cɔnna waakɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn mɔkcan ‘ya aŋan iki bilk wyetka jiettanti ma bɛ?’
42019024	“Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka bala yɔɔd ɛkɛ toŋkɛti agi, ‘Ḍeyyan luldɛ te ɛkɛti, ɔci ‘wondɛ mena balki ḍeyyan ne inyaakkɛny.’
42019025	“Yeti maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkcin bilk weegɛnti agi, ‘Ḍuaŋa, ɛkɛ balkin ḍeyyan ne inyaakkɛn doki!’
42019026	“Ḍuaŋa Tolan gɔkcin agi, ‘Ɛɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl. Naŋka neeni pwatcin maka woŋgɛn a tiicinti ne ɛkkɛn ‘wontɛti ma waka coŋin a ɔɔn bɛɛ? Gɔṭṭɛ, maka balki waak dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘uottanti ma waak ɔɔn. Yeti maka balki waak oŋ woŋgɛn a tiicin bɛɛyɛ, waka bala ɛkkɛnti ne ḍiɛkan wannayɛ, lultan ma te ɛkkɛnti.
42019027	Ɔci acca maka yookɔn te ‘ya agi naa ‘ya agji ḍuaŋa tolan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn oodɛ ɛkkɛ ‘yati wɛnni, ɔci ɛkkɛn nogdɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya ñamuti wɛnni!’ ”
42019028	Ɔci ne Yaccu ḍookki te jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ñamu bala ooddi ban Urcaliim.
42019029	Ban Bɛtpɛɛj ɔci ban Bɛtani, ɛkkɛn bala Pom Jɛtuun taaŋɛti. Ɔci ne Yaccu noŋi cɔɔlditi bonka neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn maka laldɛ ɛkɛ gɛɛg cundɛ ñamu ne yyɛɛwɔ.
42019030	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ne ɛkkɛ dɛndɛ bana yɔɔd ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl mɔktɛ yɔɔd a wiɛngɔn. Men gɛɛl taami te ɛkɛ men bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ gwottɛ, ɔci dala ɛkɛ oodɛ wɛnni.
42019031	Ɔci kan men gɛɛl tootti ɛkkɛti agi, ‘Ɛkkɛ ɛkta gujji eejji wɛnɛyɛ?’ Dala ɛkkɛ gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn buagɔn ɛkɛ.’ ”
42019032	Ɔci maka cuuññi ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn atti. Ɔci ba jwalla guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ mɔkci ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛnti neeni.
42019033	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki gwotki tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛyɛ, tɔɔrɔn weyyɛn tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay, ɛkkɛ tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ guddɛ eedɛ wɛnɛ?”
42019034	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ciɛggɔn buagɔn ɛkɛ.”
42019035	Ɔci ɛkkɛn tɔɔrɔn eyɛ Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkkɛn bworŋin ɛkkɛn ḍuacci tɔɔrɔn ŋoyɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn oŋ Yaccu taapci ñaalɔ tɔɔrɔnti oŋo.
42019036	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ luoṭṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bworŋin ɛkkɛn gɛɛg cyɛtci pɔy konɛti aŋka ɛkkɛn noŋdi ɛkɛti ba mena tolan.
42019037	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni ne cualanti ban Urcaliimti nona pɔya ooddi iñɔ Pom Jɛtuuntiyɛ, poli ma polla tolan bootcin ɛkɛti ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Juaŋ te pwana tolan te kanŋan naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda yuarɛ ɛkkɛny.
42019038	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Dala ma jieyi i, Ciɛggɔn Tolan! I a Kiṭɔ Kaci Daawud, mena bɛɛn te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan. Dala coodi pwani bala ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci dala pwani bala Juaŋti mena bala ñaalɔ neeni!”
42019039	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin gɛɛg bala nona poli ma polla tolanti neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, gɔrca ma iti, poca, yook ɛkkɛn wanna yaayɛ Juaŋti ne tolan. Dala i gɔkca maka lala i ṭeyayɔ.”
42019040	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin, kan maka neeni ciya liedayɛ, gwoyya neeni aŋka yaaddi te yom ñɔɔn ɔci jieddi ‘ya, ɔci gɔkti agi ‘ya agjɔ ḍuaŋa tolan ba maka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna ɔɔn.”
42019041	Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni ne cɔɔlnitiyɛ, ɛkɛ bala gɔṭi ban Urcaliim neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ wiakcin te bana neeni.
42019042	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin bana neeniti te ɔɔli agi, “Dala te i jyek coodda pwadan neeni te ŋeej i. Acaan accayɛ, i coodda pwadan neeni yuara moki bɛɛ.
42019043	Acaan ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, maka yookɔn te i bɛya, ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔtti cɔdan tɛyan i waruti, ɔci ɛkkɛn i yuttiwi. Ɔci pɔya koodi i bora gɔ bala moki bɛɛ.
42019044	Hay, i ban Urcaliim! I looti ma bora! Ɔci i ḍakti iki kɛɛgin i a cyɛɛlɔ. Guonan gɛɛl daltan ma nina ɛka parɛ warɛti moki bɛɛ. Acaan oŋŋa ‘ya bɛɛna iti acca neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeej i bɛɛ.”
42019045	Ɔci ɛkɛ kaaccin kaañji kañ on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ maka wɛɛṭi dok ɔci ḍɛɛk ɔci kulin ɔci boobg orɔ neeniyɛ, ŋualnɛ bora.
42019046	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, ‘On ‘yayɛ, a ona cɔkki may.’ ‘Yeti ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ a ona cieki maka ɛyyo!’”
42019047	Yaccu bala loṭi ma on Juaŋ ona tolan oŋkanda. Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkkɛn Yaccu noktitiy.
42019048	Yeti gena ɛkkɛn buagi aŋka naŋtan ɛkɛti gɔ yuarɛ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn buayi mako, acaan ma waakɛnda bala tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ ne tolan.
42020001	Oŋ gɛɛlti Yaccu bala loṭi ma on Juaŋ ona tolanti te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin. Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn ñaagɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ nona baali Yaccuy.
42020002	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i ɔɔn myettɔn, i noŋ naŋka neeni te jyek menɛ? A menɛ i ‘wonni naŋka neeniy?”
42020003	Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya da buaga toocca ɛkkɛti te jwali gɛɛl daŋkun. ‘Ya ṭwoktata ɛkkɛ ñamu parun, ɛkkɛ oŋ myettin ‘ya daŋkun oŋo.
42020004	Bulti Yɔhanna bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantɛ, walla bɛɛn te ma baanti budan? Gɔktɛ.”
42020005	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tyewɔ yɔtin pookɛn te jwalla neeni agi, “Kan ikin gɔktin agi bulti Yɔhanna neeni bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, ɔci Yaccu tootti ikinti agi, ‘Oŋ kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ba ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyek ɛkɛti bɛ?’
42020006	Yeti kan ikin gɔktin agi bulti Yɔhanna bɛɛn te ma baanti budanyɛ, ikin yeptin ma waakɛnda te gwoyi noktin dita, acaan maka coŋin neeni bala poŋi gɔki agi Yɔhannayɛ, ɛkɛ a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan.”
42020007	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ɔɔn bulti Yɔhanna neeni ŋeejɔn ne bɛɛni te aŋɛ bɛɛ.”
42020008	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin te naŋka naŋdi ‘ya neeni daŋkun bɛɛ.”
42020009	Ɔci Yaccu bala loṭi ma te jwalla a caagɔn gɛɛl agi, “Mena ‘uan gɛɛl ati pieti jang balji, ɔci ɛkɛ bala neeni ‘wonnɛ maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ati bana tolan bana parɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛɛni coodi aŋan.
42020010	Ɔci ne wɔɔka pwonki ma jang ṭɔlgɛn bɛɛniyɛ, bal weegɛn mena kanŋan ɛkɛti gɛɛl cuuññɛ nona maka gɔṭi bal neeniti aŋka ɛkɛ kɛntan ma jang ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg oodɛ baanji ɛkɛti. Yeti mena kanŋan ɛkɛti neeni jiebɛ maka gɔṭi bal neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ cuuñji duakciyɔ byeŋkɛ budan.
42020011	Ɔci moki bal weegɛn mena parɛ gɛɛl cuuññɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ jiebɛ daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ naŋɛ ɛkkɛn ne yaayan, ɔci ɛkɛ cuuñji duakciyɔ byeŋkɛ budan.
42020012	Ɔci moki ɛkɛ maka kanŋan ɛkɛti mena akki ḍoogɔ cuuññɛ moki. Ɔci maka gɔṭi bal neeni ɛkɛ yacci, ɔci ɛkɛ yiɛpcɛ bora.
42020013	Ɔci bal weegɛn gɔki agi, ‘Acca ‘ya noŋja a ɔki yeti? Ɛɛ, ‘ya kaci ‘ya aŋka cundo. Ɛkɛ a kacca ana ‘yay, ɔci ɛkkɛn yooktan te jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ.’
42020014	Yeti maka gɔṭi bal neeniyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ yuarkitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, ‘Mena neeniyɛ, gena mena wak weegɛn eedɛ ɛkɛ neeni. Dala ikin ɛkɛ noktin. Ɔci wak weegɛn waka te ooddi ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, aga wak ikin.’
42020015	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ŋualji bora te balji, ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ nogɛ ɛkkɛn bora oŋo.” Yaccu oŋ tooccin mati agi, “Oŋ bal weegɛn noŋdi a ɔki acca maka gɔṭi bal neeniti?
42020016	Ɛkɛ bɛya ɔci maka gɔṭi bal neeni nogdɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci bal ‘wondɛ maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti.” Ɔci maka bala tyeŋi jyek Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Aa cca cca cca, a ɔɔn tɛy tɛyo, hay! Naa Juaŋ naŋka bala a ɔɔn wanna gɛɛl oodi ɔɔnti bɛɛ.”
42020017	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔrcin ɛkkɛnti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jwalla kiigin jiñɛ bala a ɔki ne jwali gɔki agi, ‘Poma guaktan maka cɔti oorg agi ɛkta yaayɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi poma pwadan on warɛti doki.’
42020018	Kan men gɛɛl ḍɛmdi poma neeni wyeñɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ nuotti jitin. Yeti kan poma neeni ḍɛmdi men gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ mena neeni tiittɛ iñɔ.”
42020019	Ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn Yaccu muktan ne pɛñan te oŋŋa wanna. Yeti ɛkkɛn buayi maka coŋin. Ɛkkɛn looñi acaan ne Yaccu baali mieti ma te jwalla a caagɔnyɛ, ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ne Yaccu baali gɔki jwalla caagɔn neeni te ɛkkɛny.
42020020	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala kɛɛy ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma ɛkkɛn gɛɛg cuuñɛ ɛkkɛn Yaccuti lieda. Maka cuuñɛ ma neeniyɛ, bala noŋi ba ne ɛkkɛn buagɛ jyek Yaccu awarɛ ɔɔn. Yeti ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ te yoma pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ acaan ɛkkɛn lieṭi pɔya Yaccu muktiti ɛkkɛn aŋka oltiti ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ bieŋɛtiy. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn jwalla guagdɛ Yaccu gɛɛl aktanyɔ ɛkkɛn te jwalla yaayan.
42020021	Ɛkkɛn botcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn jyeka guaga i loṭi ma neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka pwadin awarɛ. Ɔci i lor ma waakɛnda te jyeka ne cyɛɛlɔ. I ma kɛba jitin bɛɛ. Ɔci ŋeejɔn ɔɔn moki i lor ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan, i lor te yoma awarɛ.
42020022	Ɔɔn myettɔn, kan bɔlin Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm neeni ‘wontin ikin tulbayɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba jyek ganuun ikin ma Icrayiil boki?”
42020023	Yeti yomg ɛkkɛn ŋeejɛ Yaccu ne ɛkkɛn balki gɔkki jyek labji neeniy. Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi,
42020024	“Giric gɛɛl oodɛ wɛnni ikin gɔrtin a cyɛɛlɔ.” Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Giric neeni balki pɔɔyama menɛ? Ɔci a yenti menɛ bala ɛkɛtiy?” Ɔci ma ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gena pɔɔyama Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolan, ɔci yenti ɛkɛ.”
42020025	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ, yɔɔddɛ ɛkkɛ myettin, wak Kɛɛcaryɛ, ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci wak Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, dala ‘wondɛ Juaŋ daŋkun.”
42020026	Ɔci maka neeni korkɛn buañi noon te jyek Yaccu neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn cien lieda. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti Yaccu bwantan te jwali gɛɛl ma ñomgɛnti bɛɛ.
42020027	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ma Cadyuciin gɛɛg bɛɛn Yaccuti daŋkun. Maka neeni loṭi agi ne ma tuudiyɛ, ma jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ moki bɛɛ.
42020028	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, Muuca ikin kieŋnin jiek agi, ‘Kan mena mod ɛkkɛn tuwayɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ balki ɛɛŋyɛ, ɔci kan ɛɛŋ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ men baawyɛ, dala ɛŋ ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdɛ mod ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkɛ jieda kɛɛgin jyettɛ mena tuun neeni.’
42020029	Oŋ acca gɔṭṭi! Maka ‘uay gɛɛg bala a dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɛkkɛn a modin waakɛnda jiennɛ mɛya ne cyɛɛlɔ. Moda tolan ñamuyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛɛŋ ḍɛɛnɛ, ɔci ne ɛkɛ tuuniyɛ, kɛɛgin ɛkɛ baaw men.
42020030	Ɔci moda bootcin moda tolan ŋoyɛti neeniyɛ, ɛŋa neeni ḍɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ tuun moki, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛ baaw men.
42020031	Ɔci moda akki ne ḍoogɔ moki ɛŋa neeni ḍɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ tuun moki, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛ baaw men. Ɔci maka a modin ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, ɛɛŋ ḍɛyɛ waakɛnda, yeti ɛkkɛn balki kɛɛgin gɛɛg bɛɛ. Kɛɛgin baaw ɛkkɛnti ne ɛkkɛn tuuki ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛɛŋ dalɛyɔ ɛkkɛn jieni kaci gɛɛl men bɛɛ.
42020032	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tuuki waakɛnda a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛɛŋ daŋkun tuuni.
42020033	Ɛɛ, oŋ ne oŋŋa ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te lientiy, ɛŋa neeni aga ɛŋ moda ɔkiy? Acaan ɛkɛ ḍɛyi ‘uay ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, ɔci ‘uay tuun kɛɛgin baaw waakɛnda?”
42020034	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ, maka iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛwɔ.
42020035	Yeti maka pwadin maka jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te kolk jitin, maka dɛndi ban Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci coodda ne baaṭi neeni yuartan ɛkkɛnyɛ, jyek ḍɛɛwin bala ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ.
42020036	Jyek ḍɛɛwin baaw ɛkkɛnti, acaan ɛkkɛn tuwa moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala ba malɛɛkan ɔɔn. Acaan ɛkkɛn jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te lienti, ɛkkɛn aŋi kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan.
42020037	Ɛkkɛ tiekɛ agi ma jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ te lienti moki bɛɛ. Ne Muuca gɔrni maañ baali koldi jaantiyɛ, Juaŋ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, ‘Yɔrg ɛkkɛ Abrahim ɔci Icaak ɔci Yaakubyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka moṭi ‘yati.’
42020038	Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a Jwaŋ maka tuutan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a Jwaŋ maka tɛɛti. Acaan ma ɛkɛ waakɛnda a maka tɛɛti.”
42020039	Ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋ gɛɛg gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ɛɛ, mena loṭi may, i ṭwoŋni ne pwadan te taata neeni, hay!”
42020040	Ɔci ɛkkɛn poccin tooccin ɛkɛti te genga moki bɛɛ.
42020041	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ma gɔki agi Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Bora a kaci Daawud ogo?
42020042	Ɛkkɛ pokkɛ jyek Daawud bɛɛ? Daawud waanɛyɛ, oki ɔɔlg gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya tieŋŋan Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ‘yati agi, “Dala i coocca ‘ya taaŋuti taaŋŋa byerɔn
42020043	ne maka yookɔn te i bwandaji ‘ya ɔɔn.”’
42020044	Daawud boṭi Kiṭɔ a Ciɛggɔn ɛkɛ ba Jwaŋa Tolan. Oŋ kan Daawud boṭi Kiṭɔ a Ciɛggɔny, oŋ Kiṭɔ a kaci Daawud moki a ɔki?”
42020045	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti maka coŋin ñomgɛnti agi,
42020046	“Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki maka loṭi worga Jwaŋa Tolan, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ani woon ma ñomgɛnti ɛŋi jibban becin jibban wiɛlɛn pɛñan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ma ɛkkɛn naŋtan ba maka ḍwaŋin ma ñomgɛnti dukkanji oŋkanda. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛn buagɔn ciyi kokin pwadinti oorga morki ma Juaŋo, ɔci moki kan juman bala, ɛkkɛn buagɔn ciyi kokin pwadinti oŋkanda ɔɔn.
42020047	Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn omi wak moonga ciek ɔci oorg ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn a yyɛcin, ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔki cɔŋŋa beyan aŋka ma gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn aninti Juaŋo. Te dienna ɛkkɛn dyetki ma ñingɛn neeniyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan jiek oldɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ne tolan!”
42021001	Ɔci Yaccu ñorcin ñaalɔ on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ maka cyɛgan yuarnɛ ɛkɛ bala ḍɔci bilk ɛkkɛn canduuk ḍɔcki ma bilka ‘wontan ma Jwaŋa Tolan.
42021002	Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋa cieñ ɛŋa bɔwan daŋkun yuarnɛ ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali ḍɔcci girin ne yyɛɛwɔ budany.
42021003	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan awarɛ, bilka ḍuannɛ ɛŋa bɔwan, ɛŋa cieñ neeni a ḍiɛkan, yeti Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanna pwani acaan ɛkɛ ḍɔccin.
42021004	Acaan maka neeni ɛkkɛn kɛñi te bilk ɛkkɛn wyetka kɛci bora te bilka coŋin neeniti, ɔci ḍuacci ɛkkɛn Juaŋti. Yeti ɛŋa bɔwan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍɔccin bilk ɛkɛ waakɛnda.”
42021005	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu gɛɛg bala gɔki te on Juaŋ ona tolan neeni, agi gwoyya cɔtki ma on warɛ neeniyɛ, agi ɛkki pwannɔ agi pwadgin. Ɔci agi waka ‘woñgi ma Juaŋ on Juaŋ neeni agi pwannɔ agi pwadgin moki. Ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi,
42021006	“Gɔṭṭɛ! Oorga yuartɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, waka neeni laaktan ma ɔntɔ, ɔci guonan gɛɛl niindi menin parɛti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yiɛptan ma iñɔ waakɛnda.”
42021007	Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, oŋŋa neeni bɛya bora ne tua? Ɔci ne oŋŋa neeni noŋi bɛɛdi boray, oŋ ñiitin ikin te gena?”
42021008	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ! Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ma ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Acaan maka coŋin gɛɛg bɛya, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn aginti ‘ya Kiṭɔ awarɛ. Ɔci agi Oŋ Kiṭɔ bɛɛnɔ doki. Naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka neeni bɛɛ.
42021009	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ma gɔkki agi lañ baalɔ ɔci agi ywobji baalɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ ne tolan bɛɛ. Naŋka bala a ɔɔn wanna bɛya waakɛnda, yeti jiek wyetkɛn bawwin men bɛɛ.”
42021010	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti moki agi, “Keedin wɛɛn warda noogdi yɔtin oŋkanda.
42021011	Ɔci bonka pookɛn gɛɛgtiyɛ, ṭɛɛr warɛ ḍieddi ne pɛñan. Ɔci koñ moki bɛya mati. Ɔci taab tol tolo. Ɔci moki naŋka ñyecki ma yuartan ma ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci ma buatti ne pɛñan.
42021012	“Yeti ne naŋka neeni bɛɛki bora men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ mwoktɛ mako. Ɔci ɛkkɛ naŋtɛ ɛkkɛn ne yaayan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ yɔɔttɛ ma ma ñomgɛnti oorga morki ma Juaŋti aŋka ma gɔrti jyek ɛkkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ oltɛ ma ciginji. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg yɔɔtti ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ɔci ḍuaŋan ṭɔlgɛn ñomgɛnti te jyek ‘ya.
42021013	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ma lwogdɛ te jyek ‘ya.
42021014	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍyɛgdɛ acca. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka ɛkkɛ goddi iki ma nona godanti neeni bɛɛ.
42021015	Te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkkɛ magdin ‘ya te jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ‘ya ñing tɛɛno, ɔci maka yookɔn te ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bwandɛ ɛkkɛ te jieko. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaaktanti gɔkti genga ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ.
42021016	Ɔci ma waakɛnda yooktan te ɛkkɛ te jyek ‘ya. Te oŋŋa wannayɛ, mɛyi ɛkkɛ ɔci weyi ɛkkɛ, ɔci modg ɛkkɛ ɔci ma ɛkkɛ maka pookɛn, ɔci mung ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ ma byeŋkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg noktɛ ɛkkɛn.
42021018	Yeti men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti ḍakti bɛɛ.
42021019	Kan ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyanyɛ, ɛkkɛ uddɛ.
42021020	“Gɔṭṭɛ, ne ɛkkɛ ban Urcaliim yuartɛ yuttitiwi ackanyɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ oŋŋa bana neeni yaadi cɔɔllin doki.
42021021	Kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ban Yahuudiyayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yooŋdɛ pomk jitin ne pɛñan, naa ɛkkɛ kwattɛ bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni bɛya a yuurgɔn. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ bana tolantiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ koodɛ bora ne pɛñan. Kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ bana tolan ŋoyɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ kaattɛ bana tolanti moki bɛɛ.
42021022	Acaan oŋŋa bɛya Juaŋ jiek duaktɛ Urcaliim wyeñɛti wannayɛ, ɛkɛ a ‘Oŋ Ywobji Juaŋ Ban Urcaliimti’ ba jyeka kiigin worgaji.
42021023	Maka laci ɔci maka balki kɛɛgin ḍyɛrinyɛ, oŋŋa wanna tɛy tɛy ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan. Acaan taab bɛya wannayɛ, pɛñña pɛñño, ɔci ywobji Juaŋ tol tol mati.
42021024	Ma noktan ma te byeŋgaaran. Ɔci ma gɛɛg eetan maka yooki ñin iki ɛkkɛn bonka pookɛnti baan warda aga kɛɛnk ɛkkɛn. Ɔci ban Urcaliim buurtan Keedin Pookɛn iñɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ciya wɛnan ne yuong ɛkkɛn bɛɛti bora ɔɔn.
42021025	“Oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ñiitan ma te naŋki waka pookɛn, ɔci te oŋ waŋɛ, ɔci te paano, ɔci te kɛltan. Ɔci iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, maka bonka ḍwaŋin buaya ne tolan, ɔci lieṭi pɔya yooŋti ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ te pɔɔgi galŋa tolan ɔci te joon ɛkkɛn.
42021026	Ɔci ma gɛɛg yomgɛn poda te bwaji ɔci te naŋka tɛyan naŋka bɛya mati ṭɛɛrjiy. Acaan waka bala ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn ḍieddi waakɛnda.
42021027	Hayya, ɛkkɛn oŋ ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan yuarta ne bɛɛda te pɔli te war tɛɛn ɔci pwanna pwani ne tolany.
42021028	Ne naŋka neeni noŋki bɛɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne pwadan a tyɛlga, acaan oŋŋa ɛkkɛ magdɛ Juaŋ te maka yookɔn te ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, cɔɔllin doki.”
42021029	Ɔci Yaccu ɛkkɛn myennɛ te jwalla a caagɔn gɛɛl moki agi, “Gɔrtɛ ŋuammo, ɔci janga pookɛn waakɛnda.
42021030	Ne ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ jang yuocki ɔci pworkiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ noon aŋi ḍuoŋ tukɛ doki.
42021031	Ɔci daŋkun, ne ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ naŋka neeni ne bɛɛti borayɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan cɔɔllin doki.
42021032	“‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan. Maka accayɛ, ɛkkɛn tuwa bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ciya ne jyeka neeni bɛɛti bora waakɛnda ɔɔn.
42021033	Pɔli ɔci ṭɛɛryɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi. Yeti jyek ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi bɛɛ.
42021034	“Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ, aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ jyek coodda yaayan bɛɛ, walla ba jyek nooŋi mooyo, ɔci walla paŋi jyek coodda iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te naŋka wannayɛ, ɔci oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, bɛya ne pɛñan ba yiici ne muowi waak ɔɔn.
42021035	Ɛkɛ bɛya te maka ciyi ṭɛra neeni ŋoyɛti waakɛnda.
42021036	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci cɔktɛ oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Tolan war tɛɛno, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ bwantɛ taabn bɛya ɛkkɛti waakɛnda neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ yaakɛti yɔɔttɛ ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ñamuti.”
42021037	Ɔci oŋkandayɛ, Yaccu bala loṭi ma on Juaŋ ona tolan. Yeti te weenjiyɛ, ɛkɛ ooddi ciyi Pom Jɛtuunti.
42021038	Ɔci te liid ṭɔɔl ḍiɛranyɛ, ma waakɛnda bɛya ɛkɛti on Juaŋ ona tolan acaan buagɔn tieŋdi jyek ɛkɛ.
42022001	Iid Byedga Polanyɛ, cɔɔllin doki. Iid neeniyɛ, ma boṭi agi Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi a Gorŋo.
42022002	Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn buayi mako, ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkkɛn nokki Yaccu lieda.
42022003	Ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan kaaccin Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti yomɛti. Ɛkɛ a mena akki maka laldɛ Yaccu Ne Inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn Ne yyɛɛwɔy.
42022004	Ɔci ɛkɛ ati ɔci ɛkɛ bala gɔṭi jiek iki gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil iki ḍuaŋan bɔlin on Juaŋ ona tolan acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn Yaccu ‘wondɛ ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛnti lieda ɔɔn.
42022005	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Ɛkɛ ‘wontin bilk te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.”
42022006	Ɔci Yahuuja jyettin gɔki agi, “Ɛɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin.” Ɔci ɛkɛ ati bala lieṭi pɔya ɛkɛ Yaccu ‘wondɛ ma byeŋkɛnti ne maka coŋin neeni baaki nona ɛkɛti men ɔɔn.
42022007	Ɔci Iid Byedga Polanyɛ, bɛɛn doki. Gena oŋŋa ma ŋoorki kulin ṭɔlgɛn ba naŋki oŋ Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi a Gorŋo.
42022008	Ɔci Yaccu Butruc cuuññɛ i Yɔhanna ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ wak iid ywaŋdɛyɔ, ɔci ɔɔn oŋ bɛɛdɔn ikin omtin oŋo.”
42022009	Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “I buagi ɔɔn ooddɔn waak ywaŋdɔnyɔ wɛnɛ te ikin?”
42022010	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, ne ɛkkɛ dɛndɛ ban Urcaliimjiyɛ, mena ‘uan gɛɛl koogdi iki ɛkkɛ. Ɛkɛ kɛṭi pieg te kuñŋan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ boottɛ ɛkɛ ŋoyɛti. Ɛkkɛ ooddɛ iki ɛkɛ ɔɔn ne ona ɛkɛ kaatti ɔɔn.
42022011	Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ on weegɛnti agi, ‘Mena Loṭi Ma bala tooci agi, “Ba ona cootta ‘ya a on wɛlg bɛ? Acaan ‘ya buaga noŋdɔn iid i maka laldi ‘yay.” ’
42022012	Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ myettɛ te ona tolan ñaalɔ. Ona neeni ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ doki. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ wak iid ywaŋdɛyɔ te ikin aŋan.”
42022013	Ɔci ɛkkɛn atti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yɔṭi on ba jwalla guaŋnɛ Yaccu ɛkkɛntiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn wak iid ywaŋɛyɔ aŋan.
42022014	Ɔci ne oŋ waŋa omki ma iid bɛɛni borayɛ, ɔci Yaccu cooccin iñɔ omi am iki Cuudan ɛkɛ Maka A Inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn Ne yyɛɛwɔy.
42022015	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya buaga ne pɛñan dala ikin omtin oomdin iid neeni, Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ iki ‘ya ne taab bɛɛni ‘yati men bɛɛy.
42022016	Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin ne pwadan. ‘Ya omja iid neeni moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya cied ɔɔn ne oŋŋa waak waakɛnda mugdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bieŋɛti ɔɔn.”
42022017	Ɔci ɛkɛ kubaaya pyeg luutkin luullɛ, ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ma ɛkɛti agi, “Antɛ waka nɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍyerdɛ jitin ɛkkɛ.
42022018	Tieŋdɛ! ‘Ya motca pyeg luutkin moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya cied budan ɔɔn ne cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdi ɔɔn.”
42022019	Ɔci ɛkɛ byentan gɛɛl luullɛ, ɔci cɔkcin Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci ɛkɛ byentan wɛɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci ɛkɛ ma ‘wonnɛ byentan, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Antɛ byentan neeni! Gena war ‘ya. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn, aŋka ɛkkɛ poŋɛ te ‘ya.”
42022020	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ḍookkɛ te amiyɛ, ɔci Yaccu kubaaya pyeg luutkin luullɛ daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi, “Antɛ! Mottɛ waka bala kubaaya konɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a yimg ‘ya, ɛkkɛn kɛɛwin iñɔ te ɛkkɛ. Ɔci te lyena tuuda ‘ya neeniyɛ, Juaŋ noŋdi jyeka wonkɛn iki ɛkkɛ.
42022021	Yeti gɔṭṭɛ, byeŋ mena ‘ya ‘wonda ma byeŋkɛnti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ balgin iki ‘ya nona amti wɛnni.
42022022	’Ya Kaci Ma Baan tuud ba jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ‘yay. Yeti mena ‘ya ‘wonda ma byeŋkɛnti neeniyɛ, taab bɛya ɛkɛtiyɛ, tol tolo.”
42022023	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala toyi yɔtin pookɛn agi a menɛ bala ɛkkɛnti wɛnni noŋi naŋka neeniy.
42022024	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu bala toyi yɔtin pookɛn agi, “A menɛ a mena tolan te ikiny?”
42022025	Ɔci Yaccu ɛkkɛn myennɛ agi, “Ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, balki war tɛɛn ma ɛkkɛnti oŋkanda, ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bartan ma agi, ‘Maka Ḍɔci Ma Ne Pwadany.’
42022026	Yeti ɛkkɛyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ baldɛ ba ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin neeni bɛɛ. Kan mena a mena tolan te ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ aga ba mena ḍiɛran mena moki ma te yoma pwadan.
42022027	Kan mena ciyi omiyɛ, ɔci kan mena parɛ gɛɛl bala noŋi kanŋa ɛkɛyɛ, ba mena a mena tolan te ɛkɛ neeni bɛ? Gena mena ciyi iñɔ neeni. Gena ɛkɛ aŋka tolcin bɛɛ? Yeti ‘yayɛ, ‘ya baal ba mena ḍiɛran ɛkkɛti.
42022028	Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka bala ‘yati oŋkanda ne taab baali ‘yati ɔɔn.
42022029	Ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ‘ya kanŋa maka a ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ba kanŋa ‘ya ne ‘ya ‘wonnata Wey ɔɔn kanŋa mena ḍuaŋa tolan neeni.
42022030	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin omtin ɔci mottin iki ‘ya ban cyɛgji ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ naŋdin ‘ya coottɛ kokin wyetkɛnti, ɔci agdɛ ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil maka kɛɛna a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniy.”
42022031	Ɔci te wɛnni Yaccu gɔrcin Butructi ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Butruc, Butruc, tieŋŋa poca! Jwaŋa Yaayan bala tooci te ɛkkɛ waakida, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn ‘ya ɛkɛ ‘woñga naŋki aŋka ɛkɛ buagɔn poci ɛkkɛ a poccin ba kuata ma kuaki pok oŋkanda wanna ɔɔn.
42022032	Yeti ‘ya baal cɔk Juaŋti te i, Butruc, aŋka naa jyenna jyetti i neeniyɛ, ḍɛmdi iñɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci ne i waru yaldi mokiyɛ, dala i modg ɛkkɛ maga, aŋka dala ɛkkɛn yɔɔda ne tɛyan.”
42022033	Yeti Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, kan ‘ya olta ma ciginji iki iyɛ, dala ‘ya olta ma ɔɔn. Ɔci kan ‘ya nokta ma iki iyɛ, dala ‘ya nokta ma moki ɔɔn!”
42022034	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Tieŋŋa, i myettin ‘ya, te ween jiña neeni ne tuan wiakti men bɛɛyɛ, i doki kɛkka te ‘ya oŋki ne ḍoogɔ. I gɔkca mati agi i ‘ya ŋeeja bɛɛ.”
42022035	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin Maka A Inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn Ne yyɛɛwɔti agi, “Oŋŋa ɛkkɛ cuuññin ‘ya ɔci ɛkkɛ attɛ, ɔci kucin ɔci cowaal ɔci wɛɛyi eññɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛyɛ, coodi ɛkkɛ tɛy tɛy boki?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn kɛkcin agi, “A’a, coodi tɛy tɛy bɛɛ.”
42022036	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Yeti accayɛ, kan men gɛɛl balki kucin bilkyɛ, dala ɛkɛ kucin neeni eedɛ, ɔci mena balki cowaalyɛ, dala ɛkɛ cowaal eedɛ daŋkun. Ɔci mena balki byeŋgaaran bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bworŋ jwami wiɛldɛyɔ, ɔci dala ɛkɛ wɛrdi byeŋgaaran te bilka neeni.
42022037	’Ya ɛkkɛ myettin, jyeka kiigin gɔki te ‘ya agi, ‘Jiek oljɛ ma ɛkɛ wyeñɛti i maka yeyin a cyɛɛlɔ.’ Dala jyeka neeni aga jyeka awarɛ te ‘ya. Acaan jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ‘yayɛ, noŋi cɔmdi bora waakɛnda awarɛ.”
42022038	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Ciɛggɔn, gɔṭṭi, byeŋgaaran bala wɛnni ne yyɛɛwɔ!” Ɔci ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ, kapa ɔɔn.”
42022039	Ɔci Yaccu kooyin bora te bana tolanti neeni, ɔci ati ñaalɔ Pom Jɛtuun wyeñɛti ba naŋki ɛkɛ oŋkanda. Ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun bootcin ɛkɛti.
42022040	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnni nona neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Cɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ te maali Jwaŋa Yaayan neeni ɔci kɛkti te ‘ya bɛɛ.”
42022041	Ɔci ɛkɛ ati ñamu parɛ ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin iñɔ ɔci cɔkcin Jwaŋa Tolanti agi,
42022042	“Wey ɔɔn, kan i buagiyɛ, dala i noŋja naŋki i aŋka naa taab lien neeni bɛya ‘yati bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya cɔkka iti ba yom ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya cɔkka iti ba yom i.”
42022043	Ɔci malɛɛka gɛɛl bɛɛn ɛkɛti te ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala moki Yaccu aŋka dala ɛkɛ yomɛ tɛya.
42022044	Ɔci Yaccu yomɛ bala wiak ne tolan konɛ ñɔni warɛ te taab neeni, hay! Ɔci ɛkɛ cɔkcin Juaŋti ne tolan. Ɔci cani kɛɛwin iñɔ te ɛkɛ ñamɛti bala ba yimgo.
42022045	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ḍookki te cɔŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ati dɔɔki nona maka laldɛ ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn mɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ wicɔ, acaan ɛkkɛn taabbin te yom yoño.
42022046	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ wiccɛ a ɔɔn ogo? Dala ɛkkɛ jɔldɛ ñaalɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te maali Jwaŋa Yaayan neeni, ɔci kɛktɛ te ‘ya bɛɛ.”
42022047	Ne Yaccu baali gɔki jyeka neeni menyɛ, ɔci poli ma polla tolan bɛɛni. Ɔci Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti ɛkkɛn wɛɛññɛ nona ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ ati orcinti Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkɛ Yaccu ñiimmɛ te tukɛ ba naŋki ma ɛkkɛn.
42022048	Yeti Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Yahuuja, i ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ‘wonda ma te ñiimmɔ?”
42022049	Ɔci ne maka atki iki ɛkɛ neeni gɔrki naŋka naŋtan ma ɛkɛti wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, dala ikin nooktin iki ma te byeŋgaaran ba?”
42022050	Ɔci te wɛnni mena bala Yaccuti gɛɛl mena kanŋan i gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil jyɛmmɛ jyeña byerɔn palnɛ bora te byeŋgaaran.
42022051	Yeti Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kapa ɔɔn, naa i noŋja a ɔɔn moki bɛɛ!” Ɔci Yaccu topcin men jyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ men jyeña ywaŋŋɛ moki.
42022052	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilti, ɔci ḍuaŋan bɔlin on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋinti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, hay! Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ ennɛ byeŋgaaran ɔci gɔlk byeŋkɔti aŋka ‘ya mugdata ɛkkɛ ba muŋi mena ɛɛn ogo?
42022053	Ne ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛ on Juaŋ ona tolan oŋkanda ɛkkɛ menga poccin ‘ya muŋŋa bɛɛ. Yeti dala gena ɛkkɛ buagɛ naŋdɛ neeni dala naŋdɛ wona war tɛɛn Mena Yaayan mwoki noon men ɔŋ.”
42022054	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ mugɛ ɔci eyɛ lwadɛ ne on gaciic tolan ma Icrayiilti. Ɔci Butruc ɛkɛ bala bɛya booti te ŋoyɔ nona loonan.
42022055	Ɔci ne ma gɛɛg maañ olkiti jiju kaañjiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn cooccin iñɔ bala ooyi. Ɔci Butruc daŋkun bala ooyi iki mako.
42022056	Ɔci mena a ṭɔɔl gɛɛl Butruc yuarnɛ ne ɛkɛ baali ciyi ooyi maccuy. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala gɔṭi tieci Butruc warɛ a tiito. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Hay! ‘Wana neeni moki a mena booti Yaccu daŋkun, hay!”
42022057	Yeti Butruc kɛkcin, ɔci gɔkcin ɛɛŋti agi, “Hay! Ɛɛŋo, ‘ya gena guaga i neeni ŋeej bɛɛ!”
42022058	Ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ mokiyɛ, mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala gɔṭi Butruc. Ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! I a men ɛkɛ daŋkun, hay!” Yeti Butruc kɛkcin gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay, ‘uano, ‘ya a men ɛkɛ bɛɛ!”
42022059	Ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ mokiyɛ, mena parɛ gɛɛl gɔkcin ɛkɛti moki ne pɛñan agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘wana neeni ɛkɛ bala iki Yaccu awarɛ acaan ɛkɛ a men ma Jaliil!”
42022060	Yeti Butruc gɔkcin agi, “Hay, ‘uano! Jyeka guaga i wanna ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ!” Ɔci ne pɛñan ne ɛkɛ baali gɔki jyeka neeni menyɛ, tuan wiakcin doki.
42022061	Ɔci Yaccu warɛ yallɛ, ɔci gɔrcin Butructi, ɔci Butruc ñingɛ ñieŋnɛ te jwalla guaŋŋɛ Yaccu ɛkɛti te ñamu agi, “Gɔṭṭi, Butruc, ne tuan wiakti men bɛɛyɛ, i kɛkka te ‘ya oŋki aga ne ḍoogɔ dokiy.”
42022062	Ɔci Butruc ati bora, ɔci bala wiak a joon duor konɛ te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.
42022063	Ɔci maka gɔṭi Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala juoli ɔci jiebi ɛkɛ.
42022064	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ḍɛɛkkiti ñingɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hayya! Dala i noŋja ba naŋki maka bɔwan. Mena i jyɛmmi neeni ŋeejɛ? Gɔkca!”
42022065	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala wooki ɛkɛ te jyeka pookɛn jyeka coŋin jyeka yeyin.
42022066	Ɔci ne noon bɔɔniyɛ, maka ḍwaŋin ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Yaccu owwɛ ma nona maka gɔṭi jiek ñomgɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi,
42022067	“Gɔṭṭi, kan i a Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɔɔn myettɔn.” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettinyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ bɛɛ.
42022068	Ɔci kan ‘ya tootta ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ buagɛ ṭwoktɛ genga ‘yati bɛɛ.
42022069	Yeti acca te oŋŋa neeniyɛ, ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan coocca Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti, taaŋŋa byerɔn ñaalɔ.”
42022070	Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti waakɛnda agi, “I a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan nɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal a ɔɔn, ba jwalla guagdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna.”
42022071	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “Hay yeh! Ikin buagin lieṭin jyeka pookɛn moki ogo? Ikin tieŋnin te jyetkɔ jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te tuk ɛkɛ parɛ neeni doki!”
42023001	Ɔci maka coŋin waakɛnda neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jɔllin ñaalɔ, ɔci Yaccu lwadɛ eyɛ ɛkkɛn nona Bilaatucti.
42023002	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tɔɔmi Yaccu Bilaatucti ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, “‘Wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yuarŋɔn ɔɔn, ɛkɛ bala ma ɔɔn jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala dɛyi ɔɔn moki agi naa ɔɔn ḍɔccɔn tulba Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔmti bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkɛ agji ḍuaŋa ɔɔn ḍuaŋa tolan daŋkun.”
42023003	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ookiti ma Bilaatuctiyɛ, Bilaatuc tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Hay, i gɔk i a ḍuaŋa tolan ma ɛkkɛ ma Icrayiil nɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal a ɔɔn ba jwalla guagdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna.”
42023004	Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilti ɔci maka coŋinti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, hay, ɛkkɛ! ‘Ya gena yaayan gɛɛl yuarŋ ‘wana neeniti aŋka ‘ya jiek olda ɛkɛ wyeñɛti bɛɛ.”
42023005	Yeti ɛkkɛn gɔki ‘yeṭi ne pɛñan Bilaatucti agi, “Maka ciyi bonk Ma Yahuudiya waakɛnda, te ban Jaliil ne wɛnni ɔɔnyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn ḍuobbin te jyeka loṭi ‘wana neeni ɛkkɛny.”
42023006	Ne Bilaatuc tieŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tooccin mati agi, “Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ ‘wana neeni ɛkɛ a men ma Jaliil?”
42023007	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ tieŋni agi Yaccu bɛɛnɔ te ban Hiruuduc Antipacn gɛɛlti non Jaliilyɛ, ɔci Yaccu cuuññɛ ɛkɛ Hiruuducti doki.
42023008	Te baaṭi Hiruuduc buagɔn ka gɔrti Yaccu, acaan ɛkɛ tieŋŋin jyeka guaktan ma te Yaccu ne coŋɔn. Yeti Yaccu yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ men bɛɛ. Ɔci ne Yaccu cuuññɛ Bilaatuc ɛkɛti te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi Yaccu noŋdɔ naŋka tɛyɔ gɛɛl nona ɛkɛ ñamɛti kaapun.
42023009	Ɔci Hiruuduc bala tooci Yaccuti te jyeka coŋin, yeti Yaccu ṭwokcin genga ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
42023010	Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil i maka loṭi worga Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yɔɔd tɔɔmi Yaccu ne pɛñan.
42023011	Ɔci Hiruuduc ɔci ackan ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ne yaayan Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala juoli ɛkɛ. Ɔci Yaccu ɛɛŋnɛ Hiruuduc bworŋa pwadan bworŋa beyan, ɔci cuuññɛ duaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ Bilaatucti.
42023012	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannatiyɛ, Bilaatuc ɔci Hiruuducyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeewin aŋi munin. Te ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yoyi ñin yaakkɛn te jiek ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg.
42023013	Ɔci Bilaatuc gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ḍuaŋan ɔci maka pookɛn bornɛti waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛni.
42023014	Ɔci ne ma bɛɛkiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Wana neeni oonɛ ɛkkɛ ‘yati, ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi ‘wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ma jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ. Yeti gɔṭṭɛ, jyek ‘wana neeni gwali ‘ya jitin doki ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti. Ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ tɔɔmmɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɛɛl yuarŋ ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
42023015	Ɔci Hiruuduc Antipac moki jwali gɛɛl yuarŋɛ ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Yaccu dɔɔnɛ ɛkɛ nona ikinti. Gɔṭṭɛ, gena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan aŋka tuudi ɛkɛyɛ, gɔ gɛɛl bala bɛɛ.
42023016	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ ḍuado, ɔci ‘ya oŋ ɛkɛ pɔkka oŋo.” [
42023017	Yuonginda ne Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ bɛɛdiyɛ, naŋki Bilaatuc bala aŋka maka bala ciginji men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ pɔktɛ ɛkɛ budan, wantan ma bɛɛ.]
42023018	Yeti polla tolan bala yaadan te pwana tolan waakɛnda te tuka ne cyɛɛlɔ agi, “‘Wana neeni ɛkɛ nogdɛ, ɔci Baraabac ɛkɛ aŋka pɔkka bɛya bora ɔɔnti!”
42023019	Baraabac neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala jiju ciginji acaan oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ma gɛɛg buagɔn akuuma muktan ɛkkɛn, ɔci Baraabacyɛ, ɛkɛ bala iki maka neeni. Ɔci moki ɛkɛ bala jiju ciginji acaan ɛkɛ men gɛɛl noŋŋɛ.
42023020	Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔgjin i ɛkkɛn moki, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn Yaccu pɔktɛ.
42023021	Yeti ɛkkɛn bala yaadan te pwana tolan agi, “Dala ɛkɛ ŋaaptɛ ñaalɔ! Dala ɛkɛ ŋaaptɛ ñaalɔ doki!”
42023022	Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti oŋki ne ḍoogɔ agi, “Ogo? Gena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan a gena? Gena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan tuudi ɛkɛyɛ, gɔ bala bɛɛ. ‘Ya ɛkɛ ḍuado, ɔci dala ɛkɛ ɔga ooddi.”
42023023	Yeti ɛkkɛn gɔki ‘yeṭi ne pɛñan yool a yooli te jieko. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaajjin agi, “Dala Yaccu ŋaaptɛ ñaalɔ!” Ɛkkɛn bala yaadan a ɔɔn ne Bilaatuc noŋŋi ba jwali ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
42023024	Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin mati agi dala ma noŋdi ba yomg ɛkki Yaccuti.
42023025	Ɔci ‘wana bala jiju ciginji te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan ma akuumati ɔci te jyek lienyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka pɔŋnɛ Bilaatuc ba jyek maka coŋin neeni. Ɔci Bilaatuc ackan ‘wonnɛ Yaccu byeŋkɛnti aŋka dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi ɛkɛti ba yomg ma Icrayiil.
42023026	Ɔci ackan Yaccu eyɛ lwadɛ. Ɔci mena ‘uan mena yenti Cimaanyɛ, koogjin iki ɛkkɛn yomu pɔɔjɔ. Ɛkɛ a men maka ban Cayriin. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala bɛya te yielji. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ mugɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ iircɛ ɛkkɛn kɛṭi kakan Yaccu. Yaccu bala ati ñamu, ɔci Cimaan bala booti Yaccu ŋoyɛti kɛṭi kakan.
42023027	Ɔci polla tolan bootcin ɛkɛ ŋoyɛti. Ɔci maka moong bala iki ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn bala poomi korkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala wiak te Yaccu.
42023028	Ɔci Yaccu warɛ yallɛ ɛkkɛnti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Moong maka ban Urcaliim, dala ɛkkɛ joon daldɛ te ‘ya. Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka wiaktɛ te taab bɛya ḍɔɔgi ɛkkɛti pookɔy, ɔci te kɛɛgin ɛkkɛ.
42023029	Gɔṭṭɛ, oŋ bala bɛya, ɔci ma gɔkti agi, ‘Moonga balki kɛɛgin bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔyɔ. Gena maka jieni bɛɛ, ɔci maka nɛɛti kɛɛgin bɛɛ neeni.’
42023030	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkti pomkti agi, ‘Dala ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ ɔɔnti, ɔɔn kwomdɔntiwi!’
42023031	Kan ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka neeni ‘ya mena pwadantiy, oŋ ɛkkɛn noŋdi a ɔki nɔñji ɛkkɛti ma Urcaliim maka yeyinti neeniy?”
42023032	Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg bala daŋkun ne yyɛɛwɔ. Gena maka yeyin. Ɛkkɛn eyɛ lwadɛ ma iki Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔ acaan noktan ma.
42023033	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn dɛñki nona bartan ma agi “Oon Men Baan wyeñɛtiyɛ” ɛkkɛn Yaccu ŋaapci ñaalɔ aŋan, ɔci maka yeyin ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ aŋan daŋkun. Mena ne cyɛɛlɔ ŋaapci ma Yaccu taaŋŋa byerɔnti, ɔci mena parɛ ŋaapci ma taaŋŋa aamti.
42023034	Ɔci Yaccu bala cɔki gɔki agi, “Hay! Wey ɔɔn, dala i ackan neeni bɔɔka, acaan naŋka naŋi ɛkkɛn neeni ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.” Ɔci ackan bala oomi kɔla te bworŋin ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bworŋin Yaccu cieñɛ jitin.
42023035	Ɔci ma bala yɔdi gɔṭi naŋka neeni. Yeti ḍuaŋan ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala juoli Yaccu agi, “Maka pookɛn yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci acca kan ɛkɛ a Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Borayɛ, dala ɛkɛ warɛ yɔɔdɛ parɛ.”
