42023036	Ɔci ackan daŋkunyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala juoli ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn mooya cyɛyan eyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Anti, motca.”
42023037	Ɔci ɛkkɛn moki gɔki ɛkɛti agi, “Kan i a Ciɛggɔn Tolan ma Icrayiilyɛ, dala i waru yɔya paru acca.”
42023038	Ɔci jyeka kiigin olji ma kakanti ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ Yaccu wyeñɛti gɔki agi, “MENA NEENI A CIƐGGƆN TOLAN MA ICRAYIIL”.
42023039	Ɔci mena yaayan gɛɛl, mena ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ iki Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ḍori Yaccu agi, “Hay! I a Kiṭɔ bɛɛ? Oŋ ba i war i yɔɔdi aŋka i ɔɔn da yɔɔdɔn bɛ?”
42023040	Ɔci mena parɛ neeniyɛ, mena neeni dɛɛnnɛti. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! I buay Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ? Jyeka neeni bɛɛn ikin wyetkɔti waakida.
42023041	Ɔci jiek bɛɛn ikinti yaakkɔ amaam bɛɛ. Jiek bɛɛn ikinti te naŋka naŋŋin ikin yeyin neeni. Yeti gɔṭṭi poca, ‘wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛ.”
42023042	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Yaccu, dala i poŋja te ‘ya, ne i agdi Ciɛggɔn Tolany.”
42023043	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Awarɛ, ‘ya gɔkka iti, acca neeniti ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin oottin iki ‘ya ñaalɔ pɔliji non cyɛgji ‘ya.”
42023044	Ɔci ne oŋ waŋɛ yɔɔnni yeccuyɛ, ne pɛñan noon uli doki ne oŋ waŋɛ warɛ yiɛnnɛ ɔɔn. Oŋ waŋɛ bala dɛki moki bɛɛ.
42023045	Ɔci bworŋa kɛkci ma orɔ on Juaŋ ona Tolan, bworŋa on kɛɛmmɛ jitin i on ṭɔla jiju neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍañi jitin te ñaalɔ wyeñɛti ne iñɔ ɔɔn.
42023046	Ɔci Yaccu yaadjin te pwana tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Wey ɔɔn, boŋ ‘ya ‘wondin i bieŋuti!” Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ tuun doki.
42023047	Ɔci ḍuaŋa ackanyɛ, ne ɛkɛ gɔrni naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ jieyi Juaŋ gɔki agi, “Ɛɛ, awarɛ, ‘wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena pwadan. Ɛkɛ noŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛ!”
42023048	Ɔci pooldin ḍwaŋin pooldin bɛɛn gɔṭi naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn dɔɔki baanji, ɛkkɛn bala poomi korkɛn acaan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yeyɔ.
42023049	Ɔci mung Yaccun, ɔci moonga bɛɛn boottin ɛkɛ te bana tolan ban Jaliilyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yɔdi te nona loonan. Ɔci naŋka neeni waakɛndayɛ, yuarcɛ ɛkkɛn.
42023050	Ɔci mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala yenti Yuocip. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn te ban Ɛrimatiiya ban Yahuudiyaji. Ɛkɛ a mena gɔṭi jiek iki maka ḍwaŋin daŋkun. Ɛkɛ pwad pwado, ɔci naŋki ɛkɛ pwatcin moki.
42023051	Yuocip neeniyɛ, bala kɛɛy oŋŋa cyɛgji Juaŋ bɛɛdiy. Ɛkɛ jiek ñaagɛyɔ iki Maka Gɔṭi Jiek i ma Icrayiil te jyek lyen Yaccu bɛɛ, a’a. Ɔci moki ɛkɛ yookɔn te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn Yaccuti neeni.
42023052	Ɔci Yuocipyɛ, ɛkɛ ati Bilaatuc ñamɛti ɔci tooccin Bilaatucti aŋka ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Bilaatuc war Yaccu.
42023053	Ɔci ɛkɛ war Yaccu oonɛ iñɔ, ɔci paarŋɛyɔ ɛkɛ te bworŋa woonɛ bworŋa tɛyan. Ɔci eññɛ joŋnɛ koolji. Gena kola wɔrŋɛ Yuocip poom konɛtiy. Men gɛɛl jogɛ ma kola neeniti men bɛɛ.
42023054	Oŋŋa neeniyɛ, a Oŋŋa Yɔŋki Ma Waako. Oŋ Cabit cɔɔllin doki oŋ tɛɛna wannati.
42023055	Ɔci maka moong daŋkun, maka bɛɛn iki ɛkɛ te bana tolan ban Jaliilyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ati booti Yuocip ŋoyɛti ne cwakanti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔrcin ne kool baali wɛnɛy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔṭi ne ɛkɛ warɛ ḍuackiti ma jiju a ɔkiy.
42023056	Ɔci ɛkkɛn dɔɔkkin baanji, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala yɔŋi eelan a ḍuobji ɔci eelan labi ma te ñɔɔn aŋka eelan oltan Yaccu warɛti koolji. Ɔci te Oŋ Cabityɛ, ɛkkɛn wowwin ba jyek ganuun.
42024001	Ɔci te liidɔ parɛ te tinnɔ ne Oŋ Cabit noŋi bɛɛdi borayɛ, ɔci ne Oŋ Juaŋ cɔɔlniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ati kool wyeñɛti eci elin ywaŋɛ ɛkkɛn neeni.
42024002	Ɔci ɛkkɛn guonan mɔkci niin ɔntɔ te kool tukɛti.
42024003	Yeti ne ɛkkɛn kaacki jiju kooljiyɛ, ɛkkɛn war Ciɛggɔn Yaccu mɔkci bɛɛ.
42024004	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buaññi. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki poŋki te jyek naŋka neeni menyɛ, maka ‘uay bɛɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ, bala ba malɛɛkan ɔci yɔɔtcin ɛkkɛn toŋkɛnti. Bworŋin ɛkkɛn galla gallo.
42024005	Ɔci moong buañi, ɔci ɛkkɛn ñomgɛn tɔcci iñɔ ṭɛɛrji. Ɔci malɛɛkan neeniyɛ, gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ Yaccu mena tɛɛti neeni non maka tuutan wɛnni ogo?
42024006	Gɔṭṭɛ, ɛkɛ bala wɛnni moki bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te jwalla ɛkkɛ myennɛ ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali te ban Jaliilji meny.
42024007	Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, ‘‘Ya Kaci Ma Baanyɛ, ‘ya ‘wonta ma maka nɔɔtk byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci ‘ya ŋaapta ma, ɔci te ninna akti ḍoogɔyɛ, ‘ya jɔlla ñaalɔ tɛɛt moki.’ ”
42024008	Ɔci ɛkkɛn poŋjin te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni.
42024009	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yoṭṭin te kool wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn Maka A Inyaakkɛn Wilin Ne Cyɛɛlɔ neeni nɔɔtkɛ, ɔci maka pookɛn moki nɔɔtkɛ waakɛnda.
42024010	Gena Moryam Magdalin ɔci Jɔwaana ɔci Moryam mɛy Yaakubn, ɔci moonga pookɛn moonga bala iki ɛkkɛn daŋkuny. Gena ɛkkɛn Cuudan Yaccu nɔɔtkɛ te jyeka neeniy.
42024011	Yeti Cuudan Yaccu jyeti jyek ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi jyek moong neeniyɛ, a jyeka budan.
42024012	Yeti Butruc jɔŋŋin ɔci yiŋi kool wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin liercin jiju, ɔci ɛkɛ bworŋin poorki ma war Yaccu aŋka mɔŋnɛ niini pookɛn budan. Ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ ati baanji oŋo. Ɔci ɛkɛ konɛ buañi noon te waka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ neeni.
42024013	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu gɛɛg ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ooddi baan gɛɛlti bana yenti Ɛmeeyac. Ban Ɛmeeyac neeniyɛ, looncin te ban Urcaliimti ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ, ba wɔɔkan ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔɔn.
42024014	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki atki pɔɔjɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin te naŋka bɛɛn bora waakɛnda neeni.
42024015	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki gɔɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, te wɛnni Yaccu waanɛ bɛɛn oṭṭinti bala ati i ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ.
42024016	Ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ yuarcɛ ne baali atkɛ i ɛkkɛn ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn ṭuoŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ñingɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ñiyɛ bɛɛ.
42024017	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ mung ɔɔn, ɛkkɛ jyeyɛ te jyek waaka yomɔ ɔɔn?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn yɔɔni ɔci ɛkkɛn yuarnɛ Yaccu ne ɛkkɛn ñingɛn akki cungin te yom yoñy.
42024018	Ɔci men gɛɛl ɛkkɛnti ne cyɛɛlɔ mena yenti Kliyopac, ɛkɛ ṭwokcin Yaccuti agi, “Hay! I bɛɛni ban Urcaliim a wɛli aŋka naŋka bɛɛn bora neeni kwoyi i nɛ?”
42024019	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Naŋka bɛ?” Ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gena naŋki Yaccu, men ma Najarɛt mena a bɔway. Ɛkɛ bala loṭi ma ne pwadan, ɔci noŋi naŋka tɛyan. Ɛkɛ pwad pwad Juaŋti ɔci mati waakɛnda.
42024020	Yeti gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma ɔɔn maka ḍwaŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ‘woñgi ma byeŋkɛnti. Ɔci jiek olji ma Yaccu wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ doki.
42024021	Yeti ɔɔn balgɔn poŋɔn ka ‘wana neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ma Icrayiil pɔktɛ ḍɔɔggɛnti te cyɛgji maka pookɛn neeni. Ɔci gɔṭṭi moki, gena ninna akki ne ḍoogɔ te wona naŋka guagdɔn ɔɔn neeni bɛɛniy!
42024022	Ɔci moki, ɔɔn korkɔ buañi noon acaan te liid ṭɔɔl ḍiɛranyɛ, moong ma ɔɔn, gɛɛg ati kool wyeñɛti,
42024023	yeti war ɛkɛ mɔkci ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn dɔɔkkin, ɔci ɔɔn myetkɔn te jyeka neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi malɛɛkan gɛɛg waakcin lɛɛlnɛ bora ɛkkɛnti, ɔci malɛɛkan neeniyɛ, gɔki ɛkkɛnti agi Yaccu baalɔ tɛɛtɔ katan moki.
42024024	Ɔci maka balgin iki ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg ati kool wyeñɛti daŋkun, ɔci kool mɔkci konɛ budan awarɛ ba jyeka guagɛ maka moong neeni ɔɔn!”
42024025	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ a maka aamman, wyetkɔ baawo! Ba ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka guagɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan waakɛnda neeni bɛ?
42024026	Naŋka neeni yɔmjin doki acaan Kiṭɔ taabdi te waka neeni waakɛnda ɛkɛ oŋ kaatti non pwani ɛkɛ bɛɛ?”
42024027	Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn jɔɔnnɛ lwoŋnɛ jyeka guaŋŋɛ Muuca te ɛkɛy, ɔci te jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan waakɛnda, te jyeka kiiwɛ ma te jyek naŋki ɛkɛy.
42024028	Ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔɔllinti baan tɛyɛti doki, bana ottan ɛkkɛn neeni. Ɔci Yaccu noŋi ba ne ɛkɛ ooddi ‘yeetti bora ñamu ɔɔn.
42024029	Yeti ɛkkɛn bala poṭi ɛkɛ warɛ agi, “Dala ikin nintin iki ɔɔn wɛnni hay! Acaan oŋ waŋɛ noŋi luutti iñɔ doki. Noon noŋi ula.” Ɔci ɛkɛ yeddin iki ɛkkɛn doki.
42024030	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali cieki i ɛkkɛn nona amtiyɛ, ɛkɛ byentan luullɛ, ɔci gɔkcin a pwatcin Juaŋti. Ɔci ɛkɛ byentan wɛɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ mako.
42024031	Ɔci ɛkkɛn pɔŋnɛ Yaccu ñingɛnti moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ ñiyɛ moki. Yeti ne pɛñan Yaccu baaw wiin te nona ɛkkɛnti neeni.
42024032	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Wala yuarnɛ ba! Ne ɛkɛ baali gɔki ikinti yomu nona lwowwin ikin te jyek Juaŋ jitkɛnyɛ, ikin yomgɔ kuumi te yom ñɔɔn ɔci waakɔ jimma a jimi bɛɛ?”
42024033	Ɔci te oŋ waŋɛ wannati, ɛkkɛn jɔŋŋin ne pɛñan, ɔci ati dɔɔki ban Urcaliim. Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu A Inyaakkɛn Wilin Ne Cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, mɔŋji ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ iki maka pookɛn maka bala iki ɛkkɛn oŋkanday. Ɔci maka mɔŋji ɛkkɛn neeni gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi,
42024034	“Ciɛggɔn ikin jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Butructi!”
42024035	Ɔci ‘uaya ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni daŋkun maka neeni myetkɛ daŋkun te naŋka naŋɛ ɛkkɛn pɔɔjɔy, ɔci ne Yaccu ŋeeckiti ɛkkɛn ne ɛkɛ byentan wɛɛnnɛ jitiny.
42024036	Ɔci ne maka neeni balki gɔkki te jyeka neeni menyɛ, Yaccu waanɛ bɛɛn ɔci yɔɔtcin nona maka laldɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan.”
42024037	Yeti ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buañi ne tolan, ɔci bala poŋi yomgɛnti agi, “Hay! A gena bɛɛn ikinti neeniy, ɛkɛ a ‘yeeññan kaapun!”
42024038	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ korkɔ buayi noon ogo? Ɔci yomgɔ ŋoodan a ɔɔn ogo?
42024039	Gɔṭṭɛ ‘ya byeŋku ɔci gɔṭṭɛ ‘ya ciegu! Gena ‘ya waanu jiñɛ nɛ. Toptɛ ‘yati, pottɛ gɔrtɛ! ‘Yeeññan balki yoŋi ɔci owi ba ‘ya ɔŋŋi boki? A’a!”
42024040	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ma lɛɛrnɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ciegɛ.
42024041	Yeti ɛkkɛn jyeti men bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn kuumi te yom ñɔɔn ɔci bala poŋi jiek yomgɛnti men agi, “Naŋka pwadin neeniyɛ, gena ɛkɛ waanɛ neeni boki?” Ɔci Yaccu oŋ tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ balkɛ genga wɛnni amdi ‘ya boki?”
42024042	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkɛ wɛtkɛ ŋwotkɛ yeñña piɛlgɔn.
42024043	Ɔci ɛkɛ yeñi luullɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ omjin te ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti ɔɔn.
42024044	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛ A Inyaakkɛn Wilin ne Cyɛɛlɔti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ poca, ne ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛ menyɛ, ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te naŋka bɛɛn ‘yati neeni waakɛnda. ‘Ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ka jyeka kiinɛ Muuca te ‘ya worga ganuuntiyɛ, ɔci jyeka kiiwɛ bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te ‘ya, ɔci jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ‘ya worga Ɔɔlgtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn bɛya bora waakɛnda awarɛ.”
42024045	Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn pɔŋnɛ jyetkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jiek jitkɛn jyeka a kiigin neeni.
42024046	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jyeka kiigin gɔki te Kiṭɔ agi ɛkta taabdɔ ɔci tuudɔ, ɔci ne nink bɛɛdi bora ne ḍoogɔyɛ, agi ɛkta jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ te lienti moki.
42024047	Ɔci agi dala ma ooddɔ baan wardanda, ɔci ma laldi ma te yenti ɛkta agi kan ma waakɛn yali te nɔji ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ doki. Agi dala ma ooddɔ maka ban Urcaliim laldi ñamu.
42024048	Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka naŋka neeni yuarɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ma myetti te naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda neeni.
42024049	Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ, Boŋa guaŋŋɛ Wey ɔɔn agi ɛkkɛ ‘woñji ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ cuoñña ‘ya ɛkkɛti. Yeti dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te ban Urcaliimji wɛnni ne ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ te ñaalɔ pɔliji ɔɔn.”
42024050	Ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ ɛkkɛn wɛɛññɛ ne ban Bɛtani ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ byeŋkɛ loonɛ ñaalɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala naŋka pwadan bala ɛkkɛti.”
42024051	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni ɛkkɛnti a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ pɔliji oŋo.
42024052	Ɔci ɛkkɛn morcin ɛkɛti ɔci dɔɔki ban Urcaliim, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan.
42024053	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala oŋkanda on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Jwaŋa Tolan.
43001001	Te ñamu Jwali bala. Ɔci Jwali bala i Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci Jwali a Jwaŋa Tolan.
43001002	Jwalla neeni bala ñamu i Jwaŋa Tolan.
43001003	Waak cɔnnɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda. Gena ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl cɔnnɛ menga bɛɛ.
43001004	Tɛɛtin bɛɛn te ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena dɛki ma baano.
43001005	Ɔci nona miel dyɛgdɛ mena dɛki neeni acaan nona miel mena dɛki buannɛ bɛɛ.
43001006	Mena ‘uan cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan yenti Yɔhanna.
43001007	Yɔhanna bɛɛn aŋka mieti ma. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn mieti ma te mena dɛki aŋka ma waakɛnda jyeddi mena dɛkiti te jyeka myennɛ ɛkɛ may.
43001008	Yɔhanna, ɛkɛ a mena dɛki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn aŋka mieti ma te mena dɛki.
43001009	Mena dɛki ma awarɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena dɛki ma waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ bala bɛya ma baanti.
43001010	Baan warda cɔnnɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yeti ne bɛɛni ma baantiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiyi ma ka gena ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
43001011	Ɛkɛ bɛɛn iñɔ baanji ban ɛkɛ, yeti ma ɛkɛ kɛkkin te ɛkɛ.
43001012	Yeti maka buagɔn ɛkɛ ɔci jyeti ɛkɛti te yenti ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn aŋi kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan.
43001013	Ɛkkɛn jiedi ma ba jiedi ma baan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jiedi ma ba naŋki maka ‘uay bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jiennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
43001014	Ɔci Jwali aŋi mena baano, ɔci ɛkɛ ciyin iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkɛ yuarŋin ikin ɛkɛ pwanna pwanno. Ɛkɛ pwanna pwani bala ba kacca jiennɛ weegɛn nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ. Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkɛti, ɔci yom ɛkɛ gɔki awarɛ.
43001015	Yɔhanna bala mieti ma te ɛkɛ, ɔci gɔki ne pɛñan agi, “Mena neeni a mena guaŋi ‘ya ka ‘Ɛkɛ bala bɛya ‘ya ŋoyuti, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena tolan te ‘ya, acaan ne ‘ya jiennata mɛy ɔɔn men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ doki bala.’ ”
43001016	Jwaŋa Tolan yom pwani ‘uonnɛti ikinti, ɔci ikin ‘uottinti ɛkɛ moki.
43001017	Jyeka buagiti Jwaŋa Tolan agi da ma noŋdiyɛ, oonɛ Muuca. Oŋ yeti yom pwani ɔci jyeka awarɛ bɛɛn te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
43001018	Menga Jwaŋa Tolan yuarŋɛ oŋgati bɛɛ. Gena kacca jiennɛ ɛkɛ nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ mena ciyi ñoowi i Weegɛn a ñoowin, gena ɛkɛ ma nɔɔnnɛ te Weegɛn aŋka Weegɛn ŋeeckiti ma neeni.
43001019	Maka gaciicin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma Laawi cuuñɛ ma Icrayiil te ban Urcaliim, cuuñɛ ɛkkɛn Yɔhannati aŋka ɛkkɛn tootti ɛkɛti agi, “I a menɛ?”
43001020	Yɔhanna, ɛkɛ poccin menga diennɛ ñin bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi ɛkɛ agji Kiṭɔ bɛɛ.
43001021	Ɔci ma tooccin ɛkɛti gɔkcin agi, “Oŋ i ag menɛ yeti? I a Iliiya?” Ɔci Yɔhanna kɛkcin gɔkcin agi, “A’a.” Ɔci ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a Bɔwa?” Ɔci ɛkɛ kɛkcin gɔkcin agi, “A’a.”
43001022	Ɔci ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Oŋ i a menɛ? Ɔɔn myettɔn aŋka ɔɔn ooddɔn maka ɔɔn cuoñkɔn myettɔn. I gɔk i a menɛ?”
43001023	Yɔhanna gɔkcin agi, “Bala ba jwalla guaŋŋɛ Icaaya mena bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan agi, ‘‘Ya a pwan mena yaadan wɔɔŋji agi, dala pɔy Ciɛggɔn ywaŋdɛ nina a tyɛlga.’”
43001024	Maka cuuñɛ ma Yɔhannati neeniyɛ, ma gɛɛg a ma Pɛriciin.
43001025	Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin Yɔhannati ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Kan i a Kiṭɔ bɛɛ, ɔci kan i a Iliiya bɛɛ, ɔci kan i a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ, oŋ i buor ma pietin ogo?”
43001026	Ɔci Yɔhanna gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya buor ma pietin, yeti mena kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ bala yɔdgi iki ɛkkɛ,
43001027	ɛkɛ a mena bɛya ‘ya ŋoyuti. ‘Ya baal ba wɛyi ɛkɛ looda ‘ya bora bɛɛ. ‘Ya buanna ɛkɛ ñyɛrcin bɛɛ.”
43001028	Ɔci naŋka neeni naŋi ma ban Bɛtani kuocɔ Tol Urdun ŋoyɛti nona buoṭi Yɔhanna may.
43001029	Ɔci ne liidɔ Yaccu bɛɛni, ɔci ne Yɔhanna gɔrni Yaccu baali bɛɛdi ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Gɔrtɛ, Kalŋ Šɔɔlɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɛkɛ nɔji ma baan eedɛ ɔntɔ!
43001030	Mena neeni a mena guaŋi ‘ya ka ɛkɛ bala bɛya ‘ya ŋoyuti. Ɔci ɛkɛ tolcin te ‘ya, acaan ne ‘ya jiennata mɛy ɔɔn men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ doki bala.
43001031	Ɔci ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya yeti bɛɛn buor ma te pieg aŋka Yaccu ŋeettiti ma Icrayiil.”
43001032	Ɔci Yɔhanna mieti ma ɔci gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya gɔrcan Booŋ peewin te ñaalɔ bala ba boom ɔci cooccin ɛkɛti.
43001033	Ɔci ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ. Yeti mena ‘ya cuonna buor ma te piegyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka gɔkkin ‘yati agi, ‘Mena yuarca i Booŋ peedi ɛkɛti ɔci cootti ɛkɛtiyɛ, gena ɛkɛ a mena buoṭi ma te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolany.’
43001034	Ɔci ‘ya ɛkɛ yuarŋo, ɔci ‘ya ma myetkan ka mena neeni a Kaci Juaŋo.”
43001035	Ɔci ne liidɔ Yɔhanna bala yɔdi i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ne yyɛɛwɔ.
43001036	Ɔci Yaccu bala ati a woon, ɔci Yɔhanna bala gɔṭi Yaccu ne ɛkɛ ati a woony, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi, “Gɔrtɛ, Kalŋ Šɔɔlɛ Jwaŋa Tolan!”
43001037	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yɔhanna ne yyɛɛwɔ tieŋŋin jyek ɛkɛ ɔci bootcin Yaccuti.
43001038	Ɔci Yaccu warɛ yallɛ ɔci gɔrcin ŋoyɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ma yuarnɛ bala booti ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ waaka?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Rabbi, ba bana ciyi i bɛ?” (Rabbi te tuk Mabaan agi “Mena loṭi may.”)
43001039	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Bɛɛdɛ gɔrtɛ.” Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ɔci gɔrcin nona ciyi ɛkiy. Oŋ waŋɛ noŋi utti doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ɔci bala ciyi i Yaccu oŋŋa wannati.
43001040	Maka tieŋŋin jyek Yɔhanna ɔci bootcin Yaccutiyɛ, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl yenti Andarawuc. Ɛkɛ a mod Butrucn. Yenti Butruc yenta parɛ yenti Cimaan te tuk Ma Icrayiil
43001041	Andarawuc ati ɔci mod ɛkkɛn Butruc yuarŋɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kiṭɔ yuarŋɔn ɔɔn.” (Kiṭɔ te jyek Mabaan a “Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Boray”.)
43001042	Ɔci Butruc oonɛ Andarawuc mod ɛkkɛn Yaccuti. Yaccu gɔrcin ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkcin agi, “I a Cimaan kaci Yɔhanna? Ne baaṭi i barti ma a ‘Cipac’.” (Cipac ɔci Butruc ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ, te jyek Mabaan ma boṭi a ‘Poomo’.)
43001043	Ɔci ne liidɔ Yaccu buagɔn ooddi ban Jaliil. Ɔci ɛkɛ Pilibuc yuarŋɛ. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Bɛɛd, ‘ya boottaŋɔ.”
43001044	Pilibuc bɛɛn te ban Bɛtceeyida. Bana neeni a ban Andarawucn i Butrucn.
43001045	Pilibuc Nataanyal yuarŋɛ, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena kiinɛ Muuca ɔci mena kiiwɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan yuarŋɔn ɔɔn. Gena Yaccu men ma Najarɛt, kaci Yuocip.”
43001046	Ɔci Nataanyal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! Gena pwadan gɛɛl boki bɛya te ban Najarɛtti boki?” Pilibuc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Bɛɛd, gɔrca.”
43001047	Ne Yaccu Nataanyal yuartɛ baali bɛɛdi ɛkɛtiyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Gɔrtɛ, gena men ma Icrayiil waanɛ neeni. Labji bala ɛkɛ yomɛti bɛɛ.”
43001048	Nataanyal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I ‘ya ŋeeja te aŋɛ?” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Pilibuc ne borni iti men bɛɛyɛ, i yuarŋin ‘ya ŋuami ŋwayɛti doki.”
43001049	Nataanyal gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, i a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan. I a Ciɛggɔn Tolan ma Icrayiil.”
43001050	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I jyetti ‘yati te jwalla guaŋi ‘ya ka i yuarŋin ‘ya ŋuami ŋwayɛti nɛ? Naŋka neeni ḍiɛṭ ḍyɛro. Naŋka tɛyan yuara i ne baaṭi.”
43001051	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti ‘wota agi, “Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti, ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ pɔli tukɛ pɔktɛ, ɔci malɛɛkan kaatti ñaalɔ ɔci koodi iñɔ ‘ya Kaci Ma Baanti.”
43002001	Ɔci ne nink ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛki bora te oŋŋa akki ne ḍoogɔyɛ, ma ḍɛɛwwin ban Kɛna ban Jaliilji. Mɛy Yaccun bala aŋan.
43002002	Ɔci Yaccu borki ma daŋkun i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ agi bɛɛdɔ nonta ḍɛɛki may.
43002003	Ɔci ne mooy luutkin ḍaakkiti mayɛ, mɛy Yaccun gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mooy bawwin mati.”
43002004	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mɛy ɔɔn, i tooc ‘yati a ɔɔn ogo? Oŋ ‘ya bɛɛn men bɛɛ.”
43002005	Mɛy Yaccun gɔkcin ma kanŋati agi, “Gena guagdɛ ɛkɛyɛ, dala naŋdɛ.”
43002006	Kuppan pomk bala yɔdi a dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ. Kuppan neeni yuotki ma pyega lɔkki ma Icrayiil ba naŋki ɛkkɛn. (Kuppa ne cyɛɛlɔ eci capiiyan tuggɛn ne ŋaanɔ walla ne dɔɔyɔ.)
43002007	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kuppan kuomdɛ te piego.” Ɔci kuppan kuomgɛ ma te pieg lɛkɛn bawwin.
43002008	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Šyebdɛ acca, eektɛ mena gɔṭi oomdin mena tolan.” Ɔci gɛɛg eyi ma ɛkɛti.
43002009	Ɔci mena tolan neeni dɛccin piego, ɔci pieg waakɛn aagɛ aŋi mooy luutkin doki. Ɔci naŋka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ, yeti ŋeeckɔn gena maka ṭyepi piego. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ borcin mena ḍɛñi ɛɛŋtiy,
43002010	ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Oŋkanda ma pyega milin eektan ma ñamu aŋka maattan ma ñamu, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn korkɛn yoŋtiyɛ, ɔci pyega polan ootan ma moki. Yeti i pyega milin dolniyɔ ŋoyɔ aŋka maattan ma ne ŋoyɔ ogo?”
43002011	Naŋka tɛyan naŋka juannɛ Yaccu ñamu naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛyɛ, gena akta ɛkɛ pieg aaŋŋɛyɔ akki mooy luutkin ban Kɛna ban Jaliiljiy. Ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ jyeti ɛkɛti.
43002012	Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baaniyɛ, Yaccu ati ban Kapɛrnyam. Ɛkɛ ati iki mɛɛgɛn ɔci modgɛn ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ciyi aŋan lakun.
43002013	Ɔci oŋ iid ma Icrayiil cɔɔllin doki. Iid neeni gena Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋo. Ɔci Yaccu ati ban Urcaliim.
43002014	Ɔci maka wɛɛṭi dok ɔci kulin ɔci boobg yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ kañ on Juaŋ ona Tolanti, ɔci maka ḍoṭi girin bala ciyi tarabɛɛcan ɛkkɛnti on Juaŋ ona tolan daŋkun.
43002015	Ɔci Yaccu wyeng naŋŋɛ ba woonti ɔɔn, ɔci maka neeni ŋualnɛ ɛkɛ bora te kañ on Juaŋ ona Tolanti. Ɔci dok ɔci kulin, ɛkkɛn ŋualnɛ bora Yaccu waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkɛ tarabɛɛcan ḍorki ma girin neeniyɛ, jitkɛn baamnɛ iñɔ.
43002016	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka wɛɛṭi boobgti agi, “Waka neeni eedɛ bora. Naa ɛkkɛ kañ on Wey ɔɔn naŋdɛ a ona wɛɛrki ma waak bɛɛ!”
43002017	Maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ñingɛn ñieki te jyeka kiigin agi, “‘Ya waru byerŋa byerŋ te kanŋa On i.”
43002018	Ɔci ma Icrayiil ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Naŋka neeni bɛɛn te aŋɛ? Ɔɔn myettɔn aŋka ɔɔn yomgɔ ñiektɔn naŋka neeni bɛɛn te iti, walla bɛɛn te mengati.”
43002019	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ ona neeni laagdiyɔ ɔci ne ninka ne ḍoogɔ baatiyɛ, ‘ya on ywaŋdiyɔ.”
43002020	Ɔci ma Icrayiil gɔkcin agi, “Hay! Ona neeni ma cɔti yuong a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ (46), ɔci i on ywaŋayɔ lakun nink ne ḍoogɔ doki?”
43002021	Yeti ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ona guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ wannayɛ, a on waanɛ bɛɛ gena war ɛkɛ guaŋŋɛ a on wanna.
43002022	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ jɔlni ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiyɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu ñingɛn ñieki te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeti jyeka kiigin ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni.
43002023	Ɔci Yaccu bala ban Urcaliim iidti, ɔci iid neeni ma gɔṭi Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi a Gorŋo. Ɔci maka coŋin ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka tɛyan naŋŋɛ Yaccu, naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti ɛkɛti.
43002024	Yeti Yaccu yomɛ ḍuannɛti ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ, acaan yomg ma baan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ doki waakɛnda.
43002025	Ɔci Yaccu buagɔn menga ɛkɛ myettɛ te naŋki ma baan bɛɛ, acaan yomg ma baan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ doki.
43003001	’Wan ma Pɛriciin bala yenti Nikɔdiimac. Ɛkɛ a mena tolan ban ma Icrayiil.
43003002	’Wana neeni bɛɛn Yaccuti te weenji ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi ma, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn i a mena loṭi ma, ɔci i bɛɛni te ñaalɔ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Kan Jwaŋa Tolan baaw mentiyɛ, menga yaakinti ba naŋka naŋŋi i ñyecki ma i neeni bɛɛ.”
43003003	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti, maka jiettan ma oŋkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan yuartan bɛɛ.”
43003004	Nikɔdiimac gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ma jiettan ma a ɔki ne aŋi donk doki ɔɔn? Wɔtti mɛyyɛn korkɛnti moki aŋka jiettan mɛyyɛn oŋɔ?”
43003005	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti, kan mena jiettan ma te pieg bɛɛyɛ, ɔci jiettan ma te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti ooddi non cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
43003006	Mena jiettan mayɛ, ɛkɛ a men baano, yeti mena jieddɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a naŋki Boŋ Juaŋo.
43003007	Naa i podi te jwalla guaŋi ‘ya ka i jietti ma oŋki ne yyɛɛwɔ wanna bɛɛ.
43003008	Jwami yooŋdi nona ɛkɛ buagi, ɔci i tieŋja gena joon ɛkɛ budan, yeti nona bɛɛnɛ ɛkɛ ŋeej i bɛɛ, ɔci nona ooddi ɛkɛ moki kwoy i. Jyeka neeni bala ba jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɛkɛ kanŋan a ɔɔn daŋkun maka jyeti Juaŋti waakɛnda.”
43003009	Nikɔdiimac gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Naŋka neeni bala a ɔki yeti?”
43003010	Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “I a mena loṭi ma Icrayiil ɔci i dɔki jyeka neeni kwoy i?
43003011	Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti awarɛ, ɔɔn gɔkɔn te jyeka ŋeejɔn ɔɔn, ɔci ɔɔn ma myettɔn te waka yuarŋɔn ɔɔn. Yeti ɛkkɛ yookɛ te jyeka mietɔn ɔɔn neeni.
43003012	Kan ɛkkɛ myettin te waka ṭɛɛrji iñɔ ɔci ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ bɛɛy, oŋ kan ɛkkɛ myettin te waka ñaalɔ pɔliji ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ a ɔki?
43003013	Men gɛɛl kaaccin te ñamu pɔliji bɛɛ. Gena mena kooyin te ñaalɔ pɔliji parɛ. Gena ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ‘ya aŋka kaacca ñaalɔ pɔlijiy.
43003014	“Ɔci ba naŋka naŋŋɛ Muuca te baaṭiyɛ, ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ŋaapta ma ñaalɔ ba kaŋa ŋaamnɛ Muuca ñaalɔ wɔɔŋji
43003015	aŋka maka jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkkɛn baltan tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy.
43003016	“Jwaŋa Tolan ani ma baan waakɛnda ne pɛñan. Kacca jiennɛ ɛkɛ nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ ‘wonnɛ mako, aŋka maka jyeddi ɛkɛti tuwa oŋgati moki bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn tɛɛtti yuonginda.
43003017	Kaci cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan noŋi ywobji mati bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn iñɔ aŋka ma yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ.
43003018	“Mena jyeddi ɛkɛtiyɛ, ywobji bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ, yeti mena jyeddi ɛkɛti bɛɛyɛ, ywobji bala ɛkɛti doki, acaan ɛkɛ jyeti yenti Kacca jiennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni bɛɛ.
43003019	Ywobji bɛɛn mati acaan mena dɛki bɛɛn iñɔ baanji, yeti ma ani ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Ma ani nona miel acaan naŋki ɛkkɛn a nɔjjo.
43003020	Maka noŋi nɔji neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn nona dɛki bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛya nona dɛkiti bɛɛ acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn nɔji ɛkkɛn lɛɛltan bora bɛɛ.
43003021	Yeti mena noŋi naŋka awarɛyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka bɛya nona dɛkiti aŋka ma gɔrti naŋki ɛkɛ a naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan.”
43003022	Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baaniyɛ, Yaccu ati ban Yahuudiya iki maka laldɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ciyi aŋan i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala buoṭi ma pietin.
43003023	Ɔci Yɔhanna daŋkun bala buoṭi ma pietin ban Enɔn. Ban Enɔn neeni cualcinti ban Celimti. Ɔci pieg bala coŋɔ aŋan. Ɔci ma bɛɛn Yɔhannati ɔci ɛkkɛn buulnɛ ɛkɛ pietin.
43003024	(Yɔhanna olji ma ciginji men bɛɛ.)
43003025	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yɔhanna i mena parɛ men ma Icrayiil, ɛkkɛn bala toyi yɔtin te jyek lɔɔŋ ba ganuun ma Icrayiil.
43003026	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn Yɔhannati ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “mena loṭi may, mena balgi iki i Tol Urdun ŋoyɛti, mena i ma myenni te ɛkɛ wannayɛ, ɛkɛ bala buoṭi ma daŋkun, ɔci ma waakɛnda bala ooddi ɛkɛti.”
43003027	Ɔci Yɔhanna gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Menga balki genga iñɔ wɛnni bɛɛ. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ ma ‘wonnɛ waaky.
43003028	Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek ‘ya doki ka ‘ya a Kiṭɔ bɛɛ. ‘Ya yeti cuonna Jwaŋa Tolan ñamu ne Yaccu men baawiy.
43003029	Mena ḍɛñi ɛɛŋyɛ, gena ɛkɛ balki ñooniy. Yeti mug ɛkkɛn bala bora, ɔci ne ɛkɛ tieŋdi pwan mug ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya daŋkun yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan.
43003030	Dala Yaccu tola, ɔci dala ‘ya aŋka ḍyɛrdo.”
43003031	“Mena bɛya te ñaalɔyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te ma waakɛnda. Maka bɛya te iñɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka a maka iñɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki te jyek maka iñɔ. Mena bɛya te pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te ma waakɛnda.
43003032	Ɔci ɛkɛ mieti ma te waka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ ɔci te jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkɛ. Yeti menga jyeti jyeka ma myennɛ ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
43003033	Yeti kan mena jyeddi jyek ɛkɛtiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ jyek Jwaŋa Tolan a jyeka awarɛ.
43003034	Mena cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ jyek Jwaŋa Tolan daldɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki ɛkkɛn oŋkanda ɔɔn, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ‘woñi ɛkɛ te Booŋ pɔɔdɛ a pɔɔd bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ‘woñi oŋkanda ɔɔn.
43003035	Weegɛn ani Kaci ɛkɛ ɔci waak waakɛnda ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.
43003036	Kan mena jyeddi Kacitiyɛ, ɛkɛ ciyi uda yuonginda ɔɔn. Yeti kan mena yookɔn warɛ te jyeni Kacitiyɛ, tɛɛtin bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Loñk Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka bala ɛkɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn.”
43004001	Ma Pɛriciin tieŋŋin agi maka buulda Yaccu coŋgɔ te maka buulda Yɔhannay.
43004002	(Yeti gena Yaccu buoṭi ma neeni bɛɛ. Gena maka laldɛ ɛkɛ aŋka buoṭi ma neeni.)
43004003	Ɔci ne Yaccu tieŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ uunnɛ te ban Yahuudiya ɔci ati dɔɔki ban Jaliil.
43004004	Ɔci ban Camɛɛrya bala yomɔ.
43004005	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnni ban Camɛɛryayɛ, ɛkɛ ɔŋi baan gɛɛl bala aŋan yenti Caykar. Ɔci bana neeni cualcinti te non Yaakub nona ‘wonnɛ kaci ɛkɛ Yuocip.
43004006	Ɔci jin Yaakub bala aŋan. Ɔci Yaccu taabbin te woon ɔci cooccin jiin ḍwaŋɛti. Oŋ waŋɛ bala yɔɔd yeccu.
43004007	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu ati baanji wɛɛṭi oomdin. Ɔci ɛŋ ma Camɛɛrya bɛɛn ṭyepi pieg jiidɔ. Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Šyepta pieg ‘ya motca.”
43004009	Ɔci ɛŋ ma Camɛɛrya gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “I a men ma Icrayiil ɔci ‘ya a ɛŋ ma Camɛɛrya, ɔci i tooc ‘ya te pieg ogo? Ma Icrayiil yookɔn te ma Camɛɛrya.”
43004010	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I te waka ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ma te ŋeeji i, ɔci moki te mena gɔkkin iti agi, ‘Šyepta pieg ‘ya motca,’ neeni te ŋeeji iyɛ, te toonni ɛkɛti doki, ɔci i te ‘wonni ɛkɛ pyega utki may.”
43004011	Ɛɛŋ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, gena ṭyepi i pieg baaw iti, ɔci jiin bey beyo. Ɔci i ecca pyega utki ma neeni te aŋɛ?
43004012	I tol te yɔr ɔɔn Yaakub, mena ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn jiinɔ? Ɛkɛ moti pyega neeni i kɛɛgin ɛkɛ i dok ɛkɛ.”
43004013	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Maka moti pyega neeniyɛ, amdɛ yiɛn moki.
43004014	Yeti kan mena motti pyega ‘woñga ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ amdɛ yiɛn oŋgati moki bɛɛ. Pyega ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkɛyɛ, da pookɛn. Ɛkkɛn bala ba jiin ne yiŋi ywaggi a ywaggin oŋkanday.”
43004015	Ɛɛŋ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ‘ya ‘wonda pyega wanna aŋka ‘ya amda yiɛn moki bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya bɛɛd ṭyebba oŋgati moki bɛɛ!”
43004016	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ootta ‘war i borka, ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ wɛnni.”
43004017	Ɛɛŋ kɛkcin gɔkcin agi, “‘War ‘ya baawo.” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Jyek i awarɛ, ‘war i baawo.
43004018	Te baaṭi, ‘uay i bala ne dɔɔyɔ, ɔci ‘wana bala iti acca neeni a ‘war i bɛɛ. Jyeka guaŋŋi i neeniyɛ, a jyeka awarɛ.”
43004019	Ɛɛŋ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, i a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan hay!
43004020	Yɔrg ɔɔn ma Camɛɛrya nona morki ɛkkɛn bala poma neeniti. Yeti ɛkkɛ ma Icrayiil gɔkɛ agi nona morci ma Juaŋ baalɔ ban Urcaliim.”
43004021	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛŋo, dala i jyedda ‘yati. Oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔ ɛkkɛ mortɛ Weegɛnti wɛnni moki bɛɛ, ɔci walla ma morti Weegɛnti ban Urcaliim moki bɛɛ.
43004022	Ɛkkɛ ma Camɛɛrya balgɛ moṭɛ mena kwoyɛ ɛkkɛti. Yeti ɔɔn ma Icrayiil balgɔn moṭɔn mena ŋeejɔn ɔɔn. Jyek yɔɔt bɛɛn te ma Icrayiil.
43004023	Oŋŋa ma morti Weegɛnti te yomgɛn bala bɛya ɔci bala acca doki. Ɔci maka moṭi ɛkɛti a ɔɔnyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn ɛkkɛn. Jwaŋa Tolan a Booŋo, ɔci maka morti ɛkɛti te war tɛɛn Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛyɛ, moṭi ɛkɛti te yoma awarɛ.”
43004025	Ɛɛŋ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Çeej ‘ya Kiṭɔ bala bɛya. (Ɛkɛ a mena bartan ma a ‘Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Bora’). Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɔɔn myettɔn ɛkɛ te waak waakɛnda.”
43004026	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gena ‘ya a mena gɔwwi iki i neeni, ‘ya a ɛkɛ.”
43004027	Ne Yaccu balki gɔɔki i ɛɛŋ menyɛ, maka laldɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn korkɛn buayi ne Yaccu balki gɔɔki iki ɛɛŋy. Yeti menga tooccin Yaccuti agi, ‘I buagi gena?’ Walla agi, ‘I gɔwwi iki ɛɛŋ te gena bɛɛ?’ Ɛkkɛn tooccin a ɔɔn bɛɛ.
43004028	Ɔci ɛɛŋ ḍwan dolnɛyɔ jiin ḍwaŋɛti, ɔci yiŋi baanji ɔci ma myennɛ agi,
43004029	“Bɛɛdɛ, gɔrtɛ ‘wana ‘ya myenna te naŋka naŋi ‘ya waakɛnday. ‘Wana neeni a Kiṭɔ bɛɛ?”
43004030	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati te baanji ɔci ati ne Yaccuti.
43004031	Ɔci ne ma Camɛɛrya bɛɛki Yaccuti men bɛɛyɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, omja.”
43004032	Yeti ɛkɛ ṭwokcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ama kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ bala ‘yati.”
43004033	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu bala toyi yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Men gɛɛl ɛkɛ eeŋnɛ amɔ?”
43004034	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya noŋ ba naŋka ṭagdɛ mena ‘ya cuonna, ɔci ‘ya kanŋa ɛkɛ cwamdo. Naŋka neeni a am ‘ya.
43004035	Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi, ‘Ne ponka ne ŋaanɔ baatiyɛ, ma ɛṭi poko.’ Yeti ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, gɔrtɛ ñaalɔ, yelk jitin pok ɛɛwin doki, buagɔn ‘yɛrŋo.
43004036	Mena ɛṭi pokyɛ, ɛṭi budan bɛɛ. Pok bala ɛkɛti te kanŋa ɛkɛ. Ɔci ba jyek mena ɛṭi neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek mena mieti ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ mieti ma budan bɛɛ. Ma jyeddi ɔci ɛkkɛn ciyi yuonginda. Mena dwoki ɔci mena ɛṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔya a cyɛɛlɔ yaakkɛn.
43004037	Jwalla guaktan ma a jwalla awarɛ agi, ‘Mena ne cyɛɛlɔ dwoki ɔci mena parɛ ɛṭi.’
43004038	Ɛkkɛ cuuññin ‘ya aŋka ɛkkɛ ɛṭɛ waka kannɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛy. Gena maka pookɛn noŋi kanŋay, ɔci waak bala ɛkkɛti te kanŋa ɛkkɛn.”
43004039	Ma Camɛɛrya, maka ciyi ban Caykaryɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti Yaccuti ne coŋɔn te jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛɛŋ ɛkkɛnti ne ɛkɛ ma myennɛ agi, “‘Ya myenna ɛkɛ te naŋka naŋi ‘ya waakɛnday.”
43004040	Ɔci ne ma Camɛɛrya bɛɛki Yaccutiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala poṭi ɛkɛ warɛ gɔki agi, “Dala i yadi wɛnni cietin iki ɔɔn.” Ɔci ba jwalla guagɛ ɛkkɛn agi ɛkta yeddɔ ban ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yeddin ba nink ne yyɛɛwɔ.
43004041	Ɔci maka pookɛn, maka coŋin daŋkun jyeti Yaccuti te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccuy.
43004042	Ɔci ma gɔkcin ɛɛŋti agi, “Acca ɔɔn jyettɔn ɛkɛti te jyek i paru bɛɛ. Ɔɔn tieŋnɔn te jyetk ɔɔn pookɔ, ɔci ŋeejɔn ɔɔn mena neeni a Mena Yuoci ma baan warda awarɛ.”
43004043	Ne nink ne yyɛɛwɔ baakiyɛ, ɛkɛ bana neeni dalnɛ ati ban Jaliil.
43004044	Acaan Yaccu gɔkcin mati agi, “Kan mena a bɔwa bala ban ma ɛkkɛnyɛ, maka ban ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ɛkɛ tolcin bɛɛ.”
43004045	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnni ban Jaliiljiyɛ, ma Jaliil yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔn acaan naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu yuarɛ ɛkkɛn ban Urcaliim te oŋ Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋy, acaan ɛkkɛn ati iidti ban Urcaliim daŋkun.
43004046	Ɔci Yaccu dɔɔki ban Kɛna ban Jaliilji moki, bana Yaccu pieg aaŋŋɛyɔ akki mooy luutkiny. Ɔci ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ ḍuaŋa tolanyɛ, kaci ɛkɛ kacca ‘uan warɛ yaayɛ ban Kapɛrnyam.
43004047	Ɔci ne weegɛn tieŋni Yaccu bɛɛni te ban Yahuudiya bɛɛni atti Jaliiljiyɛ, ɛkɛ ati Yaccuti, ɔci bala poṭi Yaccu warɛ aŋka Yaccu bɛya ban ɛkkɛn aŋka dala kaci ɛkɛ warɛ pwada, acaan kaci amɛ lieno.
43004048	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ naŋki ‘ya naŋka tɛyan ɔci naŋka ñyecki ma ‘ya yuardɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ‘yati boki?”
43004049	Ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, bɛɛdi, kaci ‘ya dita tuwa.”
43004050	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɔgdi ootta, gɔrca kaci i mɔkca uda.” Ɔci ‘uan jyeti jwalla guaŋŋɛ Yaccu, ɔci atti.
43004051	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali yomɔyɛ, maka kanŋan ɛkɛti gɛɛg kookcin ɛkɛti yomɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ myetkɛ ma agi, “Kaci i warɛ pwanni.”
43004052	Ɛkɛ tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkɛ warɛ pwani ne oŋ waŋɛ bala a ɔki?” Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Tɛɛnɔ ne oŋ waŋɛ warɛ yallɛ ne ḍyɛṭ ṭɔɔlɛ ɛkɛ warɛ luun doki.”
43004053	Ɔci ŋeejɛ weegɛn oŋ waŋa gɔkki ma ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, bala ba oŋ waŋa gɔŋni Yaccu ɛkɛti agi, “Ɔgdi ootta Kaci i mɔkca uda.” Ɔci ɛkɛ jyeti Yaccuti, ɔci maka on ɛkɛ moki jyeti Yaccuti waakɛnda.
43004054	Ɔci ne Yaccu kaci pɔŋniyɔ te waja neeniyɛ, ɔci naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ aŋi ne yyɛɛwɔ. Naŋka tɛyan neeni naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ban Jaliilji ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni te ban Yahuudiyay.
43005001	Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baakiyɛ, ɔci iid ma Icrayiil bala, ɔci Yaccu ati Urcaliimji.
43005002	Ɔci puol bala Urcaliimji Kaañ Tukɛ Kulin taaŋɛti. (Yenti puol te tuk ma Icrayiil ma boṭi a Bɛtcatta.) Ɔci doŋki bala ne dɔɔyɔ puol taaŋɛti.
43005003	Maka waakɛn yeyin bala niin doŋki jitin a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Maka neeni a maka ñingɛn ulan ɔci maka ŋɔṭo, ɔci maka bɔggɛn iwan ɔci maka omgɛn iwan. [Ɛkkɛn bala kɛɛy ne pieg kotti ñaalɔ ba oŋkanday.
43005004	Acaan a oŋki malɛɛka Juaŋ ooddi iñɔ puolji, ɔci pieg ṭuudiji. Mena warɛ yaayan mena jɔɔtti kaatti a wyeñ puolji ne pieg ṭuudiji malɛɛkayɛ, ɛkɛ doki nina te waja bala ɛkɛtiy.]
43005005	Ɔci mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala toonnɛ iñɔ warɛ. Yuong ɛkɛ yuonga woociyɛ, a men baan mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ (38).
43005006	Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔrni ɛkɛ baali niini iñɔ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ŋeejɛ Yaccu ‘wana neeni warɛ yaayɛ te baaṭi doki, ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I buagi waru pwada?”
43005007	Mena warɛ yaayan gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ne pyega ma waakɛn pwatti kotti ñaalɔyɛ, menga bala ‘ya olda pietin aŋka ‘ya waru pwaddɛ bɛɛ. Ne ‘ya buaga ka ‘ya ɔgdiyɛ, mena parɛ bala ñamu doki pietin.”
43005008	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ aaran lula ɔgdi ootta baanji.”
43005009	Ɔci ‘uan warɛ pwani ne pɛñan, kwaccin bɛɛ. Ɔci aaran luullɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ati parɛ, ati a woono. Ɔci oŋŋa wanna a Oŋ Cabit.
43005010	Ɔci ma Icrayiil maka ḍwaŋin gɔkcin mena warɛ pwaniti agi, “Oŋŋa neeni a Oŋ Cabit, ɔci kan i aaran eedi te oŋŋa neeniyɛ, i jyek ganuun bɛɛññiji.”
43005011	Yeti ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Mena ‘ya waru pwanni neeniyɛ, gɔkkin ‘yati agi ‘ya aaran luljɔ ɔgji ootcɔ baanji.”
43005012	Ɔci ma tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “A menɛ gɔkkin iti agi i aaran lulji ɔgji ootci baanjiy?”
43005013	Mena warɛ pwani neeniyɛ, mena ɛkɛ pɔŋnɛ te waja neeniyɛ, kwoyi ɛkɛ acaan Yaccu warɛ uunnɛ ɔntɔ nona parɛti acaan poli ma polla tolan bala.
43005014	Ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ Yaccu on Juaŋ ona tolan. Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Gɔrca, i waru pwanni. Naa i moki noŋja naŋka yaayan bɛɛ. Pɛñña bɛya iti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, bɛya a pɛñña ne yaayan iti.”
43005015	’Uan ati dɔɔki ma Icrayiilti, ɔci ɛkkɛn myennɛ agi, “Gena Yaccu ‘ya ywaŋŋay.”
43005016	Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma Icrayiil bala noŋi ywobji Yaccuti acaan Yaccu men ywaŋŋɛ te Oŋ Cabit.
43005017	Yeti Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Wey ɔɔn bala kanŋan men, ɔci ‘ya daŋkun baal kanŋ men.”
43005018	Ɔci ma Icrayiil ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn Yaccu noktan a jitkɛn bɛɛ, acaan gena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ Oŋ Cabit jyɛnnɛji parɛ neeni bɛɛ, naŋka parɛ bala moki, acaan ɛkɛ boṭi Jwaŋa Tolan agi Weegɛn, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ba ɛkɛ yoomki i Jwaŋa Tolan no.
43005019	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka guagdi ‘ya ɛkkɛti a jyeka awarɛ neeni, ‘ya Kaci yaakati noŋ genga paru budan bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔr ba waka naŋdɛ Wey ɔɔn, ɔci ‘ya noŋja daŋkun.
43005020	Acaan Wey ɔɔn ani Kacco, ɔci ‘ya Kaci lɛɛrta te naŋki ɛkɛ waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ Kaci lɛɛrtɛ te naŋka pookɛn daŋkun. Ɔci naŋka ŋoyɔ neeni tɛɛcin te naŋka ñamu, ɔci ɛkkɛ poddɛ.
43005021	Ɔci bala ba Wey ɔɔn ne ma luoldɛ ñaalɔyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin, ɔci ‘ya Kaci daŋkun kan ‘ya buagayɛ, ‘ya ma ‘woñga tɛɛtin ba yom ‘ya.
43005022	Wey ɔɔn noŋdi godan ma bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni waakɛndayɛ, ‘wonna ‘ya Kaci ɛkɛ,
43005023	aŋka ma waakɛnda ani ‘ya Kaci ba ɛkkɛn anki Wey ɔɔn daŋkun ɔɔn. Kan mena ani ‘ya Kaci bɛɛyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ani Wey ɔɔn daŋkun bɛɛ. Mena neeniyɛ, a mena ‘ya cuonnay.
43005024	“Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka guagdi ‘ya ɛkkɛti a jyeka awarɛ neeni, mena tieŋdi jyek ‘ya ɔci jyeddi mena ‘ya cuonnatiyɛ, ɛkɛ ciya yuonginda. Ɔci jyek ywobji bɛya ɛkɛti te oŋ godan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a mena tuwa moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ aŋi mena tɛɛti doki.
43005025	Awarɛ, oŋ bala bɛya, ɔci bala acca doki, gena oŋŋa maka tuun tieŋti pwan ‘ya Kaci Jwaŋa Tolany, ɔci maka tieŋdiyɛ, ɛkkɛn uda.
43005026	Acaan ba Wey ɔɔn ne tɛɛti parɛ te tɛɛtin ɛkɛyɛ, ɔci Wey ɔɔn gɔkkin ‘ya Kaciti, ɔci ‘ya Kaci moki tɛɛt ba tɛɛtin Wey ɔɔn.
43005027	Ɔci Wey ɔɔn ‘ya Kaci ‘wonna jwali aŋka ‘ya noŋja godan acaan ‘ya a Kaci Ma Baano.
43005028	Naa ɛkkɛ poddɛ te jyeka neeni bɛɛ, acaan ne baaṭi ma waakɛnda maka bala kolk jitin tieŋdi pwan ‘ya,
43005029	ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tieŋti pwan ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn jɔldi ñaalɔ waakɛnda. Ɔci maka naŋki ɛkkɛn pwadinyɛ, ɛkkɛn jɔldi ɔci ciyi tɛɛti moki ɔɔn. Ɔci kan maka naŋki ɛkkɛn yeyinyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn jɔŋti ñaalɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍakti ba jyek godan ɛkkɛn.
43005030	“‘Ya yaakati noŋ genga te yom ‘ya paru budan bɛɛ. ‘Ya tieŋŋa jiek te ñamu ɔci ‘ya gɔkka, ɔci jyeka guagdi ‘ya a jyeka awarɛ, acaan ‘ya buaga noŋ ba naŋki ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga noŋ ba naŋki Wey ɔɔn mena ‘ya cuonnay.
43005031	“Kan ‘ya miet ma te jyek war ‘ya paruyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin mati bɛɛ.
43005032	Yeti gena Mena parɛ mieti ma te war ‘yay, ɔci ŋeej ‘ya jyek ɛkɛ a jyeka awarɛ.
43005033	“Ɛkkɛ ma cuuññɛ Yɔhannati doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ myennɛ ɛkɛ te jyeka awarɛ.
43005034	Yeti ‘ya buaga men baan gɛɛl gɔkti ma myettɛ te ‘ya bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti te jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔdin.
43005035	Yɔhanna ne ɛkɛ baali ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba dyɛka ne dɛki a dyɛŋiy, ɔci ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔyɔ ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ te dyɛŋi ɛkɛ dyɛŋŋa wanna.
43005036	“‘Ya balka genga, ɛkɛ mieti ma te ‘ya ne pwadan, miti Yɔhanna buannɛ kanŋa ‘ya ‘wonnata Wey ɔɔn aŋka cwamdi ‘yay, kanŋa neeni ma myettɛ ‘ya cuonna Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci jyek myetkin neeni aŋka pwatcin te jyek Yɔhanna.
43005037	Ɔci Wey ɔɔn mena ‘ya cuonna ɛkɛ ma myennɛ te jyek ‘ya daŋkun. Pwan ɛkɛ tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ oŋgati bɛɛ, ɔci war ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ oŋgati bɛɛ.
43005038	Ɔci jyek ɛkɛ bala niin ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ tiekɛ jyek mena ɛkɛ cuonnɛ.
43005039	Ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ jiek te worgaji acaan ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeniyɛ, yuardɛ ɛkkɛ worgaji. Jyeka lildɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, gena jyeka mietki ma a jyek ‘yay.
43005040	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ yookɛ waakɔ te bɛɛn ‘yati, oŋ ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ‘ya tɛɛtin a ɔki?
43005041	“Pwani ‘ya bɛya te ma baan tuggɛn budan bɛɛ.
43005042	Yeti ŋeej ‘ya yomg ɛkkɛ ani Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
43005043	’Ya bɛɛn te yenti Wey ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati bɛɛ. Kan mena parɛ bɛya te yenti ɛkɛ budanyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ gena ɛkɛti.
43005044	Ɛkkɛ yaakɛti jyeddɛ a ɔki ne ɛkkɛ buagɛ jieyɛ maka pookɛn, ɔci maka pookɛn jieyi ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ buagɛ jieyɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ?
43005045	“Naa ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ɛkkɛ tiagdinyɔ ‘ya Wey ɔɔnti bɛɛ. Mena ɛkkɛ tiagdɛ bala. Gena Muuca mena ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ɛkɛtiy.
43005046	Ɛkkɛ te jyettɛ Muucati awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ te jyettɛ ‘yati daŋkun, acaan jyeka kiinɛ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, kiinɛ ɛkɛ gena jyek ‘ya.
43005047	Yeti kan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka kiinɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛyɛ, oŋ ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ jyek ‘ya a ɔki?”
43006001	Ne naŋka neeni baakiyɛ, Yaccu Galŋ Jaliil jyɛnnɛji, (ɔci galŋ yenta parɛ moki yenti Taybiiryac).
43006002	Ɔci polla tolan boottin ɛkɛti acaan ɛkkɛn gɔrcin Yaccu bala noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali yɔŋi maka waakɛn yeyiny.
43006003	Ɔci Yaccu kaaccin ñaalɔ poomti, ɔci cooccin iñɔ aŋan i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ.
43006004	Ɔci iid ma Icrayiil Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ cɔɔllin doki.
43006005	Ɔci ne Yaccu ñorni polla tolan balki bɛɛti ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Pilibucti agi, “Ikin wɛrtin oomdin aŋɛ aŋka amtan maka coŋin neeniy?”
43006006	Ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ poci Pilibuc a poccin acaan buagɔn gɔrti yom Pilibuc. Gena naŋdɛ Yaccu ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ doki.
43006007	Pilibuc gɔkcin agi, “Byedga amtan maka neeni eedi bilk kanŋa mena ne cyɛɛlɔ ponk ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ, ɔci byedga neeni yɔmdi bɛɛ. Ma dɛtti waakɛnda bɛɛ.”
43006008	Mod Butrucn bala, yenti Andarawuc. Ɛkɛ a mena bala maka laldɛ Yaccuti daŋkun, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Yaccuti agi,
43006009	“Kacca ‘uan gɛɛl bala wɛnni balki byedg ṭɔlgɛn ne dɔɔyɔ, (byedga naŋi ma te poka bartan ma a cayiiray). Ɔci yak ṭɔlgɛnn a ‘yɛggin ne yyɛɛwɔ daŋkun. Yeti waka neeni yɔmdi te maka coŋin neeni bɛɛ.”
43006010	Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Gɔktɛ mati, dala ma cootti iñɔ.” Ɔci nona neeni luom bala coŋɔ. Ɔci maka ‘uay cooccin iñɔ coŋgin a coŋgin ba a alpn ne dɔɔyɔ (5,000).
43006011	Ɔci Yaccu byedg luullɛ ɔci gɔkcin Juaŋti agi, “Pwatcin.” Ɔci ɛkɛ byedg wɛɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci ‘wonnɛ maka ciyi iñɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ ma wɛɛnnɛ yaka ‘yɛggin daŋkun ba yomg ɛkkɛn buagɔn.
43006012	Ne ma korkɛn yooŋkiyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Waka tɛɛti limdiyɔ aŋka naa waak ḍakti bɛɛ.”
43006013	Ɔci oomdin ɛkkɛn tiɛtki neeniyɛ, limiyɔ ma ɔdin kumgin a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ te waka tɛɛti te byedga ne dɔɔyɔ neeni.
43006014	Ne ma gɔrki naŋka tɛyan naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu a naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkcin agi, “Awarɛ, mena neeni a mena guaktan ma a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan bala bɛya ṭɛɛrjiy.”
43006015	Ne Yaccu gɔrni ma noŋki ɛkɛ muktitiyɛ, ɛkɛ ma dalliyɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ ati dɔɔki poomti parɛ. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn Yaccu muktan naŋtan a ḍuaŋa tolan ɛkkɛn.
43006016	Ne oŋ unniyɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu kaaccin iñɔ galŋji,
43006017	ɔci taapcin murkaji, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ooddi ban Kapɛrnyam. Ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ noon uli doki, ɔci Yaccu bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti men bɛɛ, baaw men.
43006018	Ɔci pɔɔgi galŋ bɛɛn ñaalɔ te jwamma tolan.
43006019	Ɔci ma bala gɔɔbi piego, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘uoccin ñamu bala ba wɔɔkan ne ŋaanɔ, ɔci Yaccu yuarcɛ ɛkkɛn bala bɛya ñaalɔ pieg wyetkɛnti, bɛya ne cwakanti murkati. Ɔci ɛkkɛn buayi ne tolan.
43006020	Yeti Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ, gena ‘ya!”
43006021	Ɔci Yaccu kaacci ɛkkɛn jiju murkaji te yoma ñɔyan, ɔci ne pɛñan murka dɛñjin kwoña ottan ɛkkɛn doki.
43006022	Ɔci te liidɔ parɛ ne polla tolan maka bala yɔdi galŋ kwoña waayiti gɔrkiyɛ, ŋeeckɔn ɛkkɛn murka parɛ gɛɛl bala bɛɛ, baawo. Murka nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ kaacki maka laldɛ Yaccuy. Çeeckɔn maka yeddin neeni maka laldɛ Yaccu ati pookɛn, Yaccu baaw ɛkkɛnti.
43006023	Ɔci ne baaṭi murkan pookɛn bɛɛn te ban Taybiiryac, bɛɛn ne cwakanti nona Yaccu gɔŋni agi, “Pwatcin,” nona omki poli ma polla tolan oomdiny.
43006024	Ne maka coŋin neeni gɔrki Yaccu baawi, ɔci maka laldɛ ɛkɛ baakiyɛ, ɛkkɛn kaaccin murkan jitin ati Kapɛrnyam lieṭi Yaccu.
43006025	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn Yaccu yuarkiti galŋ kwoña parɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, i bɛɛni wɛnni te tua?”
43006026	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Awarɛ, naŋka naŋdi ‘yayɛ, gena naŋka ñyecki ma ‘yay, yeti ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ ‘ya te naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ ‘yati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ ‘ya te oomdin ammɛ ɛkkɛ korki yooŋkiy.
43006027	Naa ɛkkɛ kanŋɛ te oomdin baadi bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ te oomdin utki mako. Oomdin neeni jada oŋgati bɛɛ. Mena ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ oomdin neeniyɛ, gena ‘ya Kaci Ma Baano. ‘Ya yaakati acaan yenti Jwaŋa Tolan bala ‘yati.”
43006028	Ɔci ma tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Ɔɔn noŋdɔn a ɔki aŋka ɔɔn noŋdɔn kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolany?”
43006029	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan neeni, dala ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ‘yati mena cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolany.”
43006030	Ɔci ma tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “I noŋja naŋka ñyecki ma i a ɔki? Ɔɔn buagɔn gɔrtɔn aŋka ɔɔn jyeddɔn iti. I noŋ a naŋki gena?
43006031	Yɔrg ɔɔn omi ama yenti manna wɔɔŋji ba kiiji ma worgaji agi, ‘Ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Muuca oomdin te ñaalɔ aŋka ami ɛkkɛn.’”
43006032	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, gena Muuca ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ oomdin te ñaalɔ bɛɛ. Gena Wey ɔɔn, ɔci Wey ɔɔn ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ oomdin awarɛ te pɔliji.
43006033	Am Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya iñɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti a Men Baano, ɔci ma baan warda uda te ɛkɛ.”
43006034	Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ɔɔn ‘wondɔn ama neeni a ñaccu.”
43006035	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya a ama tɛɛtki may. Kan mena bɛya ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkɛ amdɛ koñ moki bɛɛ, ɔci kan mena jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkɛ amdɛ yiɛn oŋgati moki bɛɛ.
43006036	Yeti ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ka ɛkkɛ ‘ya yuarŋata doki, yeti ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati men bɛɛ.
43006037	Ɔci maka ‘ya ‘wonnata Wey ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛya ‘yati waakɛnda, ɔci kan mena bɛya ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkɛ yiɛpca ‘ya ɔntɔ oŋgati bɛɛ.
43006038	Acaan ‘ya bɛɛn kooyan iñɔ te pɔliji aŋka ‘ya noŋ waka ṭagdi ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya bɛɛn aŋka ‘ya noŋ waka ṭagdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Mena ‘ya cuonnay.
43006039	Gena waka ṭagdɛ Mena ‘ya cuonna agi maka ‘ya ‘wonnata ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn men gɛɛl yeya te ‘yati bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ buagɔn ‘ya ɛkkɛn luolla ñaalɔ tɛtɔ ne oŋŋa bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔy.
43006040	Gena waka ṭagdɛ Wey ɔɔn agi, maka ‘ya Kaci ɛkɛ yuarka ɔci jyeti ‘yatiyɛ, Wey ɔɔn buagɔn ɛkkɛn ciyi uda oŋkanda, ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛn luolla ñaalɔ ne oŋŋa bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔy.”
43006041	Ɔci ma Icrayiil bala woowɔ pookɛn te jwalla guaŋŋɛ Yaccu agi, ɛkɛ agji ama bɛɛnɔ iñɔ te pɔlijiy.
43006042	Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin agi, “Yaccu neeni a kaci Yuocip bɛɛ? Weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛn ŋeecin ikin bɛɛ? A gena acca ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkɛ bɛɛnjɛ iñɔ te Juaŋtiy?”
43006043	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ wɛyyɛ pookɔ bɛɛ.
43006044	Menga yaakinti bɛya ‘yati budan bɛɛ. Gena Wey ɔɔn mena ‘ya cuonna aŋka ma oodɛti ‘yatiy, ɔci ɛkkɛn luolla ‘ya ñaalɔ ne oŋŋa bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔy.
43006045	Jyeka kiiwɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, ‘Ma waakɛnda laldɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.’ Maka tieŋŋin Wey ɔɔn ɔci lallɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka bɛya ‘yati waakɛnda.
43006046	Menga Jwaŋa Tolan yuarŋɛ oŋgati bɛɛ. ‘Ya mena bɛɛn te ɛkɛti aŋka ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ.
43006047	Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, kan mena jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkɛ ciya yuonginda.
43006048	’Ya a ama tɛɛtki may.
43006049	Yɔrg ɛkkɛ omi ama yenti manna wɔɔŋji, ɔci ɛkkɛn tuuni.
43006050	Yeti ama neeni bɛɛn te pɔliji. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn aŋka kan men gɛɛl omdi ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ tuwa oŋgati moki bɛɛ.
43006051	’Ya a ama tɛɛtki ma bɛɛn te pɔliji. Kan menga omdi ama neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ uda oŋkanda baadi bɛɛ. Ɔci ama ‘woñga ‘ya ma baan warda aŋka tɛɛtki mayɛ, gena war ‘ya.”
43006052	Ɔci ma Icrayiil gɔwwɔ pookɛn agi, “Yeti mena ‘uan neeni ikin ‘wontin war ɛkɛ aŋka amtin a ɔki?”
43006053	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Awarɛ kan ɛkkɛ omdɛ war ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛ mottɛ yimg ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba ɛkkɛ tɛɛtɛ bɛɛ.
43006054	Mena omdi war ‘yayɛ, ɔci motti yimg ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ uda oŋkanda baadi bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya ɛkɛ luolla ñaalɔ ne oŋŋa bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔy.
43006055	War ‘ya a ama awarɛ, ɔci yimg ‘ya a waka maattan ma awarɛ.
43006056	Ɔci mena omdi war ‘yayɛ, ɔci motti yimg ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ bala ‘yati ɔci ‘ya da baal ɛkɛti.
43006057	Wey ɔɔn mena ‘ya cuonnayɛ, ɛkɛ tɛɛti. Ɔci acaan ɛkɛ tɛɛti a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya da tɛɛto. Ɔci ba naŋka neeni moki kan mena omdi war ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ da tɛɛtti daŋkun.
43006058	Ama neeni a ama bɛɛn te pɔliji. Ɛkɛ bala ba oomdin omki yɔrg ɛkkɛ ɔci tuuki ɛkkɛn wanna bɛɛ. Maka omdi ama bɛɛn te pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka ciyi tɛɛti oŋkanda.”
43006059	Jyeka neeni a jyeka loṭi Yaccu ma ona morki ma Juaŋ ban Kapɛrnyam.
43006060	Ɔci maka coŋin, maka boottin ɛkɛti gɔkcin agi, “Jwalla neeni tɛy tɛyo. A menɛ yaakinti tieŋdiy?”
43006061	Yeti ŋeejɛ Yaccu yomɛti maka boottin ɛkɛti bala wooki jyeka neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jyeka neeni yeyɔ ɛkkɛtɛ?
43006062	Kan ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan dɔwwa nona bɛɛna ‘yay, ɛkkɛ oŋ noŋdɛ a ɔki oŋo?
43006063	Gena Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka tɛɛtki may. Waru yaakinti noŋi genga bɛɛ. Jyeka guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn a booŋ ɔci ɛkkɛn a tɛɛtin moki.
43006064	Yeti magga bala ɛkkɛti wɛnni ɛkkɛn jyeti ‘yati men bɛɛ.” (Maka yookɔn te jyeni Yaccutiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu doki. Ɔci mena Yaccu ‘wonnɛ ma byeŋkɛntiyɛ, ŋeejɛ Yaccu daŋkun.)
43006065	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Te gena neeni aŋka ‘ya gɔŋna ɛkkɛti ka menga yaakinti bɛya ‘yati budan bɛɛ. Kan Wey ɔɔn gɔkti menti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti bɛya ‘yati bɛɛ.”
43006066	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, maka coŋin gɛɛg maka boottin ɛkɛti wɛti doki, ɛkkɛn ati i Yaccu moki bɛɛ.
43006067	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin Maka A Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔ neeniti agi, “Ɛkkɛ da ooddɛ i makɔ?”
43006068	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ɔɔn ooddɔn menɛti? Jyek i a jyeka balki tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy,
43006069	ɔci ɔɔn jyettɔn doki ɔci ŋeejɔn ɔɔn i a Kiṭɔ, i a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋa tɛɛti.”
43006070	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ kɛnnin ‘ya bora agɛ Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔy? Ɔci mena ne cyɛɛlɔ yomɛ a Jwaŋa Yaayan baa!”
43006071	Mena guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni gena Yahuuja kaci Cimaan Ickɛɛryuti, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena Yaccu ‘wonnɛ ma byeŋkɛntiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena akki Ma Ne Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔy.
43007001	Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baaniyɛ, Yaccu ati ḍɔki bonk Jaliilji. Ɛkɛ buagɔn ooddi ḍɔki bonk Yahuudiyaji bɛɛ, acaan ma Icrayiil buagɔn noki ɛkɛ.
43007002	Ɔci Iid Cieki Ma Te Darin cɔɔllin. Iid neeni ma ciyi te darin ṭɔlgɛn.
43007003	Ɔci modg Yaccun gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Bana neeni dalja, ɔgdi ootta ban Yahuudiya aŋka maka lala i gɔrti naŋki i.
43007004	Kan menga buagɔn ŋeettan mayɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi kanŋa lieda boki? Kan i noŋ a ɔɔnyɛ, naŋki i lɛɛrka ma, dala ma waakɛnda gɔrti.”
43007005	(Modg Yaccun woodgɛn jyeti ɛkɛti bɛɛ.)
43007006	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Oŋ ‘ya men neeni bɛɛ, yeti oŋki waakɛnda pwadɔ ɛkkɛti.
43007007	Ɛkkɛ yaakɛti noŋdɛ naŋki gɛɛl aŋka ma baan yomgɛn yiegdi ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Yeti ma yomgɛn yeyɔ ‘yati acaan ‘ya gɔkcan ɛkkɛnti ka naŋki ɛkkɛn yeyɔ.
43007008	Ɛkkɛ ɔgdɛ ooddɛ iidti pookɔ. ‘Ya ootta iidti men bɛɛ, acaan nink ‘ya men ɛɛṭi.”
43007009	Ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yeddin ban Jaliil.
43007010	Yeti ne modg ɛkkɛn atki iidtiyɛ, Yaccu bootcin ŋoyɔ ati parɛ lieda ɔɔn.
43007011	Ma Icrayiil bala lieṭi ɛkɛ iidti ɔci bala gɔwwɔ toyi yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Ɛkɛ bala aŋɛ?”
43007012	Ma bala meeyi jiek te Yaccu ne pɛñan. Ma gɛɛg gɔki agi, “Ɛkɛ a mena pwadan,” ɔci gɛɛg kɛki gɔki agi, “A’a, ɛkɛ a mena ma jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ.”
43007013	Yeti ma buayi ḍuaŋan ma Icrayiil ɔci menga gɔkcin lyɛljin bɛɛ.
43007014	Ɔci ne iid aŋŋɛ konɛyɛ, Yaccu ati kaaccin on Juaŋ ona tolan loṭi mako.
43007015	Ɔci ma Icrayiil poni ɔci tooccin agi, “Jyeka kiigin ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ a ɔki? Ɛkɛ lali ma bɛɛ.”
43007016	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jyeka loṭa ‘ya mayɛ, a jyek ‘ya paru bɛɛ, gena jyek mena ‘ya cuonna.
43007017	Kan menga buagɔn noŋi ba naŋka ṭagdɛ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkɛ parɛ kan lali ‘ya neeni bɛɛn te ‘yati paru? Walla bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantiy?
43007018	Mena gɔki te tuk ɛkɛ budanyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn ma gɔki agi ɛkɛ pwadjɛ. Yeti mena buagɔn ma gɔkti a mena ɛkɛ cuonnɛ pwad pwadyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ aŋka a jyeka awarɛ, ɔci jomi jiek baaw ɛkɛti.
43007019	“Ɛkkɛ myennɛ Muuca jyek ganuun te baaṭi bɛɛ? Ɔci menga bala ɛkkɛti noŋi ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Muuca bɛɛ. Ɔci te gena aŋka ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya nogdatɛy?”
43007020	Ma gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Jwaŋa yaayan bala iti. A makɛ bala buagɔn noki iy?”
43007021	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gena naŋi ‘ya bala ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ponnɛ te ɛkɛ.
43007022	Muuca ɛkkɛ myennɛ jyek ŋwoti mako, ɔci ɛkkɛ myetkɛ yɔrg ɛkkɛ te ñamu daŋkun, Ɔci ɛkkɛ ŋuoddɛ ma te Oŋ Cabit.
43007023	Pari ɛkkɛ ŋuoddɛ ma te Oŋ Cabit acaan ɛkkɛ buagɛ jyek Muuca jyɛddɛji bɛɛ no, oŋ ɛkkɛ looñɛ ‘yati te oŋŋa ‘ya men ywaŋŋayɔ te Oŋ Cabit ogo?
43007024	Ne ɛkkɛ gɔṭɛ naŋka yuartɛ ɛkkɛ te woŋgɔ budanyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi naŋki ‘ya yaayi bɛɛ. Kan jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛndayɛ, aŋka ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ.”
43007025	Ɔci maka ban Urcaliim gɛɛg bala toyi yɔtin agi, “Mena neeni a mena liltan ma aŋka noktan ma bɛɛ?
43007026	Gɔrtɛ, ɛkɛ bala gɔki jiek lyɛli ma ñomgɛnti, ɔci menga noŋi genga ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Maka ḍwaŋin gɔki ɛkɛ a Kiṭɔ boki?
43007027	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, nona ɛkɛ bɛɛni ŋeecin ikin, yeti ne Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Bora bɛɛdiyɛ, nona ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ŋeeddɛ menga bɛɛ.”
43007028	Ɔci Yaccu ne ɛkɛ baali loṭi ma on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ tooccin mati gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya ŋeejati ɛkkɛ? Ɔci nona bɛɛna ‘ya ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ? Yeti ‘ya bɛɛn te wyeñ ‘ya paru budan bɛɛ. Mena ‘ya cuonna a mena awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ.
43007029	Yeti ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya acaan ‘ya bɛɛn te ɛkɛti, ɔci ‘ya cuonna ɛkɛ wɛnni.”
43007030	Te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neenitiyɛ, ma buagɔn Yaccu muktan, yeti ɛkɛ muŋŋɛ menga bɛɛ acaan oŋ ɛkɛ men biɛṭi.
43007031	Yeti te polla tolanti neeniyɛ, ma gɛɛg jyeti ɛkɛti a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin agi, “Ne Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Bora bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋdi naŋka tɛyan ne coŋɔn, naŋka ñyecki ma ba Yaccu ɔɔn boki?”
43007032	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin ne tieŋki polla tolan balki meeki jyeka neeni te Yaccuyɛ, ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma Pɛriciin maka bɔlin cuuñɛ aŋka Yaccu muktan.
43007033	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya baltin iki ɛkkɛ ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ, ɔci ne baaṭi ‘ya dɔwwa mena ‘ya cuonnati dɔki.
43007034	Ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ liertɛ ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya yuardata bɛɛ. Ɔci nonta oodda ‘ya neeni ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti bɛɛdɛ bɛɛ.”
43007035	Ɔci ma Icrayiil toyi yɔtin pookɛn agi, “‘Wana neeni ooddi aŋɛ aŋka yuartin ikin bɛɛy? Ɛkɛ buagɔn ooddi ma Icrayiilti maka cyɛnŋin jitin bonk ma Giriik aŋka loṭi ma Giriik?
43007036	Jyek Yaccu neeni jitkɛn bala a ɔki ne ɛkɛ gɔki agi, ‘Ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ liertɛ ‘ya ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya yuardata bɛɛy,’ ɔci ‘Nonta ‘ya oodda ɛkkɛ yaakɛti bɛɛdɛ bɛɛy?’ ”
43007037	Ɔci oŋŋa tolan ne ŋoyɔ a oŋ iid tolanyɛ, Yaccu jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te oŋŋa neeni ɔci gɔkcin te pwana tolan agi, “Kan mena amɛ yiɛnyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bɛya ‘yati ɔci motti.
43007038	Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, ‘Kan mena jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, pyega tɛɛtki ma neeni bɛya te ɛkɛ yomɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn.’ ”
43007039	(Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni a jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan. Acaan ba Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan neeni Yaccu ma myennɛ te Boŋa bɛya ciyi maka jyeddi yomgɛnti. Ne Yaccu ma myennɛ neeniyɛ, Boŋ Juaŋ bɛɛn mati men bɛɛ, acaan Yaccu jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ ɔci ati non pwani ɛkɛ pɔliji men bɛɛ.)
43007040	Ma tieŋŋin jyeka neeni, ɔci ma gɛɛg gɔkcin agi, “Ɛkɛ a mena bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ.”
43007041	Maka pookɛn gɔkcin agi, “Ɛkɛ a Kiṭɔ.” Yeti ma gɛɛg kɛki gɔki agi, “Hay! Kiṭɔ bɛya te ban Jaliil boki?
43007042	Worga gɔki a ‘Kiṭɔ jiettan ma Daawud bɛɛ? Ɔci worga gɔki a ɛkɛ bɛya te ban Bɛtlaham ban Daawudn te baaṭi bɛɛ?’”
43007043	Ɔci ma kɛɛptin jitin te jyek Yaccu,
43007044	ɔci ma gɛɛg buagɔn Yaccu muktan, yeti men gɛɛl ati ɛkɛ muŋŋɛ bɛɛ.
43007045	Ɔci maka bɔlin dɔɔkkin byeŋkɛn budan nona maka cuoñi ɛkkɛnti. Gena gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma Pɛriciin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin bɔlinti agi, “Ɛkkɛ Yaccu dolnɛyɔ ogo?”
43007046	Ɔci bɔlin gɔkcin agi, “Men gɛɛl bala gɔki ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn bɛɛ!”
43007047	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ da jyennɛ ɔntɔ jyeka jomgin neeniti daŋkun?
43007048	Ḍuaŋa tolan gɛɛl jyeti ɛkɛti boki? Walla men ma Pɛriciin gɛɛl jyeti ɛkɛti boki?
43007049	Yeti polla tolan neeni waka kiigin worgaji kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘ualdɛ Juaŋ ɔci ywobji ɛkɛ bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti.”
43007050	Nikɔdiimac, mena ati Yaccuti te ñamu bala i ḍuaŋan neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi,
43007051	“Ba jyek ganuun ikin ma ywobji oltan mengati budan boki? Te ñamu ɛkkɛn gɔrti jieko, kan jyek mena neeni bala a ɔkiy, pwadɔ, walla yeyɔ. Ɔci ma gɔṭi naŋki ɛkɛ moki, kan bala a ɔkiy, pwatcin, walla yaayɛ. Naŋki ganuun ikin bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ?”
43007052	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin gɔkcin Nikɔdiimacti agi, “I bɛɛni te ban Jaliil daŋkun? Kan i liercayɛ, ŋeejja i bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan gɛɛl bɛya te ban Jaliil bɛɛ.”
43007053	Ɔci ma waakɛnda menga da ati baanɛti.
43008001	Ɔci Yaccu ati Pom Jɛtuunti.
43008002	Ɔci te liidɔ ḍiɛran Yaccu dɔɔkkin on Juaŋ ona tolan. Ɔci ma waakɛnda bɛɛn ɛkɛti, ɔci Yaccu cooccin iñɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala loṭi mako.
43008003	Maka loṭi worga Juaŋ ɔci ma Pɛriciin eccin ɛɛŋ Yaccuti. Ɛŋa neeni bala noŋi tommo. Ɔci ɛɛŋ owwi ma ḍuacci ma yeccu nona maka coŋin ñomgɛnti.
43008004	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Mena loṭi may, ɛŋa neeni mugɛ ma te tommo,
43008005	ɔci ganuun Muuca gɔki agi, ‘Kan mena noŋdi a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkɛ yeptan ma te gwoyi noktan.’ Oŋ i da gɔk a ɔki te ɛkɛ?”
43008006	Ne ɛkkɛn gɔkki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn poci Yaccu a poccin. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn Yaccu noŋdi amaam aŋka ɛkkɛn Yaccu muktan. Yeti Yaccu goŋjin iñɔ, ɔci kiejin ṭɛɛrji te bieŋɛ.
43008007	Ɔci ma ‘wota tooccin ɔɔn, ɔci Yaccu jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ gɔkcin agi, “Mena nɔji ɛkɛ baawyɛ, dala ɛkɛ guonan yiɛptɛ ɛɛŋti ñamu.”
43008008	Ɔci Yaccu goŋjin moki kiejjin ṭɛɛrji moki.
43008009	Ne ma tieŋki jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn kaaccin bora ne cyɛɛlɔ, ne cyɛɛlɔ. Mena tolan jɔɔtcin kaaccin bora ñamu, ɔci maka pookɛn bootcin ɛkɛ ŋoyɛti ne ɛkkɛn ɔɔcki bora waakɛnda ɔɔn. Ɔci Yaccu dolliyɔ parɛ, ɔci ɛɛŋ bala yɔɔd ɛkɛ ñamɛti.
43008010	Yaccu ñorcin ɛɛŋti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ma ati aŋɛ? I yiɛmmi menga bɛɛ?”
43008011	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “A’a, Ciɛggɔn, ‘ya yiɛmma menga bɛɛ.” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya daŋkun i yyɛbdin bɛɛ. I ɔgdi ootta, naa noŋja nɔji moki bɛɛ.”
43008012	Ɔci Yaccu bala gɔwwi i ma moki, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya a mena dɛki noono. Kan mena bootti ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkɛ ooddi te nona miel bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ooddi te nona bɔwan, ɔci tuwa moki bɛɛ.”
43008013	Ma Pɛriciin gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I miet ma te war i paru, menga bala yɔɔdi iki i bɛɛ, acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyek i yɔmjin bɛɛ.”
43008014	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ‘ya miet ma te jyek war ‘ya paru budanyɛ, jyek ‘ya a jyeka awarɛ, acaan nona bɛɛna ‘ya ŋeej ‘ya, ɔci nona oodda ‘ya ŋeej ‘ya. Yeti nona bɛɛna ‘ya ɔci nona oodda ‘ya, kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ.
43008015	Ɛkkɛ jiek oldɛ ma wyetkɛnti te yomg ɛkkɛ ma baan budan, ɔci ‘ya jiek olja menga wyeñɛti bɛɛ.
43008016	Yeti kan ‘ya gɔkca ka waak pwadɔ walla yeyɔyɛ, jyek ‘ya a jyeka awarɛ, acaan ‘ya baal paru bɛɛ. Wey ɔɔn mena ‘ya cuonna, bala ‘yati oŋkanda.
43008017	Jyek ganuun ɛkkɛ bala ɛkkɛti, ɔci jiek gɔki agi kan maka ne yyɛɛwɔ gɔki jwalla ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
43008018	’Ya miet ma te war ‘ya, ɔci mena parɛ mieti ma te jyek ‘ya. Gena Wey ɔɔn mena ‘ya cuonna.”
43008019	Te jyeka neeni ɛkkɛn tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Wey ɛkkɛ bala aŋɛ?” Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Ɛkkɛ ‘ya ŋeejati bɛɛ, ɔci Wey ɔɔn kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ moki. Te ‘ya ŋeejati ɛkkɛyɛ, te Wey ɔɔn daŋkun ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ.”
43008020	Yaccu bala loṭi ma te jyeka neeni kaña on Juaŋ ona tolan nona ḍɔcki ma bilko, yeti ma bɛɛn ɛkɛ mugɛ bɛɛ acaan oŋ ɛkɛ men biɛṭi.
43008021	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti moki agi, “‘Ya ootta ɔci ɛkkɛ liertɛ ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ tuudɛ nɔji ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti ɔɔn. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, nona oodda ‘ya ɛkkɛ yaakɛti bɛɛdɛ bɛɛ.”
43008022	Ɔci maka ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil bala toyi yɔtin agi, “Ɛkɛ noki war ɛkɛ parɛ aŋka ɛkɛ gɔki agi ikin yaakinti bɛɛtin nona ootci ɛkɛ bɛɛyɛ?”
43008023	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ‘wota agi, “Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka iñɔ, ‘ya a mena ñaalɔ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji ɔci ‘ya a mena ṭɛɛrji bɛɛ.
43008024	Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya ka ɛkkɛ tuudɛ nɔji ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti ɔɔn. Kan ɛkkɛ tiekɛ gɔkɛ agi ‘‘Ya a Kiṭɔ’ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ tuudɛ nɔji ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti.”
43008025	Ɔci ma tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “I a menɛ?” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Pari ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te ñamu doki bɛɛ?
43008026	’Ya yaakati gɔkka jyeka coŋin te nɔji ɛkkɛ, yeti ‘ya gɔkca bɛɛ. Mena ‘ya cuonna ɛkɛ a mena awarɛ, ɔci ‘ya miet ma waakɛnda te jyeka tieŋŋan ‘ya te ɛkɛtiy.”
43008027	Jyeka guagdɛ Yaccu neeniyɛ, kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn ne Yaccu baali gɔki jyek Weegɛny.
43008028	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Ne ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ŋaaptata ma ñaalɔyɛ, ɔci ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ‘‘Ya a Kiṭɔ’, ɔci ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ daŋkun ‘ya noŋ genga te yom ‘ya paru budan bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya gɔk te jyeka ‘ya laldati Wey ɔɔny.
43008029	Ɔci mena ‘ya cuonnayɛ, ɛkɛ bala ‘yati. ‘Ya dalna ɛkɛ ɔntɔ bɛɛ, acaan oŋkanda ‘ya noŋ ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagitiy.”
43008030	Ne Yaccu baali gɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, maka coŋin jyeti ɛkɛti.
43008031	Maka jyeti Yaccuti neeniyɛ, ma gɛɛg a ma Icrayiil, ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te jyek ‘ya oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛ a maka laldi ‘ya awarɛ,
43008032	ɔci jyeka awarɛ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛn ḍɔɔggɔti.”
43008033	Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Abrahim a yɔr ɔɔn. Ɔɔn agɔn kɛɛnk magga oŋgati bɛɛ. A gena guaga i ɔɔn pɔktɔnyɔy?”
43008034	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, mena noŋi nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn nɔjjo.
43008035	Mena kɛɛngɔn ciyi on weegɛn a ñaccu bɛɛ. Gena mena a kaci ɛkɛ aŋka ciyi on weegɛn a ñaccu.
43008036	Kan ɛkkɛ pɔktɛ Kaciyɛ, ɛkkɛ pɔktɛ ɛkɛ awarɛ.
43008037	Çeej ‘ya ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin Abrahim. Yeti ɛkkɛ buagɛ nokkɛ ‘ya acaan jyek ‘ya bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ.
43008038	’Ya gɔk ba naŋka yuarŋ ‘ya te Wey ɔɔnti, yeti ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba waka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te wey ɛkkɛti.”
43008039	Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin Yaccuti moki agi, “Abrahim a yɔr ɔɔn.” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Te ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin Abrahimyɛ, te ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki Abrahim.
43008040	’Ya a mena ɛkkɛ myettɛ te jyeka awarɛ, jyeka tieŋŋan ‘ya te Jwaŋa Tolantiy, yeti ɛkkɛ buagɛ nokki ‘ya. Naŋki Abrahim bala a ɔɔn boki? Hayyɛllɛ!
43008041	Ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki wey ɛkkɛ.” Ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɔɔn jietkɔn ma te tomi bɛɛ. Wey ɔɔn bala ne cyɛɛlɔ, gena Jwaŋa Tolan.”
43008042	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Te Wey ɛkkɛ agi Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, te ɛkkɛ anɛ ‘ya acaan ‘ya a war Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ‘ya bɛɛn te ɛkɛti. ‘Ya bɛɛn te wyeñ ‘ya budan bɛɛ. ‘Ya cuonna Wey ɔɔn.
43008043	Te gena yeti jyek ‘ya jitkɛn kwoyɛ ɛkkɛy? Jyek ‘ya jitkɛn kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ yookɛ te jyeka loṭa ‘ya may.
43008044	Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ te wey ɛkkɛ Jwaŋa Yaayanti, ɔci ɛkkɛ buagɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka ṭagdɛ wey ɛkkɛ. Te ñamu wey ɛkkɛ a mena noki mako. Ɛkɛ yaakinti jyeka pwadin jyeka awarɛ bɛɛ, acaan jyeka awarɛ bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Ne ɛkɛ jomi jiekyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki te tuk ɛkɛ parɛ, acaan ɛkɛ a mena jomi jieko, ɔci jyeka jomgin kooyin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji te tuk ɛkɛ.
43008045	Yeti ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya miet ɛkkɛ te jyeka awarɛ.
43008046	A menɛ bala wɛnni ɛkkɛti yaakinti nɔji ‘ya lɛɛldɛ boray? Kan jyek ‘ya a jyeka awarɛ ɛkkɛ yookɛ te jyeni ‘yati ogo?
43008047	Kan mena a men Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ tyeŋi jyek Juaŋo. Ɛkkɛ agɛ ma Juaŋ bɛɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ.”
43008048	Ma Icrayiil gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Hay! Ɔɔn gɔŋnɔn awarɛ, i a mena yaayan, ɔci jwaŋa yaayan bala iti.”
43008049	Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Jwaŋa yaayan bala ‘yati bɛɛ. ‘Ya noŋ aŋka ma gɔrti pwani Wey ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi ‘ya yaajjɔ.
43008050	’Ya buaga ma gɔkti ‘ya pwadɔ? A’a a jyek ‘ya neeni bɛɛ. Gena jyek mena parɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔrti naŋki ‘ya, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti a pwatcin walla yaayɛ.
43008051	Tieŋdɛ ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, kan menga jyek ‘ya tiidiyɔyɛ, ɛkɛ tuwa oŋgati bɛɛ.”
43008052	Ma Icrayiil gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Acca ŋeejɔn ɔɔn jwaŋa yaayan bala iti. Abrahim tuuni, ɔci maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan moki tuuni, ɔci i gɔk mena noŋdi ba jyek i tuwa bɛɛ.
43008053	I tol te Abrahim yɔr ɔɔn mena tuunyɛ? Ɔci i tol te bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan maka baaw tuun nɛ? I gɔk i a menɛ?”
43008054	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ‘ya gɔk paru agi ‘ya pwadyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin bɛɛ, bala ba jyeka budan. Yeti gena Wey ɔɔn gɔki agi ‘ya pwadjɔy. Ɔci gena ɛkɛ guagdɛ ɛkkɛ a Jwaŋ ɛkkɛy.
43008055	Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya. Kan ‘ya gɔkca Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya agdi mena jomi jiek ba ɛkkɛ. Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeej ‘ya awarɛ, ɔci ‘ya tiec jyek ɛkɛ.
43008056	Ne wey ɛkkɛ Abrahim baali kɛɛy ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ, ɛkɛ gɔrti oŋŋa ‘ya bɛɛday. Ɔci gɔrcin doki, ɔci yomɛ ñɔɔcin.”
43008057	Ma Icrayiil gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Yuong i men aŋi a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ (50) bɛɛ. Abrahim boki yuarŋi i?”
43008058	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, ne Abrahim baawi menyɛ, ‘‘Ya a ‘ya,’ doki baalo.”
43008059	Ma gwoyi luuli buagɔn yebi Yaccu noktan, yeti ɛkɛ warɛ coŋŋɛ ɔci kooyin bora te on Juaŋ ona tolanti lieda ɔɔn.
43009001	Ɔci Yaccu bala goṭi pɔɔjɔ, ɔci mena ulli gɛɛl yuarnɛ ɛkɛ. Mena neeni a ulli te oŋŋa wona ɛkɛ jiennɛ mɛɛgɛny.
43009002	Maka laldɛ Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Wana neeni ñingɛ ulcin te wona jiennɛ mɛɛgɛn ogo? Te nɔji ɛkɛ, walla te nɔji maka ɛkɛ jietkiy?”
43009003	Yaccu kɛkcin agi, “A’a, te nɔji ɛkɛ bɛɛ, walla te nɔji maka ɛkɛ jietki bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ ñingɛ ulcin aŋka ma gɔrti naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛti.
43009004	Dala ikin kantin kanŋa mena ‘ya cuonna ne noon men bɔwi ɔŋ. Dita nona miel bɛya, ɔci menga yaakinti noŋdi kanŋa ne nona miel bɛɛdi bɛɛ.
43009005	’Ya ne baala iñɔ baanji wɛnni menyɛ, ‘ya a mena dɛki ma baano.”
43009006	Ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ñaang ŋuulnɛ ṭɛɛrji ɔci ñaang naŋŋɛ aŋi lommo, ɔci baannɛ mena ñingɛ ulan ñingɛti.
43009007	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɔgdi ootta ñingu kuoya Pwol Cilɔɔwamji.” (Pwol Cilɔɔwam te jyek Mabaan yenti “Pwol Mena cuuñɛ May”.) Ɔci ‘uan ati kwoccin ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɔɔŋniyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti gwallo.
43009008	Maka cieki i ɛkɛ baanji, ɔci maka ɛkɛ yuarki ne ɛkɛ ñwoyi waakyɛ, gɔkcin agi, “Mena neeni a mena ciyi iñɔ ñwoyi waak bɛɛ?”
43009009	Maka pookɛn gɛɛg gɔkcin agi, “Ɛɛ, gena ɛkɛ.” Ɔci maka pookɛn moki gɛɛg gɔki agi, “A’a, yeti bala ba ɛkɛ.” Ɔci ‘uan gɔkcin agi, “Gena ‘ya.”
43009010	Ɔci ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I ñingu pɔŋni a ɔki?”
43009011	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “‘uan gɛɛl bala bartan ma a Yaccu, ɛkɛ noŋi lomi, ɔci baannɛ ‘ya ñinguti, ɔci ‘ya myenna agi ‘ya ootcɔ kuoccɔ, ɔci ‘ya ati kwoccan, ɔci ‘ya ñingu pɔkkan.”
43009012	Ma tooccin ‘uanti agi, “Ɛkɛ bala wɛnɛ?” Ɛkɛ kɛkcin agi, “Çeej ‘ya bɛɛ.”
43009013	Ɔci mena ñingɛ ulan neeni owwi ma ma Pɛriciinti.
43009014	Ɔci oŋŋa Yaccu noŋŋi lomi, ɔci men pɔŋnɛ ñingɛti neeniyɛ, oŋŋa neeni a Oŋ Cabit.
43009015	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin daŋkun tooccin ɛkɛti gɔkcin agi, “I ñingu pɔŋni a ɔki?” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya ñingu bannɛ men te lommo, ɔci ‘ya ati kwoccan, ɔci ne pɛñan ‘ya yaakati gwallo.”
43009016	Ma Pɛriciin gɛɛg gɔkcin te Yaccu agi, “‘Wana neeni bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ganuun Oŋ Cabit tiiññɛyɔ bɛɛ.” Yeti maka pookɛn gɔkcin agi, “Mena nɔɔdɔn yaakinti naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ a ɔɔn boki?” Ɔci ma kɛɛptin jitin te jyek Yaccu.
43009017	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin mena ñingɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ neeniti moki agi, “I a mena ñingɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ. Gɔkca agi ɛkɛ a menɛ?” Ɔci ‘uan gɔkcin agi, “Ɛkɛ a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan.”
43009018	Ma Icrayiil gɔki agi, “I boki ñingu ulcin te baaṭi oŋ pɔkki ma a pɔkkin boki?” Ɛkkɛn tieki ɔɔn ne ɛkkɛn borki maka ɛkɛ jietkiti ɔɔn.
43009019	Ɔci ma Icrayiil tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Mena neeni a kaci ɛkkɛ kacca guagdɛ ɛkkɛ jiennɛ wona ḍiɛri ñingɛ ulan neenɛ? Kan a ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti gwali noon acca a ɔki?”
43009020	Ɔci maka ɛkɛ jiedi gɔkcin agi, “Çeejɔn ɔɔn gena kaci ɔɔn, ɔci jiennɔn ɔɔn ñingɛ ulcin ɔɔn.
43009021	Yeti te gwalla ɛkɛ gɔṭi noon acca a ɔkiyɛ, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn bɛɛ, ɔci mena ɛkɛ pɔŋnɛ ñingɛti neeniyɛ, kwoyɔn ɔɔn. Kaci toli doki, ɔci yuong ɛkɛ coŋgin doki, toottɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti te tuk ɛkɛ parɛ.”
43009022	Maka ɛkɛ jietki gɔki a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn buayi ma Icrayiil acaan ma Icrayiil jiekɛn ñaagɛ ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Kan men gɛɛl gɔɔdi agi Yaccu a Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Borayɛ, ɛkɛ ŋualtin ikin ɔntɔ te ona morki ma Juaŋti aŋka bɛya morti Juaŋti wɛnni oŋgati moki bɛɛ.”
43009023	Gena te jyeka neeni aŋka maka ɛkɛ jietki gɔkki agi, “Yuong ɛkɛ coŋgin doki, toottɛ ɛkɛti.”
43009024	Ɔci ɛkkɛn borcin mena ñingɛ pɔŋnɛti neeni moki, oŋki aŋi ne yyɛɛwɔ doki, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i gɔkca te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ. Yeti ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ‘wana i ñingu pɔŋnɛ neeni a nɔɔdɔn.”
43009025	Ɔci mena pɔŋnɛ Yaccu ñingɛti neeni gɔkcin agi, “Kan ɛkɛ a mena nɔɔdɔn, kwoy ‘ya. Gena ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl aŋka ŋeej ‘ya. Te ñamu ‘ya ñingu ul ulo, ɔci acca ‘ya yaaŋnati gwali noono.”
43009026	Ɔci ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I naŋŋi ɛkɛ a ɔki? I ñingu pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ a ɔki?”
43009027	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ myennin doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ yookɛ te tieŋŋin jyek ‘ya. Ɛkkɛ moki buagɛ myettin ogo? Ɛkkɛ buagɛ agdɛ maka laldɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun?”
43009028	Ɔci ɛkɛ ḍaari ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a mena laldɛ ɛkɛ, yeti ɔɔn a maka laldɛ Muuca.
43009029	Çeejɔn ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin Muucati, yeti ‘wana neeni, nona bɛɛni ɛkɛ ŋeejɔn ɔɔn bɛɛ, kwoyɔn ɔɔn.”
43009030	’Uan gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya yomu moni te kwoñi ɛkkɛ te jyeka neeni, nona bɛɛni ɛkɛ kwoyɛ ɛkkɛ, yeti ɛkɛ a mena ‘ya pɔŋna ñinguti.
43009031	Ɔci ŋeecin ikin Jwaŋa Tolan tieŋdi jyek maka nɔɔtk bɛɛ, yeti kan mena morti Juaŋtiyɛ, ɔci noŋdi ba naŋki ɛkɛyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan tieŋdi jyek ɛkɛ.
43009032	Maka jiedi ma ñingɛn ulan gɛɛl pɔkki ma ñingɛti oŋgati boki?
43009033	’Wana neeni kan te ɛkɛ bɛɛn te Juaŋti bɛɛy, te ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋi naŋka neeni boki?”
43009034	Ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a mena nɔɔdɔn, ɔci i lor ɔɔn ogo?” Ɔci ɛkɛ ŋualji ma ɔntɔ te ona morki ma Juaŋtiy.
43009035	Ɔci Yaccu tieŋŋin ‘wana neeni ŋualji ma ɔntɔ te ona morki ma Juaŋtiy, ɔci ɛkɛ ati lieṭi ɔci ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I jyedda Kaci Ma Baantɛ?”
43009036	Ɛkɛ tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ɛkɛ a menɛ aŋka ‘ya jyedda ɛkɛtiy?”
43009037	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛkɛ yuarŋi i, ɔci mena gɔwwi iki i neeniyɛ, gena ɛkɛ.”
43009038	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ‘ya jyedda.” Ɔci ɛkɛ morcin Yaccuti.
43009039	Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya bɛɛn ṭɛɛrji noŋ waak ba naŋki godan. ‘Ya bɛɛn aŋka maka ñingɛn ulan pɔkka ñingɛnti, yeti maka yookɔn te jyeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn waakɛn uultan ñaalɔ genga yuartan moki bɛɛ.”
43009040	Ɔci ma Pɛriciin gɛɛg bala cwakanti ɔci tieŋŋin jyeka guagdɛ Yaccu neeni, ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Ɔɔn agɔn maka wyetkɛn a uulgin daŋkun?”
43009041	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan te ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ a uulginyɛ, te nɔji ɛkkɛ baawo. Yeti acca ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ wɔkɔ, ɔci te jwalla neeni nɔji ɛkkɛ niin men ɛkkɛti.”
43010001	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Awarɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, maka kaatti kaañji kañ kulin te kaañ tukɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka kwayi maal a kuano, ɔci ɛkkɛn a ɛyyo.
43010002	Mena kaatti te kaañ tukɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a ḍɛɛnɔn.
43010003	Mena ciyi kaañ tukɛti neeniyɛ, kan ḍɛɛnɔn bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ kaañ tukɛ pɔktɛ te mena neeni. Ɔci kulin tieŋdi pwan ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ boor kulin ɛkɛ te yengɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ kulin cieddɛ bora.
43010004	Ɔci kan kulin ɛkɛ cieddɛ bora waakɛndayɛ, ɛkɛ wɛɛddi ñamu kulin ñomgɛnti, ɔci kulin bootti ɛkɛ ŋoyɛti, acaan pwan ɛkɛ ŋeecɔn kulin.
43010005	Kulin bootti mena kuolin ñin ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yooŋdi ɔntɔ te ɛkɛti, acaan men kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn, ɔci pwan ɛkɛ kuolin ñin ɛkkɛn.”
43010006	Jwalla a caagɔn neeni guaŋŋɛ Yaccu mati, yeti jwali jiñɛ yuarcɛ ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
43010007	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti ‘wota agi, “Awarɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ka ‘ya a ‘yeŋi tukɛ kulin.
43010008	Maka bɛɛn te ñamu noŋi waakɛn agi aginti ḍɛɛninyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ɛyi, ɔci ɛkkɛn a maka kwayi maal a kuano, yeti kulin jyeti ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
43010009	’Ya a ‘yeŋi tukɛ. Kan men gɛɛl bɛya koodi orɔ te ‘yayɛ, ‘ya yuoc ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kaatti jiju ɔci koodi bora ɔci luom yuardɛ.
43010010	Kan mena ɛɛn bɛyayɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ a kali waako, ɔci naŋki ɛkɛ a nooŋi waako, ɔci ɛkɛ noon yaadɛ. ‘Ya bɛɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn tɛɛti te ‘ya, tɛɛtin te ñamu buannɛ tɛɛtin acca neeni.
43010011	“‘Ya a ḍɛɛnɔn pwadan. Ḍɛɛnɔn pwadanyɛ, buayi lien bɛɛ.
43010012	Mena cieti kulin te bilkyɛ, ɛkɛ a kulin weegɛn bɛɛ, ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔrti ɛɛn yuartɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yooŋdi ɔntɔ, kulin daldɛ ɔntɔ. Ɔci ɛɛn kulin mwogdɛ ɔci kulin cyɛndɛ jitin.
43010013	Ɛkɛ yooŋdi ɔntɔ a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ cieti kulin te bilko, ɔci ɛkɛ ani kulin bɛɛ.
43010014	’Ya a ḍɛɛnɔn pwadan, ɔci wak ‘ya ŋeej ‘ya ɔci ‘ya ŋeecka ɛkkɛn,
43010015	bala ba ‘ya ŋeeja Wey ɔɔn ɔci ‘ya Wey ɔɔn ŋeej daŋkun. Ɔci ‘ya tuud te yom ‘ya te kulin.
43010016	“Ɔci kulin ‘ya kulin pookɛn bala daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn a kulin kaña neeni bɛɛ. ‘Ya ɛkkɛn owwa daŋkun, ɔci ɛkkɛn tieŋdi pwan ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ciyi kaañji nona ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn aga wak ‘ya waakɛnda.
43010017	“Wey ɔɔn ani ‘ya acaan ‘ya tuud te yom ‘ya aŋka jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ dɔki.
43010018	Menga yaakinti ‘ya nogda bɛɛ. ‘Ya yaakati tuud ba yom ‘ya paru, ɔci ‘ya yaakati jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ paru moki, acaan ‘ya myenna Wey ɔɔn a ɔɔn.”
43010019	Ɔci ma Icrayiil kɛɛptin jitin moki te jyeka neeni.
43010020	Maka coŋin gɛɛg gɔki agi, “Jwaŋa yaayan bala ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena luudɔn. Ɛkkɛ tyeŋɛ jyek ɛkɛ ogo?”
43010021	Maka pookɛn gɛɛg gɔkcin agi, “Jyeka neeni a jyek mena muŋŋɛ jwaŋa yaayan bɛɛ. Jwaŋa yaayan yaakinti boki ma ñingɛn pɔktɛ?”
43010022	Ɔci iid bala ban Urcaliim. Iid neeni gena iid on Juaŋ ona tolan
43010023	Ɔci te wɔɔka wanna noon a wɛɛñi wyeñɛ jwamma luyan. Ɔci Yaccu bala nona on Juaŋ ona tolan warɛti, bala ati jiju daaŋji daŋa naŋŋɛ Cɔlamany.
43010024	Ɔci ma Icrayiil bɛɛn ḍwoṭṭinti Yaccu warɛti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɔɔn yomgɔ mwondi te moottin te i ne tua? Gɔkka kan i a Kiṭɔy. Ɔɔn myettɔn ne pwadan!”
43010025	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ myennin doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ bɛɛ. Naŋka naŋdi ‘ya te Wey ɔɔnyɛ, naŋka neeni ma myettɛ ‘ya a menɛ.
43010026	Yeti ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ yookɛ acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ kulin ‘ya bɛɛ.
43010027	Kulin ‘ya tieŋdi jyek ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛn ŋeej ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛn bootti ‘yati.
43010028	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘woñga ‘ya tɛɛtin ‘ya. Tɛɛtin neeni baadi oŋgati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn tuwa oŋgati bɛɛ, ɔci menga yaakinti ɛkkɛn mugdɛ te byeŋ ‘yati bɛɛ.
43010029	Wey ɔɔn, mena ‘ya ‘wonna kulin neeni, ɛkɛ tolcin te waak waakɛnda. Ɔci menga yaakinti kulin mugdɛ te byeŋ Wey ɔɔnti bɛɛ.
43010030	’Ya ɔci Wey ɔɔn, ɔɔn agɔn wara ne cyɛɛlɔ.”
43010031	Ma Icrayiil gwoyi luuli byeŋkɛnti buagɔn yebi noki Yaccu.
43010032	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ lɛɛrnin ‘ya te naŋka naŋi ‘ya coŋin, naŋka pwadin te Wey ɔɔnti, ɔci te naŋka bɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ buagɛ yebbɛ nokkɛ ‘yay?”
43010033	Ɔci ma Icrayiil gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɔɔn yebbɔn i te naŋka pwadan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɔɔn yebbɔn nokkɔn i te ḍorin i ḍori Jwaŋa Tolan neeni, acaan i a men baan budan, ɔci i gɔk i a Juaŋo.”
43010034	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “ ‘Maka te baaṭi bardɛ Juaŋ a jɔkin.’ Ɔci jyeka neeni bala worga ganuun ɛkkɛti bɛɛ?
43010035	Ɔci ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te jyeni jyek Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka kiigin neeni acaan jyeka kiigin neeni a jyeka awarɛ. Maka tieŋŋin jyek Jwaŋa Tolan te baaṭi bardɛ Juaŋ a jɔkin.
43010036	Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi ‘ya ḍorji Jwaŋa Tolan, ne ‘ya baala gɔka ka ‘ya a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan ogo? Wey ɔɔn ‘ya kɛnna bora, ɔci ‘ya cuonna ɛkɛ iñɔ ṭɛɛrji.
43010037	Kan ‘ya noŋ naŋki Wey ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ‘yati bɛɛ.
43010038	Yeti kan ‘ya noŋ naŋki Wey ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛ yookɛ te jyek ‘ya menyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ gena naŋki ‘yati. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan Wey ɔɔn bala ‘yati, ɔci ‘ya da baal ɛkɛti.”
43010039	Ɔci ɛkkɛn poccin buagɔn mwoki Yaccu moki, yeti ɛkkɛn yaakinti bɛɛ. Yaccu ati ɔntɔ te ɛkkɛnti.
43010040	Ɔci Yaccu ati kuocɔ Tol Urdun ŋoyɛti, ati nona buoṭi Yɔhanna ma te ñamu, ɔci bala ciyi aŋan.
43010041	Ɔci maka coŋin bɛɛn ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Yɔhanna noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma gɛɛl bɛɛ, yeti jyeka guagdɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda te mena neeniyɛ, a jyeka awarɛ.”
43010042	Ɔci maka coŋin jyeti Yaccuti wɛnan.
43011001	Ɔci mena ‘uan bala yenti Lajarac. Ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɛ ne pɛñan, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ciyi ban Bɛtani, kowi ɛkkɛn a Moryam ɔci Marta.
43011002	Lajarac ɛkɛ a mod Moryamn mena eelan pwoŋnɛ Yaccu ciegɛti ɔci puuññɛ te jyeyi ɛkɛy.
43011003	Ɔci kowwɛn men gɛɛl cuuñɛ Yaccuti ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, Lajarac mena onga i ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɛ.”
43011004	Yeti ne Yaccu tieŋni jwalla neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Waja neeni bɛɛn ɛkɛti a ɔɔn acaan Juaŋ buagɔn Lajarac tuwa bɛɛ. Yeti waja neeni bɛɛn aŋka ma gɔrti pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ma gɔrti pwani ‘ya Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan.”
43011005	Yaccu ani Marta ɔci kow ɛkkɛn ɔci Lajarac.
43011006	Ne Yaccu tieŋni a Lajarac warɛ yaayɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yeddin te nona ciyi ɛkɛ aŋan nink ne yyɛɛwɔ men.
43011007	Ne nink ne yyɛɛwɔ baakiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Ikin dɔɔtin ban Yahuudiya moki.”
43011008	Maka laldɛ Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mena loṭi may, i baal aŋan ne cwakanti, ɔci ma Icrayiil noŋi yebi i, ɔci i noŋ dɔwwa aŋan moki?”
43011009	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Tieŋdɛ poca! Acca neeniti ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya yaakati ciy men ɔɔn. ‘Ya tuud men bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya men gena ‘ya cuonnata Wey ɔɔn aŋka naŋdi neeni cwamjan bɛɛ. ‘Ya ɛkɛ cwamja.”
43011011	Yaccu gɔkcin a ɔɔn ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ‘wota gɔkcin agi, “Mug ikin Lajarac wiccin, ‘ya ootta aŋka ɛkɛ ṭiewa ñaalɔ.”
43011012	Maka laldɛ ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Ciɛggɔn, kan ɛkɛ wiccinyɛ, pwatcin, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ tɛya moki.”
43011013	Ne Yaccu gɔŋni agi Lajarac winnɔyɛ, gena lyen Lajarac, yeti ma tieŋŋin ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi gɔki agi Lajarac winni agi wardan.
43011014	Ɔci ne baaṭi Yaccu ɛkkɛn myennɛ ne pwadan agi, “Lajarac tuuni.
43011015	Ɔci ‘ya yomu ñɔy ñɔy acaan ‘ya baaw ɛkɛti aŋan aŋka ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ naŋki ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ‘yati. Bɛɛdɛ, oottin ɛkɛti acca.”
43011016	Ɔci Tɔmac (mena bartan ma a Yuongɔn) gɔkcin maka laldɛ Yaccu, maka atki i ɛkɛti agi, “Dala ikin oottin aŋka ikin tuutin iki Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔ.”
43011017	Ne Yaccu bɛɛni dɛnni borayɛ, ɛkɛ tieŋŋin agi Lajarac bala koolji nink ne ŋaanɔ doki.
43011018	Ban Bɛtani cualcin te ban Urcaliim, bala ba wɔɔkan ne yyɛɛwɔ,
43011019	ɔci ma Icrayiil maka coŋin bɛɛn wɔɔwwin ḍieŋŋin Martati ɔci Moryamti aŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwattɛ.
43011020	Marta tieŋŋin Yaccu bala bɛya, ɔci ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ne pɛñan ɔci ati ɔci koogjin i ɛkkɛn yomɔ. Yeti Moryam ɛkɛ yeddin te baanji.
43011021	Marta gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, kan i te baali wɛnniyɛ, te mod ɔɔn tuun bɛɛ.
43011022	Yeti acca ŋeej ‘ya kan i toocca Jwaŋa Tolanti te gengayɛ, ɛkɛ i ‘wondi.”
43011023	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Mod ɛkkɛ moki jɔŋdi ñaalɔ.”
43011024	Marta gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Çeej ‘ya oŋŋa ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ oŋŋa bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ da jɔŋdi.”
43011025	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya a mena ma luoldɛ ñaalɔ, ɔci ‘ya a mena tɛɛtki mako. Maka jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ne tuutiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ciyi tɛɛti men.
43011026	Ɔci maka tɛɛti kan ɛkkɛn jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkkɛn tuwa oŋgati moki bɛɛ. I jyetti jyeka neenɛ?”
43011027	Marta gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛ, Ciɛggɔn, ‘ya jyeti doki, i a Kiṭɔ, i a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, i a mena guaktan ma bɛya iñɔ ṭɛɛrjiy.”
43011028	Ne Marta gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ati borcin kow ɛkkɛn Moryamti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti meejjin a meejjin agi, “Mena Loṭi Ma bɛɛn ɔci bala tooci i.”
43011029	Ne Moryam tieŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ jɔllin ne pɛñan, ati kookcin Yaccuti,
43011030	acaan Yaccu dɛññin baanji men bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala te yomɔ men nona kookki i Martay.
43011031	Ne ma Icrayiil maka bala orɔ i Moryam aŋka mwoni ɛkɛ konɛ neeni gɔrki Moryam jɔŋni ne pɛñan, ɔci kaanni borayɛ, ɛkkɛn bala poŋi agi Moryam ati ooddi wiak kool wyeñɛti kɔŋji no. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bootcin ɛkɛti.
43011032	Ɔci ne Moryam bɛɛni nona Yaccu baali, ɔci ne Yaccu yuarnɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin iñɔ Yaccu ñamɛti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I te baali wɛnniyɛ, te mod ɔɔn tuun bɛɛ.”
43011033	Ne Yaccu gɔrni Moryam wiagi, ɔci ma Icrayiil maka bɛɛn i ɛkɛ wiakki daŋkunyɛ, Yaccu yomɛ yaayɛ ne tolan.
43011034	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin gɔkcin agi, “Ɛkɛ joŋnɛ wɛnɛ?” Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, bɛɛd gɔrca.”
43011035	Ɔci Yaccu wiakcin.
43011036	Ɔci ma Icrayiil gɔkcin agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, gena mena ani Lajarac ne tolan neeni!”
43011037	Yeti ma gɛɛg gɔkcin agi, “Yaccu mena yaakinti maka ñingɛn ulan pɔktɛ neeniyɛ, te ɛkɛ baali wɛnniyɛ, te Lajarac tuun boki?”
43011038	Ɔci Yaccu booŋ tonnɛ bora moki, ɔci ɛkɛ ati kool wyeñɛti. Kola neeni a wɔrgɔn poomti, ɔci poom bala kool tukɛti.
43011039	Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Poom taandɛ ɔntɔ!” Ɔci Marta, kow mena tuun neeni, gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ɛkɛ bala koolji nink aŋi ŋaanɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ doki ŋooyin!”
43011040	Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya katan gɔkkan iti te ñamu ka i ne jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɔci i gɔrca pwani Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ?”
43011041	Ɔci poom taanji ma ɔntɔ, ɔci Yaccu ñorcin ñaalɔ ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Wey ɔɔn, pwatcin. I doki tieŋni jyek ‘ya.
43011042	Çeej ‘ya i tieŋŋa jyek ‘ya oŋkanda, yeti ‘ya gɔkkan a ɔŋŋi aŋka maka yɔdgin iki ‘ya neeni tieŋdi, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeddi ‘ya cuonna i.”
43011043	Ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yaajjin ne tolan, gɔkcin agi, “Lajarac, kooya bora!”
43011044	Ɔci mena tuun neeni kooyin bora, ɔci ɛkɛ byeŋkɛ a ḍɛɛggin ɔci ciegɛ a ḍɛɛggin te bworŋin poorki ma maka tuway. Ɔci wyeñɛ a paargɔn te bworŋo. Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mati agi, “Bworŋin laaktɛ ɔntɔ, ɔci dala ɛkɛ potti woono!”
43011045	Ɔci ma Icrayiil maka bɛɛn i Moryam ɔci gɔrcin waka naŋŋɛ Yaccuyɛ, maka coŋin gɛɛg jyeti ɛkɛti.
43011046	Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg ati ma Pɛriciin myetkɛ te waka naŋŋɛ Yaccuy.
43011047	Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma Pɛriciin, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ i maka gɔṭi jieko, ɔci gɔgjin pookɛn agi, “Ikin noŋtin a ɔki? ‘Wana neeni noŋi naŋka coŋin naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ.
43011048	Kan ikin ɛkɛ daltin noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, ma waakɛnda jyeddi ɛkɛti, ɔci ma Ḍɔɔm bɛya kɛɛn ikin muktan ɛkkɛn, ɔci on Juaŋ ona tolan neeni lɛktan.”
43011049	Menga bala ɛkkɛnti yenti Kayapac. Ɛkɛ a gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil te ywonna neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jyeka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
43011050	Ɛkkɛ jiek gwallɛ jitin waakɛnda bɛɛ. Kan mena ne cyɛɛlɔ tuwa te ma waakɛndayɛ, ɔci te naŋka neeni kan ma Icrayiil waakɛnda ḍakti bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin.”
43011051	Kayapac gɔkcin jyeka neeni te yom ɛkɛ budan bɛɛ. Te ywonna neeni ɛkɛ a gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil, ɔci ma myennɛ ɛkɛ te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ agi Yaccu tuwa te kɛɛn ma Icrayiil,
43011052	ɔci ɛkɛ tuwa te kɛɛn Ma Icrayiil pookɛn bɛɛ, yeti te kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan kɛɛgin cyɛnŋin jitin bala baan warda ḍɔɔldiyɔ Yaccu aga maka ne cyɛɛlɔ.
43011053	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannati ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔn, ɛkkɛn bala gɔṭi jyek lyen Yaccu, buagɔn ɛkɛ noktan.
43011054	Ɔci te jyeka neeni Yaccu warɛ liɛlnɛ bora ma Icrayiil ñomgɛnti moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ati ban Iprayim bana ḍiɛran bana wɔɔŋ lɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ciyi aŋan i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ.
43011055	Ɔci ne Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ cɔɔlnɛ dokiyɛ, maka ciyi ɔntɔ ban Urcaliim toŋkɛti, maka coŋin ɔɔccin ban Urcaliim konɛti noŋi naŋki ma Icrayiil te jyek lɔɔŋo.
43011056	Ɔci maka neeni bala lieṭi Yaccu. Ɛkkɛn bala orɔ on Juaŋ ona tolan bala yɔdi gɔwwɔ pookɛn ɔci toyi yɔtin agi, “I poŋ a ɔki? Yaccu boki bɛya iidtɛ?”
