43011057	Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma Pɛriciin gɔkcin mati te ñamu doki agi, “Kan men gɛɛl nona ciyi Yaccu ŋeejɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bɛya ɔɔn miettɔn aŋka ɔɔn ɛkɛ mugdɔn.”
43012001	Ɔci ne Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ biɛṭi men nink ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, Yaccu bɛɛn ban Bɛtani nona baali Lajarac mena luolnɛ ɛkɛ ñaalɔ te lienti neeni.
43012002	Ɔci ma bala nɔṭi am aŋan nɔrtan Yaccu, ɔci Marta bala ma eektɛ oomdin, ɔci Lajarac bala omi oomdin i maka pookɛn i Yaccu.
43012003	Ɔci Moryam eccin eelan wiɛlɛ tɛyan rɔtil tukɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci eelan neeni a ñɔɔn jaan gɛɛl yenti nardiin. Ɔci ɛkɛ pwoŋnɛ Yaccu ciegɛti, ɔci Yaccu puuññɛ ciegɛti te jyeyi ɛkɛ. Ɔci on jiñɛ warda ŋooyi milla mili te eelan.
43012004	Ɔci mena ne cyɛɛlɔ mena bala maka laldɛ Yaccuti, ɛkɛ yenti Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti (ɛkɛ a kaci Cimaan Ickɛɛryuti), ɔci ɛkɛ a mena Yaccu ‘wonnɛ ma byeŋkɛnti.
43012005	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Te gena yeti i yooki ikin eelan neeni wiɛlnin bora te bilk ne coŋɔn aŋka ‘wontin maka bɔwan neeniy?”
43012006	Ne Yahuuja gɔŋni a ɔɔn neeni ɛkɛ yomɛ pwatcin maka bɔwanti bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a ɛɛno. Kuñŋan bilk bala ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala koṭi bilka ḍuatan ma jiju kuñŋanji.
43012007	Yaccu gɔkcin Yahuujati agi, “Yahuuja, ɛkɛ dalja, hay! Ne ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ‘ya joŋŋata ɛkɛ a joŋi doki no.
43012008	Maka bɔwan balgi iki ɛkkɛ yuonginda, ɔci ɛkkɛ yaakɛti noŋdɛ ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ waako. Yeti ‘ya balkin iki ɛkkɛ yuonginda bɛɛ.”
43012009	Ɔci poli ma Icrayiil polla tolan ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki Yaccu baali aŋanyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn gɔrti Yaccu. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn gɔrti Yaccu parɛ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn gɔrti Lajarac mena luolnɛ Yaccu ñaalɔ te lienti neeni daŋkun.
43012010	Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɛkkɛn ñoowin te jiek waakɛnda, buagɔn Lajarac noktan,
43012011	acaan ma Icrayiil maka coŋin jyeti Yaccuti doki te gena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ Lajaracti neeni.
43012012	Ɔci ne liidɔ polla tolan maka bɛɛn Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ tieŋŋin a Yaccu bala bɛya ban Urcaliim.
43012013	Ɔci ɛkkɛn eccin tuum aamkɛ byeŋkɛnti aŋka noŋdi ɛkɛti ba mena tolan, ɔci ati kookcin Yaccuti ɔci yaajjin agi, “Dala ma jieyi i Juaŋo! I a Kiṭɔ Kaci Daawud! Mena bɛɛn te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan dala Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan Ciɛggɔn Tolanti! Gena Ciɛggɔn ma Icrayiil Ciɛggɔn Tolan!”
43012014	Ɔci Yaccu yɔṭi tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ ɔci ɛkɛ taapcin tɔɔrɔnti bala ba jyeka kiijji ma worgaji agi,
43012015	“Ma Urcaliim, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ. Ciɛggɔn Tolan ɛkkɛ bala bɛya toobdi te tɔɔrɔn ṭɔɔlɛ.”
43012016	Te ñamu gena naŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni kwoyɔn maka laldɛ ɛkɛ, yeti ne Yaccu jɔlni ñaalɔ te wara woonɛyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ñingɛn ñieki te jyeka kiijji ma worgaji te naŋka neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñingɛn ñieki te naŋka naŋi ma Yaccuti neeni.
43012017	Poli ma polla tolan maka bala i Yaccu oŋŋa ɛkɛ Lajarac luolnɛ ñaalɔ te kooljiyɛ, maka neeni jyek Yaccu dalji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala ma myettan oŋkanda te naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu Lajaracti.
43012018	Poli ma polla tolan tieŋŋin ɔci ati kookcin Yaccuti. Ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin Yaccu noŋi naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ neeni.
43012019	Ma Pɛriciin gɔgjin pookɛn agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti noŋdɛ genga boki? Maka baan warda ati bootcin ɛkɛti doki.”
43012020	Maka bɛɛn moṭi Jwaŋa Tolanti te oŋ iidyɛ, ma gɛɛg a ma Giriik.
43012021	Ɔci maka neeni bɛɛn Pilibucti. Pilibuc ɛkɛ a men ma Bɛtceeyida ban Jaliilji. Ɔci ma Giriik gɔkcin Pilibucti agi, “Ɔɔn buagɔn gɔrtɔn Yaccu.”
43012022	Pilibuc ati Andarawuc myennɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati yaakkɛn Yaccu myetki.
43012023	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Oŋŋa ma gɔrti pwani ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan cɔɔllin doki.
43012024	Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, kan poñi waŋɛ ḍɛmdi ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ cokkɛ ñin ma piik bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ niin parɛ budan. Yeti kan ɛkɛ cokkɛ ñin ma piikyɛ, ɛkɛ yula, ɔci ɛkɛ ñingɛ bɛya ne coŋɔn.
43012025	Kan mena ñingɛ caŋdɛ te ani war ɛkɛ parɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍakti. Mena wierti te war ɛkɛ iñɔ baanji wɛnni te jyek ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ tiidɛyɔ acaan te tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni.
43012026	Kan menga buagɔn aga kɛɛngɔn ‘yayɛ, dala ɛkɛ bootti ‘yati. Ɔci nona ‘ya baalayɛ, kɛɛngɔn ‘ya bala daŋkun. Kan mena kanŋan ‘yatiyɛ, Wey ɔɔn gɔki a ɛkɛ pwad pwado.
43012027	“Acca ‘ya yomu yaayɛ ne pɛñan. Ɔci ‘ya gɔkca a ɔki? ‘Ya gɔkca agi, ‘Wey ɔɔn, dala i yuoc ‘ya te oŋŋa neenɛ?’ Yeti gena te naŋka neeni aŋka ‘ya bɛɛna tuuda neeni.
43012028	Wey ɔɔn, dala i noŋja aŋka ma gɔrti pwani i.” Ɔci pwan bɛɛn te ñaalɔ gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya noŋjan doki aŋka ma gɔrti pwani ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya noŋja a ɔɔn moki.”
43012029	Ɔci poli ma polla tolan bala yɔdi ne cwakanti, ɔci ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Gena ñaala wiak wanna hay!” Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg gɔki agi, “Gena malɛɛka gɔkcin Yaccutiy.”
43012030	Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Pwana neeni bɛɛn te ‘ya bɛɛ, bɛɛn acaan te ɛkkɛ.
43012031	Ɔci acca godan ṭɛɛrji noŋi bɛya, ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan ḍuaŋa ṭɛɛrji yiɛpca ‘ya ɔntɔ.
43012032	Ɔci ne ‘ya ŋaaptata ma ñaalɔyɛ, ɔci ‘ya ma cieññati orati ‘yati waakɛnda.”
43012033	Ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ma myennɛ te jyek lyen ɛkɛ.
43012034	Polla tolan gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Çeejɔn ɔɔn te worga ne Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ ciyi yuonginda. Yeti i gɔk agi ‘ya Kaci Ma Baan ŋaapta ma ñaalɔ. Mena guaga i a Kaci Ma Baan neeni a menɛ?”
43012035	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Mena dɛki balgi iki ɛkkɛ ne ḍyɛṭ ṭɔɔlɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ ne noon bɔwi aŋka ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ bɛɛ. Kan mena ooddi te nona mielyɛ, nona ooddɛ ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ bɛɛ.
43012036	Dala ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ mena dɛkiti ne ɛkɛ balgi iki ɛkkɛ men ɔŋ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ agdɛ kɛɛgin mena dɛkiy.” Ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ luoṭi doki, ɔci warɛ coŋŋɛ te ɛkkɛn.
43012037	Yaccu noŋi naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ naŋka coŋin ma ñomgɛnti, yeti ma jyeti ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
43012038	Te naŋka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Icaaya te baaṭi dɛññin bora doki. Icaaya gɔki te baaṭi agi, “Ciɛggɔn, a makɛ jyeti jyeka guaŋŋin ikiny? Ɔci a makɛ gɔrcin war tɛɛn iy?”
43012039	Ɔci maka yookɔn te Yaccu neeni yaakinti jyeddi ɛkɛti bɛɛ, bala ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Icaaya agi,
43012040	“Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛn aammɛ ñingɛnti ɔci wyetkɛn uulnɛ ñaalɔ aŋka naa ɛkkɛn gɔrti ɔci jiek jitkɛn yuartan, ɔci waakɛn yaltan bɛya ‘yati aŋka ɛkkɛn ywaŋdiyɔ ‘ya bɛɛ.”
43012041	Icaaya gɔkcin a ɔŋŋi acaan ɛkɛ gɔrcin pwani Yaccu, ɔci gɔkcin jiek te ɛkɛ.
43012042	Ɔci ḍuaŋan ma Icrayiil jyeti Yaccuti ne coŋɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ agi, “Ɔɔn jyettɔn Yaccuti bɛɛ.” Ɛkkɛn buayi dita ɛkkɛn ŋualtan ma Pɛriciin bora te ona morki ma Juaŋti.
43012043	Acaan anna anki ɛkkɛn jyek Juaŋ bala bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ani jyek ma baan ne tolan, ɔci buagɔn ma gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka pwadgɔ.
43012044	Ɔci Yaccu yaajjin gɔkcin agi, “Kan mena jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkɛ jyeddi ‘yati paru bɛɛ, ɛkɛ jyeddi mena ‘ya cuonnati daŋkun.
43012045	Kan mena ‘ya yuartayɛ, ɛkɛ mena ‘ya cuonna da yuartɛ ɛkɛ.
43012046	’Ya bɛɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji baal ba mena dɛki, aŋka maka jyeddi ‘yati moki ciyi nona miel bɛɛ.
43012047	Kan mena tieŋdi jyek ‘ya ɔci jiek bɛɛdɛjiyɛ, gena ‘ya noŋ godan ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Acaan ‘ya bɛɛn noŋ godan bɛɛ. ‘Ya bɛɛn yuoc mako.
43012048	Yeti mena yookɔn te ‘ya ɔci tieŋdi jyek ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, godan bɛya ɛkɛti. Jyek ‘ya jyeka yookiti ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti te oŋŋa bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔy.
43012049	Godan bɛya a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti te jyek ‘ya paru budan bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya gɔk ba jyeka ‘ya myennata Wey ɔɔn parɛ mena ‘ya cuonna.
43012050	Ɔci ŋeej ‘ya jyek ɛkɛ etti tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni mati. Jyeka guagdi ‘yayɛ, guagdi ‘ya ba jyeka ‘ya myennata Wey ɔɔny.”
43013001	Ne Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ baawi menyɛ, ŋeejɛ Yaccu oŋŋa ɛkɛ ṭɛɛr daldɛ ooddi ñaalɔ Weegɛnti cɔɔllin doki. Yaccu bala ani ma ɛkɛ baan warda ɔɔn ne nink ɛkɛ baaki ɔɔn.
43013002	Ne ɛkkɛn balki cieki omki oomdinyɛ, Jwaŋa Yaayan jwali labji olnɛ Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti yomɛti doki. Jwaŋa Yaayan gɔkcin Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti yomɛti agi, “Yaccu ‘woñga ma byeŋkɛnti.”
43013003	Ɔci ŋeejɛ Yaccu waak waakɛnda ‘wonnɛ Weegɛn ɛkɛ bieŋɛti. Ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci dɔɔdi dɔki Jwaŋa Tolanti.
43013004	Ɔci Yaccu jɔŋŋin te non oomdinti ɔci bworŋa ḍɔpki ma waakɛn loonɛ bora, ɔci bworŋ paarnɛ tɛyɛti,
43013005	ɔci pieg pwoŋnɛ ḍwanji, ɔci ɛkɛ bala lɔki maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ciegɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ bala puoci ma ciegɛn te bworŋa paarnɛ ɛkɛ tɛyɛtiy.
43013006	Ɔci Yaccu bɛɛn Butructi ɔci Butruc kɛkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn i ‘ya luagda cieguti boki?”
43013007	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Butruc, gena naŋdi ‘ya neeni kwoy i, yeti ne baaṭi yuarca i ne pwadan.”
43013008	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hayɛllɛ! ‘Ya buaga cieg ‘ya luaga bɛɛ!” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan i luagdin ‘ya bɛɛ, i a men ‘ya bɛɛ.”
43013009	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Yeti kan a ɔɔnyɛ, naa ‘ya luagda cieguti pookɛn budan bɛɛ, luagda byeŋkuti ɔci wyeñuti daŋkun!”
43013010	Yaccu ṭwokcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan mena warɛ luaŋŋɛ dokiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciegɛ aŋka luagdɛ pookɛn, acaan ɛkɛ warɛ a giikin moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ warɛ pwad pwad doki. Ɛkkɛ pwadgɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ pwadgɛ waakida bɛɛ.”
43013011	Mena Yaccu ‘wondɛ ma byeŋkɛnti ŋeejɛ Yaccu doki aŋka ɛkɛ gɔŋni agi, “Ɛkkɛ pwadgɛ waakida bɛɛ wanna.”
43013012	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ma luaŋŋɛ ciegɛntiyɛ, bworŋ ɛkɛ luullɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ati cooccin iñɔ non ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ tooccin maka laldɛ ɛkɛti gɔkcin agi, “Gena naŋi ‘ya neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ?
43013013	Ɛkkɛ boṭɛ ‘ya a mena loṭi may, ɔci ɛkkɛ boṭɛ ‘ya a Ciɛggɔn moki. Ne ɛkkɛ boṭɛ ‘ya a ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin awarɛ, acaan ‘ya baal a ɔɔn.
43013014	’Ya a Mena Loṭi ɛkkɛ ɔci a Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛ. Kan ‘ya lɔk cieg ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun lɔktɛ cieg ɛkkɛ pookɔ daŋkun ba ‘ya ɔɔn.
43013015	Naŋka naŋi ‘ya neeni a naŋka lɔgdɛ ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ pookɔ ba naŋka naŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni.
43013016	Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, mena kanŋan a kanŋinyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te kanŋa weegɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci mena cuntan mayɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te mena ɛkɛ cundɛ neeni bɛɛ.
43013017	Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ naŋka neeni ŋeeddɛyɛ, ɔci ne ɛkkɛ noŋdiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ niin ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.”
43013018	“‘Ya gɔk ɛkkɛ waakida bɛɛ. Maka kɛññan ‘ya bora ŋeej ‘ya. Yeti jyeka kiigin dɛññin bora agi, ‘Mena omin iki ‘ya ama ne cyɛɛlɔ ɛkɛ ‘ya tomna dɔki.’
43013019	“Acca neeniti ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya ne naŋki men dɛndi bora bɛɛy, aŋka naŋka neeni ne bɛɛdiyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, ‘‘Ya a Kiṭɔ,’ ɔci ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ‘yati.
43013020	Awarɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, kan mena buagɔn maka cundi ‘yayɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ daŋkun buagɔn ‘ya. Ɔci maka buagɔn ‘yayɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn daŋkun buagɔn mena ‘ya cuonna daŋkun.”
43013021	Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ wiak ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Awarɛ ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, men gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛti wɛnni, ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda maka yookɔn te ‘ya byeŋkɛnti.”
43013022	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu bala ñoor yɔtin pookɛn acaan Yaccu jwali caaññɛ a caato. Mena guaŋŋɛ Yaccu neeni ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ne pwadan bɛɛ.
43013023	Maka laldɛ Yaccu menga bala ne cyɛɛlɔ ciyi Yaccu taaŋɛti. Ɛkɛ a mena ani Yaccuy.
43013024	Ɔci Butruc mena neeni gɔmnɛ bieŋɛ, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala ɔɔn myettɔn mena guagdɛ ɛkɛ neeni a menɛ?”
43013025	Ɔci mena ciyi Yaccu taaŋɛti neeniyɛ, tooccin Yaccuti gɔkcin agi, “Ciɛggɔn, a menɛ?”
43013026	Yaccu ṭwokcin agi, “Ne ‘ya am wɛdda uutta kilkti, ɔci ne ‘wonda mena ‘woñga ‘yayɛ, gena ɛkɛ waanɛ neeni.” Ɔci Yaccu am uunnɛ kilkti ɔci ‘wonnɛ Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti.
43013027	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ am ‘wonnɛ Yahuujayɛ, Jwaŋa Yaayan kaaccin Yahuuja yomɛti. Yaccu gɔkcin Yahuujati agi, “Gena naŋa iyɛ, dala naŋa i ne pɛñan acca!”
43013028	Maka cieki iki ɛkkɛn nona oomdinti neeni jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu Yahuujati neeni jitkɛn ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
43013029	Ma gɛɛg bala poŋi gɔki agi Yaccu Yahuuja myennɛ aŋka ooddi wɛɛṭi oomdin te iid kaapun, acaan kuñŋan bilk bala ɛkɛti. Ɔci ma gɛɛg bala poŋi gɔki agi Yahuuja ati maka bɔwan eektɛ waagga kaapun no.
43013030	Ne Yahuuja ‘wonnɛ Yaccu amyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kaaccin bora ne pɛñan, ɔci noon uli doki.
43013031	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ kaanni borayɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Acca neeniti ma gɔrti pwani ‘ya Kaci Ma Baano, ɔci te naŋki ‘yayɛ, ma gɔrti pwani Wey ɔɔn daŋkun.
43013032	Kan ma gɔrti pwani Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋki ‘ya Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan noŋdi daŋkun aŋka ma gɔrti pwani ‘ya Kaci ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋdi a ɔɔn acca.
43013033	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ‘ya baal ɛkkɛti ne ḍyɛṭ ṭɔɔlɛ, ɔci ne cwakanti ɛkkɛ liertɛ ‘ya, ɔci ba jwalla guaŋi ‘ya ma Icrayiiltiyɛ, guagdi ‘ya ɛkkɛti acca, ka nona oodda ‘ya ɛkkɛ yaakɛti bɛɛdɛ bɛɛ.
43013034	Ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya te jyeka wonkɛn neeni, dala ɛkkɛ oonnɛ yɔtin pookɔ. Bala ba ‘ya an ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ.
43013035	Kan ɛkkɛ oonnɛyɔ pookɔyɛ, ŋeettan ma waakɛnda ɛkkɛ a maka laldin ‘yay.”
43013036	Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, i ootta aŋɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Nona oodda ‘yayɛ, i yaakiti bootta ‘yati acca bɛɛ, yeti ne baaṭi i bootta ‘yati.”
43013037	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn i gɔk ‘ya yaakati bootta iti acca bɛɛ ogo? Kan ‘ya nokta ma te iyɛ, dala ɔga ɔɔn.”
43013038	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay! I Butruc i boki tuud te ‘ya? Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti, te ween jiña neeniyɛ, ne naŋka neeni men baawi ɔci ne tuan wiakti men bɛɛyɛ, i kɛkka te ‘ya oŋki aga ne ḍoogɔ doki.”
43014001	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin moki agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiak bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ‘yati daŋkun.
43014002	On Wey ɔɔn oorg jitkɛn bala coŋɔ. Te baali a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, te ‘ya ɛkkɛ myennin ka oorg jitkɛn bala bɛɛ. ‘Ya ootta noŋ nona ciyɛ ɛkkɛy.
43014003	Ɔci kan ‘ya ootta noŋ nona ciyɛ ɛkkɛyɛ, ‘ya dɔɔkka moki ɛkkɛ eedin ñaaktinti ‘yati aŋka ikin ciyin ñootin nona ne cyɛɛlɔ.
43014004	Ɔci pɔya oodda ‘ya ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ.”
43014005	Tɔmac gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, nona ooddi i kwoyɔn ɔɔn, ɔci pɔya ooddi i ŋeejɔn ɔɔn a ɔki?”
43014006	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya a pɔyo, ɔci ‘ya a mena awarɛ, ɔci ‘ya a mena tɛɛtki may. Menga yaakinti bɛya Wey ɔɔnti budan bɛɛ. Gena mena bɛya ‘yati aŋka bɛya Wey ɔɔnti.
43014007	Ɛkkɛ te ‘ya ŋeejatiyɛ, te Wey ɔɔn da ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Ɔci acca ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ doki.”
43014008	Pilibuc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, ɔɔn lɛɛrtɔn Wey ɛkkɛ ɔɔn gɔrtɔn, ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin doki.”
43014009	Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Pilibuc, ikin balkin iki ‘ya wɛnni te baaṭi doki, ɔci i ‘ya ŋiñña men bɛɛ? Mena ‘ya yuarŋayɛ, ɛkɛ Wey ɔɔn yuarŋɛ daŋkun. Te gena yeti i tooci Wey ɔɔny?
43014010	I jyetti ‘ya baal Wey ɔɔnti, ɔci Wey ɔɔn bala ‘yati bɛɛ? ‘Ya gɔk jyeka neeni te yom ‘ya paru budan bɛɛ. Wey ɔɔn ɛkɛ balgin iki ‘ya oŋkanda. Gena ɛkɛ noŋi naŋka neeni.
43014011	Dala i jyedda ‘ya baal Wey ɔɔnti ɔci Wey ɔɔn bala ‘yati. Kan i jyetti a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, dala i jyedda naŋki ‘yati.
43014012	Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti awarɛ, mena jyeddi ‘yatiyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋdi ba naŋki ‘ya daŋkun, ɔci naŋki ‘ya bwantan naŋki ɛkɛ, acaan ‘ya ootta Wey ɔɔnti.
43014013	Kan ɛkkɛ toottɛ Wey ɔɔnti te genga te yenti ‘yayɛ, ɔci ‘ya noŋja aŋka ma gɔrti pwani Wey ɔɔn te naŋki ‘ya Kaci ɛkɛ.
43014014	Kan ɛkkɛ toottɛ te genga te yenti ‘yayɛ, ɔci ‘ya noŋja.
43014015	“Kan ɛkkɛ anɛ ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛ jyek ‘ya tiidiyɔ.
43014016	Ɔci ‘ya cɔkca Wey ɔɔnti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ Mena Ma Magdɛ bɛya ciyi iki ɛkkɛ wɛnni a ñaccu.
43014017	Gena Boŋa awarɛ. Yeti maka ciyi budan te ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti ɛkɛ eetan yomgɛnti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ kuoli ñin ɛkkɛn. Ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ acaan ɛkɛ ñoowɛ iki ɛkkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ bɛya ciyi ɛkkɛ yomgɔti.
43014018	“‘Ya ɛkkɛ daldinyɔ pookɔ bɛɛ, ‘ya bɛɛd dɔɔkka ɛkkɛti.
43014019	Ɔci ne cwakanti maka ciyi budan te ‘yayɛ, ‘ya yuarta ɛkkɛn wɛnni moki bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ moki, ɔci ne ‘ya tɛɛtayɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ da tɛɛtɛ daŋkun.
43014020	Ne oŋŋa bɛya wannayɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya baal Wey ɔɔnti, ɔci ɛkkɛ da balgɛ ‘yati, ɔci ‘ya da baal ɛkkɛti.
43014021	“Ɔci mena jyek ‘ya bala ɛkɛti, ɔci jyek ‘ya tiidiyɔyɛ, ɛkɛ ani ‘ya. Ɔci mena ani ‘yayɛ, Wey ɔɔn ani ɛkɛ daŋkun, ɔci ‘ya an ɛkɛ daŋkun, ɔci ‘ya waru lɛɛlla bora ɛkɛti aŋka ɛkɛ gɔrti ‘ya.”
43014022	Ɔci Yahuuja bala (gena Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti bɛɛ), ɛkɛ gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, i noŋja a ɔki aŋka i yuartiti ɔɔn, ɔci maka ciyi budan te i, i yuartiti bɛɛy?”
43014023	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan menga ani ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ jyek ‘ya tiidiyɔ, ɔci Wey ɔɔn ani ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɔɔn bɛɛdɔn ciyɔn ñoowɔn iki ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ.
43014024	Mena ani ‘ya bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ jyek ‘ya tiidiyɔ bɛɛ. Jyeka tieŋdɛ ɛkkɛ ‘yati neeniyɛ, a jyek ‘ya bɛɛ, gena jyek Wey ɔɔn mena ‘ya cuonnay.
43014025	“‘Ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti te naŋka neeni ne ‘ya baala ɛkkɛti men.
43014026	Ɔci Mena Ma Magdɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ cuondɛ Wey ɔɔn te yenti ‘ya, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ laldɛ te waak waakɛnda. Ɔci te naŋki Boŋ Juaŋ neeni ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te jyeka guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti waakɛnda.
43014027	“Coodi pwani daldiyɔ ‘ya ɛkkɛti. Ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ‘ya coodi pwani ba yom ‘ya, yeti ‘ya ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ba ‘woñgin maka ciyi budan te jyek ‘ya ne ɛkkɛn ‘woñki waak bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiak bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ.
43014028	Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti ka ne ‘ya ooddayɛ, ‘ya dɔɔkka ɛkkɛti dɔki. Ɛkkɛ te anɛ ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛ te yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te jyeka guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti ka ‘ya ootta Wey ɔɔntiy, acaan Wey ɔɔn tolcin te ‘ya.
43014029	Ɛkkɛ myennin doki te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ aŋka ne naŋki dɛndi borayɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ ‘yati.
43014030	Acca ‘ya gɔwwin iki ɛkkɛ oŋki ne coŋɔn moki bɛɛ. Ciɛggɔn ṭɛɛrji neeni bala bɛya, yeti ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋi genga ‘yati bɛɛ.
43014031	’Ya noŋja ba jyeka ‘ya myennata Wey ɔɔn aŋka ŋeettan ma baan warda ‘ya an Wey ɔɔn. “Jɔŋdɛ, ikin oottin te nona neeniti.”
43015001	“‘Ya a luutkin waanɛ, ɔci Wey ɔɔn, ɛkɛ a mena gɔṭi jango.
43015002	Ɔci kan kɛn ‘ya gɛɛl jieda ṭɔlgɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ tɔttɛ Weegɛn ɔntɔ. Ɔci jaan kɛna jied ṭɔlgɛyɛ, kɛrkɛ tuomdɛti Weegɛn aŋka jieda ṭɔlgɛ ‘wota.
43015003	Acca ɛkkɛ pwadgɛ te jyeka guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti.
43015004	Dala ɛkkɛ ciyin ñoowin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci dala ‘ya baal ciy ɛkkɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Jaan kɛnɛ kan bala ɔntɔyɛ, jieda bɛɛ. Kan bala te mɛɛgɛntiyɛ, jieda. Ɔci ba jyek jaan kɛrka neeniyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ ciyin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba jaan kɛna ṭɔlgɛ baawo. Yeti kan ɛkkɛ balkin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba jaan kɛna ciyi mɛɛgɛnti jied ṭɔlgɛy.
43015005	“‘Ya a jaan warɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ agɛ jaan kɛrkɛ. Kan men gɛɛl bala ‘yati, ɔci ‘ya da baal ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba jaan kɛna jied ṭɔlgɛ ne coŋɔny. Kan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ budan te ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti noŋdɛ genga bɛɛ.
43015006	Kan mena ciyin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba jaan kɛna yiɛmnɛ weegɛn ɔntɔ neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ iwa. Ɔci kɛrka neeni eedɛ yiɛptɛ weegɛn maccu, ɔci amdɛ maaño, ɔci baadi doki.
43015007	Kan ɛkkɛ ciyin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci kan jyek ‘ya bala ɛkkɛtiyɛ, kan ɛkkɛ toottɛ te gengayɛ, ɔci gena neeni bala ɛkkɛti doki.
43015008	Kan ɛkkɛ jieddɛ ṭɔlgɔ ne coŋɔn ba luutkin ɔɔnyɛ, te naŋka neeni ma gɔrti pwani Wey ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ maka laldi ‘ya awarɛ.
43015009	“‘Ya an ɛkkɛ bala ba Wey ɔɔn ne ani ‘yay. Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba anna ana ‘ya ɛkkɛ a ñaccuy.
43015010	Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ jyek ‘ya tiidiyɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba anna ana ‘ya ɛkkɛy. Ɔci kan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba ‘ya moki ne jyek Wey ɔɔn tiiññayɔy, ɔci ‘ya ciy ba anna ani Wey ɔɔn ‘yay.
43015011	“Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te waka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te yoma ñɔyan ba yom ñɔɔn ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ne tolan.
43015012	Jyek ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni, dala ɛkkɛ oondiyɔ pookɔ bala ba anna ana ‘ya ɛkkɛy.
43015013	Kan mena tuwa te mung ɛkkɛnyɛ, anna ani ɛkɛ mung ɛkkɛn buannɛ ani menga bɛɛ.
43015014	Kan ɛkkɛ noŋɛ jyek ‘ya oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ mung ‘ya.
43015015	Acca ɛkkɛ bardin ‘ya a kɛɛnk moki bɛɛ, acaan mena kɛɛngɔn naŋka naŋdɛ weegɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te naŋki waakɛnda naŋka tieŋŋan ‘ya te Wey ɔɔntiy, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ bardin ‘ya a mung ɔɔn.
43015016	’Ya kɛnnata ɛkkɛ bora bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ aŋka kɛnnin ‘ya bora te mati te yom ‘ya. Ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wonnin ‘ya jwali aŋka ɛkkɛ ooddɛ jieddɛ ṭɔlgɔ ne coŋɔn, ɔci ṭɔlg ɛkkɛ baadi bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, kan ɛkkɛ toottɛ Wey ɔɔnti te genga te yenti ‘yayɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ.
43015017	Jyeka gɔwwan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ oondiyɔ pookɔ.
43015018	“Kan maka ciyi budan te ‘ya, yookɔn te ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ acaan ɛkkɛn yookɔn te ‘ya te ñamu.
43015019	Ɛkkɛ te agɛ maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn te ani ɛkkɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn ani ma ɛkkɛn pookɛn. Yeti ɛkkɛ agɛ maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ kɛnnin ‘ya bora te maka ṭɛra neeniti, aŋka ɛkkɛn yookiti te ɛkkɛ wanna.
43015020	Dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te jwalla guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti agi, ‘Kɛɛngɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te kanŋa weegɛn bɛɛ.’ Ɔci kan ma noŋi ywobji ‘yatiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn da noŋdi ywobji ɛkkɛti daŋkun. Ɔci kan ma tieci jyek ‘ya waakɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn da jyek ɛkkɛ tiitanyɔ bɛɛ.
43015021	Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi waka neeni waakɛnda ɛkkɛti te ‘ya, acaan mena ‘ya cuonna kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn.
43015022	’Ya te bɛɛna bɛɛyɛ, ɔci ‘ya te gɔŋna genga ɛkkɛnti bɛɛyɛ, te jyek nɔji te bala ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Gena ‘ya bɛɛna aŋka jyek nɔji oona ‘ya bora neeni, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti coki nɔji ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ.
43015023	Ɔci kan mena yookɔn te ‘yayɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ daŋkun yookɔn te Wey ɔɔn.
43015024	Naŋka naŋi ‘ya ma ñomgɛnti neeniyɛ, naŋŋɛ menga oŋgati bɛɛ. ‘Ya te noŋŋa a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, te jyek nɔji ɛkkɛn baawo. Yeti ‘ya yuarka ɛkkɛn, yeti ɛkkɛn yookɔn te ɔɔn yaakkɔ i Wey ɔɔn.
43015025	Yeti waka neeni dɛññin bora ba jyek ganuun ɛkkɛn. Worga ɛkkɛn gɔki agi, ‘Ɛkkɛn yookɔn te ‘ya budan.’
43015026	“Mena Ma Magdɛ mena cuoñña ‘ya ɛkkɛti te Wey ɔɔntiyɛ, ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ mieti ma te jyek ‘ya. Ɛkɛ a Boŋa awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena bɛya te Wey ɔɔnti.
43015027	Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun miettɛ ma te jyek ‘ya acaan ɛkkɛ balkin iki ‘ya te ñamu.
43016001	“‘Ya ɛkkɛ myennin te waka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ bɛɛ.
43016002	Ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ ŋualtɛ ma ɔntɔ te oorga morki ma Juaŋti, ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ noktɛ mako. Ɔci maka noki ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, poŋi gɔki agi nooŋŋa neeni baali ba kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan katan.
43016003	Ɛkkɛn noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn Wey ɔɔn ŋeecɔn bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya daŋkun ŋeecka ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
43016004	’Ya ɛkkɛ myennin te naŋka neeni aŋka ne baaṭi ne naŋka neeni dɛndi borayɛ, ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te jyeka guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni. “‘Ya ɛkkɛ myennin te jyeka neeni wona ikin balkin iki ‘ya aŋka ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te ɛkkɛn ne naŋka neeni dɛndi boray.
43016005	Yeti acca ɛkkɛ myennin acaan ‘ya ootta dɔwwa mena ‘ya cuonnati dɔki. Ɔci menga bala ɛkkɛti wɛnni tootti ‘yati agi ‘ya ootcɔ wɛnɛ bɛɛ.
43016006	Ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yeyɔ te jyeka guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni.
43016007	Yeti ‘ya gɔk awarɛ, ɔci kan ‘ya oottayɛ, pwad pwad ɛkkɛti. Kan ‘ya ootta bɛɛyɛ, Mena Ma Magdɛ bɛya ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Yeti ne ‘ya ooddayɛ, Mena Ma Magdɛ cuoñña ‘ya ɛkkɛti.
43016008	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ maka ṭɛɛrji wɛnni myettɛ te jyek nɔjjo, ɔci te jyek naŋka pwadin, ɔci te jyek godan daŋkun.
43016009	Jyek nɔji bala acaan ɛkkɛn jyeti ‘yati bɛɛ.
43016010	Jyek naŋka pwadin bala acaan ‘ya ootta Wey ɔɔnti ɔci ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ.
43016011	Jyek godan bala acaan ḍuaŋa ṭɛɛrji jyek godan ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ doki.
43016012	“Ɔci ‘ya buaga gɔkka jyeka coŋin jyeka pookɛn ɛkkɛti, yeti ɛkkɛ yaakɛti tieŋdɛ acca bɛɛ.
43016013	Yeti Boŋa awarɛ ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛ laldɛ ɛkɛ te jyeka awarɛ waakɛnda. Acaan ɛkɛ gɔkti te yom ɛkɛ parɛ budan bɛɛ. Waka tieŋdɛ ɛkɛyɛ, aŋka ɛkɛ gɔkti, ɔci ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɛkɛ te waka bɛyay.
43016014	Boŋa awarɛ neeni, ɛkɛ noŋi aŋka ma gɔrti pwani ‘ya bala a ɔki, acaan jyek ‘ya eedɛ ɛkɛ te ‘yati, ɔci ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɛkɛ te jyeka neeni.
43016015	Waka bala Wey ɔɔnti waakɛndayɛ, a wak ‘ya. Acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti agi jyek ‘ya eedɛ ɛkɛ te ‘yati, ɔci ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɛkɛ te jyeka neeni.
43016016	“Ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ, ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ‘wota ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ dɔki.”
43016017	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu gɛɛg bala toyi yɔtin pookɛn gɔki agi, “Jiek jitkɛn guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ikinti neeni bala a ɔki ne ɛkɛ gɔki agi ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ɛkɛ yuarditi ikin bɛɛ, ɔci ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ‘wota ɛkɛ yuarditi ikin moki, ɔci ɛkɛ ootci Wey ɛkkɛntiy?”
43016018	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu gɔki agi, “A gena guagdɛ ɛkɛ agi ‘ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛy?’ Jiek jitkɛn guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda neeni ŋeecin ikin bɛɛ.”
43016019	Çeejɛ Yaccu ma buagɔn tootti ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ toyyɛ yɔtin pookɔ te jyeka guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti ka ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, ɔci moki ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ ‘wota ‘ya yuardata ɛkkɛ dɔkiyɛ?
43016020	Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti awarɛ, ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ wiaktɛ a joon ne ‘ya noktati may, yeti maka ciyi budan te ‘ya ɛkkɛn aŋka yomgɛn ñɔyɔ. Ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi, yeti ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ aŋka yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn dɔki.
43016021	Ɔci kan ɛɛŋ amɛ jiediyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɛ te jiedi kacco. Yeti kan ɛkɛ kaci jieddɛ bora dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñingɛ wierti te pɛñi kacco. Ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn acaan kaci jiennɛ ɛkɛ bora doki.
43016022	Ɔci ba jyek ɛŋa neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ɛkkɛ. Acaan acca ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi, yeti ne ɛkkɛ yuardin ‘ya mokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya a ñɔɔno, ɔci yom ñɔɔn neeni eedɛ menga te ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
43016023	“Ɔci te oŋŋa bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔ ɛkkɛ toottɛ ‘yati te genga moki bɛɛ. Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, kan ɛkkɛ toottɛ Wey ɔɔnti te yenti ‘ya te gengayɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ.
43016024	Ɛkkɛ toonnɛ ɛkɛti te genga te yenti ‘ya men bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ oŋkanda, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
43016025	“‘Ya ɛkkɛ myennin jyeka neeni te jiek jitkɛn bɛɛ, yeti ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya a ɔɔn moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya ɛkkɛ myettin te jyek Wey ɔɔn te jiek jitkɛn woodgɛn.
43016026	Ɔci te oŋŋa bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ toottɛ Wey ɔɔnti te yenti ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya toocca te genga Wey ɔɔnti te ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ.
43016027	Acaan Wey ɔɔn ɛkɛ ani ɛkkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ anɛ ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati doki a 'ya bɛɛn te Wey ɔɔnti.
43016028	’Ya bɛɛn te Wey ɔɔnti, ɔci ‘ya bɛɛn ṭɛɛrji, ɔci acca ‘ya ṭɛɛr daldiyɔ, ɔci ‘ya dɔwwa Wey ɔɔnti.”
43016029	Maka laldɛ Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Pwatcin! Acca i gɔŋni ne pwadan, i gɔŋni te jiek jitkɛn woodgɛn.
43016030	Ɔci acca ŋeejɔn ɔɔn waak waakɛnda ŋeej i, ɔci kan menga tootti iti moki bɛɛyɛ, yɔmjin. Te jyeka neeni ŋeejɔn ɔɔn i bɛɛni te Jwaŋa Tolanti.”
43016031	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Hay! Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ‘yati acca doki? A’a.
43016032	Oŋ bala bɛya ɔci cɔɔllin doki, oŋŋa ɛkkɛ cyɛndi jitin. Ɔci ɛkkɛ menga da ati baanɛti ɔci menga da ati baanɛti, ɔci ‘ya daldata ɛkkɛ paru. Yeti ‘ya baal paru bɛɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn i Wey ɔɔn.
43016033	Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te naŋka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ baltɛ coodi pwani ‘yati. Iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji taab bala ɛkkɛti, yeti dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ yomgɔ tɛɛcin, acaan waka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni buani ‘ya waakɛnda!”
43017001	Ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñorcin ñaalɔ ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Wey ɔɔn, oŋ bɛɛn doki, dala i noŋja aŋka ma gɔrti pwani ‘ya Kaci i, aŋka ‘ya Kaci i noŋja aŋka ma gɔrti pwani i.
43017002	Acaan ‘ya Kaci i ‘wonna i war tɛɛn i, ɔci ‘ya yaakati gɔkca mati iñɔ ṭɛɛrji waakɛnda. Ɔci acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya yaakati maka ‘ya ‘wonna i neeni ‘woñga tɛɛtin baadi ywongati bɛɛ neeni.
43017003	I paru a Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ. Ɔci kan mena i ŋeejɛyɛ, tɛɛtin i bala ɛkɛti, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ. ‘Ya Yaccu Kiṭɔ ‘ya a mena cuonni i, ɔci kan mena ‘ya ŋeejayɛ, tɛɛtin bala ɛkɛti, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
43017004	Kanŋa ‘ya ‘wonna iyɛ, cwamjan ‘ya iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni doki, ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, ma gɔrcin pwani i.
43017005	Wey ɔɔn, ‘ya ne bɛɛda ñaalɔ aŋan iti accayɛ, dala i noŋja aŋka pwani ‘ya bala moki ba naŋka naŋŋi i te baaṭi wona ṭɛɛr men baawi ne ‘ya baala iti meny.
43017006	“‘Ya noŋjan aŋka i ŋeeckiti ma neeni. Ɔci maka neeni, ɛkkɛn a maka ‘ya kɛnna i te iñɔ ṭɛɛrji te maka pookɛnti. Ɛkkɛn a ma i, ɔci acca i ‘ya ‘wonna ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyek i tiiyɛyɔ.
43017007	Ɔci acca ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn waka ‘ya ‘wonna i waakɛnda bɛɛn te iti awarɛ.
43017008	Acaan ‘ya ɛkkɛn ‘woñgan jyeka ‘ya ‘wonna iy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeti jyeka neeni, ɔci ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ‘ya bɛɛn te iti awarɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeti ‘yati acaan ‘ya cuonna i.
43017009	“Ɔci ‘ya cɔk te ɛkkɛn. ‘Ya cɔk te maka ciyi budan te ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya cɔk te maka ‘ya ‘wonna i, acaan ɛkkɛn a ma i.
43017010	Ma ‘ya waakɛnda a ma i, ɔci ma i a ma ‘ya daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ne pwadan aŋka ma gɔrti pwani ‘ya.
43017011	Ɔci acca ‘ya baldi iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji moki bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛn bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni men, ɔci ‘ya bɛɛd iti. Wey ɔɔn, Weya pwadan, maka ‘ya ‘wonna i dala i ɛkkɛn tiyayɔ te yenti i, aŋka ɛkkɛn aga maka ne cyɛɛlɔ bala ba ikin a mena ne cyɛɛlɔ.
43017012	Ne ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛn menyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn tiiñiyɔ te yenti i yenta ‘ya ‘wonna iy, ɔci ɛkkɛn gwali ‘ya, ɔci menga ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl yien bɛɛ. Gena mena pɔy bana maañ ḍyɛmmɛji ɛkɛ aŋka yien parɛy. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, jyeka kiigin dɛññin bora doki.
43017013	Ɔci acca ‘ya bɛɛd iti, ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan waka neeni ne ‘ya baala te iñɔ ṭɛɛrji men, aŋka ma ‘ya ciyi te yoma ñɔyan ba yom ‘ya.
43017014	’Ya ɛkkɛn myetkan jyek i. Ɔci maka ciyi budan te ‘ya yookɔn te ɛkkɛn, acaan maka neeni a maka ṭɛɛrji bɛɛ, bala ba ‘ya daŋkun, acaan ‘ya a mena ṭɛɛrji bɛɛ.
43017015	’Ya tooc iti aŋka i ɛkkɛn eya bora te ṭɛɛrji bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya tooc iti aŋka i yuoc ɛkkɛn te Mena Yaayan iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji.
43017016	Ɛkkɛn bala ba maka ṭɛɛrji ciyi budan te ‘ya neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala ba ‘ya daŋkun.
43017017	Dala i ɛkkɛn kɛbba bora ḍuacca pookɛn aga ma i maka pwadin te jyeka awarɛ, acaan jyek i a jyeka awarɛ.
43017018	’Ya ɛkkɛn cuuñi baan warda bala ba i ‘ya cuonna iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni.
43017019	’Ya waru ‘wonnin i aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔrti ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn ‘wonti i moki, ɔci ciya ba ‘ya ɔɔn te jyek i jyeka awarɛ.
43017020	“‘Ya cɔk te maka neeni pookɛn bɛɛ. ‘Ya cɔk te maka tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛn ne baaṭi ɔci jyeddi ‘yatiy.
43017021	’Ya cɔk te ɛkkɛn waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛn waakɛnda aga maka ne cyɛɛlɔ bala ba ikin yaakkɔ akin mena ne cyɛɛlɔ. I a Wey ɔɔn. Dala maka neeni ɛkkɛn iki ikin aktin yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeettan ma ‘ya cuonna i.
43017022	Ɔci pwanna ‘ya ‘wonna iyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn ‘woñgan daŋkun, ɔci ɛkkɛn aŋi maka ne cyɛɛlɔ ba ikin akin yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔy.
43017023	Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya baal ɛkkɛnti, ɔci i da baal ‘yati, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn aga maka ne cyɛɛlɔ awarɛ. Ɔci ŋeettan ma waakɛnda ‘ya cuonna i, ɔci i an ɛkkɛn bala ba i ne ani ‘yay.
43017024	“Wey ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga maka ‘ya ‘wonna i dala ɛkkɛn bɛya nona ‘ya baala aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔrti pwani ‘ya pwanna ‘ya ‘wonna i te anna ani i ‘ya ne ṭɛɛr men baawi neeniy.
43017025	Wey ɔɔn, Weya pwadan, i ŋeecki maka ciyi budan te ‘ya bɛɛ, yeti i ŋeejin ‘ya, ɔci i ŋeecki maka neeni ‘ya cuonna i.
43017026	’Ya ɛkkɛn nɔɔtkan te i doki, ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛn nɔɔtka ‘wota moki te i, aŋka anna ani i ‘yayɛ, bala ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ‘ya ciy ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti.”
43018001	Ɔci ne Yaccu gɔŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ati i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ. Ɛkkɛn ati Ḍoñi Kidrɔn jyɛdɛji. Jiniina bala aŋan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati kaaccin jiniinaji.
43018002	Ɔci Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti, mena Yaccu ‘wonnɛ ma byeŋkɛntiyɛ, non jiniina ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ, acaan Yaccu ati oŋkanda aŋan i maka laldɛ ɛkɛ.
43018003	Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci ma Pɛriciin Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti ‘woñgi ackan ɔci bɔlin, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati i Yahuuja aŋan jiniinaji eci dyɛkan ɔci yetin ɔci wak ṭwaŋ byeŋkɛnti.
43018004	Yaccu naŋka naŋtan ma ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda doki. Ɔci ɛkɛ ati kookcinti mati, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ menɛ?”
43018005	Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɔɔn lieṭɔn Yaccu men ma Najarɛt.” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gena ‘ya neeni.” Ɔci Yahuuja mena Yaccu ‘wonnɛ ma byeŋkɛnti bala yɔɔd i ɛkkɛn.
43018006	Ne Yaccu gɔŋni ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gena ‘ya neeniyɛ,” ɛkkɛn dwoṭi te ŋotkɛn ɔci ḍɛɛmdin te doŋko.
43018007	Ɔci Yaccu tooccin moki agi, “Ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ menɛ?” Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin agi, “Ɔɔn lieṭɔn Yaccu men ma Najarɛt.”
43018008	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya doki ka gena ‘ya neeni. Kan ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ ‘yayɛ, ‘uaya neeni daldɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ooddi.”
43018009	(Yaccu ne gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu dɛññin bora doki. Jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu agi, “Wey ɔɔn maka ‘ya ‘wonna i menga ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl yien bɛɛ.”)
43018010	Ɔci Butruc balki byeŋgaaran, ɔci ɛkɛ byeŋgaaran dɔnnɛ bora, ɔci men gɛɛl jyɛmmɛ jyeña byerɔn palnɛ bora. Ɔci mena jyeñɛ palnɛ ɛkɛ bora neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena kanŋan i gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil. Ɔci mena neeni yenti Malkac.
43018011	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin Butructi agi, “Byeŋgaaran olja kuorjɛji! ‘Ya motca kubaaya lien kubaaya ‘ya ‘wonnata Wey ɔɔn bɛɛ?”
43018012	Ɔci Yaccu mugɛ ackan iki ḍuaŋa ɛkkɛn ɔci bɔlin ma Icrayiil, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍɛɛgi ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛti.
43018013	Ɔci te ñamu ɛkɛ lwadi eyi ma Anacti. Anac neeni, kaci ɛkɛ a ɛŋ Kayapac. Te ywonna neeni Kayapac a gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil.
43018014	Kayapac neeni, ɛkɛ a mena ma Icrayiil myennɛ agi kan mena ne cyɛɛlɔ tuwa te nɔji ma baan a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
43018015	Ɔci Butruc bootcin Yaccu ŋoyɛti. Ɔci mena parɛ daŋkun mena laldɛ Yaccu gɛɛl bootcin Yaccu ŋoyɛti. Ɔci mena parɛ neeni ŋeejɛ gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil, ɔci ɛkkɛn kaaccin orɔ yaakkɛn i Yaccu kañ on gaciic tolan neeni.
43018016	Yeti Butruc bala yɔɔd te bora on tukɛti. Ɔci mena parɛ mena ŋeejɛ gaciic tolan neeniyɛ, ati gɔkcin ṭɔla kɛɛyi on tukɛ neeniti, ɔci Butruc koonɛ ɛkɛ orɔ.
43018017	Ɔci ṭɔla kɛɛyi on tukɛ neeni gɔkcin Butructi agi, “I a mena laldɛ ‘wana neeni daŋkun bɛɛ?” Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin agi, “A’a, gena ‘ya bɛɛ.”
43018018	Maka noŋi kanŋa ɛkkɛn i bɔlin maañ toñgɛ mulŋinti, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala yɔdi maccu ooyi jwami luy luyo. Ɔci Butruc bala yɔɔd i ɛkkɛn maccu ooyi.
43018019	Ɔci gaciic tolan tooccin Yaccuti te maka laldɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci tooccin ɛkɛti moki te jyeka loṭi ɛkɛ may.
43018020	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya baal gɔk jiek ma ñomgɛnti a lyɛlta oŋkanda. ‘Ya baal lor ma oŋkanda oorga morki ma Juaŋti, ɔci on Juaŋ ona tolan, nona bɛɛti ma Icrayiil ḍworki wyetkɛn waakɛnday. ‘Ya jwali gɛɛl coŋiyɔ oŋgati bɛɛ.
43018021	I tooc ‘yati ogo? Toocca maka tyeŋi jyek ‘ya oŋkanday. Jyeka guagdi ‘ya ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn.”
43018022	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, mena a bɔɔlɔn gɛɛl Yaccu monnɛ ñingɛ jitin te bieŋɛ, ɔci gɔkcin agi, “I gɔk a ɔɔn gaciic tolanti ogo?”
43018023	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan naŋka naŋi ‘ya yaayan bala, dala lwowwa i bora. Yeti kan naŋka yaayan baawyɛ, ɔci kan jyeka guaŋi ‘ya a jyeka awarɛy, oŋ i ‘ya jyɛbda budan ogo?”
43018024	Ɔci Anac Yaccu cuuññɛ Kayapacti byeŋkɛ a ḍɛɛggin ɔɔn. Kayapac neeni ɛkɛ a gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil.
43018025	Ɔci Butruc bala yɔɔd maccu ooyi men, ɔci ma gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a mena laldɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun bɛɛ?” Ɔci ɛkɛ kɛkcin gɔkcin agi, “Gena ‘ya bɛɛ.”
43018026	Mena kanŋan i gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil gɛɛl bala. Ɔci men kanŋa mena parɛ gɛɛl ɛkkɛn i mena jyeñɛ palnɛ ɔntɔ Butrucyɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛna ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci mena neeni gɔkcin Butructi agi, “I yuarŋin ‘ya jiniinaji iki Yaccu bɛɛ?”
43018027	Ɔci Butruc kɛkcin gɔkcin agi, “A’a, gena ‘ya bɛɛ.” Ɔci ɛkɛ ne kɛŋni gɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ne pɛñan tuan wiakcin doki.
43018028	Ɔci Yaccu lwadi ma te on Kayapac eyi lwadi ma ona noŋki ma godan on ḍuaŋa ṭɔɔlɛ yenti Bilaatuc. Ɔci noon aŋi tini wyeñɛ doki. Ɔci ma Icrayiil kaaccin orɔ ona noŋki ma godan bɛɛ, kan ɛkkɛn kaatti orɔ ɛkkɛn yaakinti omdi oomdin te oŋ Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni gena naŋki ma Icrayiil neeni.
43018029	Ɔci Bilaatuc kooyin bora ɛkkɛnti, ɔci tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ tɛkɛ jiek mena neeni ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔki?”
43018030	Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin agi, “Kan ɛkɛ a nɔɔdɔn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ oonɔn ɔɔn iti ogo?”
43018031	Bilaatuc gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkɛ eedɛ ɛkkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ godan ba jyek worga ɛkkɛ pookɔ.” Ɔci ma Icrayiil gɔkcin agi, “A’a, ɔɔn myennɔn akuuma agi naa menga nogdi ma bɛɛ.”
43018032	Te jyeka neeni jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu te lyen ɛkɛ dɛññin bora.
43018033	Ɔci Bilaatuc dɔɔkcin orɔ ona noŋki ma godan dɔki borcin Yaccuti, ɔci tooccin gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a Ciɛggɔn Ma Icrayiil Ciɛggɔn Tolanɛ?”
43018034	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I gɔk te yom i paru? Walla i myetki maka pookɛn?”
43018035	Bilaatuc gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya a men Ma Icrayiil bɛɛ. Ma ɛkkɛ i ‘woñki ‘ya bieŋuti, ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɛkkɛn ‘ya ‘woñka i bieŋuti daŋkun. I noŋŋi gena?”
43018036	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya te aga ḍuaŋa tolan maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, te ma ‘ya noowɔ i mako. Ɔci te ‘ya ‘wonna menga ma Icrayiil byeŋkɛnti bɛɛ. Yeti cyɛgji ‘ya a cyɛgja iñɔ wɛnni bɛɛ.”
43018037	Bilaatuc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a Ciɛggɔn Tolanɛ?” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I gɔk awarɛ, ‘ya a Ciɛggɔn Tolan. Acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, aŋka ‘ya jietkati ma neeni. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya bɛɛn ṭɛɛrji ɔci miet ma te jyeka awarɛ. Maka ani jyeka awarɛ ɛkkɛn pwan ‘ya ŋeecɔn waakɛnda.”
43018038	Bilaatuc tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “A gena a jyeka awarɛy?” Ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ kaaccin bora ma Icrayiilti moki, ɔci ɛkkɛn myennɛ agi, “Gena yaayan gɛɛl yuarŋ ‘ya ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
43018039	Yeti naŋki ɛkkɛ bala yuonginda, ɔci ne Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋ baaliyɛ, mena bala ciginji gɛɛl pɔktɛ doki. Ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya Ciɛggɔn Ma Icrayiil Ciɛggɔn Tolan pɔkka?”
43018040	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaajjin ne pɛñan kɛkcin agi, “Mena neeni bɛɛ. Baraabac aŋka pɔkka!” Ɔci Baraabac neeni ɛkɛ a ɛɛno.
43019001	Ɔci Bilaatuc Yaccu dalnɛ ḍwayi ma.
43019002	Ɔci kuwi paari ackan naŋi a til ɔci ḍuacci Yaccu wyeñɛti. Ɔci bworŋ cyɛgji bworŋa wiɛlɛ pɛñan a buol ‘yɛɛŋji ɛkkɛn Yaccuti.
43019003	Ɔci ma ɔga ɛkɛti ɔci gɔkti agi, “Dala i ciy yuonginda, Ciɛggɔn Ma Icrayiil Ciɛggɔn Tolan!” Ɛkkɛn ooddi ɛkɛti gɔ ɛkɛ jyɛpin moki ɔɔn.
43019004	Ɔci Bilaatuc kaaccin bora ma Icrayiilti moki, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ owwa bora ɛkkɛti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ gena yaayan gɛɛl yuarŋ ‘ya ɛkɛti bɛɛ.”
43019005	Ɔci Yaccu kooyin bora ɔci bala ɛŋi tila kuwi neeni wyeñɛti, ɔci bworŋa buolo. Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin mati agi, “Gɔrtɛ ‘wana wanna.”
43019006	Ɔci ne Yaccu yuarkiti gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiilyɛ, ɔci ne yuarkiti bɔlin mokiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaadan ne tolan ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Dala ɛkɛ ŋaabdɛ, dala ɛkɛ ŋaabdɛ!” Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkɛ eedɛ ɛkkɛ ŋaabdɛ pookɔ. Gena yaayan gɛɛl yuarŋ ‘ya ɛkɛti bɛɛ.”
43019007	Ma Icrayiil gɔkcin agi, “Jyek ganuun ɔɔn bala, ɔci dala ɛkɛ tuwa ba naŋki jyek ɔɔn neeni acaan ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkɛ agji Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan.”
43019008	Ɔci Bilaatuc ɛkɛ ne tieŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ buayi ne pɛñan.
43019009	Ɛkɛ kaaccin orɔ on godan moki, ɔci gɔkcin Yaccuti agi, “I bɛɛni te aŋɛ?” Ɔci Yaccu yeti gɔkcin genga ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
43019010	Ɔci Bilaatuc tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “I gɔkka ‘yati bɛɛ? Kwoy i, kan ‘ya buaga i pɔktinyɛ, ‘ya yaakati, ɔci kan ‘ya buaga i ŋaaptin ñaalɔyɛ, ‘ya yaakati i ŋaabdin?”
43019011	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Te Jwaŋa Tolan ñaalɔ kɛŋniyɛ, i te yaakiti noŋ genga ‘yati bɛɛ. Acaan ba naŋka neeni mena ‘ya ‘wonna i bieŋuti neeni, nɔji ɛkɛ tol tol te nɔji i. Nɔji i buannɛ nɔji ɛkɛ.”
43019012	Ɔci te naŋka neeni Bilaatuc noŋi Yaccu pɔktɛ. Yeti ma Icrayiil yaajjin gɔkcin agi, “Kan i mena neeni pɔktiyɛ, i a mug Kɛɛcarn ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm moki bɛɛ. Kan menga noŋi aga ba ḍuaŋa tolan te yom ɛkɛ parɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ba ne ɛkɛ yookiti te jyek Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolany.”
43019013	Ɔci ne Bilaatuc tieŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ Yaccu koonɛ bora ɔci ɛkɛ cooccin te kaakci godan nona yenti Acmɛɛnti, (te tuk ma Icrayiil ma boṭi agi, “Gabbata”).
43019014	Oŋŋa neeni a Oŋŋa Yɔŋki Ma Wak Iid. Iid neeni bartan ma a Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋo. Ɔci oŋ waŋɛ noŋi yɔɔtti yeccu. Bilaatuc gɔkcin ma Icrayiilti agi, “Gɔrtɛ ‘wana a ḍuaŋa ɛkkɛ ḍuaŋa tolan wan.”
43019015	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaajjin ne tolan gɔkcin agi, “Eedɛ ɔntɔ! Eedɛ ɔntɔ! Çaaptɛ ñaalɔ, Nogdɛ!” Ɔci Bilaatuc tooccin gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya ḍuaŋa ɛkkɛ ḍuaŋa tolan ŋaabdɔ?” Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil gɔkcin agi, “Ḍuaŋa ɔɔn ḍuaŋa tolan a cyɛɛlɔ budan. Gena Kɛɛcar ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm.”
43019016	Ɔci ma ‘wonnɛ Bilaatuc Yaccu byeŋkɛnti aŋka eetan ŋaaptan ñaalɔ.
43019017	Ɔci ɛkkɛn Yaccu eyi, ɔci Yaccu bala kɛṭi kakan ŋoopki ma ɛkɛ parɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati bora nona poma yenti “Oon Men Baan Wyeñɛti.” (Te tuk ma Icrayiil poma neeni yenti “Gɔlgata”.)
43019018	Ɔci Yaccu ŋaapci ma ñaalɔ aŋan poomti, ɛkɛ iki maka ɛyi ne yyɛɛwɔ, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ te byeŋa aamo, ɔci mena ne cyɛɛlɔ te byeŋa byerɔn, Yaccu yuukci yeccu.
43019019	Ɔci Bilaatuc kiejin jiek ḍuannɛ ɛkɛ ñaalɔ kakanti. Ɔci jyeka neeni gɔki agi, “YACCU MEN NAJARƐT, ƐKƐ A CIƐGGƆN TOLAN CIƐGGƆN MA YAHUUD.”
43019020	Maka coŋin ma Icrayiil pokcin jwalla neeni acaan nona ŋoopki ma Yaccu ñaalɔ bala baan ŋoyɛti cwakanti aŋan. Ɔci jiek bala te tugga ne ḍoogɔ, gena tuk ma Icrayiil, ɔci tuk ma Ḍɔɔm, ɔci tuk ma Giriik.
43019021	Gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil gɔkcin Bilaatucti agi, “Naa i te kienni agi ‘Ciɛggɔn Tolan Ciɛggɔn Ma Icrayiil’ bɛɛ. Dala i kiejja jiek agi, ‘Yaccu gɔki agi ɛkɛ agji Ciɛggɔn Tolan Ciɛggɔn Ma Icrayiil’.”
43019022	Yeti Bilaatuc kɛkcin gɔkcin agi, “Gena kiin ‘yayɛ, kiin ‘ya doki, bawwin.”
43019023	Ɔci ne ackan ne ŋaanɔ neeni Yaccu ŋaapkitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bworŋin Yaccu cieñi jitin, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda mena ne cyɛɛlɔ da eci, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ da eci. Yeti bworŋa beyan pɔya ṭuorkiti ma bala bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ eyi ma a een te ñaalɔ eyi ma ne iñɔ.
43019024	Ɔci ackan gɔgjin pookɛn agi, “Naa bworŋa neeni jietin jitin bɛɛ. Dala ikin oomtin kɔla. Kan mena ikin amtinyɛ, bworŋ eedɛ ɛkɛ doki te naŋka neeni.” Te naŋka neeni jyeka kiigin dɛññin bora. Worga gɔki agi, “Bworŋin ‘ya cieñi ma jitin ɔci eyi ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn oomjin kɔla te bworŋ ‘ya bworŋa beyan.”
43019025	Ɔci ba naŋka neeni naŋi ackan Yaccuti doki. Ɔci ma bala yɔdi kakan taaŋɛti ne cwakanti, gena mɛy Yaccun, ɔci kow mɛy Yaccun Moryam ɛŋ Klɔpac, ɔci Moryam Magdalin.
43019026	Ɔci Yaccu ne gɔrni mɛy ɛkkɛn iki mena laldɛ ɛkɛ mena ani Yaccuyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin mɛɛgɛnti agi, “Mɛy ɔɔn, gɔrca kaci i mena i gwaldiy.”
43019027	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin mena laldɛ ɛkɛti agi, “Gɔrca mɛy ɛkkɛ.” Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, mena laldɛ Yaccu mɛy Yaccun eññɛ ɛkɛ ban ɛkkɛn.
43019028	Ɔci ne jyeka neeni baakiyɛ, ŋeejɛ Yaccu naŋki waakɛnda bawwin doki, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya ama yiɛno.” A ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka kiigin dɛññin bora doki.
43019029	“Ɔci kuura pyega cyɛyan bala yɔɔd aŋan. Ɔci liipa umji ma jaan tukɛti ɔci lakci ma ñaalɔ olji ma Yaccu tukɛti.”
43019030	Ɔci ne Yaccu ‘woñkiti ma pyega cyɛyan neeni, ɔci ne ɛkɛ dɛnniyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Bawwin doki.” Ɔci ɛkɛ tuuni.
43019031	Oŋŋa wanna a Oŋŋa Yɔŋki Ma Wak Iid. Ɔci ma Icrayiil buagɔn magga ŋaabi ñaalɔ te Oŋ Cabit bɛɛ, acaan Oŋ Cabit a oŋŋa pwadan ne tolan ma ɛkkɛntiy, ɔci ma Icrayiil ati Bilaatucti tooccin ɛkɛti gɔkcin agi, “Dala ma tɛrkɛn lɛɛktan ma ɔntɔ aŋka ɛkkɛn tuwa lakun ne pɛñan, ɔci ma waakɛn gwottan ma iñɔ.”
43019032	Ɔci ackan ati mena ŋaapci ma Yaccu taaŋɛti tɛrkɛ lɛɛkci ma ɔntɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati mena Yaccu taaŋŋa parɛti ɔci tɛrkɛ lɛɛkci ɔntɔ daŋkun.
43019033	Yeti ne ɛkkɛn bɛɛki Yaccutiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔrcin Yaccuti, ɔci Yaccu mɔkci tuun doki, ɔci tɛrk ɛkɛ lɛɛkci ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
43019034	Yeti ackan gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ Yaccu dɔŋŋɛ gwonnɛti te ṭwaŋo. Ɔci ne pɛñan yimg mɔṭṭin ɔci piego.
43019035	Ɔci ‘ya mena naŋka neeni yuarŋɛ neeniyɛ, ‘ya ma myetkan te naŋka neeni, ɔci jyeka myetkan ‘ya ma neeni a jyeka awarɛ. Ɔci ŋeej ‘ya jyeka myetkan ‘ya ma neeni a jyeka awarɛ. ‘Ya jiek mieddan bora aŋka ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ daŋkun.
43019036	Te naŋka neeni jyeka kiigin dɛññin bora. Worga gɔki agi, “Oon ɛkɛ gɛɛl lɛgdɛ menga jitin bɛɛ.”
43019037	Jwalla kiigɔn jwalla parɛ moki gɔki agi, “Ma gɔrti mena dɔɔgi ɛkkɛny.”
43019038	Ɔci Yuocip, ɛkɛ a men ban Ɛrimatiiya, (ɛkɛ a mena bootcin Yaccuti lieda ɔɔn, acaan ɛkɛ buayi ma Icrayiil te jieko). Ɔci Yuocip neeni ati Bilaatucti, ɔci tooccin ɛkɛti te war Yaccu acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn Yaccu jogdɛ ne pɛñan wona men Oŋ Cabit bɛɛni bɛɛy. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “‘Ya buaga war Yaccu eedo.” Ɔci Bilaatuc gɔkcin Yuocipti agi, “Ɔgdi ootta, eya.” Ɔci Yuocip ati, ɔci war Yaccu eññɛ.
43019039	Ɔci Nikɔdiimac, mena bɛɛn Yaccuti te ñamu te weenji, ɛkɛ ati eccin eelan a ḍuobji ne yyɛɛwɔ ñaaŋŋɛyɔ yaakkɛn ɔci lammiyɔ. Eelan ne cyɛɛlɔ a eelan cyɛyan, ɔci ɛka parɛ yenti aalɔ. Eelan a ḍuobji oonɛ ɛkɛ neeni gena kierki ma waak tuggɛ a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ (100).
43019040	Ɔci war Yaccu eyi ma, ɔci cuogi eelan a ḍuobji, ɔci paari ma te bworŋ bala ba naŋka jokki ma Icrayiil maka tuway.
43019041	Ɔci nona ŋoopki ma Yaccu jiniina bala cualcinti. Ɔci kola wari ma woonɛ bala jiniinaji. Menga jokci ma oŋgati kola neeniti bɛɛ.
43019042	Oŋŋa neeni a Oŋŋa Yɔŋki Ma Icrayiil Wak Iid. Ɔci kool bala cualcin, ɔci Yaccu olji ma koolji.
43020001	Ɔci te liidi parɛ te tinnɔ ne Oŋ Cabit noŋi bɛɛdi bora, ɔci ne Oŋ Juaŋ cɔɔlniyɛ, Moryam Magdalin bɛɛn koolji. Ɛkɛ gɔrcin koolo, ɔci kool tukɛ a pɔggɔn doki. Guonan ñiinnɛ menga ɔntɔ doki.
43020002	Ɔci Moryam yiŋi Butructi ɔci mena laldɛ Yaccu mena parɛ mena ani Yaccu ne tolanti daŋkun. Ɔci Moryam gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ciɛggɔn owwi ma bora te koolji, ɔci nona ɛkɛ eekiti niinkiti ŋeejɔn ɔɔn bɛɛ!”
43020003	Ɔci Butruc kooyin bora te baanji yaakkɛn i mena parɛ, mena laldɛ Yaccuy.
43020004	Ɛkkɛn bala yooŋdi koolji yaakkɛn, ɔci mena parɛ neeni, ɛkɛ yiŋi ne pɛñan te Butruc, ɔci ɛkɛ dɛñjin koolji ñamu.
43020005	Ɔci ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin liercin jiju ɔci gɔrcin bworŋin bala niin pookɛn. Yeti ɛkɛ kaaccin jiju bɛɛ.
43020006	Ɔci Butruc dɛñjin ne ŋoyɔ daŋkun, ɔci ɛkɛ kaaccin jiju koolji, ɔci gɔrcin bworŋin bala niin iñɔ.
43020007	Bworŋa bala Yaccu wyeñɛti, ɔci bworŋa poorki ma Yaccu warɛ, ɛkkɛn bala niin nona ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. Bworŋa ɛkɛ wyeñɛti bala niin te nona parɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala niin a mɔggɔn.
43020008	Ɔci mena dɛñjin ñamu neeni, ɛkɛ kaaccin koolji daŋkun. Ɛkɛ gɔrcin ɔci jyetti.
43020009	Te ñamu jyeka kiigin kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn ne worga gɔki agi Yaccu jɔldi ñaalɔ mokiy.
43020010	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu neeniyɛ, dɔɔkkin baanji.
43020011	Ɔci Moryam Magdalin bala yɔɔd wiak kool tukɛti. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali wiagi menyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍwoñjin iñɔ liercin koolji.
43020012	Ɔci ɛkɛ malɛɛkan ne yyɛɛwɔ yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ koolji. Ɛka ne cyɛɛlɔ bala ciyi nona Yaccu wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛka parɛ bala ciyi nona Yaccu ciegɛti, yeti Yaccu bala bɛɛ.
43020013	Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛŋo, i wiak ogo?” Ɔci Moryam gɔkcin agi, “Ciɛggɔn ‘ya baaw eyi ma ɔntɔ, ɔci nona eekiti niinkiti ma ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ.”
43020014	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ yallɛ ɔci gɔrcin ŋoyɛti ɔci Yaccu yuarnɛ, yeti ɛkɛ Yaccu ñiññɛ bɛɛ.
43020015	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛŋo, i wiak ogo? I lier menɛ?” Moryam bala poŋi gɔki agi gena mena kɛɛyi jiniina neeni, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan i war Yaccu eññi ɔntɔyɛ, dala i ‘ya myetta nona i ɛkɛ ḍuanni, aŋka ‘ya ootta ɛkɛ eedo.”
43020016	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Moryam.” Ɔci Moryam warɛ yallɛ ɔci gɔkcin ɛkɛti te tuk ma Icrayiil agi, “Rabbi.” (Rabbi te tuk Mabaan agi “Mena loṭi may.”)
43020017	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Naa topca ‘yati bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya ati ñaalɔ Wey ɔɔnti men bɛɛ. Yeti ɔgdi ootta modg ɔɔn myetka ‘ya ootta ñaalɔ Wey ɔɔnti ɔci Wey ɛkkɛnti, ‘ya ootta Jwaŋ ‘yati ɔci Jwaŋ ɛkkɛnti.”
43020018	Moryam Magdalin ati maka laldɛ Yaccu myennɛ agi, “‘Ya Yaccu yuarŋo!” Ɔci ɛkkɛn myennɛ daŋkun te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Yaccu ɛkɛti.
43020019	Ɔci te Oŋ Jwaŋa neeni ne oŋ unniyɛ, maka laldɛ Yaccu wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ orɔ waakɛnda. Ɔci ‘yegin tuggɛn uuli acaan ɛkkɛn buayi ma Icrayiil. Ɔci Yaccu kaaccin ɛkkɛnti orɔ, ɔci yɔɔtcin yeccu ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti, ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Dala coodi pwani bala ɛkkɛti.”
43020020	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ma lɛɛrnɛ kolk mucmaarin byeŋkɛti ɔci ṭwaŋ tukɛ ɛkɛ gwonnɛti. Maka laldɛ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
43020021	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti moki agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ coodɛ te pwanno. ‘Ya ɛkkɛ cundin bala ba ne ‘ya cuonnata Wey ɔɔny.”
43020022	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ma kuonnɛ booŋo, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Antɛ Boŋ Juaŋo.
43020023	Kan ɛkkɛ ma bɔɔktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɔɔktɛ Juaŋ a warɛ. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ ma bɔɔktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn da bɔɔktɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ.”
43020024	Tɔmac (mena bartan ma a Yuongɔn) ɛkɛ a Mena akki Ma Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔy. Ɔci ne Yaccu bɛɛni matiyɛ, ɛkɛ baawo.
43020025	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu maka pookɛn neeni Tɔmac myetki gɔkcin agi, “Ɔɔn Ciɛggɔn yuarŋɔn!” Yeti Tɔmac gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kan ‘ya gɔrca kolk mucmaarin Yaccu byeŋkɛti bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ‘ya topca kola Yaccu dɔɔkkiti ma gwonnɛti bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya jyedda bɛɛ.”
43020026	Ɔci te Oŋ Jwaŋa parɛ moki maka laldɛ Yaccu bala orɔ moki, ɔci Tɔmac bala i ɛkkɛn. Ɔci ‘yegin tuggɛn a uulgin, yeti Yaccu kooyin orɔ yɔɔtcin yeccu ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti, ɔci gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ coodɛ te pwanno.”
43020027	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Tɔmacti agi, “Bieŋu olja wɛnni, ɔci gɔrca byeŋki ‘ya, ɔci bieŋu olja topca ‘ya gwonnuti. Naa i tiek jiek bɛɛ. Dala i jyedda ‘yati!”
43020028	Ɔci Tɔmac gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn ‘ya! Jwaŋ ‘ya!”
43020029	Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya yuarŋa i aŋka i jyetti ‘yati nɛ? Maka jyeddi ‘yati ne ɛkkɛn ‘ya yuarka bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne ɛkkɛn ‘ya kuolka ñin ɔɔn!”
43020030	Naŋka tɛyan naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu maka laldɛ ɛkɛ ñomgɛnti naŋŋɛ coŋɔ. Naŋka neeni a naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ. Ɔci naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka tɛyan naŋka coŋin naŋka pookɛn gɛɛg bala daŋkun, ɛkkɛn kiiwɛ ma worga neeniti bɛɛ.
43020031	Yeti jyeka bala kiiwɛ ma worga neenitiyɛ, bala aŋka ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ Yaccu neeni ɛkɛ a Kiṭɔ a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ te yenti ɛkɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci tɛɛtin bala ɛkkɛti.
43021001	Ɔci ne naŋka neeni baakiyɛ, Yaccu warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora moki maka laldɛ ɛkɛti Galŋ Jaliil ḍwaŋɛti. (Ɔci galŋ yenta parɛ moki yenti “Taybiiryac”.)
43021002	Maka laldɛ Yaccu bala nona ne cyɛɛlɔ. Gena Butruc, ɔci Tɔmac mena bartan ma a Yuongɔn, ɔci Nataanyal mena bɛɛn te ban Kɛna ban Jaliilji, ɔci kɛɛgin Jɛbadi, ɔci maka ‘uay bala ne yyɛɛwɔ moki.
43021003	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Ya ootta wyec yako.” Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin Butructi agi, “Ikin oottin iki ɔɔn.” Ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ɔci kaaccin murkaji, yeti te ween jiñɛ neeni ɛkkɛn mwoki yeñi gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ.
43021004	Ɔci ne noon bɔɔniyɛ, Yaccu bala yɔɔd galŋ ḍwaŋɛti, yeti kwoyɔn maka laldɛ ɛkɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi agi gena Yaccu yɔɔd wanna bɛɛ.
43021005	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Kɛɛgin ‘ya, yak bala?” Ɛkkɛn gɔkcin agi, “A’a, baawo.”
43021006	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti moki agi, “Mali yiɛptɛ murka taaŋŋa byerɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ acca.” Ɔci ɛkkɛn mali yiɛpcɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti mali ootan bora te pietin moki bɛɛ, acaan yak bala jiju coŋɔ.
43021007	Mena ani Yaccu gɔkcin Butructi agi, “Gena Ciɛggɔn!” Bworŋin Butruc bala niin ɔntɔ te kanŋa, ɔci ne ɛkɛ tieŋni agi gena Ciɛggɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ bworŋin ‘yɛɛŋnɛ, ɔci kaaccin iñɔ galŋji ati Yaccuti.
43021008	Ɔci maka laldɛ Yaccu maka pookɛn bɛɛn te murka, bɛɛn wɔɔci mali acaan mali kuumi te yako. Šɛɛr jiñɛ looncin ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ, bala ba mitarn jitkɛn a miyya ne cyɛɛlɔ (100).
43021009	Ne ɛkkɛn kaacki bora ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, mañ mulŋin yuarɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci yak bala maccu ɔci byedg bala daŋkun.
43021010	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Yaka muoŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ acca gɛɛg oodɛ.”
43021011	Ɔci Butruc kaaccin murkaji ɔci mali wuannɛ ɛkɛ bora ṭɛɛrji kuumi te yaka ḍwaŋin a miyya ɔci ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne ḍoogɔ (153). Yeti yaka coŋin neeni mali ɛɛri jitin bɛɛ.
43021012	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Bɛɛdɛ, omdɛ.” Ɔci ma tooccin ɛkɛti agi ɛkɛ a menɛ bɛɛ, acaan ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn gena ɛkɛ Ciɛggɔn.
43021013	Ɔci Yaccu bɛɛn ɔci byedg wɛɛnnɛ ma jitkɛn, ɔci ‘wonnɛ ma, ɔci yaka ‘yɛggin daŋkun naŋŋɛ a ɔɔn.
43021014	Ɔci te oŋŋa Yaccu jɔŋni ñaalɔ te lienti tɛɛti moki, ɔci ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ baali galŋ ḍwaŋɛti ɔɔnyɛ, Yaccu warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora, oŋki aŋi ne ḍoogɔ doki.
43021015	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn omki ne ḍookkiyɛ, Yaccu gɔkcin Butructi agi, “Butruc kaci Yɔhanna, i an ‘ya ne tolan te waka neeni boki?” Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛ, Ciɛggɔn, ŋeej i ‘ya an i.” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kulin ṭɔlgɛn ‘ya oomga tuggɛnti.”
43021016	Yaccu gɔkcin moki agi, “Butruc kaci Yɔhanna, i an ‘ya?” Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Ɛɛ, Ciɛggɔn, ŋeej i ‘ya an i.” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Waŋu tiicca kulin ‘yati.”
43021017	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti te oŋŋa akki ne ḍoogɔ agi, “Butruc, kaci Yɔhanna, i an ‘ya?” Ɔci Butruc yomɛ yaañi acaan Yaccu tooccin ɛkɛti oŋki ne ḍoogɔ agi, “I an ‘ya?” Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin agi, “Ciɛggɔn, waak waakɛnda ŋeej i, ɔci ŋeej i ‘ya an i.” Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kulin ‘ya oomga tuggɛnti.
43021018	Tieŋŋa, ‘ya gɔkka iti awarɛ, wonta i men ḍiɛri i ɛɛŋja bworŋin ɔci at te yom i, yeti ne i agdi daanyɛ, i byeŋku miɛtca bora, ɔci mena parɛ i ḍɛgdi, ɔci i eeti ma nona i buagiti bɛɛ.”
43021019	(Ne Yaccu gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ Butruc myennɛ lyen ɛkɛ a myetkin. Ɔci te lyen ɛkɛ ma gɔrti pwani Jwaŋa Tolan.) Ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin Butructi agi, “Bootta ‘yati.”
43021020	Ɔci Butruc warɛ yallɛ, ɔci mena ani Yaccu yuarnɛ ɛkɛ bala bootti ɛkkɛn ŋotkɛnti. Mena neeni a mena ciyi Yaccu taaŋɛti iidtiy. Ɔci gena ɛkɛ tooci gɔki agi, “Ciɛggɔn, mena i ‘wondi ma byeŋkɛnti a menɛ?”
43021021	Ɔci Butruc ne mena neeni yuarnɛyɛ, ɛkɛ tooccin Yaccuti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, oŋ mena nɛ?”
43021022	Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Kan ‘ya buaga ɛkɛ ciya wɛnni ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɔɔnyɛ, gena jyek i bɛɛ. Dala i bɛɛd bootta ‘yati.”
43021023	Ɔci jiek ati modgɛnti waakɛnda, ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi mena laldɛ Yaccu neeni tuudɔ bɛɛ. Yeti Yaccu gɔkcin a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Yaccu gɔkcin agi, “Kan ‘ya buaga ɛkɛ ciya wɛnni ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɔɔnyɛ, gena jyek i bɛɛ.”
43021024	’Ya mena laldɛ Yaccuyɛ, gena ‘ya a mena mieti jyeka neeniy. Ɔci jyeka neeni kiin ‘ya. Ɔci ŋeecɔn ikin jyeka neeni a jyeka awarɛ.
43021025	Naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu naŋka coŋin, naŋka pookɛn bala daŋkun. Ɔci kan jyek naŋki Yaccu kiitan ma worganji waakɛndayɛ, baan warda yaakinti worgan eedɛ bɛɛ, noon kuma warda.
44001001	Tiyɔɔpiloc, worga parɛti ‘ya kiewan iti te jyeka loṭi Yaccu ma, ɔci te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda te oŋŋa ɛkɛ jɔɔnni,
44001002	ɔci ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ atti ñaalɔ ɔɔn. Yeti ne Yaccu atti ñaalɔ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ maka muonɛ ɛkɛ bora naŋŋɛ a Cuudan ɛkɛ te baaṭi neeni myennɛ te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛny.
44001003	Ne Yaccu tuuni ɔci ne ɛkɛ jɔlni ñaalɔ dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Cuudanti oŋki kɔɔna kɔɔni pɔyi jitkɛn ne coŋɔn aŋka ŋeettan ma ɛkɛ bala tɛɛti awarɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ cien iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni nink a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (40), ɔci ne ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛrni ma a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn myennɛ te jyek cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolan.
44001004	Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti ne ɛkkɛn balki cieki i ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn myennɛ ɛkɛ agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ kaattɛ bora te ban Urcaliimji wɛnni bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ kɛɛddɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan mena guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi bɛɛdɔy. Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba jwalla guaŋi ‘ya ɛkkɛti te ñamu agi,
44001005	bala ba Yɔhanna ne baali buoṭi ma te pieg te baaṭiyɛ, ɔci ne cwakanti daŋkun ɛkkɛ buldɛ Boŋ Juaŋo.”
44001006	Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti ne Cuudan wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlkiti Yaccutiyɛ, ɛkkɛn tooccin ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn, i noŋ cyɛgji ma Icrayiil dɔwwa ɛkkɛnti te oŋŋɔ?”
44001007	Ɔci Yaccu gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Jyek oŋki naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, a jyek ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, gena jyek Wey ɔɔn. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ aŋka jyek ninka neeni ŋeejɛy.
44001008	Ɔci ne Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdi ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti eedɛ war tɛɛn te ɛkɛti oŋo. Ɔci ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka mieti ma te jyek ‘ya ban Urcaliim, ɔci ban Yahuudiya warda, ɔci ban Camɛɛrya warda, ɔci bonk jitkɛn waakɛnda baan warda.”
44001009	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ eññɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñaalɔ, ɔci pɔli bɛɛn kookkinti ɛkɛti ɔci ɛkɛ kuommɛ ñino. Ɔci ɛkɛ yuarcɛ ma moki bɛɛ.
44001010	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali atiyɛ, ma bala yɔdi ñoṭi ɛkɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki yɔtki ñorki menyɛ, ne pɛñan maka ‘uay gɛɛg bɛɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ yɔɔtcin ɛkkɛn toŋkɛnti bworŋin ɛkkɛn bɔɔna bɔɔno.
44001011	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Uay ma Jaliil, ɛkkɛ yɔdgɛ ñoṭɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji a ɔɔn ogo? Yaccu mena luoṭi te ɛkkɛti acca neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ dɔɔkti moki ba wona yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ atti ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni ɔɔn.”
44001012	Ne Yaccu eññɛ Juaŋ pɔliji te Pom Jɛtuun wyeñɛti dokiyɛ, Cuudan ɛkɛ kooyin iñɔ te Pom Jɛtuun wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati dɔɔki ban Urcaliimji. Ban Urcaliim looncin bɛɛ, cual cwalo.
44001013	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn dɛñki baanjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ati kaaccin on kona ñaalɔ ona cieki ɛkkɛny. Gena Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna, ɔci Yaakub ɔci Andarawuc, ɔci Pilibuc ɔci Tɔmac, ɔci Bartɔɔlamawuc ɔci Matta, ɔci Yaakub kaci Alpyac ɔci Cimaan men Maka yomgɛn myɛlin, ɔci Yahuuja kaci Yaakub.
44001014	Maka neeni bala cɔki a cɔŋi oŋkanda. Ɔci maka moong bala cɔki i ɛkkɛn. Moryam mɛy Yaccun bala nona cɔkki ma daŋkun, ɔci modg Yaccun bala daŋkun.
44001015	Oŋ gɛɛlti ma wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ ne coŋɔn, bala ba miyya ɔci men baan ne cyɛɛlɔ (120). Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, Butruc jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ ma ñomgɛnti ɔci gɔkcin agi,
44001016	“Modg ɔɔn, jyeka bɛɛn Yahuuja Ickɛɛryutiti acca neeni bɛɛn a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn guagɛ ma te baaṭi doki agi bɛɛdɔ ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te tuk Daawud te baaṭi, ne ɛkɛ gɔki te jyek Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti mena wɛɛñi maka ooddi mwoki Yaccuy.
44001017	Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti ɛkɛ muonɛ Yaccu bora a men ikin te ñamu, ɔci ɛkɛ bala noŋin kanŋa iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ.”
44001018	(Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti neeni ɛkɛ noon wiɛllɛ te bilka ɛkɛ ‘woñkiti ma te labji ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍɛmmin iñɔ nona wannati wyeñɛ ṭiɛŋnɛ iñɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ nuottin jitin, ɔci ‘yeeng ɛkɛ bɛɛn bora waakɛnda.
44001019	Ɔci jyek lyen Yahuuja neeni ati ban Urcaliim konɛti warda. Ɔci nona neeni ɛkkɛn boṭi agi Akɛɛldama. Akɛɛldama te tuk Mabaan ma boṭi agi, “Non Yimgo.”)
44001020	“Acaan jyeka kiigin worga Ɔɔlg Daawudji gɔki agi, ‘Dala non ɛkɛ nina budan ɔɔn. Naa magga cootti aŋan bɛɛ.’ Ɔci moki agi, ‘Dala kanŋa ɛkɛ mugdɛ mena parɛ.’
44001021	“Ɔci acca dala ikin mena parɛ gɛɛl muotin bora te maka balkin iki ikin te ñamu ne Yaccu balkin iki ikin meny.
44001022	Mena neeniyɛ, dala aga mena balkin iki ikin te ñamu te oŋŋa Yaccu buulli Yɔhanna ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ luoṭṭi ñaalɔ ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ muotin bora aŋka ikin ma nɔɔttin iki ɛkɛ agi Yaccu jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki.”
44001023	Ɔci ɛkkɛn maka ‘uay kɛññɛ bora ne yyɛɛwɔ aŋka ɛkkɛn muodi men gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ te maka neeniti, mena ne cyɛɛlɔ yenti Yuocip. Yeng ɛkɛ yenga pookɛnyɛ, ma boṭi agi Barcaaboc ɔci Jactac. Ɔci ‘wana parɛ yenti Mataayac.
44001024	Ɔci ma cɔkcin Juaŋti ɔci gɔkcin agi, “I ciɛggɔn, yomg ma baan waakɛnda ŋeej i. Ɔɔn myettɔn mena i buagi cuoñña kandin iki ɔɔn a cyɛɛlɔ te maka ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniti.
44001025	Dala ɛkɛ kanŋa Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti kanŋa cuuda mugdɛ, acaan Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti kanŋa ɛkɛ dalnɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ jyetcin ɔntɔ ati nona ɛkɛ buagɛtiy.”
44001026	Ɔci ɛkkɛn oomjin kɔla aŋka kɔla ɛkkɛn myettɛ mena muktan ɛkkɛn oltan non Yahuuja Ickɛɛryutitiy, ɔci ɛkkɛn myennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te kɔla, agi dala ɛkki Mataayac oldɛ non Yahuuja Ickɛɛryuti. Ɔci Mataayac warɛ ñaaŋnɛti Cuudan Yaccuti, ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi mena akki Ma Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn aŋi Cuudan Yaccu waakɛnda.
44002001	Ɔci ne Iid Nink A Ma Baan Ne Yyɛɛwɔ Mena Parɛ Byeŋkɛ (50) bɛɛniyɛ, Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda bala nona ne cyɛɛlɔ.
44002002	Ɔci joon bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji bala ba joon jwamma tolan ɔɔn. Ɔci ona cieki ɛkkɛn neeni jiñɛ kuumi te joona neeni.
44002003	Ɔci ma gɔrcin ɔci gen gɛɛl bɛɛn ba maañ ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ kɛɛmmɛ jitin ɔci cooccin ma wyetkɛnti waakɛnda.
44002004	Ɔci ɛkkɛn kuomnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan yomgɛnti te Boŋ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔki te tugi maka pookɛn ba bolja ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Boŋ Juaŋ war tɛɛny.
44002005	Ɔci ma Icrayiil maka moṭi Juaŋti maka bɛɛn te bonka pookɛnti waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ciyi ban Urcaliim.
44002006	Ɔci ne polla tolan neeni tieŋki ma gɔkki te tugga pookɛn a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn waakɛnda Ma Kiṭɔti, ɔci ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi noon acaan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda tieŋŋin magga da te tuk ɛkkɛn ɔci magga da te tuk ɛkkɛn.
44002007	Ɔci ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi ɔci bala poŋi gɔki agi, “Maka neeni ɛkkɛn bɛɛn te ban Jaliil waakɛnda boki?
44002008	Oŋ ɛkkɛn loṭi ikin te tugi ikin a ɔki? Tugi ikin ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn te aŋɛ? Acaan ikin wɛnniyɛ, ikin ma gɛɛg da pookɛn!
44002009	Ikin ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Partya, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Midya, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Ilam, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te Bana Kaŋ Wyeñɛti, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Yahuudiya, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Kapadociiya, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Bunti, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Ecya,
44002010	ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Prijya, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Pampiilya, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Macor, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Libya te ban Cayriin taaŋɛti, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban Ḍɔɔm, ɔci ɛkkɛn ma gɛɛg a ma Icrayiil ɔci ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛn a Keedin Pookɛn maka moṭi Jwaŋ ma Icrayiilti.
44002011	Ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te Kaŋ Kriit, ɔci ma gɛɛg bɛɛn te ban buñko. Jyeka guaktan ma ikinti neeniyɛ, ikin tyeŋin ɛkkɛn gɔki te tugi ikin, magga da te tuk ɛkkɛn, ɔci magga da te tuk ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn mieti ikin te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan naŋka tɛyan!”
44002012	Ɔci maka coŋin maka tieŋŋin jyeka guaktan ma neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda korkɛn buañi ɔci ɛkkɛn tieki ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin pookɛn agi, “Naŋka neeni bala a ɔki ɔɔn yeti?”
44002013	Ɔci maka pookɛn bala juoli gɔki agi, “Hay, ɛkkɛn nokkin mooy kaapun!”
44002014	Ɔci Butruc yɔɔtcin ma ñomgɛnti ɔci Cuudan pookɛn Maka Inyaakkɛn Wilin Ne Cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔɔtcin Butruc toŋkɛti. Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin polla tolanti ne pɛñan te pwana tolan agi, “Hay, ‘uay ma Icrayiil ɔci maka ciyi ban Urcaliimji waakɛnda, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ. Ɛkkɛ myettin te jyeka neeni ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ‘ya neeni.
44002015	Maka neeni nokkin mooy ba jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ neeni bɛɛ, acaan noon a liidɔ men.
44002016	Naŋka neeni a naŋka guaŋŋɛ Jɔwɛl mena a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolany. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi,
44002017	‘Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, ne oŋŋa ookti bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ‘ya Boŋ ‘ya pwowwa mati waakɛnda. Ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkkɛ kɛɛgin a ‘uay ɔci kɛɛgin a moongyɛ, ɛkkɛn ma myettan te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni. Ɔci ‘uay ɛkkɛ ‘uaya ḍyɛrin gɔrti waka lɛɛlla ‘ya bora ɛkkɛntiy. Ɔci ‘uay ɛkkɛ ‘uaya donkyɛ, ɛkkɛn lokti loggin.
44002018	Ɛɛ, ɔci kɛɛnk ‘ya kɛɛnka a ‘uay ɔci kɛɛnka a moongyɛ, boŋ ‘ya pwowwa ‘ya ɛkkɛnti oŋka wannati, ɔci ɛkkɛn ma myettan te jyeka bɛya ne ŋoyɔy.
44002019	Ɔci ‘ya ma lɛɛrka naŋka tɛyan ɔci naŋka ñyecki ma naŋki tɛɛn ‘ya te pɔliji ɔci iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni moki. Ma gɔrti yimgo, ɔci meeko, ɔci jien maaño,
44002020	ɔci oŋ waŋɛ dɛkti bɛɛ, ɔci paan tida ba yimgo. Oŋŋa ‘ya bɛɛdayɛ, oŋŋa neeni tolla toli ɔci pwanna pwanno. Ɔci ne oŋŋa neeni baawi menyɛ, ma gɔrti naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma neeni ñamu.
44002021	Ɔci maka cɔkti ‘yati te yenti ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔɔd ‘ya waakɛnda.’
44002022	“Ma Icrayiil, tieŋdɛ! Yaccu men ma Najarɛt neeniyɛ, ne ɛkɛ baali noŋi kanŋa ɛkɛyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan bala noŋi naŋka tɛyan ɔci naŋka ñyecki ma aŋka ŋeettan ma Yaccu a mena awarɛ. Naŋka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, gena naŋka ñyecki ma Yaccuy. Juaŋ bala noŋi naŋka neeni ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti. Jyek Yaccu neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki.
44002023	Yeti Juaŋ jwali ḍyɛŋŋɛ te baaṭi doki agi Yaccu neeni ‘wontɛ ma ɛkkɛ byeŋkɔti. Ɔci naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ Yaccutiyɛ, ŋeennɛ Juaŋ doki. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ maka bɛɛyi jyek Juaŋ olnɛ Yaccu nogɛ ŋaabɛ ñaalɔ kakanti. Ɔci a ɔɔn bala ba gena ɛkkɛ woodgɔ noŋnɛ ɛkɛ wanna.
44002024	Yeti ɛkɛ pɔŋnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te lyena ɛkɛ tuuni neeni, acaan lien yaakinti Yaccu tiektɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn bɛɛ.
44002025	Daawud bala gɔki te naŋka bɛya Yaccuti ne ɛkɛ gɔki agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn ‘ya yuarcan ciyi ‘ya ñamuti oŋkanda, ɛkɛ ciyi taaŋŋa byeŋa byerɔn, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka ‘ya yɔɔda ne tɛyan neeni.
44002026	Ɔci ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔno, ɔci ‘ya lɛmmu gɔki jyeka ñɔyan. Ɔci war ‘ya bala kɛɛy oŋŋa Juaŋ noŋdi naŋki ɛkɛ ‘ya warutiy.
44002027	Acaan i ‘ya dalda i non lienji budan bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya a men i Mena Pwadan, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya dalda i waru jada koolji budan bɛɛ.
44002028	I ‘ya nɔɔnna pɔya ‘ya tɛɛta moki ne baaṭiy, i balkin iki ‘ya, ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan.’
44002029	“Modg ɔɔn, jyek wey ikin Daawud ḍuaŋa tolan neeni ‘ya waru mɛɛdan ne ‘ya gɔka te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ tuun awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ jokci ma koolji, ɔci kol ɛkɛ bala wɛnni men acca ban ikin.
44002030	Daawudyɛ, ɛkɛ a bɔwa Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ nɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ te ñamu agi ‘mena bɛɛdɔ te kɛɛgin Daawudtiyɛ, agi ɛkta agdɔ ḍuaŋa tolan, ɔci coottɔ kaakci Daawudti.’
44002031	Ɔci acaan jyeka neeni ŋeejɛ Daawudyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati te jɔŋŋin jɔŋdi Kiṭɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki agi, ‘Ɛkɛ dalnɛ Juaŋ non lienji budan bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ jani bɛɛ.’
44002032	Yaccu mena bala ikinti wɛnni neeniyɛ, gena ɛkɛ guagdɛ Daawud neeni. Ɛkɛ luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji, ɔci ɛkɛ tɛɛti moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ yuarŋɔn ɔɔn te woŋgɔ waakida.
44002033	Ɔci Yaccu neeni naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋi mena tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ cooccin Juaŋ taaŋɛti taaŋŋa byerɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Weegɛn Boŋ ɛkɛ ba jwalla guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɛkɛti te baaṭiy. Ɔci Yaccu ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn Boŋ ɛkɛ ne ŋoyɔ. Naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ ɔɔnti acca neeniyɛ, ɔci jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, bɛɛn te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanti Boŋa ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti Yaccu acca neeni.
44002034	Daawud waanɛ ati ñaalɔ pɔliji bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ gɔki te baaṭi agi, ‘Ciɛggɔn gɔkcin Ciɛggɔn ‘yati agi dala i coocca ‘ya taaŋuti taaŋŋa byerɔn,
44002035	ne maka yookɔn te i bwanda ‘ya ɔci ḍuatta ‘ya iñɔ i cieguti ɔɔn.’
44002036	“Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ma Icrayiil waakɛnda, Yaccu mena ŋaamnɛ ɛkkɛ ñaalɔ neeniyɛ, naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan aŋi Ciɛggɔn, ɔci naŋŋɛ a Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Bora moki neeni.”
44002037	Ɔci ne poli ma polla tolan neeni tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yomgɛn wiak. Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin Butructi i maka atki iki ɛkɛ a Cuudan Yaccuti agi, “Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn noŋdɔn a ɔki?”
44002038	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ yaldɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛ, ɔci ne ɛkkɛ waakɔ yaldɛ dokiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ bultɛ ma te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka ŋeettan ma ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ doki. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ Boŋ ɛkɛ.
44002039	Acaan jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ñamu agi ɛkɛ ma ‘woñji Boŋ ɛkɛyɛ, jyeka neeni bala te ɛkkɛ, ɔci te kɛɛgin ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Ɔci moki te maka loonan daŋkun maka bortɛ Juaŋ ɛkɛti waakɛnday.”
44002040	Ɔci Butruc bala loṭi ma men te jyeka coŋin. Ɛkɛ bala ṭeyi ɛkkɛn agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te naŋka yeyin naŋka naŋtan maka coŋin oŋkanda neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ uddɛ te ywobja bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti neeni.”
44002041	Ɔci maka jyeti jyeka guaŋŋɛ Butruc a jyek Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buuli ma. Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maka coŋin ñoowin i Ma Kiṭɔ aŋi ba maka ne cyɛɛlɔ. Maka jyeti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a alpn ne ḍoogɔ (3,000).
44002042	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛya oŋkanda aŋka tieŋdi jyeka lorki Cuudan Yaccuy, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ñoowɔ te jwali tɛɛtin, ɔci moki bala ñoowɔ te Am Ciɛggɔn, ɔci te cɔŋi Juaŋ daŋkun.
44002043	Ɔci ma waakɛnda korkɛn buañi, acaan Cuudan Yaccu bala noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma Jwaŋa Tolan a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ.
44002044	Ɔci maka jyeti Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ḍwoṭi wyetkɛn oŋkanda waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkkɛn menga gɔki agi waka neeni a wak mena ne cyɛɛlɔ parɛ bɛɛ, a wak ɛkkɛn waakɛnda.
44002045	Ɔci wak ɛkkɛn wiɛljiyɔ ɔci bilk ‘woñgi maka bilkɛn baawy.
44002046	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala wyetkɛn ḍɔɔltan oŋkanda on Juaŋ ona tolan neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn omi ñoowɔ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ baanji oorg ɛkkɛn jitin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
44002047	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala jieyi Juaŋ oŋkanda, ɔci maka pookɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci oŋkanda Juaŋ bala maka pookɛn oodɛ jyeddi ɛkɛti gɔ Ma Kiṭɔ moki coŋkin ɔɔn.
44003001	Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti ne oŋ waŋɛ warɛ yiɛnnɛyɛ, Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna ɛkkɛn bala ati ooddi on Juaŋ ona tolan aŋka cɔkti Juaŋti.
44003002	Ɔci ma gɛɛg bala ḍuoṭi mena puono. Ɔci ‘wana a puon neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a puon wona jiennɛ mɛɛgɛn. Ɔci ɛkɛ eetan ma ḍurtan oŋkanda ḍuattan ma Kaañ Tuka Pwadanti aŋka ɛkɛ ñwoyi waak ne ma bɛɛti on Juaŋ ona tolany.
44003003	Ne ɛkɛ gɔrni Butruc yaakkɛn i Yɔhanna noŋki kaatti on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ tooccin ɛkkɛnti te waako.
44003004	Ɔci Butruc bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ te waŋɛ, ɔci Yɔhanna daŋkun bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ te waŋɛ, ɔci Butruc gɔkcin mena puonti agi, “Gɔṭṭa ɔɔnti wɛnni.”
44003005	Ɔci mena ñwoyi waak neeni gɔrcin ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ ‘wondɛti ma waagga kaapun.
44003006	Yeti Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “‘Ya balka ḍeyyan gɛɛg aŋka ‘wondin i bɛɛ. Yeti gena bala ‘yatiyɛ, i ‘wondin. ‘Ya gɔkka iti te yenti Yaccu men ma Najarɛt, jɔlla ñaalɔ pocca woono!”
44003007	Ɔci Butruc mena puon neeniyɛ, muŋŋɛ te bieŋɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ luolnɛ ñaalɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ ciegɛ ɔci ṭuamkɛ tɛɛn doki.
44003008	Ɔci ɛkɛ kuawin ñaalɔ ne pɛñan, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti woon parɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ ati kaaccin orɔ on Juaŋ ona tolan iki ɛkkɛn. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ati a woon ne ḍyɛṭ ṭɔɔlɛ gɔ moki ɛkɛ kuawi ñaalɔ ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi Jwaŋa Tolan pwanni agi pwani katan.
44003009	Ɔci ne ma waakɛnda gɔrki ɛkɛ ati a woon parɛyɛ, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki ɛkɛ gɔki agi Juaŋ pwadɔyɛ,
44003010	ɛkkɛn poni ne tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi ne pɛñan te naŋka neeni, acaan ‘wana neeni ñiyɛ ɛkkɛn gena mena bala ciyi kaañ tukɛti ñwoyi waaky. Kaañ tuka kaatti ma on Juaŋ ona tolan neeniyɛ, ma boṭi agi Kaañ Tuka Pwadan.
44003011	Ɔci ne mena ñwoyi waak neeni baali atki i Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna menyɛ, ɔci ma waakɛnda yiŋi ḍworcinti ɛkkɛnti bora daaŋji daŋa cɔnnɛ Cɔlaman on Juaŋ ona tolan warɛti acaan ɛkkɛn korkɛn buañi noono.
44003012	Ɔci ne Butruc gɔrni a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “‘Uay ma Icrayiil, ɛkkɛ korkɔ buayi noon te naŋka neeni a ɔɔn ogo? Ɛkkɛ gɔṭɛ ɔɔn ḍyɛrdintɔ a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ɔɔn ‘wana neeni ywaŋŋɔnyɔ ɔɔn pookɔ te naŋki ɔɔn naŋka tɛyan aŋka ɛkɛ yaakiti woon wanna ogo?
44003013	Jwaŋa Tolan noŋjin, ɔci yenti kɛɛngɔn ɛkɛ Yaccu toli doki. Jwaŋa neeniyɛ, gena Jwaŋ yɔrg ikin Abrahim ɔci Icaak ɔci Yaakub. Yeti Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ ɛkkɛ ma byeŋkɛnti, ɔci ne ɛkkɛ attɛ Bilaatuc ñamɛti, ɔci ne ɛkɛ buagi Yaccu pɔktɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ yookɛ te pɔkkin ɛkɛ.
44003014	Awarɛ, ɛkkɛ yookɛ te mena pwadan ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔŋnɛ Bilaatucti agi mena noki ma gɛɛl aŋka pɔkka.
44003015	Ɔci te jyek ɛkkɛyɛ, mena tɛɛtki ma aŋka nogɛ ma doki. Yeti ɛkɛ luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji, ɔci ɛkɛ yuarŋɔn ɔɔn tɛɛti moki, ɔci acca ɔɔn mietɔn ma te jyek jɔŋŋin ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔ neeni.
44003016	’Wana gwaldɛ ɛkkɛ ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ pwani te yenti Yaccu mena noŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ neeni ne ɛkɛ jyetti yenti ɛkɛtiy. Ɛkɛ warɛ pwani warda.
44003017	“Modg ɔɔn, yeti ŋeej ‘ya ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ Yaccuti neeniyɛ, naŋka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan bɛɛ, ba ma ɛkkɛ maka ḍwaŋin daŋkun, naŋka neeni kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn moki.
44003018	Yeti a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te tugi maka a bɔwan Juaŋ te baaṭi dɛññin bora, ne ɛkkɛn gɔkki te tuk Jwaŋa Tolan agi Kiṭɔ wardan eeddɔ.
44003019	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakti te nɔji ɛkkɛ, ɔci waakɔ yaldɛ aŋka nɔji ɛkkɛ eedɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ te ɛkkɛti.
44003020	Ɔci Juaŋ noŋdi kanŋa tolan ɛkkɛti. Ɛkɛ oŋ Yaccu mena muonɛ ɛkɛ bora neeni cuondɛ dɔɔdɛ wɛnni moki ba jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu dokiy.
44003021	Yeti acca ɛkɛ ciyi ñaalɔ kɛɛy oŋŋa Juaŋ waak ywaŋdɛ waakɛnda aktɛ waka wonkɛny. Ɛkɛ waak ywaŋdɛ ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te baaṭi ne ɛkɛ gɔki jyeka neeni te tugi maka a bɔwan ɛkɛ bɔwan pwadiny.
44003022	Muuca gɔkcin agi, ‘Juaŋ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ bɔwa gɛɛl te ma ɛkkɛti bala ba ne ɛkɛ ‘ya naŋŋata a bɔwa wanna ɔɔn. Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka guagdɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda.
44003023	Ɔci kan men gɛɛl tieŋdi jyek bɔwa neeni bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ kyɛptan ma ɔntɔ te Ma Kiṭɔti ɔci ɛkɛ ḍakti.’
44003024	“Camwil ɔci maka bɔwan maka boottin Camwil ŋoyɛti waakɛnda, ne ɛkkɛn gɔkki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki te oŋka acca neeni.
44003025	Ɔci waka guagɛ bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te baaṭiyɛ, guagɛ ɛkkɛn te ɛkkɛ daŋkun, ɔci jyeka naŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan i yɔrg ɛkkɛyɛ, dɛññin bora ɛkkɛti doki. Gena jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti ne Juaŋ gɔki agi, ‘Naŋka pwadan bɛya kɛɛn wardati te mena bɛya te war itiy.’
44003026	A ɔŋŋi Jwaŋa Tolan ne ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ kɛɛngɔn ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ cuonnɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti te ñamu doki aŋka ɛkɛ yom ñɔɔn cuondɛ ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ yaldɛyɔ ɛkɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka yeyin.”
44004001	Ɔci ne Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna balki gɔkki mati a ɔɔnyɛ, gaciicin ma Icrayiil bɛɛn i ḍuaŋa bɔlin on Juaŋ ona tolan, ɔci ma Cadyuciin da bɛɛn iki ɛkkɛn.
44004002	Acaan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yeyɔ te jyeka lorki Cuudan ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniy. Acaan ɛkkɛn gɔkcin mati agi Yaccu jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki. Jyeka neeni mieti agi maka tuun yaakinti jɔŋdi ñaalɔ tɛɛti moki.
44004003	Ɔci Cuudan neeni muogɛ ma ɔci ḍuaccɛ ma ciginji, ɔci niini ne liidɔ acaan oŋ utcin doki.
44004004	Yeti maka tieŋŋin jyek ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, jyeti a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ, a ɔŋŋi Ma Kiṭɔ bala ciɛñ a ciɛñi ne coŋki bala ba alpn ne dɔɔyɔ (5,000) ɔɔn.
44004005	Ɔci ne liidɔ maka cyekin ɔci maka ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɔci maka loṭi ganuun Juaŋ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ ban Urcaliim.
44004006	Ɔci Anac gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil, ɔci Kayapac, ɔci Yɔhanna, ɔci Alɛkcaandar, ɔci ma gaciic tolan bala i ɛkkɛn daŋkun.
44004007	Ɔci Cuudan Yaccu owwɛ ma ɔci yɔɔtci ɛkkɛn ma ñomgɛnti, ɔci maka gɔṭi jiek tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɛkkɛ yaakɛti naŋka neeni a ɔki? Naŋka neeni naŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ te yenti menɛ yeti?”
44004008	Ɔci Butruc acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ kuumi te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi, “Maka ḍwaŋin ɔci maka cyekin, tieŋdɛ!
44004009	Kan ɛkkɛ toocɛ ɔɔnti te naŋka mena a puon warɛ pwanni neeniyɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ naŋka neeni bɛɛn te aŋɛ.
44004010	Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci dala ŋeettan ma Icrayiil waakɛnda ‘wana neeni warɛ pwani te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ men ma Najarɛt. Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ŋaamnɛ ɛkkɛ ñaalɔy, yeti ɛkɛ luolnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, aŋka ‘wana neeni bala yɔɔd ɛkkɛ ñomgɛti warɛ pwanni.
44004011	A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Daawud te baaṭi agi, ‘Guonan guaktan maka cɔti oorg agi ɛkta yaayɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi guonan pwadan on warɛti doki? Ɔci ɛkkɛ woodgɔ agɛ maka yookɔn te ɛkɛy.’
44004012	Ɔci yɔɔd bɛya te mena parɛ gɛɛlti bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin yɔɔd te Yaccu parɛ. Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ikin ‘wonnin yenta parɛ gɛɛl bala baan wɛɛn warda aŋka ikin yɔɔtin ɛkɛ bɛɛ.”
44004013	Ɔci ne ma gɔrki Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna yomgɛn tɛɛki a tɛɛnyɛ, ma korkɛn buañi noono, acaan ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna neeni, ɛkkɛn lalɛ ma te worgan waakɛnda bɛɛ. Ne ma tieŋki jyek ɛkkɛnyɛ, ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛɛcin, acaan ɛkkɛn bala i Yaccu oŋkanda.
44004014	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki ‘wana warɛ pwani neeni ne baali yɔɔtki iki Butruc ɔci Yɔhannayɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔki gena yaayan gɛɛl ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ.
44004015	Ɔci ne Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna cuoñkiti ma bora te nona ɛkkɛn noŋki jiekyɛ, ɔci ma bala gɔwwi yɔtin pookɛn agi,
44004016	“Ikin ‘uaya neeni naŋtin a ɔki yeti? Acaan naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma naŋɛ ɛkkɛn yuarɛ maka ban Urcaliim waakɛnda. Ɔci ikin yaakinti tiekin te naŋka neeni bɛɛ.
44004017	Dala ikin gɔktin ‘yertin ɛkkɛnti ne pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔkti maggati te jyek Yaccu neeni moki bɛɛ. Ɔci kan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka neeni ooddi baan warda moki bɛɛ.”
44004018	Ɔci ɛkkɛn Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna borki orɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ mati te yenti Yaccu moki bɛɛ.”
44004019	Yeti Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna, ɛkkɛn ṭwokcin gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Gɔṭṭɛ, a gena pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolantiy, ɔɔn noŋdɔn ba jyek ɛkkɛ, walla ɔɔn noŋdɔn ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolan?
44004020	Ɔɔn yaakɔnti ciedɔn lieda te naŋka yuarŋɔn ɔɔn neeni bɛɛ, ɔci te jyeka tieŋnɔn ɔɔn neeni bɛɛ.”
44004021	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna iirkiti mokiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti agi, “Ɔgdɛ ooddɛ.” Ɛkkɛn gɔki a ɔɔn acaan pɔya noŋki ɛkkɛn ywobji mati bala bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn buayi maka pookɛn acaan ma waakɛnda bala jieyi Juaŋ te naŋka naŋɛ Butruc yaakkɛn i Yɔhanna neeni.
44004022	’Wana warɛ pwani te naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma neeniyɛ, yuong ɛkɛ bala ñamu te yuonga a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (40).
44004023	Ɔci Butruc ɔci Yɔhanna ne ɛkkɛn pɔkkiti mayɛ, ɛkkɛn dɔɔki nona mung ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ te jyeka guagɛ gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil ɛkkɛnti, ɔci te jyeka guagɛ cyekin ɛkkɛnti.
44004024	Ɔci ne mung ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyek ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn cɔkcin Jwaŋa Tolanti te tuka ne cyɛɛlɔ waakɛnda agi, “Ciɛggɔn, i balki war tɛɛn waakɛnda, i a mena cɔti pɔllo, ɔci ṭɛɛro, ɔci galŋin, ɔci waka bala ɛkkɛn jitkɛnti neeni waakɛnday.
44004025	Ɔci i a mena gɔki te Boŋ i te tuk yɔr ɔɔn Daawud kɛɛngɔn i, ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni mati agi, ‘Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn a jyek ywobji ogo? Oŋ ma bala gɔwwɔ yɔtin te jyeka tobin jyeka budan neeni ogo?
44004026	Ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin baan wardayɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi jyek tommo. Ɔci maka a wyetkyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn ñaagɛyɔ te tomi agi noowinti iki Juaŋ ɔci Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Bora daŋkun.’
44004027	Ɔci acca awarɛ Hiruuduc Antipac ɔci Bilaatuc Buntiyɛ, jiek ñaagɛyɔ bana neeniti wɛnni i Keedin Pookɛn ɔci i kɛɛn Icrayiil daŋkun agi noowinti i Yaccu kɛɛngɔn i mena yomɛ bɔwan Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Boray.
44004028	Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ aŋka noŋdi ba naŋka ḍaaŋŋi i te war tɛɛn i ɔci ba yom i agi bɛɛdɔy.
44004029	Ɔci acca Ciɛggɔn, dala i tieŋja jyeka ‘yerki ma ɔɔn neeni, ɔci dala ɔɔn kɛɛnk i magdɔn acca aŋka ɔɔn mietɔn ma te jyek i te yoma tɛyan oŋkanda ɔɔn.
44004030	Ɔci dala i maka waakɛn yeyin ywaŋa, ɔci dala ma i noŋdi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma iy. Dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka neeni te yenti Yaccu mena a kɛɛngɔn i kɛɛgɔn yomɛ bɔwany.”
44004031	Ɔci ne cɔŋŋa neeni baaniyɛ, ona cɔkki ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, warɛ ḍiedan. Ɔci Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn kuumi te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala mieti ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan te yoma tɛyan.
44004032	Ɔci maka jyeti Yaccuti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda yomg ɛkkɛn a yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci paŋŋa paŋtan ɛkkɛnyɛ, a paŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci kan waak bala ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn menga gɔki agi gena wak ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ. Waak waakɛnda a wak ɛkkɛn waakɛnda.
44004033	Ɔci Cuudan Yaccu ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ te jyek jɔllin Yaccu jɔlni ñaalɔy. Ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ a ɔɔn te yoma tɛyan, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanna pwani ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda.
44004034	Ɔci ɛkkɛn men gɛɛl bɔw bɔw bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn magga balki oorg ɔci yelko. Ɔci a oŋki ɛkkɛn yiel gɛɛl wiɛltanyɔ, ɔci oŋŋa parɛ moki ɛkkɛn on gɛɛl wiɛltanyɔ,
44004035	ɔci ɛkkɛn bilka neeni eetan nona Cuudan Yaccuti, ɔci Cuudan Yaccu neeniyɛ, kan ma gɛɛg bɔw bɔw te bilkyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn ma kɛntan.
44004036	Ɔci maka wak ɛkkɛn wiɛljiyɔ neeni gɛɛl bala yenti Yuocip. Ɛkɛ a kɛɛn Laawi. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn te Kaŋ Cayprac. Ɛkɛ okki Cuudan Yaccu yenta parɛ agi Barnabac. (Ɔci Barnabac te tuk Mabaan agi, “Mena Šeyi May.”)
44004037	Ɔci Barnabac neeni, ɛkɛ yel ɛkɛ wiɛllɛ, ɔci bilk eññɛ ‘wonnɛ Cuudan Yaccu.
44005001	Ɔci mena ‘uan gɛɛl bala yenti Ananaayac, ɛŋ ɛkɛ yenti Capiira, ɔci ɛkkɛn yel ɛkkɛn wiɛljiyɔ.
44005002	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bilka neeni wɛɛdi jitin, ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn daliyɔ te on ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn neeni eññɛ mena ‘uan nona Cuudan Yaccuti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ne bilk wɛɛtkiti jitinyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛɛŋ daŋkun.
44005003	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin agi, “Ananaayac, te gena yeti i yomu kuummi te jyek Jwaŋa Yaayan aŋka i dyeti Boŋ Juaŋ ñingɛ a ɔɔn neeni? Bilka wiɛlli i te non ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ooni i waakɛnda wɛnni bɛɛ. Gɛɛg dolniyɔ i te baanji daŋkun.
44005004	Gɔṭṭi poca, ne ɛkkɛ noon men wiɛllɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a non ɛkkɛ bɛɛ? Ɔci ne ɛkɛ wiɛllɛ ɛkkɛ doki, jyek bilk a jyek ɛkkɛ bɛɛ? Ɔci acca i yomu bala a ɔki aŋka i noŋi a ɔɔn wan? Iyɛ, gena men baana naŋŋi ñin i neeni bɛɛ. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan naŋŋi ñin i wan!”
44005005	Ɔci Ananaayac ne ɛkɛ tieŋni jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍɛmmin iñɔ ɔci tuun doki. Ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ ne tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buayi waakɛnda.
44005006	Ɔci ‘uaya ḍyɛrin gɛɛg jɔllin ñaalɔ ɔci ati ɛkɛ paariyɔ te bworŋin ɔci ḍuurɛ bora ɔci jokci iñɔ.
44005007	Ɔci ne oŋ woŋgɛ ne ḍoogɔ baakiyɛ, ɛŋ ɛkɛ bɛɛn daŋkun. Yeti ɛkɛ jyek ‘uarɛ ŋeejɛ men bɛɛ.
44005008	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay i! ‘Ya myetta, ɛkkɛ noon wiɛllɛ bilk bala ba bolja neeni ɔɔn pari bɛɛ?” Ɔci ɛɛŋ jyettin agi, “Ɛɛ, bilk wiɛllɔn ɔɔn bala ba bolja wanna ɔɔn.”
44005009	Ɔci Butruc gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Hay i! Ɛkkɛ jiek ñaaŋŋɛyɔ yaakkɔ a ɔɔn nɔñji bala ba ɛkkɛ ponnɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan a poccin a ɔɔn ogo? Tieŋŋa, maka ‘war i eyɛ bora ɔci jokci iñɔ waayiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala bɛya, ɔci i daŋkun eeti ɛkkɛn bora jokti iñɔ.”
44005010	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni a ɔɔnyɛ, ne pɛñan doki Capiira ḍɛmmin iñɔ Butruc ñamɛti ɔci tuuni. Ɔci ne maka ‘uaya ḍyɛrin ne kooki orɔyɛ, ɛkɛ mɔkci tuun doki. Ɔci ɛkɛ eyɛ ɛkkɛn bora, ɔci jokci ‘war ɛkɛ taaŋɛti.
44005011	Ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, Ma Kiṭɔ buañi waakɛnda, ɔci maka bora ne ɛkkɛn tieŋkiyɛ, ɛkkɛn buañi daŋkun.
44005012	Ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, Cuudan Yaccu bala noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma Juaŋ ma ñomgɛnti. Ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda bala ḍwoṭi wyetkɛn oŋkanda on Juaŋ ona tolan daaŋji daŋa cɔnnɛ Cɔlamany.
44005013	Ɔci maka borayɛ, ɛkkɛn magga ñoodi i Ma Kiṭɔ amaam budan bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn buayi. Yeti ɛkkɛn bala poŋi gɔki agi maka neeni ɛkki pwadgɔ.
44005014	Yeti maka coŋin gɛɛg jyeti Yaccuti, ɔci polla tolan ati Ma Kiṭɔti aŋi maka ne cyɛɛlɔ, maka ‘uayi ɔci maka moongo.
44005015	Ɔci oŋkanda maka waakɛn yiegdi ɛkkɛn ootan ma bora te oorgti, ɔci eetan ḍurtan ma pɔɔk toŋkɛnti te aŋgann ɔci te aarann moki, aŋka ne Butruc gordi pɔɔjɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn ṭiebji ɛkɛ ɔga maka waakɛn yeyinti neeni aŋka ɛkkɛn waakɛn pwaddi.
44005016	Ɔci maka bala ban Urcaliim toŋkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ḍwoṭṭinti ban Urcaliimji. Ɛkkɛn bɛɛn eccin maka waakɛn yeyin ɔci maka muogɛ jɔkin yeyin, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn pwadgin waakɛnda.
44005017	Yeti gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil i maka bala ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn korkɛn modɔ Cuudan Yaccuti,
44005018	ɛkkɛn ati ɛkkɛn muogɛ ɔci ɛkkɛn eyɛ ciginji. Maka bala i gaciic tolan neeniyɛ, gena ma Cadyuciin.
44005019	Yeti ne weenji malɛɛka gɛɛl cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci cigin tukɛ pɔŋnɛ, ɔci ma koonɛ malɛɛka bora, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin mati agi,
44005020	“Ɔgdɛ ooddɛ yɔɔttɛ on Juaŋ ona tolanji ma myettɛ te jyek Juaŋ jyeka tɛɛtki ma neeni waakɛnda.”
44005021	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ati on Juaŋ ona tolanti te tinnɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala loṭi ma moki. Ɔci gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil iki maka balki iki ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ nona ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn borcin maka gɔṭi jiekti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn borcin cyekin ma Icrayiilti waakɛnda daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ma gɛɛg cuuñɛ ciginji aŋka ma ootan bora te ciginji aŋka ɛkkɛn eetan nona ma wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlkitiy.
44005022	Yeti ne bɔlin atki ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn mɔkci jiju bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn dɔɔkkin dɔki nona maka ɛkkɛn cuuñkiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ agi,
44005023	“Ɔɔn cigin mɔŋnɔn tuggɛ a uulgin. Ɔci maka gɔṭi ciginyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yɔdi kɛɛy gɔṭi cigin. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn cigin tuggɛn pɔkkitiyɛ, ɔɔn gɔrnɔn jiju, ɔci menga bala bɛɛ.”
44005024	Ɔci ne ḍuaŋa bɔlin on Juaŋ ona tolan ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin ma Icrayiil tieŋki jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieki, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala gɔki agi, “Aa, cca cca cca, naŋka neeni baadi men boki?”
44005025	Ɔci men gɛɛl bɛɛn ɔci ɛkkɛn myennɛ agi, “‘Uaya olnɛ ɛkkɛ ciginjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala yɔdi on Juaŋ ona tolanji loṭi mako.”
44005026	Ɔci ḍuaŋa bɔlin ɛkɛ ati i bɔlin aŋka ɛkkɛn ma dɔɔtan moki. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ma ookitiyɛ, owwɛ te ywobji moki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn buayi dita ɛkkɛn yeptan ma te gwoyi noktan.
44005027	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ookiti mayɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔɔtci ma maka gɔṭi jiek ñomgɛnti. Ɔci gaciic tolan ma Icrayiil tooccin ɛkkɛnti agi,
