45016017	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ne pwadan jyeka gɔwwa ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te maka kɛɛbi ma jitkɛn te jieko, ɔci te maka noŋi ne yaayan, aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ bɛɛ. Maka noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn bala ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ma te ñamu neeni bɛɛ. Naa jyek ɛkkɛ ñoodi i jyek ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
45016018	Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn kanŋan te kanŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Kiṭɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn gɔki te lɛmma milan ɔci maka pookɛn naŋtan ñin doki.
45016019	Ma waakɛnda tieŋŋin agi ɛkkɛ baljɛ noŋjɛ ba jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin ne pwadan. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te jyek ɛkkɛ. Yeti ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ tɛya te jyeka pwadin. Naa jyeka yeyin bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
45016020	Jwaŋa Tolan mena ma ‘wondɛ coodda pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan bwandɛ ne cwakanti. Accayɛ, dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pwada pwani ɛkkɛti.
45016021	Timutawuc mena noŋin kanŋa iki ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki agi ‘ya ɛkkɛ ñiibjɛ te ɛkɛ daŋkun, ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkkɛ niinjɛ boki? Ɔci Luciiyoc, ɔci Jɛcan, ɔci Cɔciipatɛr, ɛkkɛn a maka ban ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ‘ya ɛkkɛ ñiibjɛ te ɛkkɛn daŋkun agi ɛkkɛ niinjɛ boki?
45016022	Gena ‘ya Tɛrcyac, mena Buuluc kieŋnɛ worga neeni, ‘ya ñieb ɛkkɛ daŋkun, acaan ‘ya a men Kiṭɔ daŋkun ba ɛkkɛ ɔɔn, ɛkkɛ niinnɛ boki.
45016023	Gayac mena onɛ ciya ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Gayac neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena moki Ma Kiṭɔ wɛnni waakɛnda. Iraactac, mena gɔṭi bilk akuuma ban ɔɔn neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Ɔci mod ikin Kwartoc, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun. [
45016024	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɔti waakida. Amɛɛn.]
45016025	Dala ikin jieyin Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ yaakinti ɛkkɛ yɔɔttɛ iñɔ ne tɛyan te jyeni ɛkkɛ. ‘Ya lor ma te Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin, ɔci ba jyek liɛlti naŋka awarɛ naŋka niin lieda warɛ a coggɔn te baaṭi loonan neeni.
45016026	Acca naŋka neeni warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora te worgan kiiwɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci te jwalla guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan mena ciyi yuonginda neeniy. Naŋka neeni mieddɛ ma bora keedinti waakɛnda, a ɔŋŋi aŋka ma waakɛnda tieŋdi ɔci jyeddi.
45016027	Dala Jwaŋa Tolan mena nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ a ñing tɛɛn neeniyɛ, jiɛtan ma te Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne baaṭi ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
46001001	Gena ‘ya, Buuluc mena bornɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka aga Cuuda ɛkɛ ba yom Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci mod ikin Cɔctanic kiewɔn worga neen neeni.
46001002	Worga neeni ooddi kaniica Jwaŋa Tolanti ban Kuruntuc, ooddi maka bornɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, aŋka aga ma ɛkɛ maka pwadin te ñoowin ɛkkɛn ñooki iki Yaccu Kiṭɔ i maka moṭi ɛkɛti noon warday. Ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛn ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin.
46001003	Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin, ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno.
46001004	’Ya gɔk a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛ, acaan Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
46001005	Acaan ɛkkɛ korkɔ kuumi te ɛkɛ te pɔyi waakɛnda te jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda, ɔci te ŋeejin ɛkkɛ waak ŋeejɛ waakɛnday.
46001006	Acaan jyeka gɔɔnɔn ɔɔn bora te Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, niinjin ɛkkɛ yomgɔti ne tɛyan. Ɛkkɛ balkɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ Juaŋ te Boŋ ɛkɛ waakɛnda doki.
46001007	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ kɛɛyɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ɔɔn.
46001008	Ɛkkɛ tiidɛyɔ ɛkɛ ne tɛyan ne baaṭi ɔɔn. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, lɔɔn gɛɛl bɛya ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti te oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdɛ neeni bɛɛ.
46001009	Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkkɛ oonɛ nona ñoowɛ ɛkkɛ iki Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ Kaci ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tieci jyek ɛkɛ waakɛn.
46001010	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya toocca ɛkkɛti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, dala ɛkkɛ waakida yɔɔddɛ te jwalla ne cyɛɛlɔ. Naa jyeka a kɛɛbgin bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ, yeti dala ɛkkɛ coodɛ te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci te paŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.
46001011	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya nɔɔtka ma on tukɛ Klawi agi jyek kɛɛptin baalɔ ɛkkɛti.
46001012	Jyeka guagdi ‘ya neeni jitkɛn bala a ɔŋŋi, ɛkkɛ men da gɔki agi, “‘Ya bootca Buulucti,” ɔci mena parɛ moki agi, “‘Ya bootca Apɔɔlɔcti,” ɔci mena parɛ agi, “‘Ya bootca Cipacti,” ɔci mena parɛ moki agi, “‘Ya bootca Yaccu Kiṭɔti.”
46001013	Kiṭɔ warɛ ŋuonnɛ jitin? Buuluc ŋaapci ma kakanti te ɛkkɛ? Ɛkkɛ buulki ma te yenti Buuluc?
46001014	’Ya gɔkca Juaŋti a pwatcin acaan ‘ya buoṭi menga te ɛkkɛti bɛɛ, yeti Kricpac buuli ‘ya yaakkɛn i Gayac,
46001015	acaan naa menga gɔkti agi ɛkɛ buulliti ma te yenti ‘ya bɛɛ.
46001016	Ɛɛ, on tukɛ Ictɛɛpanucyɛ, buuli ‘ya moki. Menga buuli ‘ya moki maka neeni ŋotkɛnti moki boki? Çeej ‘ya bɛɛ.
46001017	Kiṭɔ ‘ya cuonna buor ma bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya cuonna lor ma te jyek ɛkɛ, oŋ yeti te jyek ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan aŋka war tɛɛn kakan Kiṭɔ aga jyeka budan bɛɛ.
46001018	Maka yienyɛ, jyek Kiṭɔ ñaltan a jyeka budan ɛkkɛnti, oŋ yeti ikin a maka yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ñaltin ikin a war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan.
46001019	Acaan kiiwɛ ma worga Juaŋji agi, “‘Ya ñing tɛɛn maka ñingɛn tɛyan nuud jitin, ɔci wyeñ wɔŋi maka wyetkɛn wɔkin uutca ‘ya ɔntɔ.”
46001020	Ba ‘wana ñingɛ tɛyan bɛ? Ba mena urkinti worga ne tolan bɛ? Ba mena lieṭi jiek jitkɛn yuonga neeniti bɛ? Jwaŋa Tolan ñing tɛɛn iñɔ baanji wɛnni naŋŋɛ a wyeñ booji bɛɛ?
46001021	Acaan Juaŋ te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛyɛ, maka iñɔ baanji wɛnni dalnɛ, ɛkɛ ñiyɛ te ñing tɛɛn ɛkkɛn pookɛn bɛɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pwatcin te jyeka loṭin ikin ma ñaltan maka iñɔ a wyeñ booji neeni, aŋka maka jyeddi jyeka neeni yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ.
46001022	Ma Icrayiil buagɔn gɔrti naŋka tɛyan, ɔci ma Giriik lieṭi ñing tɛɛno.
46001023	Yeti ne ikin loṭin ma ka Yaccu ŋaabɛ mayɛ, lalla neeni ma Icrayiilti bala ba jyeka kooki ɛkkɛn te jyek Juaŋo, ɔci lalla neeni a wyeñ booji Keedin Pookɛnti.
46001024	Yeti maka bornɛ Juaŋ waakɛnda, kan ɛkkɛn a ma Icrayiil, walla a maka Kɛɛna Pookɛnyɛ, Kiṭɔ a war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci a ñing tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛnti.
46001025	Wyeñ wɔŋi Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, bala ñamu te wyeñ wɔŋi ma baano, ɔci war tɛɛn ɛkɛyɛ, bala ñamu te war tɛɛn ma baano.
46001026	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ne ɛkkɛ bornɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛ balgɛ a ɔki. Magga ɛkkɛti ñingɛn tɛɛcin ba bolji ma baan bɛɛ, ɔci waakɛn tɛɛcin bɛɛ, ɔci menga jiedi ma ba mena tolan bɛɛ.
46001027	Oŋ yeti Juaŋ muowin maka ñingɛn morŋan aŋka maka ñingɛn tɛyan lɔɔddi, ɔci Juaŋ muowin maka waakɛn koyan baan konɛti, aŋka maka waakɛn tɛyan lɔɔddi.
46001028	Juaŋ muowin maka ḍyɛrin, ɔci maka waaktan ma ɔci maka baaw aŋka maka bala neeni uuttan ɔntɔ.
46001029	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa menga noŋi warɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti bɛɛ.
46001030	Yeti Juaŋ ɛkkɛ oonɛ ɔci ñaaŋŋɛyɔ i Yaccu Kiṭɔ, mena aŋi ñing tɛɛn ikin te Jwaŋa Tolan mena a pwani ikin, ɔci ikin wanniny.
46001031	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin worga Juaŋji ne gɔkki agi, “Dala mena noŋi warɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi warɛ te Ciɛggɔn.”
46002001	Modg ɔɔn, ne ‘ya bɛɛna ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myennin jyek Juaŋ te jyeka ḍwaŋin ɔci te ñing tɛɛn bɛɛ.
46002002	Acaan ne ‘ya baala ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ‘ya buaga gena parɛ gɛɛl ŋeejja ɛkkɛti aŋan bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya buaga Yaccu aŋka ŋeejja i ŋaamma ɛkɛ ŋaapkiti may.
46002003	Ɔci ‘ya da waru koy koyo, ɔci buayo, ɔci waru ḍiedan.
46002004	Jyeka guaŋi ‘ya, ɔci jwalla owwan ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn guaŋi ‘ya te ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn guaŋi ‘ya te liɛlti Boŋ Juaŋ ɔci war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
46002005	Aŋka naa jyeni ɛkkɛ bala te ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan bɛɛ, yeti dala jyeni ɛkkɛ bala te war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan.
46002006	Ɔɔn gɔkɔn te ñing tɛɛn maka ñingɛn tɛɛnti, yeti ɔɔn gɔkɔn te ñing tɛɛn yuonga neeniti walla te ñing tɛɛn maka ḍwaŋin yuonga neeni bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka eedɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ baadi budany.
46002007	Yeti ɔɔn gɔkɔn te jyek Juaŋ jyeka jitkɛn a coggin maka ñingɛn tɛyantiy, ɔci te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ ñing tɛɛn guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te baaṭi te yuonga baaw te pwani ikiny.
46002008	Maka ḍwaŋin yuonga neeniti jyeka neeni jitkɛn yuarcɛ bɛɛ. Te ɛkkɛn jyeka neeni jitkɛn yuarkitiyɛ, te ɛkkɛn Ciɛggɔn pwadan neeni ŋaabɛ kakanti bɛɛ.
46002009	Bala ba jyeka kiigin worga Juaŋji gɔki agi, “Gena ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te maka ani ɛkɛyɛ, yuarŋɛ menga te waŋɛ bɛɛ, walla tieŋnɛ menga te jyeñɛ bɛɛ, walla konɛ yuarnɛji menga bɛɛ.”
46002010	Gena neeni lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora te Boŋ Juaŋo. Acaan Boŋ ɛkɛ lieṭi waak jitkɛn waakɛnda i wak Juaŋ waka jitkɛn loonan.
46002011	Acaan a menɛ paŋi men baan ŋeejɛy? Pari ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ? Bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, menga bala paŋi Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛ bɛɛ, gena Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ aŋka paŋi ɛkɛ ŋeejɛy.
46002012	Acca ikin mwokkin Boŋ Juaŋ bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolantiy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin yaakinti waka ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋ neeni jitkɛn yuartin. Ikin mwokkin boŋa iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ.
46002013	Ɔci ɔɔn gɔkɔn a ɔŋŋi te jyeka laltan ma te ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan bɛɛ, yeti ne ɔɔn loṭɔn te jyek wak Booŋ maka balki Booŋtiyɛ, ɔɔn gɔkɔn te ñing tɛɛn jyeka loṭɛ Boŋ Juaŋy.
46002014	Mena baaki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛtiyɛ, waka ma ‘wondɛ Booŋ mugdɛ ɛkɛ yomɛti bɛɛ, acaan waka neeni jitkɛn yuartɛji ɛkɛ bɛɛ, acaan waka neeni jitkɛn yuartan ma te Boŋ Juaŋo.
46002015	Mena balki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ wak Jwaŋa Tolan jitkɛn ŋeejɛ waakɛnda. Yeti waka bala ɛkɛ yomɛti ŋeejɛ menga bɛɛ.
46002016	“A menɛ paŋi Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛy? A menɛ yaakinti ɛkɛ myettɛy?” Yeti ɔɔn balkɔn paŋi Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
46003001	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya yaakati gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ba maka balkin Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ, oŋ yeti ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ba maka baan konɛti, ɔci ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti bala ba ne ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin Yaccu Kiṭɔti ɔɔn.
46003002	’Ya ɛkkɛ lallin te jyeka koyan, ga ‘ya ɛkkɛ lallin te jyeka jitkɛn tɛyan bɛɛ. Acca ɛkkɛ yaakɛti muŋi ɛkkɛn men bɛɛ. Ɔci acca men ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ waakɔ ywaŋŋɛ bɛɛ,
46003003	acaan ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba coodda baan konɛti men. Acaan ne kon moni ɔci wɛyyin balki ɛkkɛti menyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ ma baan konɛ budan, ɔci noŋɛ ba naŋki ma baan konɛ budan bɛɛ?
46003004	Ne ɛkkɛ men da gɔki agi, “‘Ya bootca Buulucti,” ɔci mena parɛ moki agi, “‘Ya bootca Apɔɔlɔcti,” te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni ɛkkɛ agɛ ma baan konɛ budan bɛɛ?
46003005	Apɔɔlɔc a menɛ? Ɔci ‘ya Buuluc a menɛ? Pari te lali ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ jyettɛ neeni bɛɛ? Ɔɔn yaakkɔ menga da kanŋan ba kanŋa ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti Juaŋy.
46003006	’Ya kookin piinno, ɔci Apɔɔlɔc ɛkkɛn moonnɛ piego, oŋ yeti Juaŋ ɛkkɛn yuolnɛ ñaalɔ.
46003007	Mena pieti kookin ɔci mena mooti kookinyɛ, ɛkkɛn a genga bɛɛ, oŋ yeti Juaŋ aŋka a mena waak ‘wondɛ ḍɔŋo.
46003008	Mena pieti ɔci mena mootiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ, oŋ yeti men da yɔɔrdi gena ɛkɛ ‘wondi Juaŋ ba taab kanŋa ɛkɛ.
46003009	Ɔɔn agɔn maka kanŋan Juaŋti, ɔci ɛkkɛ agɛ bal Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkkɛ agɛ on Juaŋ moki.
46003010	Te yom pwani Juaŋ yom pwani ‘wonnata ‘ya neeniyɛ, ‘ya jɔɔtcan te cɔni on ŋwayɛ ba mena gɔɔñgɔn. Ɔci mena parɛ eñi ɛkɛ wyeñɛti, yeti dala menga da waŋɛ tiittɛ te eeno, ne ɛkkɛn balki cɔtki on ŋwaya neeni wyeñɛtiy.
46003011	Menga gorndi cwoddi ona parɛ gɛɛl te ɛka cɔnnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan neeni moki bɛɛ. On ŋwaya neeniyɛ, gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
46003012	Kan menga cɔti on ŋwaya neeni wyeñɛti te dahab, ɔci te bil pɔdda, ɔci te gwoyya pwadin, ɔci te jang, ɔci te luom, ɔci te waaŋgiyɛ,
46003013	kanŋa ɛkɛ warɛ lyɛldɛ. Acaan te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maañ menga da nɔɔtki kanŋa ɛkɛ.
46003014	Kan maka cɔti on ŋwaya neeni wyeñɛti neeni gɛɛl kanŋa ɛkɛ maañ kɔɔrniyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Tolan genga.
46003015	Kan men gɛɛl kanŋa ɛkɛ ammɛ maañyɛ, kanŋa ɛkɛ nuottin budan, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ aŋka uda te maaño.
46003016	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkkɛ agɛ on Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ? Ɔci Boŋ Juaŋ ciyi ɛkkɛti bɛɛ?
46003017	Mena on Juaŋ nuudɛ jitinyɛ, ɛkɛ da nuudɛji Juaŋo, acaan on Juaŋyɛ, balkɔn giikin bɛɛ, ɔci ona neeniyɛ, gena ɛkkɛ.
46003018	Naa menga warɛ dieddiyɔ parɛ bɛɛ. Kan menga ɛkkɛti gɔki agi ɛkɛ agji ‘wana ñingɛ tɛyan ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ aga aamma, aŋka ɛkɛ aga mena ñingɛ tɛyan awarɛ.
46003019	Acaan waka guaktan ma ṭɛɛrji agi ñing tɛɛnyɛ, ñaldɛ Juaŋ a wyeñ booj bala ba Jyek Juaŋ jyeka A kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “‘Ya labji ɛkkɛn yuarcaji te ñing tɛɛn ɛkkɛn jitin ɔɔn.”
46003020	Ɔci moki agi, “Ciɛggɔn paŋi maka ñingɛn tɛyan ŋeejɛ a paŋŋa budan.”
46003021	Naa menga warɛ naŋdɛ te kanŋa men baan budan bɛɛ, acaan waak waakɛnda a wak ɛkkɛ.
46003022	Kan a ‘ya, walla a Apɔɔlɔc, walla a Butruc, ɔci walla baan warda, ɔci walla a tɛɛtin walla lieno, ɔci walla acca ɔci ne ñamu, waka neeni waakɛndayɛ, a wak ɛkkɛ.
46003023	Ɔci ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔ, ɔci Kiṭɔyɛ, a Men Jwaŋa Tolan.
46004001	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ma ɔɔn ñaltɔn ba maka kanŋan Kiṭɔti maka ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ wak Juaŋ waka jitkɛn a cogginy.
46004002	Ɔci kanŋa weegɛn buagɔn dala maka ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ kanŋa neeni kandi ba jyeka ṭagdɛ ɛkɛy.
46004003	Kan ɛkkɛ jiek dɔɔdɛ ‘ya wyeñuti, walla kan a godan ma baan budanyɛ, naŋka neeni tolcin ‘yati bɛɛ. ‘Ya waru noŋga godan paru bɛɛ.
46004004	’Ya yomu wɔɔkcin, yeti naŋka neeni ‘ya naŋda agdi mena pwadan bɛɛ.
46004005	Naa ɛkkɛ jiek naŋdɛ te genga men ne wɔɔka awarɛ men baawi bɛɛ. Da ɛkkɛ kɛɛddɛ lakun ne Ciɛggɔn bɛɛdɛ ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ waka bala miel jitin ɔci waka bala ma yomgɛnti, lɛɛldɛ ɛkɛ bora. Te wɔɔka wannayɛ, Juaŋ menga da ‘wondɛ jiɛd ɛkɛ oŋo.
46004006	Acca modg ɔɔn, waka guaŋi ‘ya neeni, guaŋi ‘ya te war Apɔɔlɔc ɔci te war ‘ya te ɛkkɛ modg ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ urtɛti te ɔɔn, aŋka naa ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ‘yeettɛ bora jyeka kiigin ŋotkɛnti ɔci menga ɛkkɛti noŋdi warɛ mengati bɛɛ.
46004007	Acaan a menɛ i naŋŋi tol te maka pookɛny? A gena baaw iti oŋ ɛkɛ yuarŋi i bɛɛy? Oŋ ne kan i gena neeni yuarŋi dokiyɛ, oŋ i noŋ waru bala ba ne gena neeni i ‘wonniti Juaŋ a ‘woñgin bɛɛ ɔɔn ogo?
46004008	Ɛkkɛ balkɛ waka ɛkkɛ buagɛ waakɛnda doki. Ɛkkɛ korkɔ kuumi doki. Ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ cyekin ḍwaŋin te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ doki, yeti bolja wanna yɔmjin bɛɛ. ‘Ya baal kɛɛy awarɛ, ka dala te ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ cyekin ḍwaŋin, aŋka te ɔɔn da aŋŋɔn cyekin ḍwaŋin iki ɛkkɛ.
46004009	Acaan yuarca ‘ya Juaŋ ɔɔn cuudan ɛkɛ neeni lɛɛlnɔn bora te maka coŋin jitin ba maka wanɛ ma te lien aŋka noktan ma. Ɔɔn aŋŋɔn liɛlti waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋti waakɛnda, malɛɛkan ɔci ma baanti daŋkun.
46004010	Ɔɔn wyetkɔ baaw te Yaccu, yeti ɛkkɛ balkɛ wyetkɔ ne tolan Kiṭɔti. Ɔɔn waakɔ koocin, yeti ɛkkɛ aŋka waakɔ tɛɛcin, ma noŋi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti, yeti menga bala noŋi ne pwadan ɔɔnti bɛɛ!
46004011	Ne acca men ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn amdɔn koñ ɔci yiɛno, ɔci atɔn waakɔ budan. Ɔɔn jiepkɔn ma. Ɔɔn balkɔn baan bɛɛ.
46004012	Ɔɔn kanŋɔn ne pɛñan te byeŋki ɔɔn. Ne ɔɔn ‘walkɔnti mayɛ, ɔɔn gɔkɔn ɛkkɛnti ne pwadan men ɔɔn, ne ɔɔn naŋkɔnti ma ne yaayanyɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ tieŋnɔn,
46004013	ne ɔɔn jomkɔntiyɔ mayɛ, ɔɔn ṭwoktɔn ɛkkɛnti te yoma pwadan. Ɔɔn baallɔn ba tuok baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni, ɔci baallɔn ba giikin baan konɛ wɛnni.
46004014	’Ya kiew jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga lɔɔn bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya kiew jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ ṭyɛldinyɔ ba kɛɛgin ‘ya kɛɛgin onga ‘yay.
46004015	Kan ɛkkɛ balkɛ maka wɛɛyi ɛkkɛ a alpn a inyaakkɛn (10,000) Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balkɛ weyyɔ ne coŋɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ oonin ‘ya Yaccu Kiṭɔti te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin.
46004016	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan aŋka ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ‘ya.
46004017	Te naŋka neeniyɛ, ‘ya Timutawuc cuoñña ɛkkɛti, ɛkɛ a kacca ana ‘yay. Ɛkɛ a mena pwadan Ciɛggɔn ñamɛti. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ nɔɔttɛ te coodi ‘ya Yaccu Kiṭɔti. Coodi ‘ya bala ba jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma noon warda kaniican jitin neeni.
46004018	Ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti noŋi waakɛn poŋi gɔki agi ‘ya baaljɔ bɛɛdjɔ ḍieŋjɔ ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
46004019	Yeti ‘ya baal bɛɛd ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan kan Juaŋ buagɔny, ‘ya buaga gɔrca war tɛɛn ɛkkɛn. ‘Ya buaga gɔrca jyek maka noŋi waakɛn neeni budan bɛɛ.
46004020	Acaan cyɛgji Juaŋ ɛkɛ a war tɛɛno. A jyeka budan bɛɛ.
46004021	Ɛkkɛ buagɛ gena? Ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya bɛɛd ecca wiici bieŋuti, walla ‘ya bɛɛd te ani ɔci boŋa pwadan?
46005001	Jiek ati noon warda te tomma bala ɛkkɛtiy. Tomma neeni yaayɛ ne tolan moki maka moṭi waka budantiy. Acaan menga bala ɛkkɛti wɛnni niin i ɛŋ weegɛn.
46005002	Ɛkkɛ yaaktiti noŋi waakɔ a ɔki? Ba ɛkkɛ kuuyɛ bɛ? Mena noŋi a ɔɔn wannayɛ, dala ɛkɛ ŋualdɛ bora te ɛkkɛ jitkiti wɛnan.
46005003	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ‘ya waru baawa ɛkkɛti aŋanyɛ, boŋ ‘ya balgi iki ɛkkɛ aŋan, ɔci ‘ya jiek olja mena noŋi ne yaayan neeni wyeñɛti doki, bala ba ne ‘ya baala aŋan ɔɔn.
46005004	Ne ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ ḍɔɔldɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛ te booŋo, ɔci te war tɛɛn Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ,
46005005	dala ɛkkɛ ‘wana neeni ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan bieŋɛti, dala war ɛkɛ baadi, ɔci boŋ ɛkɛ aŋka yɔɔdɛ Ciɛggɔn te oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdɛy.
46005006	Naŋka noŋɛ ɛkkɛ waakɔ wanna pwatcin bɛɛ. Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ñamga ne ḍiɛkan ḍuobja wayi ma ne tolan caaba warda te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ?
46005007	Dala ɛkkɛ nɔji ɔci naŋka yeyin uuttɛ ɔntɔ te ɛkkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ, acaan Kiṭɔ ŋaabɛ ma kakanti te ikin.
46005008	Dala ikin codin nɔji ɔci naŋka yeyin waakɛnda neeni daltin, dala ikin cietin te coodi pwani ɔci te coodda awarɛ moki.
46005009	Ɛkkɛ kieŋnin ‘ya worga acaan naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ i maka noŋi tomi bɛɛy.
46005010	’Ya gɔk maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti maka tobin neeni, ɔci maka yomgɛn ḍwaŋin te waak, ɔci maka a ɛɛjan, ɔci maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋŋɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ kaannɛ bora te baan konɛti doki.
46005011	’Ya kiewan worga ɛkkɛti acaan naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ i mena bardɛ ɛkkɛ a mod ɛkkɛ te Kiṭɔ, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ a tomma, ɔci yomɛ tolcin te waak ɔci moṭi jɔkin yeyinti, ɔci ḍori ma, ɔci nokkin mooy, ɔci a ɛɛja wanna bɛɛ. Mena bala a ɔɔnyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ omdi i ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ.
46005012	Te gena aŋka ‘ya jiek olja maka bora wyetkɛnti budany, pari ɛkkɛ jiek oldɛ maka kaniicaji wyetkɛnti bɛɛ?
46005013	Acaan maka bala bora te kaniicajiyɛ, Juaŋ jiek oldɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti bala ba jyeka a kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ mena yaayan neeniyɛ, ŋualdɛ ɔntɔ te kaniicaji wɛnan.”
46006001	Ne men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti yomɛ yaayɛ moodɛn gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ moodɛn tiagdɛyɔ non godan maka a ma Juaŋti bɛɛ ogo? Ba ɛkɛ moodɛn eedɛ ma Juaŋti bɛ?
46006002	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ maka pwadin noŋdi godan maka baan konɛti wɛnni bɛɛ? Ɔci kan maka baan konɛti wɛnni noŋdɛ ɛkkɛ godany, oŋ ɛkkɛ yaakɛti jyeka bala ɛkkɛti ḍyɛrin neeni ñaldɛ pookɔ bɛɛ?
46006003	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ a ikin noŋtin godan malɛɛkanti bɛɛ? A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeka bala ɛkkɛti ñaldɛ ɛkkɛ pookɔ ne koyan budan.
46006004	Oŋ te gena ɛkkɛ godan ɛkkɛ eedɛ bora maka a ma kaniicati bɛɛy?
46006005	’Ya gɔkka a ɔŋŋi aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga lɔɔno! Menga bala ɛkkɛti aŋan a mena ñingɛ tɛyan ne tolan aŋka jyeka neeni ñaldɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ?
46006006	Yeti mod gɛɛl ooddi moodɛn tiagdɛyɔ non ganuun maka a Ma Kiṭɔti bɛɛ ogo?
46006007	Naŋki godan neeni ne baali ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ buannɛji ɛkɛ doki. Ba ɛkkɛ naŋka damɛ ma ɛkkɛti ḍuattɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛ? Ba dienna dyetki ma ɛkkɛ ñingɔ neeni ḍuattɛ ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛ?
46006008	Yeti ɛkkɛ woodgɔ noŋi ma ñingɛn, ɔci noŋɛ modg ɛkkɛ ñingɛn daŋkun!
46006009	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ a maka yeyin neeni non cyɛgji Juaŋ yuartan ɛkkɛn baaw bɛɛ? Naa ɛkkɛ dieddɛ ñin menga bɛɛ. Kan a maka tobin, walla kan a maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti, ɔci kan a maka niin i maka a ‘uayi,
46006010	ɔci kan a maka a ɛyi, ɔci maka yomgɛn ḍwaŋin, ɔci maka nokkin mook, ɔci maka ḍor ma, ɔci maka kwayi wak mayɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda dɛndi non cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ.
46006011	Ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti bala a ɔɔn te ñamu. Yeti ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te nɔjjo, ɔci ɛkkɛ pwannɛ ɔci aŋŋɛ maka awarɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci te Boŋ Jwaŋ ikin.
46006012	’Ya dita gɔkca ka “Waak waakɛnda pwadɔ ‘yati,” oŋ yeti waak waakɛnda yɔmjin bɛɛ. “Waak waakɛnda pwadɔ ‘yati,” oŋ yeti genga bala ‘ya naŋda a kɛɛngɔn ɛkɛ bɛɛ.
46006013	“Amyɛ, te kono, ɔci konyɛ, te amo.” Oŋ yeti Juaŋ ɛkkɛn nuudɛji yaakkɛn. Naa wara bala ikinti neeni oltin noŋin ikin tomi bɛɛ, yeti oltin kanŋin ikin gena Ciɛggɔnti. Ɔci Ciɛggɔn noŋi kanŋa te waak ikin.
46006014	Juaŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ jɔɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ te lienti te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin jɔɔŋtin ñaalɔ daŋkun.
46006015	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne waak ɛkkɛ ñooki i Kiṭɔ bɛɛ? ‘Ya wara ñoowin i Kiṭɔ owwa bora ɔci ñaagdiyɔ i ɛŋa a tomma? Hayɛllɛ!
46006016	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ, a mena ñoodi i ɛŋa a tomma ɛkkɛn aŋi wara ne cyɛɛlɔ i ɛkɛ bɛɛ? Jyeka a kiigin gɔki agi, “Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñoowin yaakkɛn.”
46006017	Oŋ yeti mena warɛ ñaaktiti Ciɛggɔntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋi ba mena ne cyɛɛlɔ i ɛkɛ te booŋo.
46006018	Dala ɛkkɛ tomi daldɛ. Nɔjja naŋdi men baan waakɛndayɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi te bora budan, oŋ yeti mena noŋdi nɔji tomiyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi nɔji war ɛkɛti.
46006019	Waak ɛkkɛ ŋeejɛ ne akki on Boŋ Juaŋ mena bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti mena bala ɛkkɛti neeni bɛɛ? Ɛkkɛ agɛ wak waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ agɛ wak Juaŋo.
46006020	Ɛkkɛ agɛ wiɛlgɔn, a ɔŋŋi dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan Juaŋti te waak ɛkkɛ.
46007001	Te taata taaññɛ ɛkkɛ te worga oonɛ ɛkkɛ ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ṭwoggin ‘ya bala a ɔŋŋi, kan i ḍɛññi bɛɛyɛ, pwatcin doki.
46007002	Oŋ yeti te bwaji naŋki tomiyɛ, dala maka a ‘uay men da baltan ɛŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci moong men da baltan ‘war ɛkɛ.
46007003	’Uanyɛ, ɛɛŋ ‘wondɛ waka ɛkɛ buagiy, ɔci ɛɛŋ daŋkun noŋdi ba ‘war ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
46007004	Ɛɛŋyɛ, war ɛkɛ te ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ, yeti te ‘war ɛkɛ daŋkun, ɔci ‘uan daŋkunyɛ, war ɛkɛ bala te ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ, yeti te ɛŋ ɛkɛ daŋkun.
46007005	Naa ɛkkɛ ṭiewɛ yɔtin pookɔ i ɛŋ i bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ jiek ñaagdiyɔ ne wɔɔka baali te cɔŋiy, ɔci ɛkkɛ waakɔ ñaagdɛ moki oŋ aŋka naa Jwaŋa Yaayan ɛkkɛ pɔɔdɛ te bolja ɛkkɛ yaakɛti waakɔ mugdɛ bɛɛy.
46007006	’Ya gɔk jyeka neeni acaan ‘ya ‘yer ɛkkɛ te ḍɛɛn bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya gɔk aŋka dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ ŋeeddɛ, kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ awarɛy.
46007007	’Ya buaga dala ma waakɛnda ciya budan te moong bala ba ‘ya ɔɔn. Oŋ yeti men da balki gena ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋy, magga buagɔn ḍɛɛdi, ɔci magga buagɔn ḍɛɛdi bɛɛ.
46007008	Acca ‘ya gɔkka te maka baakin moong ɔci moonga a cieky, pwatcin te ɛkkɛn. Dala ɛkkɛn ciya budan te ḍɛɛn ba ‘ya ɔɔn.
46007009	Oŋ yeti kan ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti waakɛn tiekɛ bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛdi. Ḍɛɛn aŋka pwatcin te coodda i ciyi budan te ɛɛŋ oŋ buagiti noŋi gena tomiy.
46007010	Maka balkɔn moongyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn ‘woñga jyeka neeni, yeti a ‘ya bɛɛ, gena Ciɛggɔn. Ɛɛŋyɛ, naa ‘war ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛ.
46007011	Kan ɛkɛ ‘uarɛ dalniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciya budan te ‘uano, ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛn jiek ywaŋtan i ‘uarɛ. Ɔci mena ‘uan daŋkunyɛ, naa ɛŋ ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛ.
46007012	’Ya gɔkka maka pookɛnti moki (gena ‘ya, a Ciɛggɔn bɛɛ), kan mod ikin gɛɛl a men Kiṭɔ oŋ ɛkɛ balkɔn ɛŋa jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn ciyi i ɛkɛyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ɛɛŋ daldɛ bɛɛ.
46007013	Ɔci moki kan mena a ɛɛŋ a men Kiṭɔ oŋ ɛkɛ balkɔn ‘wana jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ, yeti kan ‘uan buagɔn ciyi i ɛkɛyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ‘uan daldɛ bɛɛ.
46007014	Acaan ‘wana jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ neeniyɛ, pwani te ɛŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛŋa jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ neeniyɛ, pwani te jyeni ‘war ɛkɛ. Kan te bala a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, te kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn yɔmjin Juaŋti bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti ba bolja men gɛɛl ɛkkɛnti agi men Juaŋ neeniyɛ, kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn yɔmjin Juaŋti doki.
46007015	Oŋ yeti kan mena a men Kiṭɔ bɛɛ neeni buagɔn jyek doortinyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagiy, acaan mod ɔci kow genga bala ɛkkɛn mugdɛyɔ te coodda wanna bɛɛ. Acaan Juaŋ ikin bornin coodda pwadanti.
46007016	Çeej i a ɔki, a ɛŋa jyeti Kiṭɔtiy, ‘war i yɔya i? Ɔci ŋeej i a ɔki, a ‘wana jyeti Kiṭɔtiy, ɛŋ i yɔya i?
46007017	Dala men da coodi ɛkɛ bala ba bolja ɛkɛ ‘wonni Juaŋy, ɔci ba borkin Ciɛggɔn men da bornɛy. Jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔkca kaniicanti waakɛnda a ɔɔn.
46007018	Mena bornɛ Juaŋ oŋ ɛkɛ a ŋudgɔnyɛ, naa ɛkɛ warɛ naŋdɛ a ɛkɛ a ŋudgɔn bɛɛ, ɔci mena bornɛ Juaŋ oŋ ɛkɛ a ŋudgɔn bɛɛyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ŋuttan ma bɛɛ.
46007019	Kan men gɛɛl a ŋudgɔnyɛ, a genga bɛɛ, ɔci kan mena ciyi budan te ŋuniyɛ, a genga bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti tiid ganuun Jwaŋa Tolan warɛyɛ, aŋka pwatcin.
46007020	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala men da ciya ba bolja ɛkɛ bornɛ Juaŋy.
46007021	Ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk ne ɛkkɛ bornɛti Juaŋyɛ? Baatɔ, yeti kan ɛkkɛ balkɛ wɔɔka aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ kɛɛnk bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ doki.
46007022	Acaan mena bornɛ Juaŋ ne ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ pɔŋnɛ Ciɛggɔn doki. Bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, kan mena bornɛ Juaŋ ne ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn bɛɛyɛ, acca ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn Kiṭɔ.
46007023	Ɛkkɛ agɛ wiɛlgɔn, A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ agdɛ kɛɛnk ma baan bɛɛ.
46007024	Modg ɔɔn, dala ma waakɛnda ciya i Juaŋ a cyɛɛlɔ ba borkin ɛkkɛn bornɛ ɛkɛy.
46007025	Acca te maka a kaalk ɔci maka ṭɔlgyɛ, ‘ya balka jwali gɛɛl te Ciɛggɔnti aŋka guagdi ‘ya te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya ɛkkɛ ‘wondin paŋi ‘ya ba mena pwani Ciɛggɔn ñamɛti te yom pwani ɛkɛy.
46007026	Yuarca ‘ya acca tɛɛcin te coodi ikin Ma Kiṭɔ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya poŋ ka mena buagɔn ciyi budan te ɛɛŋyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciya budan ɔɔn.
46007027	I ḍɛññi ɛɛŋɔ? Yeti naa i pocca ɛkɛ pɔkka bɛɛ. I ḍɛññi boki? Kan baawiyɛ, naa lierca gɛɛl bɛɛ.
46007028	Yeti kan i ḍɛññiyɛ, naŋka wanna a nɔji bɛɛ. Ɔci kan ṭɔɔl gɛɛl ḍɛyɛ mayɛ, ḍɛɛn ɛkɛ wanna a nɔji bɛɛ, yeti coodda yaayan daŋkun bɛya maka neeniti, ɔci ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ ‘uottinti coodda yaayan neeni moki bɛɛ.
46007029	Modg ɔɔn, gena gen kona guagdi ‘ya neeni, wɔɔka bɛɛdɛ Kiṭɔ cualcin acca, ɔci ne ñamu ɔɔnyɛ, dala maka balki moong neeni cootti ba ɛkkɛn balkiti moong bɛɛ ɔɔn.
46007030	Ɔci maka yomgɛn yeyinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya ba ɛkkɛn yomgɛn yieki bɛɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci maka yomgɛn ñɔyinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya ba ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔki bɛɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci maka wɛɛṭi waakyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya ba ɛkkɛn baakiti waak ɔɔn.
46007031	Ɔci maka kanŋan te waka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍuattanti waka neeniti bɛɛ. Acaan ṭɛra ciyin ikin acca neeni ati noŋi baadi doki.
46007032	’Ya buaga naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ jiek yomgɔti ne coŋɔn bɛɛ. Mena ḍɛñi bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te wak Ciɛggɔn aŋka Ciɛggɔn yomɛ pwada.
46007033	Mena ḍɛñiyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te waka baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni aŋka ɛkɛ ɛɛŋɛ ywaŋdɛ yomɛti.
46007034	Ɔci kanŋan ɛkɛ ŋuottin jitin, ɛŋa ḍɛyɛ ma bɛɛ walla a ṭɔɔl menyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te wak Ciɛggɔn aŋka ɛkɛ ciyi te wara pwadan, ɔci te boŋa pwadan Ciɛggɔn ñamɛti. Yeti ɛŋa ḍɛyɛ ma dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋi te waka baanji wɛnni aŋka ‘war ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada.
46007035	’Ya gɔk a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya yɔŋ ɛkkɛ a ywaŋŋo, ga ‘ya waka cyɛgan kɔɔnja ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ gena pwadan ɔci awarɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ ‘wondɛ Ciɛggɔn waakɛnda aŋka paŋi ɛkkɛ cyɛndi jitin bɛɛ.
46007036	Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ noŋjɛ ne pwadan ñan ɛkɛti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ aŋi ṭɔla tolan dokiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagɛ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛdi. Ɛkɛ noŋi nɔji te naŋka wanna bɛɛ.
46007037	Yeti mena yomɛ tiektɛ, ɔci ñan ɛkɛ tiidiyɔ ciya a ṭɔɔl ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan.
46007038	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, mena ñan ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan, yeti mena ñan ɛkɛ daldɛ te ḍɛɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka noŋi ne pwadan nɔñji.
46007039	Mena ɛɛŋ ne ‘war ɛkɛ ciyi a tɛɛta menyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔkcin bɛɛ, yeti kan ‘war ɛkɛ tuun dokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔŋi oŋ aŋka ḍɛɛdɛ ‘wana bala ɛkɛ buagɛy, yeti ɛkɛ ḍɛɛdɛ ‘wana a men Kiṭɔ.
46007040	Yeti ‘ya poŋ ka ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya ñɔɔn ne tolan ne ɛkɛ coodi budan te ḍɛɛny. Gena paŋi ‘ya neeni, ɔci ‘ya poŋ ‘ya daŋkun balka Boŋ Juaŋo.
46008001	Acca te jyek yoŋga ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin, ikin waakida balkin ŋeejin ikin waak ŋeeciny. Çeejinyɛ, ɛkɛ a yɛcan kotti ne ñaalɔ. Yeti aniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka cɔti warɛ.
46008002	Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ waak ŋeejjɛ waakcindayɛ, haldu, ɛkɛ genga ŋeejɛ awarɛ men bɛɛ.
46008003	Yeti kan men gɛɛl ani Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
46008004	Oŋ a ɔŋŋi te jyek yoŋga ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin jɔkin waakɛnda iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a waagga bɛɛ, ɔci Juaŋ gɛɛl bala parɛ moki bɛɛ, gena Jwaŋa Tolan parɛ.
46008005	Ne kan waak gɛɛg bala bartan ma a “jɔkin yeyin” iñɔ ṭɛɛrji ɔci pɔlijiyɛ, bala ba “jɔkin yeyin” bala kɔɔna kɔɔni ɔci “cyekin” kɔɔna kɔɔnno.
46008006	Ikin balkin Juaŋ ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin, mena waak waakɛnda bɛɛn te ɛkɛtiy, ɔci ikin moki tɛɛtin te ɛkɛ. Ɔci ikin balkin Ciɛggɔn ne cyɛɛlɔ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena waak waakɛnda bɛɛn te ɛkɛtiy, ɔci ikin moki bɛɛnin te ɛkɛti.
46008007	Jyeka neeni ŋeecɔn ma waakɛnda bɛɛ. Yeti ma gɛɛgyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn aanɛ te ami waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti, ɔci ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti neeniyɛ, ‘yɛrŋi ma aŋŋi wak jɔkin agi wardan. Ɔci acaan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn koocinyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn aŋi giikin.
46008008	Oomdinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ikin eetin Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ, ɔci kan ikin omminyɛ, ikin yɔɔrtin genga te ami ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
46008009	Yeti dala i waŋu tiicca aŋka naa naŋki i neeni aga guonan tuor mod ɛkkɛ mena yomɛ koyan neeni bɛɛ.
46008010	Kan mena warɛ koyan gɛɛl, i a mena balki ŋeejin neeni yuardi baal om waka ŋartan ma jɔkin yeyinti neeni on jɔkin yeyin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ oldɛti ɔci omdi wak jɔkin yeyin neeni acaan ɛkɛ i yuarŋi baal om wak jɔkin bɛɛ?
46008011	Te ñing tɛɛn iyɛ, mod ɛkkɛ ‘wana yomɛ koyan mena Kiṭɔ tuun te ɛkɛ daŋkun neeniyɛ, nuottin jitin doki.
46008012	Nɔjja naŋa i modgɔti te amma omi i wak jɔkin yeyin ɔci yooci i yomg ɛkkɛn yomga koyan wannayɛ, i noŋ nɔji Kiṭɔti.
46008013	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan ami wak jɔkin ɛkɛ a gena mod ɔɔn yiɛptɛ iñɔyɛ, ‘ya omja yoŋi waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyinti gɛɛl moki aŋka mod ɔɔn ḍɛmdi te naŋki ‘ya bɛɛ.
46009001	’Ya ḍwaŋu wɔɔkcin bɛɛ? Pari ‘ya a cuuda bɛɛ? ‘Ya Ciɛggɔn ikin Kiṭɔ yuarŋ bɛɛ? Pari ɛkkɛ a ma kanŋa ‘ya Ciɛggɔnti bɛɛ?
46009002	Kan ‘ya a cuuda maka pookɛnti bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya a cuuda ɛkkɛti, acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ wyeñ kanŋa ‘ya Ciɛggɔnti.
46009003	Gena ṭwoggin ‘ya maka poci ‘ya neeniti neeni.
46009004	Hay! Yɔmjin ɔɔnti ne ɔɔn omɔn ɔci motɔn te wak kanŋa ɔɔn bɛɛ?
46009005	Hay! Yɔmjin ɔɔnti ne moong ɔɔn wɛɛdɔn ba cuudan pookɛn, kan ɔɔn balkɔn moong bɛɛ? Ɔci ba modg Ciɛggɔn ɔci Cipac bɛɛ?
46009006	Walla ɔɔn yaakkɔ i Barnabac aŋka a maka kanŋan waak pookɛn aŋka ciyɔn tɛɛtɔn ɔɔn?
46009007	A menɛ kanŋan a ackan oŋ warɛ ḍɔɔktɛ bilk parɛy? A menɛ cuoti jang jiniinaji oŋ omi jang ṭɔlgɛn bɛɛy? A ḍɛɛnɔn ɔki moti ak mala ciddɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛy?
46009008	Jyek ‘ya neeni a jyek ma baan budan boki? Pari ganuun gɔki jwalla neeni moki bɛɛ?
46009009	Acaan jyeka a kiigin jyek ganuun Muuca gɔki agi, “Naa yaan ḍyɛga tukɛti ne ɛkɛ baali deyi pok bɛɛ.” I poŋ Juaŋ poŋi te yotk pookɛn ne ɛkɛ gɔkki jwalla neeni nɛ?
46009010	A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala poŋi te ikin. Jyeka neeni kiiwɛ ma te ikin. Mena ooṭi ṭɛɛr konɛ ɔci mena ɛṭi pokyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi kanŋa ɛkɛ ɔci jyeti kɛɛy acaan ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi waak te kanŋa ɛkɛti.
46009011	Kan ɔɔn kookin pwadin piinnɔn ɛkkɛ yomgɔtiyɛ, oŋ yɔmjin doki kan ne ɔɔn yɔɔrdɔn waak te ɛkkɛti bɛɛ?
46009012	Kan maka pookɛn gɛɛg ñoonɛ i ɛkkɛ te eñi waakyɛ, pari ɔɔn a maka eci ne tolan nɔñji bɛɛ? Oŋ yeti ɔɔn naŋka awarɛ neeni naŋŋɔn bɛɛ? Yeti ɔɔn naŋka neeni waakɛnda ḍuannɔn ḍɔɔggɔti, acaan naa pɔy jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin te Kiṭɔ neeni uuldɔnti bɛɛ.
46009013	Çeej i maka kanŋan on Juaŋ ona tolanti oomdin ɛkkɛn bɛya te on Juaŋ ona tolanti, ɔci maka kanŋan nona ɛrki ma waakyɛ, ɛkkɛn omi waka ‘yɛrtan ma neeni daŋkun bɛɛ?
46009014	Bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, Ciɛggɔn gɔkkin agi maka kanŋan loṭi ma te worga Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, waka amtan ɛkkɛn bɛya te kanŋa lorki ɛkkɛn ma te worga Juaŋti daŋkun.
46009015	Yeti ‘ya noŋi waka neeni gɛɛl bɛɛ, walla ‘ya kiew worga aŋka ‘ya ‘wonta ma waka neeni gɛɛl bɛɛ, acaan lyena tuuda ‘ya aŋka yɔmjin, aŋka naa menga pwani ‘ya naŋdɛ aga gena budan te naŋki warɛ bɛɛ!
46009016	Ne ‘ya loṭa jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin matiyɛ, ‘ya balka genga aŋka ‘ya jiɛtati ma bɛɛ, acaan lalla loṭa ‘ya neeni ɛkɛ a gena bala ‘ya ḍwaŋuti aŋka naŋdi ‘yay. Kan ‘ya lor ma te jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛ, naŋka yaayan bɛya ‘ya wyeñuti!
46009017	Kan ‘ya lor ma te yom ‘ya waanɛyɛ, ‘ya yɔɔra genga te Juaŋti. Yeti kan ‘ya lor te yom ‘ya waanɛ bɛɛyɛ, kanŋa ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ neeni naŋi ‘ya awarɛ bɛɛ.
46009018	’Ya ‘wonta ma gena? A’a, ne ‘ya loṭa jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin matiyɛ, ‘ya lor acaan ‘ya ‘wonta ma genga bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya noŋja gena kanŋa ɔci wierta te paŋi waka ‘ya ‘wontati ma te kanŋa ‘yay.
46009019	’Ya a kɛɛngɔn men baan gɛɛl acaan ɛkɛ ‘ya ḍɔɔkta bilk kanŋa ‘ya bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya waru naŋi a mena kanŋan mati waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛn owwa Kiṭɔti ne coŋɔn.
46009020	Ne ‘ya baala kanŋa ma Icrayiiltiyɛ, ‘ya baal ciy ba coodi ɛkkɛn ɔɔn, aŋka ‘ya yaakati ɛkkɛn owwa Kiṭɔti. Ɔci ‘ya baal noŋ ba ne ‘ya baala byeŋ ganuun Muuca ɔɔn, ne ‘ya baala kanŋin iki maka balki jyek ganuun aŋka ‘ya ɛkkɛn owwa Kiṭɔti.
46009021	Maka baakɛ ganuunyɛ, ‘ya baali ba ne baakati ganuun ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Yeti ‘ya baaka ganuun Juaŋ bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya balka ganuun Kiṭɔ. Oŋ ‘ya waru naŋi ba baakati ganuun ɔɔn, aŋka ‘ya maka baaki ganuun neeni owwa Kiṭɔti.
46009022	Maka waakɛn koyantiyɛ, ‘ya waru naŋi ba ‘ya waru koyi ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn, aŋka ‘ya ɛkkɛn owwa Kiṭɔti. ‘Ya aŋi waak waakɛnda mati waakɛnda aŋka ‘ya ma gɛɛg uddo.
46009023	’Ya noŋ a ɔɔn te jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin aŋka naŋka pwadan bɛya ‘yati daŋkun te jyeka neeniti.
46009024	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ non boddin maka ñwobbɔ ɛkkɛn ywoddɔ waakɛnda, oŋ mena ma boddɛ aŋka ‘wontan ma genga bɛɛ? A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kuadɛ aŋka gena neeni buuŋdɛ ɛkkɛ.
46009025	Maka ñieyi waakɛnda ɛkkɛn tieci waakɛn te waak waakɛnda. Ɛkkɛn noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛn yɔɔrdi taagga bɔnnin taagga baadi budan neeni. Yeti ikinyɛ, yɔɔrtin taagga baadi bɛɛy.
46009026	’Ya yiŋ mɔr amaam budan bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya jieb noon te buam budan amaam ba mena jieb jwami budan ɔɔn bɛɛ.
46009027	Yeti ‘ya waru tiido, ɔci ‘ya agdi ḍuaŋa ɛkɛ, dita ‘ya yɔmja te genga te lalla loṭa ‘ya neeni bɛɛ.
46010001	’Ya buaga dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, hay modg ɔɔn! Weyi ikin waakɛnda bala ati pɔli pwanɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn Tola Tidan jyɛdɛji.
46010002	Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda buullɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te pɔllo, ɔci toolji moki aŋka ɛkkɛn aga maka bootcin Muucatiy.
46010003	Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda omi ama pooktan,
46010004	ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda moti pyega pooktany. Acaan ɛkkɛn moti te pyega bɛɛn te guonan pooktanti, guonan bala ati i ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔy. Ɔci guonan neeni Gena Kiṭɔ.
46010005	Yeti ɛkkɛn muŋŋɛ Juaŋ waakɛnda bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdin wɔɔŋji aŋan.
46010006	Waka neeni mieti ikin aŋka naa ikin antin naŋki nɔji ba ɛkkɛn moki ɔɔn bɛɛ.
46010007	Naa ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka moṭi jɔkin yeyinti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn te baaṭi ma gɛɛg bala moṭi jɔkin yeyin neeniti bala ba kiiwɛ ma agi, “Ma cooccin iñɔ aŋka omi ɔci moti, ɔci ɛkkɛn jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ aŋka ñiɛldi.”
46010008	Naa ikin noŋtin tomi ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɛɛg noŋi tomi ɔci ḍɛɛmdin tuun a alpn a men baan wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ (23,000) te oŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.
46010009	Naa ikin Ciɛggɔn pɔɔtin bɛɛ. Acaan ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛntiyɛ, Ciɛggɔn pɔɔyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn kooyɛ kogi ɔci tuuni.
46010010	Ɔci walla naa ikin ywontin waakɔ ba ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛnti ne ywoñki waakɛn te baaṭi ɔci ɛkkɛn yaaññɛ Malɛɛka Yooci Noon wanna bɛɛ.
46010011	Naŋka neeni bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn myettan, yeti ɛkkɛn kiiwɛ ma, aŋka loṭi ikin maka acca yuonga ookkin ne ŋoyɔ neeni.
46010012	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala mena poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ yɔɔdjɛ ne tɛyan neeni waŋɛ tiittɛ aŋka naa ɛkɛ ḍɛmdi bɛɛ.
46010013	Pɔɔta parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛn ɛkkɛti bɛɛ, gena pɔɔta ŋeecɔn ma waakɛnday. Yeti Juaŋ ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ daldɛ pɔɔt jitin ne tolan ne ɛkkɛ bwanditiji ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ war tɛɛn aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ pɔya ɛkkɛ koodɛ boray.
46010014	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, hay modg ɔɔn maka ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ uuttɛ te mali jɔkin yeyinti.
46010015	’Ya gɔk maka ñingɛn tɛyantiy, dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ gena guagdi ‘ya acca neeni ne baali a ɔkiy.
46010016	Kubaaya motin pyeg luutkin Ciɛggɔn, ɔci ikin gɔkin a pwatcin te ɛkɛ neeni, ne ikin motin ɛkɛyɛ, ikin ñoowin te yimg Kiṭɔ. Ɔci byentan wɛttin ikin jitin neeniyɛ, ikin ñoowin te war Kiṭɔ.
46010017	Acaan byentan a cyɛɛlɔ budan ɔci ikin coŋkin, yeti ikin agin wara ne cyɛɛlɔ budan acaan ikin ñoowin te byentan ne cyɛɛlɔ.
46010018	Gɔrtɛ ma Icrayiil maka omi waka ‘yɛrtan may, pari ɛkkɛn ñoowin te nona ɛrki ma waak bɛɛ?
46010019	’Ya gɔkca a ɔki, waka maltan ma a jɔkin yeyin neeni a genga? Walla waka ‘yɛrtan ma jɔkin yeyin neeniti a genga?
46010020	A’a, waka ‘yɛrtan ma baan konɛyɛ, ŋoortan ɛkkɛn jɔkin yeyin, ŋoortan Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ i jɔkin yeyin bɛɛ.
46010021	Ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti mottɛ pyeg luutkin Ciɛggɔn i pyeg luutkin jɔkin yeyin bɛɛ. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti ñoodɛ te am Ciɛggɔn ɔci am jɔkin yeyin bɛɛ.
46010022	Ikin poccin Ciɛggɔn aŋka ɛkɛ loondi ikinti ogo? Ɔci ikin waakɔ tɛɛcin te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ boki?
46010023	Waak waakɛnda pwadɔ, oŋ yeti waak waakɛnda yɔmjin bɛɛ. Waak waakɛnda pwadɔ ‘yati, oŋ yeti waak waakɛnda i uutti ñamu bɛɛ.
46010024	Naa ikin menga poŋdi te war ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ poŋdi te war moodɛn, ɔci te gena pwadan te ɛkɛy.
46010025	Yoŋga wyɛltan ma te dukkan yoŋgitiyɛ, ɛkkɛ omdɛ ɛkkɛn. Yeti naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tooci jiek bɛɛ.
46010026	Bala ba jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Šɛɛr konɛ ɔci waka bala ɛkɛ konɛti waakɛndayɛ, a wak Ciɛggɔn.”
46010027	Kan ɛkkɛ ‘uommɛ mena jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ, amti oŋ kan ɛkkɛ attiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ omdɛ waka oodɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti waakɛnda, naa ɛkkɛ tooci jiek yomgɔti bɛɛ,
46010028	oŋ yeti kan ɛkkɛ nɔɔnnɛ menga agi, “Waka neeni ŋaarŋi ma nona ɛrki ma waak jɔkin yeyintiyɛ,” naa ɛkkɛ omdi bɛɛ, acaan te mena ɛkkɛ nɔɔnnɛ wanna, ɔci te yom ɛkɛ moki.
46010029	’Ya gɔk te yomg ɛkkɛ bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔk te yomg maka pookɛn. Menga tooci agi, “Yom mena parɛ yom ‘ya mugdɛyɔ ogo?
46010030	Kan ‘ya gɔkcan Juaŋti a pwatcin ɔci omjan amy, oŋ mena parɛ jiek oldɛ ‘ya wyeñuti te gena gɔŋna ‘ya Juaŋti a pwatcin ogo?”
46010031	Kan ɛkkɛ omɛ walla motɛ walla noŋɛ naŋki gɛɛlyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ naŋka neeni naŋdɛ waakɛnda te jied Jwaŋa Tolan.
46010032	Naa ɛkkɛ agdɛ guonan tuor ma Icrayiil, ɔci Keedin Pookɛn, ɔci kaniica Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
46010033	Ɔci moki ‘ya buaga ma waakɛnda yomgɛn pwada te naŋka naŋdi ‘ya waakɛnday, ‘ya lier waka pwadin te war ‘ya paru bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya lier te pwani ma waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛn uda.
46011001	Dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ‘ya bala ba ne ‘ya lɔka naŋki Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
46011002	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya baal jiey ɛkkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ poŋi te ‘ya, ɔci balgɛ noŋɛ ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lallin ‘ya waakɛnday.
46011003	’Ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ ne pwadan. Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a wyeñ maka a ‘uay waakɛnda, ɔci wyeñ mena a ɛɛŋyɛ, a ‘uano. Ɔci Kiṭɔyɛ, wyeñ ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa Tolan.
46011004	Kan mena ‘uan gɛɛl cɔki Juaŋti ɔci mieti ma te jyek Juaŋ ne ɛkɛ wyeñɛ a kwomgɔn te taagga ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan Kiṭɔti.
46011005	Ɛŋa cɔki Juaŋti ɔci mieti ma te jyek Juaŋ ɔci wyeñɛ a kwomgɔn te bworŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan wyeñ ɛkɛti. Kan ɛkɛ wyeñɛ kwommɛ bɛɛyɛ, bala ba ɛkɛ wyeñɛ ‘yɛnnɛ doki no.
46011006	Kan mena ɛɛŋ kwomi wyeñɛ bɛɛyɛ, dala jyeyi ɛkɛ tuomdɛ bora. Kan a lɔɔn mena ɛɛŋti te twomti ɔci yiɛli jyeyi borayɛ, dala ɛkɛ wyeñɛ kwomdɛ.
46011007	Naa mena ‘uan ɛɛŋdi genga wyeñɛti ne ɛkɛ cɔki bɛɛ. Acaan ɛkɛ aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ba bolji ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ a pwani Jwaŋa Tolan. Yeti mena a ɛɛŋyɛ, ɛkɛ a pwani mena ‘uano.
46011008	Acaan mena ‘uan bɛɛn te mena ɛɛŋti bɛɛ. Mena ɛɛŋ aŋka bɛɛn te mena ‘uanti.
46011009	Mena ‘uan aŋŋɛ Juaŋ oŋnɛ mena ɛɛŋ bɛɛ. Mena ɛɛŋ aŋka aŋŋɛ Juaŋ oŋnɛ mena ‘uano.
46011010	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala mena a ɛɛŋ wyeñɛ kwomdɛ te ‘war ɛkɛ, ɔci te malɛɛkan moki.
46011011	Te coodda ikin ciyin te jyek Juaŋyɛ, mena ɛɛŋ ciyi parɛ ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔkcin te mena ‘uan bɛɛ, ɔci mena ‘uan daŋkun ciyi parɛ ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔkcin te mena ɛɛŋ bɛɛ.
46011012	Acaan mena ɛɛŋ bɛɛn te mena ‘uanyɛ, mena ‘uan daŋkun jiedi ma te mena ɛɛŋo. Oŋ yeti waak waakɛnda bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti.
46011013	Dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ jwalla mugdɛ ɛkkɛ te jyeka neeniti te waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ. Pwatcin a ɔɔn mena ɛɛŋti ne ɛkɛ cɔki Juaŋti wyeñɛ daldɛ te kwomiyɛ?
46011014	Ɛkkɛ jyek bolja te baaṭi ŋeejɛ ne loṭi ɛkkɛ agi kan mena a ‘uan jyeyi ɛkɛ daldɛ ne becinyɛ, etti lɔɔn ɛkɛti bɛɛ?
46011015	Oŋ yeti kan mena ɛɛŋ jyeyyɛ beciy, pari pwani ɛkɛ bɛɛ? Ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyeyya becin aŋka kwomi ɛkɛ wyeñɛ.
46011016	Kan mena buagɔn tyewwinyɛ, ɔɔn balkɔn naŋka wanna bɛɛ, ɔci kaniica Jwaŋa Tolan balkɔn naŋka wanna daŋkun bɛɛ.
46011017	’Ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin te jyeka a caagin gɛɛg. Ɔci ‘ya baal jiey ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, acaan ne ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ a cyɛɛlɔ kaniicajiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ te pwani bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ te naŋki yoño.
46011018	Gena jwali ‘ya jwalla te ñamu neeni, ne ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ ba ma kaniicayɛ, ‘ya tieŋŋan agi jyek kɛɛptin baalɔ ɛkkɛti, ɔci jyeka neeni gɛɛg mugdi ‘ya.
46011019	’Ya yomu moda te jyeka wanna bɛɛ. Acaan jyek kɛɛptin ne balki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, maka a Ma Kiṭɔ woodgɛn waakɛn lɛɛltan bora te mati.
46011020	Ne ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ ḍɔɔldɛ aŋka omiyɛ, ama amdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna ɛkkɛ omɛ Ciɛggɔnti bɛɛ.
46011021	Acaan ne ɛkkɛ omɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ kɛɛwwɛ yɔtin bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋi ɛkkɛ men gɛɛl aŋka daldɛ amɛ koño, ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn aŋka nokkin mooyo.
46011022	A gena ɔɔn? Ɛkkɛ balkɛ oorg aŋka ɛkkɛ omɛ ɔci motɛ bɛɛ? Walla ɛkkɛ ñieyɛ te kaniica Juaŋ a ñieko, ɔci maka baaki waak neeni ‘wondɛ lɔɔn ḍɔɔggɛnti? ‘Ya gɔkka a ɔki ɛkkɛti moki? ‘Ya jiejja ɛkkɛ? A’a, ‘ya jiejja ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
46011023	Acaan gena muŋi ‘ya te Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya daŋkun neeni, ka Ciɛggɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ te ween kona ɛkɛ mukkiti mayɛ, ɛkɛ byentan luullɛ.
46011024	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ gɔŋnɛ a pwatcin Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkɛ byentan wɛnnɛ jitin, ɔci gɔkcin agi, “Gena war ‘ya wara wɛɛttin jitin te ɛkkɛ neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn daŋkun oŋkanda, aŋka ɛkkɛ poŋɛ te ‘ya.”
46011025	Ɔci moki ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn te pyeg luutkin ne ɛkkɛn ḍookki te amy. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Pyeg luutkin neeni gena jyeka ñaagɛ ma i Juaŋ wonkɛn te yimg ‘yay. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ mottɛ ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te ‘ya.”
46011026	Ne ɛkkɛ omɛ byentan neeni, ɔci motɛ pyeg luutkin neeni oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛ mietɛ ma te lyen Ciɛggɔn ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
46011027	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan men gɛɛl omdi byentan neeni, ɔci motti pyeg luutkin neeni ne ɛkɛ yɔmjin acaan motti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi nɔjjo, acaan ɛkɛ war Ciɛggɔn ɔci yimg Ciɛggɔn cuullɛyɔ.
46011028	Dala men da gɔrti war ɛkɛti ñamu lakun, ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ omdi byentan ɔci motti pyeg luutkin neeni oŋo.
46011029	Kan mena omdi ɔci motti pyeg luutkin ne ɛkɛ naŋka neeni jiña yuartɛji bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ omi ɔci moti ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan war ɛkɛti.
46011030	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti bomcin, ɔci waakɛn yeyɔ, ɔci gɛɛg tuun doki.
46011031	Kan te ikin waakɔ noŋnin godan pookɔ dokiyɛ, te ikin noŋtin Juaŋ godan moki bɛɛ.
46011032	Yeti ikin noŋnin Juaŋ godan, ɔci ikin ṭeenin ɛkɛ aŋka naa jiek bɛya ikin wyetkɔti i maka baan konɛ warda neeni bɛɛ.
46011033	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, hay, modg ɔɔn, ne ɛkkɛ coottɛ a cyɛɛlɔ non Juaŋ acaan omɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kɛɛddɛ yɔtin.
46011034	Kan menga amɛ koñyɛ, dala ɛkɛ omdi te baanji aŋka naa jiek dɔɔkti ɛkkɛ wyetkɔti a cyɛɛlɔ waakida bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya te waka pookɛn ne ‘ya bɛɛda aŋany.
46012001	Acca te jyek waka ma ‘wondɛ Boŋ Juaŋyɛ, hay, modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ jyeka awarɛ neeni jitkɛn ŋeeddɛ.
46012002	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ne wona ɛkkɛ agɛ maka moṭi Juaŋti bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ attɛ bora jɔkin yeyinti jɔkin gɔki jiek bɛɛ neeni byeŋkɛnti, ba eñña ɛkkɛ eekiti ɛkkɛn doki wanna.
46012003	Acca ‘ya miet ɛkkɛ ka mena gɔki te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti gɔkti agi, “Yaccu a ‘walgɔn” bɛɛ, ɔci menga yaakinti gɔkti agi, “Yaccu a Ciɛggɔn” budan bɛɛ. Gena mena balkɛ Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka yaakinti gɔkti a ɔɔny.
46012004	Waka ma ‘wondɛ Juaŋ jitkɛn coŋɔ, yeti ɛkkɛn bɛya te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti.
46012005	Ɔci kanŋan jitkɛn bala coŋɔ, yeti Ciɛggɔn a cyɛɛlɔ budan.
46012006	Ɔci naŋki bala jitkɛn ne coŋɔn, yeti gena Jwaŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ ma kiennɛ ɛkkɛn waakɛnda wanna.
46012007	Ɔci Juaŋ ma ‘wonnɛ Booŋ waakɛnda a lyɛlta te gena pwadan te ma waakɛnda.
46012008	Men gɛɛl ‘wonnɛ Boŋ Juaŋ boŋ ñing tɛɛno, ɔci ɛka parɛ balkɛ boŋ ŋeejin, yeti ɛkkɛn bɛya te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti.
46012009	Ɔci mena parɛ balkɛ jyenno, yeti te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti, ɔci ɛka parɛ yɔŋi ma waakɛn te wajan, yeti naŋka neeni bɛya te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti.
46012010	Men gɛɛl a mena noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki may, ɔci ɛka parɛ a mena mieti ma te jieko, ɔci mena parɛ balkɛ war tɛɛn aŋka waka bɛya te Boŋ Juaŋti ɔci waka bɛya te boŋka pookɛnti byɛŋdɛ jitin. Ɔci men gɛɛl a mena gɔki te tugga pookɛn, men gɛɛl a mena ma myettɛ jiek te tugga pookɛnti.
46012011	Waka neeni waakɛnda naŋdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ waak ‘wondɛ ma waakɛnda ba yom ɛkɛ parɛ.
46012012	Bala ba waryɛ, ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ budan, yeti ɛkɛ balkɛ waak ne coŋɔn. Ɔci wak wara ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn coŋɔ, yeti ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ budan. Ɔci war Yaccu daŋkun bala a ɔɔn. Gena kaniica.
46012013	Acaan ikin buulkin ma te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni, ɔci aŋŋin wara ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ma Icrayiil ɔci Keedin Pookɛn, ɔci maka bɔwan ɔci maka cyɛganyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda moti Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni.
46012014	War men baan balki waak ne coŋɔn.
46012015	Kan ciyu gɔkti agi, “‘Ya a bieŋ bɛɛ, war balkin genga ‘yati bɛɛ,” jwalla neeni ɛkɛ naŋdɛ aga gena ḍiɛran te warti bɛɛ.
46012016	Ɔci kan jyeñ gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya a waŋ bɛɛ, war balkin genga ‘yati bɛɛ,” jwalla neeni ɛkɛ naŋdɛ aga gena ḍiɛran te warti bɛɛ.
46012017	Kan war warda niin a waŋy, oŋ ba tyeŋi bɛ? Oŋ kan war warda a jyeñy, oŋ ba ŋood bɛ?
46012018	Yeti bala a ɔɔn, Jwaŋa Tolan war cuonnɛ waako, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ba naŋka yom ɛkɛ buagitiy.
46012019	Oŋ kan waka neeni waakɛnda niin a cyɛɛlɔ budany, oŋ war bala wɛnɛ?
46012020	Waak bala kɔɔna kɔɔnno, yeti war a cyɛɛlɔ budan.
46012021	Waŋu yaakinti gɔkti bieŋuti boki agi, “‘Ya buaga i ba.” A’a. Ɔci wyeñu yaaktanti gɔkti cieguti boki agi, “‘Ya buaga genga ɛkkɛti ba.” A’a.
46012022	Te cyɛŋŋa wannayɛ, waka men warɛti ɛkkin ñaltin ikin ba waakɛn kookɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yɔmjin ne tolan.
46012023	Ɔci waka men warɛti ɛkkin ñaltin ka ɛkkɛn a genga bɛɛyɛ, ikin noŋin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti ne tolan. Ɔci waka bala ikin waakɔti ñaltin ka yeyin neeniyɛ, ikin noŋtin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti ne tolan,
46012024	gena naŋka yookɛti makɛn pwadin neeniy. Yeti Juaŋ ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ñaaŋŋɛyɔ ba gena ne cyɛɛlɔ, aŋka ɛkkɛn nooŋdi yɔtin ne pwadan.
46012025	Ɔci waryɛ, ɛkɛ a kɛɛptɔn bɛɛ, waka men warɛti ɛkkɛn gɔɔr yɔtin pookɛn waakɛnda.
46012026	Kan gen gɛɛl te waka neeniti konɛ ñakcin te gengayɛ, ɛkkin pookɛn wanna da korkɛn ñakti ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci waka neeni kan gɛɛl naŋɛ ma ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkkin pookɛn waakɛnda yomgɛn ñɔya ñɔɔn i ɛkɛ.
46012027	Yeti ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ war Kiṭɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ agɛ maka balgɛ i ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ.
46012028	Ɔci Juaŋ ma kɛɛmnɛ kanŋa jitkɛ kaniicaji. Ma gɛɛg a cuudan, ɔci ma gɛɛg a maka mieti jieko, ɔci gɛɛg a maka loṭi may, ɔci gɛɛg a maka noŋi naŋka tɛyan, ɔci gɛɛg a maka yɔŋi ma waakɛn te wajan, ɔci gɛɛg a maka moki may, ɔci gɛɛg a maka ma ḍɔɔltanyɔ kanŋati nona ne cyɛɛlɔy, ɔci gɛɛg gɔki te tugga pookɛn ne coŋɔn.
46012029	Ma waakɛnda a cuudanɛ? Ma waakɛnda a maka lwoki ma te jiekɔ? Ma waakɛnda a maka loṭi makɔ? Hay, ma waakɛnda noŋi naŋka tɛyanɛ?
46012030	Hay, ma waakɛnda balkɛ kanŋa ywaŋi ma te wajanɛ? Hay, ma waakɛnda gɔki te tugga pookɛn? Ma waakɛnda a maka jiek jitkɛn ootan bora?
46012031	A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ, yeti dala i bwagdi ne pɛñan aŋka naŋka pwadan neeni gɛɛl bala iti. Yeti ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin pɔya pwadan ‘wota men.
46013001	Kan ‘ya yaakati gɔk te tugga iñɔ ṭɛɛrji ɔci tugga ñaalɔ pɔliji waakɛnda, oŋ ‘ya an ma bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya a genga bɛɛ, ɔci jyek ‘ya bala ba joon lɔlŋa ɔci ba joon bila garan.
46013002	Ɔci kan ‘ya ‘wonna Juaŋ miti jiek ɔci kan ‘ya jyeka a coggin ŋeej ɔci kan waak ŋeej ‘ya waakɛnda, ɔci moki kan ‘ya balka jyeni ne pwadan aŋka pomk uutca ɔntɔ te nonkɛnti, oŋ kan ‘ya an ma bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya a genga bɛɛ.
46013003	Kan ‘ya mal ‘ya ‘woñgan maka bɔwan waakɛnda, ɔci war ‘ya oljan nokka ma te jyeni ‘ya, oŋ kan ‘ya an ma bɛɛyɛ, genga yɔmdi te ‘ya bɛɛ.
46013004	Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ kɛɛy ɔci noŋi ne pwadan. Mena ani mayɛ, yomɛ motcin bɛɛ, ɔci moki noŋi warɛ bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ a yɛcan bɛɛ,
46013005	ɔci ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan bɛɛ, ɔci buagɔn genga te war ɛkɛ bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ poŋi ne yaayan bɛɛ, ɔci loomgɛ koocin bɛɛ.
46013006	Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔcin te jyeka awarɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔcin te nɔji bɛɛ.
46013007	Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ jiñɛ tɛɛcin te waak waakɛnda, ɔci jyeti waak waakɛnda, ɔci kɛɛy waak waakɛnda, ɔci balkɛ kɛɛn te waak waakɛnda.
46013008	Aniyɛ, baadi bɛɛ, oŋ yeti miti jiek mati baadi, ɔci jyeka te tugga pookɛn baadi, ɔci ŋeejin baadi moki.
46013009	Acaan ŋeejin ikinyɛ, bɔɔnjin, ɔci jyeka mittin ikinyɛ, bɔɔnjin.
46013010	Oŋ yeti mena yɔmjin neeni ne bɛɛdiyɛ, waka bɔɔnjin neeniyɛ, eedɛ bora.
46013011	Ne wona ‘ya aga kaciyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk ba kacca ḍiɛran, ɔci baal poŋ ba kacca ḍiɛran, ɔci ‘ya waka jitkɛn yuartanji kɛɛgin, yuarcanji ‘ya daŋkun. Ne ‘ya aŋŋa ‘uanyɛ, ‘ya pɔy kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin daljan doki.
46013012	Acaan waka ñaltin ikin acca neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba pɔɔyama yuar waŋɛti budan, oŋ yeti te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ikin ñoortin woŋgɔti a ñoorin. Ɔci ‘ya waak gɛɛg ŋeejo, yeti te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ‘ya waak ŋeejja ne pwadan bala ba ŋeejin ‘ya ŋeejati Juaŋy.
46013013	Oŋ accayɛ, jyeni, ɔci jyenna jyettin ikin kɛɛyin, ɔci aniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala oŋkanda. Oŋ yeti ɛka pwadan ne tolanyɛ, gena anno.
46014001	Dala ani aga paŋi ɛkkɛ paŋŋa tolan. Ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ andɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ lwokɛ ma te jyek Juaŋo.
46014002	Acaan mena gɔki te tugga pookɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki ma baanti bɛɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki Jwaŋa Tolanti. Awarɛ, menga jyek ɛkɛ tieŋdɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ gɔki te Booŋ yomɛti te waka a cogginy.
46014003	Oŋ yeti mena lwoki ma te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ nɔɔti ma, ɔci moki ɛkkɛn, ɔci cyeŋi ɛkkɛn te war tɛɛno, ɔci mwoni ɛkkɛn jitkɛn.
46014004	Mena gɔki te tugga pookɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ moki war ɛkɛ parɛ, oŋ yeti mena lwoŋi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛn ŋeejɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ma kaniica magdɛ.
46014005	Kan ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ te tugga pookɛn waakidayɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin, yeti kan ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti lwoŋi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛnyɛ, a ɔɔn aŋka pwatcin ne tolan ‘yati. Mena yaakinti lwoŋi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛnyɛ, pwatcin ne tolan te mena urkinti tugi maka pookɛny, yeti kan men gɛɛl balayɛ, dala jyeka lwogdɛ ɛkɛ neeni oodɛ bora. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kaniica yaakinti ‘uotti ñamu.
46014006	Acca hay! Modg ɔɔn, kan ‘ya bɛɛn ɛkkɛti oŋ gɔkcan te tugga pookɛn oŋ ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ bɛɛy, oŋ jyeka neeni ɛkkɛ maktɛ a ɔki? Yeti kan ‘ya bɛɛn ɔci gɔkcan te jyeka lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora ‘yati neeni, ɔci walla ɛkkɛ nɔɔttin te waka ŋeej ‘ya neeni, ɔci walla te waka bala bɛya neeni, ɔci walla te jyek Juaŋ jyeka pwadin jyeka buagiti ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ maktɛ.
46014007	Kan waka kuuttan ma bala ba luañ ɔci waka cyɛptan ma bala ba coŋkɔn, kan pɔɔdgɛn pwadɔ bɛɛy, oŋ pwana wiak ne pwadan tieŋtin a ɔki?
46014008	Ɔci moki kan ṭuoŋ kuudi ma ne pwadan bɛɛy, a menɛ warɛ ywaŋdɛ te lañy?
46014009	Ɔci moki kan ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ te tugga pookɛn tugga tieŋtan ma bɛɛy, oŋ ɛkkɛn jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna jitkɛn ŋeettan a ɔki? Jyek ɛkkɛ neeni peedɛ jwami bora budan.
46014010	Awarɛ, tugga pookɛn bala ne coŋɔn baan konɛ warda, ɔci ɛkkɛn jitkɛn tieŋtan ma waakɛnda.
46014011	Kan ‘ya jyeka guagdɛ mena neeni kuoliwiyɛ, ‘ya a miiŋ te jyeka guagdɛ ɛkɛ wanna.
46014012	Te bwakta ɛkkɛ buagɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ Booŋyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ waka kaniica ciɛndi ñamuy.
46014013	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan mena gɔki te tugga pookɛnyɛ, dala ɛkɛ cɔkti Juaŋti aŋka ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi war tɛɛn te lwoŋi jyeka neeni.
46014014	Oŋ kan ‘ya cɔk te tuka parɛyɛ, gena boŋ ‘ya cɔkiy, oŋ yeti paŋi ‘ya yɔɔrdi genga bɛɛ.
46014015	Oŋ ‘ya noŋja a ɔki? ‘Ya cɔkca te boŋ ‘ya, ɔci moki cɔkca te paŋi ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya ‘ualja te boŋ ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya ‘ualja te paŋi ‘ya moki.
46014016	Kan i jiey Juaŋ te booŋy, oŋ mena balkɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ booŋ bɛɛ neeni, ɛkɛ yaaktanti ñoodi iki i te cɔŋi a ɔki ne i cɔkiy? Acaan ɛkɛ jyeka guaga i wanna ŋeejɛ bɛɛ.
46014017	I waanu cɔk ne pwadan awarɛ, yeti i moodɔ maŋŋi bɛɛ.
46014018	’Ya gɔk Juaŋti a pwatcin, acaan ‘ya gɔk te tugga pookɛn ne tolan te ɛkkɛ.
46014019	Kan ‘ya loṭi kaniicaji te jyeka jitkɛn wɔkin ne dɔɔyɔyɛ, yɔmjin ne tolan te jyek tuka parɛ jyeka a alpn a inyaakkɛn (10,000) jitkɛn wɔkin bɛɛ neeni.
46014020	Modg ɔɔn, naa paŋi ɛkkɛ bala ba paŋi kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin bɛɛ. Yeti dala ɛkkɛ baldɛ ba kɛɛgin ḍyɛrin te naŋki nɔjjo, oŋ yeti dala paŋi ɛkkɛ bala ba paŋi maka ḍwaŋin.
46014021	Ɔci bala ba kiiwɛ ma ganuunji agi, “Te tuk maka pookɛn, ɔci te tuk wɛlga kwoyinyɛ, ‘ya gɔkca maka neeniti, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jwali ‘ya bɛɛ. Gena Ciɛggɔn gɔki a ɔɔn neeni.”
46014022	Oŋ yeti jyeka te tugga pookɛnyɛ, a naŋka tɛyan te maka jyeti Juaŋti neeni bɛɛy, yeti ɛkkɛn te maka jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ. Ɔci miti jiekyɛ, te maka jyeti Juaŋti baaw bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn te maka jyeti Juaŋtiy.
46014023	Kan ma kaniica wyetkɛn ḍɔɔlɛ waakɛnda kaniicaji, ɔci ma gɔkti te tugga pookɛn, ɔci kan maka baan konɛti, walla maka jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ gɛɛg bɛya ɛkkɛti kaniicajiy, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ guaktɛ agi ɛkkɛ agjɛ maka wyetkɛn yeyin bɛɛ?
46014024	Yeti kan ma waakɛnda mieti ma te jyek Juaŋ ɔci mena jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ, walla mena baan konɛti gɛɛl bɛɛn orɔyɛ, ɛkɛ wiakti yomɛti te nɔji ɛkɛ te jyeka tieŋni ɛkɛ neeni, ɔci jyeka tieŋni ɛkɛ neeni nɔji ɛkɛ lɛɛltan bora a ɛkɛ a mena nɔɔdɔn.
46014025	Ɔci jyeka bala ɛkɛ yomɛti a coggin neeniyɛ, bɛya bora ɔci ɛkɛ ḍwondi iñɔ, ɔci morti Juaŋti, ɔci yomɛ wiakti, ɔci gɔkti agi, “Jwaŋa Tolan balgi iki ɛkkɛ awarɛ, hay!”
46014026	Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn gɔktɔn a ɔki? Ne ɛkkɛ ḍwoṭɛ wyetkɔ a cyɛɛlɔ kaniicajiyɛ, ɛkkɛ men da balki ɔɔli, ɔci mena parɛ balki lali, ɔci mena parɛ balki gena ɛkɛ lɛɛrnɛ Juaŋy, ɔci mena parɛ balki lali jiek te tuka parɛ, ɔci mena parɛ balki lwoŋi jieko. Waka neeni waakɛndayɛ, kaniica ciɛntan ñamu.
46014027	Kan menga gɔki te tuka parɛyɛ, ma ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔci walla ne ḍoogɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn menga da jɔŋdi te wɔɔka ɛkɛ parɛ, oŋ yeti mena lwoki jiek jitkɛnyɛ, a cyɛɛlɔ.
46014028	Kan mena lwoki jiek baawyɛ, dala ma waakɛnda ciya lieda kaniicaji, ɔci men da gɔkti war ɛkɛti parɛ, ɔci gɔgdi i Jwaŋa Tolan.
46014029	Dala maka mieti jyek Juaŋ ne yyɛɛwɔ ɔci walla ne ḍoogɔ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn gɔkti, ɔci dala maka pookɛn neeniyɛ, tieŋdi jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛny.
46014030	Kan Boŋ Juaŋ jiek lɛɛlnɛ bora mena ciyi iñɔ neeni gɛɛltiyɛ, dala mena gɔki ñamu neeni yɔɔda te jieko.
46014031	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti agdɛ maka lwoki jiek waakida, menga da te wɔɔka ɛkɛ parɛ aŋka ma waakɛnda urtanti jiek, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda yomgɛn tɛya ɔci ñɔya.
46014032	Maka mieti mayɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki amaam bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn mwoki jyek Juaŋ ne pwadan.
46014033	Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, nwoci jiek bɛɛ, ɛkɛ a mena yɔŋi jieko. Bala ba ma kaniican waakɛnda, maka pwadgin Juaŋtiy,
46014034	dala moong ɛkkɛ ciya lieda kaniicanji. Ɛkkɛn balkɔn pɔɔdg aŋka gɔkti bɛɛ, oŋ yeti dala ɛkkɛn jyeddi ba jyeka guagdɛ ganuuny. Naa ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn eetan ñaalɔ ḍwaŋdi te maka ‘uay bɛɛ.
46014035	Kan moong buagɔn genga ŋeettanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn tootti ‘uay ɛkkɛnti baanji. Acaan yaayɛ a lɔɔn ɛɛŋti ne ɛkɛ gɔkti jiek kaniicajiy.
46014036	Jyek Juaŋ bɛɛn te ɛkkɛtɛ? Walla ɛkkɛn bɛɛn ɛkkɛti pookɔ?
46014037	Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ agjɛ mena mieti ma ɔci walla balkiti Boŋ Juaŋyɛ, dala ɛkɛ jyeka kiid ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkɛ a jyek Ciɛggɔn.
46014038	Kan ɛkɛ jyeka neeni naŋŋɛ a wyeñ boojyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ a mena wyeñɛ baawy.
46014039	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ bwaktɛ waka ma ‘wondɛ Boŋ Juaŋ te miti, ɔci naa menga dɛɛdɛ ɛkkɛ te jyek tugga pookɛn bɛɛ.
46014040	Oŋ yeti dala waak waakɛnda bala te pɔya awarɛ, ɔci a ywaŋgɔny.
46015001	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin moki te jyeka ɛkkɛ lallin ‘ya a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyeka muŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan neeniy.
46015002	Kan ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni tiektɛ ne tɛyanyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔtɛ ɛkkɛn. Yeti kan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka pookɛn gɛɛgtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ yɔɔt bɛɛ.
46015003	’Ya ɛkkɛ ‘wonnin waka pwadin ne tolan waka muŋi ‘ya ñamu daŋkun, agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ tuun te nɔji ikin ba jyeka kiiwɛ ma te ɛkɛy.
46015004	Ɛkɛ jokci ma koolji ɔci ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te ninna akki ne ḍoogɔ tɛɛti moki ba jyeka a kiigin.
46015005	Ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Butructi, hayya, ɛkɛ oŋ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Cuudan A Inyaakkɛn Wyetkɛn Ne Yyɛɛwɔti oŋo.
46015006	Ɛkɛ oŋ moki warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora maka a miyyan ne dɔɔyɔti (500) te oŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Maka neeni gɛɛg bala ciyi tɛɛti acca men, yeti ɛkkin pookɛn tuun doki.
46015007	Ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora Yaakubti, ɔci ɛkɛ moki oŋ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora cuudanti waakɛnda oŋo.
46015008	Ɔci ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ‘ya baali ba kacca a guoṭi ne ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ‘yatiy.
46015009	Acaan ‘ya a mena ḍiɛran te cuudan pookɛn waakɛnda, ‘ya a mena te naa bartan ma a cuuda bɛɛy, acaan ‘ya baal noŋ ne yaayan kaniica Juaŋti.
46015010	Yeti te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ‘ya baal ba bolji ‘ya bolja te baaṭi moki bɛɛ, ɔci yom pwani Juaŋ yom pwani ‘wonnata ‘ya neeni ḍakcin budan bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya kanŋan ne tolan te maka pookɛn waakɛnda. Yeti a ‘ya bɛɛ, gena yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan yom pwanna bala ‘yati neeniy.
46015011	Ɔci kan a ‘ya, walla maka waayiyɛ, ɔɔn waakida loṭɔn a ɔŋŋi, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ a ɔŋŋi.
46015012	Ɔci kan ma loṭi ma te jyek Kiṭɔ agi ɛkta jɔŋnɔ ñaalɔ te lientiy, oŋ ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛti gɔki agi jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te kolk jitin baawɔ ogo?
46015013	Te jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ baawyɛ, te Yaccu Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
46015014	Kan te Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛyɛ, te lali ɔɔn neeni budan, ɔci te jyenna jyettɛ ɛkkɛ neeni daŋkun yɔmdi te genga bɛɛ.
46015015	Kan Juaŋ te Kiṭɔ jɔɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ te lienti bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan maka tuun neeni jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te lienti bɛɛyɛ, ɔɔn aŋŋɔn maka jomi jiek Juaŋti, acaan ɔɔn loṭɔn ma ka Kiṭɔ jɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te lienti. Yeti kan te jyeka guaktan ma agi maka tuunɔ jɔŋdɔ ñaalɔ moki bɛɛ wanna a jyeka awarɛyɛ, te Kiṭɔ daŋkun jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
46015016	Kan maka a tuutan jɔŋdi ñaalɔ bɛɛyɛ, te Kiṭɔ daŋkun jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
46015017	Ɔci kan te Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛyɛ, te jyeni ɛkkɛ wanna budan, te ɛkkɛ men balgɛ te nɔji jitin men ɔɔn.
46015018	Ɔci te maka jyeti Kiṭɔti oŋ tuun neeniyɛ, te ɛkkɛn ḍakcin daŋkun budan.
46015019	Kan te ikin ciyin kɛɛyin a tɛɛtin acca neeni parɛyɛ, te ɔɔn a maka beeldi ne tolan.
46015020	Yeti awarɛ awarɛyɛ, Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te lienti doki. Ɛkɛ a juati maka jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te kolk jitiny.
46015021	Bala ba lien bɛɛn mati te mena ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ daŋkun bala te mena ne cyɛɛlɔ.
46015022	Bala ba ma waakɛnda tuun te naŋki Adam, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma waakɛnda tɛɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
46015023	Yeti menga da te non ɛkɛ. Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a juatto, ɔci maka jyeti ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn oŋ jɔŋdi ñaalɔ daŋkun te oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdɛy.
46015024	Naŋka neeni wyeñɛ bala oŋ te oŋŋa cyɛgji luldɛ weegɛn Jwaŋa Tolan te Kiṭɔti, ne Kiṭɔ akuuman ɔci cyekin ḍwaŋin ɔci war tɛɛn waakɛnda lɛɛŋŋɛ jitin dokiy.
46015025	Acaan ɛkɛ aga Ciɛggɔn ɔɔn, ne maka yoyi ñin iki ɛkɛ neeni buurtɛ ɛkɛ iñɔ ɛkɛ ciegɛti ɔɔn.
46015026	Mena yoyi ñin iki ɛkɛ aŋka lɛgdɛ ɛkɛ jitin ne ŋoyɔyɛ, gena lieno.
46015027	Worga Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, “Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan waak waakɛnda ḍuannɛ iñɔ ɛkɛ ciegɛti.” Jwali konɛ wɔɔkcin ne jiek gɔkki agi “waak waakɛnda” Juaŋ waanɛ bala i waka neeni bɛɛ, ɛkɛ a mena waak waakɛnda ḍuannɛ Kiṭɔ bieŋɛtiy.
46015028	Ne ɛkɛ waak waakɛnda ḍuattɛ iñɔyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ Kaci ɛkɛ daŋkun warɛ ḍuattɛ Juaŋ bieŋɛti, ɛkɛ a mena waak waakɛnda bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛtiy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan aga mena waak waakɛnda bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛtiy.
46015029	Oŋ maka buuli ma te maka tuun neeni noŋdi a ɔki? Oŋ kan maka tuun neeni jɔŋdi ñaalɔ bɛɛy, oŋ ma bultan ma te ɛkkɛn moki ogo?
46015030	Oŋ ‘ya baal nona yaayan a lien oŋki waakɛnda ogo?
46015031	’Ya gɔkka awarɛ te naŋka noŋa ‘ya waru te ɛkkɛy. Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya baal nona yaayan a lienti oŋkanda te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
46015032	’Ya gɔk ba jyek ma baano. A gena yɔmjin te ‘ya, kan te ‘ya noonin iki wak luom ban Ɛpacacy? Kan maka tuun jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ bɛɛyɛ, dala ikin noŋtin ba jyek maka gɔki agi, “Dala ikin omtin ɔci mottin, acaan ikin tuutin ne liidɔ.”
46015033	Naa ɛkkɛ maaldɛ menga bɛɛ acaan jiek gɔki agi, “Ñoowin ikin ñoowin i maka yeyinyɛ, wyeña pwadan yaadɛ.”
46015034	Dala ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ wyeñ ɛkkɛ wyeña pwadanti, ɔci noŋdɛ nɔji moki bɛɛ. Acaan ma gɛɛg balkɛ ñing tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔk a ɔŋŋi, aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga lɔɔno.
46015035	Yeti menga tootti agi, “‘Yeeñg jɔŋdi ñaalɔ moki? Ɛkkɛn bɛya ati te wara ɔkiy?”
46015036	Hay, i mena poŋi amaam nɛ, gena piitca i iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, kan ɛkɛ jada bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti ywoldi bɛɛ.
46015037	Ɔci gena piinni i wanna ɛkɛ yorti ba bolja piinni i wanna bɛɛ, yeti gena cyɛni ɛkɛ aŋka yulay, kan a yimi walla poka pookɛn gɛɛgy.
46015038	Yeti Juaŋ gena neeni ‘wondɛ warɛ ba bolja ɛkɛ buagɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ waak ñingɛn waakɛnda ‘wondɛ ñingɛn waakɛnda men da ‘woñgi war ɛkɛ.
46015039	Acaan war a cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ, war gɛɛl a war ma baano, ɔci gɛɛl a war maalo, ɔci ɛka parɛ a war ḍiirgo, ɔci ɛkan a war yako.
46015040	Wara pɔliji bala, ɔci wara ṭɛɛrji da bala, yeti wara pɔliji da te pwani ɛkɛ, ɔci wara ṭɛɛrji da te pwani ɛkɛ.
46015041	Pwani wɔɔka bala. Ɔci paan daŋkun, pwani ɛkɛ da parɛ moki. Ɔci kɛltan daŋkun balkɛ pwani ɛkkɛn, ɔci kɛltan gɛɛg pwani ɛkkɛn bala ñamu te makɛn pookɛn.
46015042	Jɔŋŋin ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ daŋkun bala a ɔɔn. Wara jogɛ mayɛ, ɛkɛ baadi jada, yeti wara jɔŋdi ñaalɔ mokiyɛ, ɛkɛ baadi bɛɛ.
46015043	Ɛkɛ jogɛ ma te jwoljo, yeti ɛkɛ jɔŋdi ñaalɔ pwanna pwanno, ɛkɛ jogɛ ma te war koñño, yeti ɛkɛ jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te war tɛɛno.
46015044	Ɛkɛ jogɛ ma te war ma baan wara baadi neeni budan, yeti ɛkɛ jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te war booŋo. Kan wara baadi neeni balayɛ, war booŋ daŋkun bala.
46015045	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka a kiigin gɔki agi, “Adam mena aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ñamu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyi tɛɛti.” Yeti Adam ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi mena ma ‘wondɛ tɛɛtin.
46015046	Adam mena ñamu neeni balkɛ war booŋ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ a war budan. Hayya mena balkɛ war booŋ oŋ bɛɛn ne ŋoyɔ oŋo.
46015047	Adam mena ñamuyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn te ṭɛɛrji, ɔci ɛkɛ a ṭɛɛro. Yeti Adam akki ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji.
46015048	Ba bolji Adam mena bɛɛn te ṭɛɛrti neeniyɛ, ma baan maka bɛɛn te ṭɛɛrti neeni waakɛnda daŋkun bala ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci ba bolji Kiṭɔ mena bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji neeniyɛ, maka jyeti ɛkɛti neeni daŋkun aga maka ñaalɔ pɔliji ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
46015049	Bala ba ne ikin balkinti bolji Adam mena bɛɛn te ṭɛɛrti neeniyɛ, bolji Yaccu mena bɛɛn te pɔliji neeni daŋkun bɛya ikinti.
46015050	Hay, modg ɔɔn, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te gena neeni ka war ikin wara acca neeniyɛ, ooddi cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ, ɔci moki waak ikin waaka baadi neeniyɛ, tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni yuartan ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
46015051	Gɔṭṭɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin gena konɛ a coggɔn neeni. Ikin tuutin waakida bɛɛ, yeti ikin waaki aktin.
46015052	Naŋka neeni bɛya ne pɛñan ba men ne woŋgɛ moortiti ne ṭwoŋa ne ŋoyɔ wiaktiy. Acaan ṭuoŋ wiakti, ɔci maka tuun jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te wara woonɛ, wara baadi bɛɛy, ɔci ikin da waaki aktin.
46015053	Acaan bolja baadi neeni ɛɛŋdi bolja baadi bɛɛy, ɔci yoŋi lien neeni ɛɛŋdi yoŋŋa lienɛ baawy.
46015054	Ne wara a jadɔn ɛɛŋdi wara jannɛ baawyɛ, ɔci ne war lien ɛɛŋdi wara lienɛ baawyɛ, jyeka a kiigin neeni bɛya bora oŋ agi, “Lien lannɛ bɔnnin.”
46015055	“Hay, i lieno, ba war tɛɛn bɔɔni i ma bɛ? Hay, i koolo, ba pɛñi i bɛ?”
46015056	War tɛɛn lienyɛ, ɛkɛ a nɔjjo. Ɔci war tɛɛn nɔjiyɛ, a jyek ganuun.
46015057	Yeti dala gɔktin a pwatcin Juaŋti mena ikin ‘wonnin war tɛɛn te Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka ikin yaakinti jyek lien bwantin neeniy.
46015058	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, hay modg ɔɔn maka ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔttɛ iñɔ ne tɛyan, naa ɛkkɛ kɛɛtɛ waakɔ bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ciɛndɛ ñamu coŋdɛ oŋkanda kanŋa Juaŋti. Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ kanŋa ɛkkɛ neeni ḍakti budan bɛɛ.
46016001	Acca ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti te jyek waka limtin te Ma Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, bala ba ‘ya kaniican ban Galatiya myetkan doki. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun noŋdɛ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
46016002	Te oŋki Juaŋ waakɛndayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ waakida men da ḍɔccɛ genga bora, ɔci bwogdɛ ñino. Ɛkɛ ḍɔtti ba waka bala ɛkɛti aŋka ne ‘ya bɛɛda naa ɛkkɛ moki ɔgdɛ lyemɛ a limi ɔɔn bɛɛ.
46016003	Ɔci ne ‘ya dɛnda aŋanyɛ, waka limmɛ ɛkkɛ te yom pwani neeniyɛ, cundi ‘ya ban Urcaliim iki worgan i maka muonɛ ɛkkɛ bora wanna.
46016004	Kan jwali warɛ liɛllɛ a ‘ya oottayɛ, ɛkkɛn ooddin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ.
46016005	’Ya bɛɛd ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti ne ‘ya gorda ban Macɛdɔɔnyajiy, acaan ‘ya buaga gora ban Macɛdɔɔnyaji.
46016006	’Ya coottin i ɛkkɛ ne ḍiɛran kaapun, walla ‘ya wɛɛñi wyeñɛ cwamja aŋan aŋka ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ‘ya ‘yeettatɛ te won ‘ya nona oodda ‘yay.
46016007	Acaan ‘ya buaga naa ɛkkɛ yuardin gordinyɔ a gorti ɔɔn bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga nink ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg noktin i ɛkkɛ kan Ciɛggɔn ‘ya pɔŋna pɔyy.
46016008	Yeti ‘ya cood te ban Ɛpacac ne oŋ Iid Ninka A Ma Baan Ne Yyɛɛwɔ Mena Parɛ Byeŋkɛ (50) neeni bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
46016009	Acaan pɔy tuka tolan warɛ pɔŋŋɛ te kanŋa ‘yati, ɔci maka yookɔn te ‘ya bala kɔɔna kɔɔnno.
46016010	Ne Timutawuc bɛɛdi ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ gwaldɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan, acaan ɛkɛ noŋi kanŋa Ciɛggɔn ba ‘ya daŋkun.
46016011	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa menga wooki ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Yeti dala ɛkɛ magdɛ ɛkkɛ pɔɔjɔ te pwani aŋka ɛkɛ dɔɔkti ‘yati. Acaan ɔɔn balgɔn kɛɛyɔn ɛkɛ i modg ikin.
46016012	Bala ba ‘ya gɔkcan mod ikin Apɔɔlɔcti ne pɛñan ka dala ɛkɛ bɛya ḍieŋdi ɛkkɛti, yeti ɛkɛ yomɛ buagɔn bɛya acca bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bɛya ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi wɔɔkay.
46016013	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyeni ɛkkɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ tɛɛdɛ.
46016014	Dala waka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda naŋdɛ te oonnin yɔtin.
46016015	Acca modg ɔɔn, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ on tukɛ Ictɛɛpanuc ɛkkɛn a maka bɛɛn Juaŋti ñamu ban Akeeya, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn ‘woñgi kanŋa Ma Kiṭɔ.
46016016	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya gɔk ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan ka dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka noŋi kanŋa Juaŋ a ɔɔn wanna, ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka pookɛn maka noŋi kanŋa Juaŋ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔny.
46016017	’Ya yomu ñɔɔn ne Ictɛɛpanuc bɛɛni ɔci Pɔrtyunaatac, ɔci Akaaykacy, acaan ɛkkɛn non ɛkkɛ mugɛ aŋka ‘ya makta ne ɛkkɛ baagɛy.
46016018	Acaan ɛkkɛn ‘ya makka yomuti ba ɛkkɛ moki ɔɔn. Maka ba maka neeniyɛ, dala kanŋa ɛkkɛn yuartanji ma ɔci dala ma noŋdɛ ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti.
46016019	Kaniican ban Ecya cuoññin ñiimi ɛkkɛti. Akwilla ɔci Pricilla i kaniica on ɛkkɛn ban Ecya wɛnniyɛ, ñiepi ɛkkɛ te yoma pwadan te yenti Kiṭɔ.
46016020	Modg ikin waakɛnda ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ñiebdɛ yɔtin pookɔ waakida te ñiebbin pwadan.
46016021	Gena ‘ya, Buuluc kiewan jyek ñiimma neeni te byeŋ ‘ya paru ɛkkɛti neeni.
46016022	Kan men gɛɛl balki ani Ciɛggɔn bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ aga ‘walgɔn! Ciɛggɔn ɔɔn, dala i bɛɛdi!
46016023	Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti.
46016024	Dala ani bala ɛkkɛti waakida te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
47001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba yom Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci mod ikin Timutawuc kiewɔn worga neen neeni. Worga neeni ooddi kaniica Jwaŋa Tolanti ban Kuruntuc i Ma Kiṭɔ maka pwadin ban Akeeyaji warda.
47001002	Dala yom pwani ɔci coodi pwani bala ɛkkɛti te Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔy.
47001003	Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno.
47001004	Ɛkɛ a mena ikin muntinji te yom yoñ ikin waakiday. A ɔŋŋi aŋka ikin da yaakinti maka yomgɛn yeyin muntinji te munna ikin munnintiji Jwaŋa Tolany.
47001005	Acaan bala ba ne ikin ñoowin iki Kiṭɔ te taab ɛkɛyɛ, ikin da yomgɔ pwada te Kiṭɔ te munna neeni daŋkun.
47001006	Kan ɔɔn taamnɔnyɛ, aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwaddi, ɔci yɔɔdɛ Juaŋo. Ɔci kan ɔɔn yomgɔ pwaniyɛ, aŋka ɛkkɛ da yomgɔ pwaddi. Naŋka neeni bɛya te tiekin ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tieŋni te taab bɛɛn ikinti waakida neeniy.
47001007	Ɔci paŋŋa poŋɔn ɔɔn te ɛkkɛyɛ, tɛɛna tɛɛno, acaan ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ba ñoowin ɛkkɛ ñoowin iki ɔɔn te taab neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ daŋkun ñootin iki ɔɔn te yom pwanno.
47001008	Hay modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn buagɔn dala naŋka bɛɛn ɔɔnti yaayan ban Ecya neeni ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ. Naŋka neeni cyɛŋŋa cyɛŋi ɔɔnti ne tolan, ɔci ɔɔn beelnɔn te kɛɛn coodi tɛɛtin moki.
47001009	Ɔɔn waakɔ poccin iñɔ bala ba ne ɔɔn wankɔnti ma te lien no. Yeti naŋka neeni bɛɛn a ɔɔn aŋka naa ɔɔn poŋdɔn te waak ɔɔn pookɔ bɛɛ, yeti dala ɔɔn poŋdɔn te gena Jwaŋa Tolan mena maka tuun jɔɔŋdɛ ñaalɔy.
47001010	Ɛkɛ ɔɔn wɛɛnɔn bora te nona yaayanti, ɔci ɛkɛ ɔɔn wɛɛdɔn bora moki. Ɔci paŋi ɔɔn ḍuannɔn aŋa ɛkɛti ka ɛkɛ ɔɔn wɛɛdɔn bora moki.
47001011	A ɔŋŋi ɛkkɛ daŋkun ɔɔn magdintɔ te cɔŋŋo, aŋka maka coŋin gɔkti a pwatcin te gena yuarŋɔn ɔɔn te cɔŋi maka coŋin neeni. Ɔci Juaŋ bieŋɛ tandɛ ɔɔnti, ɔci maka coŋin gɔkti a pwatcin ɛkɛti te ɔɔn.
47001012	Naŋka noŋɔn ɔɔn waakɔ bala a ɔŋŋi, jwali yomg ɔɔn te naŋka naŋŋɔn ɔɔn ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɔɔn noŋŋɔn te yoma ḍiɛran ɔci te pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, yeti te ñing tɛɛn war ma baan budan bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn noŋŋɔn te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci noŋŋɔn ne tolan aŋa ɛkkɛti nɔñji.
47001013	Ɔɔn kiedɔn gena parɛ gɛɛl ɛkkɛti bɛɛ, gena waka ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti paŋŋɛn ɔci jitkɛn yuartɛy. ‘Ya baal poŋ ka ɛkkɛ waka neeni jitkɛn yuartɛ ne pwadan.
47001014	Bala ba ɛkkɛ waak jitkɛn yuarnɛ ne ḍiɛran dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti noŋdɛ waakɔ te ɔɔn bala ba ne ɔɔn noŋɔn waakɔ te ɛkkɛ, ne oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdɛy.
47001015	Acaan naŋka neeni ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadanyɛ, ‘ya buaga ka bɛɛd ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti te ñamu aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ñɔɔn ne tolan.
47001016	’Ya buaga ka ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti ne ‘ya gorda oodda ban Macɛdɔɔnya ɔci dɔɔkta ɛkkɛti moki te ban Macɛdɔɔnya, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘yeettatɛ pɔɔjɔ ne ‘ya oodda ban Yahuudiyay.
47001017	’Ya yomu ŋoodan ne ‘ya buagati noŋa naŋka neeniyɛ? Gena ‘ya buaga ka ɛkɛ naŋdi neeniyɛ, naŋdi ‘ya ba naŋka ṭɛɛrji wɛnni aŋka ‘ya gɔkca ka “Ɛɛ” ɔci “A’a” te oŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ? A’a, ɔɔn noŋɔn a ɔɔn bɛɛ.
47001018	Awarɛ, te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan mena ooki jyek ɛkɛ waakɛn bɛɛ neeniyɛ, jwali ɔɔn ɛkkɛtiyɛ, a “Ɛɛ” ɔci “A’a” bɛɛ.
47001019	Acaan Yaccu Kiṭɔ Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ a mena ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔny. Ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn i Cila ɔci Timutawuc, ɔci jwali ‘ya a “Ɛɛ” ɔci “A’a” bɛɛ. Yeti jwalla a “Ɛɛ” aŋka bala Juaŋti oŋkanda.
47001020	Acaan jwalla ḍuaññɛ Jwaŋa Tolan balkɛ jwalla a “Ɛɛ” te Kiṭɔ, a ɔŋŋi aŋka ɔɔn gɔkɔn ka dala bala a ɔɔn te ɛkɛ te pwani Jwaŋa Tolan neeni.
47001021	Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ a mena ɔɔn yɔɔnnɔn iñɔ iki ɛkkɛ Kiṭɔtiy, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin kanŋa byeŋkɔti.
47001022	Ɛkɛ ikin naŋŋin te mañ ɛkɛ, ɔci ikin ‘wonnin Boŋ ɛkɛ yomgɔti ba gena mwoki ikin lakun.
47001023	Yeti ‘ya gɔkca te yenti Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ aga lɔɔn bɛɛ. Gena te jyeka neeni aŋka ‘ya bɛɛna ban Kuruntuc men bɛɛ neeni.
47001024	’Ya gɔkka ɔŋŋi aŋka ɛkkɛ myettin te waka ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn kanŋɔn iki ɛkkɛ te yom ñɔɔn ɛkkɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan te jyeni ɛkkɛ.
47002001	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya yomu muŋi ka naa ‘ya bɛɛd ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti moki aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi bɛɛ.
47002002	Kan ‘ya ɛkkɛ yaadin yomgɔti oŋ a menɛ ‘ya ywaŋda yomutiy, pari ɛkkɛ maka yaañi ‘ya yomgɛnti neeni bɛɛ?
47002003	A ɔŋŋi aŋka ‘ya kiena worga neeni ɛkkɛti te ñamu wanna. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ‘ya bɛɛdayɛ, ‘ya yomu yaaya te ɛkkɛ maka ‘ya ywaŋka yomuti neeni bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ waakida ŋeejin ‘ya ne pwadan. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, yom ñɔɔn ‘ya aga yom ñɔɔn ɛkkɛ waakida.
47002004	Acaan ne ‘ya ɛkkɛ kieŋnin worgayɛ, ‘ya yomu wiak ne tolan, ɔci ‘ya yomu ñɔni warɛ, ɔci pieg bala wɔyi ‘ya ñinguti. Yeti ‘ya noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ yaadin ‘ya yomgɔti bɛɛ, yeti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ te anna ana ‘ya ɛkkɛ ne tolan neeni.
47002005	Kan menga eccin yom yoñ mengatiyɛ, ‘ya yomu yaaya bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ yaaññɛ yomgɔti pookɔ. ‘Ya gɔk a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya buaga naa ‘ya naŋka neeni, ‘uotkati ɛkɛ wyeñɛti bɛɛ.
47002006	Mena noŋi a ɔɔn wanna kan maka coŋin jiek duakcɛ ɛkɛ wyeñɛtiyɛ, yɔmjin doki.
47002007	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ bɔɔktɛ ɔci ywaŋdɛ yomɛti aŋka naa ɛkɛ bwandɛji yom yoñ bɛɛ.
47002008	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ lɛɛrtɛ ani ɛkkɛ aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkɛ.
47002009	Worga kiewan ‘ya ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ‘ya poci ɛkkɛ a poccin buaga gɔrca ne ɛkkɛ agɛ maka tieci jiek te waak waakɛnda boki no.
47002010	Mena bɔɔktɛ ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ bɔɔka ‘ya daŋkun. Kan genga bala aŋka ɛkɛ bɔɔka ‘ya, oŋ ɛkɛ bɔɔkan ‘ya Kiṭɔ ñamɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɔɔkan ‘ya te ɛkkɛ
47002011	aŋka naa Jwaŋa Yaayan ikin naŋtin ñin acaan ikin paŋi ɛkɛ kuolin ñin bɛɛ.
47002012	Ne ‘ya bɛɛna ban Trɔwacti aŋka lor ma te jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadinyɛ, Ciɛggɔn pɔy tukɛ pɔŋnɛ te kanŋa aŋan.
47002013	Yeti paŋi ‘ya warɛ ḍiemnɛ iñɔ bɛɛ, acaan mod ɔɔn Tituc mɔkcan ‘ya aŋan bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya bana neeni daljan ɔntɔ, ɔci ‘ya ati ban Macɛdɔɔnya.
47002014	Ɔɔn gɔktɔn a pwatcin Juaŋti, acaan ɛkɛ a mena ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn bɔnnin te Yaccu Kiṭɔ te war tɛɛn aŋka ŋeejin ɛkɛ ŋeettiti ma eedɔn ɔɔn noon warda bala ba piinŋan pyeni milany.
47002015	Acaan ɔɔn agɔn pyen Kiṭɔ pyena milan maka uniti ɔci maka tuwati.
47002016	Pyena neeni etti lien maka yienti, yeti ɛkɛ a pyena etti tɛɛtin maka unitiy. Oŋ a menɛ yɔmjin te kanŋa neeniy?
47002017	Acaan ɔɔn balgɔn ba maka coŋin yieyɔn jwali Juaŋ a yied bɛɛ. Yeti ɔɔn balgɔn ba maka yɔɔññɛ Juaŋo. Ɔɔn gɔkɔn te Juaŋ te yoma awarɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba maka kanŋan Kiṭɔtiy.
47003001	Ɔɔn jɔɔttɔn te jiɛt waakɔ pookɔ moki? Walla ɔɔn buagɔn kiedɔn worgan ɛkkɛti aŋka mieti ɛkkɛ te waak ɔɔnɔ? Walla moki ɔɔn buagɔn ɛkkɛ kieddɛ worgan mieti te ɔɔnɔ? A'a.
47003002	Ɛkkɛ woodgɔ agɛ kiikan ɔɔn, ɔci balgɛ ɔɔn yomgɔti aŋka ŋeettan ma waakɛnda ɔci paktan ma waakɛnda.
47003003	Gena Kiṭɔ kieñi kiikan neeni, ɔci cuuññɛ ɛkɛ te ɔɔny, oŋ yeti te ñɔɔn galam bɛɛ, yeti te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tɛɛti, ɔci moki te kiikan guonanti bɛɛ, yeti te kiikan men baan yomɛti.
47003004	Ɔɔn balkɔn jwalla awarɛ te Kiṭɔ Juaŋ ñamɛti.
47003005	Ɔɔn yaakɔnti poŋɔn te genga te waak ɔɔn pookɔ aŋka noŋɔn kanŋa neeni bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti war tɛɛn ɔɔn bɛya te Juaŋti.
47003006	Gena ɛkɛ ɔɔn naŋŋɔn aŋka ɔɔn yaakɔnti kanŋa jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wonkɛn neeniy. Oŋ yeti te jyek ganuun a kiigin bɛɛ, yeti te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan. Jyek ganuun jyeka a kiigin etti lieno, yeti Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka etti tɛɛtin.
47003007	Pɔy ganuun kiinɛ Juaŋ a kiin gwoyi ṭɔlgɛn ŋotkɛnti pɔya ñamu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ eccin lieno. Yeti ɛkɛ balki pwani Juaŋ ne tolan. Ɔci pwanna neeni bala galdan Muuca ñingɛti ne tolan, ɔci ma Icrayiil yaakɛnti gɔrti Muuca woŋgɛti te wɔɔka wanna bɛɛ. Acaan pwanna neeni bala galdan ne yaajan ɛkkɛn ciɛrɛ ñingɛnti. Yeti te wɔɔka wannayɛ, pwanna neeni ati ooddi baadi doki,
47003008	pwani kanŋa Boŋ Juaŋ aŋka tol tol nɔñji.
47003009	Kan kanŋa jiek oldɛ ma wyetkɛnti ɛkɛ pwatcinyɛ, kanŋa etti yɔɔt neeni aŋka pwatcin ne tolan nɔñji.
47003010	Pwanna ñamu tolan neeniyɛ, kan ɛkɛ poortinti i pwani jyeka naŋŋa Juaŋ ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a genga moki bɛɛ. Ɛka ñamu neeni pwani ɛkɛ bala moki bɛɛ, bawwin doki.
47003011	Oŋ kan naŋka ñamu naŋka bawwin neeni balki pwani ne tolany, oŋ pwani jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wonkɛn jyeka baadi bɛɛ neeni bala a ɔki? Pwanna neeni aŋka bala ñamu ne yaajan nɔñji.
47003012	Ne jyenna kɛɛyin ɔɔn baali ɔɔntiyɛ, ɔɔn waakɔ tɛɛcin ne tolan.
47003013	Ɔɔn balgɔn ba Muuca mena kwomi woŋgɛ te bworŋ aŋka naa ma Icrayiil pwanna ati ɔci bawwin neeni yuartan bɛɛ.
47003014	Oŋ yeti paŋi ɛkkɛnyɛ, aŋi wyeñ boojo, ɔci ne acca neeniti ɔɔnyɛ, kan jyek ganuun jyeka te baaṭi paktan mayɛ, ɛkkɛn men wyetkɛn niin a uulgin ba wyeña te baaṭi wanna ɔɔn, ɛkkɛn jyeka awarɛ neeni jitkɛn yuartan bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛn meni bala kwomi ñingɛn te bworŋa kwomki ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn te baaṭi bworŋa kɛki ɛkkɛn wanna meni ɔɔn. Yeti kan men jyeddi Yaccutiyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ jyeka awarɛ neeni jitkɛn yuartɛji oŋo. Ɔci a ɔɔn bala ba bworŋa neeni warɛ uunnɛ ɔntɔ oŋo.
47003015	Ɔci acca men ɔɔnyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn pokki ganuun Muucayɛ, ɛkkɛn jiek jitkɛn yuartanji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn men bala yomgɛn niin a uulgin bala ba ne bworŋa kwomki ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn wanna baali kɛki ɛkkɛn men ɔɔn.
47003016	Bala ba jyeka kiigin worga Juaŋji gɔki agi, “Muuca bworŋ uunnɛ ɔntɔ te woŋgɛti ne ɛkɛ warɛ yallɛ Ciɛggɔntiy.”
47003017	Accayɛ, “Ciɛggɔn” a Boŋ Juaŋo, ɔci ne Boŋ Ciɛggɔn baaliyɛ, ikin ḍɔɔggɔ wɔkɔ.
47003018	Ɔci ikin maka woŋgɛn a kwomgin te bworŋa neeni bɛɛyɛ, ikin balkin pwani Ciɛggɔn. Ɔci ikin waakɔ aaŋŋin balkin ba ɛkɛ te pwani ɛkɛ pwanna tolan pwanna bɛya te Ciɛggɔnti, mena a Boŋ Juaŋy.
47004001	A ɔŋŋi ne kanŋa neeni baali ɔɔnti te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɔɔn yaakɔnti poddɔn bɛɛ.
47004002	Ɔɔn kɛŋnɔn te lɔna niin lieda neeni bɛɛ, ɔci ɔɔn menga dieddɔn ñin bɛɛ, ɔci ɔɔn jomɔn jwali Juaŋ a jomi bɛɛ. Yeti ɔɔn buagɔn ciyɔn ne pwadan aŋka ŋeettan ma waakɛnda ɔɔn ciyɔn ba coodda naŋki Juaŋ naŋka awarɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ɔɔnti Juaŋ ñamɛtiy.
47004003	Yeti kan jwalla oonɔn ɔɔn neeni konɛ ḍiilcinyɛ, ɛkɛ konɛ ḍiilcin aŋa maka ati ooddi ḍakti neeniti pookɛn.
47004004	Jwaŋa Yaayan iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni maka jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ neeni uullɛ ñingɛnti aŋka naa ɛkkɛn nona dɛki te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin te pwani Kiṭɔ neeni yuartan bɛɛ. Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ bala ba bolji Jwaŋa Tolan.
47004005	Acaan ne ɔɔn loṭɔnyɛ, ɔɔn loṭɔn te gena Ciɛggɔn Yaccu, ga ɔɔn loṭɔn ma te waak ɔɔn woodgɔ bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn loṭɔn ka ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn, ɔci waak ɔɔn bala ba maka kanŋan ɛkkɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
47004006	Acaan gena Jwaŋa Tolan waanɛ gɔki agi, “Dala nona dɛki dɛkti te miel jitin.” Gena ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa mañ ɛkɛ bala dɛki ɔɔn yomgɔti aŋka ɔɔn pwani Jwaŋa Tolan yuartɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ ñingɛtiy.
47004007	Yeti ɔɔn balkɔn waka ḍuaññɔn ɔɔn a wak booŋ te kullan a lop neeni. Ɛkkɛn nɔɔti a naŋka naŋŋɔn ɔɔn pwadan neeni, naŋŋɔn te waak ɔɔn pookɔ bɛɛ. Yeti naŋka neeni bɛɛn te Juaŋti.
47004008	Ɔɔn yomgɔ wiak te naŋki waakɛnda, yeti genga bɛɛn ɔɔn ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ. Ɔɔn waakɔ yiŋnɔn ñaalɔ, gena naŋdɔn ɔɔn gɛɛl yuartɔn bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn ponnɔn bɛɛ.
47004009	Ɔɔn naŋkɔn ma ne yaayan, yeti ɔɔn dalkɔn ma ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Ɔɔn yiɛpkɔn ma iñɔ, yeti ɔɔn nuonnɔn jitin bɛɛ.
47004010	Ma buagɔn noki ɔɔn budan bala ba lyena ɛkkɛn Yaccu nokkitiy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, tɛɛtin Yaccu daŋkun warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora waak ɔɔnti.
47004011	Acaan ɔɔn maka a tɛɛtan neeniyɛ, waakɔ ‘wondɔn lien oŋkanda te Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka tɛɛtin ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ɔɔn waakɔti daŋkun.
47004012	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, lien bala ɔɔnti, yeti tɛɛtin aŋka bala ɛkkɛti.
47004013	Bala ba kiiwɛ ma agi, “‘Ya jyetto, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan.” Ɔɔn daŋkun jyettɔn te boŋ jyenna neeni, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn daŋkun gɔkɔn.
47004014	Çeejɔn ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yaccu jɔɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ te lienti neeni, ɔɔn daŋkun luoldɔn ɛkɛ ñaalɔ iki Yaccu a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɔɔn oodɔn iki ɛkkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ ɛkɛ ñamɛti.
47004015	Naŋka neeni waakɛnda bala te ɛkkɛ aŋka yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan bala maka coŋinti, ɔci maka coŋin gɔkti a pwatcin, ɔci jieddi Juaŋo.
47004016	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn poddɔn bɛɛ. Kan war ɔɔn wara bora neeni noŋi baadi dokiyɛ, ɛka jiju neeni aga ɛka woonɛ oŋkanda oŋkanda.
47004017	Acaan naŋka bala ikinti puaran ɔci baadi lakun neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ pwani ɔɔn ‘uottiti ne tolan. Naŋka bɛɛn ɔɔnti pɛñan neeni bwandɛ pwanna baadi bɛɛ neeni.
47004018	Ɔɔn gɔṭɔn waka yuartin te waakɛn neeni bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn gɔṭɔn waka yuartin te waakɛn bɛɛ neeniy. Acaan waka yuartɔn te waakɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a waka baadi lakun, yeti waka yuartin te waakɛn bɛɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a waka bala yuonginday.
47005001	Acaan ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ne daran ciyɔn ɔɔn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni baadiyɛ, ɔɔn balkɔn ona parɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ona neeni cɔnnɛ menga te bieŋɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ baadi bɛɛ.
47005002	Ɔɔn ne ciyɔn te ona iñɔ neeniyɛ, ɔɔn joŋdɔn buagɔn ɛka ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni.
47005003	Ne ɔɔn kwomɔn ona neeni waakɔtiyɛ, ɔɔn coottɔn waakɔ budan moki bɛɛ.
47005004	Acaan ne ɔɔn men balgɔn te daran neenitiyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn joŋdɔn, ɔci ñokɔn jitkɔ acaan ɔɔn buagɔn coottɔn waakɔ budan bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn buagɔn ɛɛŋdɔn ɛka ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, wara a tuuta neeni laddɛ tɛɛtin.
47005005	Gena Juaŋ waanɛ ɔɔn ḍuaññɔn te gena neeniy. Ɛkɛ a mena ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn Boŋ Juaŋ bala ba juati waka ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ ɔɔntiy.
47005006	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ɔci ɔɔn yomgɔ tɛɛcin oŋkanda. Ne ɔɔn balgɔn ciyɔn te war ɔɔn war ma baan menyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn ɔntɔ ne loonan te Ciɛggɔnti.
47005007	Ɔɔn ciyɔn te jyenno, ga ɔɔn ciyɔn te ñali budan bɛɛ.
47005008	Ɔɔn yomgɔ tɛɛcin ɔci buagɔn ban ɔɔn daldɔn ɔci baldɔn ɔntɔ te waak ɔɔnti, yeti baldɔn iki Ciɛggɔn baanji.
47005009	A ɔŋŋi kan ɔɔn balgɔn baanji walla balgɔn ɔntɔyɛ, ɔɔn poŋɔn te yom pwani ɛkɛ.
47005010	Acaan ikin waakida waakɔ lɛɛltin bora non kaakci godan Yaccu ñamɛti, ɔci ikin waakida menga da yɔɔrdi gena yuardɛ ɛkɛ ba naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ wona ɛkɛ baali ciyɛ te war ma baan meny, kan a pwani walla yoñ kaapun no.
47005011	Acaan bwajja ɔɔn buayɔn Ciɛggɔn ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ne pwadanyɛ, ɔɔn yaakɔnti ma myettɔn ne pwadan. Juaŋ ɔɔn ŋeejɔn ne pwadan, ɔci ‘ya poŋ ɛkkɛ ‘ya ŋeejati yomgɔti daŋkun.
47005012	Ɔɔn jieyɔn waakɔ ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn noŋŋɔn a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ waakɔ te ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti ṭwokti maka noŋi waakɛn te ma ñingɛn budan neeniti. Ɛkkɛn noŋi te yomgɛn bɛɛ.
47005013	Kan ɔɔn wilnɔnyɛ, ɔɔn wilnɔn te Jwaŋa Tolan. Kan ɔɔn aŋŋɔn wiilin bɛɛyɛ, ɔɔn aŋŋɔn wiilin bɛɛ te ɛkkɛ.
47005014	Acaan ani Kiṭɔ ɔɔn kɛɛyɔnyɔyɛ, naŋka neeni pagdɔn ɔɔn a kan mena ne cyɛɛlɔ tuun te maka coŋin waakɛndayɛ, a ɔŋŋi bala ba ma tuun waakɛnda daŋkun.
47005015	Ɔci ɛkɛ tuun te ma waakɛnda, a ɔŋŋi aŋka maka ciyi tɛɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ciyi tɛɛti te waak ɛkkɛn pookɛn moki bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn ciyi te mena tuun te ɛkkɛn ɔci jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ neeni.
47005016	A ɔŋŋi acca ɔci ne ñamu ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn menga ŋeejɔn ba paŋi ma baan bɛɛ. Kan ɔɔn Yaccu ŋeennɔn doki ba paŋi ma baanyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeejɔn ɔɔn acca ba paŋi ma baan moki bɛɛ.
47005017	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan menga bala Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi gena cɔnnɛ Juaŋ woonɛ. Bolja a daan ati bora doki, ɛka woonɛ aŋka bɛɛni.
47005018	Naŋka neeni waakɛnda bɛɛn te Juaŋti mena noŋŋin iki ikin ŋɛy te Yaccu Kiṭɔy. Ɛkɛ ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn kanŋa ŋeewin.
47005019	Juaŋ noŋi ŋɛy iki maka ṭɛɛrji wɛnni waakɛnda te Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɛkɛ poŋi te nɔji ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ jwali ŋeewin ḍuannɛ ɔɔnti.
47005020	A ɔŋŋi ɔɔn agɔn cuudan Yaccu. Ɔɔn gɔktɔn ɛkkɛti bala ba gena Kiṭɔ waanɛ gɔkti ɛkkɛti wanna ɔɔn. Ɔɔn gɔktɔn ɛkkɛti te yenti Yaccu ka dala ɛkkɛ ŋeedɛ i Juaŋo.
47005021	Yaccu mena baaki nɔji neeni naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋi nɔji te ikin. Oŋ te ñoowin ikin ñoowin iki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ikin ñootin iki ɛkɛ te pwani Juaŋo.
47006001	Te kanŋa ɔɔn i Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɔɔn toottɔn ɛkkɛti acaan dala yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan neeni naa mugdɛ ɛkkɛ te kona baaw budan bɛɛ.
47006002	Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, “‘Ya ɛkkɛ tieŋnin te oŋŋa ‘ya yomu pɔŋna ɛkkɛtiy, ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛ maŋŋin te oŋ yɔɔto.” ‘Ya ɛkkɛ nɔɔttin, acca Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ! Ɔci acca gena oŋŋa Juaŋ yuoci ikin neeni!
47006003	Ɔɔn buagɔn kandɔn ne pwadan aŋka naa menga kanŋa ɔɔn yuartɛ a damgɔn bɛɛ, acaan ɔɔn buagɔn naa menga yɔddɔnyɔ ɔɔn te yuarŋa ɛkɛ Ciɛggɔn yuardɛ bɛɛ.
47006004	Dala ɔɔn waakɔ lɛɛldɔn bora te pɔyi waakɛnda ba kɛɛnk Juaŋ te tiit yomgɔ, ɔci te taabn, ɔci te naŋka pɛñan, ɔci te naŋka bɛya ɔɔnti ne yaayan,
47006005	ɔci te jyepto, ɔci te cigin, ɔci te ywobjo, ɔci te kanŋa pɛñan, ɔci te yuon ween konɛ, ɔci te koño,
47006006	ɔci te yoma giikkɛ baaw mati, ɔci te ŋeejin, ɔci te loomga tɛyan, ɔci te yoma pwadan, ɔci te Boŋ Juaŋo, ɔci te anna awarɛ,
47006007	ɔci te jyeka awarɛ, ɔci te war tɛɛn Juaŋo. Ɔɔn balkɔn naŋka pwadan bala ba byeŋgaaran ɔci kɔɔrñi ɔɔn kɛɛyɔn ɔɔn waakɔ ɔci noŋɔn ɔɔn ṭwaŋo.
