47006008	Ma noŋi ɔɔnti ne pwadan, ɔci moki ɔɔn ñaltɔn a genga bɛɛ, ɔci ɔɔn ḍorkɔnyɔ ma, ɔci jiekɔn ma. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ɔɔn jomjɔn jieko, oŋ yeti ɔɔn gɔkɔn te jyeka awarɛ.
47006009	Ɔɔn balgɔn ba ne kuokɔnti ma ɔɔn, oŋ yeti ɔɔn ŋeeckɔn mako. Ɔɔn a tuutan, oŋ yeti ɔɔn tɛɛtɔn men.
47006010	Ɔɔn yomgɔ wiak ne tolan, oŋ yeti ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔyɔ oŋkanda. Ɔɔn aŋŋɔn ba maka bɔwan, oŋ yeti ɔɔn ma naŋŋɔn aŋi maka cyɛgan ne coŋɔn. Ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn ba balkɔnti waak bɛɛ, oŋ yeti ɔɔn balkɔn waak waakɛnda men ɔɔn.
47006011	Hay, ma Kuruntuc! Ɔɔn gɔŋnɔn ɛkkɛti ne pwadan doki, ɔci ɔɔn yomgɔ pɔŋnɔn ɛkkɛti.
47006012	Ɔɔn yomgɔ uullɔn ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ aŋka yomgɔ uullɛ ɔɔnti.
47006013	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ba kɛɛgin ‘ya, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pɔktɛ ne tolan daŋkun!
47006014	Naa ɛkkɛ ñoodi i maka jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ neeni te naŋki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Naŋka pwadan ñoodi i naŋka yaayan a ɔki? Ɔci nona bɔwan ñoodi i nona a miel a ɔki?
47006015	Kiṭɔ ñoodi i Jwaŋa Yaayanɛ? Ɔci mena jyeti Juaŋti ñoodi i mena ciyi budan te Jyek Juaŋɔ?
47006016	On Juaŋ ona tolan balkɔn jiek gɛɛg i jɔkin yeyin waka maltan ma budan nɛ? Ikin agin on Jwaŋa tɛɛti. Juaŋ gɔki agi, “‘Ya coocca ɛkkɛn jitin ɔci atca bootca ɛkkɛn jitin, ɔci ‘ya agdi Jwaŋ ɛkkɛn ɔci ɛkkɛn aga ma ‘ya.
47006017	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ koodɛ bora te ɛkkɛnti ɔci ɛkkɛn daldɛ. Naa toptɛ gena yaayan gɛɛlti bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛ mugdin.
47006018	’Ya agdi Wey ɛkkɛ ɔci ɛkkɛ agdɛ kɛɛgin ‘ya kɛɛgin a ‘uay ɔci kɛɛgin a moongo. Gena Jwaŋa Yaakinti Naŋki Waakɛnda gɔki a ɔŋŋi neeniy.”
47007001	Maka ana ‘yay, ne jyeka ikin ḍuaññinti Juaŋ neeni balki ikintiyɛ, dala ikin waakɔ ywaŋtin te bora ne jiju. Ɔci dala ikin pwattin awarɛ te coodda ciyin ikin te bwajja ikin buayin Juaŋy.
47007002	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pɔktɛ ɔɔnti, ɔɔn dommɔn naŋki mengati bɛɛ, ɔci ɔɔn menga yaaññɔn bɛɛ. Ɔɔn menga naŋŋɔn ñin bɛɛ.
47007003	’Ya gɔk a ɔŋŋi aŋka jiek dɔwwa ɛkkɛ wyetkɔti bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya gɔkkan te ñamu doki, ka ɛkkɛ balgɛ ɔɔn yomgɔti ne ikin tuutin a cyɛɛlɔ ɔɔn, ɔci ne ikin tɛɛttin a cyɛɛlɔ ɔɔn.
47007004	Ɛkkɛ ŋeejin ‘ya yomuti awarɛ. ‘Ya noŋ waru te ɛkkɛ ne tolan. ‘Ya waru wookkan te beelin ɔɔn warda. ‘Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan.
47007005	Acaan ne oŋŋa ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ban Macɛdɔɔnya ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn waakɔ wooŋnɔn bɛɛ, yeti naŋka yeyin bɛɛn ɔɔnti nonk waakɛnda. Ma bala wɛyyɔn iki ɔɔn, ɔci ɔɔn buayɔn yomgɔti jiju.
47007006	Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan mena mwoni maka waakɛn dɔɔtan iñɔ yomgɛnyɛ, ɔɔn munnɔnji te bɛɛna bɛɛni Titucy.
47007007	Yeti te bɛɛn ɛkɛ parɛ budan bɛɛ, yeti te yom pwani te ɛkkɛti. Ɛkɛ ɔɔn myennɔn te yom yoñ ɛkkɛ, ɔci kuut ɛkkɛ moki, ɔci te bwakta ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya ne tolany. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, yom ñɔɔn ‘ya nɔñji ciɛñjin ñamu ne tolan.
47007008	Kan ‘ya ɛkkɛ yaaññin yomgɔti te worgan cuoññan ‘yayɛ, ‘ya yomu wiakcin bɛɛ. Ɛɛ, ‘ya yomu wiakcin te naŋka neeni ne ḍiɛran, acaan yuarcan ‘ya worgan wanna ɛkkɛ yaakɛ yomgɔti ba wɔɔka ne ḍuulan budan.
47007009	’Ya yomu ñɔɔcin acca men ɔɔn, yeti ‘ya yomu ñɔɔcin acaan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakcin bɛɛ, yeti acaan yom joon ɛkkɛ neeni ɛkkɛ wɛɛññɛ ɔci ɛkkɛ waakɔ yallɛ. Acaan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakcin ne pɛñan ba bolja Jwaŋa Tolan buagɛy, ɔci ga ɛkkɛ yaakɛ ɔɔn te genga bɛɛ.
47007010	Yom joona ba naŋki Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ etti yali waakɔ, yalla ikin wɛɛtin yɔɔta ikin yɔɔtinti Juaŋ ɔci ɛkɛ etti yom joon bɛɛ. Yeti yom joona iñɔ baanji wɛnni ɛkɛ etti lieno.
47007011	Gɔrtɛ Juaŋ noŋi gena te yom yoñ ɛkkɛ neeni. Ɛkɛ eccin war byerŋ ɛkkɛti, ɔci eccin bwakti aŋka pwani ɛkkɛ cwamdɛ, ɔci eccin loñko, ɔci bwajjo, ɔci war mwordin, ɔci ani kanŋa. Ɔci eccin jyek wani te naŋka a damgin neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛ waakɔ lɛɛlnɛ bora aŋka ŋeettan ma ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔ wɔkɔ te naŋka neeniti warda.
47007012	Ne ‘ya kiena worga ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ‘ya kiewan te mena noŋi nɔji wanna bɛɛ, ɔci walla te mena naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ne yaayan wanna bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya kieñi te gwalla gɔṭɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛ ne tolan neeni Ciɛggɔn ñamɛti.
47007013	’Wota te naŋka neeniyɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ tɛɛn te yom pwani ɛkkɛ, yeti ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔn nɔñji te yom ñɔɔn Tituc, acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ luun ɛkkɛti waakida.
47007014	Ne wona ɛkɛ luoṭṭi te ‘yati wɛnni men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ nɔɔtkɛn ‘ya te naŋka noŋa ‘ya waru te ɛkkɛy, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya poollati yomuti. ‘Ya ɛkkɛ myennin te naŋka awarɛ oŋkanda, ɔci acca naŋka noŋa ‘ya waru te Titucyɛ, aŋi naŋka awarɛ.
47007015	Ɛkɛ ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan ne ɛkɛ poŋdi te naŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba jyek ɛkɛ ɔci te muŋŋa ɛkkɛ jyek ɛkɛ muŋŋɛ te yoma pwadan yom bwaji ɔci war ḍiediny.
47007016	Acca ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. ‘Ya ɛkkɛ ŋeennin ne pwadan.
47008001	Acca modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn buagɔn dala yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan yom pwani ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ ma kaniican ban Macɛdɔɔnya pwadan neeniyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ.
47008002	Ɛkkɛn bala pɔɔt jitin, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔni. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔcin ne tolan ɔci bala ‘woñi waak te yoma pwadan ne ɛkkɛn akki maka bɔwan ɔɔn.
47008003	Gena ŋeej ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti ḍɔccin ba waka bala ɛkkɛnti. Ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti naŋka neeni ɔci ‘uotkiti te yomg ɛkkɛn.
47008004	Ɔci ɛkkɛn tooccin ɔɔnti oŋkɛn ne coŋɔn te maŋŋa mokɔn Ma Kiṭɔ ban Yahuudiyay.
47008005	Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ne tolan nɔñji naŋka paŋdɔn ɔɔn ‘yeeyɛyɔ, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn waakɛn ‘woñgi Ciɛggɔn ñamu lakun, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn ‘woñkɔn ɔɔn moki te yom pwani Juaŋo.
47008006	A ɔŋŋi ɔɔn toonnɔn Titucti ka dala ɛkɛ kanŋa neeni cwamdɛ bala ba ne ɛkɛ jɔɔnni te kanŋa yom pwani neeni.
47008007	Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka cyɛgan te waak waakɛnda. Gena jyeni, ɔci jiek, ɔci ŋeejin, ɔci war byerŋ, ɔci anna anɛ ɛkkɛ ɔɔny. Ɔci a ɔŋŋi ɔɔn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ bwagdɛ kanŋa yom pwani Juaŋ neeni ne tolan.
47008008	’Ya ‘yer ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya buaga ani ɛkkɛ poorcati i war byerŋ maka pookɛn aŋka gɔrca ne ani ɛkkɛ agi warɛ boki no.
47008009	Acaan naŋki yom pwani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ɛkɛ a mena cyɛgan, yeti ɛkɛ warɛ naŋŋɛ bɔɔn te ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka cyɛgan te bɔɔn ɛkɛ neeni.
47008010	Paŋi ‘yayɛ, bala a ɔŋŋi, dala kanŋa jɔɔnni ɛkkɛ ywoniti neeni cwamdɛ. Gena ɛkkɛ a maka jɔɔtcin te kanŋa neeniy. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ kanŋa neeni te yom ñɔɔn ɛkkɛ buagɛ noŋɛ kanŋa neeni ba bolja ɛkkɛ jɔɔnnɛ wanna ɔɔn.
47008011	Accayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kanŋa cwamdɛ aŋka bwakta yomg ɛkkɛ buagi noŋi kanŋa neeni ḍɔtti ne pwadan ne ɛkkɛ kanŋa naŋdiy. Dala ɛkkɛ menga da ‘woñi ba gena bala ɛkɛtiy.
47008012	Kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘woññɛyɛ, Juaŋ waka ‘woññɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, mugdɛ te waka ‘woññɛ ɛkkɛ neeniti, ga te waka baaw ɛkkɛti neeniti bɛɛ.
47008013	’Ya buaga maka pookɛn woodi ɔci ɛkkɛ aŋka taabdɛ bɛɛ, yeti ne ɛkkɛ balkɛ waak ne coŋɔn te waka neeniyɛ, dala te ɛkkɛ maka baaki waak neeni maŋŋɛ.
47008014	Ne ɛkkɛ baakɛti waak, ɔci ɛkkɛn balkiti waak ne coŋɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ maktɛ. Te naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ poṭṭɛ a poṭṭin.
47008015	Bala ba jyeka a kiigin worga Jwaŋa Tolanji ne gɔkki agi, “Mena lyemi ne coŋɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ balki ne coŋɔn nɔñji bɛɛ. Ɔci mena lyemi ne ḍiɛkanyɛ, ɛkɛ balki ne ḍiɛkan nɔñji moki bɛɛ.”
47008016	’Ya gɔk a pwatcin Juaŋti acaan ɛkɛ Tituc ‘wonnɛ bwakti bala ba ne ɔɔn buagɔnti mokɔn ɛkkɛy.
47008017	Acaan ɛkɛ jyeti jyeka ɔɔn toonnɔn ɛkkɛti pookɛn bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ buagɔn moki ɛkkɛ te yom ɛkɛ parɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yomɛ ḍyɛŋŋɛ aŋka bɛya ɛkkɛti aŋan.
47008018	Ɔci ɔɔn menga cuonnɔn i ɛkɛ. Mena neeni kaniican kanŋi ɛkɛyɛ, yomgɛn ñɔɔna a ñɔɔn ɛkɛti te lali ɛkɛ te jyeka wonkɛn.
47008019	Awarɛ, ‘wana neeni mwowwɛ kaniican bora aŋka atɔn i ɔɔn noŋɔn kanŋa ani neeni, ɔci naŋka neeni a pwani Ciɛggɔn, ɔci nɔɔti te bwakta ɔɔn buagɔnti mokɔn ɛkkɛy.
47008020	Ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn tiecɔn woŋgɔ aŋka naa jwalla yaayan gɛɛl bɛya te kanŋa ‘woññin ne coŋɔn kanŋa bala ɔɔn byeŋkɔti neeni bɛɛ.
47008021	Acaan gena ɔɔn buagɔn naŋdɔnyɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn noŋdɔn naŋka pwadin Juaŋ ñamɛti parɛ bɛɛ, yeti ma baan ñomgɛnti daŋkun.
47008022	Mod ɔɔn cuonnɔn ɔɔn i ɛkkɛn. Ɔɔn ɛkɛ pɔɔññɔn oŋki ne coŋɔn, ɔci yuarŋɔn ɔɔn ɛkɛ yomɛ buagɔn moki ma.
47008023	Ɔci Titucyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ñoowin i ‘ya te kanŋa te ɛkkɛ ɔci maka a modg ikin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka cuntan kaniican, ɔci noŋi ba jyek Kiṭɔ.
47008024	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ani ɛkkɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ‘uaya neeniti a ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci dala kaniican gɔrti ani ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn nɔɔttɛ ɔɔn jieyɔn waakɔ te ɛkkɛ awarɛ.
47009001	Te waka cuuññɛ ɛkkɛ wanna ‘ya balka gen gɛɛl aŋka ‘ya ɛkkɛ kiegdin worga te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
47009002	Acaan bwakta ɛkkɛ buagɛ moki mayɛ, ŋeej ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya noŋ waru te ɛkkɛ ma Macɛdɔɔnyati, ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan agi ɛkkɛ ma Akeeyayɛ, waakɔ ywaŋŋɛ te ywonna ati waayi doki, ɔci bwakta ɛkkɛ buagɛ neeniyɛ, magga ṭyɛllɛyɔ te ɛkkɛnti.
47009003	Acca ‘ya modg ɔɔn cuoñña aŋka naa jiɛta jieyin ɔɔn waakɔ te ɛkkɛ neeni koodi bora aga jyeka budan bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti bala ba guaŋi ‘ya doki, dala waak ɛkkɛ nina a ywaŋgɔn te jyek moowin.
47009004	’Ya buay kan ma Macɛdɔɔnya gɛɛg bɛɛdin i ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ woottɛ ɛkkɛn waakɔ a ywaŋgɔn bɛɛyɛ, ɔɔn nogdɔn lɔɔno, ɔci gɔktɔn te lɔn ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ, acaan yomg ɔɔn ḍuannɔnti ɛkkɛti doki.
47009005	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, modg ɔɔn gɛɛg cuoññan ‘ya ñamu ɛkkɛti aŋka gɔrti waka limmɛ ɛkkɛ ne baali ḍaaŋŋɛ te limi ba jwalla ḍuaññɛ ɛkkɛy, acaan ‘ya buaga ‘woññin ɛkkɛ neeni aga ‘woññin awarɛ, naa aga ‘woññin mwaji bɛɛ.
47009006	Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, mena duodi pok ne ḍiɛkanyɛ, ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi ne ḍiɛkan daŋkun, ɔci mena duodi ne coŋɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yɔɔrdi ne coŋɔn daŋkun.
47009007	Dala men da ‘woñi ba yom ɛkɛ. Naa ɛkɛ ‘woñi te yoma baaw bɛɛ, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ ñɔɔcin te mena ‘woñi te yoma pwadany.
47009008	Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan yaakinti ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛti pwani ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ baltɛ waka ɛkkɛ yɔɔmti oŋkanda ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛti waak ne coŋɔn nɔñji waakɛnda te naŋka pwadan.
47009009	Bala ba jyeka kiigin worga Juaŋji gɔki agi, “Mena pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ maka bɔwan ‘wonnɛ waako, ɔci naŋki pwani ɛkɛ bala yuonginda ɔɔn.”
47009010	Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan mena ‘woñi kookin dɔktan ma, ɔci ‘woñi ma te oomdin, aŋka amtan ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ daŋkun ‘wondɛ kookin ɛkkɛ buagɛ waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn yuoldɛ ñaalɔ ɔci ‘wondɛ ḍɔŋo, ɔci jieda ne pwadan te wak ɛkkɛ waka ‘wonnɛ ɛkkɛ ne coŋɔn neeni.
47009011	Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ agdɛ maka cyɛgan te waak waakɛnda, ɔci maka coŋin gɔkti Juaŋti a pwatcin te waka ‘wonnɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci luulɛ ɛkkɛn te ɔɔnti neeni.
47009012	Acaan naŋki moowin neeniyɛ, maka pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti yɔɔmtan pookɛn bɛɛ, yeti ciɛndi ñamu te jwali pwani Juaŋti, gɔ moki ciɛñji ɔɔn.
47009013	Acaan ɛkkɛ waakɔ lɛɛlnɛ bora te kanŋa neeniyɛ, ma waakɛnda gɔkti a pwatcin Juaŋti te jyeni ɛkkɛ, ɔci te naŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadiny, ɔci moki te waka ‘wonnɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn, ɔci ma waakɛnda mokiy.
47009014	Ne ɛkkɛn balki cɔkki te ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan te yom pwani ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan neeniy.
47009015	Pwatcin ne tolan Juaŋti te ‘woññin ɛkɛ ‘woññin tolan ne yaajan neeni.
47010001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc toocca ɛkkɛti te war ‘ya. ‘Ya a mena gɔk ɛkkɛti ka ‘ya waru dɔwwa iñɔ ne ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛy, ɔci ‘ya waru koobba ñaalɔ ne ‘ya baawa ɛkkɛtiy.
47010002	’Ya toocca ɛkkɛti te yom pwani Kiṭɔ, aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘ya tindati wyeñu yaaya ne ‘ya bɛɛda aŋan bɛɛy. Çeej ‘ya ne pwadan ma gɛɛg gɔki agi ɔɔn noŋjɔn ba naŋka iñɔ baanji wɛnni neeni. ‘Ya noŋdin iki ɛkkɛn ne yaayan.
47010003	Ikin ciyin iñɔ baanji wɛnni awarɛ, yeti ikin noŋin ṭwaŋ te wara ṭɛɛrji baanji wɛnni bɛɛ.
47010004	Waka noŋin ikin ṭwaŋ neeni a waka iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn a wak war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan. Ikin noŋin ṭwaŋ te ɛkkɛn. Ikin nonka tɛyan yaatin iki tyewwin jyeka a jomgin nuutin jitin.
47010005	Naŋki waakɔ naŋka kooki ŋeejin ma Juaŋ ŋeettiti neeni oortin iñɔ. Paŋi waakɛnda muktinyɔ ɔci naŋtin tieŋdi jyek Kiṭɔ.
47010006	Ɔci ne naŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba jyek Kiṭɔ neeni cwamnɛ ɛkkɛ dokiyɛ, ɔɔn waakɔ ywaŋŋɔn doki aŋka jiek oldɔn maka bɛɛyi jiek neeni wyetkɛnti.
47010007	Ɛkkɛ gɔṭɛ waka niin te waaka bora neeni. Menga bala poŋi te war ɛkɛ, a ɛkɛ a men Kiṭɔ? Pwatcin, dala ɛkɛ poŋdi moki te war ɛkɛ, acaan ɔɔn daŋkun agɔn Ma Kiṭɔ ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
47010008	Kan ‘ya noŋ waru ne tolan te jyeka ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti Ciɛggɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ kooptɛ ɔɔn ñaalɔ neeniyɛ, ‘ya waru a lɔɔn te naŋka wanna bɛɛ. Ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn ɛkɛ jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ jietɛ ma jitin bɛɛ.
47010009	’Ya buaga naa bala ba ne ‘ya kiewa worgan neeni aŋka ɛkkɛ poddɛ bɛɛ.
47010010	Menga kɔŋji gɔkti agi, “Worgan Buuluc jiekɛn pɛñɔ ɔci tɛɛcin, yeti ne ɛkɛ balgin iki ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ tɛɛcin bɛɛ, ɔci jyek ɛkɛ a genga bɛɛ.”
47010011	Mena gɔki a ɔɔn wannayɛ, dala ɛkɛ ñingɛ ñiektɛ te waka kiidɔn ɔɔn te worgan ne ɔɔn longɔn ɔntɔ, ɔci te waka naŋdɔn ɔɔn ne ɔɔn balgɔn ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ, a kɛɛptin bɛɛ.
47010012	Ɔɔn poṭṭɔn waak ɔɔn ɔci walla balgɔn ba maka noŋi waakɛn oltan ñamu wanna bɛɛ. Poca gɔrtɛ! Wyeñ booj ɛkkɛn bala a ɔki. Ɛkkɛn waakɛn kooptan ñaalɔ pookɛn, waakɛn poortanti pookɛn te bolja bala ɛkkɛntiy.
47010013	Oŋ yeti ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn noŋɔn waakɔ te gena loonan te kanŋa ɔɔnti bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn ningɔn te kanŋa Juaŋ ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti naŋdɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti, ɔci nona yɔɔnnɔn ɔɔn te kanŋa ɔɔn ‘wonnɔnti Juaŋy.
47010014	Ne ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naŋki wari ɔɔn ati ne loonan ‘yeeccin bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn dɛnnɔn ɛkkɛti te jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni.
47010015	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn noŋdɔn waakɔ te kanŋa naŋɛ maka pookɛn ‘yeettɔn bora te nona yɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ aŋka naŋdɔn ɔɔn neeni bɛɛ. Yeti ɔɔn poŋɔn ka jyeni ɛkkɛ ‘uotti ñamu, ɔci ɔɔn yaaktɔnti noŋdɔn kanŋa tolan ɛkkɛti oŋkanda te nona ɔɔn yɔɔnnɔnti Juaŋtiy.
47010016	Ɔci ɔɔn jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin eedɔn bonka lonin ban ɛkkɛ ŋoyɛti aŋan aŋka naa ɔɔn noŋdɔn waakɔ te kanŋa naŋɛ maka pookɛn te jyeka lali ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
47010017	Bala ba jyeka a kiigin worga Juaŋji ne gɔkki agi, “Kan mena buagɔn noŋi warɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi warɛ te naŋka naŋŋi Juaŋy.”
47010018	Ciɛggɔn poŋi te mena maŋdɛ ɛkɛy, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ poŋi te mena mooŋi war ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ.
47011001	’Ya poŋ ka dala te ɛkkɛ ‘ya bɔɔŋnata te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ owwan ‘ya bora te wyeñ booj neeni, dala ɛkkɛ ‘ya bɔɔktatɛ.
47011002	’Ya yomu tolcin ne tolan te ɛkkɛ bala ba Juaŋ yomɛ toli te ɛkkɛy. Ɛkkɛ ḍuaññin ‘ya te jwali te ‘uan ne cyɛɛlɔ, gena Kiṭɔ aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondin ɛkɛ ba ṭɔla pwadan.
47011003	’Ya buay dita ɛkkɛ ñomgɔ yaldɛ ɔntɔ te naŋka awarɛti, ɔci te ani Kiṭɔti ba Awwa ne dienni ñin kaaŋ te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛy.
47011004	Kan magga bɛɛn ɛkkɛti ɔci ɛkkɛ lalkɛ te pɔya parɛ gɛɛl te Yaccu bala ba pɔya ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn wanna bɛɛyɛ, ɔci moki kan ɛkkɛ mwokkɛ boŋa parɛ gɛɛl te ɛka muŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ te ɔɔnti ɔci kan ɛkkɛ mwokkɛ jwalla parɛ gɛɛl te jwalla muŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ te ɔɔntiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ doki jyeka neeni mugdɛ ne byeran ɔɔn.
47011005	Oŋ yeti ‘ya poŋ ka ‘ya a mena ḍiɛran te kanŋa te maka boṭi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn aginti “cuudan Yaccu” neeni bɛɛ.
47011006	’Ya urkati jiek ne tolan bɛɛ, yeti awarɛ ‘ya waak ŋeejo. Waka neeni jitkɛn lɛɛlnɔn ɔɔn bora korkɛn ne wɔkɔn oŋki waakɛnda.
47011007	’Ya waru dɔwwan iñɔ aŋka ɛkkɛ koobdin ñaalɔ te jyek Juaŋ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin budan. ‘Ya buaga genga te ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Oŋ naŋka neeni dami ‘ya?
47011008	Ne ‘ya baala kanŋa ɛkkɛtiyɛ, kaniican pookɛn bala moki ‘ya. ‘Ya baal ec wak ɛkkɛn ne coŋɔn aŋka ‘ya gɔk jiek mok ɛkkɛ.
47011009	Ne ‘ya baala ciyin iki ɛkkɛyɛ, ‘ya tooccan ɛkkɛti te genga ne ‘ya buagati bɛɛ. Ma ban Macɛdɔɔnya waka ‘ya buagatiyɛ, ḍuaccɛ ɛkkɛn. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya waru tiekan te oljin waka cyɛgan olda ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti, ɔci naŋka neeni tieka ‘ya oŋkanda ɔɔn.
47011010	Naŋki Kiṭɔ naŋka awarɛ, naŋka bala ‘yati neeniyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ ḍuadin te jwali ka naŋka noŋa ‘ya waru neeni ḍieptɛ iñɔ menga ban Akeeya aŋan bɛɛ.
47011011	’Ya gɔk a ɔŋŋi acaan ‘ya yooka te ɛkkɛ? A’a, ŋeejɛ Juaŋ ‘ya an ɛkkɛ.
47011012	’Ya kanja budan te bilk ba kanŋa kanŋa ‘ya acca neeni ɔɔn aŋka maka noŋi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn balginti ba ɔɔn neeni yɔddiyɔ te naŋki waakɛn.
47011013	’Uaya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a cuudan Yaccu awarɛ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn a cuudan jomi jieko, ɔci a maka jomi jiek te kanŋan ɛkkɛn, ɔci noŋi waakɛn ba ɛkkɛn akki cuudan Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
47011014	Ikin waakɔ potti iñɔ te naŋka neeni bɛɛ! Acaan Jwaŋa Yaayan daŋkun warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora bala ba malɛɛka nona dɛkiy.
47011015	A ɔŋŋi ikin korkɔ buaya noon bɛɛ, acaan kɛɛnk jwaŋa yaayan neeni daŋkun waakɛn lɛɛltan bora noŋi bala ba ɛkkɛn akki kɛɛnk Jwaŋa Tolan ɔɔn. Yeti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, jiek dɔɔkti ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ba naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin neeni waakɛnda.
47011016	’Ya gɔk moki, naa menga poŋdi ‘ya a aamma bɛɛ. Dala ‘ya mugdata kan ‘ya a aamma ɔɔn, aŋka ‘ya jiejja waru ne ḍiɛran.
47011017	Te naŋki ‘ya waru paru neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ba jyeka buagi Juaŋ bɛɛ, oŋ yeti ‘ya gɔk ba jyek wyeñ booj awarɛ.
47011018	Acaan maka coŋin maka noŋi ba naŋka baan konɛti, noŋi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn pwadgintiyɛ, ‘ya daŋkun noŋja waru ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
47011019	Ɛkkɛ woodgɔyɛ, wyetkɔ pwadɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ maka wyetkɛn baaw muŋŋɛ te yoma pwadan.
47011020	Ne ma balki noŋki ɛkkɛ a kɛɛnkyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ gɔktɛ genga bɛɛ, ɔci ne ma noŋki ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ gɔktɛ genga bɛɛ, ɔci ne ɛkkɛ kantɛ ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋki waakɛn ɛkkɛti ɔci jiepki ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔŋnɛ genga ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
47011021	Ɔɔn waakɔ aŋi lɔɔn acaan ɔɔn noŋŋɔn ba naŋka naŋɛ maka pookɛn wanna bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti kan mena balkɔn war tɛɛn acaan gɔkti te pwani war ɛkɛyɛ, ‘ya da balka yoma tɛyan aŋka gɔkca te pwani war ‘ya, ɔci jyeka guagdi ‘ya neeniyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya a jyek wyeñ boojo.
47011022	Kan ɛkkɛn a ma Ibrunyɛ, ‘ya da baal a ɔɔn. Ɔci kan a ma Icrayiilyɛ, ‘ya da baal a ɔɔn moki. Ɔci kan a kɛɛn Abrahimyɛ, ‘ya da baal a ɔɔn moki.
47011023	Kan ɛkkɛn a maka kanŋan Yaccutiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ba mena wyeñɛ baawo, oŋ yeti ‘ya kanŋ ne pwadan te ɛkkɛn, ‘ya baal kanŋ ne pɛñan, ɔci kanŋa ɛkkɛn buannɛ kanŋa ‘ya. Ɔci ‘ya cien ciginji oŋki ne coŋɔn te ɛkkɛn ‘wota. Ɔci ‘ya ḍuaka ma oŋki ne coŋɔn ɛkkɛn buanno, ɔci ‘ya baal lien tukɛti oŋki ne coŋɔn ɛkkɛn buanno.
47011024	Ɔci ‘ya ḍuaka ma Yahuud oŋki ne dɔɔyɔ woong tuggɛn a men baan mena parɛ byeŋkɛ ɔci ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ (39).
47011025	Ɔci ‘ya jiepka ma Ḍɔɔm oŋki ne ḍoogɔ te gɔlko. Ɔci yepka te gwoyi oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci ‘ya lɛŋna murka tolan Galŋa Tolanji oŋki ne ḍoogɔ, ɔci ‘ya oŋ konɛ ɔci ween konɛ noŋi te tɔɔn pieg wyetkɛnti ne murka lɛɛŋniy.
47011026	Wodin ata ‘ya korkɛn ne coŋɔnyɛ, ‘ya koogjin i naŋka yeyin pwatcin bɛɛ, noŋ eeda toolo, ɔci noŋ kalta ɛɛjan, ɔci ma Yahuud noŋi ne yaayan ɔci Keedin Pookɛn noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati moki. Ma bonka ḍwaŋin noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati, ɔci ne ‘ya baala luom jitin naŋka yaayan bɛɛn moki, ɔci ne baala toolji, ‘ya yɔṭi naŋka yaayan, ɔci munga jomi jiek bala noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati moki.
47011027	Ɔci oŋki ne coŋɔn ‘ya woŋgu dɛtkan nink baaw acaan te kanŋan coŋin, ɔci amma koñ ɔci yiɛno. Ɔci waka amdi ‘ya baaw oŋki ne coŋɔn, ɔci moki noŋŋa jwami, ɔci baaka bworŋin.
47011028	Te naŋka bala bɛɛn ‘ya waruti coŋin neeni toŋkɛntiyɛ, ñalla ñoṭa ‘ya kaniican waakɛnda neeniyɛ, cyɛŋi ‘yati.
47011029	Kan men gɛɛl warɛ koocinyɛ, ‘ya da waru koya ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn bɛɛ? Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ḍɛmdi nɔji jitiny, ‘ya yoma yaayɛ te ɛkɛ bɛɛ?
47011030	Kan ‘ya buaga gɔkca te war ‘yayɛ, ‘ya gɔkca te waka waakɛn lɛɛllɛ bora te war koñi ‘yay.
47011031	Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu mena maltin ikin yuonginda neeniyɛ, ‘ya ŋeeja ‘ya jom jiek bɛɛ.
47011032	Ḍuaŋ ṭɔɔlɛ ḍuannɛ Ariitac ḍuaŋa tolan ban Ḍimaacka neeniyɛ, gɔkcin bɔlin kɛɛyi ‘yegin tuggɛn ban Ḍimaackati aŋka ‘ya muktayɔ.
47011033	Oŋ yeti ‘ya ḍuacka ma guppaji, ɔci guppa wiɛnɛ ma te wyenti, ɔci ‘ya luotka ma bora te kaañ waŋɛ, ɔci boottan kaañ warɛti ne iñɔ aŋka ‘ya unna te byeŋ ɛkɛti neeni.
47012001	Dala ‘ya noŋja waru. Yeti ‘ya yɔɔra genga te naŋka neeniti bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te loggin ɔci te waka ‘ya lɛɛrnati Ciɛggɔny.
47012002	Çeej ‘ya te yuonga ati a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ waayiyɛ, ‘ya eñña Juaŋ ñaalɔ pɔli jiña loonan, yeti kan ‘ya baal ciy te war ma baan walla wara baawyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ, ŋeejɛ gena Juaŋ parɛ.
47012003	Çeej ‘ya ‘ya eñña Juaŋ ñaalɔ ban Jwaŋa Tolan te waro, walla kan te war bɛɛyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ, ŋeejɛ gena Juaŋ parɛ.
47012004	Ɔci aŋanyɛ, ‘ya tieŋjan waka ma yaakinti guaktan bɛɛy, waka neeni Juaŋ dɛyi ma aŋka guaktan ma bɛɛ.
47012005	’Ya jiejja waru te war ‘ya, yeti ‘ya jiejja waru paru bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya noŋja waru te gena war koñi ‘ya.
47012006	Kan te ‘ya noŋja waruyɛ, ‘ya baldi ba mena wyeñɛ baaw bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya gɔk te jyeka awarɛ. Yeti ‘ya noŋja waru bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya buaga naa menga poŋdi ne tolan te ‘ya nɔñji te waka yuartɛ ɛkɛ ɔci tieŋdi ɛkɛ te ‘yati neeni bɛɛ.
47012007	Aŋka naa ‘ya noŋja waru te waka waakɛn lɛɛllɛ bora coŋin neeni bɛɛyɛ, Juaŋ ‘ya ‘wonna kuun waruti bala ba mena cundɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan, aŋka ñoki ‘ya kono, ɔci ‘ya dɛɛda te naŋki waru.
47012008	’Ya wiakcan Juaŋti oŋki ne ḍoogɔ ka dala ɛkɛ naŋka neeni eedɛ ɔntɔ te ‘yati.
47012009	Yeti ɛkɛ ṭwokkin ‘yati agi, “A’a, yom pwani ‘ya i yɔɔmdi, acaan war tɛɛn ‘ya warɛ cwamdɛ te war koñño.” Ya yomu ñɔɔcin acaan ‘ya noŋ waru te war koñi ‘ya aŋka war tɛɛn Kiṭɔ bɛya ‘yati.
47012010	’Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te war koñi, ɔci te ŋɛɛgga ḍorki ma ‘ya, ɔci te yaata yoocki ma ‘ya, ɔci te naŋka noŋki ma ‘ya ne yaayan, ɔci te tiñña ‘ya tiñkati ma ñaalɔ te Kiṭɔy. Acaan ne ‘ya waru koyiyɛ, ‘ya waru tɛɛcin dɔki.
47012011	Gena ɛkkɛ ‘ya olnatɛ noŋjan ba mena wyeñɛ baawy. Acaan gena te ɛkkɛ aŋka jieddɛ jiek te ‘yay, ga te ‘ya jiejja jiek te war ‘ya paru bɛɛ. Acaan ‘ya buanka cuudan pookɛn neeni te genga bɛɛ, kan ne ‘ya aga genga baaw ɔɔny.
47012012	Ne ‘ya baala aŋanyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛ lɛɛrnin naŋki mena a cuuda waakɛnda. ‘Ya cuonna Juaŋ waanɛ ɛkkɛti. ‘Ya yomu tiekan, ɔci noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma war tɛɛn Juaŋ ne coŋɔn, ɔci liɛlgin ɔci war tɛɛn kanŋa ɛkkɛti.
47012013	Ɛkkɛ buankɛ kaniican pookɛn te genga? A’a, yeti gena ŋeej ‘yayɛ, ‘ya tooccan ɛkkɛti te jyek maŋi te genga te kanŋa ‘ya neeni bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ‘ya bɔɔktatɛ te naŋka neeni.
47012014	Gena oŋŋa akti ḍoogɔ neeni, ‘ya waru ywaŋi doki aŋka ‘ya bɛɛd ɛkkɛti, ɔci ‘ya agdi gena cyɛgan ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ, ‘ya lier ɛkkɛ woodgɔ. ‘Ya lier waka bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Gena kɛɛgin weyyɛn ɔci mɛyyɛn aŋka kɛɛgin ‘wontan waaky. Kɛɛgin yaakinti weyyɛn ɔci mɛyyɛn ‘wontan waak bɛɛ.
47012015	Yeti ‘yayɛ, wak ‘ya ‘uaccanyɔ te ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ magdin. Kan ‘ya an ɛkkɛ ne tolany, ɛkkɛ andɛ ‘ya ne ḍiɛran?
47012016	Yeti ŋeej ‘ya magga te ɛkkɛti poŋi agi, ɛɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi gena cyɛgan ikinti te genga bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ noŋi ikinti te ñing tɛɛno.
47012017	’Ya yomu toli te genga te maka cuoññan ‘ya ɛkkɛti wanna?
47012018	’Ya ‘yercan Titucti ka dala ɛkɛ ooddi, ɔci mena a mod ikin neeni cuoññan iki ɛkɛ. Tituc yomɛ toli te genga ɛkkɛtɛ? Ɔɔn kanŋɔn te boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ? Ɔɔn atɔn te ciya ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ?
47012019	Ɛkkɛ balgɛ poŋɛ a ɔɔn yuocɔn waakɔ ɛkkɛ ñomgɔtɛ? A’a, ɔɔn gɔkɔn Juaŋ ñamɛti te Kiṭɔ. Yeti naŋka neeni waakɛnda naŋŋɔn ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu hay, maka ana ‘yay.
47012020	Acaan ‘ya buay ne ‘ya bɛɛda ḍieŋda ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dita ɛkkɛ mɔktin ciyɛ ba coodda buagati ‘ya neeni bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ, dita, ‘ya yuartata ba bolja ɛkkɛ buagɛ bɛɛ. Dita naŋka neeni aŋka bala, gena wɛɛdin, ɔci kon moni, ɔci loñko, ɔci ani waakɔ, ɔci jomtan jieko, ɔci lɔɔrin yɔtin, ɔci jiɛt waakɔ, ɔci naŋka amaamo.
47012021	Ɛɛ, ‘ya buay acaan ne ‘ya bɛɛda moki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, Juaŋ ‘ya dɔɔda iñɔ ɛkkɛ ñomgɔti kaapun, ɔci ‘ya yomu wiakti te maka noŋi nɔji te ñamu, ɔci waakɛn yali te naŋka naŋɛ ɛkkɛn yaayan, ɔci tomi, ɔci wɛlja naŋɛ ɛkkɛn wanna bɛɛ neeni kaapun.
47013001	Oŋŋa bɛɛda ‘ya ɛkkɛti acca neeni gena oŋŋa akki ne ḍoogɔ. Jyeka a kiigin worga Juaŋti gɔki agi, “Jiek waakɛnda aga jyeka awarɛ te tuk maka ne yyɛɛwɔ, walla te tuk maka ne ḍoogɔ.”
47013002	’Ya gɔkka maka noŋi nɔji te ñamu dokiti, ɔci maka pookɛnti waakɛnda. ‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛnti, yeti ‘ya baal wɛnan bɛɛ, bala ba naŋka naŋi ‘ya te ciya ‘ya bɛɛna ḍieŋna te oŋŋa akki ne yyɛɛwɔy. Kan ‘ya bɛɛd mokiyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn bɔɔka moki bɛɛ.
47013003	Ɛkkɛ buagɛ gɔrtɛ Kiṭɔ gɔki a lyɛlta ‘yatiɛ? Ɛkɛ a war tɛɛn ɛkkɛti, ɛkɛ warɛ koy koy ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
47013004	Acaan ɛkɛ ŋaabɛ ma te war koñño, yeti ɛkɛ tɛɛti te war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔɔn da waakɔ koocin te ñoowin ɔɔn ñoowin iki ɛkɛy, yeti te jyeka ɔɔn ñoowin iki ɛkkɛyɛ, war tɛɛn Juaŋ bala ɔɔnti daŋkun te tɛɛtin ɛkɛ.
47013005	Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ pɔɔdɛ, ɔci gɔrtɛ kan ɛkkɛ balgɛ tiecɛ jyeni ɛkkɛ boki no. Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ pɔɔdɛ. Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ? Yeti ɛkkɛ buannɛji pɔɔta neeni.
47013006	’Ya baal kɛɛy ɛkkɛ ka ɔɔn ñiidɔntɔ, acaan ɔɔn buannɔn genga bɛɛ.
47013007	Yeti ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɔɔn dita buagɔn dala ɔɔn aŋka gwaltɔn ma ba maka kanŋa ɛkkɛn yɔmjin ne tolan bɛɛ, a’a, ɔci ba bolja wookki ma kanŋa ɔɔn wanna ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ naŋa pwadin.
47013008	Ɔɔn noŋdɔn naŋka awarɛ oŋkanda. Ɔɔn yaakɔnti noŋdɔn ne yaayan naŋka awarɛti neeni bɛɛ.
47013009	Acaan ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne ɔɔn waakɔ kooki ɔci ɛkkɛ aŋka waakɔ tɛɛkiy. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu.
47013010	’Ya kiew jyeka neeni ɛkkɛti ne ‘ya baawa ɛkkɛtiy. A ɔŋŋi ‘ya noŋja ɛkkɛti ne pɛñan ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga noŋja war tɛɛn ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ koobdin ñaalɔ, ɛkkɛ mɔɔrtin iñɔ bɛɛ.
47013011	Ne ŋoyɔyɛ, hay, modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu! Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka guagdi ‘yay. Dala jwali ɛkkɛ aga cyɛɛlɔ waakida. Dala ɛkkɛ coodɛ te pwanno, ɔci Jwaŋa ani ma ɔci noŋi ne pwadan mati baldi iki ɛkkɛ.
47013012	Dala ɛkkɛ ñiebdɛ yɔtin te ñiebbin yoma pwadan,
47013013	Ma Kiṭɔ wɛnni ñiepi ɛkkɛ waakida.
47013014	Dala yom pwani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci ani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ñoowin Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkkɛti waakida.
48001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc ñiep ɛkkɛ neeni. Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya cuonna men baan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ ‘ya cuonna ɔci Weegɛn Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkɛ jɔɔlnɛ ñaalɔ te lientiy.
48001002	Ɔci modg ikin modga balgin iki ‘ya wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Ɔɔn ñiepɔn ɛkkɛ ma kaniican ban Galatiya.
48001003	Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti moki.
48001004	Yaccu a mena war ɛkɛ ‘wonnin ikin te nɔji ikin aŋka ɛkɛ yuoci ikin te ṭɛra ciyin ikin acca ṭɛra yaayan neeni. Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn ba yom Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan.
48001005	Dala ma jieyi ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
48001006	’Ya yomu wiak ne ɛkkɛ waakɔ yalnɛ ɔntɔ ne pɛñan te Juaŋti mena ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora neeniy. Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛti ɔci ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora te yom pwani Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ waakɔ yalnɛ ɔntɔ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pookɛnti neeni.
48001007	Jyeka pookɛn neeniyɛ, a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin awarɛ bɛɛ. Ma gɛɛg bala, ɔci ɛkkɛn buagɔn ɛkkɛ nuutɛ wyetkɔti ɔci ɛkkɛn jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin aktanyɔ aga jyeka jomgin budan ɛkkɛti.
48001008	Kan men gɛɛl te ɔɔnti, walla kan a malɛɛka gɛɛl bɛɛn te ñaalɔ pɔliji ɔci lorti ɛkkɛ te jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg bala ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn ñamu neeni bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ḍardɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
48001009	’Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki, kan men gɛɛl bɛɛn ɔci lorti ɛkkɛ te jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg bala ba jyeka muŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ ñamu neeni bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ḍardɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
48001010	Ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ‘ya buagata ma baan gɔktɔ agi ‘ya pwadjɔ? A’a, ‘ya buaga Juaŋ aŋka gɔkti agi ‘ya pwadjɔ. ‘Ya buaga ŋeetta ma baan ne coŋɔn? A’a. Te ‘ya baala potta noŋa aŋka ŋeetta ma ne coŋɔnyɛ, te ‘ya noŋ kanŋa Kiṭɔ ne pwadan bɛɛ.
48001011	Modg ɔɔn, tieŋdɛ ne pwadan. Jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin ɛkkɛ nɔɔnnin ‘ya neeni a jyek men baan gɛɛl budan bɛɛ.
48001012	’Ya myenna men baan gɛɛl te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci moki ‘ya lalka ma te jyeka wonkɛn neeni bɛɛ. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka ‘ya lɛɛrna jyeka wonkɛn neeni te naŋki ɛkɛy.
48001013	Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek naŋki ‘ya doki. Wona ‘ya aŋŋa cuuda Yaccu men bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya baal noŋ ba naŋki ma Icrayiil. ‘Ya baal noŋ ne yaayan ma kaniicati oŋkanda ne tolan, acaan ‘ya buaga dala jyek Yaccu baadi, ɔci maka booti ɛkɛti nogdi waakɛnda.
48001014	Maka ‘uayi maka a ma ɔɔn ba ‘ya ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn buani ‘ya te mali ma Icrayiil a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ, acaan ‘ya waru byerŋa byerŋ te jyek naŋki yɔrg ikin yɔrga te baaṭi.
48001015	Yeti ne ‘ya jiennata mɛy ɔɔn men bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya doki muona Jwaŋa Tolan bora te kanŋa ɛkɛ doki. Ɔci oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya borna te yom pwani ɛkɛ ‘yati.
48001016	Ɔci ‘ya lɛɛrna ɛkɛ Kaci ɛkɛ, ɔci ‘ya oŋ cuuñña ɛkɛ ati lor Keedin Pookɛn te Jyek Kiṭɔ oŋo. Ne ‘ya cuuññati Juaŋ a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya tooccan men gɛɛlti te jiek gɛɛg bɛɛ.
48001017	Maka muonɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bora ñamu te ‘ya ŋeej ‘ya ne balki ban Urcaliimji ɔɔn. Yeti ‘ya ati aŋan aŋka myetta ɛkkɛn te jwali gɛɛl bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya ati gena ban Arabya, ɔci ne baaṭi ‘ya dɔɔkkan dɔki ban Ḍimaackati.
48001018	Ɔci ne yuonga ne ḍoogɔ bɛɛki borayɛ, ‘ya oŋ ati ban Urcaliimji, ḍieŋjan Butructi oŋo. Ɔɔn balgɔn iki ɛkɛ nink a inyaakkɛn om ne cyɛɛlɔ (15).
48001019	Yeti Cuudan Yaccu makɛn pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yuarŋ ‘ya bɛɛ, gena Yaakub mod Yaccun aŋka yuarŋ ‘ya parɛy.
48001020	Jyeka kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, a jyeka jomgin bɛɛ. Çeejɛ Juaŋ jyeka neeni a jyeka awarɛ.
48001021	Ɔci ne baaṭi ‘ya oŋ ati ban Cuurya ɔci ban Ciliicya oŋo.
48001022	Ɔci ma kaniican ban Yahuudiya, ɛkkɛn ‘ya yuarka te woŋgɛn bɛɛ.
48001023	Ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin te jyetkɛn budan agi mena noŋɔ ne yaayan ɛkkɛnti te ñamuyɛ, agi ɛkta baalɔ loṭɔ ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka ɛkta baalda nokta ma agi dala baadɔ te ñamuy.
48001024	Ɔci ma bala jieyi Juaŋ te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ‘yati te akta ɛkɛ ‘ya aaŋŋati ñin pwanna neeni.
48002001	Ne yuonga a inyaakkɛn wyetkɛn ne ŋaanɔ neeni bɛɛki borayɛ, ‘ya ati ban Urcaliim moki. Ɔɔn attɔn i Barnabac, ɔci Tituc eñi ‘ya.
48002002	’Ya myenna Kiṭɔ te won ‘ya ban Urcaliim. Ɔci maka ḍwaŋin myetkan ‘ya pookɛn ñamu te jyeka loṭa ‘ya Keedin Pookɛn neeni, acaan ‘ya buaga naa jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma neeni aga ba jyeka budan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci moki, ‘ya buaga naa jyeka loṭa ‘ya ɛkkɛn ne baaṭi aga ba jyeka budan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
48002003	Ma gɛɛg bala aŋan ɛkkɛn noŋi ba ne ɛkkɛn akki modg ikin ɔɔn no, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn a modg ikin awarɛ bɛɛ. A menɛ ɛkkɛn barŋɛ a modg ikin lieda neeni yeti? Ɛkkɛn buagɔn naa ikin ḍɔɔggɔ wɔkti te jyek ganuun bɛɛ, acaan acca ikin jyettin Kiṭɔti doki. Maka neeni ɛkkɛn ṭoki dala ikin naŋtin a kɛɛnk ganuun moki. Mena mod ɔɔn Titucyɛ, ɛkɛ a men ma Giriik, yeti maka wɛɛyi ma neeni ‘yercin ɛkɛti te jyek ŋuni moki aŋka ɛkɛ naŋtan aga men Ma Icrayiil ba ikin ɔŋŋi bɛɛ.
48002006	Yeti maka bala ñaltan ma ba ne akki maka wɛɛyi ma ḍwaŋin neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔk ka naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni eccin paŋŋa woonɛ gɛɛl ‘yati bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan gɔṭi waak maka wɛɛyi ma neeni waaka bora budan bɛɛ.
48002007	Maka ḍwaŋin neeni ɛkkɛn ‘ya myetka te jyek kanŋa lali ma parɛ budan bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn ‘ya ciŋkaji te naŋki kanŋa maka Kɛɛna Pookɛnti. Yaakub i Butruc i Yɔhannayɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka ḍwaŋin. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn gɔrki naŋka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ mati te jyek ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn te ɔɔn yaakkɔ Barnabac bɛɛ. Butruc ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan kanŋa te lali ma Icrayiil maka balki jyek ŋwoti oŋkanday.
48002010	Ɛkkɛn balki jwali gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ budan agi dala ɔɔn ma Juaŋ maka bɔwan magjɔn ban Urcaliimji. Jyek ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka buagata ‘ya neeni daŋkun.
48002011	Ne Butruc bɛɛni ban Antyakyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan ɛkɛti ne pɛñan acaan ɛkɛ bala noŋi ne pwadan bɛɛ.
48002012	Te ñamu ɛkɛ bala omi iki Keedin Pookɛn. Yeti ne ma gɛɛg bɛɛki te Yaakubtiyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ yɔɔnnɛ te amma ɛkɛ omki iki Keedin Pookɛny. Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buayi ma Icrayiil maka buagɔn jyek ŋwoti Keedin Pookɛn neeni.
48002013	Ɔci ma Icrayiil a Ma Kiṭɔ maka pookɛnyɛ, ñokcinti ɔci bala noŋi ba naŋki ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkkɛnyɛ, Barnabac daŋkun jyɛtci ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ ɔci noŋi ba ɛkkɛn moki ɔɔn.
48002014	Ɔci ne ‘ya gɔrna ɛkkɛn atki te pɔy waŋɛ a tyɛlga ba bolji jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan Butructi te ma ñomgɛnti waakɛnda ka, “Hay Butruc, i a men ma Icrayiil ɔci i baal ciy ba ma Keedin Pookɛn neeni. Oŋ te gena aŋka i buagi dala Keedin Pookɛn neeni naŋki ɛkkɛn daltan ɔci dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi ba naŋki ma Icrayiily?”
48002015	Ɛkkɛn oŋ myetkan ‘ya jwalla awarɛ neeni agi ikin jietkin ma akin ma Icrayiil maka noŋi ba jyek ganuun jitkɛn.
48002016	Yeti ŋeecin ikin men gɛɛl ikinti pwada Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ. Ikin ma Icrayiil pwattin Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ikin jyettin Yaccu Kiṭɔti. Ɔci Keedin Pookɛn neeni, ɛkkɛn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetti Yaccu Kiṭɔti daŋkun. Ikin waakida balkin bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ. Men gɛɛl pwada Juaŋ ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ.
48002017	Ikin ma Icrayiil yɔɔnnin te naŋki mali ikin ma Icrayiil acaan ŋeecin ikin ikin pwatkin Juaŋ ñamɛti acca acaan te jyenna jyettin ikin Kiṭɔti neeni. Ɔci ma ikin ma Icrayiil ɛkkɛn ikin ñaltin ba nɔɔtka ḍwaŋin te naŋka neeni. Hay! Yaccu ikin eeŋnin nɔji ḍɔɔggɔtɛ? Hayɛllɛ! Nɔji bɛya te Yaccuti bɛɛ.
48002018	’Ya baal lor ma te jyenna ikin pwattin Juaŋ ñamɛti neeni, ɔci acca kan ‘ya jiek agdiyɔ, ɔci kan ‘ya dɔwwa lorca ma ka da ɛkkɛn tieci jyek ganuun mokiyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya jiek dami doki.
48002019	Ne ‘ya baala noŋa ba jyeka ganuun buagɛ aŋka naŋdi ‘yayɛ, naŋki ‘ya neeni yuarcan ‘ya a jomgɔn budan, acaan yuarcan ‘ya pwad awarɛ te naŋki ganuun wanna bɛɛ.
48002020	’Ya tuunin iki Kiṭɔ a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci acca gena ‘ya ciy neeni moki bɛɛ. Gena Kiṭɔ aŋka ciyi ‘ya yomuti neeni. Ɔci coodda ciya ‘ya acca neeniyɛ, ‘ya ciy te jyenna ‘ya jyetta Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanti mena ani ‘ya ɔci ‘ya ‘wonna war ɛkɛy.
48002021	Gena naŋŋɛ Juaŋ pwadan neeniyɛ, a jyeka budan ‘yati bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ma yaakinti pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun pookɛnyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ne ɛkɛ gɔki agi lyen Yaccu neeniyɛ, bala ba ne ɛkɛ tuuni budan no.
48003001	Hay, ɛkkɛ maka ban Galatiya, ɛkkɛ naŋŋɛ ñin menɛ yeti? Ɛkkɛ nɔɔnnin ‘ya ne pwadan te kon lyen Yaccu Kiṭɔ te ñamu te oŋŋa tuuni ɛkɛ kakanti neeni.
48003002	Acca ‘ya buaga toocca ɛkkɛti te jwali gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ Boŋ ɛkɛ te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛn boki, walla te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek ɛkɛy?
48003003	Oŋ acca ɛkkɛ poŋɛ amaam ɔɔn ogo? Ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ Ma Kiṭɔ te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci acca ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ‘uottɛ ñamu te naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka tɛyan te waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ?
48003004	Te ñamu taab ɛkkɛ tol tol te naŋki maka ‘yeṭi ɛkkɛ te jyek ganuun. Ɔci acca kan ɛkkɛ dɔɔdɛ naŋki ɛkkɛntiyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba yom tiekin te taab neeni bɛɛn ɛkkɛti budan. Yeti ‘ya poŋ gɔk ka taab ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ eektɛ jyeka pwadin.
48003005	Yaccu mena ‘woñi ɛkkɛ te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci mena noŋi naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛ tiecɛ jyek ganuun Muuca jitkɛn boki? Walla acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci tieŋnɛ jyek ɛkɛ?
48003006	Ɔci ba jyek jyenna neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki te jyeni Abrahim agi, “Abrahim jyeti Juaŋti, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti.”
48003007	Ɔci dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ maka a kɛɛgin Abrahim awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka jyeti Juaŋti ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
48003008	Te baaṭi ne jiek bɛɛki bora men bɛɛyɛ, jyek worga gɔki agi Juaŋ gɔkcin Abrahimti agi, “Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan mati baan konɛ warda te i.” Juaŋ gɔki a ɔɔn acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ Keedin Pookɛn jyeddi ɛkɛti, ɔci pwaddi ɛkɛ ñamɛti te jyeni ɛkkɛn.
48003009	Oŋŋa Abrahim jyetti Juaŋtiyɛ, Juaŋ noŋi ɛkɛti ne pwadan. Ɔci acca maka jyeddi Juaŋtiyɛ, Juaŋ da noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda ba Abrahim ɔɔn.
48003010	Maka buagɔn pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛn pookɛnyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti. Acaan jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Kan men gɛɛl jyek ganuun tiidiyɔ waakɛnda bɛɛyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti dita.” Men gɛɛl jyek ganuun tiiññiyɔ oŋgati waakɛnda boki? Hayɛllɛ! Men gɛɛl jiek tiiññiyɔ waakɛnda bɛɛ.
48003011	Çeecin ikin ne pwadan menga yaakinti pwada Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te tiit jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ acaan jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Gena mena pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka uda.”
48003012	Yeti jyek ganuun ñoowin i jyek jyeni bɛɛ. Jyek ganuun gɔki agi, “Kan mena jyek ganuun tiidiyɔ waakɛndayɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka uda.”
48003013	Yeti jiek bɛya ɔɔn wyetkɔti te jyek ganuun bɛɛ, acaan ɔɔn wannɔn Kiṭɔ doki te oŋŋa jiek bɛɛki ɛkɛ wyeñɛti te ɔɔny. Acaan jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Kan menga ŋaaptan ma ñaalɔ jaantiyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba jiek bɛɛn ɛkɛ wyeñɛti doki.”
48003014	Kiṭɔ noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka dala jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Abrahimti a jyeka pwadin neeni, dala ooddi Keedin Pookɛnti daŋkun te ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, Boŋ Juaŋ bala ɔɔnti te jyenna ɔɔn jyettɔn Juaŋti neeni.
48003015	Modg ɔɔn, tieŋdɛ jwali ṭɔɔlɛ neeni, gena jwali naŋki ikin. Kan jiek naŋɛ ma doki ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɔci kan maka neeni jwali ḍyɛgɛ a warɛ dokiyɛ, jiek bawwin doki. Mena parɛ gɛɛl yaakinti gɔkti agi jyeka neeni agi jyeka budan moki bɛɛ. Ɔci menga yaakinti jyeka neeni agdiyɔ moki bɛɛ.
48003016	Jyeka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan neeni a jyek kɛɛgin Abrahim waakɛnda bɛɛ. Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Gena Kaci i parɛ.” Gena Kiṭɔ mena bɛɛn te Abrahimtiy.
48003017	Ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek Abrahim. Jwaŋa Tolan jiek naŋɛ iki Abrahim te ñamu te jyek mena bɛya te Abrahimti. Oŋŋa Juaŋ noŋki jiek iki Abrahimyɛ, jyek ganuun men bala bɛɛ. Ne yuonga coŋin ba miyyan ne ŋaanɔ ɔci men baan mena parɛ byeŋkɛ (430) bɛɛki borayɛ, jyek ganuun bɛɛn oŋo. Yeti jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim aŋi jyeka budan bɛɛ. Jiek aaŋŋɛyɔ Juaŋ bɛɛ.
48003018	Kan te jyek ganuun ma yɔɔkitiyɛ, te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimti neeniyɛ, te aŋi jyeka budan. Yeti jiek bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ma yɔɔtan jyek ganuun bɛɛ. Ma yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ Abrahimti. Pɔya parɛ gɛɛl bala bɛɛ.
48003019	Ɔci kan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, oŋ Muuca ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyek ganuun te gena? Ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyek ganuun acaan ma a nɔɔtko, ɔci te jyek ganuun neeniyɛ, ŋeettan ɛkkɛn naŋki ɛkkɛn a nɔjjo. Ɔci jyek ganuun bala ɛkkɛnti oŋkanda ɔɔn ne oŋŋa Kacca Abrahim myennɛ Juaŋ neeni bɛɛni ɔɔn. Ma ‘wonni Juaŋ ganuun waakɛnda bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ ganuun ‘wonnɛ malɛɛkan byeŋkɛnti ɔci ‘woñgi ɛkkɛn Muuca bieŋɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ oŋ ma ‘wonnɛ oŋo, acaan Muuca a cuuda. Yeti jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Cuuda bala bɛɛ. Juaŋ gɔkcin Abrahim waanɛti. Ɛkɛ gɔkcin mena parɛ gɛɛlti bɛɛ.
48003020	Ɔci kan men buagɔn noŋi gen parɛyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn cuuda gɛɛl moki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ noŋi parɛ, ɔci mena neeniyɛ, gena Jwaŋa Tolan.
48003021	Gɔṭṭɛ, jyek ganuun kooki jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim nɛ? A’a. Jyeka neeni kooki makɛn neeni bɛɛ, hay! Kan te tɛɛtin baali mati te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛndayɛ, ma te pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti, ɔci te jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim neeniyɛ, te aŋi jyeka budan doki.
48003022	Yeti jyek Juaŋ bala a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ganuun bala aŋka ŋeettan ma, ma waakɛnda a nɔɔtko. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka pwadin jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Abrahimti neeniyɛ, bɛya mati te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Yaccu Kiṭɔtiy.
48003023	Te ñamu ne Kiṭɔ bɛɛni men bɛɛyɛ, jyek ganuun bala ṭeyi ikin ma Icrayiil waakida te nɔji ikin aŋka ikin poŋtin jyek nɔji ikin. Ɔci jyek ganuun neeni bala ikinti oŋkanda ɔɔn, ɔci ŋeecin ikin mena ikin pɔktinyɛ, bɛya ne baaṭi, ɔci ikin balgin kɛɛyin ɛkɛ.
48003024	Ikin ma Icrayiilyɛ, ikin balkin ba kɛɛgin. Ɔci ganuunyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba ṭuoñ ikinti, ɔci ɛkɛ bala gɔṭi ikin oŋkanda ne Kiṭɔ bɛɛni ɔɔn. Ɔci ikin pwannin Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyenna ikin jyettin ɛkɛti neeni.
48003025	Ɔci acca acaan jyek jyeni bala dokiyɛ, ganuun neeni a ṭwoñ ikin moki bɛɛ.
48003026	Oŋŋa ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan waakida.
48003027	Acaan ɛkkɛ waakida buulkɛ ma te yenti Kiṭɔyɛ, Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛti doki. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ waakɔ ‘yɛɛŋŋɛ te tɛɛtin Kiṭɔ waanɛ.
48003028	Ikin ne aŋŋin Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ikin moki gɔkin agi menga a ma Icrayiil walla menga a ma Keedin Pookɛn, walla menga a mena kɛɛngɔn walla menga a mena ḍwaŋɛ wɔɔgan te kɛñji, walla menga a mena ɛɛŋ walla menga a mena ‘uan bɛɛ, ikin waakida balkin ba bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ Yaccu Kiṭɔti.
48003029	Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ a Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin Abrahim woodgɛn, ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ Abrahimtiyɛ, bɛya ɛkkɛti daŋkun.
48004001	Ɔci acca ‘ya gɔk daŋkun te mena guagdɛ weegɛn agi dala maal wiɛnda ɛktayɛ, ne ɛkɛ wona ḍiɛri menyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba bolji mena kɛɛngɔn. Acaan mena kɛɛngɔn ɛkɛ noŋi ba yom ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ ne waak waakɛnda bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti ɔɔn.
48004002	Mena guagdɛ weegɛn neeniyɛ, ne baaṭi ɛkɛ aga mena mwoki mal weegɛn. Yeti ne ɛkɛ wona ḍiɛri menyɛ, ma bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ ne pwadan ɔci ma bala gɔṭi mal ɛkɛ daŋkun ne pwadan ne oŋŋa guaŋŋɛ weegɛn te baaṭi neeni bɛɛni ɔɔn.
48004003	Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ikin daŋkun. Te ñamu ne ikin jyek Juaŋ jitkɛn ŋeecin ne pwadan men bɛɛyɛ, ikin balkin ba maka kɛɛnk men. Ikin balkin loṭin te jyeka jyetki yɔrg ikin te baaṭiy.
48004004	Ɔci ne oŋŋa guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ wanna waanɛ jiñɛ bɛɛniyɛ, ɔci Juaŋ Kaci ɛkɛ cuonnɛ iñɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ jiennɛ mena ɛɛŋo, ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi men baano. Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛniyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun cien te jyek ganuun ma Icrayiil.
48004005	Kaci Juaŋ bɛɛn aŋka maka ciyi te jyek ganuun neeniyɛ, wandɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci aŋka ikin pirtin Juaŋ aktin kɛɛgin ɛkɛ.
48004006	Ɔci acaan ikin akin kɛɛgin Juaŋ awarɛyɛ, ikin ‘wonnin Juaŋ Boŋ Kaci ɛkɛ ikin yomgɔti. Ɔci Boŋa bala ikin yomgɔti neeniyɛ, gɔki Juaŋti agi, “Wey ɔɔn, Wey ɔɔn!”
48004007	Ɔci acca i baal ba kɛɛngɔn moki bɛɛ. I aŋŋi kacca tolan doki, ɔci acaan i a kaci Juaŋ a ɔɔnyɛ, i baal ba mena guaŋŋɛ Weegɛn agi dala maal wiɛnda ɛktay.
48004008	Te ñamu ne Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk waka bartan ma agi jɔkin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn a waka budan. Ɛkkɛn a jɔkin woodgɛn bɛɛ.
48004009	Yeti acca Juaŋ ŋeennɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Ɔci ɛkkɛ ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun. Oŋ te gena yeti ɛkkɛ jyennɛ ɔntɔ aŋka ɛkkɛ dɔɔkkɛ jyeka yeyinti neeni moki? Ɛkkɛ buagɛ agdɛ kɛɛnk moki?
48004010	Ɛkkɛ dɔɔkkɛ ŋoyɔ cooŋɛ ñingɔ te waka bala naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ te baaṭiy, gena jyek oŋko, ɔci jyek ponko, ɔci jyek yuongo.
48004011	Ɔci ‘ya buay kanŋa ‘ya aga kanŋa budan dita.
48004012	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ baldɛ ba ‘ya ɔɔn. Acaan ganuun yaakinti gɔkti genga ‘yati bɛɛ. ‘Ya aŋi ba men ma ɛkkɛ doki. Ɛkkɛ dommɛ naŋki gɛɛl ‘yati bɛɛ.
48004013	Oŋŋa ‘ya bɛɛna loṭa ɛkkɛ te ñamuyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya waru yaayɛ.
48004014	Waja ‘ya neeni a pɔɔt ɛkkɛti, yeti ɛkkɛ yookɛ te ‘ya bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘ya liɛllatiyɔ bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ne pwadan ‘yati ba ne ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ malɛɛka gɛɛlti walla Kiṭɔtiy.
48004015	Ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te ñamu! Oŋ a gena bɛɛn ɔŋ? Te wɔɔka wannati kan te ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, te ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ dɔɔnnɛ bora ɔci ‘wonnata ‘ya te yoma ñɔyan.
48004016	Ɔci acca ba yom ñɔɔn ɛkkɛ bala aŋɛ? Ɛkkɛ yookɛ te ‘ya ne ‘ya mieta ɛkkɛ te jyeka ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya a jyeka awarɛ nɛ?
48004017	Maka pookɛn maka bɛɛn ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔki ne pwadan ɛkkɛti, yeti ɛkkɛn balkɔn yoma awarɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn ɛkkɛ kɛptɛji i ‘ya acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ myɛldi ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
48004018	Gɔṭṭɛ, kan ma yomgɛn myɛlɔ te naŋka pwadanyɛ, yaayɛ bɛɛ, pwatcin. Yeti naa naŋka neeni bala te oŋka ‘ya balgin iki ɛkkɛ budan bɛɛ, dala naŋka neeni bala ne ‘ya baawa ɛkkɛti daŋkun ɔɔn.
48004019	Kɛɛgin ‘ya kɛɛgin onga ‘yay, kan ɛɛŋ amɛ jiediyɛ, kaci pɛñ pɛñ ɛkɛti, ɔci ba jiedi kaciyɛ, bala ba ‘ya daŋkun, ‘ya yomu yaayɛ ne tolan acaan ‘ya buaga dala Yaccu bala ɛkkɛti ne pwadan.
48004020	Hay, a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba dala te ikin balkin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ aŋan aŋka ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti te tuk ‘ya, acaan ‘ya baal poŋ te ɛkkɛ a jiñu bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔk ka ɛkkɛ balgɛ ɔntɔ kaapun.
48004021	Hay ɛkkɛ maka buagɔn ciyi te jyek ganuun nɛ, jyek ganuun jitkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan boki?
48004022	Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi kɛɛgin Abrahim kɛɛgin a ‘uay bala ne yyɛɛwɔ. Kacca ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl jiennɛ mena kɛɛngɔn, ɔci ɛka parɛ jiennɛ ɛŋ ɛkɛ waanɛ.
48004023	Kaci mena kɛɛngɔn neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ jiedɛ ma ba naŋki ma baan oŋkanda. Yeti kaci ɛŋ Abrahim waanɛyɛ, ɛkɛ jiedɛ ma ba jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki Abrahim te ñamuy.
48004024	Ba jyek moonga ne yyɛɛwɔ neeniyɛ, ɔci bala ba jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ iki ma Icrayiil te baaṭiy. Haajaryɛ, ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn, ɔci kɛɛgin ɛkɛ a kɛɛnk ba ɛkɛ daŋkun.
48004025	Ɔci ba jyek Haajar neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ganuun jyeka ma ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan poomti, poma yenti Pom Cina ban Arayaji. Ɔci maka ciyi te jyek ganuunyɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnko. Ɔci maka ciyi ban Urcaliim accayɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnk ba Haajar ɔɔn, acaan ɛkkɛn bala ciyi te jyek ganuun men.
48004026	Yeti jyek Caarayɛ, da pookɛn. Ɛkɛ a ɛŋ Abrahim waanɛ. Ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn bɛɛ. Ɔci ba jyek ɛkɛyɛ, bala ba jyek maka jyeti Juaŋti, maka a ma Urcaliim ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni. Ɛkɛ a mɛy ikin. Ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn bɛɛ. Ɔci ikin balkin ba ɛkɛ daŋkun. Ikin akin kɛɛnk bɛɛ.
48004027	Acaan worga gɔki agi, “Dala i yomu ñɔya, hay, i ɛŋa kɛɛggɛ baawy! Dala i yaajja dɛɛrja te pwana tolan te yom ñɔɔno. I a mena dɛnni pɛñi jiedi kaci oŋgati bɛɛy! Acaan ɛŋa ‘uarɛ ati ɔntɔ te ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ baltan kɛɛgin ne coŋɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ ɛŋa niin iki ‘uarɛ oŋkanda neeni bwandɛ ɛkɛ te kɛɛgin.”
48004028	Modg ɔɔn, ikin aŋŋin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan ba jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ yaakkɛn iki Abrahim te baaṭiy. Ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, ikin balkin ba Icaak.
48004029	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, mena jiedɛ ma ba naŋki ma baan budanyɛ, ɛkɛ bala noŋi ne yaayan kacca neeniti, gena kacca jiedɛ ma te Boŋ Juaŋy. Ɔci acca moki taab ikin bala a ɔɔn daŋkun.
48004030	Jyek worga gɔki a ɔki te naŋka neeni? Worga gɔki agi, “Ɛŋa a kɛɛngɔn neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ oldɛ ɛkkɛ ɔntɔ iki kaci ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ aŋka kaci ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, naa jyek ɛkɛ ñoodi i jyek kacca guaŋŋɛ weegɛn agi dala maal wiɛnda ɛkta neeni bɛɛ.”
48004031	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin akin kɛɛgin mena kɛɛngɔn bɛɛ. Ikin akin kɛɛgin mena ciyi budan te kɛnjo.
48005001	Ikin pɔŋnin Kiṭɔ te jyek kɛnjo. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ dɔɔdɛ kɛnjiti moki bɛɛ.
48005002	Tieŋdɛ jyek ‘ya neeni. Gena ‘ya Buuluc gɔk ɛkkɛti neeni. Naa ɛkkɛ ŋwottɛ ma bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ ŋwottɛ mayɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba jyek Kiṭɔ aŋi jyeka budan ɛkkɛti doki.
48005003	Ɛkkɛ maka buagɔn jyek ŋwotiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki, kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ jyek ŋwotiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ jyek ganuun tiidɛyɔ waakɛnda.
48005004	Kan ɛkkɛ buagɛ pwaddɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti te tiid jyek ganuun waakɛnyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba jyek Kiṭɔ baaw ɛkkɛti, ɔci a ɔɔn moki bala ba ɛkkɛ yookɛ te naŋka naŋdɛ Juaŋ mati te yom ɛkɛ yoma pwadan neeni.
48005005	Te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ikin yomgɔtiyɛ, ŋeecin ikin oŋŋa ikin yɔɔttin Juaŋ ñamɛtiyɛ, jiek bala moki bɛɛ. Ikin pwannin ɛkɛ ñamɛti doki.
48005006	Maka bala Yaccu Kiṭɔti, kan jyek ŋwoti bala ɛkkɛnti ɔci kan walla baaw ɛkkɛntiyɛ, jyeka neeni bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ. Kan jyek jyeni ɔci jyek ani aŋka bala ma yomgɛntiyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
48005007	Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔɔdɛ ne pwadan. Oŋ ɛkkɛ jyɛnnɛ menɛ ɔntɔ yeti te jyeka awarɛ neeniti?
48005008	Jyeka pookɛn neeni bɛɛn te mena ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora neeniti bɛɛ.
48005009	Jyeka pookɛn neeni bala ba jyek ñamgo. Ma gɔki agi, “Kan ñamg bala ḍuobjiti ne ḍiɛkanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ooddi ḍuobji warɛti warda.”
48005010	Çeej ‘ya yomuti ɛkkɛ magdɛ Ciɛggɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛ moki dɔɔktɛ jyek ‘yati. Ɔci mena eccin jyeka pookɛn ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ, yeti ne baaṭi ywobji Juaŋ bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti.
48005011	Modg ɔɔn, te ‘ya baala loṭa ɛkkɛ te jyek ŋwoti menyɛ, te ma Icrayiil bala etti jyek taab neeni ‘yati boki? A’a. Kan ‘ya te loṭa ma agi dala ma ŋwottan mayɛ, te ma Icrayiil te yookɔn te jyek lyen Yaccu bɛɛ.
48005012	’Ya poŋ ka dala te maka poṭi ɛkkɛ waakɔ te jyek ŋwoti wanna dala ɛkkɛn ‘uotti ñamu te naŋka wanna ɔci ‘wolgɛn yuutan aga luoko. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn uuttan ɔntɔ te kaniicaji.
48005013	Modg ɔɔn, ɛkkɛ muonɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bora, ɔci ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ doki. Ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ acaan ɛkkɛ noŋɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ oondi yɔtin pookɔ.
48005014	Jyek ganuun jitkɛn waakɛndayɛ, jitk ɛkkɛn bala te jwalla ne cyɛɛlɔ kiiwɛ ma agi, “Dala ɛkkɛ anɛ maka ciyɛ iki ɛkkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ ba anna ɛkkɛ anɛ waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ neeni ɔɔn.”
48005015	Yeti kan ɛkkɛ yoyyɛ ñin, ɔci yaccɛ waakɔ pookɔ bala ba leyya ywobkyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyeka bɛya bora te coodi ɛkkɛy. Acaan coodda pwadan baadi te yoyyin ñino.
48005016	Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka ciedɛ te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba yoma te baaṭi moki bɛɛ.
48005017	Yoma te baaṭi neeniyɛ, yookɔn te Boŋ Juaŋo, ɔci moki Boŋ Juaŋ yookɔn te jyek yoma te baaṭi. Ɛkkɛn noowi yaakkɛn a ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti noŋdɛ ba naŋka ɛkkɛ buagɛ bɛɛ.
48005018	Kan ɛkkɛ wɛɛdɛ Boŋ Juaŋ oŋkandayɛ, jyek ganuun bala ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ.
48005019	Naŋki yoma te baaṭiyɛ, gena tommo, ɔci naŋka amaamo, ɔci wɛljo,
48005020	ɔci mali jɔkin yeyin waka pɔɔtan ma a pɔɔto, ɔci ṭyejjo, ɔci pɔñko, ɔci yom yoño, ɔci jyek wɛɛdin, ɔci yom monno, ɔci loñko, ɔci anna anki ma waak ɛkkɛn pookɛny. Ɔci jyek kɛɛptin ɔci jyek tyewwin daŋkun,
48005021	ɔci nooŋi mooyo, ɔci naŋki bajjo, ɔci naŋka pookɛn waakɛnda ba naŋka neeni ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bɛya te yoma te baaṭiti. Ɔci ‘ya ṭey ɛkkɛ moki bala ba ṭeena ɛkkɛ ṭeenin ‘ya te ñamu ɔɔny, maka noŋi naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki noon ban cyɛgji Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ.
48005022	Te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ma yomgɛntiyɛ, Juaŋ etti naŋka pwadin. Ɔci te Boŋ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ma ani Juaŋo, ɔci ma ooni yɔtin pookɛn. Ɔci naŋka pookɛnyɛ, gena yom ñɔɔno, ɔci coodi pwanno. Ɔci te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, ma loomgɛn tɛy tɛyo. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ mati. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn bɔw bɔwo, ɔci ɛkkɛn jiekɛn a yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛ,
48005023	ɔci ɛkkɛn a ywobk bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti paŋi jiek ñamu, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi amaam budan bɛɛ. Jyek ganuun yaakinti gɔkti genga te naŋka pwadan neeni bɛɛ.
48005024	Yoma buagɔn naŋka yaayan ne pɛñan neeniyɛ, ma Yaccu Kiṭɔ mwonnin te ɛkɛ doki. Bala ba yoma te baaṭi neeni olji ɛkkɛn kakanti ɔci tuun doki bawwin.
48005025	Kan tɛɛtin Juaŋ bala ikinti te Boŋ ɛkɛyɛ, dala ikin noŋtin ba jyeka guagdɛ Boŋ ɛkɛ ikinti oŋkanda neeni.
48005026	Naa ikin jieyin waakɔ pookɔ te naŋka naŋtin ikin bɛɛ. Naa ikin noŋtin naŋki aŋka maka pookɛn loondi ikinti bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ikin korkɔ modɔ yɔtin bɛɛ.
48006001	Modg ɔɔn, kan men gɛɛl yuardɛ ɛkkɛ, kan ɛkɛ bala noŋi ne yaayan, dala ɛkkɛ maka yɔɔd ne tɛyan neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ magdɛ te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan te yoma pwadan aŋka ɛkɛ jiek ywaŋdɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ magdɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ daŋkun aŋka naa ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn bɛɛ.
48006002	Dala ɛkkɛ moowɛ yɔtin pookɔ te jyeka tɛyan, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti tiecɛ Jyek Kiṭɔ waakɛn.
48006003	Kan men gɛɛl poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ toljiyɛ, ɛkɛ dyeti war ɛkɛ parɛ.
48006004	Dala ɛkkɛ waakida gɔrti naŋki ɛkkɛ ne naŋki ɛkkɛ pwatki boki no. Ɔci ne men gɛɛl gɔrti naŋki ɛkɛ pwadiyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ poŋi te kanŋa mena parɛ bɛɛ.
48006005	Menga da kɛṭi naŋki ɛkɛ te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da kɛṭi naŋki ɛkɛ te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ.
48006006	Mena laltan ma te jyek Juaŋyɛ, dala ɛkɛ mena loṭi ɛkɛ kɛndɛ waka pwadin waka bala ɛkɛti waakɛnda.
48006007	Naa ɛkkɛ waakɔ dieddɛ ñin pookɔ bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi men gɛɛl yaakinti Juaŋ naŋdɛ ñin bɛɛ. Acaan kan menga dwoki waak gɛɛgyɛ, waka wanna ‘yɛrdɛ ɛkɛ parɛ daŋkun.
48006008	Acaan jyek ikin waakɛnda ŋeejɛ Juaŋo, ɔci ba naŋka naŋtin ikin acca neeniyɛ, naŋka neeni etti naŋka pookɛn ne baaṭi. Kan men gɛɛl bala noŋi ne yaayan ba yom ɛkɛ yoma te baaṭi neeniyɛ, ne baaṭi naŋka neeni etti lieno. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl noŋi ne pwadan te war tɛɛn Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ yomɛtiyɛ, ne baaṭi naŋka neeni etti tɛɛtin, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni bɛya te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
48006009	Acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, naa ikin taaptin te naŋka pwadin neeni bɛɛ. Acaan ne oŋŋa guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ neeni bɛɛdiyɛ, kan yomg ikin ḍɛɛmdin iñɔ bɛɛyɛ, jyeka neeni ikin ‘wontin waka pwadin te kanŋa ikin.
48006010	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne pɔya ikin noŋtin ne pwadan mati baaliyɛ, dala ikin noŋtin ne pwadan mati waakɛnda. Ɔci maka jyeti Juaŋti dokiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn maktin ikin ne pwadan nɔñji.
48006011	Gɔṭṭɛ, ne ‘ya kieda worga ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ‘ya kiewa ɛkkɛti te kiikan ḍwaŋin.
48006012	Maka ‘yeṭi ɛkkɛ te jyek ŋwoti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛn pwaddi ma ñomgɛnti aŋka naa taab bɛya ɛkkɛnti te jyek lyen Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, lyena tuuni ɛkɛ kakanti neeni bɛɛ.
48006013	’Uaya ŋuodɛ ma neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieci jyek ganuun jitkɛn ne pwadan boki? Hayɛllɛ! Ɛkkɛn gɔki ɛkkɛti te jyek ŋwoti acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ agdɛ ba maka ne cyɛɛlɔ iki ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn jiɛtan ma te naŋka neeni.
48006014	’Ya buaga jiɛt waru te naŋki gɛɛl bɛɛ, gena lyena tuuni Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ kakanti neeni aŋka ‘ya jieya ɛkɛ neeni. Te lyen ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ‘ya tuun daŋkun. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka bala iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, aŋi ba jyeka budan ‘yati doki. Ɔci jyeka bala iñɔ wɛnni baan konɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔkti genga ‘yati moki bɛɛ. Acaan ‘ya aŋi ba gena tuuta ɛkkɛnti doki.
48006015	Kan jyek ŋwoti balayɛ, jyek ŋwoti neeni a genga bɛɛ. Ɔci kan jyek ŋwoti moki baawiyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋdi genga bɛɛ. Gena jyek aŋŋa ikin aktin maka wonkɛn te jyek Juaŋyɛ, aŋka tolcin.
48006016	Maka ciyi te jyeka neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya te coodda pwadan, ɔci dala Juaŋ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛnti. Gena ma Icrayiil woodgɛn ɛkkɛn guagdi ‘ya neeni.
48006017	Acca menga yaakinti etti taab ‘yati te genga moki bɛɛ. Bilgin bala ‘ya waruti te naŋka naŋɛ ma yaayan ‘yati te jyek Yaccu. Ɔci te bilgin neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ma ‘ya a men Kiṭɔ.
48006018	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ikin yomgɔti waakida. Amɛɛn.
49001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc mena bornɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te yom ɛkɛ ɔci naŋŋɛ a cuuda Ciɛggɔn Yaccuy. ‘Ya kiew worga Ma Kiṭɔti maka ciyi ban Ɛpacacy. Gena maka jyek Yaccu tiiyɛyɔ ne pwadany.
49001002	Dala Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno.
49001003	Dala ikin jieyin Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ acaan Kiṭɔ cuonnɛ ɛkɛ ikinti aŋka ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋka pwadin ikin yomgɔti, ɔci naŋka pwadin ñaalɔ ban Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, oonɛ ɛkɛ ikinti waakɛnda.
49001004	Te baaṭi ne noon warda aŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan men bɛɛyɛ, Juaŋ ikin muonin bora doki. Ɛkɛ ikin muonin bora a ɔɔn te ‘woñgin ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonninti Yaccu Kiṭɔ te baaṭi doki agi ikin akcin maka ciyi budan te naŋka yaayan, ɔci agi ikin pwatcin ɛkɛ ñamɛtiy.
49001005	Acaan ɛkɛ ani ikinyɛ, jiek naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ñamu doki agi dala ikin akcin kɛɛgin ɛkɛ woodgɛn te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkɛ jiek naŋŋɛ a ɔɔn te yom ɛkɛ parɛ, acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ bala ikinti. Jiek paŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu agi ikin akcin kɛɛgin ɛkɛ, ɔci acca ɛkɛ noŋjin a ɔɔn doki.
49001006	Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin cuonnin ɛkɛ Kaci ɛkɛ Kacca ani ɛkɛy. Dala ikin jieyin Jwaŋa Tolan acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ pwanna a pwani ikinti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
49001007	Ikin wannin ɛkɛ te yimg Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin bɔɔŋnin ɛkɛ acca doki te nɔji ikin. Yom pwani Juaŋ neeni tol tolo hay!
49001008	Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanna a pwani ikinti awarɛ te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.
49001009	Ɔci acca ikin nɔɔnnin Juaŋ te ñing tɛɛn waakɛnda te jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te Kiṭɔ te yom ɛkɛ te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ jyeka jitkɛn kuoliwi ma te baaṭiy. Yeti ɛkɛ jiek oonɛ bora ikinti acca doki.
49001010	Jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ yomɛti neeni gɔki agi ne oŋ gɛɛlti ba oŋŋa guagdɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ jiek ywaŋdɛ waakɛnda. Gena jyek waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, ɔci jyek waka bala ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ waak ywaŋdɛyɔ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci Kiṭɔ aga Ciɛggɔn waak waakɛnda.
49001011	Ɔci moki kan Juaŋ gɔki agi ɛkɛ noŋji gengayɛ, ɛkɛ jyeka neeni daldɛ budan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ noŋdi ba jyeka guagdi ɛkɛy. Gɔṭṭɛ, ɛkɛ ikin kɛnnin bora ba jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te baaṭi aŋka ikin aktin ma ɛkɛ woodgɛn te ñoowin ikin, ñoonin iki Kiṭɔ ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagɛ naŋka ḍaaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu dokiy.
49001012	Ikin maka jyeti Kiṭɔti ñamu neeniyɛ, dala ikin jieyin Juaŋ te pwani ɛkɛ.
49001013	Ɛkkɛ maka ciyi ban Ɛpacacyɛ, ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka awarɛ neeni daŋkun. Jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, gɔki agi Yaccu yaakinti yuoci ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ agi ‘woñji may. Ɔci te Boŋ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora a ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ ma Jwaŋa Tolan doki.
49001014	Te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ikinti neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin ne oŋ gɛɛlti ikin ‘wontin Juaŋ waka pwadin ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ikinti neeni, ɔci te Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ŋeettin ikin a Juaŋ ikin wannin ɔci naŋŋin a ma ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin jiettin ɛkɛ te pwani ɛkɛ neeni.
49001015	’Ya tieŋŋan jyek ɛkkɛ doki agi ɛkkɛ jyetcɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci ɛkkɛ anjɛ Ma Kiṭɔ waakcinda.
49001016	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk a pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛ. ‘Ya cɔk Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda.
49001017	’Ya cɔk Jwaŋ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti. Ɛkɛ a Wey ikin weya pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ñing tɛɛn ɔci ɛkkɛ laldɛ te Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan.
49001018	Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ balgɛ kɛɛyɛ naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka bɛya ne baaṭiy. Ɔci ‘ya baal cɔk Juaŋti aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ ñing tɛɛno, aŋka jyeka neeni ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan yomgɔti. Ɔci ‘ya cɔk Juaŋti moki aŋka jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ neeni ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan ne Juaŋ gɔki agi ɛkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ ‘woñji waak ba naŋki ma baan ne kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn ‘wontiti ɛkkɛn moldiny. Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ ‘wondɛ waak ne pwadan.
49001019	’Ya cɔk Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ aŋka dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan war tɛɛn ‘wonninti ikin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tol tolo. Ikin maka jyeti ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
49001020	War tɛɛn neeniyɛ, gena war tɛɛn Juaŋ Kiṭɔ luolnɛ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiy. Ɔci te oŋŋa wanna Kiṭɔ coonnɛ Juaŋ taaŋɛti taaŋŋa byerɔn ñaalɔ pɔliji.
49001021	Ɔci waak waakɛnda waka bala acca ɔci waka bɛya ne baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala Kiṭɔ bieŋɛti. Gena malɛɛkan, ɔci jɔkin ṭɔlgɛn, ɔci cyekin bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji waakɛndayɛ, bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.
49001022	Te naŋki Juaŋyɛ, waak waakɛnda bala byeŋ Kiṭɔti. Jiek waakɛnda a jyek Kiṭɔ. Ɔci Kiṭɔ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋi Ciɛggɔn ma kaniica waakɛnda.
49001023	Ɛkɛ a wyeñ ma kaniica, ɔci ma kaniica a war ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, genga bɔɔnjin Kiṭɔti moki bɛɛ. Ɔci waka aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɔci noon wardayɛ, kuumi te ɛkɛ.
49002001	Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba maka tuutan acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ne yaayan, ɔci moki acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ nɔjjo. Yeti acca ɛkkɛ tɛɛtɛ te naŋka naŋŋɛ Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛti neeni.
49002002	Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba naŋka iñɔ baanji wɛnni budan. Ɔci naŋka neeni gena naŋki ḍuaŋa boŋka yeyin. Gena ɛkɛ bala noŋi naŋka neeni maka bɛɛyi jyek Juaŋ yomgɛnti neeniy.
49002003	Te ñamu ikin waakida balkin noŋin ba maka yeyin neeni. Ikin balkin noŋin ba yomg ikin. Ɔci ikin balkin noŋin ba naŋka waak ikin buagɔn, ɔci ba paŋi ikin paŋŋa yaayan neeni. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ikintiyɛ, ɔci kan ywobji ɛkɛ bɛya mati waakɛndayɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ bɛɛ. Yɔmjin a ɔɔn.
49002004	Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan noŋi a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ikinti. Ɛkɛ ani ikin ne tolan.
49002005	Ɔci ne ikin balkin ba maka tuutan te nɔji ikinyɛ, ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ tɛɛtin te tɛɛtin ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ Kiṭɔ wanna. Gɔṭṭɛ, ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ te naŋka ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonninti tɛɛtin te yom pwani ɛkɛ neeni.
49002006	Oŋŋa Kiṭɔ luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiyɛ, ikin luolnin Juaŋ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛtin moki daŋkun. Ɔci ne Yaccu coonni Juaŋ taaŋɛtiyɛ, ikin coonnin Juaŋ taaŋɛti ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn, acaan ikin akin war ɛkɛ.
49002007	Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka yom pwani ɛkɛ yom pwani tolan naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ikinti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni, warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ne yuonga bɛya ne baaṭi neeni.
49002008	Oŋŋa ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛ te yom pwani ɛkɛ parɛ neeni. Ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛ te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ.
49002009	Acaan Juaŋ buagɔn naa menga jieyi warɛ te yɔɔta ɛkɛ yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ.
49002010	Ikin naŋŋin Juaŋ aŋŋin maka wonkɛn te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ ikinti aŋka ikin noŋin naŋka pwadan naŋka ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ agi naŋcin ikiny.
49002011	Naa ɛkkɛ yiedɛ bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ jietki ma agi Keedin Pookɛn. Ɔci ma yahuud maka balkin jyek ŋwotiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ḍori ɛkkɛ agi maka ciyi budan te jyek ŋwotto. Yeti gɔṭṭɛ, jyek ŋwoti mayɛ, a jyek ŋwoti ma yoŋgɛn budan.
49002012	Ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ ɔntɔ te Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ kɛɛptɛ jitin iki maka muonɛ Juaŋ bora neeni, gena ma yahuud. Ɔci jyeka ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, a jyek ɛkkɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ kɛɛyɛ Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ waka pwadin. Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan a Jwaŋ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
49002013	Te ñamu ɛkkɛ longɛ ɔntɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti, yeti acca te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ornɛti Jwaŋa Tolanti te yimg Kiṭɔ.
49002014	Kiṭɔyɛ, gena ɛkɛ eccin coodda pwadan ikinti aŋka jyek ma yahuud ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ i jyek Keedin Pookɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn ŋeeki neeni. Yoyyin ɛkkɛn yooki ñin wannayɛ, bala moki bɛɛ. Bawwin doki. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛn kɛɛptan jitin moki bɛɛ.
49002015	Oŋŋa Kiṭɔ tuuniyɛ, ganuun a genga nɔñji moki bɛɛ, ɔci ma yahuud i Keedin Pookɛn neeni naŋŋɛ Yaccu aŋi maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te naŋki ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ coodda pwadan oonɛ ikinti.
49002016	Gena te jyeka neeni aŋka Yaccu bɛɛni neeni. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn ɔci tuun kakanti aŋka maka neeni aga maka ne cyɛɛlɔ. Yoyyin ɛkkɛn yooki ñin neeni lɛɛŋŋɛ ɛkɛ jitin doki te oŋŋa ɛkɛ tuuni neeni. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn ñaaŋŋɛ ñin akki mena ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn yɔŋni jiek i Juaŋ daŋkun.
49002017	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛn ɔci Keedin Pookɛn maka bala ɔntɔ lonin neeniyɛ, ñaaŋŋɛyɔ i ma yahuud maka cwalŋan neeni te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Gena jyek coodda pwadan.
49002018	Te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ikin waakida Keedin Pookɛn ɔci ma yahuudyɛ, yaakinti ortinti Wey ikinti te Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Gena Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan.
49002019	Acca ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛn balgɛ ba maka wɛlg moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ maka ne cyɛɛlɔ i Ma Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan doki.
49002020	Ɛkkɛ waakida balgɛ ba ona pwadan ona cɔdi ma te gwoyiy. Ɔci cuudan Yaccu ɔci bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn a gwoyya yiecki ma on ŋwayɛ. Ɔci guonan tolan on warɛtiyɛ, gena Yaccu.
49002021	Ɔci gwoyya cɔttan ma on warɛtiyɛ, gena ɛkkɛ. Yaccu ɛkkɛ ywaŋŋɛyɔ ɔci ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ wara ne cyɛɛlɔ iki ɛkɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ waakida aŋŋɛ ba ona ne cyɛɛlɔ on Jwaŋa Tolan ona pwadan.
49002022	Ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛn ɔci ma yahuud acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ ona ciyi Jwaŋa Tolan te Boŋ ɛkɛ.
49003001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc mena olji ma ciginji te ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛn ne ‘ya baala mieta ɛkkɛ te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔy.
49003002	Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ ne ‘ya naŋŋata Juaŋ aŋŋa mena moki ɛkkɛ te yom pwani ɛkɛ parɛ boki?
49003003	Ɛkkɛ kieŋnin ‘ya jiek gɛɛg doki te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan ne ɛkɛ ‘ya lɛɛrnati jyek Yaccu jyeka coggin te ñamuy. Ɛkkɛn oonɛ Juaŋ bora ‘yati.
49003004	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ poktɛ jyeka kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti te ñamu neeniyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan jyek Kiṭɔ jyeka coggin te ñamuyɛ, jitkɛn ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan.
49003005	Yɔrg ikinyɛ, jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeecin ɛkkɛn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Yeti acca jiek oonɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bora ma ɛkɛti. Gena Cuudan Yaccu ɔci bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan maka yomgɛn bala Juaŋti ne pwadany.
49003006	Jyeka coggin oonɛ Boŋ Juaŋ bora neeniyɛ, gena jyek ñoowin ma yahuud iki Keedin Pookɛn te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Jyeka neeni gɔki agi waka ‘wondɛ Juaŋ ma yahuudyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋ Keedin Pookɛn daŋkun, ɔci ɛkkɛn aŋi yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ma yahuudti te Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, aŋi jyek Keedin Pookɛn daŋkun.
49003007	’Ya naŋŋa Jwaŋa Tolan aŋi mena mieti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. ‘Ya ‘wonna Juaŋ kanŋa neeni te yom pwani ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala kanŋan ne tolan ‘yati te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
49003008	’Ya a mena ḍiɛran te Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda, yeti ‘ya ‘wonna Jwaŋa Tolan kanŋa ɛkɛ te yom pwani ɛkɛ aŋka ‘ya miet Keedin Pookɛn te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni te Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci jyeka neeni bala ba mala ma ‘wondɛ Juaŋ a mala tolany.
49003009	Juaŋ buagɔn ‘ya ma myetka jiek jitkɛn waakɛnda agi ɛkɛ jyeka neeni cɔmdɛ bora a ɔki. Te ñamu jyeka neeni a coggin yuonginda ɔɔn, ɔci jyeka neeni bala aŋa Juaŋti mena oki waak waakɛnda neeni parɛ.
49003010	Ɔci acca jyek yɔɔta ma yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ bɛɛn bora doki, ɔci ñing tɛɛn Juaŋ ñing tɛɛn tolan ŋeecin malɛɛkan ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci boŋko, ɔci jɔkin waakɛnda. Ñing tɛɛn Juaŋ neeni yuarɛ ɛkkɛn ne Juaŋ noŋi naŋki ɛkɛ ma kaniicatiy.
49003011	Jwaŋa Tolan balki jyek naŋka neeni yomɛti te baaṭi doki ne ṭɛɛr men baawiy. Ɔci ne Yaccu Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ikin neeni bɛɛni dokiyɛ, Juaŋ jyeka neeni naŋŋɛ ba jyeka ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ dokiy.
49003012	Ɔci ne ikin balkin Yaccuti te jyenna ikin jyettin ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti ortinti Jwaŋa Tolanti ne pwadan. Ikin buayin genga bɛɛ.
49003013	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti ka naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tuwa te taab bala ‘yati neeni bɛɛ. Taab ‘ya neeniyɛ, etti naŋka pwadan ɛkkɛti.
49003014	Ne ‘ya baala poŋa jyek naŋka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan pwadan neeniyɛ, gɔ ‘ya moki ḍwoñji iñɔ morci Wey ɔɔn ñamɛti ɔɔn.
49003015	Ɛkɛ a mena ‘woñi ma waakɛnda te yenti ɛkɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji ɔci iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni.
49003016	Ɔci ‘ya cɔk Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti te Boŋ ɛkɛ, te pwani ɛkɛ pwanna tolan neeniti acaan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ tɛɛna tɛɛno.
49003017	’Ya cɔk Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ aga nona ciyi Kiṭɔ oŋkanda te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ɛkɛti neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ tiittɛti jyek oonnin ma oonki yɔtin ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan
49003018	aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ i Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda anna Kiṭɔ ani ɛkkɛ tol tol bala a ɔki.
49003019	Anna neeniyɛ, tol tolo. Mena anna neeni ŋeejɛ warda ne pwadanyɛ, gɔ bala bɛɛ. Yeti ‘ya aŋka baal cɔk Juaŋti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ kuma ne tolan te Jwaŋa Tolan.
49003020	’Ya jiey Jwaŋa Tolan mena noŋi naŋka tɛyan ikin yomgɔti te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ neeni. ‘Ya jiey ɛkɛ a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋi naŋka tɛyan neeni ne tolan nɔñji, ɔci naŋki ɛkɛ neeni ‘uottiti ɛkɛ parɛ ba bolja ikin yaakinti paŋtin bɛɛy.
49003021	Dala ma jieddi Juaŋ ne tolan te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ma kaniicati te Yaccu Kiṭɔy. Dala ɛkkɛn jyeddi ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
49004001	Gena ‘ya a mena olji ma ciginji te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔy. ‘Ya ṭey ɛkkɛ ka dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan acaan ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora.
49004002	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍyɛrdi. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwaddi mati oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ loomgɔ tɛya. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ bɔyyɛ yɔtin pookɔ ne ɛkkɛ oonni yɔtin pookɔy.
49004003	Ɛkkɛ agɛ maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te Boŋ Juaŋ Boŋa ɛkkɛ noŋnɛ ŋɛyy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ŋeewin ɛkkɛ ŋeenɛ, ɔci ñoonɛ neeni tiidɛ ñin oŋkanda ɔɔn.
49004004	Ɛkkɛ agɛ yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci Boŋ Juaŋ a Boŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ moki. Ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora Jwaŋa Tolan ne cyɛɛlɔ parɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ jyettɛ kɛɛyɛ naŋka ne cyɛɛlɔ daŋkun.
49004005	Ɛkkɛ balkɛ Ciɛggɔn ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci jyenna ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci bulta ne cyɛɛlɔ.
49004006	Jwaŋ ɛkkɛ a Jwaŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ a Wey ikin waakida. Waak waakɛnda buannɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kanŋan waakti waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ ciyi waak jitin waakɛnda.
49004007	Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ikinti waakida. Ikin ‘wonnin Kiṭɔ naŋka pwadin waakida te yom ɛkɛ parɛ. Ɔci naŋka ikin ‘wonninti Kiṭɔ pwadin neeniyɛ, a naŋka ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. Ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ naŋko, ɔci menga da te naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te naŋki ɛkɛ.
49004008	Jyeka neeni bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Ne ɛkɛ atti ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkɛ ma gɛɛg yaallɛ eññɛ bieŋɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ ma baan ‘wonnɛ waak te yom ɛkɛ budan.”
49004009	Ne worga gɔki agi, “Kiṭɔ atti ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ,” a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba worga gɔki te bɛɛna ɛkɛ bɛɛni te ñaalɔ, bɛɛni iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrjiy.
49004010	Yaccu neeni bɛɛn iñɔ, ɔci ɛkɛ moki ati ñaalɔ nona loonan pɔlijiy. Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka noon warda kuma te ɛkɛ te iñɔ wɛnni ne nona loonan ñaalɔ ɔɔn.
49004011	Ikin ‘wonnin ɛkɛ naŋki ɛkɛ budan. Ɔci naŋka neeni waakɛnda bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. Ma gɛɛg ikinti a cuudan Juaŋ eci jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma gɛɛg naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a bɔwan. Ɔci ma gɛɛg naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ aŋi maka booti baan konɛ loṭi ma te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma gɛɛg naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a gaciicin. Ɔci ma gɛɛg naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ aŋi maka loṭi may.
49004012	Acaan ikin agen war Yaccuyɛ, Juaŋ men da ‘woñgi kanŋa ɛkɛ, ɔci men da ‘woñgi kanŋa ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn Ma Kiṭɔ maktan ne pwadan te jiek waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn aŋka Ma Kiṭɔ kooptan ñaalɔ.
49004013	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin maktin Juaŋ te naŋki ikin neeni oŋkanda, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ikin aktin maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te jyenna ikin jyettin Yaccuti, ɔci te ŋeejjin ikin Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeennin ne pwadan neeniy. Acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ikin baltin waak waakɛnda yomgɔti waakida, ɔci ‘uottin ñamu, ɔci ikin baltin ba Yaccu ɔɔn.
49004014	Ɔci kan ikin balkin a ɔɔnyɛ, ikin balkin ba kɛɛgin moki bɛɛ. Ɔci kan jyeka laltan ma a jomgin gɛɛg bɛya ikintiyɛ, ikin balkin ba waka peedɛ jwami budan bɛɛ. Pɔya ikin yɔɔttin ne tɛyan bala doki. Ɔci maka ñingɛn tɛyan te naŋki ma ñingɛnyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn buagɔn noŋdi a ɔɔn ikintiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋdi genga ikinti bɛɛ.
49004015	Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ikin waakida gɔktin jyeka awarɛ te yoma pwadan. Dala ikin ‘uottin ñamu aŋka baltin ba Kiṭɔ te naŋki waakɛnda, ɛkɛ a wyeñ ikin.
49004016	Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn i Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn a wara ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɔci Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a wyeñ ikin, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena ikin naŋtin ciyin ne pwadan ba maka ne cyɛɛlɔy, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin naŋtin kantin ne pwadan waakida aŋka ikin balkin ba wara baaki waja ɔci tɛyany. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛyɛ, ikin ‘uottin ñamu te jyek oonnin yɔtin.
49004017	Tieŋdɛ jyeka guagdi ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni. ‘Ya gɔk ɛkkɛti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin, ka dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te naŋki maka ciyi budan te jyek Juaŋo. Dala ɛkkɛ paŋŋa paŋtan ɛkkɛn a paŋŋa budan neeni daldɛ.
49004018	Acaan ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi jiek jitkɛn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn balki tɛɛtin Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ciyi budan amaamo. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn tɛy tɛy aŋka tɛɛtin Juaŋ baawi ɛkkɛnti neeni.
49004019	Ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi te jyek naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn, walla balkɛ lɔɔn moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi te gena jyek naŋki tomi budan. Ɛkkɛn naŋki tomi gɛɛl dalji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi naŋka yeyin jitkɛn waakɛnda.
49004020	Ne ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek Kiṭɔyɛ, jyeka neeni bala ba jyeka neeni boki? Hayɛllɛ!
49004021	Çeej ‘ya ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ te naŋki Yaccu doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ Yaccuti doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ma te jyek Yaccu jyeka awarɛ neeni.
49004022	Jyek ɛkɛ neeni gɔki agi dala ɛkkɛ mwonjɛ te yom ɛkkɛ yoma te baaṭi yoma ɛkkɛ oldɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka te baaṭiy. Yom ɛkkɛ yoma a daan neeni ɛkɛ buagɔn waka coŋin amaam budan, ɔci waka coŋin neeniyɛ, yomg ɛkkɛ maaltan ɔci yaatan ɛkkɛn.
49004023	Dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun ooktɛ yomga wonkɛn, ɔci wyetka wonkɛn naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ba yom ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ baldɛ ba Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkɛ jyeka awarɛ neeni te naŋka pwadin naŋka ɛkɛ buagɛy.
49004025	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te jomi jieko. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔgdɛ yɔtin te jyeka awarɛ oŋkanda, acaan ikin waakidayɛ, ikin akin yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.
49004026	Kan ɛkkɛ looñi te gengayɛ, naa loñka neeni etti nɔji ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ. Ɔci naa loñka neeni ḍuadɛ yomgɔti oŋkanda ɔɔn bɛɛ. Dala baadi ne noon men bɔwi ɔɔn.
49004027	Naa Jwaŋa Yaayan pɔktɛ pɔy aŋka ɛkkɛ pɔɔdɛ yomgɔti te loñk ɛkkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
49004028	Mena bala koṭi waakyɛ, dala ɛkɛ mwondi te kali waako. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ noŋdi kanŋa pwadan te byeŋ ɛkɛ. Dala ɛkɛ balki waak te kanŋa naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te byeŋ ɛkɛ aŋka dala ɛkɛ moki maka anin daŋkun.
49004029	Naa ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ jyeka yeyin oŋgati bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ jyeka pwadan jyeka ma kooptan ñaalɔ aŋka maka neeni maktan jyek ɛkkɛ neeni.
49004030	Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ naŋka yaayan aŋka Boŋ Juaŋ yomɛ wiak a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Acaan Boŋ Juaŋ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti neeni bala ba mañ Juaŋo. Ɔci maka balki mañ Juaŋ te Boŋ ɛkɛ te wanna ɛkkɛn wannɛ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, cwamdi ɛkɛ ne baaṭi.
49004031	Dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te yom yoño, ɔci te ywobjo, ɔci moki te loñka budan, ɔci moki te wɛyyin, ɔci moki te lomi jieko. Ɔci naa jwalla yaayan gɛɛl daldɛ niin ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ.
49004032	Dala ɛkkɛ moowɛ yɔtin pookɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala mati moki, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ bɔyyɛ yɔtin pookɔ daŋkun bala ba bɔɔkin ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni.
49005001	Dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan.
49005002	Kiṭɔ ani ikin ne tolan aŋka ɛkɛ tuuni te nɔji ikin, ɔci baalli ba gena ‘yɛri ma pwadan Juaŋti neeni. Ɔci dala anna ɛkkɛ oondi yɔtin bala a ɔɔn daŋkun.
49005003	Acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, naa jiek bɛya te bora ɛkkɛti agi ɛkkɛ baljɛ noŋjɛ tomi a ɔɔn bɛɛ, ɔci walla naa jiek bɛya ɛkkɛti agi ɛkkɛ anjɛ wak maka pookcɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci kan jyek naŋka neeni bɛya Ma Kiṭɔti bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
49005004	Naa ɛkkɛ jyeyɛ te jyek wɛlji ɔci te jyeka yeyin bɛɛ. Ɔci moki naa ɛkkɛ juolɛ jyeka yeyin bɛɛ. Jyeka neeniyɛ, yɔmjin Ma Kiṭɔti bɛɛ. Yeti dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ agi pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda.
49005005	Acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ maka noŋi tomi ɔci maka poŋi jyeka yeyin, ɔci maka ani wak maka pookɛnyɛ, non ɛkkɛn baaw ban Kiṭɔ i ban Juaŋo. Jyek ani wak maka pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba jyek mali jɔkin yeyin ɔɔn daŋkun.
49005006	Naa ɛkkɛ naŋtɛ ma ñin te jyeka budan neeni bɛɛ. Te naŋka yeyin neeniyɛ, ywobji Juaŋ bɛya mati. Gena maka tuoci waakɛn te jyek ɛkɛy.
49005007	Naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ iki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
49005008	Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ te nona mielo, yeti acca ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ yoŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ iki Yaccu, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ nona bɔwanti acca. Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ne pwadan ba maka ciyi te nona bɔwany.
49005009	Naŋka bɛya te nona bɔwantiyɛ, gena naŋka pwadan ɔci naŋka awarɛ.
49005010	Te ñamu dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ne pwadan, ɔci kan naŋki ɛkkɛ pwad pwad Ciɛggɔn ikintiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ oŋ noŋdɛ oŋo. Kan naŋka neeni pwatcin bɛɛyɛ, naa noŋdɛ bɛɛ.
49005011	Naŋka naŋtan maka ciyi te nona ulanti menyɛ, etti jyeka pwadin bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ ñoodɛ iki ɛkkɛn te naŋka neeni bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka gɔktɛ ɛkkɛnti, ɛkkɛn ṭeedɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛn.
49005012	Acaan naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn lieda neeniyɛ, yaayɛ ne tolan. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ‘ya gɔkta jyek naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni ‘ya tukuti bɛɛ.
49005013	Naŋki waakɛndayɛ, kan eetan ma bora nona bɔwantiyɛ, ɔci ŋeettan ma ne kan naŋki pwadɔy. Kan noon bɔw bɔwyɛ, ma yaakinti naŋka yeyin neeni coktan iñɔ moki bɛɛ. Acaan ne nona bɔwan dɛkti nona ulantiyɛ, ɔci nona ulan neeni baadi doki.
49005014	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba jwalla gɔki agi, “Mena wici, i ṭiewa, hay! Mena tuuta, i jɔlla ñaalɔ, ɔci Kiṭɔ i dyɛgdi.”
49005015	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te coodi ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba maka jiek kwoyɔn noŋi amaam budan ɔɔn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba maka ñingɛn tɛyan.
49005016	Dala ɛkkɛ tiecɛ oŋki ɛkkɛ waakɛn ne pwadan acaan nɔji tol tol mati.
49005017	Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba maka jiek kwoyɔn bɛɛ. Dala yom Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan.
49005018	Naa ɛkkɛ noktɛ mooy bɛɛ. Acaan nooŋi mooyyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ yaatɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ aŋka kuma te gena Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda.
49005019	Ne ɛkkɛ coottɛ iñɔ a cyɛɛlɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ jyeyɛ te ɔɔlga ɛkkɛ laldɛ Boŋ Juaŋy, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ‘ualɛ Juaŋti moki te yomg ɛkkɛ.
49005020	Ɔci oŋkandayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin Wey ikin Juaŋti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ te waak waakɛnda.
49005021	Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek modg ɛkkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ waakida noŋɛ ne pwadan Yaccu Kiṭɔti.
49005022	Moongo, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛ bala ba bolja ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek Ciɛggɔn ikiny.
49005023	Maka ‘uayyɛ, ɛkkɛn a wyetk maka moong bala ba Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ a wyeñ ma kaniica. Ma kaniicayɛ, ɛkkɛn a war Kiṭɔ, ɔci Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci Ma kaniica.
49005024	Ɔci ba bolja ma kaniica tyeŋki jyek Kiṭɔ oŋkanda neeniyɛ, dala moong tieŋdi jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛn oŋkanda daŋkun.
49005025	Ɛkkɛ, maka ‘uayo, dala ɛkkɛ anɛ moong ɛkkɛ ne tolan bala ba bolja Kiṭɔ ani ma kaniica, ɔci ɛkɛ tuuni te ɛkkɛny.
49005026	Yaccu tuun te ma kaniica aŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwaddi te nɔji ne ɛkkɛn bultɛti may. Ɔci jyek Jwaŋa Tolan neeni ɛkkɛn naŋtan pwaddi Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.
49005027	Ɛkɛ noŋi a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma kaniica pwada ɛkɛ ñingɛti ne tolan. Dala ɛkkɛn bala ba mena ɛŋi bworŋin pwadin, bworŋin giikkɛn baawy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Kiṭɔ buagɔn naa gena yaayan gɛɛl bala kaniica ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
49005028	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala maka ‘uayyɛ, ɛkkɛn ani moong ɛkkɛn ba ne ɛkkɛn anki waak ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Kan menga ani ɛŋ ɛkɛyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ ani war ɛkɛ daŋkun.
49005029	Men gɛɛl yookɔn te war ɛkɛ boki? Hayɛllɛ! Men gɛɛl yookɔn te war ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔṭi kon ɛkɛ oŋkanda ne pwadan te waka amdɛ ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔṭi war ɛkɛ ne pwadan oŋkanda bala ba ne Kiṭɔ gɔṭi kaniica ɛkɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn,
49005030	acaan ikin akin war ɛkɛ.
49005031	Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne mena kaalgɔn ḍɛɛdi ɛɛŋyɛ, ɛkɛ on weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛn daldɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ciyi iki ɛŋ ɛkɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñoowin yaakkɛn doki. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋi ba mena ne cyɛɛlɔ doki, a yyɛɛwɔ moki bɛɛ.”
49005032	Jwalla neeniyɛ, gɔki te mena ‘uan i ɛŋ ɛkɛ. Ɔci jwalla neeniyɛ, kon ɛkɛ ɛka parɛ bala moki. ‘Ya gɔk ka gena jyek ñoowin Kiṭɔ i kaniica ɛkɛ.
49005033	Ɛkkɛyɛ, dala maka ‘uay ani moong ɛkkɛn ba ne ɛkkɛn anki waak ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Ɔci moongyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛn te yoma pwadan.
49006001	Kɛɛgin, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek weyi ɛkkɛ ɔci ba jyek mɛyi ɛkkɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin Jwaŋa Tolanti.
49006002	Ne Juaŋ gɔŋni mati te ganuun jiña neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ jwali gɛɛl naŋɛ ɛkɛ iki ma doki te ganuun jiña neeni. Ganuun jiña neeni gɔki agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek weyi ɛkkɛ ɔci jyek mɛyi ɛkkɛ te yoma pwadanyɛ,
49006003	ɔci coodi ɛkkɛ pwada ɔci beya iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni.”
49006004	Hay, kɛɛgin weyyɛn, naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ kɛɛgin ɔɔrndɛ a ɔɔrŋin a ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛn loondi bɛɛ. Dala kɛɛgin ɛkkɛ laldɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ṭeedɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛn bootti Ciɛggɔn ikinti.
49006005	Maka kɛɛnko, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyek kanŋa weyyɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ te yoma pwadan kanŋa weyyɛnti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ buattɛ ɛkkɛn. Ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ kanŋa neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ kanŋa neeni a kanŋa Kiṭɔ.
49006006	Acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk Kiṭɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa ne pwadan te kanŋa weyyɛn ñingɛnti budan bɛɛ, ne ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn te ma ñingɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛ buagɛ dala ma jieyi ɛkkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun kandɛ ne pwadan ne kanŋa weyyɛn baaki daŋkuny. Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn te yoma pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti noŋdɛ ba naŋka Juaŋ buagɛy.
49006007	Dala kanŋa ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ waakɛnda te yoma pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ kanŋa neeni naŋdɛ Juaŋti, naa naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ ma baanti budan bɛɛ.
49006008	Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ kan men gɛɛl a kɛɛngɔn walla kan a kɛɛngɔn bɛɛyɛ, waka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan wannayɛ, etti waka pwadin ne baaṭi te Ciɛggɔn ikinti.
49006009	Hay! Kanŋa weyyɛn, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwaddi kɛɛnk ɛkkɛti daŋkun. Naa ɛkkɛ ɔɔrŋɛ kɛɛnk ɛkkɛ waakɛn a ɔɔrŋin te jyeka yeyin neeni bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ yeya te jyeka neeni bɛɛ. Wey ɛkkɛ Weya ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkɛ a Wey ɛkkɛ waakida i kɛɛnk ɛkkɛ. Ɛkɛ a mena kɛɛb ma jitkɛn bɛɛ.
49006010	Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala moki ne cyɛɛlɔ. Acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, dala war tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛti oŋkanda, acaan war tɛɛn ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, tol tol ɔci tɛɛna tɛɛno.
49006011	Ne lañ baaliyɛ, ma ɛŋi wak laño. Ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ naŋki Juaŋ aŋka ne ɛkkɛ noogdɛ iki Jwaŋa Yaayan daŋkunyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ te naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
49006012	Ikin noowin iki ma baan bɛɛ. Ikin noowin iki jɔkin yeyin pɔɔldinji, ɔci ikin noowin i jɔkin yeyin i Jwaŋa Yaayan mena etti naŋka yeyin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni.
49006013	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋki Juaŋ waakɛnda aŋka ne oŋŋa jiek yiekti ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan. Ɔci ne lañ baali toliyɛ, ɛkkɛ yooŋdɛ ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ yɔɔttɛ iñɔ ne tɛyan ɔɔn.
49006014	’Ya gɔk ɛkkɛti dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te ŋeejin ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ba mena warɛ ywaŋŋɛ buagɔn noŋi ṭwaŋy. Dala ɛkkɛ baltɛ yoma pwadan. Yoma pwadan neeniyɛ, bala ba buarñan ḍyɛktan ma korkɛnti ne ma nookiy.
49006015	Dala ɛkkɛ baltɛ yoma buagɔn mieti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Gena jyek coodda pwadan. Ɔci ba jyek yoma buagɔn miti ma neeniyɛ, bala ba mena ɛŋi wɛyi ṭwaŋ ciegɛtiy.
49006016	Dala jyeni ɛkkɛ tiektɛ ne tɛyan oŋkanda bala ba kɔɔrña eetan ma ṭwaŋti aŋka dooŋɛ ɛkkɛ jyek Jwaŋa Yaayan jyeka bala ba cowwa tuggɛn bitin cowwa noki ɛkkɛy.
49006017	Dala ɛkkɛ baltɛ yɔɔt Juaŋ yɔɔta yuoci ɛkkɛy. Ɔci jyek yɔɔt neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek taaggan ‘yɛŋtan ma a taaggan ṭwaŋy. Dala ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ jyeka ikin ‘wonninti Boŋ Juaŋ neeni ŋeeddɛ. Ɔci jwali Juaŋ neeni bala ba byeŋgaaran ikinti.
49006018	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔkɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Naa ɛkkɛ woodɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ aŋka dala Juaŋ ɛkkɛ magdɛ, cɔktɛ ɛkɛti te wɔɔkan waakɛnda ne ɛkkɛ wɛɛdɛ Boŋ Juaŋy. Acaan a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan, naa togdɛ bɛɛ, dala cɔktɛ oŋkanda te Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda.
49006019	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ‘ya daŋkun. Ne ‘ya tuku pɔkta gɔkta mati loṭa mayɛ, dala Juaŋ ‘ya ‘wonda jyeka pwadin tukuti aŋka ‘ya yaaktati gɔkca mati ne pwadan te jyeka jitkɛn a coggin mati te baaṭi jyeka lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni.
49006020	’Ya a cuuda Yaccu ec jyek ɛkɛ mati, ɔci acca ‘ya ḍɛɛkka ma te jiŋgin te jyek ɛkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ‘ya aŋka ne ‘ya gɔkta matiyɛ, naa ‘ya buay genga bɛɛ. Dala ‘ya gɔkca mati te yoma tɛyan, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin.
49006021	Ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya ŋeeddata ne ‘ya baala ciya a ɔkiy, ɔci ne ‘ya baala noŋa a ɔkiy. Ticcikoc, ɛkɛ a mena anki may, ɔci ɛkɛ bala tieci kanŋa Juaŋ warɛ ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛ nɔɔttɛ ɛkɛ te coodi ‘ya waakɛnda.
49006022	’Ya ɛkɛ cuoñña ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɛkɛ te jyek ɔɔn, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ɔci yomgɔ tɛya.
49006023	Modg ikin waakɛndayɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋ coodda pwadan. Ɔci anna Juaŋ ani mayɛ, dala oldɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti daŋkun. Ɔci dala Juaŋ ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ jyek jyeni daŋkun. Dala waka neeni bɛya mati te Wey ikin Juaŋti, ɔci te Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti moki.
49006024	Maka ani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne pwadan oŋkandayɛ, dala Juaŋ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda.
50001001	Hay! Ɛkkɛ modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda ban Pilibbi, ɔɔn kienɔn worga ɛkkɛti, ɔci gaciicinti daŋkun, ɔci dikannti daŋkun. Gena ‘ya Buuluc ɔci mod ikin Timutawuc kɛɛnk Yaccu Kiṭɔ kienɔn worga ɛkkɛti neeni.
50001002	Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin i Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwani daŋkun.
50001003	Gɔṭṭɛ, modg ɔɔn, oŋkanda ne ‘ya baala poŋa te ɛkkɛyɛ, ‘ya gɔk Jwaŋa Tolanti a pwatcin te ɛkkɛ.
50001004	Ɔci oŋkanda ne ‘ya baala cɔka Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ waakida a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya cɔk te yoma ñɔyan.
50001005	’Ya yomu ñɔy ñɔy acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ mokɛ ‘ya oŋkanda te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek Juaŋ wanna ne acca neeniti ɔɔn.
50001006	Çeej ‘ya ne pwadan, Jwaŋa Tolan mena poccin noŋi kanŋa pwadan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ kanŋa neeni daldɛ budan amaam bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ kandi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti ɔɔn ne oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
50001007	Ɛkkɛ balgɛ ‘ya yomuti oŋkanda! A ɔŋŋiyɛ, yɔmjin ‘yati doki ne ‘ya noŋa a ɔɔn ɛkkɛtiy, acaan ɛkkɛ waakida ñoonin iki ‘ya te wɔɔka ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ neeni. Kan ‘ya baal ciginji walla kan ‘ya baal borayɛ, ‘ya yuoc jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ñoonin iki ‘ya te jyeka neeni aŋka ‘ya jyeka neeni yɔɔtca iñɔ ne tɛyan.
