50001008	Yom ‘ya ŋeejɛ Juaŋ ne ‘ya baala ana ɛkkɛ a ɔkiy. ‘Ya yomu bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan ba ne Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ baali ɛkkɛti wanna ɔɔn.
50001009	’Ya cɔk Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ ka dala anna ɛkkɛ anɛ Juaŋ ɔci anna ɛkkɛ anɛ ma baan dala tola daŋkun. Ɔci ŋeejin ɛkkɛ jiek ŋeejɛ neeniyɛ, dala ciɛña a ciɛnñi gɔ moki ciɛñji ñamu ɔɔn. Dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ tɛya gɔ moki ñingɔ tɛyin ɔɔn
50001010	aŋka jiek jitkɛn ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, jyeka neeni pwadɔ walla yeyɔ. Naa jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ ne oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan, naa maka pookɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te naŋki ɛkkɛ bɛɛ.
50001011	Ɔci ba bolji jana wyeñɛ kuumi te ṭɔlgɛ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun yomgɔ kuma te naŋka pwadin naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ma gɔrti ne naŋki Juaŋ pwadiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jieddi ɛkɛ.
50001012	Hay! Modg ɔɔn, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne ‘ya olkata ma ciginji a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya kanŋa Juaŋ yaañi te naŋka neeni bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, aŋka jiek ooddi baan konɛ warda.
50001013	Jyek coodi ‘ya jiju ciginji te jyek Kiṭɔyɛ, ŋeecɔn ackan i ma akuuma nona neeni wɛnni waakɛnda. Ɔci jyek ‘ya ati baan konɛti warda daŋkun.
50001014	Modg ikin modga coŋinyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn tieŋki jyek coodi ‘ya jiju ciginjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛɛn te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala mieti ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛn buayi menga moki bɛɛ.
50001015	Awarɛ, hay! Modg ɔɔn, ma gɛɛg mieti ma te jyek Kiṭɔ te yoma pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn korkɛn modɔ te naŋka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ‘yati neeni, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ mati bɛɛ. Yeti maka pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn loṭi ma te yoma pwadan.
50001016	Ɛkkɛn ani ‘ya acaan te kanŋa naŋdi ‘ya a kanŋa Kiṭɔ neeni, ɔci ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛn ‘ya baal jiju wɛnni te jyek kanŋa Yaccu.
50001017	Maka loṭi ma te yoma yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn korkɛn modɔ ‘yati, ɔci ɛkkɛn loṭi ma te yoma awarɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi ne ɛkkɛn lortinti ma a ɔɔnyɛ, agi aŋka ‘ya taabjɔ ne tolan ciginji wɛnni.
50001018	Yeti baatɔ! Ne ma balki lorki ma te yoma yaayan walla te yoma awarɛyɛ, jyek Kiṭɔ bala ooddi mati men ɔɔn, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
50001019	Yom ‘ya mwondi te ñɔɔn bɛɛ. ‘Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ cɔkɛ Juaŋti te ‘ya, ɔci Boŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ‘yati, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya ‘ya pɔkta Juaŋo.
50001020	Yom ‘ya buagɔn dala ‘ya gɔkca mati ne pwadan acca, ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔn lɔɔdja bɛɛ. Kan ‘ya nokta ma, walla kan ‘ya ciy tɛɛt men ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala Kiṭɔ ŋeettan ma a Kiṭɔ tol tol te naŋki ‘ya neeni.
50001021	Kan ‘ya ciy tɛɛt ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya ciy noŋ kanŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Yeti kan ‘ya tuudyɛ, pwatcin ne tolan nɔñji, acaan Juaŋ ‘woñi ‘ya te waka pwadin.
50001022	Kan ‘ya ciy tɛɛtyɛ, ɔci ‘ya yaakati ma magdi te jyek Juaŋo.
50001023	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya waru yikcan ñaalɔ gena naŋdi ne cyɛɛlɔ yuarca bɛɛ, ‘ya yaakati gɔkca lien pwatcin, walla jyek tɛɛtin aŋka pwatcin bɛɛ. Yomg ‘ya a yyɛɛwɔ. Yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ gɛɛl buagɔn ‘ya ciy meni. Ɔci yoma parɛ buagɔn ‘ya tuudo. Ɔci gena yom ‘ya buagiti ne pɛñanyɛ, gena lyena ‘ya tuuda ɔci oodda ban Yaccuti ɛkɛ aŋka pwatcin ne tolan te coodda ciya ‘ya iñɔ wɛnniy.
50001024	Yeti kan ‘ya yadi wɛnni te ɛkkɛyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin.
50001025	Ɛɛ, jwali gɛɛl ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan, ‘ya yaddo. Ɔci ɛkkɛ magdin ‘ya aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu, ɔci aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi te jyek jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeni.
50001026	Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ne ‘ya bɛɛda ɛkkɛti mokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ jieddɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.
50001027	Yeti kan ‘ya bɛɛd ɛkkɛti ɔci walla kan ‘ya bɛɛd ɛkkɛti bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ oŋkanda neeniyɛ, dala bala ba naŋki jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ mietɛ ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, dala paŋi ɛkkɛ aga paŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ.
50001028	Ɔci ne ma tiekti te jyeka neeniyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yeyɔ te jyek ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeettan ɛkkɛn jiek bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ne baaṭi. Ɔci te naŋka wanna mokiyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ Juaŋo.
50001029	Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti doki, ɔci a ɔɔn pwatcin. Yeti jyek jyenna ɛkkɛ jyetti Kiṭɔti neeniyɛ, bala parɛ bɛɛ, jyek taab bala ɛkkɛti daŋkun. Kan taab bala ɛkkɛti te yenti Kiṭɔyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ bɛɛ. A ɔɔn pwatcin daŋkun.
50001030	Taab yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ ‘yati te kanŋa Yaccu neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛti daŋkun, ɔci bala ‘yati acca men ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ bawwin men bɛɛ.
50002001	Tieŋdɛ, modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ, kan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛy tɛy te naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci kan lati ma korkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci kan Boŋ Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛti, ɔci kan yomg ɛkkɛ bala mati ne pwadanyɛ,
50002002	dala ‘ya yomu ñɔya te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ oondi yɔtin waakida. Ɔci dala yomg ɛkkɛ aga ba yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba maka ne cyɛɛlɔ.
50002003	Naa ɛkkɛ anɛ waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ naŋki yyɛji bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ waakɔ naŋdɛ ba maka ḍwaŋin bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala ba maka ḍyɛrin, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ agi maka pookɛn ɛkkɛn aŋka pwadɔ te ɛkkɛ.
50002004	Naa ɛkkɛ mokɛ waak ɛkkɛ pookɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ maka pookɛn magdɛ daŋkun.
50002005	Dala yomg ɛkkɛ bala ba yom Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
50002006	Ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ a wara ne cyɛɛlɔ iki Jwaŋa Tolan, yeti ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyek ḍyɛrji bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala ‘yeṭi warɛ aŋka warɛ poortɛti Juaŋti te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ.
50002007	Ɛkɛ warɛ naŋŋɛ ba ne ɛkɛ a genga bɛɛ no. Ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi ba bolji mena kɛɛngɔn. Ɛkɛ warɛ aaŋŋɛ aŋi men baano.
50002008	Ɔci ɛkɛ jyek Juaŋ tiiññiyɔ waakɛnda iki jyek lyen ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Gena lyena tuuni ɛkɛ kakantiy.
50002009	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu koomnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ñaalɔ ɔci ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ yenta tolan. Ɔci yenta neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tol tol te yenga pookɛn waakɛnda.
50002010	Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ma ḍwondi iñɔ ɛkɛ ñamɛti morti ɛkɛti waakɛnda. Gena maka ñaalɔ pɔliji i maka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni, ɔci maka bala kolk jitin waakɛnda.
50002011	Ɔci ma waakɛnda gɔkti te lɛmma ne cyɛɛlɔ waakɛnda, agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkta agi Ciɛggɔn tolɔ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ma jieyi Wey ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan daŋkun.
50002012	Munga ana ‘yay, ba bolja ɛkkɛ jyek ‘ya tiiññɛ ñin ne ‘ya balkin iki ɛkkɛ aŋan neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ Jiek tiidɛyɔ ne pwadan waakɛnda ne ‘ya baawa loona ɔntɔ te ɛkkɛti ɔɔn. Jwaŋa Tolan bala kanŋan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti, ɔci te kanŋa ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ buagɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkɛ, noŋdɛ ba yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ moki bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ buattɛ Juaŋ te yoma awarɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te yɔɔd Jwaŋa Tolan.
50002014	Gɔṭṭɛ, gena ɛkkɛ buagɛ naŋdɛyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ te yoma yaayan ywoñɛ waakɔ bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛ tyewwɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ budan te nɔjjo.
50002015	Naa ɛkkɛ a maka waaktan ma a maka noŋi naŋka yeyin bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Maka coŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ciyi amaam budan. Naŋki ɛkkɛn yeyɔ. Noon yaayɛ ɛkkɛn te nɔjjo. Nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba nona mielo. Yeti ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba kɛltan ne dɛkki nona mielti,
50002016	acaan ɛkkɛ mietɛ ma te jyeka tɛɛtki ma neeni. Kan ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadanyɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiyɛ, ‘ya lɔɔdja te ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti bɛɛ. ‘Ya aŋka yomu ñɔya ñɔɔn te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni, acaan coodi ‘ya iñɔ wɛnni a coodda budan bɛɛ, ɔci kanŋa ‘ya iñɔ wɛnni aŋi kanŋa budan bɛɛ.
50002017	Kan lyen ‘ya jyeni ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛtiyɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔya ñɔɔn ne tolan. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔki daŋkunyɛ, ɔci ‘ya daŋkun yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔno.
50002018	Ɔci ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya daŋkun ba ‘ya ɔɔn.
50002019	Gɔṭṭɛ poca, ‘ya buaga Timutawuc cuoñña ɛkkɛti. Kan Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu buagɔn a ɔɔn daŋkunyɛ, ‘ya ɛkɛ cuoñña ɛkkɛti aŋan aŋka ɛkɛ ‘ya eekta jiek ṭɔlgɛn gɛɛg te ɛkkɛti aŋka ‘ya yomu luudɛ parun.
50002020	Mena parɛ gɛɛl bala wɛnni yomɛ bala ɛkkɛti ba Timutawuc ɔɔn bɛɛ.
50002021	Maka pookɛn waakɛnda ɛkkɛn poŋi te jyek kanŋa wak ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te kanŋa wak Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛ.
50002022	Oŋ yeti Timutawucyɛ, ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ pwadiy. Ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali kanŋin iki ‘ya ba kaci ne kanki iki weegɛn ɔɔn.
50002023	Ne ‘ya gɔrta jyek godan ‘ya ne baali a ɔkiyɛ, ‘ya oŋ Timutawuc cuoñña ɛkkɛti oŋo.
50002024	Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ɔɔn, ŋeej ‘ya, ‘ya bɛɛd ooda Juaŋ ne cwakanti ḍieŋŋa ɛkkɛti.
50002025	’Ya poŋ gɔk ka Ipaprodaaytoc cuoñña dɔwwa ‘ya nona ɛkkɛti ne cwakanti moki. Ɛkɛ bala ba mod ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ bala kanŋin iki ‘ya, ɔci ɛkɛ a ackan Juaŋ ba ‘ya ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ cuonnɛ ‘yati wɛnni, ɔci ɛkɛ bala moki ‘ya.
50002026	Ɛkɛ ñingɛ boŋi te ɛkkɛ ne tolan. Ne ɛkɛ tieŋni agi ma ɛkɛ tieŋnɔ agi ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɔyɛ, ɛkɛ bala poŋi jiek yomɛti.
50002027	Ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɛ ne tolan, ɛkɛ noŋi tuwa doki. Yeti Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ pwani doki. Ɔci Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ‘yati daŋkun te ywaŋŋa ɛkɛ ‘wana neeni ywaŋŋɛy. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, taab ‘ya bala moki bɛɛ.
50002028	Ɔci acca ‘ya yomu noki warɛ ne tolan te bwakta ‘ya buagati ɛkɛ cuonda ɛkkɛtiy. Acaan ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ɔci gɔktɛ a pwatcin ne ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ yuardɛy, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya yomu pwada daŋkun.
50002029	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ magdɛ te yom ñɔɔn ba mod ɛkkɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn. Maka pwadin ba Ipaprodaaytoc neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkkɛn.
50002030	Acaan Ipaprodaaytoc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi tuwa te kanŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛ buagɛ ‘ya magdatɛ, yeti acaan ban ɛkkɛ looncin ɔntɔyɛ, aŋka ɛkkɛ Ipaprodaaytoc cuonnɛ ‘yati moki ‘ya neeni. Taab ɛkɛ tol tolo, yeti ɛkɛ buayi lyen ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala moki ‘ya men ɔɔn.
50003001	Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya oŋkanda, acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ Ciɛggɔn ikinti doki. Kan ‘ya kiewa jyeka neeni ɛkkɛti oŋki ne coŋɔn ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayi ‘yati bɛɛ. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyek ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan.
50003002	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te maka bala ba gɔki maka yeyin a laaban neeni. Acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn ŋwoti ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ naŋtɛ a Ma Yahuud ba ɛkkɛn budan ɔɔn.
50003003	Ikin maka moṭi Jwaŋa Tolanti te Boŋ ɛkɛyɛ, ikin aŋka balkin jyek ŋwoti awarɛ. Ikin yomgɔ ñɔyɔ te Yaccu Kiṭɔ parɛ. Ɔci ikin poŋin gɔkin agi ikin yaakinti naŋka pwadan te waak tɛɛn ikin pookɔ bɛɛ.
50003004	Kan men gɛɛl gɔki jieyi warɛ agi ɛkɛ yaakiti warɛ udjɛ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ parɛ budanyɛ, ‘ya yaakati jyek ɛkɛ bwandi ‘ya daŋkun.
50003005	Tieŋdɛ, ɛkkɛ poktin naŋki war ‘ya. Ne ‘ya jiennata mɛy ɔɔn, ɔci ne nink ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛki bora ba naŋki yɔrg ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya ŋutka ma doki te ninna akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ. ‘Ya jietka ma Icrayiil. ‘Ya bɛɛn te kɛɛn Benjaminti. ‘Ya jietka ma Icrayiil. ‘Ya a Pɛriciy, ɔci ba naŋki ma Pɛriciinyɛ, ‘ya baal tiec Jyek ganuun waakɛn ne pwadan.
50003006	’Ya waru byerŋa byerŋ te kanŋa yɔɔro, ɔci ‘ya baal noŋ ne yaayan ma kaniicanti. Jyek ganuun jitkɛn tiiñiyɔ ‘ya waakɛnda. Gɛɛl bɛɛñiji bɛɛ.
50003007	Gɔṭṭɛ, jyek yɔrg ɔɔn, ɔci jyek naŋki ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwadɔ ‘yati, yeti ɛkkɛn daljan ‘ya ɔntɔ waakɛnda a kucin te jyek Kiṭɔ.
50003008	Awarɛ, jyeka pookɛn waakɛnda aŋi ba jyeka budan ‘yati. Gena jyek ŋeejiin Ciɛggɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeeja ‘ya neeni aŋka pwatciny. Acaan ‘ya buaga jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, waak waakɛnda yorkan ‘ya ŋoyu, yom ‘ya bala ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn ɔga ḍakti doki. ‘Ya buaga ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya buaga gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ parɛ.
50003009	’Ya buaga dala ɛkɛ bala ‘yati. ‘Ya poŋ ka ‘ya pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te naŋki ‘ya paru bɛɛ, walla te tiit jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ. ‘Ya pwani ɛkɛ ñamɛti te jyenna ‘ya jyetta Kiṭɔti neeni. Acaan maka jyeddi Yaccu Kiṭɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn naŋdɛ Juaŋ pwaddi ɛkɛ ñamɛti.
50003010	’Ya buaga dala Kiṭɔ ŋeejja ‘ya ne pwadan. Ɔci ‘ya buaga dala war tɛɛn jɔlni ɛkɛ ñaalɔ neeni ŋeejja ‘ya daŋkun. Ɔci ‘ya buaga dala taab Yaccu ŋeejja ‘ya daŋkun, ɔci dala lyen ɛkɛ aga ba lyen ‘ya,
50003011	ɔci dala ‘ya jɔŋŋa ñaalɔ moki ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
50003012	’Ya gɔkca te war ‘ya ka jyeka neeni ḍaaŋi ‘ya waakɛnda men bɛɛ. ‘Ya a mena domi jiek men. Yeti ‘ya ciɛñ ‘uocca ñamu te jyek Yaccu a ‘uoccin gɔ moki ‘uocci ɔɔn, aŋka gena odga ‘ya ñamuti neeni aga gen ‘ya bala ba ne ‘ya koonati Yaccu Kiṭɔ bora aŋŋa men ɛkɛ dokiy. Ɔci ‘ya buaga naŋka ‘ya koonati ɛkɛ bora neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bala ‘yati.
50003013	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya gɔk ka naŋka neeni ḍaaŋi ‘ya waakɛnda doki bɛɛ. A’a. Naŋka coŋin bala men, yeti gen gɛɛl aŋka bala ne cyɛɛlɔ naŋdi ‘ya oŋkanda. Waka dollanyɔ ‘yayɛ, ‘ya poŋ te jyek ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ. ‘Ya poŋ te waka bala ñamu,
50003014	ɔci ‘ya ciɛñ ‘uocca ñamu a ‘uoccin gɔ moki ‘uocci ɔɔn. ‘Ya muona Jwaŋa Tolan bora te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci ‘ya buaga jyek naŋka pwadin neeni pookɛn.
50003015	Ikin maka loonnin ñamu doki te jyek Yaccuyɛ, dala paŋŋa neeni bala ikinti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti paŋi ɛkɛ bala ɔntɔyɛ, ɛkɛ myettɛ Jwaŋa Tolan agi paŋi ɛkta neeni baalɔ ɔntɔ.
50003016	Dala ikin noŋtin ne pwadan ba jyeka ŋeecin ikiny.
50003017	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ‘ya ɔɔn. Gena ɔɔn agɔn maka lwaktan ma te naŋka pwadin neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ maka lɔki naŋka neeni wanna ne pwadan.
50003018	Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te jyeka neeni oŋki kɔɔna kɔɔnno, ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin acca moki ɔɔn. Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ maka coŋin maka yeyinyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn te kakan Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ne ‘ya baala gɔka ɛkkɛti te jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk a ɔɔn ne pieg bala ‘ya woŋguti ɔɔn.
50003019	Ne baaṭi ɛkkɛn ñɔɔdi ɔci ḍakti budan. Jyek bwakti waak bala ñamu ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti aŋi ba jwaŋ ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn jieyi waakɛn te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn yaayan neeni budan. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te jyek waka bala iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni budan.
50003020	Ikinyɛ, ikin aŋka akin maka bana ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci ikin kɛɛyin mena bɛya te aŋany, gena Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
50003021	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ waak ikin waaka yeyin neeniyɛ, agdiyɔ ɛkɛ aga ba war ɛkɛ wara pwadan neeni. Ikin aktinyɔ ɛkɛ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ. Ɔci te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aga Ciɛggɔn noon warda, ɔci waak waakɛndayɛ, noŋdi ba jyek ɛkɛ.
50004001	Modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ modga ana ‘yay, te naŋka bɛya neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin. ‘Ya ñingu boŋi te ɛkkɛ. ‘Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te ɛkkɛ.
50004002	’Ya gɔk Yuadyati yaakkɛn i Cintiki, dala ɛkkɛn ciya te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ te jyek Yaccu, naa ɛkkɛn yoyi ñin yaakkɛn a ɔɔn bɛɛ.
50004003	Hay! Mena kanŋin iki ‘yay, ‘ya gɔkka iti, dala moonga neeni magdɛ te jyek ɛkkɛn, acaan moonga neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala kanŋin iki ‘ya te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɛkkɛn bala kanŋin iki ‘ya i Klɛmanti i maka pookɛn daŋkun, maka yeng ɛkkɛn bala worgajiy. Worga neeniyɛ, a worga balki yeng maka tɛɛtiy.
50004004	Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te yoma ñɔyan te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin oŋkanda ɔɔn. ‘Ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti moki ka dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te yoma ñɔyan!
50004005	Dala ŋeettan ma waakɛnda yomg ɛkkɛ pwadɔ mati, ɔci dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin bala bɛya ne cwakanti ikinti.
50004006	Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ jiek te jyek waagga bɛɛ. Dala yeti ɛkkɛ aŋka cɔktɛ gena Jwaŋa Tolanti te jiek waakɛnda. Ɔci oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ ɛkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ te waka ɛkkɛ buagɛy. Dala ɛkkɛ gɔkti ɛkɛti a pwatcin.
50004007	Kan ɛkkɛ noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ coodi pwanno. Ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔ waŋɛ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ, ɔci te paŋi ɛkkɛ moki. Naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, da parɛ. Naŋka neeni jiñɛ yuartanji ma baan te wyetk ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
50004008	Modg ɔɔn, jwali gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te waka pwadin jitkɛn waakɛnda. Waka pwadin neeniyɛ, gena naŋka awarɛ, ɔci naŋka pwadan, ɔci ani mako, ɔci yenta pwadan, ɔci naŋka balki yom pwani, ɔci jiɛt Juaŋ jiɛta pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ caŋdɛ te gena paŋi waka neeni.
50004009	Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ noŋdɛ ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lallin ‘ya neeni. Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek ‘ya, ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔrnɛ naŋki ‘ya. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn daŋkun. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan mena ‘woñi ma te coodi pwani ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ baldɛ iki ɛkkɛ.
50004010	Ɛɛ, te baaṭi ɛkkɛ balgɛ poŋɛ te ‘ya, ɔci ‘ya maŋŋata ɛkkɛ. Ɔci acca ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ poŋɛ te ‘ya ɔci mokɛ ‘ya men. Çeej ‘ya ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala ‘yati ɔci buagɛ mokɛ ‘ya oŋkanda, yeti pɔya ɛkkɛ ‘ya magdatɛ gɔ bala bɛɛ.
50004011	’Ya gɔk a ɔɔn ɛkkɛti acaan ‘ya bɔw bɛɛ. Acca ‘ya poŋ te jyek waka ciya ‘ya acca moki bɛɛ. Acca kan waak bala, ɔci walla kan waak baaw ‘yatiyɛ, ‘ya men yomu pwad pwad ɔɔn.
50004012	’Ya yaakati ciy ba mena bɔwan waak baaw ɛkɛtiy, ɔci ‘ya yaakati ciy ba mena cyɛgan waak bala ɛkɛtiy. Naŋka neeni yuarŋ ‘ya doki. Kan baan yooŋ yoŋ, walla kan baan yaayɛ moki a koñyɛ, ‘ya yaakati ciy ne pwadan men ɔɔn.
50004013	’Ya yaakati naŋki waakɛnda te war tɛɛna ‘ya ‘wondata Kiṭɔ oŋkanday.
50004014	Ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwanna pwani ‘yati ne ɛkkɛ ‘ya maŋŋata te oŋŋa taab baali ‘yatiy. Taab ‘ya aŋi ba taab ɛkkɛ doki.
50004015	Ɛkkɛ maka ban Pilibbi, jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Ne ɛkkɛ lallin ‘ya te ñamu, ɔci ne ‘ya koona bora te ban Macɛdɔɔnyayɛ, ‘ya makka ma kaniican gɛɛg bɛɛ, ‘ya maŋŋata gena ɛkkɛ pookɔ.
50004016	Ɔci moki ne ‘ya baala ban Tacalunikayɛ, ‘ya maŋŋata ɛkkɛ oŋki aŋi ne yyɛɛwɔ doki.
50004017	Yom ‘ya buagɔn ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘wondata waka neeni budan bɛɛ. Yom ‘ya buagɔn dala Juaŋ aŋka noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti te naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ pwadin neeni.
50004018	Ɛkkɛ ‘ya cuonnata bilk ne coŋɔn. Ɔci waka ‘ya cuonnata ɛkkɛ te byeŋ Ipaprodaaytoc neeniyɛ, yɔmjin te ‘ya doki. Ne ɛkkɛ ‘ya ‘wonnata waka neeniyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ ne Jwaŋa Tolan ‘wonnɛ gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkkɛ gena pwadan gena ɛkkɛ buagɛ neeni, ɔci Juaŋ yookɔn te naŋka neeni bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni pwanna pwani ɛkɛti.
50004019	Dala Jwaŋ ‘yayɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ waka baaw ɛkkɛti neeni ba bolja ɛkɛ agi mena cyɛgan neeni te byeŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
50004020	Jwaŋ ikin ɔci Wey ikinyɛ, dala ma jieddi ɛkɛ oŋkanda yuonginda ɔɔn.
50004021	Dala ɛkkɛ ma Yaccu Kiṭɔ ñiibdɛ waakɛnda te ‘ya. Modg ikin modga bala wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun.
50004022	Ma Kiṭɔ maka bala wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Ɔci maka bala on Kɛɛcartiyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ ne pɛñan daŋkun.
50004023	Dala yom pwani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn.
51001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc, cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ te yom Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci mod ikin Timutawuc, kienɔn worga ɛkkɛti neeni.
51001002	Ɛkkɛ agɛ modg ɔɔn Ma Kiṭɔ maka ban Kuluci, maka pwadin maka jyettɛ Kiṭɔtiy. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ coodda pwadan.
51001003	Oŋkandayɛ, ɔɔn gɔkin a pwatcin ne ɔɔn cɔkɔn Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti te ɛkkɛy.
51001004	Acaan ɔɔn tieŋnɔn jiek te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci te jyek anna ɛkkɛ anɛ Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnday.
51001005	Jyek jyeni ɔci jyek ani neeniyɛ, bala ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ balgɛ kɛɛyɛ te coodda ne baaṭi coodda ciedɛ ɛkkɛ ñaalɔy. Paŋŋa neeni bɛɛn ɛkkɛti te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyeka awarɛy.
51001006	Jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni bɛɛn mati ṭɛɛr konɛ warda, ɔci bala eci naŋka pwadin ma yomgɛnti Ɔci jyeka neeni bala ciɛñ a ciɛñi gɔ moki ciɛñcin ñamu ɔɔn. Te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ, ɔci ne acca ɔɔnyɛ, jyeka neeni bala etti naŋka pwadin oŋkanda ɛkkɛti. Acaan ɛkkɛ mwokɛ yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛti.
51001007	Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka neeni te Epapracti. Ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn Kiṭɔ ba ikin ɔɔn. Ikin anin ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ bala noŋi ba jyek Kiṭɔ ɔci loṭi ɛkkɛ ne pwadan aŋka ɛkɛ moki ‘ya.
51001008	Ɔci ɔɔn nɔɔnnɔn ɛkɛ te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti agi ɛkkɛ anjɛ ma ne tolan.
51001009	Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda te oŋŋa ɔɔn tieŋnɔn jyek ɛkkɛ neeni, ɔci ne acca ɔɔn. Ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ jyeka loṭi Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeeddɛ, ɔci aŋka dala ɛkkɛ yom Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan.
51001010	Ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti a ɔɔn aŋka dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba coodi ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, coodi ɛkkɛ pwada Juaŋti. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala kanŋa kandɛ ɛkkɛ waakɛnda neeniyɛ, etti naŋka pwadan. Ɔci ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti moki ka dala Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan gɔ moki ŋeejjɛ ɔɔn te naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci te yom pwani ɛkɛ.
51001011	Dala ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ war tɛɛn tolan neeni aŋka dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ ne pwadan aŋka ne jwali gɛɛl bɛɛdi ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ yaakɛti yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ma jieddi Juaŋ te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni.
51001012	Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin Wey ikinti oŋkanda, acaan ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a maka ciyi te nona bɔwan.
51001013	Te ñamu ikin agin ma ciɛggɔn nona mielo, yeti ikin wɛɛnin Jwaŋa Tolan bora, ɔci eññin ḍuannin non Kaci ɛkɛ, Kacca ondɛ ɛkɛ aŋka tieŋtin gena jyek ɛkɛ parɛ.
51001014	Ikin wannin Kaci ɛkɛ, ɔci ikin bɔɔŋnin ɛkɛ te nɔji ikin.
51001015	Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ yuarɛ ma te woŋgɛn bɛɛ. Yeti Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa Tolan waanɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ warɛ aaŋŋɛ aŋi men baan aŋka ɛkɛ yuarkiti ma ne pwadan neeni. Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn waka cɔnnɛ Juaŋ neeni waakɛnda.
51001016	Waak cɔnnɛ Juaŋ te Kiṭɔ waakɛnda waka ṭɛɛrji yuartin ikin te woŋgɔ, ɔci waka ñaalɔ pɔliji waka yuartin ikin te woŋgɔ bɛɛ, ɔci jɔkin waakɛnda ɛkkin ḍwaŋin i ɛkkin ḍyɛrin. Ɛkkɛn bɛɛn te Kiṭɔ aŋka ɛkɛ jiɛtan ma te waak waakɛnda.
51001017	Ne waak waakɛnda baaki menyɛ, ɛkɛ doki bala. Waak waakɛnda bala te nonk ɛkkɛnti te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
51001018	Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a ḍuaŋa acaan ɛkɛ a wyeñ ma kaniican. Ma kaniican ɛkkɛn ciyi tɛɛti te Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn a war ɛkɛ. Gena ɛkɛ a mena bɔɔni lien te ñamu aŋka jyek ɛkɛ balki ñamu te jyek waka pookɛn waakɛnda neeni.
51001019	Te yom Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, Kiṭɔ bolji Jwaŋa Tolan lɛɛlnɛ bora warda.
51001020	Ɔci moki te yom Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋki Kiṭɔ te oŋŋa yimg ɛkɛ kɛɛki iñɔyɛ, Juaŋ ŋeewin i ma baan doki, ɔci ŋeewin i waka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni, ɔci ŋeewin i waka bala ñaalɔ pɔliji moki.
51001021	Ɔci ɛkkɛ, te ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ɔntɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci paŋi ɛkkɛ da bala ɔntɔ pookɔ moki. Ɛkkɛ yookɛ te Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛ moki yeyɔ.
51001022	Yeti acca ɛkkɛ ŋeenɛ i Jwaŋa Tolan doki te lyena tuuni Kiṭɔ kakanti neeni. Yaccu tuun te ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka pwadin ne tolan Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.
51001023	Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan oŋkanda te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti neeni. Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn naa yɔɔta ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ neeni daldɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni doki. Ɔci jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni ati ṭɛɛr konɛ warda. Ɔci ‘ya Buuluc neeniyɛ, ‘ya a mena noŋi kanŋa jyeka neeni.
51001024	Ne ‘ya balkati taab te ɛkkɛ ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya yomu ñɔy ñɔy men ɔɔn acaan taab ‘ya neeni etti pwani ɛkkɛti. Taab ‘ya neeniyɛ, bala ba taab Yaccu. Taab bala ɛkɛti te ma kaniica ɛkɛ. Ɔci ‘ya daŋkun taabba aŋka ma kaniica magdi ne coŋɔn.
51001025	Juaŋ ‘ya naŋŋa a mena noŋi kanŋa ma kaniicati, ɔci ‘ya naŋŋa Juaŋ a cuuda noŋ kanŋa ɛkkɛti. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te jyek ɛkɛ waakɛnda.
51001026	’Ya cuonna ɛkɛ aŋka ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te baaṭi jitkɛn a coggin matiy. Jyeka neeni lɛɛlnɛ ɛkɛ bora acca. Ɛkɛ buagɔn ‘ya ɛkkɛ myettin te ɛkkɛn ne pwadan. Ɛkɛ Keedin Pookɛn yɔɔññɛ te baaṭi te yuonga ati coŋin waayi bɛɛ. Yeti acca ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma ɛkɛ waakɛnda jwalla neeni ŋeettan.
51001027	Ɛkkɛ Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, jyeka coggin neeni oonɛ Juaŋ bora ɛkkɛti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni pwadɔ ne tolan. Jyeka bɛɛn bora neeniyɛ, gena Kiṭɔ mena bala ɛkkɛ yomgɛti neeni. A ɔŋŋi ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ciyɛ kɛɛyɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn, aŋka ɛkkɛ kaattɛ ban Jwaŋa Tolan.
51001028	Ɔɔn moki balgɔn mietɔn ma oŋkanda te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔɔn balgɔn ṭeyɔn ma waakɛnda, ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn loṭɔn ma waakɛnda te jiek acaan ɔɔn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛn oodɔn Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti pwadgin a pwadgin.
51001029	’Ya kanŋ ne pɛñan waru byerŋa byerŋ te kanŋa te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ ‘ya yomuti.
51002001	Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ‘ya baal kanŋ te ɛkkɛ ne tolan, ɔci te Ma Kiṭɔ maka ban Lɛyoduciiya daŋkun. Ɔci ‘ya baal kanŋ moki te Ma Kiṭɔ maka yuarŋ ‘ya te woŋgu ‘ya men bɛɛy.
51002002	’Ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te yoma ñɔyan oŋkanda, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ oondi yɔtin pookɔ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan, ɔci jyeka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te baaṭi jitkɛn a coggin neeni ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan, jyeka neeniyɛ, gena Kiṭɔ waanɛ.
51002003	Jyek ñing tɛɛn bɛɛn te ɛkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena jiek ŋeejɛ waakɛnda.
51002004	’Ya ɛkkɛ myennin a ɔɔn aŋka naa ma gɛɛg ɛkkɛ maaltɛ ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ te lɛmma milan bɛɛ.
51002005	Ne ‘ya baawa ɛkkɛti te war ‘ya waanɛ jiñɛyɛ, ‘ya baal ba ne ikin balkin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ te booŋ no. Ɔci ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te yɔɔdda ɛkkɛ yɔɔnnɛ ne tɛyan te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti neeni.
51002006	Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Yaccu muŋŋɛ yomgɔti doki aŋi Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan ɛkɛti oŋkanda ɔɔn.
51002007	Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba jana bɛɛkkɛ ati iñɔ ne pwadan. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te jyek ɛkɛ. Dala jyeni ɛkkɛ tɛya gɔ moki tɛyi ɔɔn te jyek ɛkɛ, ba naŋka ɛkkɛ lallɛ Ɛpaprac te ñamu wanna ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ a pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda te jyeka neeni.
51002008	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ maka loṭi ma te Jwaŋa Tolan amaam te jyeka pookɛn neeni bɛɛ. Jyeka lorki ɛkkɛn ma neeni a jyek naŋki ma baan ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti wɛnni budan. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ acaan jyeka neeni bɛɛn te Kiṭɔti bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn pɛɛdan i jyek Kiṭɔ.
51002009	Juaŋ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora warda ikinti te lali Kiṭɔ oŋŋa ɛkɛ aŋŋi men baan, ɔci baali ciyin iki ikin ba men baany.
51002010	Ɔci acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔ dokiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balkɛ coodda pwadin waakɛnda. Gɔṭṭɛ, Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn jɔkin waakɛnda, ɔci moki ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn ḍuaŋan waakɛnda.
51002011	Ɛkkɛ maka bala Yaccutiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balkɛ jyek ŋwoti daŋkun. Yeti jyek ŋwotta neeniyɛ, gena naŋka naŋtan ma te byeŋkɛn bɛɛ. Gena naŋka naŋdɛ Kiṭɔ ma yomgɛnti, ɔci naŋka neeni aŋka yɔmjin acaan yomg ɛkkɛ yomga te baaṭi neeniyɛ, eññɛ ɛkɛ ɔntɔ doki.
51002012	Ɔci ba jyek bulti ɛkkɛyɛ, bala ba jyek lyen ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Lyen Yaccu aŋi ba lyen ɛkkɛ, ɔci jɔŋŋin ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔyɛ, aŋi ba jɔŋŋin ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Naŋka neeni bala ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ tolla tollo. Yaccu luolnɛ ɛkɛ ñaalɔ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
51002013	Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba maka tuutan te nɔji ɛkkɛ. Ɔci yomga yeyin eññɛ Kiṭɔ men bɛɛ. Yeti acca ɛkkɛ unnɛ iki Kiṭɔ a cyɛɛlɔ te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛti. Ikin bɔɔŋnin ɛkɛ te nɔji ikin waakɛnda.
51002014	Ikin noŋŋin nɔji waakida, ɔci jiek dɔɔkkin ikin wyetkɔti te nɔjja neeni, ɔci yeti jyeka neeni nuunnɛ ɔntɔ Juaŋ te ikinti te oŋŋa Yaccu tuuni ñaalɔ kakantiy.
51002015	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannati ɔɔn daŋkunyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋa Yaayan buannɛ i ma ɛkɛ. Gɔṭṭɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan oŋ warɛ jaaññɛ bala lɔti ɛkkɛn te wyeng ba kɛɛnka kwayɛ ma te nona loonan. Ɛkɛ bala lɔti ɛkkɛn malɛɛkan ñomgɛnti.
51002016	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, ne ɛkkɛ tiecɛ waka neeni waakɛn bɛɛyɛ, naa menga wooki ɛkkɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ wanna bɛɛ. Waka neeni gena waka tiitanyɔ Ma Yahuudy, ɔci waka neeniyɛ, gena ami oomdin gɛɛg ɔci waka maattan ma gɛɛg, ɔci iidn Ma Yahuud, ɔci iid paan waŋɛ oŋkanda, ɔci Oŋ Cabit. Naa menga wooki ɛkkɛ te waka neeni bɛɛ.
51002017	Naŋki tiit ninka neeniyɛ, bala ba ṭiebji naŋka bɛyay. Ɔci naŋka bɛya neeniyɛ, gena Kiṭɔ. Jyek ɛkɛ aŋka awarɛ, dala tiitinyɔ.
51002018	Naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ma ɔntɔ te malla awarɛti neeni bɛɛ, acaan ma gɛɛg poŋi gɔki agi waka yuarɛ ɛkkɛn te loggin neeniyɛ, a jyeka awarɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka neeni buagɔn ɛkkɛ waakɔ dɔɔdɛ iñɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛ mortɛ malɛɛkanti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala poŋi amaam budan, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍwaŋgin.
51002019	Ɔci ɛkkɛn kɛpcin ɔntɔ yookɔn te jyek Kiṭɔ wyeñ kaniica. Ma kaniica aga maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te wyeñ ɛkkɛn neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘uotti ñamu, ɔci kaniica naŋdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan tɛya te Kiṭɔ.
51002020	Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ, naa ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba ne ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni moki bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ tyeŋɛ jyeka naŋtan ma iñɔ ṭɛɛrji baanji moki bɛɛ. Acaan te oŋŋa ɛkkɛ tuunɛ iki Kiṭɔyɛ, paŋŋa bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji, ɛkɛ a paŋi ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ. Maka iñɔ wɛnni ɛkkɛn gɔki agi,
51002021	“Naa i gena neeni luolla ñaalɔ bɛɛ.” Ɔci moki agi, “Naa i topci gena neeniti bɛɛ.” Ɔci moki agi, “Naa i dɛcca gena neeni bɛɛ.” Naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.
51002022	Naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka dɛɛki Ma Yahuud te naŋki waka coŋin wanna bɛɛ. Acaan waka neeni ɛkkɛn a waka baadi lakun budan ne ikin noŋin ɛkkɛny. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jiek ṭɔlgɛn naŋɛ ɛkkɛn te waka neen neeni bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ jyeka neeni bɛɛ. Yeti jyeka neeni naŋɛ ɛkkɛn pookɛn a jyek ma baan budan.
51002023	Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛn wanna bɛɛ, acaan jyeka wanna ma naŋtan noŋdi nɔji ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn yomga yeyin wanna buagɛ men ɔɔn, ɔci moki ba bolja ɛkkɛn balki poŋki agi ma ñingɛn tɛyɔ te naŋki jyeka neeni ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn poŋi ‘wota gɔkɛ agi kan ɛkkɛn waakɛn dɔɔdinti iñɔ Jwaŋa Tolan ñamdanti, ɔci moki agi kan ɛkkɛn waakɛn jyebdinti jitin te nɔji ɛkkɛn, ɔci agi kan ɛkkɛn mortɛnti Juaŋti ba naŋki ma ɛkkɛnyɛ, agi a ɔɔn ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛyɔ katan.
51003001	Gɔṭṭɛ, dala yomg ɛkkɛ buagdɛ jyek waka bala ñaalɔ nona ciyi Kiṭɔy. Acaan ɛkkɛ jɔŋnɛ ñaalɔ iki Yaccu Kiṭɔ a cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkɛ bala ciyi Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti taaŋŋa byerɔn acaan ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a Ciɛggɔn Tolan.
51003002	Ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jyek waka bala ñaalɔ neeni. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jyek naŋka naŋtan ma yeyin iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji bɛɛ.
51003003	Acaan ɛkkɛ tuunɛ doki, ɔci tɛɛtin ɛkkɛ tɛɛtin Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, bala Juaŋti.
51003004	Kiṭɔ mena tɛɛtin ikin neeniyɛ, ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdi warɛ lɛɛldɛ borayɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ daŋkun baldɛ ba ɛkɛ te pwani ɛkɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji.
51003005	Yomg ɛkkɛ yomga te baaṭi neeniyɛ, dala nogdɛ tuwa baadi. Naŋki yoma te baaṭi neeniyɛ, gena tomi, ɔci wɛlji, ɔci yoma ulan, ɔci tomi maka ‘uayiti, ɔci bwakti naŋka yeyin neeni, ɔci war ḍiŋŋo, ɔci yom ḍɔŋ te waako. Mena buagɔn wak mena parɛ naŋki ɛkɛ bala ba mali jɔkin yeyin, waka pɔɔtan ma a pɔɔto.
51003006	Naŋka yeyin neeniyɛ, etti ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan maka noŋi naŋka neeniti.
51003007	Ne ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ Ma Kiṭɔ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ ba coodda yaayan neeni ɔɔn.
51003008	Yeti accayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te loñko, ɔci kon cyɛñño, ɔci yom yoño, ɔci waaŋi maka pookɛn. Naa jyeka yeyin bala ɛkkɛ tuggɔti bɛɛ.
51003009	Naa ɛkkɛ joommɛ yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ waka neeni moki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ yoma te baaṭi neeni olnɛ ɔntɔ iki naŋki ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
51003010	Ɔci acaan ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan yoma woonɛ, ɔci yoma woonɛ neeni ciɛñ a ciɛñi gɔ moki ciɛñji ñamu ɔɔn ne ɛkɛ Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ne pwadan ɔɔn. Yoma neeni warɛ agdɛ aga ba mena oki ɛkiy.
51003011	Kan yoma woonɛ neeni bala ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ menga yaakinti gɔkti moki agi Keedin Pookɛn aŋka pwadgɔ, walla Ma Yahuud pwadgɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci walla menga gɔkti agi maka balki jyek ŋwoti ɔci bɔɔrk aŋka pwadgɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci walla menga gɔkti agi maka ani ṭwaŋ oŋ aŋi Ma Kiṭɔ neeni, ɔci walla agi maka kɛɛnk aŋka pwadgɔ bɛɛ. Acaan Kiṭɔ bala ikinti waakida. Ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛn bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ waakɛnda. Yeti Kiṭɔ aŋka bala ñamu ne tolan te waak waakɛnda.
51003012	Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora aŋŋɛ ma ɛkɛ maka anɛ ɛkiy. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ bala mati. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan mati. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ waakɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ tuggɔ luucin. Dala ɛkkɛ loomgɔ tɛɛcin. Dala ɛkkɛ bɔyyɛ yɔtin pookɔ. Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti balki jwali gɛɛl te naŋki mena parɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ mena parɛ neeni bɔɔktɛ. Bala ba ne ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ maka pookɛn neeni bɔɔktɛ daŋkun.
51003014	Jwali gɛɛl bala ñamu agi dala ɛkkɛ oonji yɔtin pookɔ. Ɔci te jyek oonnin ɛkkɛ oonni yɔtin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti coodɛ a cyɛɛlɔ ne pwadan oŋkanda ɔɔn.
51003015	Dala coodi pwani bɛya te Kiṭɔti neeni aga ba ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛ yomgɔti. Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora aŋka ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te coodi pwani waakida. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ Juaŋti a pwatcin oŋkanda.
51003016	Dala jyek Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti ne pwadan oŋkanda ɔɔn. Dala ɛkkɛ loordɛ yɔtin pookɔ te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ ṭeewɛ yɔtin pookɔ te ñing tɛɛno. Dala ɛkkɛ ‘ualdɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jieddɛ ɛkɛ te jyek ɔɔlgo, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ‘ualdɛ ɔɔlga loṭi Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan may. Ɔci gɔktɛ a pwatcin Juaŋti te yoma awarɛ.
51003017	Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ gengayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu. Ɔci moki kan ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ gengayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ a pwatcin te yenti Yaccu Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolanti.
51003018	Moongo, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛ. A ɔɔn pwatcin Ciɛggɔnti.
51003019	’Uayo, dala ɛkkɛ andɛ moong ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ ɛkkɛn ɔɔrndɛ a ɔɔrŋin bɛɛ.
51003020	Kɛɛgin, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek mɛyyɔ ɔci ba jyek weyyɔ. A ɔɔn pwatcin Ciɛggɔnti.
51003021	Kɛɛgin weyyɛn ɔci mɛyyɛn, naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ ‘yeṭɛ kɛɛginti a ñaccu ɔɔn nɔñji bɛɛ. Kɛɛgin yomgɛn tuwa dita.
51003022	Hay, maka kɛɛnko! Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek kanŋa weyyɛn iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji oŋkanda. Naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa ne pwadan te kanŋa weyyɛn ñingɛnti budan aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi ɛkkɛ pwadjɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ te yoma awarɛ, ɔci buattɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
51003023	Ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ kanŋa neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋɛ te yoma awarɛ, ɔci poŋdɛ kanŋa neeni a kanŋa Kiṭɔ. Gena kanŋa ma baan budan bɛɛ.
51003024	Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ gena Ciɛggɔn ikin ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ gena ma ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ neeni ne baaṭi te kanŋa ɛkkɛ neeni, acaan kanŋa weegɛn waanɛyɛ, gena Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
51003025	Kan men gɛɛl noŋi ne yaayan, kan ɛkɛ a mena ḍiɛran walla kan ɛkɛ a mena daanyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan jiek oldɛ ɛkɛ wyeñɛti ɔɔn.
51004001	Kanŋa weyyɛn, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan kɛɛnk ɛkkɛti. Naa ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛn amdɛji bɛɛ. Acaan ɛkkɛ daŋkun balkɛ Weya gɔṭi ɛkkɛ ñaalɔ daŋkun.
51004002	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ cɔktɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te cɔŋi ɛkkɛ oŋkanda. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin ɛkɛti.
51004003	Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ cɔktɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ɔɔn daŋkun. Dala ɔɔn noŋdɔn Juaŋ pɔy aŋka ɔɔn mietɔn ma te jyeka pwadin. Gena jyek Kiṭɔ mena cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan yuoci ma, jyeka bɛɛn bora acca neeni. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ‘ya Buuluc acaan ‘ya baal ciginji te jyeka neeni.
51004004	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti aŋka ‘ya jiek owwa bora ne pwadan mati ba bolja Jwaŋa Tolan buagɛy.
51004005	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ ɔci te jyek ɛkkɛ, ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ gɔwwɛ iki maka pookɛn maka ciyi budan te jyek Jwaŋa Tolany. Dala wɔɔkan ṭɔlgɛn yuardɛ ɛkkɛyɛ, oldɛ loṭi ɛkkɛ ma waakɛnda.
51004006	Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ maka neeniti te lɛmma pwadan oŋkanda. Naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ amaam budan bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jiek ñamu oŋ ɛkkɛ oŋ ṭwoktɛ mati te jyeka tootti ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛti te Kiṭɔ neeni.
51004007	Ɛkkɛ nɔɔttɛ Ticcikoc te jyek ‘ya waakɛnda. Ticcikoc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mod ikin moda ana ‘yay. Ɛkɛ a mena tieci kanŋan waakɛn. Ɛkɛ bala kanŋin iki ‘ya a cyɛɛlɔ te kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan.
51004008	’Ya ɛkɛ cuoñña ɛkkɛti acaan ‘ya buaga dala ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɛkɛ te jyek ɔɔn aŋka dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya te jyek ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti.
51004009	Ɛkkɛn bɛya iki Ɔnɛɛcimac. Ɔnɛɛcimacyɛ, bala tieci kanŋan ɛkɛ waakɛn ‘yati daŋkun. Ɛkɛ a mod ikin acca, ‘ya an ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ a maka ban ɛkkɛ. Maka neeni yaakkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ myettɛ te jyek ɔɔn waakɛnda.
51004010	Mod ikin Erictaarkoc mena balgin iki ‘ya ciginji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Ɔci Mark ñaakan Barnabac ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ban ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ ñiibdɛ ne pwadan ba bolja ‘ya ɛkkɛ myennin te jyek ɛkɛ dokiy.
51004011	Jicac mena bartan ma agi Jactac neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun. Maka ḍokkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a Ma Kiṭɔ maka a Ma Yahuud. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala kanŋin iki ‘ya te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkkɛn ‘ya makka ne pwadan, ma ɔɔn Ma Yahuud maka pookɛn gɛɛg bala moki wɛnni bɛɛ.
51004012	Ɛpaprac men ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ ne tolan. Ɛkɛ a mena noŋi kanŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda ne tolan agi dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔdjɛ ne tɛyan, ɔci agi dala ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ ŋeejjɛ ne pwadan, ɔci agi dala yomg ɛkkɛ bwagda naŋki yom Juaŋo.
51004013	Naŋki ɛkɛ ŋeej ‘ya ne ɛkɛ baali kanŋi kanŋa Juaŋ ne tolan ɛkkɛti, ɔci ne ɛkɛ baali kanŋi maka pookɛnti daŋkuny. Gena Ma Kiṭɔ maka ban Lɛyoduciiya ɔci ban Yarɔɔpolic.
51004014	Luuk mena a kiimi mena anin ikin, ɛkkɛn yaakkɛn i Dimacyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ.
51004015	Dala ɛkkɛ maka ban Lɛyoduciiya ñiibdɛ te ‘ya. Ɔci Nimpac ñiibdɛ te ‘ya daŋkun iki maka ḍwoṭi wyetkɛn on ɛkɛ te jyek Juaŋy.
51004016	Ne ɛkkɛ ḍoodɛ te paŋi worga ‘yayɛ, dala ɛkɛ paktan ma kaniicati ban Lɛyoduciiya. Ɔci worga bɛɛn te ban Lɛyoduciiyayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poktɛ ɛkɛ daŋkun.
51004017	Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ Arkippocti agi dala ɛkɛ waŋɛ tiittɛ te kanŋa ɛkɛ kanŋa ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Kiṭɔy.
51004018	Gena ‘ya Buuluc kiewan jwali ṭɔɔlɛ neeni ɛkkɛti te byeŋ ‘ya paru neeni, aŋka ‘ya ñiep ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ ñingɔ yeya te ‘ya ciginji wɛnni bɛɛ, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ‘ya! Dala Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti.
52001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc ɔci Cila ɔci Timutawuc ñiepɔn ɛkkɛ ma kaniica ban Tacalunika neeni. Ɛkkɛ agɛ ma Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ma Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Dala ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ coodi pwani ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti.
52001002	Ɔɔn gɔkɔn a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛ. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn
52001003	acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ naŋka pwadan jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ kanŋɛ kanŋa Juaŋ acaan ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan ne ɛkkɛ jyettɛ balgi kɛɛyɛ oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiy. Ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn gɔkɔn te naŋki ɛkkɛ neeni oŋkanda Juaŋ ñamɛti.
52001004	Modg ɔɔn, ŋeejɔn ɔɔn Juaŋ ani ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora aŋka agdɛ ma ɛkɛ.
52001005	Acaan ne ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ennɔn jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn gɔkɔn te jyek tuggɔ budan bɛɛ. Ɔɔn noŋɔn te naŋki Juaŋ naŋka tɛyan neeni, ɔci te Boŋ Juaŋ daŋkun. Ɔci ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ne pwadan jyeka loṭṭɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛ wanna a jyeka awarɛ. Ɔci coodda cienɔn ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ waayiti ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ coodi ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ aŋan wanna ɛkkɛ magdɛ.
52001006	Ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ lɔkɛ naŋki ɔɔn, ɔci naŋki Ciɛggɔn ikin daŋkun. Acaan ne taab bɛɛni ɛkkɛti ne tolan te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔnnɛ te jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te Boŋ Juaŋo.
52001007	Ma Kiṭɔ maka ban Macɛdɔɔnya ɔci maka ban Akeeyayɛ, kan ɛkkɛn lɔkti ba naŋki ɛkkɛ ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin daŋkun.
52001008	Te naŋki ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ ati ban Macɛdɔɔnya konɛti ɔci ban Akeeya konɛti. Jyek Juaŋ bala ban Macɛdɔɔnyati ɔci ban Akeeyati pookɛn bɛɛ. Bala bonka pookɛnti waakɛnda daŋkun, ɔci ma tieŋŋin agi ɛkkɛ jyetcɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn mietɔn ma te jyek ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛ. Acaan jyek ɛkkɛ ŋeecɔn ma doki.
52001009	Maka tieŋŋin jyek ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala mieti ɔɔn agi ne ikin balkin iki ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ɛkkɛ mwonjɛ te mali jɔkin yeyin neeni. Ɔci agi ɛkkɛ morcɛ gena Jwaŋa Tolanti pardan. Gena Jwaŋa ciyi tɛɛti Jwaŋa awarɛy.
52001010	Ɔci ɔɔn myetkɔn ɛkkɛn agi ɛkkɛ baljɛ kɛɛjjɛ oŋŋa Kaci ɛkta bɛɛdda te ñaalɔ pɔlijiy. Gena Yaccu mena luolnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te lientiy. Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena yuoci ikin te ywobji Juaŋ ywobja bɛya ne baaṭi ma wyetkɛntiy.
52002001	Modg ɔɔn, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ te coodda cienɔn ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, eccin naŋka pwadan ɛkkɛti.
52002002	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamu ne ɔɔn balgɔn ban Pilibbiyɛ, taab bala ɔɔnti. Ma bala noŋi ne yaayan ɔɔnti. Yeti ɔɔn buayɔn bɛɛ. Ɔɔn yomgɔ tɛy tɛy te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɔɔn bɛɛnɔn ban ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn mietɔn ɛkkɛ te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin te Jwaŋa Tolan ne ma yookɔn te ɔɔn ɔɔn.
52002003	Ɔɔn loṭɔn ma oŋkanda te jyeka awarɛ neeni ɔci te yoma pwadan. Ɔɔn noŋɔn ma ñingɛn bɛɛ.
52002004	Ɔɔn ‘wonnɔn Jwaŋa Tolan kanŋa miti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka ɔɔn loṭɔn ma neeni. Ɔɔn buagɔn dala jyeka loṭɔn ɔɔn ma neeniyɛ, pwaddi aŋa Juaŋti parɛ. Ɔɔn buagɔn jyek ɔɔn pwaddi ma baanti bɛɛ. A’a, aŋa Juaŋti parɛ. Acaan ɛkɛ poci ikin a poccin aŋka gɔrti ne ikin yomgɔ balki a ɔkiy.
52002005	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ, ɔci ŋeejɛ Juaŋ moki, ɔɔn gɔkɔn dyetɔn ɛkkɛ ñingɔ te lɛmma milan bɛɛ. Ɔɔn buagɔn wak ɛkkɛ eedɔn ɔɔn bɛɛ. A’a.
52002006	Kan maka cundɛ Yaccu jiɛtan mayɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin doki. Ɔɔn agɔn cuudan Yaccu, yeti ɔɔn buagɔn naa ma jieyi ɔɔn bɛɛ. Kan a ɛkkɛ ɔci kan walla a mena parɛyɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn menga jieddi ɔɔn bɛɛ.
52002007	Ne ikin balkin iki ɔɔnyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn gɔṭɔn ɛkkɛ ne pwadan ba ɛŋa gɔṭi kɛɛgin ɛkɛ ne pwadany.
52002008	Acaan yomg ɔɔn bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ eekkɛ ɔɔn jyek Juaŋ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn poŋɔn gɔkɔn agi kan ɔɔn tuudɔn te kanŋa neeniyɛ, baatɔ. A ɔɔn aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ɔɔn anɔn ɛkkɛ ne tolan awarɛ.
52002009	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ ñingɔ ñiektɛ te kanŋa kanŋɔn ɔɔn ban ɛkkiy. Ɔci te kanŋa neeniyɛ, taab dɔɔkkin ɔɔn waakɔti acaan ɔɔn balgɔn kanŋɔn te ween jiñɛ ɔci te oŋ jiñɛ aŋka ɔɔn yɔɔrdɔn waka amdɔn ɔɔn. Ɔɔn balgɔn loṭɔn ɛkkɛ te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin, ɔci ɔɔn buagɔn naa coodi ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ wanna bɛya ɛkkɛti a taab bɛɛ.
52002010	Ɛkkɛ ɔɔn yuarŋɔntɔ ne ɔɔn balgɔn ciyɔn a ɔkiy. Ɔci coodda ciyin ɔɔn neeniyɛ, ŋeejɛ Juaŋ daŋkun. Naŋki ɔɔn pwad pwad ɛkkɛti maka jyeti Juaŋti neeni. Gena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɔɔn ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ.
52002011	Ɛkkɛ ɔɔn ŋeejɔntɔ ne ɔɔn balgɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛ waakɔ waakiday, bala ba kɛɛgin weegɛn ne ṭeyi kɛɛgin waakɛny.
52002012	Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora, ɔci aŋŋɛ ma ɛkɛ, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn cyeŋɔn ɛkkɛ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba coodda ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔyɛy.
52002013	Ɔɔn gɔkɔn a pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda te ɛkkɛ, acaan ne ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek Juaŋ te tuk ɔɔntiyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni muŋŋɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ gɔŋnɛ agi jyeka neeniyɛ, a jyek ma baan budan bɛɛ. Gena jyek Jwaŋa Tolan. Awarɛ, jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyek Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci jyeka neeni bala kanŋan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti doki.
52002014	Hay! Ɛkkɛ modg ɔɔn, taab bɛɛn ɛkkɛti te ma ɛkkɛti neeni bala ba taab bɛɛn ma kaniicanti ban Yahuudiya ne Ma Yahuud ma ɛkkɛn woodgɛn balki noŋki ne yaayan ɛkkɛntiy.
52002015	Ma Yahuudyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan ban ɛkkɛn nokkitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn oŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ nogɛ moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɔɔn ŋualkɔn ɔntɔ te bonk ɛkkɛnti. Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn te Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci yookɔn te ma baan waakɛnda moki.
52002016	Ma Yahuud, ɛkkɛn dɛyi ɔɔn agi naa ɔɔn lorcɔn Keedin Pookɛn te jyek Yaccu bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn buagɔn naa Keedin Pookɛn neeni yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ. Nɔji ɛkkɛn tola gɔ moki toli ɔɔn, ɔci acca toli doki, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn ɛkkɛn ḍɔɔggɛnti doki.
52002017	Modg ɔɔn, te ninka ne ḍiɛkan neeniyɛ, ikin balkin iki ɔɔn bɛɛ. Yeti te paŋi ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ne ikin balkin iki ɔɔn doki no. Ɔɔn ñingɔ boŋi te ɛkkɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn ikin yɔɔrtin iki ɔɔn. Ɔɔn noŋɔn bɛɛdɔn ḍieŋdɔn ɛkkɛti,
52002018	yeti pɔya ɔɔn bɛɛdɔn ḍieŋdɔn ɛkkɛti neeni ga bala bɛɛ. Pɔya neeniyɛ, uullɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan. Ɔci ‘ya Buuluc neeniyɛ, ‘ya baal poc te jyek woon oŋkanda paru, yeti pɔy baawo.
52002019	Hay! Oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi ɛkɛ ñamɛti te gena yeti? Ɛɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔgdi ɛkɛ ñamɛti te ɛkkɛ.
52002020	Acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ maka ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔki oŋkanday.
52003001	Ɔci ne ɔɔn ñingɔ bokki ne pɛñanyɛ, ɔɔn jiek naŋŋɔn ka dala mod ikin Timutawuc, ɛkɛ aŋka bɛya ban ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɔɔn aŋka yaddɔn pookɔ te ban Atɛnicji. Ɛkɛ bɛɛn ɛkkɛti ɔci dɔɔkkin wɛnni acca doki. Timutawuc neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala kanŋin iki ɔɔn te jyek Kiṭɔ. Ɛkɛ cuondɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti aŋka dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ṭeediyɔ aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Kiṭɔti neeni.
52003003	Yeti taab ɛkkɛ bala acca tolcin te naŋka noŋki ma ne yaayan ɛkkɛti wanna, ɔci ɔɔn buagɔn naa men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti dɔɔdi ŋoyɔ jyeni ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛ. Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda ɛkkɛn balki taab a ɔɔn daŋkun.
52003004	Ne ikin balkin iki ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn doki ka taab bala bɛya, ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ taab bɛɛn doki ba jyeka guaŋŋɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti te ñamu neeni.
52003005	Ɔci bala ba ‘ya gɔkkan doki ka ne ɔɔn ñingɔ bokki te ɛkkɛ ne pɛñanyɛ, ‘ya Timutawuc cuoññan ɛkkɛti, acaan ‘ya buaga tieŋŋa te coodi ɛkkɛ te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ne coodi ɛkkɛ baali a ɔkiy. ‘Ya buay ‘ya baal poŋ ka ɛkkɛ maaldɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan mena mooṭi ma neeni dita. Ɔci ‘ya poŋ gɔk ka dita kanŋa ɔɔn aga kanŋa budan dita.
52003006	Ɔci Timutawuc, bɛɛn wɛnni dɔɔkkin nona ɔɔnti doki. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɔɔn eeŋnɔn jyeka pwadin te jyek jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti, ɔci te jyek anna ɛkkɛ anɛ may. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkkɛ baljɛ poŋjɛ te ɔɔn daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi ɛkkɛ ñingɔ boŋŋɔ te ɔɔn daŋkun ba ɔɔn ne ñingɔ bokki te ɛkkɛ ɔɔn daŋkuny.
52003007	Hay! Modg ɔɔn, taab ɔɔn tol tolo. Yeti te jyeka oonɛ Timutawuc te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ne pwadan neeniyɛ, ɔɔn yomgɔ pwani doki.
52003008	Ɛɛ, kan ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin a ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwad pwad ɔɔnti ne tolan, ɔɔn yomgɔ noki waakɛn te genga moki bɛɛ.
52003009	’Ya gɔkca Juaŋti a pwatcin te ɛkkɛ a ɔki yeti? Acaan ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn te ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ñamɛti.
52003010	Oŋkandayɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ ne tolan. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti te oŋ jiñɛ a ñaccu, ɔci te ween jiñɛ a ñaccu. Acaan ɔɔn buagɔn dala ikin yɔɔrtin iki ɔɔn, kan jyeka tɛyan gɛɛg balayɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ makti ɔɔn aŋka jyeni ɛkkɛ ‘uotti ñamu.
52003011	Wey ikin waanɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccuyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ɔɔn pɔktɔn pɔy aŋka ɔɔn bɛɛdɔn ɛkkɛti.
52003012	Dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ ne tolan, ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛ andɛ ma waakɛnda daŋkun bala ba anna ɔɔn anɔn ɛkkɛ neeni daŋkun ɔɔn.
52003013	Ɔci te naŋka neeniyɛ, dala nɔji baaw ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ te naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya te naŋki Juaŋ ɛkkɛti aŋka ne oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛti iki ma ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti yɔɔddɛ ne pwadan Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.
52004001	Yɔɔddɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ‘wota hay! Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛ ne tolan te jwali gɛɛl te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn te coodda pwadan coodi Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ a ɔɔn, ɔci ɔɔn gɔkɔn ɛkkɛti ka dala ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu gɔ moki ‘uoccɛ ñamu ɔɔn te coodi Juaŋo.
52004002	Jyeka ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccuyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ.
52004003	Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn agi dala ɛkkɛ ciejjɛ budan te nɔjjo. Ɔci moki agi dala ma mwondɔ te naŋki tomi waakcinda.
52004004	Maka ‘uayo, Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ, menga da ciya ɛŋ ɛkɛ aŋka tiidɛyɔ ne pwadan.
52004005	Ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ waak ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ tomi bɛɛ. Maka jyek Juaŋ kwoyɔn, maka kɛɛna pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka noŋi tommo, yeti ɛkkɛyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.
52004006	Naa men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayan ɛŋ moodɛnti bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayan ɛŋ moodɛntiyɛ, bala ba ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan mod ɛkkɛnti doki. Ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn doki, ɔci moki ɛkkɛ ṭeekɛ ɔɔn te ñamu ka maka noŋi ba naŋka neeniyɛ, ywobji Juaŋ bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti ne tolan.
52004007	Ɛɛ, gɔṭṭɛ, ikin muonin Juaŋ bora aŋka noŋin tomi bɛɛ. Yeti ikin muonin ɛkɛ bora aŋka ikin cietin ne pwadan ɛkɛti.
52004008	Kan men gɛɛl yookɔn warɛ te tiid jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyek men baan ɛkɛ yookiti warɛ wanna bɛɛ. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ yookiti warɛ wanna. Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, gena ɛkɛ ‘woñi ɛkkɛ te Boŋ ɛkɛ, Boŋa Pwadan neeni.
52004009	Yeti te jyek oonnin Ma Kiṭɔ oonnin labjɛ baaw neeniyɛ, men gɛɛl ɛkkɛ kiegdɛ worga te jyek oonnin yɔtin neeni moki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ lallɛ Juaŋ te jyek oonnin yɔtin neeni doki.
52004010	Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ anɛ Ma Kiṭɔ modga ban ɛkkɛ ban Macɛdɔɔnya waakɛnda baan konɛ warda. Ɔɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛ ka dala ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu ne tolan te ani ɛkkɛ a ‘uoccin gɔ moki ‘uoccɛ ñamu ɔɔn.
52004011	Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki waak ɛkkɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ te byeŋkɔ menga da te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ ba jyeka ɛkkɛ ṭeeki ɔɔn te ñamu neeni.
52004012	Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛ pwada maka ciyi budan te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ñomgɛnti. Ɔci moki te kanŋa ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ buagɛ ñwoyɛ maka pookɛn waakɛn te waak gɛɛg moki bɛɛ.
52004013	Acca hay! Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn buagɔn dala jyek Ma Kiṭɔ maka tuwa ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan. Acaan ɔɔn buagɔn naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi kuuyɛ ba maka pookɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti jyeti kɛɛy naŋka pwadin naŋka bɛya ɛkkɛnti ne ŋoyɔ neeni bɛɛ.
52004014	Ɛɛ, ikin jyettin jiek agi Yaccu tuunɔ ɔci jɔŋnɔ ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki. Ɔci ba naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti jyettin moki agi Ma Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛn luoldɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ te kolk jitin te naŋki Yaccu neeni ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdɛy.
52004015	Ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin ka ikin maka ciyi tɛɛti men neeniyɛ, ne oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn bɛɛdiyɛ, ikin bottin ñamu kooktin i ɛkɛ ñamu te maka tuun neeni bɛɛ. A’a, ikin oottin iki ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ.
52004016	Ne malɛɛka tolan gɛɛl yaaddi te pwana tolanyɛ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan kuotti ṭuoŋ oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ, acaan Ciɛggɔn ikin koodi iñɔ te pɔliji. Ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ maka tuunyɛ, ɛkkɛn jɔldi ñaalɔ te kolk jitin tɛɛti moki.
52004017	Ɔci ikin maka tɛɛtin baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ikin oŋ oottin ñaalɔ oŋ iki maka jɔŋdi ñaalɔ te lienti neeniy, ɔci ikin waakida oottin pɔliji, ɔci kooktin iki Ciɛggɔn pɔliji. Ɔci ikin cietin iki ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn.
52004018	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ma ɛkkɛ tuutiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka neeni, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ muondɛ jitin pookɔ te joono.
52005001	Gɔṭṭɛ modg ɔɔn, jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, men gɛɛl yaakinti kiedi worga ɛkkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ myettɛ te oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛdi moki bɛɛ.
52005002	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne Oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛya lieda ba mena ɛɛn ɔɔn.
52005003	Maka pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieki gɔki agi haldu, gena yaayɔ gɛɛl bɛɛdɔ ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn balki poŋki ba paŋŋa wanna men ɔɔnyɛ, Yaccu bɛya dɛndi bora ne pɛñan lieda ɔɔn. Ɔci ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ɛkkɛnti ɛkkɛn yuurdɛ ñin, ɔci pɔya yooŋti ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ gɛɛl bala moki bɛɛ. Bala ba ɛɛŋ ne amɛ jiediyɛ, kaci bɛya ne pɛñan te wɔɔka kwoyi ɛkɛ, ɔci pɔya ɛkɛ tuoci warɛ te jiedi gɔ bala bɛɛ.
52005004	Modg ɔɔn, ɛkkɛ balgɛ nona mielti ba maka pookɛn neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci ne oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛ poddɛ ba ma ne potki te naŋki mena ɛɛn neeni bɛɛ.
52005005	Ɛkkɛ waakida agɛ maka ciyi te nona bɔwan. Ɛkkɛ jiek kwoyɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ jiek ŋeejɛ. Ikinyɛ, akin maka ciyi te nona ulan bɛɛ.
52005006	Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ikin cietin amaam ba coodi maka pookɛn bɛɛ. Dala ikin woŋgɔ tiittin oŋkanda te coodi ikin.
52005007	Maka wiciyɛ, ɛkkɛn wici te ween jiñɛ. Ɔci moki, maka noktan mooyyɛ, ɛkkɛn noktan mooy te ween jiñɛ. Ɔci ba jyek naŋka naŋtan ma te ween jiñɛ neeniyɛ, ɔci bala ba jyek coodda cieki maka jiek ŋeecɔn bɛɛy. Ɛkkɛn ciyi te nona ulan.
52005008	Ikinyɛ, aŋka akin maka ciyi te nona bɔwan. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin jyettin Juaŋti ne pwadan oŋkanda. Ɔci dala ikin anin Juaŋ i ma baano. Ɔci kan ikin noŋtin a ɔɔnyɛ, jyeni ikin ikin kɛɛtin ñin ba maka ooddi lañti ne ecki kɔɔrjin ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛntiy. Ɔci moki dala ikin kɛɛttin naŋki mena yuoci ikiny. Ɔci ba jyek jyenna kɛɛyin ikin yɔɔt Juaŋ te Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, bala ba taaggan a bilk ne balki maka noowɔ wyetkɛntiy.
52005009	Jyeka naŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te baaṭi gɔki agi ywobji bɛɛdɔ ikintɛ? A’a, a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ikinyɛ, gɔki agi ikin yɔɔtinti ɛkɛ te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
52005010	Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni tuun te ikin, ɔci kan ikin ciyin tɛɛtin walla kan ikin tuuninyɛ, ikin balkin tɛɛtin iki ɛkɛ men ɔɔn.
52005011	Ɔci ba ṭeena ɛkkɛ ṭeyɛ yɔtin pookɔ neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ṭeeddɛ yɔtin a ɔɔn oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan ba naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ wanna ɔɔn.
52005012	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka wɛɛyi ɛkkɛ kaniicaji maka kanŋan ne tolan te ɛkkɛ neeni. Ɛkkɛn a cyekin ɛkkɛ te kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ṭeyi ɛkkɛ.
52005013	Dala ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkkɛn ne tolan te kanŋa ɛkkɛn neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Naa ɛkkɛ yoyyɛ ñin bɛɛ.
52005014	Gɔṭṭɛ hay! Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛ kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti warɛ pɛñcin te kanŋa waakyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ ṭeedɛ wyeñɛti. Dala ɛkkɛ maka buayi ciŋdɛji aŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛya, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ maka waakɛn koyan magdɛ yomgɛnti te jieko, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ mati waakɛnda.
52005015	Kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne yaayan ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka noŋdɛ ne pwadan gena ɛkɛti. Dala ɛkkɛ moowɛ yɔtin ne pwadan oŋkanda, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan mati waakɛnda.
52005016	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn oŋkanda ɔɔn.
52005017	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti a ñaccu.
52005018	Dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin Juaŋti oŋkanda te jiek waakɛnda, acaan maka bala Yaccutiyɛ, Juaŋ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi a ɔɔn.
52005019	Naa ɛkkɛ kɛkɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
52005020	Naa ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi jyek maka lwoki ma te jyeka bɛya te Juaŋti neeni a jyeka budan bɛɛ.
52005021	Dala ɛkkɛ pottɛ gɔrtɛ jyeka neeni ne pwadan ne jyeka neeni balki ba jyek Juaŋ awarɛ boki no. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jyeka pwadin neeni mugdɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti.
52005022	Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te jyeka yeyin waakɛnda.
52005023	Jwaŋa Tolan waanɛ, mena ‘woñi ma te coodi pwaniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋki ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ. Dala Juaŋ waak ɛkkɛ ɔci paŋi ɛkkɛ ɔci yomg ɛkkɛ moki gwaldɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan ne oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Ɔci ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ mɔktɛ ɛkɛ ciyɛ ne pwadan.
52005024	Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkkɛ bornɛ aŋka agdɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tieci jyek ɛkɛ jitkɛn ne pwadan. Ɔci ɛkkɛ gwaldɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan awarɛ ba jyeka ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛy.
52005025	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ɔɔn.
52005026	Dala ɛkkɛ modg ikin ñiibdɛ waakɛnda.
52005027	’Ya gɔk ɛkkɛti te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin ka dala ɛkkɛ worga neeni pagdɛ modg ikinti waakɛnda.
52005028	Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti oŋkanda.
53001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc ɔci Cila ɔci Timutawuc, ñiepɔn ɛkkɛ ma kaniica ban Tacalunika neeni. Ɛkkɛ agɛ ma Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci ma Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
53001002	Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔci Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwani ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ yomgɔti.
53001003	Hay! Modg ɔɔn, Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ɔɔn gɔktɔn a pwatcin ɛkɛti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin. Te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya gɔ moki tɛyin ɔɔn. Ɔci moki anna ɛkkɛ oonnɛ yɔtin neeniyɛ, tola gɔ moki toli ɔɔn.
53001004	Ɔɔn balgɔn jieyɔn ɛkkɛ te yoma ñɔyan ma kaniican Juaŋti acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan ne ma balki noŋki ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiy. Ɔci moki ne taabn pookɛn balki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan.
53001005	Ne ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwatki ne taab baali ɛkkɛti men ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeecɔn ma naŋki Juaŋ pwad pwad ne ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ a ma cyɛgji ɛkɛy.
53001006	Naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan pwad pwad awarɛ. Ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkɛ jiek kɔɔktɛ maka noŋi ne yaayan ɛkkɛti neeni wyetkɛnti.
53001007	Ne oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, taab ɛkkɛ baadi ɔci taab ɔɔn moki baadi. Oŋŋa Yaccu warɛ lɛɛldɛ borayɛ, ɛkɛ bɛya te pɔliji iki malɛɛkan ḍwaŋin ɔci maaño.
53001008	Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, maka yookɔn waakɛn te jyek Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ywobji bɛya ɛkkɛnti te yookɔn ɛkkɛn yookiti waakɛn te tieŋŋin jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni.
53001009	Ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan neeni bala ɛkkɛnti yuonginda, baadi bɛɛ. Ɔci pɔya ortiti ɛkkɛn Juaŋti bala moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma ɛkɛ neeni yuartan ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ḍakcin doki.
53001010	Ɔci oŋŋa tolan oŋŋa wannayɛ, pwanna pwani ma Juaŋti waakɛnda. Ɔci maka jyeti Juaŋtiyɛ, ne oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛn jieddi ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ daŋkunyɛ, jieddi ɛkkɛ te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn neenitiy.
53001011	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɛkkɛ oŋkanda. Ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala Juaŋ gɔkti agi ɛkkɛ pwadjɛ. Ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ ɛkɛ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ te naŋka ɛkkɛ buagɛ naŋdɛ a naŋka pwadan neeni. Acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ kanŋɛ kanŋa pwadan neeni, ɔci ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ ɛkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ kanŋa neeni cwamdɛ te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
53001012	Ɔci naŋka neeniyɛ, ɔɔn cɔkɔn Juaŋti ka dala yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ tola mati te naŋki ɛkkɛ, ɔci moki ka dala ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ te naŋki ɛkɛ. Naŋka neeni bɛya te ɛkɛti te yom pwani ɛkɛ ikinti, ɔci moki te yom pwani Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
53002001	Modg ɔɔn, ɔɔn gɔkɔn ɛkkɛti te jyek bɛɛna Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi dɔɔkti iñɔ baanji wɛnniy, ɔci te jyek oŋŋa ikin oottin kooktin iki ɛkɛy.
53002002	Kan ma gɛɛg gɔkti ɛkkɛti agi Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛnɔ dɔɔŋnɔ iñɔ baanji wɛnni dokiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ jyeka neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci moki kan men gɛɛl gɔkti ɛkkɛti agi ɛkɛ myennɛti Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te jyeka neeniyɛ, ɔci walla kan men gɛɛl gɔki budan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci moki kan men gɛɛl worga kiedɛ ɛkkɛti gɔki agi Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛnɔyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ worga neeni kiinɛ bala ba worga kienɔn ɔɔnyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jyeddɛ jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ.
53002003	Naa men gɛɛl ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ñin te jyeka neeni budan bɛɛ. Ne Yaccu bwagdɛ bɛɛnyɛ, maka coŋin lakun yooktan waakɛn ne pɛñan te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan ñamu. Ɔci moki mena bartan ma a nɔɔdɔn kaci bana yaayanyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora mati ñamu. Yeti ɛkɛ ciya yuonginda ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya ɛkɛti dɔki.
53002004	Mena neeni ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ a naŋki yyɛjjo. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkɛ toljɛ te jɔkin pookcɛn jɔkin maldi may, ɔci ɛkɛ daŋkun toljɛ te waka pookcɛn waka maldi ma waakcinday. Ɔci ɛkɛ cootti on Juaŋji, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋdi ba ɛkɛ agi Jwaŋa Tolan ɔɔn!
53002005	Ne ikin balkin iki ‘yayɛ, ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya a ɔɔn doki, ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka neeni bɛɛ?
53002006	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ mena dɛyi ɛkɛ te bɛɛna ɛkɛ bɛɛdi wɛnni neeniyɛ, bala. Ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ba oŋŋa guagdɛ Jwaŋa Tolany.
53002007	Ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala kanŋan kanŋa ɛkɛ kanŋa yaayan neeni iñɔ lieda ɔɔn, ɛkɛ waanɛ bɛya men bɛɛ. Yeti ne mena dɛyi ɛkɛ oŋkanda neeni warɛ uuttɛ ooddiyɛ, mena yookɔn te jiek waakɛnda neeni ɛkɛ oŋ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora oŋo.
53002008	Ɔci ne Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiyɛ, Mena Yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ nogdɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ te boŋ ɛkɛ tukɛ. Ɔci kanŋa ɛkɛ lɛgdɛ jitin baadi doki.
53002009	Mena Yaayan neeniyɛ, ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ balki war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Yaayan, ɔci ɛkɛ ma naŋdɛ ñin te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka tɛyan neeni.
53002010	Maka naŋdɛ ñin ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka ooddi bana maaño. Ɛkkɛn a maka yookɔn te jyeka awarɛ jyeka pwadin neeni. Gena yookin ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkkɛn ḍakti wanna.
53002011	Ɔci te yookin ɛkkɛn yookiti te jyeka awarɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn daldɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi jiek ne pwadan bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeddi gena jyeka jomginti.
53002012	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka yookɔn te jyeka awarɛ ɔci buagɔn gena jyeka yeyin neeniyɛ, jyeka neeni bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti waakɛnda ba naŋki ɛkkɛn wanna.
53002013	Ɔci ɛkkɛyɛ, ɔɔn gɔkɔn a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɛkkɛ, ɔci a ɔɔn pwatcin. Modg ɔɔn, Juaŋ ani ɛkkɛ ne tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora ñamu acaan ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ buagɔn ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ɛkɛ agdɛ maka pwadin te naŋki Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ yomgɔti, ɔci te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ jyeka awarɛ neeniti.
53002014	Ne ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora aŋka dala ɛkkɛ pwaddɛ ba Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ daŋkun.
53002015	Modg ɔɔn, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn te tugi ɔɔn neeni, ɔci te jyeka kienɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti waakɛnda neeni.
53002016	Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin mena ani ikin, ɔci ikin ‘wonnin yom tɛɛn ɔci kɛɛna ikin kɛɛyin te yom pwani ɛkɛ neeniyɛ,
53002017	ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ yom tɛɛno, ɔci ɛkkɛ tɛldɛ oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ɔci gɔktɛ a waka pwadin oŋkanda.
53003001	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɔɔn aŋka dala jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin ooddi mati ne pɛñan te war tɛɛn ɔci ma jyeddi ɛkɛti bala ba jiek ne bɛɛki ban ɛkkɛ wanna ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ma jieddi Juaŋ te jyeka neeni.
53003002	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka naa maka yeyin maka wyetkɛn baaw neeni noŋdi ne yaayan ɔɔnti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn waakɛnda jyeti Juaŋti men bɛɛ.
53003003	Yeti Ciɛggɔn ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tieci jyek ɛkɛ waakɛn. Ɔci ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ war tɛɛno. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ te Jwaŋa Yaayan.
53003004	Ɔɔn poŋɔn aŋa Juaŋti parɛ gɔkɔn ka Jwaŋa Tolan bala moki ɛkkɛ. Ɔci moki ɔɔn balgɔn poŋɔn ka ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba jyeka neeni oŋkanda ɔɔn.
53003005	Dala ɛkkɛ wɛɛdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te jyek ɛkɛ aŋka anna ɛkɛ ani ma neeniyɛ, ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya ba yom Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
53003006	Gɔṭṭɛ, hay! Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin te jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl ne cyɛɛlɔ moki te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ. Tieŋdɛ, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, maka waakɛn pɛñin te naŋki waak, ɔci maka yookɔn te jyeka loṭɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛnyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ ñoodi iki ɛkkɛn te coodi bɛɛ.
53003007	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ kan ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin. Ne ɔɔn balgɔn iki ɛkkɛ ban ɛkkɛyɛ, ɔɔn waakɔ pɛñɔ te naŋki waak bɛɛ.
53003008	Ɔɔn balgɔn omɔn wak ɛkkɛ budan bɛɛ, yeti ɔɔn balgɔn wɛɛṭɔn oomdin ɔɔn a wyɛlto. Ɔɔn balgɔn kanŋɔn ne tolan te oŋ jiñɛ ɔci te ween jiñɛ aŋka naa coodi ɔɔn ban ɛkkɛ cyɛga ɛkkɛti te jyek waka amtin bɛɛ.
53003009	Kan ɔɔn gɔktɔn ɛkkɛti ka ɔɔn ‘wondɔntɔ ɛkkɛ oomdinyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ bɛɛ. Yeti ɔɔn kanŋɔn te byeŋkɔ a ɔɔn acaan ɔɔn buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba naŋki ɔɔn neeni.
53003010	Ne ɔɔn balgɔn iki ɛkkɛ ban ɛkkɛyɛ, ɔɔn gɔŋnɔn ɛkkɛti agi, “Kan men gɛɛl noŋi kanŋa bɛɛyɛ, naa ɛkɛ daŋkun omdi waak bɛɛ.”
53003011	Ɛɛ, ɔɔn nɔɔtkɔn ma agi ma ɛkkɛ gɛɛg balgi tieci kanŋan ɛkki waakcin bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛn bala cooŋi ñingɛn te gena luarŋ ma waakɛn.
53003012	Maka noŋi naŋka neeniyɛ, ɔɔn ṭeyɔn ɛkkɛn te yenti Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ka dala ɛkkɛn tieci kanŋan ɛkkɛn waakɛn ne pwadan aŋka oomdin ɔci waka pookɛn bala ɛkkɛn byeŋkɛnti daŋkun te kanŋa ɛkkɛn.
53003013	Ɔci gɔṭṭɛ, hay! Modg ɔɔn, naa ɛkkɛ taabdɛ ɔci mwondɛ te naŋka pwadin bɛɛ.
53003014	Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti yookɔn te jyeka kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te ɛkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ jyeyɛ iki ɛkɛ oŋkanda bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ poŋdi te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka yaayan neeni.
53003015	Yeti gɔṭṭɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te ɛkɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ ṭeedɛ ba ṭeena ma ṭeeki modg ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ɔɔn.
53003016	Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin mena ma ‘wondɛ coodi pwani neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ coodi pwani ɛkɛ oŋkanda te jiek waakɛnda. Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin bala ɛkkɛti waakida.
53003017	Gena ‘ya Buuluc kiewan jwali ṭɔɔlɛ ne ŋoyɔ neeni te byeŋ ‘ya paru neeni. ‘Ya ñiep ɛkkɛ. Ɔci te jyek ñiebbin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn kiewan ‘ya te byeŋ ‘ya aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ worga neeni bɛɛn te ‘yati paru. Naŋki ‘ya bala a ɔɔn oŋkanda worganti.
53003018	Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti waakida.
54001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc, cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ te yom Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yuoci ikin, ɔci te yom Yaccu Kiṭɔ moki. Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena etti naŋka pwadin naŋka jyettin kɛɛtin ikiny.
54001002	Timutawuc, ‘ya kiewan worga iti. I aŋŋi kaci ‘ya te jyenna i jyetti Kiṭɔti neeni. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɛn pwada a pwani iti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pɔktan iti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn i ‘wonti coodi pwanno.
54001003	Ne ‘ya noŋa jɔŋda te ban Ɛpacacti oodda ban Macɛdɔɔnyatiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkkan iti ka dala i yedda te ban Ɛpacacti acaan ma gɛɛg bala loṭi ma amaam aŋan. Ɔci ‘ya buaga dala i gɔkca ɛkkɛnti te naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni. Dala ɛkkɛn naŋki ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, daltan.
54001004	Ɔci moki dala ɛkkɛn mwondi te jyeka jomgin ɔci te jyeka lwoktan ma te jyek yɔrg ɛkkɛny. Te jyeka neeniyɛ, jiek ḍuobbin ma wyetkɛnti, ɔci pɔy Jwaŋa Tolan pɔya yuartan ma ne ma jyetti neeni pɔya neeni yuartan ma moki bɛɛ.
54001005	Dala i maka neeni myetka jyeka lorki ɛkkɛn ma amaam wanna yɔttan ñin, acaan ikin buagin dala Ma Kiṭɔ oondi yɔtin. Ma Kiṭɔ ooniyɔ awarɛ ne yomg ɛkkɛn pwatkiy, ɔci moki ne jwalla yaayan gɛɛl baali ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti aŋka ma wookki ɛkkɛn bɛɛy, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn jyetki Yaccuti ne pwadany.
54001006	Yeti maka loṭi ma amaam neeni ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ te waka pwadin neeniti. Ɛkkɛn jyek naŋka pwadan neeni ŋeecɔn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala tyewɔ te wyeñ booji te jyeka budan.
54001007	Maka neeniyɛ, buagɔn agi dala ɛkkɛn ŋeeddɛnti maka pookɛn agi ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛyɔ te lali jyek ganuun Muuca neeni. Yeti ɛkkɛn jyek ganuun jitkɛn ŋeecɔn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn mati neeni jitkɛn kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn.
54001008	Ɛɛ, ŋeecin ikin jyek ganuun pwadɔ, kan ɛkkɛn tiiyɛyɔ ma ba bolja Juaŋ buagɛy.
54001009	Yeti ŋeecin ikin jyek ganuun bɛɛn acaan maka noŋi ba jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ. Yeti ganuun bɛɛn acaan te maka nɔɔtk maka noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn yookɔn te Jwaŋa Tolany, ɔci moki bala te maka bɛɛyi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛny. Ɔci moki te maka jyek Juaŋ baaw ɛkkɛntiy. Ɔci moki te maka paŋi ɛkkɛn yeyiny. Ɔci moki te maka gɔki jyeka yeyiny. Ɔci moki ganuun bala te maka noki weyyɛn iki mɛyyɛn iki maka pookɛny.
54001010	Ɔci moki jyek ganuun bala te maka noŋi tommo, ɔci te maka ‘uay maka tobi yɔtin pookɛny, ɔci te maka koṭi may, ɔci te maka jomi jieky, ɔci te maka aaltan te yenti Jwaŋa Tolan te jyeka awarɛ bɛɛy. Kan gen gɛɛl bala ɔntɔ te jyek Juaŋtiyɛ, jyek ganuun bala te ɛkɛ daŋkun.
54001011	Jwaŋ ikin Jwaŋa pwadan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonna kanŋa miet ma te jyek ɛkɛ jyeka pwadin neeni.
54001012	Ɛɛ, ‘ya gɔk a pwatcin Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti, hay! Acaan ɛkɛ ‘ya muona bora noŋ kanŋa ɛkɛ neeni, ɔci ‘ya ‘wonna ɛkɛ war tɛɛn ɛkɛ noŋa kanŋa ɛkɛ neeni.
54001013	Te ñamuyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk ka yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni yaayɛ, ɔci ‘ya baal noŋ ne yaayan Ma Kiṭɔti, ɔci ‘ya baal wook ɛkɛ te jyeka yeyin. Yeti Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ‘yati acaan ne ‘ya baala noŋa naŋka yaayan neeniyɛ, ‘ya jyeti Yaccuti men bɛɛ, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naŋka naŋi ‘ya wanna konɛ ŋeej ‘ya bɛɛ.
54001014	Acc, hay! Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ‘yati, ‘ya maŋŋa ɛkɛ aŋka ‘ya yomu ḍuacca ɛkɛti ne pwadan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya maŋŋa aŋka ‘ya jyeti Yaccuti ɔci ‘ya an maka pookɛn ne tolan te ani Yaccu.
54001015	Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Jwalla neeniyɛ, gena jwalla awarɛ, ma yaakinti jyeddi jwalla neeniti waakɛnda. Jwalla neeni gɔki agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛnɔ iñɔ baanji wɛnni, aŋka maka nɔɔtk yɔɔnda ɛkta. Ɔci ‘yayɛ, maka pookɛn buani ‘ya te nɔjjo, yeti ɛkɛ ‘ya yɔɔñña doki.
54001016	Ɔci Juaŋ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ‘yati. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala maka pookɛn gɔrti naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋka Yaccu ŋeettiti ma ne ɛkɛ loomgɛ tɛɛki mati oŋkanda aŋka ŋeettan ma Yaccu Kiṭɔ noŋi a ɔɔn maka jyeddi ɛkɛti waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
54001017	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk a pwatcin Juaŋti mena a Ciɛggɔn Tolan mena ciyi yuonginda neeniti. Ɛkɛ baadi bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ yuartin ikin te woŋgɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a Juaŋ waanɛ. Ɛkɛ pwanna pwanno, ɔci ma noŋi ne pwadan ɛkɛti. Dala ma jieddi ɛkɛ yuonginda ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.
54001018	Gɔṭṭi acca hay! Kaci ‘ya, Timutawuc, ‘ya buaga i myettin te jyek kanŋa i bala ba te ñamu ne ma myennɛ Juaŋ gɔkki te jyek naŋki i naŋka bɛya ne baaṭiy. Dala i poŋja jyeka guagɛ ma te i neeni aŋka i noŋja kanŋa Juaŋ ne pwadan.
54001019	Dala jyeni i Kiṭɔti tieka te yoma wɔɔgan. Ma gɛɛg yomg ɛkkɛn tiiyɛ ñin bɛɛ, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeni ɛkkɛn jyenna jyetki Yaccuti neeni daljɛ doki.
54001020	Aymaneeyac ɔci Alɛkcaandaryɛ, ɛkkɛn bala noŋi a ɔɔn. Ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛn oljan Jwaŋa Yaayan bieŋɛti aŋka dala ɛkkɛn taabdi aŋka ɛkkɛn mwondi te ŋɛɛgga ḍorki ɛkkɛn jyek Jwaŋ ɛkkɛn neeni.
54002001	Gɔṭṭi, ‘ya gɔkka iti, jwalla bala ñamu te jyeka pookɛn waakɛndayɛ, gena jyek cɔŋŋo. Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te maka pookɛn waakɛnda. Dala ɛkkɛ toottɛ Juaŋti aŋka ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛ cɔktiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.
54002002	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin waakɛnda, ɔci maka bala ḍuaŋan ḍwaŋin neeni ŋotkɛnti daŋkun aŋka ɛkkɛn magdɛ Juaŋ te muŋi baan aŋka ikin cietin ne pwadan, ɔci aŋka ikin noŋtin ba naŋki Juaŋ oŋkanda.
54002003	Cɔŋŋa neeniyɛ, pwad pwado, ɔci yɔmjin Juaŋti Mena Yuoci ikiny.
54002004	Acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn yuoci ma waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala jyeka awarɛ neeni ŋeettan ɛkkɛn.
54002005	Juaŋ bala ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Ɔci cuuda ikin daŋkun bala ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Gena mena etti jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ikintiy. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ, mena aŋi men baany.
54002006	Ɛkɛ tuun aŋka ɛkɛ woni ma waakɛnda. Te lyen ɛkɛ te oŋŋa ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ wannayɛ, jiek lɛɛlnɛ ɛkɛ bora ne pwadan a Juaŋ buagɔn ma waakɛnda uda.
54002007	A ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya naŋŋa Juaŋ aŋi mena loṭi ma ɔci cuuda Yaccu. ‘Ya cuonna Juaŋ aŋka lor Keedin Pookɛn te jyeka awarɛ te jyek jyenna jyetki ma Juaŋti neeni. Ɛɛ, ne ‘ya gɔka ka ‘ya cuonna Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ‘ya jom jiek bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔk awarɛ.
54002008	’Ya buaga dala maka ‘uay cɔkti Juaŋti kaniicanji waakɛnda. Dala ɛkkɛn cɔkti te yoma pwadan. Ne ɛkkɛn cɔkkiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn looñi mengati bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛn wɛyyɔ bɛɛ.
54002009	Ɔci gɔṭṭi moki, dala i maka moong myetka, ne ɛkkɛn bɛɛtɛ on Juaŋ ona tolanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ɛɛŋdi bworŋin ne pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn tiitan ne pwadan aŋka naa maka ‘uay gɔṭi booti ɛkkɛn waakɛn bɛɛ. Yeti naa ɛkkɛn buagɔn ma jieddi ɛkkɛn te pani jyeyi a ɔɔn bɛɛ, ɔci walla te waka ‘yɛŋtan ɛkkɛn ba dahab bɛɛ, ɔci lirga ‘yɛŋtan ma a luulan ɔci bworŋin wiɛlɛn tɛyan a ɔɔn bɛɛ.
54002010	Moonga gɔki agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka moṭi Juaŋtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn aŋka jiɛtan ma te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn pwadin neeni.
54002011	Gɔṭṭi ‘wota, moongyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ciya lieda kaniicaji, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyeka laltan ma te yoma pwadan. Naa ɛkkɛn noŋi waakɛn bɛɛ.
54002012	’Ya buaga naa maka moong loṭi maka ‘uay bɛɛ, ɔci naa ɛkkɛn ḍwaŋdi yomgɛnti aŋka ‘yeṭi maka ‘uay jitkɛn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn ciya lieda.
54002013	Jiek bala a ɔɔn moongti ogo? Jiek bala a ɔɔn acaan Adamyɛ, ɛkɛ cɔnnɛ Juaŋ ñamu, ɔci Awwayɛ, ɛkɛ cɔnnɛ Juaŋ ne ŋoyɔ.
54002014	Ɔci moki a Adam ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ ñin Jwaŋa Yaayan bɛɛ. Gena Awwa aŋka naŋŋɛ ñin Jwaŋa Yaayany. Ɔci ɛkɛ jyek Juaŋ bɛɛññɛji.
54002015	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ moong cuonnɛ pɛñi ɔci taab ne ɛkkɛn jiedki kɛɛginy. Yeti kan maka moong ciyi ne pwadan te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋti neeni, ɔci kan anna ɛkkɛn anki ma bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛntiyɛ, ɔci kan naŋki ɛkkɛn pwadɔyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi jiek ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn magdɛ Juaŋ te jiedi kɛɛgin.
54003001	Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Kan mena buagɔn naŋtan ma a gaciicyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn gena pwadan.” Jwalla neeniyɛ, a jwalla awarɛ.
54003002	Mena naŋtan ma a gaciicyɛ, naa ɛkɛ naŋtan ma a mena waaktan ma bɛɛ. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena balkin ɛɛŋ ne cyɛɛlɔ budan. Dala ɛkɛ aga mena tukɛ luyan. Dala ɛkɛ poŋi jiek te ñamu. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena cooddɛ pwadan. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena yomɛ pwadan Ma Kiṭɔ maka wɛlgtiy. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena yaakinti lali ma te worga Juaŋ ne pwadan.
54003003	Naa ɛkɛ a mena nokkin mooy bɛɛy. Ɔci naa ɛkɛ a mena noowi i ma bɛɛy. Dala ɛkɛ a mena yomɛ pwadan maka pookɛnti. Naa ɛkɛ a mena ani wɛɛdin iki maka pookɛn bɛɛy. Naa ɛkɛ a mena ani bilk bɛɛy.
54003004	Dala ɛkɛ a mena gɔṭi ma on ɛkɛ ne pwadan. Dala kɛɛgin ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkanda te yoma pwadan.
54003005	Acaan kan men yaakinti gɔṭi kɛɛgin ɛkɛ ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, oŋ ɛkɛ yaakinti gɔrti ma kaniica a ɔki?
54003006	Naa ɛkɛ a mena jyeti Yaccuti woonɛ bɛɛ. Kan ɛkɛ a mena jyeti woonɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ naŋtan ma a gaciic ne pɛñan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ tola dita, ɔci ɛkɛ noŋdi amaam dita. Ɔci jiek bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti daŋkun ba jyeka bɛɛn Jwaŋa Yaayan wyeñɛti neeniy.
54003007	Dala mena neeni a mena jiɛtan maka bora agi ɛkta pwadɔ. Kan a ɔɔn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ dita waaktan ma, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍɛmdi iñɔ te naŋki Jwaŋa Yaayan neeni dita.
54003008	Maka dikannyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn a maka yaakinti paŋi jieko. Naa ɛkkɛn balki yomgɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn ani mooy bɛɛ. Ɔci moki naa ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buagɔn waka coŋin bɛɛ.
54003009	Jyek yɔɔt Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin, jyeka bɛɛn bora neeniyɛ, dala bala ɛkkɛnti te yoma wɔɔgan ne pwadan.
54003010	Dala ma gɔrti naŋki ɛkkɛn te ñamu ne ɛkkɛn cieki ne pwadan boki no, hayya! Ɛkkɛn oŋ naŋtan ma aga dikann oŋo.
54003011	Dikann a moongyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn daŋkun a maka yaakinti paŋi jieko. Naa ɛkkɛn a moonga ani luarŋ ma waakɛn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn a moonga tuggɛn luyan. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛn a moonga woŋgɛn a tiicin te jiek waakɛnda ne pwadan.
54003012	Maka dikannyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn balki moong ne ciṭin. Dala ɛkkɛn a maka gɔṭi kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn ne pwadan iki maka cieki iki ɛkkɛn oorg ɛkkɛn jitin waakɛnda.
54003013	Kan dikann noŋi kanŋa Juaŋ neeni ne pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka anki may. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔkti ne pwadan mati te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkkɛn buayi menga bɛɛ.
54003014	Ɛɛ, ŋeej ‘ya ne ‘ya buagati bɛɛda ban ɛkkɛ ne cwakanti ɔɔn. Yeti ‘ya kiewan jyeka neeni iti men ɔɔn
54003015	aŋka kan ne ‘ya kwattayɛ, jyek naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ŋeejja i te worga kiewan ‘ya iti neeni doki. Ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ kaniica Jwaŋa Tolan. Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a tuuta bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a tɛɛta. Juaŋ buagɔn dala ma kaniica yɔɔda ne tɛyan aŋka ma gɔrti a jwali Juaŋ neeni a jwalla awarɛ.
54003016	Ɛɛ, awarɛ, jyek Juaŋ ikin tɛy tɛyo, ɛkkɛn jitkɛn wɔkɔ mati te ñamu bɛɛ. Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora mati te oŋŋa ɛkɛ aŋŋi men baany. Naŋki pwani ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ Boŋ Juaŋ bora te jɔɔŋŋin ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔ te kooljiy. Ɛkɛ yuarɛ malɛɛkan te woŋgɛn. Ma bala loṭi keedin waakɛnda te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci ma gɛɛg jyeti ɛkɛti baan warda. Ɔci ɛkɛ eññɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ pɔliji.
54004001	Ɔɔn myennɔn Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadan agi ne ninka bɛya ne ṭɛɛr noŋɛ wyeñɛ baldiyɛ, ma kaniica gɛɛg jyeka awarɛ neeni daltan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeddi ɔci bootti amaam jyeka ɛkkɛn laltɛti jɔkin yeyin a jyeka a jomgin neeniti.
54004002	Maka loṭi ɛkkɛn te jyeka pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi ba ɛkkɛn akki maka pwadin ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn a maka pwadin bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jomi jieko, ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti paŋi jyeka pwadin bɛɛ.
54004003	Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn dɛyi ma te jyek ḍɛɛwin, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki dɛyi ma te waka amtan ma gɛɛg. Yeti waka neeni aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɔci ‘wonnin ɛkɛ ikin. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin maka jyeti Juaŋti, maka jyeka awarɛ neeni ŋeecɔn ɛkkɛnyɛ, ikin gɔktin a pwatcin Juaŋti te waka neeni. Ɔci ma Juaŋ yaakinti omi waka neeni te yoma pwadan.
54004004	Waka aŋŋɛ Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwadɔ waakɛnda. Kan men gɛɛl gɔkti a pwatcin Juaŋti te waka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti omdi waka neeni waakɛnda,
54004005	acaan waka neeni pwadgin te jyek Juaŋ ɔci te cɔŋŋa neeni.
54004006	Kan i Ma Kiṭɔ nɔɔtka jyeka neeni jitkɛnyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, i noŋ kanŋa ne pwadan Yaccu Kiṭɔti, bala ba ne i pyeṭi waru te jyek jyeni, ɔci te jyeka boonni i a jyek lalla awarɛ neeni.
54004007	Dala i waru uutca ɔntɔ ne loonan te jyeka jiɛtan ma a jyeka jitkɛn baaw budan wanna, naa i tieŋja ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Dala i waŋu tiicca oŋkanda te yom i aŋka i noŋja naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan.
54004008	Kan i waŋu tiicca te war i aŋka ɛkɛ tɛy tɛyyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin. Yeti jyek tiit yomgɔ te coodi Juaŋ aŋka bala ñamu. Acaan jyek tiit yomgɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn etti waka pwadin iñɔ baanji ṭɛɛrji wɛnni acca, ɔci moki ne baaṭi daŋkun.
54004009	Jwali ṭɔɔlɛ gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Jwalla neeni gena jwalla awarɛ. Ma yaakinti jyeddi jwalla neeniti waakɛnda.
54004010	(Ikin kanŋin ne tolan ne taab baali ikinti ɔɔn.) Ɔci jwalla neeni gɔki agi, “Ikin kɛɛyin naŋki Jwaŋa Tolan mena ciyi tɛɛti yuonginday. Ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci ma waakɛnday. Ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci maka jyeddi ɛkɛti nɔñji ne tolan.”
54004011	Gɔṭṭi Timutawuc kaci ‘ya, naa i mwonna te myetkin ma te jyeka i myennin ‘ya worgaji neeni bɛɛ, ɔci walla te lalla neeni bɛɛ.
54004012	Naa ma lɛɛrti i waru agi i agji gaciic ne i a mena ḍiɛran bɛɛ. Dala i gɔk te lɛmma pwadan, ɔci noŋja naŋka pwadin aŋka maka jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti neeni lɔkti ba naŋki i neeni, ɔci moki ba anna ani i ma neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki lɔkti. Ɔci moki ba jyenna i jyetti Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki lɔkti. Ɔci ba coodi i coodda pwadan neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki lɔkti.
54004013	Dala i pokca worga Juaŋ mati, ɔci dala i ṭey ma, ɔci lorca ma oŋkanda ne ‘ya bɛɛda iti ɔɔn.
54004014	Dala i waŋu tiicca te naŋka i ‘wonniti Juaŋ te oŋŋa cyekin kaniica byeŋkɛn tañkiti itiy. Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔki te Boŋ Juaŋ te jyek naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ itiy.
54004015	Dala i waŋu tiicca te kanŋa i neeni. Dala i ñingu juaddi te ɛkɛ, aŋka dala i ŋeetti ma waakɛnda i baal ‘uocca ñamu gɔ moki ‘uoci ɔɔn.
54004016	Dala i waŋu tiicca te coodi i, ɔci te lali i daŋkun. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, i waru maga paru, ɔci i yaaktiti maka pookɛn, maka tyeŋi jyek i maga daŋkun.
54005001	I Timutawuc, gɔṭṭi i myettin te kanŋa i kaniicaji ‘wota. Tieŋŋa, kan men a mena tolanyɛ, naa i gɔk ṭey ɛkɛ ne pɛñan bɛɛ. Dala i gɔkca ɛkɛti ne maalan ṭɔɔlɛ bala ba ne ɛkɛ agi wey ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci ‘uaya ḍyɛrinyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkkɛnti bala ba ne ɛkkɛn akki modg ɛkkɛ ɔɔn.
54005002	Moonga ḍwaŋinyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkkɛnti ne maalan ṭɔɔlɛ bala ba ne ɛkkɛn akki mɛyi ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci moonga ḍyɛrinyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkkɛnti ne maalan ṭɔɔlɛ bala ba ne ɛkkɛn akki kowi ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Naa paŋŋa yaayan gɛɛl bala iti bɛɛ.
54005003	Moonga ciekyɛ, kan mena gɔṭi ɛkkɛn baawiyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn maga.
54005004	Moonga ciekyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn balki kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin a kɛɛginyɛ, dala ŋeettan ɛkkɛn ne pwadan a dala ɛkkɛn moki mɛyi ɛkkɛn, ɔci walla moki ṭyerg ɛkkɛn, ɔci a ɔɔn pwatcin. Dala kɛɛgin moki ma ɛkkɛn a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn magɛ mɛyyɛn a ɔɔn te ñamu daŋkun, ɔci a ɔɔn pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti daŋkun.
54005005	Ɛŋa cieñyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ bala ciyi parɛ acaan menga bala gɔṭi ɛkɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ bala Juaŋti ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti oŋkanda te oŋ jiñɛ, ɔci te ween jiñɛ. Ɛkɛ tooci Juaŋti te waka ɛkɛ buagitiy.
54005006	Yeti ɛŋa cieñyɛ, kan ɛkɛ bala lieṭi waak ne coŋɔn te ḍwaŋ ɛkɛ parɛyɛ, ɛŋa cieñ neeni ɛkɛ bala ba mena tuuta doki.
54005007	Dala i ɛkkɛn myetka ‘wota te jiek jitkɛn daŋkun te gwali moonga ciek neeni aŋka naa ma wookti Ma Kiṭɔ te naŋki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
54005008	Acaan kan men gɛɛl moki ma ɛkkɛn, mɛyyɛn ɔci ṭyerkɛn bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyek Juaŋ doki. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ yaayɛ ne pɛñan te naŋki maka ciyi budan te jyek Juaŋy.
54005009	Moonga ciekyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn yuongɛn a ma baan ne ḍoogɔ (60) men bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn ‘uaya ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛkɛ te baaṭi tiiyɛyɔ ne ciṭin bɛɛyɛ, naa yeng ɛkkɛn olja worga kiewi i yeng moonga ciekji, aŋka i ɛkkɛn maga te bilk Juaŋ bɛɛ.
54005010	Ɔci moonga yeng ɛkkɛn olja worgajiyɛ, gena moonga guaktan ma agi naŋki ɛkki pwadgɔy. Kan ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn gwalɛ ne pwadanyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ maka wɛlgtiyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn moki noŋi Ma Kiṭɔti ne pwadan te yoma pwadanyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn moki maka balki taab magɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn buagɔn noŋdi ne pwadan mati oŋkandayɛ, dala i moonga neeni aŋka yengɛn olja worgaji.
54005011	Moonga ḍyɛrin, moonga ciekyɛ, naa yeng ɛkkɛn olja worga kiewi i yeng moonga ciekji bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛn poŋi jyek ḍɛɛn oŋkanda ne tolanyɛ, ɔci paŋŋa neeni bala ñamu ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyek Kiṭɔ daltan ɔci ḍɛɛtan ma moki.
54005012	Ɔci a ɔɔn jyeka naŋɛ ɛkkɛn i Kiṭɔ te ñamuyɛ, bɛɛtan ɛkkɛn jitin, ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti.
54005013	Ɔci moki, moonga ḍyɛrin moonga ciekyɛ, ɛkkɛn ma gɛɛg ciyi budan waakɛn pɛñɔ te kanŋa, ɔci ɛkkɛn ati ḍɔki a ḍwaŋi lɔṭi ma waakɛn oorg maka pookɛn jitin. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala nɔɔti jiek amaam budan. Ɛkkɛn ani nwati jiek pwatcin bɛɛ.
54005014	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk yomuti ka dala moonga ḍyɛrin moonga ciekyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛtan mako, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn jietti kɛɛgin, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn tiittan ma ɛkkɛnti oorg ɛkkɛn jitin. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, maka yookɔn te jyek Juaŋ neeni yaakinti wooki ikin te genga moki bɛɛ.
54005015	Acaan moonga ciek gɛɛg jyetcin ɔntɔ te kaniicaji doki, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala booti Jwaŋa Yaayanti doki.
54005016	Yɔɔddi i myettin lakun ‘wota! Ma Kiṭɔ maka ‘uay ɔci maka moong kan ma ɛkkɛn gɛɛg a moonga ciekyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛn magtan. Naa moonga ciek balki ma ɛkkɛn neeni bɛya a taab kaniicati bɛɛ. Dala kaniicayɛ, moonga ciek anin baaki maka gɔṭi ɛkkɛn neeni aŋka magdɛ ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn ma ɛkkɛn baawo.
54005017	Cyekin kaniica maka noŋi kanŋa ɛkkɛn ne tolanyɛ, ɔci maka loṭi ma ne pwadan mokiyɛ, dala i noŋja ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti ba kanŋa ɛkkɛn.
54005018	Acaan worga Juaŋ gɔki agi, “Kan yaan bala olni i wɔɔci jana deeki ma pok aŋka deyi pok iyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ḍyɛga tukɛti bɛɛ.” Ɔci worga moki gɔki agi, “Mena noŋi kanŋayɛ, dala ɛkɛ omdi bilk ba kanŋa ɛkɛ.”
54005019	Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ciɛggɔn kaniica neeni baalɔ noŋi ne yaayanyɛ, naa i jyedda budan men bɛɛ. Kan ma gɛɛg ɛkɛ yuarki ne yyɛɛwɔ walla ne ḍoogɔyɛ, dala i oŋ jyedda gɔrca jyek ɛkɛ oŋo.
54005020	Kan men noŋi nɔji awarɛyɛ, kan i buagi gɔkca ṭey ɛkɛyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkɛti maka pookɛn ñomgɛnti waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛn buatti nɔjja neeni yaayɛ awarɛ.
54005021	Timutawuc, ‘ya gɔkka iti Juaŋ ñamɛti ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔti ɔci malɛɛkan pwadin ñomgɛnti daŋkun, ka dala i noŋja ba jyeka i myennin ‘ya neeni. Ɔci ne i noŋdi a ɔɔnyɛ, dala i noŋja ma waakɛndati ba bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala i yomu bala ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda.
54005022	Kan i buagi noŋja mena wɛɛyi ma gɛɛlyɛ, naa i ɛkɛ naŋa ne pɛñan ñamu doki budan bɛɛ. Kan i men gɛɛl naŋa ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, jyeka neeniyɛ, bɛya aŋa i wyeñuti dɔki. Naa nɔji bala i ḍwaŋuti bɛɛ.
54005023	Naa i mot pieg pookɛn bɛɛ. Dala i motca mooy ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ acaan kon i balki taab, ɔci aŋka dala i waru pwada acaan i waru yaayɛ a ñaccu gɔ moki waru yaayɛ acaan taab bala i konuti neeni.
54005024	Ma gɛɛgyɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin niin te waakɛn a lyɛlta, ɔci nɔji ɛkkɛn neeni ɛkkɛn eedɛ non godan. Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛgyɛ, ɛkkɛn coki naŋki ɛkkɛn waakɛn. Jyek ɛkkɛn ootan bora bɛɛ. Yeti jyek ɛkkɛn bɛya bora ne baaṭi dɔki te oŋ godan Jwaŋa Tolan.
54005025	Ɔci jyek naŋka pwadin bala a ɔɔn daŋkun. Jyek naŋka pwadin gɛɛgyɛ, ŋeettan ma waakɛnda, ɔci jyek naŋka pwadin gɛɛgyɛ, bɛya bora ne pɛñan bɛɛ, bɛya bora ne baaṭi dɔki.
54006001	I Timutawuc, gɔṭṭi ‘wota, i myettin baa! Maka kɛɛnkyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ani weyi ɛkkɛn aŋka naa maka pookɛn wookti yenti Juaŋ bɛɛ, ɔci walla jyeka loṭin ikin ma neeni bɛɛ.
54006002	Maka kɛɛnkyɛ, kan maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛn maka waka pwadin bɛya ɛkkɛnti te kanŋa kɛɛnk neeni a Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn yooktan te jyek weyyɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi ɛkkɛn aŋŋinti modin aŋka ɛkkɛn yookinti te jyek ɛkki wanna bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn kandi ne tolan te yoma pwadan acaan weyi ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a Ma Kiṭɔ ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn daŋkun. Ɔci Juaŋ ani ɛkkɛn. Dala i ma lala te jyeka awarɛ neeni, ɔci dala i ɛkkɛn ciŋaji te jiek aŋka ɛkkɛn tieŋdi ɔci noŋdi ba jyek weyya ḍɔci ɛkkɛny.
54006003	Kan men gɛɛl loṭi ma te jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg jyeka a jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyek coodda cieki Ma Kiṭɔyɛ,
54006004	mena neeni ɛkɛ noŋi warɛ amaam budan. Ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi ɛkɛ jiek ŋeejjɛ waakcinda. Yeti ɛkɛ genga ŋeejɛ bɛɛ. Mena neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ani tyewwin iki ma te jieko. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛyɛ, ma korkɛn modɔ, ɔci ma wɛyyɔ, ɔci ma woowɔ yɔtin, ɔci ma pooŋɔ yɔtin te jyeka budan.
54006005	Maka ani tyewwin neeni ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi jyeka pwadin gɛɛg moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn yiegin jiju poŋi gɔki agi mali Jwaŋa Tolan neeni agi pɔya ma yɔɔrdi waka coŋin neeni budan. Naa i ñoodi iki ɛkkɛn te jiek bɛɛ.
54006006	Awarɛ, mali Juaŋ ikin naŋtin balkin ba maka cyɛgan kan ikin yɔmnin doki te waka ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋy.
