54006007	Gɔṭṭi, oŋŋa ikin jiedkinti mayɛ, ikin ennin waagga byeŋkɔti iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ikin tuutinyɛ, ikin daŋkun eetin waagga byeŋkɔti bɛɛ.
54006008	Ɔci acaan ikin akin Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, kan waka amtin bala ikintiyɛ, ɔci kan moki ikin balkin bworŋinyɛ, a ɔɔn yɔmjin doki ikinti.
54006009	Maka buagɔn aga maka cyɛgan te waakyɛ, paŋŋa coŋin bala ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ. Jyek bwakti waka coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn maaldɛ ne ɛkkɛn noŋtɛ nɔji ɔɔn. Kan ma buagɔn waka coŋin amaam ɔɔnyɛ, bwakti waka coŋin neeniyɛ, etti naŋka yeyin ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ma gɛɛg ḍakti te naŋka neeni.
54006010	Ani bilk neeni, ɛkɛ a ŋway naŋka yeyin jitkɛn waakɛnda. Ɔci te jyek ani bilk neeniyɛ, ma gɛɛg jyetcin ɔntɔ doki te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋtiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛn taabbin ne tolan doki te yom yoño.
54006011	Yeti hay! I Timutawuc, i ag men Juaŋo, dala i waŋu tiicca te bwakti waka coŋin neeni waakɛnda amaamo. Dala i noŋja naŋka pwadin, dala naŋka naŋa i bala ba naŋka Juaŋ buagɛy. Dala i jyedda Juaŋti ne pwadan ɔci dala i balki ani yomuti. Dala i yɔɔd ne tɛyan, ɔci dala i yomu pwad pwad mati.
54006012	Coodda i ciyi te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba maka yiŋ boddi guoñjiy, mena ma boddiyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wontan ma genga ba ŋañ ɛkɛ neeni. Ɔci bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, kan i noŋja kanŋa ne tolan ba mena ma bonnɛ guoñji neeniyɛ, Juaŋ daŋkun i ‘wondi tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka Juaŋ i borniti te oŋŋa i Jiek ooni bora te jyeni i maka coŋin ñomgɛnti neeni.
54006013	’Ya gɔkka iti Jwaŋa Tolan mena waak waakɛnda ‘wondɛ tɛɛtin neeni ñamɛti, ɔci moki ‘ya gɔkka iti Yaccu Kiṭɔ ñamɛti, ɛkɛ a mena jyeni ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ne tɛyan Bilaatuc Bunti ñamɛtiy. ‘Ya gɔkka iti ɛkkɛn ñomgɛnti
54006014	aŋka dala i jyeka i myennin ‘ya te kanŋa i neeni tiyayɔ ne pwadan oŋkanda naa i jyeka neeni gɛɛl dalja bɛɛ, ne oŋŋa Yaccu warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora mati ɔɔn.
54006015	Yaccu lɛɛldɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bora oŋgati ba oŋŋa ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te ɛkɛ, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ pwad pwado, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ñamu te cyekin ḍwaŋin pookɛn waakɛnda ɔci cyekin bala makɛn ḍwaŋin neeni ŋotkɛntiy.
54006016	Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ bala te baaṭi doki, ɔci ɛkɛ bala parɛ yuonginda ɔɔn. Ɔci nona ciyi ɛkɛyɛ, galla gallo, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, menga yaakinti ortiti nona ciyi ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ menga te waŋɛ oŋgati bɛɛ, ɔci menga yaakinti ɛkɛ yuartɛ acca bɛɛ. Dala yenti ɛkɛ tola, ɔci dala war tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
54006017	Maka cyɛgan te waka iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn myetka naa ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍwaŋdi bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍuattan waka coŋinti, waka baadi neeni bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ḍuattan gena Juaŋti parɛ, mena ‘woñi ma te waka ma yomgɛn ñɔɔti waakɛnday.
54006018	Dala i ɛkkɛn myetka, dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka pwadan mati te bilk ɛkkɛn. Dala naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn neeni coŋdi. Dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pɔktan, ɔci ma ‘wontan waak te yoma pwadan.
54006019	Ɔci naŋka pwadan neeni warɛ bwogdɛ ñaalɔ pɔliji ban Juaŋ bala ba mal ɛkkɛn ne baaṭi. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeni ne baaṭi.
54006020	I Timutawuc, dala i waŋu tiicca ne pwadan te kanŋa i, kanŋa i ‘wonniti Juaŋ neeniy. Dala i yooki te jyeka guaktan ma budan a jyeka cɔggin neeni. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi ma ñingɛn tɛɛdɔ te jyeka neeni katan. Yeti ma ñingɛn tɛya te jyeka neeni awarɛ bɛɛ.
54006021	Ma gɛɛg gɔki agi ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛɛnɔ te jyeka cɔggin neeni doki, yeti ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ te jyek Juaŋti. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti waakida. Bawwin.
55001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Jwaŋa Tolan ‘ya muona bora aŋka ‘ya ma myetka te naŋki ɛkɛ. Ɔci naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, gena tɛɛtin Juaŋ ma ḍuaññɛ te jwali agi ɛkki ‘woñji ɛkɛ te Yaccu Kiṭɔy.
55001002	Kaci ‘ya Timutawuc, dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin, ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomgɛn pwada a pwani iti, ɔci dala yom pɔkkin Juaŋ bala iti.
55001003	’Ya gɔk a pwatcin Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda te i, hay, Timutawuc. ‘Ya kanŋ ɛkɛti te yoma pwadan. Ɛkɛ a Jwaŋ yɔrg ɔɔn ɔci a Jwaŋ ‘ya. ‘Ya cɔk ɛkɛti oŋkanda, te oŋ jiñɛ ɔci te ween jiñɛ ka da ɛkɛ i ordiyɔ.
55001004	’Ya ñingu boŋi ne pɛñan te i. Ne ‘ya poŋa te joon i te oŋŋa ikin kɛɛmninji iki iyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala ikin yɔɔrtin iki ‘ya, aŋka ‘ya yomu ñɔɔdɛ.
55001005	Ɛɛ, ‘ya baal poŋ te jyenna i jyetti Juaŋti ne pwadan neeni. Šyer ɛkkɛ Lɔwic jyeti ne pwadan daŋkun yaakkɛn i mɛy ɛkkɛ Yunic. Ɔci acca ‘ya gɔk ka i jyetti ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn daŋkun.
55001006	Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya i myettin ‘wota, dala i waru tɛya ‘wota te naŋki i naŋka i ‘wonniti Juaŋ te oŋŋa ‘ya byeŋku tanna itiy.
55001007	Acaan Boŋ Juaŋ Boŋa ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ etti jyek bwaji bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ etti gena war tɛɛn iki anna ikin anin Juaŋ iki ma baany. Ɔci moki te Boŋ Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti maŋi waakɔ ne pwadan.
55001008	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa i noŋ ba i lɔɔdi te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛ. ‘Ya baal jiju ciginji acca te jyek ɛkɛ, ɔci naa i poŋ gɔk naŋka neeni a lɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɔci kan taab bɛya iti te jyeka loṭi i ma a jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, naa i yooki bɛɛ. Dala war tɛɛn Jwaŋa Tolan bala iti.
55001009	Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, gena ɛkɛ ikin yɔɔññin neeni, ɔci gena ɛkɛ ikin muonin bora aŋka ikin aktin ma ɛkɛ maka pwadin neeni. Ikin muonin ɛkɛ bora te naŋka naŋŋin ikin pwadin gɛɛl bɛɛ. Yeti ikin muonin ɛkɛ bora ba naŋka ɛkɛ buagiti ikin ne ṭɛɛr men baawiy. Ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin yom pwani ɛkɛ te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
55001010	Ɔci acca jyek yom pwani Juaŋ neeni bɛɛn bora doki. Jyeka neeni bɛɛn bora oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛni iñɔ baanji wɛnniy. Ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci ikin. War tɛɛn lien lɛɛŋŋɛ ɛkɛ jitin, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin tɛɛtin te jyenna ikin jyettin jyek ɛkɛy. Ɔci tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
55001011	Te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, ‘ya naŋŋa Yaccu aŋi cuuda ɛkɛ miet ma te jyek ɛkɛ, ɔci lor ma te jyek ɛkɛ.
55001012	Ɔci te jyeka neeniyɛ, aŋka taab bɛɛni ‘yati neeni. Yeti ‘ya lɔɔd te jyeka neeni bɛɛ, acaan mena jyetta ‘ya neeniyɛ, ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan. Ɔci ŋeej ‘ya kanŋa ‘ya ‘wonnata ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔṭi kanŋa neeni oŋkanda ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
55001013	Jyeka i laldin ‘ya a jyeka awarɛ neeniyɛ, dala i waŋu tiicca te ɛkkɛn. Dala yom i an ma ne pwadan, ɔci dala i yomu ḍuacca Juaŋti ne pwadan oŋkanda. Naŋka neeni bɛya te Yaccu Kiṭɔti waakɛnda.
55001014	Dala i waŋu tiicca ne pwadan te kanŋa i ‘wonniti Juaŋ pwadan neeni te Boŋ Juaŋ mena ciyi ikin yomgɔti neeni.
55001015	Çeej i doki ne ‘ya dalkata maka ciyi ban Ecya waakɛnday. ‘Ya dalka Pijiiloc ɛkkɛn yaakkɛn iki Ɛrmɔɔjɛnic.
55001016	Yeti Ɔnɛciipɔracyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya dalna bɛɛ. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ on tukɛ ɛkɛti, acaan ‘ya maŋŋa ɛkɛ oŋki ne coŋɔn te yoma pwadan. Ne ‘ya byeŋku akki ḍɛɛggin te jiŋginyɛ, ɛkɛ buayi warɛ a lɔɔn bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ bɛɛn ḍieŋŋin ‘yati ɔci ‘ya maŋŋa yomuti.
55001017	Ɛɛ, awarɛ, ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni ban Ḍɔɔmyɛ, ɛkɛ bala lieṭi ‘ya a lilti ne tolan ne ‘ya yuarŋata ɛkɛ ɔɔn.
55001018	Ne oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, dala Yaccu yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkɛti. Ɛkɛ ŋeej i ne pwadan, ne ɛkɛ ‘ya maŋŋata te naŋka coŋin ban ɛkkɛ ban Ɛpacacjiy.
55002001	Kaci ‘ya Timutawuc, dala i waru tɛya gɔ moki tɛyi ɔɔn te yom pwani ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋ te Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni i yomuti.
55002002	Jyeka i myennin ‘ya maka pookɛn ñomgɛnti neeniyɛ, dala i ‘uaya pookɛn ‘uaya tieci jiek waakɛn oŋkanda neeniyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn ‘woñga jyeka neeni daŋkun, aŋka ɛkkɛn lorti ma te jyeka neeni daŋkun.
55002003	Naa i buay taab bɛɛ. Kan taab bala itiyɛ, dala i yomu tɛya ɔɔn ba mena ackan. Ikin da balkin ba ackan Yaccu Kiṭɔ ackan pwadin neeni.
55002004	Mena ackanyɛ, ɛkɛ ñingɛ juadan te kanŋa parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala naŋki ɛkɛ pwada mena ɛkɛ naŋŋi a ackan neeniti.
55002005	Gɔṭṭi ‘wota, maka boddɔ guoñjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn boddɔ ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan guoñji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn boddɔ ba naŋki jyek boddin. Ɔci maka ma bwantanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wontan ma waka pwadin. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ba yom ɛkɛ parɛ budanyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ maka pookɛn bwandɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wontan ma genga bɛɛ.
55002006	Ɔci gɔṭṭi ‘wota, mena kanŋan ne pwadan oŋkanda yieljiyɛ, waka ‘yɛgdi ñamu yieljiyɛ, aga wak ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin.
55002007	Dala i poŋja te waka neeni. Ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin i magdi, ɔci i tieŋja jyeka neeni ne jiek jitkɛn balki a ɔkiy.
55002008	Dala i poŋja te Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena yɔr ɛkkɛn a Dawuud neeni, ɛkɛ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te lienti doki, bala ba jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin loṭa ‘ya ma neeni mieti a ɔɔn te ɛkɛ.
55002009	’Ya lor ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni, ɔci acca ‘ya balka taab te jyeka neeni. Ɔci ‘ya olka ma jiju ciginji doki ba mena nɔɔdɔn ɔɔn. Yeti jyek Juaŋ neeniyɛ, menga yaakinti ɛkkɛn mugdɛyɔ bɛɛ.
55002010	’Ya yɔɔd ne tɛyan taab bɛɛn ‘yati neeni jitin ɔɔn, aŋka dala maka muonɛ Juaŋ bora neeni daŋkun yɔɔrdi tɛɛtin bala Yaccuti neeni ɔci pwanna baadi bɛɛ neeni.
55002011	Jwalla pwadan gɛɛl bala, ɔci ikin yaakinti jyettin jwalla neeniti. Jwalla neeni gɔki agi, Kan lyen Yaccu aŋi ba lyen ikinyɛ, ɔci tɛɛtin ɛkɛ aŋi ba tɛɛtin ikin daŋkun.
55002012	Ɔci moki kan taab ɛkɛ aŋi ba taab ikinyɛ, ikin ‘wontin ɛkɛ jyek cyɛgji ne baaṭi, ɔci ikin aktin cyekin iki ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ. Kan ikin kɛkin te ɛkɛyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ da kɛkti te ikin daŋkun.
55002013	Yeti ne ikin bɛɛyin jiek jitkɛnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ men tieci jiek waakɛn ɔɔn. Acaan ɛkɛ yaakinti warɛ agdɛ moki bɛɛ.
55002014	Dala i gɔkca ma kaniicati moki aŋka ɛkkɛn ñingɛn ñiektan te jyeka neeni. Dala ɛkkɛn myetka i Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti, dala ɛkkɛn mwondi te tyewwin te jyeka jitkɛn baaw neeni. Acaan jyek tyewwin neeniyɛ, etti naŋka pwadan gɛɛl mati bɛɛ. Yeti ma ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te naŋka neeni.
55002015	Dala i waŋu tiicca te naŋki i aŋka Juaŋ yomɛ pwada te naŋki i ko. Dala i kanja ɔci lorca ma ne pwadan te jyeka awarɛ oŋkanda ɔɔn aŋka ne baaṭiyɛ, i lɔɔdja bɛɛ.
55002016	Dala i jyeka pookɛn, jyeka coŋin neeniyɛ, dalja. Acaan maka ani jyeka coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ooddi ɔntɔ te jyek Jwaŋa Tolanti.
55002017	Ɔci jyek ɛkkɛn jyeka yeyin neeniyɛ, ooddi mati waakɛnda ba naŋki waja yaayan neeni ɔɔn. Aymaneeyac yaakkɛn i Payliitocyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki jyeka neeni.
55002018	Ɛkkɛn jiek pɔɔdɛ acaan ɛkkɛn jyeka awarɛ neeni ŋeecɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi oŋŋa ma jɔŋti ñaalɔ te kolk jitinyɛ, agi bɛɛnɔ doki. Ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ gɛɛg tieŋŋin jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn neeni, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ doki.
55002019	Yeti kaniica Juaŋyɛ, yɔɔd ne tɛyan oŋkanda acaan ma Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki jyeka ne yyɛɛwɔ. Jwalla ne cyɛɛlɔ gɔki agi, “Maka a ma Juaŋ awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeejɛ Juaŋo.” Ɔci jwalla parɛ neeni gɔki agi, “Maka yenti Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛntiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn nɔji daltan waakɛnda.”
55002020	Gɔṭṭi, maka ciyi te ona tolan ona pwadanyɛ, ɛkkɛn balki waak ne coŋɔn. Ɔci waka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg naŋɛ ma te dahab, ɔci gɛɛg naŋɛ ma te bil pɔdda, ɔci gɛɛg moki naŋɛ ma te jango, ɔci gɛɛg naŋɛ ma te lommo. Ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛnda kɛɛptin jitin te kanŋa ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Waak gɛɛg balki kanŋan pwadin, ɔci ɛkkɛn pookɛn gɛɛgyɛ, balki kanŋan yeyin.
55002021	Ɔci ba jyek waka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek ikin daŋkun. Kan mena warɛ uuttɛ ɔntɔ te maka gɔki jyeka budanti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aga ba gena pwadan weegɛnti, ɔci ɛkɛ ‘wondi ɛkɛ kanŋa pwadan.
55002022	Dala i waŋu tiicca te waka ma ḍyɛrkɔ yomgɛn buagiti ne pɛñany. Dala i pocca noŋja naŋka pwadin, ɔci dala i jyedda ne pwadan, ɔci dala i anja Juaŋ ɔci ma baan ne pwadan, ɔci dala i yomu niin pwanna pwanno. Gɔṭṭi, ‘ya gɔkka moki,
55002023	dala i noŋja naŋka neeni maka cɔki Juaŋti te yoma pwadan neeni, kan ma tyewɔ te jyeka pookɛn jyeka budanyɛ, naa i ñoodi iki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Acaan ŋeej i tyewwin neeniyɛ, etti wɛyyin.
55002024	Acaan mena noŋi kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, naa ɛkɛ ani wɛyyin iki ma bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ yomɛ niin pwanna pwani mati waakɛnda aŋka ɛkɛ loṭi maka domi naŋkiy. Dala ɛkɛ loṭi ma ne pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkɛ loomgɛ tɛya.
55002025	Ɔci kan ma gɛɛg yookɔn waakɛn te jyeka loṭi i ma neeniyɛ, dala maka neeni ṭeyayɔ te yoma pwadan. Ɔci a ɔɔn Juaŋ dita noŋdi naŋki ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn yaltan kaapun, ɔci naŋka awarɛ ŋeettan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn poŋdi te naŋki ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeka awarɛ ŋeettan, ɔci waakɛn yaltan dɔɔktiti jyeka awarɛ neeniti.
55002026	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn bɛya moki, ɔci ɛkkɛn pɔktɛ Juaŋ te Jwaŋa Yaayan bieŋɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi kanŋa Juaŋ moki.
55003001	Timutawuc, dala ŋeejja i ne pwadan acaan oŋka bɛya ookti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, jiek tɛya.
55003002	Acaan maka coŋinyɛ, gɛɛg andi gena waak ɛkkɛn pookɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn andi bilk daŋkun. Ɔci ɛkkɛn andi yyɛji daŋkun, ɔci moki ɛkkɛn andi jied waakɛn pookɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn moki andi lomi jieko. Ɔci ɛkkɛn andi weyyɛn walla mɛyyɛn bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti a pwatcin oŋgati te genga bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ciyi a nɔɔtk budan oŋkanda ɔɔn.
55003003	Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn baaw mati waakɛnda. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti yɔŋi jiek i ma bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jomi ma waakɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan amaam ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn a ywobko. Ɛkkɛn yookɔn te jyeka pwadin waakɛnda.
55003004	Ɛkkɛn ma ‘wontan maka pookɛn byeŋkɛnti aŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn ne yaayan. Ɛkkɛn poŋdi jiek ñamu oŋ ɛkkɛn oŋ noŋti bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi amaam budan ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi ɛkkɛn ḍwaŋgintɛ. Ɛkkɛn ñingɛn juadan te waka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔɔtiy, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn baaw Juaŋti.
55003005	Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba ɛkkɛn akki Ma Kiṭɔ ɔɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn war tɛɛn Juaŋ daltan aŋka noŋdi kanŋa ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci naa i ñoodi iki ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
55003006	Maka neeni gɛɛgyɛ, ɛkkɛn kaatti orɔ oorg maka pookɛnti mooṭi moonga wyetkɛn baaw neeni aŋka moonga neeni aga maka booti ɛkkɛnti. Moonga neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala poŋi oŋkanda te nɔjja naŋɛ ɛkkɛny, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ba naŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn buagiti ne pɛñan oŋkanda neeni.
55003007	Ɛkkɛn buagɔn tieŋdi jiek ne coŋɔn, yeti ɛkkɛn jyeka awarɛ yuartanji bɛɛ.
55003008	Bala ba Janic ɔci Jambric ne ɛkkɛn yookiti te jyek Muuca te baaṭiyɛ, ɔci acca daŋkun ‘uaya neeni yookɔn waakɛn te jyeka awarɛ daŋkun. ‘Uaya neeniyɛ, yaakinti paŋi jiek ne pwadan bɛɛ. Jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki neeniyɛ, a jyenna awarɛ bɛɛ.
55003009	Yeti ɛkkɛn ‘uotti ñamu ne loonan bɛɛ, acaan jyek naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yaayan neeniyɛ, bɛya bora ne cwakanti, ɔci ɛkkɛn ŋeettan ma te naŋki ɛkkɛn. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyek Janic ɔci Jambric.
55003010	Gɔṭṭi hay! Timutawuc, jyeka loṭa ‘ya neeniyɛ, yuarniji i, ɔci coodda ciya ‘yayɛ, ŋeej i moki. Ɔci paŋi ‘ya ŋeej i, ɔci jyeni ‘ya mokiyɛ, ŋeej i, ɔci loomg tɛɛn ‘yayɛ, ŋeej i, ɔci anna ana ‘ya mayɛ, ŋeej i moki. Ɔci yɔɔdda yɔɔda ‘ya ne tɛyan ne ma balki noŋki ne yaayan ‘yatiyɛ, ŋeej i moki.
55003011	Taab ‘ya tol tol ban Antyak ɔci ban Aykɔɔnyam, ɔci ban Lictara, ɔci ‘ya baal yɔɔd ne tɛyan men ɔɔn. ‘Ya maŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin ɔci wɛɛna bora ɛkɛ te taab neeniti waakɛnda.
55003012	Ɛɛ, awarɛ, maka buagɔn ciyi ne pwadan te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, taab bɛya ɛkkɛnti te maka pookɛnti.
55003013	Ɔci maka yeyin maka a laabanyɛ, naŋki ɛkkɛn pɛɛddi te yoñ gɔ moki pɛɛddi ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛn gɔ ɛkkɛn da naŋin ñin ma ɔɔn.
55003014	Yeti iyɛ, dala i waŋu tiicca te jyeka i lalkiti ma jyeka jyetti iy. Ɔci ŋeej i te maka i lalki te jyeka awarɛ neeniy.
55003015	Ɔci ŋeej i moki jyek Juaŋ jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, ŋeej i ne wona i ḍiɛri meny. Ñing tɛɛn bɛya te jyeka kiigin neeni. Ɔci te jyek ñing tɛɛn jyeka kiigin neeni mokiyɛ, i yaaktiti jyedda Yaccu Kiṭɔti ɔci i yɔɔdi ɛkɛ.
55003016	Jyek Juaŋ jyeka kiigin waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka ma myennɛ Juaŋ te Boŋ ɛkɛy. Ɔci te jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, ma laltan ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan jitkɛn ne pwadan. Ɔci moki te jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, naŋka naŋtan ma yaayan neeniyɛ, ŋeettan ma ne naŋka yaayan neeni baali a ɔkiy. Ɔci moki te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, ma yaakinti naŋka yeyin neeni daltan. Jyeka kiigin neeni loṭi ma te naŋka pwadin.
55003017	Kanŋa jyeka kiigin neeniyɛ, bala a ɔɔn acaan Juaŋ buagɔn dala ma ɛkɛ ‘uotti ñamu ne pwadan aŋka dala ɛkkɛn naŋki waka pwadin neeni ŋeettan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda.
55004001	’Ya gɔkka iti Juaŋ ñamɛti ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena noŋdi godan mati waakɛnda neeni ñamɛti. Gena ɛkɛ a mena godan maka tɛɛti ɔci maka tuuny. Acaan ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora mati, ɔci ɛkɛ aga Ciɛggɔn Tolan mati waakɛnda ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ warda.
55004002	Dala i lor ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda ɔɔn. Naa i poŋ gɔk agi pɔya loṭi ma baaw bɛɛ. Dala i gɔkca mati ne pwadan aŋka ma tieŋdi ɔci jyeddi. Kan ma bala noŋi ne yaayanyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn ṭeya ñin ne pɛñan te yoma pwadan. Dala i lor ma te jyek Juaŋ oŋkanda ɔɔn.
55004003	Acaan oŋŋa bɛya waayiyɛ, ma bwagdɛ jyeka pwadin neeni moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn buagdɛ gena jyeka budan. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ooddi lieṭi maka loṭi ɛkkɛn te jyeka ɛkkɛn buagiti jyeka milin ɛkkɛnti jyeka yeyin neeni.
55004004	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yooktan te jyek worga Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka awarɛ neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn tieŋdi gena jyek ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ jyeka budan neeni.
55004005	Yeti iyɛ, dala i waru muga oŋkanda. Kan taab balayɛ, dala i yɔɔdi ne tɛyan ɔɔn. Dala i noŋja kanŋa i kanŋa miti ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Naa kanŋa gɛɛl dalja bɛɛ.
55004006	Yeti gɔṭṭi! ‘Yayɛ, ‘ya tuud ne cwakanti te kanŋa Juaŋo. Oŋŋa ‘ya ṭɛra neeni daldayɔyɛ, moki looncin bɛɛ.
55004007	’Ya noonɔn i Jwaŋa Yaayan ne pwadan. Kanŋa ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ neeni cwamjan ‘ya doki. Jyek jyeni Juaŋ daljan ‘ya oŋgati bɛɛ.
55004008	Ne oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔ a oŋŋa tolanyɛ, mena pwadan Mena Noŋi Godan matiyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda gena pwadan te coodi ‘ya coodda pwadan. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda paru bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonda iki maka bala kɛɛy buagɔn oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdi daŋkuny.
55004009	Gɔṭṭi hay, Timutawuc! Dala i pocca bɛɛd ‘yati wɛnni ne pɛñan ne cwakanti.
55004010	Acaan ‘ya dalna Dimac. Ɛkɛ bala ani jyeka iñɔ baanji wɛnni ne tolan. Ɔci acca ɛkɛ ati ban Tacalunika. Ɔci Krɛcɛnicyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ban Galatiya, ɔci Tituc, ɛkɛ ati ban Dalmeecya.
55004011	Gena Luuk aŋka bala ‘yati parɛ wɛnniy. Dala i ootta Mark owwa, ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛ yaakkɔ wɛnni nona ‘yati, acaan Markyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka yaakinti ‘ya magda ne pwadan te kanŋa ‘ya.
55004012	Ticcikoc cuuñi ‘ya ban Ɛpacac.
55004013	Ne ɛkkɛ bɛɛdɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ bworŋ ‘ya bworŋ jwami oodɛ. Ɛkɛ dollanyɔ ‘ya Karpocti ban Trɔwac. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ worgan ‘ya oodɛ daŋkun. Yeti kan ɛkkɛ worgan pookɛn dolnɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ worgan a geek aŋka oodɛ.
55004014	Alɛkcaandar mena a gɔɔñi gɔci waak te bilka tɛyan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati. “Ciɛggɔn ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ jiek duaktɛ mena neeni wyeñɛti te naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ yaayan ‘yati neeni.”
55004015	Ɔci i daŋkunyɛ, dala i waŋu tiicca te Alɛkcaandar acaan ɛkɛ yookɔn te jyeka loṭin ikin ma neeni ne pɛñan.
55004016	Ne ‘ya noŋkata ma godan te ñamuyɛ, men gɛɛl ‘ya maŋŋa yuonna taaŋuti te jyek godan ‘ya bɛɛ. ‘Ya dalka ma paru ɛkkɛn yiŋi ɔntɔ waakɛnda. Yeti ‘ya buaga Juaŋ jiek oldɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti te naŋka neeni bɛɛ. A’a.
55004017	Ciɛggɔn ikin aŋka bala ‘yati parɛ, ɔci ‘ya ‘wonna ɛkɛ war tɛɛno, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya ma myetkan te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni waakɛnda. Ɔci Keedin Pookɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin jyeka neeni waakɛnda. ‘Ya maŋŋa Juaŋ te jyek godan, bala ba mena wɛyɛ ma te jiɛl tukɛti.
55004018	Ɛɛ, ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ ‘ya yɔɔda te naŋka yeyin neeni waakɛnda ne ‘ya dɛnda ban cyɛgji ɛkɛti ñaalɔ ɔɔn. Dala Juaŋ jiɛtan ma oŋkanda oŋkanda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
55004019	Dala i ñiepca Pricillati te ‘ya, ɔci ñiepca Akwillati te ‘ya moki, ɔci ñiepca ma Ɔnɛciipɔracti te ‘ya moki.
55004020	Iraactac yeddin te ban Kuruntuc. Ɔci Trɔpimoc dollanyɔ ‘ya te ban Mayliitac, acaan ɛkɛ warɛ yaayɛ.
55004021	Dala i pocca bɛɛd ‘yati wɛnni ne pɛñan ne ñaal jiñɛ baawi men ɔɔn. Yubyuulac ñiepi i, ɔci Pudɛnic moki ñiepi i, ɔci Laynac moki ñiepi i, ɔci Klɔdya moki ñiepi i, ɔci modg ikin waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi i daŋkun.
55004022	Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin bala iti. Dala ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada a pwani iti. Bawwin.
56001001	Gena ‘ya Buuluc kɛɛngɔn Jwaŋa Tolan. ‘Ya a cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ te jyek jyenna ma jyetki Juaŋti neeni. Gena maka muonɛ Juaŋ boray. Ɔci ɛkɛ ‘ya cuonna aŋka ‘ya lor ma te jyek ɛkɛ jyeka awarɛ, ɔci coodda ɛkɛ buagɛ ma cootɛ a ɔki te jyek ɛkɛy.
56001002	Ikin jyettin kɛɛyin jyek tɛɛtin Juaŋ tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeniy, acaan Juaŋ gɔki te baaṭi doki wona ṭɛɛr men baawi agi ikin ‘wontinti ɛkɛ tɛɛtin neeni. Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan yaakinti dyeti ma ñingɛn bɛɛ.
56001003	Ɔci ɛkɛ jyek tɛɛtin ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora mati te oŋŋa pwadan oŋŋa ɛkɛ buagɛtiy. Gena jyeka loṭa ‘ya ma a jyek Jwaŋa Tolany. Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yuoci ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘ya ‘wonna kanŋa miti ma te jyeka neeni bieŋuti.
56001004	Hay! Kaci ‘ya Tituc, ‘ya kiewan worga neeni iti. I aŋŋi kaci ‘ya te jyenna i jyetti Kiṭɔti neeni. Ikin jyettin Juaŋti yaakkɔ. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan Wey ikin, ɔci Cieggɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena Yuoci ikin neeni yomgɛn pwada a pwani iti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn i ‘wonti coodi pwanno.
56001005	Ɛɛ, gɔṭṭi, Tituc, i dolninyɔ ‘ya Kaŋ Kriit wyeñɛti aŋka kanŋa dollanyɔ ‘ya wanna cwamja, ɔci aŋka i ma maga te jyek cyɛgji kaniicanji, bonka neeniti waakɛnda ba jyeka i myennin ‘ya te ñamuy.
56001006	Cyekin kaniicanyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn naŋa i a maka waaktan ma bɛɛ. Ɔci maka neeni dala ɛkkɛn balki moong ne ciṭin. Dala kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn a maka jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti. Naa ɛkkɛn balki kɛɛgin guaktan ma a kɛɛgin cooddɛn yeyin bɛɛ, ɔci walla kɛɛgin yookɔn te jyek weyyɛn bɛɛ.
56001007	Mena gaciicyɛ, naa ɛkɛ a mena waaktan ma bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ a mena Ma Kiṭɔ bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti. Walla naa ɛkɛ a mena yyɛcan bɛɛ. Ɔci walla naa ɛkɛ a mena loomgɛ cwalŋan bɛɛ. Ɔci walla naa ɛkɛ a mena ani mooy bɛɛ. Ɔci walla naa ɛkɛ a mena cooddɛ yaayan bɛɛ. Ɔci walla naa ɛkɛ a mena warɛ ḍigan ani waak bɛɛ.
56001008	Dala ɛkɛ a mena yomɛ pwadan mena gɔṭi wɛlgo. Dala ɛkɛ a mena ani naŋka pwadin, ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena mwoki warɛ ne pwadan. Dala ɛkɛ a mena pwadan Juaŋ ñamɛti. Dala ɛkɛ a mena ciyi noŋi ba naŋka Juaŋ buagɛy. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ a mena yaakinti poŋi te warɛ.
56001009	Dala ɛkɛ waŋɛ tiittɛ te jyeka pwadin jyeka loṭɔn ɔɔn ma neeni, aŋka ɛkɛ ṭeyi ma ɔci loṭi ma te jyeka pwadin neeni, ɔci moki aŋka maka tieki jiek bwandɛ ɛkɛ.
56001010	Ma Kiṭɔ maka coŋin gɛɛg bala noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn. Ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek menga bɛɛ. Ɔci maka coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg a Ma Yahuud. Ɛkkɛn balki jyeka coŋin tuggɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛn.
56001011	Dala ɛkkɛn yɔddɛ ñin te lali jyeka yeyin neeni. Acaan maka coŋin gɛɛg bala jyetcin ɔntɔ doki te jyek ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn bala loṭi ma amaamo. Ɛkkɛn loṭi ma a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn ‘wontan ma waako. Naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni a labjo.
56001012	Jyeka neeni bala ba men gɛɛl bɛɛn te ma maka neeniti, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki te ma Kriit agi ma Kriityɛ, ɛkkɛn jomi jiek waakɛnda. Ɔci moki ɛkɛ gɔki agi ɛkki agi ywobk ba leyi gɛɛg, ɔci agi ɛkki waakcin pɛñgɔ te kanŋa waak ne tolan, yeti ɛkkɛn ati booti omi gena oomdin mati.
56001013	Jyeka guaŋŋɛ mena neeni te ɛkkɛn neeni a jyeka awarɛ, hay! Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn ṭeya ne pɛñan te jyeka neeni aŋka ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛya te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetkɛ Juaŋti neeni.
56001014	Ɔci dala Ma Kiṭɔ mwondi te jyeka guaktan Ma Yahuud a jyeka budan neeni. Maka yookɔn te jyeka awarɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala gɔki mati te jyeka ɛkkɛn buagɛti dala naŋtan may. Jyeka neeni bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ. A’a, jyeka neeni bɛɛn te ma baanti budan. Dala i ma myetka naa ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.
56001015	Yeti maka yomgɛn pwadinyɛ, waak waakɛnda pwadɔ ɛkkɛnti, ɔci maka jyeti jyek Juaŋti bɛɛyɛ, waak waakɛnda yeyɔ ɛkkɛnti, acaan maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waka pwadin walla waka yeyin ŋeecɔn yomgɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi paŋŋa pwadan bɛɛ.
56001016	Ɛkkɛn gɔki te tuggɛn agi ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejinti katan. Yeti te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn yaayan neeniyɛ, ɔci ŋeecɔn ma ɛkkɛn Juaŋ ŋeecɔn awarɛ bɛɛ. Hay! Ɛkkɛn yeyɔ, ɛkkɛn bɛɛyi jyek Juaŋ neeni. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋdi gena pwadan gɛɛl bɛɛ.
56002001	Ɔci iyɛ, hay Tituc! Dala i lorca ma te jyeka pwadin jyek coodi Ma Kiṭɔ.
56002002	Dala i ‘uaya ḍwaŋin myetka dala ɛkkɛn tuggɛn luya. Dala ɛkkɛn yaakinti muŋi waakɛn. Dala ɛkkɛn poŋdi jiek ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛn jyeddi Juaŋti ne pwadan. Dala ani Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn yɔdi ne tɛyan.
56002003	Ɔci moonga ḍwaŋinyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn myetka dala ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn tiittan ciyi ba maka moṭi Juaŋti awarɛ. Naa ɛkkɛn ati booti ma wyetkɛnti wooki maka pookɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn aga maka nokkin mooy bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn loṭi ma te naŋka pwadin.
56002004	Dala moonga neeni ɛkkɛn moonga ḍyɛrin laltan aŋka dala ɛkkɛn andi ‘uay ɛkkɛn, ɔci dala andi kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn daŋkun.
56002005	Ɔci dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn muktan ne pwadan, ɔci naa paŋŋa yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn gɔṭi oorg ɛkkɛn jitkɛn ne pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ mati. Dala ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛn ne pwadan. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ma yaaktanti wooki jyek Jwaŋa Tolan neeni moki bɛɛ.
56002006	Ɔci dala i ‘uaya ḍyɛrin ṭeyayɔ daŋkun aŋka naa ɛkkɛn noŋdi amaam bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn muktan ne pwadan.
56002007	Ɔci i waanuyɛ, dala naŋki i waakɛnda pwaddi aŋka maka pookɛn lɔkti ba naŋki i. Ɔci oŋkanda ne i loṭi mayɛ, dala i lorca ɛkkɛn ne pwadan, ɔci a ɔɔn jyeka loṭi i ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ŋeettan ɛkkɛn jyeka neeni a jyeka a ñiek bɛɛ.
56002008	Ne i loṭi mayɛ, dala i lorca ɔci gɔkca te jyeka menga yaakinti wooki jyeka lala i neeni bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, maka yookɔn te ikin neeni ɛkkɛn yaakinti wooki ikin te genga moki bɛɛ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn aga lɔɔno.
56002009	Dala i maka kɛɛnk myetka dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi ba jyek maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛn. Dala naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda neeniyɛ, dala pwaddi maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛnti neeni. Ɔci kan maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti genga ɛkkɛntiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn koogdi i ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
56002010	Dala i ɛkkɛn myetka naa ɛkkɛn kɛndi wak maka ḍɔci ɛkkɛn neeni te yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi gena naŋka pwadin oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛn ŋeettiti ma ɛkkɛn labjin baawo. Ɔci te naŋka naŋtan ɛkkɛn pwadin waakɛnda neeniyɛ, jyek Jwaŋa Tolan Mena Yuoci ikin neeniyɛ, pwaddi mati.
56002011	Acaan yɔɔta yuoci Jwaŋa Tolan ma neeniyɛ, bɛɛn mati waakɛnda acca doki ba yom pwani ɛkɛ.
56002012	Ɔci yom pwani Juaŋ neeni loṭi ikin agi dala ikin mwoncin te naŋki coodi ikin coodda te baaṭi wona ikin balkin ciyin budan te jyek Juaŋ neeni, ɔci moki agi dala ikin mwoncin te paŋi jyek waka ikin buaginti ne coŋɔn ba maka ciyi baan konɛti neeni. Ɔci agi dala ikin cieccin noŋcin naŋka pwadin naŋka Juaŋ buagɛ aŋka naŋtin ikin ne wonta ikin ciyin tɛɛtin men ɔŋ.
56002013	Acaan acca ikin jyettin kɛɛyin te naŋki Jwaŋ ikin naŋka pwadan neeni. Ɔci oŋŋa kɛɛtin ikin neeniyɛ, gena oŋŋa Jwaŋ ikin ɔci Cieggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena Yuoci ikin bɛɛdi pwanni a pwani, ɔci warɛ lɛɛldi bora ikintiy.
56002014	Yaccu tuun te ikin te yom ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn woni ikin te nɔji waakɛnda, ɔci naŋtin a maka giikin baaw yomgɛnti te nɔji waakɛnda. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala maka neeni aga ma ɛkɛ woodgɛn. Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma ɛkɛ waakɛn byerdi te naŋka pwadin.
56002015	Dala i ma myetka te jyeka neeni. Dala i ma ṭeyayɔ, ɔci kan men gɛɛl ciyi ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, dala i gɔkca ɛkɛti. Dala i noŋja naŋka neeni ne pwadan acaan i balki war tɛɛn bieŋuti doki. Ɔci naa menga wooki i bɛɛ.
56003001	Dala i ma myetka jiek dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi ba jyek akuuma ɔci jyek ma kuuma maka ḍwaŋin. Dala ɛkkɛn bwagdɛ naŋka pwadin.
56003002	Naa ɛkkɛn wooki menga bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛn ciyi iki ma te pwani, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn poŋi te maka pookɛn, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi mati waakɛnda te wara bala iñɔ.
56003003	Te baaṭiyɛ, ikin wyetkɔ bala ɔntɔ daŋkun. Ikin balkin tyeŋin jyek menga bɛɛ. Ikin noŋin ba yomg ikin pookɔ. Ɔci waka ikin buaginti ne tolan neeniyɛ, ikin mukkinyɔ naŋkin ba kɛɛnk ɛkkɛn, ɔci ikin balkin lieṭin waka ikin yomgɔ ñɔɔki ne pɛñany. Ɔci oŋkandayɛ, ikin balkin ciyin amaamo. Ɔci ikin korkɔ modɔ, ɔci ikin yookin te maka pookɛn, ɔci ikin balkin yoyyin ñin pookɔ daŋkun.
56003004	Yeti oŋŋa Jwaŋa Tolan noŋni ne pwadan ikinti te anna ɛkɛ ani ikin neeniyɛ,
56003005	ɛkɛ ikin yɔɔññin doki. Ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ acaan naŋki ikin pwad pwad ɛkɛti pookɔ bɛɛ. Ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ acaan ɛkɛ yomɛ pwad pwad ikinti. Ɛkɛ ikin yɔɔññin te Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa ikin luaŋŋin yomgɔti te nɔji, Boŋa ikin jiennin te jiedda woonɛ aŋka ikin aŋŋin maka wonkɛny.
56003006	Ikin ‘wonnin Jwaŋa Tolan Boŋ ɛkɛ ne tolan te naŋka naŋŋɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena Yuoci ikiny.
56003007	Ikin yɔɔññin ɛkɛ a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ikin pwattin Juaŋ ñamɛti te yom pwani ɛkɛ ikinti neeni. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeecin ikin tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ, tɛɛtin jyettin kɛɛtin ikin neeniyɛ, yuartin ikin ne baaṭi.
56003008	Ikin yaakinti jyettin jyeka neeni acaan ɛkkɛn a jyeka awarɛ waakɛnda. Ɔci te jyeka neeniyɛ, ‘ya buaga dala i ma myetka te jyeka neeni ne pwadan aŋka naa ɛkkɛn yeya bɛɛ. Acaan maka jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti dokiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn woŋgɛn tiittan te kanŋa pwadin neeni. Kanŋa neeni pwad pwado, ɔci etti naŋka pwadin mati.
56003009	Dala i ma myetka naa ma tyewɔ iki maka pookɛn te jyeka budan neeni bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛn tyewɔ te jyek yɔrg ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci moki naa ɛkkɛn wɛyyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛn tyewɔ te jyek tiit jyek ganuun Ma Yahuud bɛɛ. Acaan tyewwinyɛ, etti jyeka pwadin mengati bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni a naŋka budan.
56003010	Kan men gɛɛl buagɔn Ma Kiṭɔ kɛbdɛ jitin kaniicajiyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ ṭeya, ɔci kan ɛkɛ tieŋdi bɛɛyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ ṭeya moki. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ yookɔn men ɔɔnyɛ, dala i ɛkɛ dorka warɛti, ɔci naa i ñoodi iki ɛkɛ te genga moki bɛɛ.
56003011	Çeecin ikin kan men gɛɛl naŋki ɛkɛ bala a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci kan paŋi ɛkɛ bala ɔntɔ mokiyɛ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, a nɔjjo. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ wannayɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lyɛldɛ ne naŋki ɛkɛ agi damgin awarɛy.
56003012	Gɔṭṭi, ne Artɛmac walla Ticcikoc cuonda ‘ya ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala i pocca bɛɛd ‘yati ne pɛñan. Ikin kooktin ban Nikɔɔpolic acaan ‘ya buaga coocca wɛnan te ñaal konɛ.
56003013	Jinac mena kanŋa ɛkɛ a jyek ganuun, ɔci Apɔɔlɔcyɛ, dala i ɛkkɛn maga ne pwadan ne ɛkkɛn bwagdɛ woony. Dala i ɛkkɛn maga te waak aŋka naa genga bɔɔndi ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
56003014	Ma ikinyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn kandi ne pwadan oŋkanda aŋka dala waak bala ɛkkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn moki maka pookɛn te wak ɛkkɛn, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, coodi ɛkkɛn aga coodda budan bɛɛ.
56003015	Maka bala ‘yati wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda ñiepi i. Ɔci iyɛ, dala i ma ñiiba te ɔɔn daŋkun. Gena maka ani ikiny, maka jyeti Juaŋti dokiy. Dala Juaŋ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti oŋkanda waakida. Bawwin.
57001001	I, Pilimun, gena ‘ya Buuluc ɔci mod ikin Timutawuc ñiepɔn i neeni. ‘Ya a mena bala jiju ciginji te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔy. Ɔɔn anɔn i acaan i a mena kanŋin iki ɔɔny.
57001002	Ɔɔn ñiepɔn kow ikin Apya, ɔci ɔɔn ñiepɔn Arkippoc mena noŋi kanŋa Kiṭɔ ba ikin ɔɔny. Ɔci ɔɔn moki ñiepɔn ma kaniica maka ḍwoṭi wyetkɛn oŋkanda on iy.
57001003	Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ ‘wontɛ coodi pwanno.
57001004	Oŋkanday ne ‘ya baala cɔka Jwaŋ ‘yatiyɛ, ‘ya gɔk Juaŋti a pwatcin te i.
57001005	’Ya gɔk a pwatcin Juaŋti te i a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya tieŋŋan te jyenna i jyetti Ciɛggɔn Ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci te anna ani i ma ɛkɛ ne tolany.
57001006	’Ya cɔk Jwaŋa Tolanti ka dala i maka pookɛn daŋkun myetka te Kiṭɔ te jyenna i jyetti neeni aŋka dala ɛkkɛn jyeka pwadin ŋeettan waakɛnda daŋkun. Gena jyek naŋka pwadin, naŋka bɛya maka jyeti Yaccu Kiṭɔti neeni.
57001007	Mod ɔɔn, ‘ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan te naŋki i. ‘Ya yomu wiak moki bɛɛ. Te anna i ani ma neeniyɛ, modg ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn yomgɛn tɛɛn te naŋki i neeni ɛkkɛnti.
57001008	Gɔṭṭi, mod ɔɔn Pilimun, ‘ya tuku a jwali ṭɔɔlɛ iti. ‘Ya dita te gɔkka iti ne pɛñan te yenti Yaccu ka dala i noŋja gena guagdi ‘ya neeni, acaan naŋka neeni gena naŋka te naŋa i te yom i paruy. Oŋ yeti te oonnin ikin oonnin yɔtinyɛ, ‘ya buaga toocca iti ba yom i. Dala jwalla neeni muga i te ‘yati ba jwali ‘ya mug ɛkkɛ Buuluc muka aŋi daan, mena bala ciginji acca te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeniy.
57001010	Acca ‘ya tooc iti te kaci ‘ya Ɔnɛɛcimac. Ne ‘ya baala ciginjiyɛ, ‘ya aŋi ba wey ɛkkɛn te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan.
57001011	Te ñamu ɛkɛ pwatcin iti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ yiŋi ɔntɔ te iti. Yeti accayɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti noŋdi kanŋa i ne pwadan bala ba ne ɛkɛ baali noŋi kanŋa ‘ya wɛnni ne pwadany.
57001012	’Ya baal ɛkɛ cuoñña dɔwwa iti dɔki. Ne ‘ya ɛkɛ cuonda iti a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba gena yom ‘ya aŋka cuoñña iti wanna.
57001013	’Ya yomu pwanna pwani ka dala ɛkɛ ciedin iki ‘ya wɛnni aŋka ‘ya magda. A ɔɔn bala ba gena i waanu aŋka mok ‘ya ne ‘ya baala jiju ciginji te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni.
57001014	Ɔci acca ‘ya toocca iti te ɛkɛ. ‘Ya ɛkɛ ‘woñga kanŋa ‘ya budan te yom ‘ya bɛɛ. Kan ‘ya ɛkɛ muŋiyɔ ciya te wɛnniyɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba i noŋ ne pwadan ‘yati te yom i paru bɛɛ. A ɔɔn, bala ba i moki ‘ya te yom ‘ya no. Yeti ‘ya buaga kan i noŋja ne pwadan ‘yatiyɛ, dala i noŋja te yom i paru.
57001015	Ɔci naŋka ɛkɛ yiŋŋi ɔntɔ amaam neeniyɛ, naŋka neeni bɛɛn iti budan bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan naŋka neeni yallɛ ñin aŋi pwani iti. Ɔci ɛkɛ dɔɔdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan iti moki. Ɔci ɛkɛ baldi iki i yuonginda ɔɔn.
57001016	Ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala ba mena kɛɛngɔn budan iti moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ aŋi mod ɛkkɛ moda ani i doki. ‘Ya an ɛkɛ daŋkun. Ɔci acca i yaakiti an ɛkɛ ne tolan acaan ɛkɛ bala kanŋan ne pwadan. Ɔci moki dala i anja ɛkɛ acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔ yaakkɔ doki.
57001017	Gɔṭṭi, i baal ba mod ɔɔn waanɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkka iti te Ɔnɛɛcimac. Ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, dala i noŋja ɛkɛti ne pwadan bala ba gena ‘ya waanu aŋka naŋda i wanna.
57001018	Ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne yaayan te gengayɛ, walla kan ɛkɛ balki dɛɛn gɛɛl itiyɛ, dala i waka neeni kiijja worgaji, dala aga dɛn ‘ya.
57001019	Gena ‘ya Buuluc kiewan jyeka neeni te byeŋ ‘ya iti neeni. I wondin ‘ya waka bala ɛkɛ ḍwaŋɛti neeni waakɛnda. Ɔci naa i ñingu yeya te naŋki ‘ya bɛɛ. Te ‘ya baawayɛ, te i jyetti Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ.
57001020	Mod ɔɔn, dala i yomu pɔkka ‘yati, ɔci noŋja ne pwadan Ɔnɛɛcimacti. ‘Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn acaan ikin yaakkɔ akin Ma Kiṭɔ.
57001021	Çeej ‘ya yomuti i buagi noŋja ba jyek ‘ya neeni. Ɔci i buagi noŋja naŋka pookɛn naŋka pwadin Ɔnɛɛcimacti daŋkun.
57001022	Ɔci jwalla parɛ gɛɛl bala daŋkun. Dala ‘ya yɔŋda on maka wɛlg gɛɛl jiñɛ acaan ‘ya buaga bɛɛd ban ɛkkɛ moki. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ cɔkɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti te ‘ya. Dala Juaŋ tieŋdi cɔŋi ɛkkɛ, aŋka ‘ya ooda ɛkɛ nona ɛkkɛti.
57001023	Ɛpaprac, mena bala ciginji te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ ba ‘ya ɔɔn neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi i.
57001024	Maka kanŋin iki ‘ya wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi i daŋkun. Gena Mark ɔci Ɛrictaarkoc, ɔci Dimac ɔci Luuk.
57001025	Dala Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti waakida.
58001001	Jwaŋa Tolan ne maka yɔrg ikin ɔci weyi ikin nɔɔnnɛ te baaṭi te maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te jiek jitkɛn ne coŋɔn ɔci oŋki ne coŋɔnyɛ,
58001002	ɛkɛ oŋ ikin nɔɔnnin te ninka bawwin doki neeni te Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a mena mwoki waak waakɛnday, ɔci te ɛkɛ mokiyɛ, Juaŋ cɔti ṭɛɛr ɔci pɔllo.
58001003	Ɔci Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena yɔṭṭin ikin pwani Jwaŋa Tolany, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ba bolji Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ eci waak waakɛnda ati te ɛkɛ yɔɔda bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ ma pɔŋnɛ te nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ cooccin Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti taaŋŋa a byerɔn ñaalɔ pɔliji.
58001004	Ɔci Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te malɛɛkan waakɛnda bala ba ne ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Weegɛn yenta pwadan te malɛɛkan waakɛnday.
58001005	Acaan Juaŋ gɔkcin malɛɛka gɛɛlti oŋgati a ɔŋŋi bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “I a Kaci ‘ya, i jiennin ‘ya te oŋŋo.” Ɔci moki agi, “‘Ya agdi Wey ɛkkɛn ɔci ɛkɛ aga Kaci ‘ya.”
58001006	Yeti ne Juaŋ buaŋŋi aŋka cuondi Kacca a kɛɛgɔn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “Dala malɛɛkan Jwaŋa Tolan morti ɛkɛti waakɛnda.”
58001007	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Ɛkɛ malɛɛkan ɛkɛ naŋdɛ aga jwammo, ɔci maka kanŋan ɛkɛti aga maañ lɛmmɛ.”
58001008	Oŋ yeti te Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Hay Juaŋo, kaakci iyɛ, ɛkɛ bala oŋki waakɛnda baadi bɛɛ. Ɔci naŋka pwadanyɛ, aga war tɛɛn cyɛgji i.
58001009	I an naŋka pwadan, ɔci i yooki te naŋka yeyin. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋ iyɛ, i muoni bora ɔci ‘wonnɛ yoma ñɔyan ne tolan te mung ɛkkɛ.”
58001010	Ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin moki agi, “Ciɛggɔn, te ñamuyɛ, i okki ṭɛɛr ɔci pɔllo. Ɛkkɛn a kanŋa byeŋ i.
58001011	Yeti ɛkkɛnyɛ, baadi, oŋ iyɛ, aŋka baldi oŋki waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkkɛn aga donk ba bworŋ ne agdi daany.
58001012	Ɔci ɛkkɛn wiñayɔ i ba bworŋa tolan ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkkɛn waakɛn aktan ba bworŋ ɔɔn. Oŋ yeti iyɛ, waru aga oŋgati bɛɛ. I ciy yuong waakɛnda ɔɔn.”
58001013	Juaŋ gɔkcin malɛɛkan ɛkɛ gɛɛlti oŋgati boki agi, “I coocca ‘ya taaŋuti taaŋŋa a byerɔny, ɔci ‘ya maka noŋi ne yaayan iti neeni bwandi, ɔci ḍuacca ‘ya iñɔ i cieguti.”
58001014	Malɛɛkan ɛkkɛn waakɛnda a boŋka cundɛ Juaŋ noŋi kanŋan maka ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ aŋka non yɔɔt ɛkɛ muktan neeniti.
58002001	Yaccu tol tol te malɛɛkan, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin woŋgɔ tiittin te waka tieŋnin ikin aŋka naa ikin jyettin ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
58002002	Jyeka guagɛ malɛɛkan a jyeka awarɛ, ɔci jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛji ma. Ɔci maka noŋi nɔji neeniyɛ, ywobji Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda awarɛ.
58002003	Kan ikin woŋgɔ tiittin te yɔɔta Juaŋ yuoci ikin neeni bɛɛyɛ, ikin uttin bɛɛ. Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ jɔɔtcin te jyek yɔɔta neeni ñamu, ɔci maka tieŋŋin ɔci jyek ɛkɛ mugɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn mieti ikin a jyeka neeni awarɛ ɔci tiekɛ ne ikin bɛɛnin ɔɔn.
58002004	Ɔci Juaŋ daŋkun ikin myennin a jyeka neeni ɛkkɛn awarɛ. Ɛkɛ ikin myennin te naŋka tɛyan naŋka ñyecki ma war tɛɛn ɛkɛ ɔci te naŋka ma woŋgɛn ñiektiti te ɛkɛ, ɔci te ‘woñgin ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonninti Boŋ ɛkɛy. Ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin waka neeni aŋka ŋeettin ikin jyeka neeni awarɛ.
58002005	Šɛɛr warda ṭɛra bala ne baaṭi ṭɛra guaktin ikin neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍuannɛ Juaŋ malɛɛkan byeŋkɛnti bɛɛ.
58002006	Oŋ yeti menga gɔki worga Juaŋji agi, “Men baan ɛkɛ a menɛ aŋka i poŋi te ɛkɛy? Ɔci ɛkɛ a menɛ aŋka i gɔṭi ɛkɛy?
58002007	I ɛkɛ naŋŋi ḍiɛrŋ te malɛɛkan wɔɔka ne ḍuulan, ɔci i ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ pwanno,
58002008	ɔci i waak waakɛnda ḍuanni ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.” Jwalla neeni kon ɛkɛ bala a ɔŋŋi, kan waak tieŋdi jyek ɛkɛ waakɛndayɛ, Juaŋ genga dalnɛ bora ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ, waak waakɛnda ‘wonni ɛkɛ men baan bieŋɛti. Yeti acca waak yuartin ikin tyeŋi jyek men baan waakɛnda moki bɛɛ.
58002009	Yeti Yaccu Mena ḍuannɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ḍiɛrŋ te malɛɛkan wɔɔka ne ḍuulan neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ yuartin ikin ne ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ yom pwani aŋka ɛkɛ dɛccin pɛñi lieno. Ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ḍiɛrŋ te malɛɛkan te naŋki pwani Juaŋo. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ tuun te ma waakɛnda.
58002010	Acaan waak waakɛnda cɔnnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ waak waakɛnda naŋŋɛ bala ati yɔɔda bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, yɔmjin doki ne Juaŋ Yaccu naŋŋɛ kanŋa ɛkɛ cwamdɛ te taaby. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ eccin kɛɛgin ne coŋɔn aŋka ñoowɔ iki ɛkɛ te pwani ɛkɛ. Acaan Yaccu a mena ɛkkɛn wɛɛdɛ nona ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ Juaŋy.
58002011	Yaccu ma pɔŋnɛ te nɔjjo. Ɔci ɛkɛ i maka pɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ te nɔji neeni Wey ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu lɔɔddi te barŋa ɛkkɛn bardɛ a modin bɛɛ.
58002012	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin Juaŋti agi, “Modg ɔɔn nɔɔtka ‘ya te yenti i, ɔci ‘ya ‘ualja te yenti i kaniicaji.”
58002013	Ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi, “Paŋi ‘ya ḍuacca aŋa Juaŋti.” Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi, “‘Ya wɛnni iki kɛɛgin ‘ya ‘wonnata Juaŋ nɛ.”
58002014	Acaan kɛɛgin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ma baano, ɔci Yaccu daŋkun aŋi men baan ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn. Ɔci te lyen ɛkɛ neeni ɛkɛ mena balki jyek lien neeniyɛ, nuudɛ jitin. Gena Jwaŋa Yaayan.
58002015	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka ciyi kɛñji jitin neeni pɔŋnɛyɔ ɛkɛ te kɛñji acaan ɛkkɛn buayi lien ne tolan.
58002016	Oŋ yeti awarɛyɛ, ɛkɛ moki malɛɛkan bɛɛ. “Ɛkɛ moki gena kɛɛn Abrahim.”
58002017	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ bala ba modgɛn te waak waakɛnda aŋka ɛkɛ yomɛ pwada ɛkkɛnti ɔci noŋdi ba jyek gaciic tolan Ma Yahuud awarɛ te wak Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka ɛkɛ ma wandɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn.
58002018	Acaan ɛkɛ taabbin, ɔci ɛkɛ pɔɔññɛ Jwaŋa Yaayanyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun yaakinti moki maka pɔɔdɛ Jwaŋa Yaayany.
58003001	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, hay modg ɔɔn maka pwadgin Juaŋ ñamɛti maka bornɛ Juaŋy, dala ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena cuonnɛ ɛkɛ a gaciic tolan ɔci a Ciɛggɔn jyeni ikin neeniy.
58003002	Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena noŋi ba jwali Juaŋ mena ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ a gaciic tolan bala ba Muuca ne baali noŋi ba jwali Juaŋ on Juaŋy.
58003003	Oŋ a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ pwatcin ne tolan te Muuca bala ba mena eñi ony. Acaan kan men gɛɛl eñi onyɛ, ma noŋi ne pwadan ɛkɛti ne tolan te ono.
58003004	Oorg waakɛndayɛ, eetan ma a een balki maka cɔti ɛkkɛny, oŋ yeti Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena cɔti waak waakɛnday.
58003005	Oŋ yeti awarɛyɛ, Muuca bala gɔṭi on Juaŋ ne pwadan ba mena kanŋan a kanŋin ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala nɔɔti ma te waka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi balgɔ bɛɛdɔ te oŋka bɛɛdɔ ne ŋoyɔy.
58003006	Oŋ yeti Kiṭɔ bala gɔṭi on Juaŋ ne pwadan acaan ɛkɛ a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ikin agin on ɛkɛ kan ikin ɛkɛ tieŋnin ne pwadan te yomg ikin, ɔci kan ikin yomgɔ ŋoodan te waka pwadin waka ɛkɛ buagɔn acaan ‘wontin ikin neeni bɛɛy.
58003007	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba jyeka guagdi Boŋ Juaŋ agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ pwan Juaŋ te oŋiyɛ,
58003008	naa ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ tɛy tɛy ba naŋka naŋɛ yɔrg ɛkkɛ te baaṭi wanna bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ yookɔn te jyek ‘ya ne ɛkkɛn balki wɔɔŋjiy.
58003009	Ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘ya pɔɔka, ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔrcin naŋki ‘ya yuong ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔ (40).
58003010	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya baal looñ ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan ka ɛkkɛn oŋkanda noŋi nɔji yomgɛnti, yeti ɛkkɛn pɔɔk ‘ya ŋeecɔn bɛɛ.
58003011	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya gɔkcan te loñk awarɛ ɛkkɛnti ka naa ɛkkɛn kaatti nona wooti ma nona ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.”
58003012	Hay modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, naa menga baltan yoma yaayan yoma baaw Juaŋti te dwakta ɛkɛ dɔɔdi ŋoyɔ te Jwaŋa tɛɛti neeniti bɛɛ.
58003013	Dala ɛkkɛ ṭeewɛ yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda ba jyek jwalla gɔki agi “Te Oŋŋo,” aŋka naa menga ɛkkɛti wyeñɛ tɛya te maalla ɛkɛ maaldɛ nɔji bɛɛ.
58003014	Kan ikin yɔɔnnin ne tɛyan Jwaŋa Tolanti ne baaṭi ɔɔn ba bolja ikin jɔɔnnin jyettin ɛkɛti ñamu neeniyɛ, ikin ñootin a cyɛɛlɔ waakida Yaccu Kiṭɔti.
58003015	Bala ba Boŋ Juaŋ ne gɔki agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ pwan Juaŋ te oŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ tɛy tɛy bɛɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka naŋɛ yɔrg ɛkkɛ ne ɛkkɛn jyecki bora wɔɔŋji yookiti te jyek Juaŋ wanna bɛɛ.”
58003016	Oŋ a makɛ tieŋjin pwan Juaŋ ɔci looñjiny? Gena maka koonɛ Muuca bora te ban Macory.
58003017	Oŋ a makɛ Juaŋ looñjin ɛkkɛnti yuong a ma baan ne yyɛɛwɔy (40)? Gena maka noŋi nɔji, ɔci ɛkkɛn a maka tuun wɔɔŋjiy.
58003018	Juaŋ gɔkcin makɛti te loñk awarɛ agi, “Naa ɛkkɛn kaatti nona wooti ma nona ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛy?” Gena maka yookɔn waakɛn te tieŋŋin jyek ɛkɛy.
58003019	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, yuartin ikin ɛkkɛn yaaŋnɛti kaaccin nona wooti ma neeni bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn jyeti Juaŋti bɛɛ.
58004001	Oŋ kan ne Juaŋ bala ikin ḍuaññin te jwali aŋka ikin kaattin nona wooti may, dala ikin buattin aŋka naa menga ikinti dita dɛndi nona wooti ma aŋan baaw bɛɛ.
58004002	Acaan ikin lalkin ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin bala ba ɛkkɛn ne lalkiti ma daŋkuny. Oŋ yeti jyeka tieŋjɛ ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, yɔmjin te genga ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Acaan maka tieŋŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeti jyeka neeni te yoma awarɛ bɛɛ.
58004003	Oŋ yeti ikin a maka jyeti Jwaŋa Tolanti neeni aŋka kaattin nona wooti may. Gena guagdɛ Juaŋ agi, “‘Ya gɔkcan te loñk awarɛ ɛkkɛnti ka, ‘Naa ɛkkɛn kaatti nona wooti ma nona ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.’ ”
58004004	Juaŋ gɔki a ɔɔn ne ɛkɛ ḍookki te kanŋa wona ɛkɛ okki waaky. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki worgaji te ninna akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ agi, “Jwaŋa Tolan wooki te ninna akki ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔ neeni ne ɛkɛ ḍookki te kanŋa ɛkɛy.”
58004005	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi, “Naa ɛkkɛn kaatti nona wooti ma nona ‘woñga ‘ya ɛkkɛn neeni bɛɛ.”
58004006	Acaan maka lali ma ñamu te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn kaaccin nona wooti ma bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin jyek Juaŋ bɛɛ. Maka pookɛn gɛɛg kaatti nona wooti ma acaan ɛkkɛn tieŋŋin jyek Juaŋo.
58004007	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ oŋŋa parɛ gɛɛl kɛnnɛ bora barŋɛ agi, “Te Oŋŋo.” Ɛkɛ gɔki ɔɔn te tuk Daawud te baaṭi agi, “Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ pwan Juaŋ te oŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ tɛya bɛɛ.”
58004008	Kan te Jɔcwa ma Icrayiil kaannɛ nona wooti ɛkkɛnyɛ, te Juaŋ moki gɔki te oŋŋa parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ. Yeti Jɔcwa ɛkkɛn kaannɛ aŋan bɛɛ.
58004009	Ma Juaŋ aŋka balki wooka ba wooka woonɛ Juaŋ te ninna akki dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔy.
58004010	Kan mena kaatti nona wooti ma nona ma ‘wondɛ Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ woodi te kanŋa ɛkɛ bala ba Juaŋ ne wookki te kanŋa ɛkɛy.
58004011	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin kantin ne pɛñan aŋka ikin kaattin nona wooti ma neenitiy. Dala ikin buattin aŋka naa menga ḍaga yomu budan te kaaccin ɛkɛ kaatti nona wooti ma neeni te naŋki waka bala ba waka naŋi maka jyek Juaŋ lɛɛgɛ jitin waayi bɛɛ.
58004012	Jwali Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ tɛɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ kanŋan mati. Ɛkɛ byeŋgaaran balki lɛkɛ ne yyɛɛwɔ buannɛ te ñɔjjo. Ɛkɛ i waru ŋwoddɛ jitin i booŋo, ɔci wɔtti owi jitin ɔci ṭuŋiti. Ɛkɛ paŋi ma baan ɔci waka yomg ma baan buagɛ byɛŋdɛji waakɛnda.
58004013	Genga bala warɛ a coggɔn Juaŋti bɛɛ. Waak waakɛnda waakɛn a liɛlgin Juaŋ woŋgɛti. Ɛkɛ a mena myettin ikin naŋki ikin waakɛnday.
58004014	Ikin balkin gaciic tolan. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ Juaŋti, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala jyeni ikin muktin ikin yomgɔti ne tɛyan.
58004015	Ikin balkin Yaccu a gaciic tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti ikin maktin te war koñi ikin, acaan ɛkɛ pɔɔññɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan te waak waakɛnda ba ikin ɔɔn, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ noŋi nɔji bɛɛ.
58004016	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin ortinti Jwaŋ naŋki pwaniti te yoma tɛyan aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ ikinti, ɔci ikin yɔɔrtin yom pwani Juaŋo. Ɔci ne naŋka yeyin bɛɛti ikintiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin maktin.
58005001	Ɔci gaciicin ḍwaŋin waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn lɔɔttan ma bora te ma jitin, aŋka kanŋan kanŋa Juaŋ te ma waakɛnda. Mena gaciic tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ waak ‘wondɛ Juaŋ te mako. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛṭi waak Juaŋti te mako. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ ɛkkɛn bɔɔktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn.
58005002	Ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti moki maka noŋi nɔji, ɔci maka pɔy Juaŋ ŋeecɔn bɛɛy, acaan ɛkɛ da warɛ koy koy ba ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
58005003	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ da warɛ ‘yɛrdɛ te nɔji ɛkɛ bala ba bolja ɛkɛ ɛṭi ma ɛkɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn wanna ɔɔn.
58005004	Yeti menga warɛ naŋdɛ aga gaciic tolan parɛ bɛɛ. Gena mena borti Juaŋ a borkin bala ba Juaŋ ne Haruun borniy.
58005005	Oŋ Kiṭɔ daŋkunyɛ, warɛ olnɛ ñamu parɛ nona ɛkɛ agɛ gaciic tolan neeniti bɛɛ. Gena Juaŋ aŋka gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “I a Kaci ‘ya. I jiennin ‘ya te oŋŋo.”
58005006	Ɔci Juaŋ gɔki worga kona parɛ gɛɛlti moki agi, “I ag gaciic younginda ba Mɛlki Caadik.”
58005007	Ne Yaccu men baali ciyi te coodi ma baanyɛ, ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti, ɔci bala wiak te pyeg woŋgɛ Juaŋti, ɔci bala yaadan Juaŋti acaan Juaŋ yaakinti ɛkɛ yɔɔdɛ te lieno. Ɔci Juaŋ tieŋŋin cɔŋi ɛkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ bala noŋi ba jyek Juaŋo.
58005008	Ɛkɛ a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, oŋ yeti ɛkɛ yaaŋnɛti tiit jyek Juaŋ te taab ɛkɛ neeni.
58005009	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ cwamnɛ Weegɛnyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi mena yuoci maka tyeŋi jyek ɛkɛ waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy.
58005010	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ ɛkɛ barŋɛ a gaciic tolan ba Mɛlki Caadik.
58005011	’Ya buaga ɛkkɛ myettin jiek ne coŋɔn te jwalla neeni, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn lwoŋŋɛn tɛɛcin ɛkkɛti, acaan ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba maka miŋko.
58005012	Awarɛ, ɛkkɛ balkɛ wɔɔka aŋka te ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka loṭi mako, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛ buagɛ dɔkɔ mena ɛkkɛ laldɛ te jɔɔtcin ɛkkɛ jɔɔttɛ te lali jwali Juaŋy. Ɛkkɛ buagɛ jyek Juaŋ jyeka koyan ba aak neeni, ɛkkɛ buagɛ oomdin tɛyan bɛɛ.
58005013	Mena moti aakyɛ, ɛkɛ a kacco, ɔci ɛkɛ a mena jyeka pwadin ŋeejɛ bɛɛy.
58005014	Oŋ yeti oomdin tɛyanyɛ, gena oomdin maka ḍwaŋin maka tɛyan, acaan ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛɛn ɔci yaaŋnɛti naŋka pwadan ŋeejjɛ, ɔci naŋka yeyin ŋeejjɛ moki.
58006001	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala bolja ikin loṭin ñɔkin a ñwaŋi a jiek ŋwayya ne cyɛɛlɔ a ñaccu te jyek jyenna ma jyetti Kiṭɔti neeniyɛ, daltin lakun. Dala ikin ‘uottin ñamu lalla korkɛn twotinti. Naa ikin moki dɔɔtin ŋoyɔ aŋka gɔwwin te jyek bolja ma waakɛn yaltiti te naŋka yeyin naŋka etti lienti bɛɛ, ɔci moki te jyek jyenna ma jyetti Juaŋti bɛɛ,
58006002	ɔci te jyek lali bulti ma ɔci tañña ma byeŋkɛn tantiti ma wyetkɛnti bɛɛ, ɔci jɔŋŋin maka a tuutan jɔŋti ñaalɔ te lienti bɛɛ, ɔci ywobji Juaŋ ywobja baadi bɛya neeniti bɛɛ.
58006003	Kan Juaŋ ikin daltinyɛ, dala ikin ‘uottin ñamu te naŋki waka neeniti!
58006004	Oŋ kan magga jyeni ɛkkɛn dalji dokiyɛ, dɔɔkkin ɛkkɛn dɔɔktiti aŋka waakɛn yaltitiyɛ, koocin ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bala te ñamu non Juaŋ nona dɛki, ɔci ɛkkɛn dɛccin gena ma ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ te ñaalɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn balki ñoowin Boŋ Juaŋ daŋkun.
58006005	Ɔci ɛkkɛn jwalla pwadan ŋeejjɛ te Juaŋti, ɔci naŋka tɛyan naŋka bɛya ñomgɔti neeni ŋeejjɛ daŋkun.
58006006	Oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ, ɔci dɔɔkkin ɛkkɛn dɔɔkti aŋka waakɛn yaltitiyɛ, kooccin ɛkkɛnti moki bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛn Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan ŋaaptan ñaalɔ kakanti moki te naŋki yoñ ɛkkɛn aŋka ɛkɛ ‘wontan lɔɔn ma ñomgɛnti.
58006007	Acaan ṭɛɛr ne ñaal liɛbi ɛkɛti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ moti piego. Kan ɛkɛ poka piidi ma yuoldɛ ñaalɔ ne pwadan maka dwokiti neeniyɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pwad pwad ṭɛra neeniti.
58006008	Oŋ yeti kan ṭɛɛr etti kuwi ɔci janga yeyinyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘waldɛ Juaŋo, ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkɛ amdɛ maaño.
58006009	Mung ɔɔn, ‘ya gɔkkan doki te waka yeyin, yeti ŋeej ‘ya ne pwadan ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ waka pwadin te Juaŋti acaan ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ ɛkɛ.
58006010	Acaan Juaŋ menga amdɛji te genga bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ñingɛ yeya te naŋki ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, ɔci te anna lɛɛlni ɛkkɛ bora ɛkɛti te yenti ɛkɛ ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ kanŋɛ mokɛ Ma Kiṭɔy, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ kanŋɛ te maka neeni men ɔɔn.
58006011	Ɔci ɔɔn buagɔn men da war tɛɛn ɛkɛ lɛɛldi bora warda ne naŋka neeni baadi ɔɔn, a ɔŋŋi ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ waka pwadin waka kɛɛdɛ ɛkkɛ neeni te Juaŋti.
58006012	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔɔn buagɔn naa ɛkkɛ waakɔ morndi bɛɛ, oŋ yeti dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba maka jyeti jwali Juaŋ, ɔci yomgɛn tiektany. A ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn mwoki waka pwadin te Juaŋti waka jwallɛn ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛy.
58006013	Ne Juaŋ Abrahim ḍuaññɛ te jwaliyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin awarɛ te yenti ɛkɛ, acaan menga bala tolcin te Juaŋ aŋka ɛkɛ gɔŋni te yenti mena parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛ.
58006014	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya noŋja ne pwadan iti awarɛ, ɔci kɛɛn i naŋdi ne coŋɔn.”
58006015	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Abrahim yomɛ tieŋnɛ ɔci yɔṭi waka ɛkɛ ḍuaññɛ Juaŋy.
58006016	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ma gɔki awarɛ te mena tolan te ɛkkɛny, ɔci jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn awarɛyɛ, jyek pɛɛdin yɔɔdɛyɔ waakɛnda.
58006017	Acaan Juaŋ buagɔn maka jyeti jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ neeni nɔɔttɛ ne pwadan agi paŋi ɛkɛ agjiyɔ moki bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin agi, “‘Ya gɔkka awarɛ.”
58006018	Ikin balkin jyeka ikin ḍuaññinti ɛkɛ, ɔci jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te yenti ɛkɛ awarɛy. Waka yaakkɛn neeniyɛ, yɔɔd ne tɛyan, Juaŋ yaakinti jomi jiek te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci ikin yiŋŋin Juaŋti, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin yɔɔññin, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin myennin awarɛ aŋka ikin yomgɔ tiektin ne ikin jyettin kɛɛyin waka pwadin, waka ikin ḍuaññinti ɛkɛ te jwali aŋka ikin ‘wontin ɛkkɛny.
58006019	Jwalla ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te waka pwadin neeniyɛ, bala ba lɔña tɛyan coodi ikinti, ɛkɛ tɛɛna tɛɛno. Jwalla ikin ḍuaññinti Juaŋ neeni moki, ikin wɛɛtin ne jiju bworŋa on Juaŋ ona a bworŋji neeni aŋka ikin dɛntin nona baali Jwaŋa Tolany.
58006020	Gena nona kaanni Yaccu ñamu te ikiny, ɔci ɛkɛ aŋi gaciic tolan yuonginda ba Mɛlki Caadik.
58007001	Mɛlki Caadik neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a ciɛggɔn tolan ban Celam. Ɛkɛ a gaciic Jwaŋa Tolan. Gena ɛkɛ ati kookcin Abrahimti ne Abrahim dɔɔŋni te nona ɛkɛ cyekin pookɛn cyekin ḍwaŋin buannɛy. Ɔci Mɛlki Caadik cɔkcin ne pwadan Juaŋti aŋka Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan Abrahimti.
58007002	Ɔci ɛkɛ kɛnnɛ Abrahim gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka a inyaakkɛnti te waka yoolnɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda neeni. Kon yenti ɛkɛ a Mɛlki Caadik neeni agi, “Ciɛggɔn Tolan Ciɛggɔn Naŋka Pwadan.” Ɔci ɛkɛ bartan ma a ciɛggɔn ban Celam ciɛggɔn tolan. Yenta a ciɛggɔn tolan ban Celam neeni kon ɛkɛ agi, “Ciɛggɔn Tolan Ciɛggɔn Coodda Pwadan.”
58007003	Ɛkɛ balkɔn weegɛn ɔci mɛɛgɛn ɔci yɔrgɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ balkɔn oŋŋa ɛkɛ jɔɔnnɛ te coodi ɔci oŋŋa coodi ɛkɛ wyeñɛ baadi bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkɛ bala ba Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan, acaan ɛkɛ a gaciic Jwaŋa Tolan oŋki waakɛnda.
58007004	Gɔṭṭɛ moki, ‘wana neeniyɛ, tolcin hay! Aŋka Abrahim yɔr weyi ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti te waka oonɛ ɛkɛ waakɛndati neeniy.
58007005	Ɔci gaciicin kɛɛn Laawiyɛ, ganuun gɔki ɛkkɛnti aŋka ɛkkɛn eedi gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti te mati. Ɛkkɛn eedi waak te modg ɛkkɛn modga bɛɛn te Abrahimtiy.
58007006	Oŋ yeti Mɛlki Caadikyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn te kɛɛn Laawiti bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ eci gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti te Abrahimti, ɔci ɛkɛ cɔkcin Juaŋti aŋka Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan Abrahimti. Gena Abrahim ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛy.
58007007	Awarɛ, gena mena tolan aŋka gɔkti jyeka pwadin mena ḍiɛrantiy.
58007008	Gaciicin kɛɛn Laawi maka eci gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti waakɛnda neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka tuwa lakun. Yeti Mɛlki Caadik mena eci gena ne cyɛɛlɔ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti neeni, worga Juaŋ gɔki agi ɛkta tuudɔ bɛɛ, agi waka ‘wontan ma Juaŋ te waka ne inyaakkɛnti neeni limmɛ Mɛlki Caadik mena tɛɛti neeni.
58007009	Ɔci ‘ya gɔkca te ma Laawi maka eci waak te mati neeni, ka ɛkkɛn daŋkun ḍɔccin waka neeni ne ɛkkɛn men balki te Abrahim konɛtiy.
58007010	Acaan te wɔɔka Mɛlki Caadik kookki i Abrahim waayiyɛ, Laawi men biɛṭi te yɔr ɛkkɛn Abrahim konɛti.
58007011	Juaŋ ma ‘wonnɛ ganuun te gaciicin ma Laawi, ɔci te kanŋa yɔmni te gaciicin ma Laawiyɛ, te Juaŋ moki noŋdi gaciic parɛ mena bala ba Mɛlki Caadik neeni boki? A’a. Yeti Juaŋ noŋi gaciic parɛ bala ba Mɛlki Caadik neeni ɔɔn acaan kanŋa ma Laawi bɔɔnjin, ɔci gaciic neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba Haruun bɛɛ.
58007012	Kan kanŋa gaciicin warɛ aaŋŋɛyɛ, ganuun warɛ agdɛ daŋkun.
58007013	Kiṭɔ mena guagdɛ Juaŋ mena bala ba Mɛlki Caadik neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛɛn te kɛɛna parɛti. Ɔci maka te kɛɛna neenitiyɛ, menga noŋi kanŋa ‘yɛrŋ waak neeni bɛɛ.
58007014	Oŋ yeti awarɛyɛ, Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛn te kɛɛn Yahuujati, ɔci Muuca gɔki jwali gɛɛl te kɛɛna neeni te jyek gaciicin bɛɛ.
58007015	Naŋka neeni warɛ liɛllɛ ne pwadan moki, acaan gaciic parɛ gɛɛl warɛ liɛllɛ bala ba Mɛlki Caadik ɔɔn.
58007016	Ɛkɛ naŋɛ ma a gaciic ba jyek ganuun ma baan bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a gaciic te war tɛɛn tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛy.
58007017	Ɔci worga Jwaŋa Tolan gɔki agi, “I agdi gaciic oŋki waakɛnda ba Mɛlki Caadik.”
58007018	Waka ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn baaw yɔɔni acaan ɛkkɛn bɔɔnjin, ɛkkɛn yɔmjin te genga bɛɛ.
58007019	Acaan ganuun Muuca genga naŋŋɛ ḍaaŋŋɛ warda bɛɛ, oŋ yeti acca Juaŋ gɔkkin te jyek waka pwadin ɛkɛ buagɔn ‘wontin ikiny, ɔci te jwalla neeniyɛ, ikin ortinti Jwaŋa Tolanti.
58007020	Ɔci jyeka neeniyɛ, Juaŋ gɔkcin ɛkkɛn budan bɛɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ɛkkɛn te yenti ɛkɛ awarɛ!
58007021	Ɔci maka pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋi gaciicin budan. Juaŋ gɔkcin ɛkkɛnti te yenti ɛkɛ awarɛ bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti Yaccuyɛ, aŋi gaciic te jwalla awarɛ ne Juaŋ gɔŋni ɛkɛti agi, “Ciɛggɔn paŋi ɛkɛ agdɛyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin awarɛ agi, ‘I a gaciic oŋki waakɛnda.’ ”
58007022	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu aŋi mena ikin woŋgɔ ñiektin a Juaŋ noŋdi waka ikin ḍuaññinti ɛkɛ te jwali a waka pwadin neeni ikinti.
58007023	Awarɛ, gaciicin ma Laawiyɛ, ɛkkɛn coŋɔ, acaan ɛkkɛn tuw ɔci yaakinti noŋi kanŋa moki bɛɛ.
58007024	Oŋ Yaccuyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka bala oŋki waakɛnda, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kanŋa ɛkɛ agi gaciic neeniyɛ, luldɛ menga bɛɛ.
58007025	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti maka ortiti Juaŋti te ɛkɛyɛ, yɔɔdɛ oŋki waakɛnda, acaan ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti te ɛkkɛn oŋkanda, ɔci ɛkɛ tuwa oŋgati bɛɛ.
58007026	Acaan Yaccu a gaciic tolan, a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ yɔmjin te ikin ɔci ɛkɛ a mena pwadan, ɛkɛ balkɔn nɔji bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ balkɔn naŋka yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ kooyin bora te maka a nɔɔtkti doki. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ciyi ñaalɔ ban Jwaŋa Tolan.
58007027	Ɛkɛ bala ba maka a gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud neeni bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn eci waka ‘yɛrtan ɛkkɛn oŋkanda te nɔji ɛkkɛn ñamu, ɔci te nɔji mako. Yaccu buagɔn noŋdi a ɔɔn bɛɛ, te nɔji mayɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi naŋka neeni oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ ne ɛkɛ ŋaapkiti ma kakantiy.
58007028	Acaan ganuun Muuca maka waakɛn koyanyɛ, muodɛ bora aga gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud, oŋ yeti jyek Juaŋ jyeka awarɛ bɛɛn ganuun ŋoyɛti, ɛkɛ mwoki Kaci Juaŋ aŋka aga gaciic tolan awarɛ oŋki waakɛnda.
58008001	Jyeka a jiek wyetkɛnyɛ, ikin balkin gaciic tolan a ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ cooccin ñaalɔ pɔliji kaakci Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti byeŋa byerɔn non Ḍɔŋ Jwaŋa Tolan.
58008002	Ɔci ɛkɛ bala kanŋan Nona Pwadan Ne Tolanti. Gena on Juaŋ ona awarɛ, ona cɔnnɛ Ciɛggɔny. Gena ona cɔdɛ ma baan bɛɛy.
58008003	Kanŋa gaciic tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi kanŋa waka ‘yɛrtan ma Juaŋti i waka ‘wontan ma Juaŋy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Kiṭɔ mena gaciic tolan neeniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ daŋkun etti genga Juaŋti.
58008004	Kan te ɛkɛ baali ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ te aŋi gaciic bɛɛ. Acaan gaciicin ‘woñi waak te jyek ganuun Ma Yahuudyɛ, bala doki.
58008005	Ɔci ɛkkɛn kanŋan a muacin budan te ṭiebji waka bala ñaalɔ pɔlijiy. Bala ba Muuca ne buagi eyi on Juaŋyɛ, Juaŋ gɔkcin ɛkɛti agi, “Dala i waŋu tiicca, ɔci noŋja waak waakɛnda ba naŋka i nɔɔnnin poomtiy.”
58008006	Oŋ yeti accayɛ, Yaccu ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ kanŋa pwadan te kanŋa gaciicin ḍwaŋin Ma Yahuud waayi, acaan jwalla naŋŋɛ Juaŋ a ɛkɛ a cuuda Juaŋ ma ɛkɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka pwatcin ne tolan, acaan jwalla neeni yɔɔnnɛ iñɔ Juaŋ te jyeka ḍuaññɛ ɛkɛ a jyek waka pwadin ne tolany.
58008007	Kan jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ñamu yɔmjin dokiyɛ, oŋ te Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn noŋdi jyeka pookɛn moki boki? A’a.
58008008	Ɔci Juaŋ bala wooki maka te ñamu ne ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Ciɛggɔn gɔki agi, ‘Hay, oŋka bɛya neeniyɛ, ‘ya noŋdin ikin kɛɛn Icrayiil ɔci kɛɛn Yahuuja jyeka wonkɛn.
58008009	Oŋ yeti bala ba jyeka naŋi ‘ya i yɔrg ɛkkɛn oŋŋa ‘ya ɛkkɛn muoŋŋa te byeŋkɛn acaan kooya bora te ban Macor wanna bɛɛ. Ɔci ne ɛkkɛn jyek ‘ya tiikitiyɔ bɛɛyɛ, ‘ya ɛkkɛn daljan noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn. ‘Ya waŋu tiiccan ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.’
58008010	Ɔci Ciɛggɔn gɔki moki agi, ‘Ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ‘ya noŋdin jiek iki ma Icrayiil, ɔci ganuun ‘ya ḍuacca ‘ya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti, ɔci ḍuacca ‘ya ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti, ɔci ‘ya agdi Juaŋ ɛkkɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn aga ma ‘ya.
58008011	Ɔci ɛkkɛn modgɛn laltan moki bɛɛ. Walla gɔkti modgɛnti agi, “Dala ɛkkɛn Ciɛggɔn ŋeettan bɛɛ,” acaan ɛkkɛn ‘ya ŋeecka waakɛnda doki. Gena maka ḍyɛrin ɔci maka ḍwaŋin.
58008012	Ɔci ‘ya ɛkkɛn bɔɔka te nɔji ɛkkɛn, ɔci ‘ya poŋja te nɔji ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ.’ ”
58008013	Ɔci te jwali Juaŋ jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te jyeka wonkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛka ñamu naŋŋɛ aŋi daan doki. Ɔci waak waakɛnda waka aŋi donk neeniyɛ, noŋi baadi doki.
58009001	Jyeka naŋɛ Juaŋ i ma ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ te malla ɛkkɛn mortɛ Juaŋti a ɔkiy, ɔci aŋka ma ona morki ɛkkɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni cɔttan a ɔki.
58009002	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ona a bworŋ cɔdɛ ma yenti Nona Pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ balkɔn dyɛkan dɛki, ɔci tarabɛɛca ɔci byedga ‘wontan ma Juaŋy.
58009003	Ɔci on kona neenitiyɛ, bworŋa kɛkci ma bala. Ɔci on kona bworŋa neeni ŋoyɛtiyɛ, bartan ma agi, “Nona Pwadan Ne Tolany.”
58009004	Gena on ṭɔla balkɔn gena ṭuorki ma jien gena naŋi ma te dahab, ɔci canduuk jyeka ḍyɛŋŋɛ Juaŋ canduuk naŋɛ ma te dahab warɛ warday. Ɔci kulla naŋi ma te dahab kulla ḍuacki ma ama bartan ma a “Manna” ama ma ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ te ñaalɔ pɔliji, ɔci gɔl Haruun gɔla pworŋ, ɔci gwoyi ṭɔlgɛn kieññi Juaŋ jyeka ḍyɛŋŋɛ ɛkɛyɛ, bala jiju canduuk neeniji wɛnan.
58009005	Ɔci canduuk neeni wyeñɛtiyɛ, malɛɛkan bartan ma agi caryubim bala yɔɔd ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɛkkɛn mieti ma agi Juaŋ baalɔ nona yɔtki ɛkkɛn wanna, ɔci ɛkkɛn kɔggɛn nona Juaŋ bɔɔci ma te nɔji kwomiyɔ. Oŋ yeti accayɛ, wɔɔka gɛɛl bala aŋka lookin jiek korkɛn bɛɛ.
58009006	Waak waakɛnda a ywaŋgɔn a ɔŋŋi, gaciicin kaatti on kona ñamu oŋkanda aŋka noŋi kanŋa.
58009007	Oŋ yeti on kona parɛtiyɛ, gaciic tolan Ma Yahuud aŋka kaatti parɛ oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ te ywonna ne cyɛɛlɔ. Oŋ yeti ɛkɛ kaatti budan bɛɛ, ɛkɛ eedi yimg gena ŋardɛ ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkɛ, ɔci te nɔjja naŋɛ ma ɛkɛy.
58009008	Boŋ Juaŋ nɔɔti te Nona Pwadan Ne Tolan agi pɔy tuktan agi uulgɔn, acaan ona yɔɔd bora bala yɔɔd men.
58009009	Ɔci kanŋa a ywaŋgɔn neeniyɛ, nɔɔti te oŋka accay. Waka ‘wontan ma Juaŋ ɔci waka ŋartan mayɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti nɔji ma eetan ɔntɔ te ma yomgɛnti bɛɛ.
58009010	Oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn a waka amtin, ɔci waka maattin, ɔci lɔɔŋa luaktan ma jitkɛn ne coŋɔny. Ɛkkɛn kandi te waka neeni ɔɔn ne kanŋa woonɛ neeni bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
58009011	Oŋ yeti Yaccuyɛ, ne ɛkɛ bɛɛni aŋŋi gaciic tolan te jyek waka pwadin waka bala acca neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ doki kaaccin on Juaŋ ñaalɔ ona naŋɛ ma te byeŋkɛn bɛɛ neeni. Ona kaannɛ ɛkɛ neeni tol tolo, ɔci pwatcin ne tolan te oorga naŋtan ma te byeŋkɛn. Ɔci ona neeni te ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bɛɛ.
58009012	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ kaanni Nona Pwadan Ne Tolanti oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, ɛkɛ kaaccin te yimg ḍɛɛk ɔci yimg yotk ṭɔlgɛn bɛɛ, yeti ɛkɛ kaaccin te yimg ɛkɛ parɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin eeŋnin yɔɔta baadi bɛɛy.
58009013	Oŋ kan gañi yimg ḍɛɛk ɔci yotk, ɔci twon neek ṭɔlgɛn a moong, maka a nɔɔtk ywaŋtan pwaddi Juaŋ ñamɛtiy,
58009014	oŋ poca, gɔrca! Yaccu Kiṭɔ, yimg ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan ne tolan ikinti. Ɛkɛ warɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ ba gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ Juaŋti pwadan te Boŋa baadi bɛɛy. Ɔci yimg ɛkɛ nɔji ikin eetan ɔntɔ te ikin yomgɔti i waka budan neeni aŋka ikin mortin Jwaŋa tɛɛtiy!
58009015	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkɛ a cuuda jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wonkɛn aŋka maka bornɛ Juaŋ neeni yɔɔrdi waka pwadin waka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi ‘woñji ɛkkɛn waka baadi bɛɛy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ tuun aŋka ma wandɛ te nɔjja naŋɛ ɛkkɛn ne ɛkkɛn balki cieki te jyeka naŋŋi Juaŋ ñamuy.
58009016	Ɔci kan men ne noŋi tuudiyɛ, jyeka ɛkɛ buagɛ aŋka naŋtan mayɛ, kiiddɛ ɛkɛ worgaji, yeti kan ɛkɛ tuun men bɛɛyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ yɔmdi te genga men bɛɛ.
58009017	Jyeka kiinɛ mena tuun worgaji neeniyɛ, balkɔn war tɛɛn ne mena kieñi ɛkkɛn neeni tuuni dokiy. Oŋ kan men tɛɛti menyɛ, jyeka neeni balkɔn war tɛɛn bɛɛ.
58009018	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ ñamuyɛ, yɔɔtcin iñɔ ne tɛyan budan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yɔɔtcin iñɔ te yimgo.
58009019	Te ñamuyɛ, Muuca ne ma nɔɔnnɛ te jyek ganuun jitkɛn waakɛndayɛ, ɛkɛ oŋ yimg yotk ɔci yimg ḍɛɛk ñaaŋŋɛyɔ i pieg ɔci gannɛ worga ganuunti, ɔci gannɛ ma waakɛnti moki. Ɛkɛ bala goci te aamk min ɔci jyeyya tidan.
58009020	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Yimga neeniyɛ, gena yimga guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi, ‘Dala naŋjɛ ɛkkɛy.’ ”
58009021	Muuca yimg gannɛ ona a bworŋti, ɔci yimg gannɛ waka morki mati moki.
58009022	Waak waakɛnda pwaddi te yimg te jyek ganuun. Kan yimg pwokci ma bɛɛyɛ, buat nɔji gɛɛl bala bɛɛ.
58009023	Ona a bworŋ ona morki ma ɔci waka bala jiju ɛkɛ konɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a muacin budan, a waka awarɛ ba waka ñaalɔ pɔliji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn waakɛn pwaddi te oljin yimg oltiti ma ɛkkɛntiy. Oŋ yeti waka ñaalɔ pɔlijiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛn pwaddi te waka ‘yɛrtan ma pwadin ne tolany.
58009024	Acaan Kiṭɔ kaaccin Nona Pwadan Ne Tolan naŋi ma baan nona a muacin neeni bɛɛy. Oŋ yeti ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ pɔliji aŋka warɛ liɛldɛ bora Juaŋ ñamɛti te ikin.
58009025	Gaciic tolan Ma Yahuudyɛ, ɛkɛ kaatti Nona Pwadan oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ te ywoni te yimg maalo. Yeti Kiṭɔ warɛ ‘wondɛ ma noktan te ikin, gɔ moki nokin a ñaccu ɔɔn bɛɛ.
58009026	Te baali a ɔɔnyɛ, Kiṭɔ te tuun oŋki ne coŋɔn te ma waakɛnda wona noon aŋŋɛ Juaŋy. Oŋ yeti te oŋka ookkin ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci nɔji eññɛ ɔntɔ te naŋka ɛkɛ warɛ naŋŋɛ a gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ Juaŋti neeni.
58009027	Men baanyɛ, tuwa oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ lakun, Juaŋ oŋ hayya gɔrti jyek godan ɛkɛ oŋo.
58009028	A ɔɔn daŋkun Kiṭɔ tuun oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋka nɔji ma waakɛnda eedɛ ɔntɔ. Ɔci ɛkɛ dɔɔkti te nɔji moki bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ dɔɔkti aŋka maka kɛɛy ɛkɛ neeni yɔɔdɛ.
58010001	Ganuun Ma Yahuud, ɛkɛ a ṭiebji waka pwadin waka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni budan. Ɛkɛ awarɛ ba waka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, waka ‘yɛrtan ma Juaŋti yuonginda neeni yaakinti maka moṭi Juaŋti neeni naŋtan pwaddi bɛɛ.
58010002	Oŋ kan te waka ‘yɛrtan ma neeni yaakinti nɔji eetan ɔntɔyɛ, te ma yɔɔni te ‘yɛrŋ ɛkkɛn doki. Acaan maka moṭi Juaŋti neeni te nɔji ɛkkɛn te eyɛ waka neeni doki, ɔci te ɛkkɛn yaakinti poŋi te nɔji ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, te waka ‘yɛrtan ma neeni te yɔɔni waakɛnda doki.
58010003	Yeti ma ɛṭi waka neeni yuonginda aŋka ma poŋdi te nɔji ɛkkɛn.
58010004	Acaan yimg yotk ɔci yimg ḍɛɛk yaakinti nɔji eetan ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
58010005	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne Yaccu buaŋŋɛ woon bɛɛdi iñɔ ṭɛɛrjiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin Juaŋti agi, “Waka ‘yɛrtan ma ɔci waka ‘wontiti ma iyɛ, i buagi ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, yeti i ‘ya noŋna waro.
58010006	I buagi waka ṭultan ma ɔci waka ‘yɛrtan ma te nɔji neeni bɛɛ.
58010007	Ɔci ‘ya gɔkcan ka, ‘‘Ya wɛnni nɛ, hay Juaŋo, aŋka ‘ya noŋ ba gena ṭaga i bala ba jyeka a kiigin worgaji te ‘yay.’ ”
58010008	Ɛkɛ gɔki ñamu agi, “Waka ‘yɛrtan ma ɔci waka ‘wontiti ma i, ɔci waka ṭultan ɛkkɛn gena ɛrki ma waak wyeñɛti neeni, ɔci waka ‘yɛrtan ma te nɔjiyɛ, i buagi ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.” Ɛkɛ gɔki a ɔɔn ne ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ waka neeni ‘yɛri ma ba jyek ganuun ɔɔn.
58010009	Ɛkɛ gɔkcin moki agi, “‘Ya wɛnni neeni, ‘ya bɛɛn aŋka noŋ naŋka ṭaga iy.” Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Yaccu jyek naŋka ɛrki ma waak ñamu olnɛ ɔntɔ, ɔci jyek naŋka Juaŋ buagɛ naŋka woonɛ neeni aŋka ḍuannɛ ɛkɛ non waka te ñamu.
58010010	Ɔci te naŋka wannayɛ, ikin pwannin oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ doki te war Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋi te ikiny.
58010011	Gaciicin Ma Yahuud ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi kanŋa ɛkkɛn oŋki waakɛnda. Ɛkkɛn ɛṭi a waka ne cyɛɛlɔ oŋkanda ɔɔn. Waka neeni yaakinti nɔji eetan ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
58010012	Yeti Kiṭɔ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ te nɔji ma waakɛnda. Te naŋka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ nɔji eññɛ ɔntɔ ne baaṭi ɔɔn, ɔci ɛkɛ cooccin iñɔ Juaŋ taaŋɛti taaŋŋa a byerɔn.
58010013	Yaccu bala kɛɛy oŋŋa maka yoyi ñin iki ɛkɛ neeni bwandɛ Juaŋ ɔci ḍuattɛ Juaŋ iñɔ ɛkɛ ciegɛtiy.
58010014	Te gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, maka ɛkɛ buagɔn naŋdi pwaddi neeniyɛ, naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ pwadgin doki.
58010015	Boŋ Juaŋ moki nɔɔti ikin te naŋka neeni. Te ñamu ɛkɛ gɔki agi,
58010016	“Gena jyeka naŋdɔn ɔɔn iki ɛkkɛn ne ninka neeni baatiy. Ciɛggɔn gɔki agi ganuun ‘ya olja ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti, ɔci ‘ya ganuun ḍuacca jiju ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti.”
58010017	Ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkcin moki agi, “Nɔji ɛkkɛn ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyinyɛ, ‘ya poŋja te ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛ.”
58010018	Acaan Juaŋ ma bɔɔŋnɛ te nɔji dokiyɛ, jyek ‘yɛrŋ waak bala moki bɛɛ, bawwin doki.
58010019	Acca modg ɔɔn, Yaccu Kiṭɔ tuun te ikin. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin balkin bwaji moki ne ikin kaattin Nona Pwadan Ne Tolanti neeni bɛɛ.
58010020	Ɛkɛ ikin pɔŋnin pɔya woonɛ pɔy tɛɛtin te ‘yɛrŋa ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛy. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin kaattin jiju bworŋa kɛkci ma on Juaŋ neeni konɛti.
58010021	Ikin balkin gaciic tolan, ɔci ɛkɛ mwoki on Jwaŋa Tolan.
58010022	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin ortinti Juaŋti te yoma pwadan, ɔci te jyenna awarɛ, ɔci te yomga nɔjjɛn baaw, ɔci te waaka a luaggin te pyega pwadiny.
58010023	Dala ikin yomgɔ tiektin ne ikin kɛɛyin waka pwadin waka ikin ḍuaññinti Juaŋ te jwaliy. Acaan ikin jyettin ka Juaŋ jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ikinti neeni daldɛ budan bɛɛ.
58010024	Dala ikin gɔɔrin yɔtin aŋka ikin moowin yɔtin pookɔ aŋka ikin ani lɛɛltin bora ɔci noŋtin ne pwadan.
58010025	Naa ikin mwontin te ḍɔɔlla ikin ḍwoṭin wyetkɔ oŋkanda neeni bɛɛ. Ma gɛɛg te baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn mwonnin te ḍɔɔli wyetkɛn. Yeti dala ikin moowin yɔtin pookɔ waakida ne tolan, acaan yuartɛ ɛkkɛ oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛdi cɔɔllin doki.
58010026	Kan ikin naŋka awarɛ ŋeennin oŋ ikin buagin noŋin nɔji men a labji ɔɔnyɛ, gena ‘yɛrtan ma gɛɛl bala moki nɔji ikin eedɛ ɔntɔ bɛɛ.
58010027	Ɔci a ɔŋŋi aŋka ikin buayin ywobji Juaŋ ywobja bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeni, ɔci maña koldan maña maka yoyi ñin iki Jwaŋa Tolan neeni amdiy!
58010028	Mena ganuun Muuca lɛgdɛjiyɛ, ɔci kan ma ne yyɛɛwɔ walla ne ḍoogɔ gɔkcin te naŋki ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ noktan ma. Menga yomɛ pwada ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
58010029	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ poŋɛ naŋka bɛya mena noŋdi ne yaayan Kaci Juaŋti neeni bala a ɔki? Ɔci mena yimg Yaccu yimga ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Juaŋ pwanni neeni ñaldɛ a genga bɛɛ neeniy, a gena bɛya ɛkɛtiy? Ɔci a gena bɛya mena wooki Boŋ Juaŋ Boŋa etti yom pwani Juaŋ mati neeniy? Maka noŋi naŋka neeniyɛ, Juaŋ jiek oldɛ ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti.
58010030	Çeecin ikin mena gɔki agi, “‘Ya noŋja ne yaayan maka noŋi ne yaayan ‘yati neeni.” Ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi, “Juaŋ noŋdi godan ma ɛkɛti.”
58010031	Ḍɛmmin ma ḍɛmti Jwaŋ tɛɛtin bieŋɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ a gena buayin ikiny!
58010032	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te ninka ati waayi ne ɛkkɛ koonɛ bora Juaŋ te miel jitinyɛ, ɛkkɛ beelkɛ waak jitkɛn ne coŋɔn, yeti ɛkkɛ buankɛ ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
58010033	A oŋki ɛkkɛ balgɛ lɔɔn jitin, ɔci ma noŋi ne yaayan ɛkkɛti. Ɔci a oŋki ɛkkɛ ñoowɛ iki maka naŋtan ma ne yaayan neeni.
58010034	Ɛkkɛ ñoonɛ iki ma te taab ne ɛkkɛn balki ciginji, ɔci ne mal ɛkkɛ kuakiti mayɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn men ɔɔn, acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki ɛkkɛ balkɛ mala pwadan mala baadi bɛɛy.
58010035	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ toga bɛɛ, acaan ne ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektiyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ waka pwadin ñaalɔ pɔliji ne baaṭi.
58010036	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka ṭagdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan aŋka ɛkkɛ yɔɔrdɛ gena guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛy.
58010037	Acaan bala ba jwalla guagdɛ worga agi, “Ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ lakun, ɔci mena bɛya neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛya, ɛkɛ kwatti bɛɛ.
58010038	Men ‘ya mena pwadanyɛ, ɛkɛ ciya te jyeni ɛkɛ, yeti kan ɛkɛ dɔɔki ŋoyɔyɛ, ‘ya yomu pwada ɛkɛti bɛɛ.”
58010039	Ikin agin maka dɔɔdi ŋoyɔ ɔci ḍakti bɛɛ. Yeti ikin balkin jyenno. Ɔci ikin unnin doki.
58011001	Jyeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a gena ñyecin ikin waka kɛɛtin ikiny. Ɔci te jyeniyɛ, ikin jyettin yomgɔti awarɛ te waka yuarŋin ikin men bɛɛy.
58011002	Te jyeniyɛ, maka te baaṭi Juaŋ yomɛ pwanna pwani ɛkkɛnti.
58011003	Te jyeniyɛ, ikin waak ŋeecin waakɛnda ka cɔnnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te jwali ɛkɛ, ɔci waka ñaltin ikin acca neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn cɔnnɛ Juaŋ te waka yuartin ikin te woŋgɔ bɛɛ neeniti.
58011004	Te jyeniyɛ, gena oonɛ Habiil Juaŋti ɛkɛ pwatcin te gena oonɛ mod ɛkkɛn kɛɛn Juaŋtiy. Te jyeniyɛ, ɛkɛ maaŋŋɛ Juaŋ agi ɛkta agɔ mena pwadɔ acaan Juaŋ bala gɔki ne pwadan te gena ‘wonnɛ Habiil ɛkɛy. Ɔci te jyeniyɛ, ne Habiil tuuniyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ bala gɔki ikinti acca men ɔɔn.
58011005	Te jyeniyɛ, Inak eññɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ ne ɛkɛ a tɛɛta ɔɔn, tuun bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ yuarŋɛ menga bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ eññɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ doki. Worga Juaŋ gɔki agi ne Inak eññɛ Juaŋ men bɛɛyɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pwatcin ɛkɛti.
58011006	Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada mengati budan kan jyeni baaw ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Kan menga buagɔn bɛya Juaŋtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ jyeddi a Juaŋ bala, ɔci moki dala ɛkɛ jyeddi a maka lieṭi Juaŋ neeni ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ waka pwadin.
58011007	Te jyeniyɛ, Nɔwa noŋi ba jyeka ɛkɛ myennɛ Juaŋ te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ men bɛɛ neeni. Ɛkɛ cɔti murka tolan aŋka ɛkkɛn uddɛ iki kɛɛgin ɛkɛ i moongɛn. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ywobji Juaŋ bɛɛn ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ warda, ɔci Juaŋ gɔki agi Nɔwa agɔ mena pwadɔ te jyeni ɛkta.
58011008	Te jyeniyɛ, Abrahim jyeti jwalla guaŋnɛ Juaŋ ɛkɛti agi ɛkta gortɔ bora ooddɔ bana ɛkɛ ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te jwaliy. Ɛkɛ ban ɛkɛ dalnɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ bala ati ooddi bana kwoyi ɛkɛ.
58011009	Te jyeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyi ba mena wɛli bana ɛkɛ ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ neeniji. Ɛkɛ bala ciyi te ona a bworŋo, ɔci Icaak i Yaakub ɛkkɛn bala ciyi te oorga a bworŋin daŋkun. Ɔci Juaŋ daŋkun ɛkkɛn ḍuaññɛ te jwali ba jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ Abrahimti neeni daŋkun.
58011010	Abrahim bala kɛɛy bana yɔɔd ne tɛyan neeni, ɔci gena Jwaŋa Tolan, ɛkɛ a mena cɔti bana neeniy.
58011011	Te jyeniyɛ, Caara waanɛ yɔṭi war tɛɛn aŋka ɛkɛ laatti ne ɛkɛ aŋi ṭien doki ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ jyeti agi Juaŋ mena ɛkɛ ḍuaññɛ te jwali neeniyɛ, gɔki awarɛ.
58011012	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, Abrahim bala ba mena tuuta acaan ɛkɛ aŋi daan doki, yeti ɛkɛ jieni kɛɛgin ne coŋɔn ba kɛltan, ɔci ɛkkɛn kɔɔna kɔɔni bala ba ŋɔmma niin kɔmi ḍwaŋɛti.
58011013	Maka neeni bala ciyi te jyenna ɛkkɛn jyetki Juaŋti neeni ne oŋŋa ɛkkɛn tuuki ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛn waka jwallɛn ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ neeni yuarɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛn waka neeni yuarcɛji te nona loonan ɔci mugɛ ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeti yomgɛnti a ɛkkɛn ciyi a wɛlg iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni.
58011014	Maka gɔki te waka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn mieti agi ɛkkɛn lieṭi ban ɛkkɛn waanɛ.
58011015	Ɛkkɛn poŋi te bana dolliyɔ ɛkkɛn waayi moki bɛɛ. Te ɛkkɛn poŋki te bana dollɛ ɛkkɛn waayiyɛ, te ɛkkɛn dɔɔki doki.
58011016	Yeti ɛkkɛn dɔɔki bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn bana ñaalɔ pɔliji bana pwadan. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, Juaŋ lɔɔdan ne ɛkkɛn borki ɛkɛ a Juaŋ ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn noŋnɛ baano.
58011017	Oŋŋa Juaŋ Abrahim pɔɔññɛ aŋka gɔrti ne yom ɛkɛ baali a ɔkiyɛ, Abrahim jyeti Juaŋti men ɔɔn, ɔci kaci ɛkɛ Icaak ‘wonnɛ Juaŋo, ɛkɛ yookɔn bɛɛ.
58011018	Te ñamu Jwaŋa Tolan Abrahim ḍuaññɛ te jyek kacca neeni agi, “Kɛɛgin Abrahim bɛya te Icaakti.” Yeti Abrahim noŋi kaci ɛkɛ kacca nɔɔti ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni ‘yɛrdɛ Juaŋti.
58011019	Abrahim poŋi gɔki agi Juaŋ Icaak jɔɔŋda ñaalɔ te lienti moki, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bala ba ne ikin gɔkin agi Abrahim Icaak duaŋŋɛ dɔkɔ te lienti.
58011020	Te jyeniyɛ, Icaak gɔkcin Yaakubti ɔci Icɔti te naŋka bɛya pwadan ɛkkɛnti ne baaṭiy.
58011021	Te jyeniyɛ, Yaakub ne buaŋŋɛ lienyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin ne pwadan kɛɛgin Yuocipti waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍaŋnɛ tɛɛlnɛ kɔmñi ɛkɛ wyeñɛti, ɔci morcin Juaŋti.
58011022	Te jyeniyɛ, Yuocip ne buaŋŋɛ lienyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin te jyek kooyin ma Icrayiil bora te ban Macor, ɔci ɛkɛ ma nɔɔnnɛ te nona jokki ma owi ɛkɛy.
58011023	Te baaṭi ḍuaŋa tolan ma Macor bala noki kɛɛgin ma Icrayiil. Yeti te jyeniyɛ, Muuca ne jietkiti mayɛ, ɛkɛ cogɛyɔ weegɛn i mɛɛgɛn ponk ne ḍoogɔ, acaan ɛkɛ yuarcɛ ɛkkɛn pwanna pwanno. Ɔci ɛkkɛn buañi jwali ḍuaŋa tolan ma Macor moki bɛɛ.
58011024	Te jyeniyɛ, Muuca ne tolliyɛ, ɛkɛ yookɔn warɛ te barŋa ɛkɛ bartiti ma a kaci ṭɔl ḍuaŋa tolan ma Macory.
58011025	Ɛkɛ buagɔn taabdi ba taab taabki ma Juaŋ wanna, ɔci buagɔn yomɛ ñɔya te wak nɔji neeni wɔɔka ne ḍuulan bɛɛ.
58011026	Acaan yuarnɛ ɛkɛ te jwolta ma juolki Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka pwatcin ne tolan te mal ma Macor mala coŋin mala pwadin neeni, acaan ɛkɛ bala poŋi gɔki agi gena ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ neeni aŋka pwatcin ɛkɛti.
58011027	Te jyeniyɛ, Muuca kooyin bora te ban Macor, ɔci ɛkɛ buañi te loñk ḍuaŋa tolan ma Macor bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yookɔn warɛ te dɔɔkkin bala ba Juaŋ mena yuartan ma te woŋgɛn bɛɛ neeni yuartɛ ɛkɛ no.
58011028	Te jyeniyɛ, Muuca ma myennɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn ŋordi kulin ṭɔlgɛn ɔci noŋdi iid. Ɔci ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn myennɛ aŋka ɛkkɛn yimg kulin ṭɔlgɛn gattan ‘yegin tuggɛnti aŋka Malɛɛka Lien kɛɛgin ɛkkɛn kɛɛgin a kɛɛgin nogdɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci iid neeni ma boṭi agi, Iid Malɛɛka Lien Bɛɛn Goṭi A Gorŋo.
58011029	Te jyeniyɛ, ma Icrayiil galŋa bartan ma a Galŋa Tidan jyɛdɛji. Ɛkkɛn bala ati ba ne atki nona iwanti ɔɔn. Ɔci ne ma Macor buaŋŋɛ acaan kaatti daŋkunyɛ, galŋ ɛkkɛn muulnɛ ñaalɔ ɔci eññɛ.
58011030	Te jyeniyɛ, ne ma Icrayiil kaatan ban Jɛrikɔ wiilkitiyɔ nink ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, kaatan ḍɛɛmdin.
58011031	Te jyeniyɛ, Rahab ɛŋa toban neeni tuun iki maka a nɔɔtk bɛɛ, acaan ɛkɛ ma Icrayiil maka ati lɛɛl noon neeni coŋŋɛyɔ.
58011032	’Ya ‘uocca gɔkca a ɔki moki? ‘Ya balka wɔɔka aŋka gɔkta te Gidyan, ɔci te Baraak, ɔci te Camcuun, ɔci te Jɛpta, ɔci te Daawud, ɔci te Camwil, ɔci te maka a bɔwan moki bɛɛ.
58011033	Te jyeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn keedin buanɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛn waka ɛkkɛn ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ te jwali mugɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyer ‘uorkɛ tuggɛnti, ɔci ɛkkɛn amɛ jyer bɛɛ.
58011034	Ɔci ɛkkɛn war tɛɛn maañ buannɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn uni te lyen byeŋgaaran. Ɛkkɛn a maka waakɛn koyan yeti ɛkkɛn waakɛn tɛɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn tɛɛna tɛɛn lañti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ackan bonka pookɛn buanɛ.
58011035	Te jyeniyɛ, moong gɛɛg ma ɛkkɛn maka jɔŋŋin te lientiyɛ, yuarɛ. Ɔci ma gɛɛg korkɛn ñakcin te jwolto. Yeti ɛkkɛn yookɔn waakɛn te pɔkkin ɛkkɛn pɔktiti ma aŋka ɛkkɛn ḍɔɔggɛn wɔkti te lyena ɛkkɛn noktiti ma, acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn jɔŋdi te lienti te tɛɛtin pwadan.
58011036	Ɔci ma gɛɛg juoli ma, ɔci ḍwayɛ, ɔci gɛɛg ḍɛɛgɛ, ɔci oljɛ jiju ciginji.
58011037	Ɔci gɛɛg yepci ma te gwoyi ɔci nogɛ. Ɔci gɛɛg ŋuodɛ ma jitin, ɔci gɛɛg nogɛ te byeŋgaaran. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ɛŋi geek kulin i geek ḍɛɛko, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala ati amaam budan, gena bartan ɛkkɛn a gen ɛkkɛn gɛɛl bala bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn naŋɛ ma ne yaayan.
58011038	Ɔci ɛkkɛn yɔmji i baan konɛ moki bɛɛ! Ɛkkɛn ati amaam wɔɔŋji ɔci pomk jitin, ɔci ɛkkɛn wɔti kɔki pomkti.
58011039	Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn maaŋi ma te jyeni ɛkkɛn. Oŋ yeti ɛkkɛn waka jiekɛn a ḍuagin neeni yuarɛ men bɛɛ.
58011040	Juaŋ ikin ḍɔɔŋnin gena pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛn pwattin iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ.
58012001	Maka boorŋ ‘ya te yengɛn coŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔṭi ikin, ikin yudkinyɔ. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ikin waka cyɛgan ɔci nɔjja kɔrcinti ikinti ne tɛyan neeniyɛ, yiɛptin ɔntɔ, ɔci dala ikin yomgɔ tiektin ne ikin yiŋin boddin oŋkanda te boddin ḍuaññɛ Juaŋ ikin ñomgɔti neeniy.
58012002	Ɔci dala ikin woŋgɔ tiittin gena Yaccu Kiṭɔt mena a bɛɛkin jyeni ikiny. Ɔci ɛkɛ a mena ikin naŋtin pwattin te jyeni ikiny. Ɛkɛ yookɔn warɛ te kakan bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ poŋjin te ŋɛɛgga ḍorki ma ɛkɛ bɛɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ yom ñɔɔn bala kɛɛy ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ poŋjin te lɔna tuudɛ ɛkɛ kakanti neeni bɛɛ. Oŋ accayɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyi Juaŋ taaŋɛti byeŋa byerɔn.
58012003	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te loomg tɛɛn ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ naŋka naŋɛ maka yeyin ɛkɛti buannɛ jitin waakɛnda aŋka naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ poda, ɔci yomgɔ buaya bɛɛ.
58012004	Te lañ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ noowɛ i nɔjjo, oŋ yeti ɛkkɛ noonɛ ne tuunɛ men bɛɛ.
58012005	Ɛkkɛ ñingɔ yien te jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛti ba ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛyɛ? Juaŋ gɔki agi, “Hay, kaci ‘ya, dala i waŋu tiicca ne Ciɛggɔn i ṭeeditiy, ɔci naa i yomu koya ne ɛkɛ i ṭeeditiyɔ bɛɛ.
58012006	Acaan Ciɛggɔn ṭeyi maka ɛkɛ aniy, ɔci mena mugdɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ḍuadɛ ɛkɛ ba kaci ɛkɛ.”
58012007	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tiektɛ ne Juaŋ ṭeyi ɛkkɛy. Ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ɛkɛ ba kɛɛgin ɛkɛ. Kɛɛgin waakɛnda ṭeetan weyyɛn.
58012008	Kan ɛkkɛ ṭeedɛ Juaŋ ba kɛɛgin ɛkɛ waakɛnda bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ awarɛ bɛɛ. Kan a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin jiedi ma te tommo.
58012009	Weyya ikin jietkinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ṭeyi ikin ɔci ikin buayin ɛkkɛn, oŋ dala ikin tieŋtin Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolanti aŋka ikin tɛɛttin.
58012010	Weyya ikin jietkinyɛ, ikin ṭeekin wɔɔka ne ḍuulan ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagɔn, oŋ yeti Juaŋyɛ, ikin ṭeenin ɛkɛ yɔŋi ikin a ywaŋi aŋka ikin ñootin te pwani ɛkɛ.
58012011	Ikin ne ṭeekinti mayɛ, te oŋŋa wanna ikin poŋŋin ka ṭeena neeni yaayɛ, pwatcin bɛɛ. Oŋ yeti ne ŋoyɔyɛ, ṭeena neeni etti naŋka pwadan te maka ṭeyi ma te naŋka neeniy. A ɔŋŋi, ɛkkɛn ciya ne pwadan.
58012012	Dala byeŋki ɛkkɛ byeŋka morŋan neeni koobdɛ ñaalɔ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ ‘woŋga ḍiedan neeni tiittɛ iñɔ.
58012013	Dala ɛkkɛ ooddɛ te pɔɔka a tyɛlgan aŋka naa ciega morŋan beeldi bɛɛ, yeti dala ɛkkɛn waakɛn tiittan iñɔ ne tɛyan.
58012014	Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ i ma waakɛnda ne pwadan te coodda pwadan. Kan pwani baaw mentiyɛ, mena neeni Ciɛggɔn yuardɛ bɛɛ.
58012015	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, acaan naa menga warɛ ñiedɛ jitin te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan te gena Juaŋ buagɛ aŋka ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ. Ɔci naa mena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛti, ɔci ma yaadɛ ne coŋɔn te naŋki ɛkɛ bɛɛ. “Ɛkɛ bala ba jana yaayan ywollin baljiy.”
58012016	Naa ɛkkɛ menga noŋdi ne yaayan aga tomma ba Icɔ mena jyek Juaŋ baaw yomɛti ɔci ḍɔŋa ɛkɛ jiennɛ mɛɛgɛn agi kacca ñamu neeni wiɛlnɛyɔ te ama ne cyɛɛlɔ neeni bɛɛ.
58012017	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ buaŋŋi ne ŋoyɔ aŋka dala weegɛn gɔkti ne pwadan ɛkɛtiyɛ, Icɔ ṭiiŋŋɛ wey ɛkkɛn acaan ɛkɛ yaakinti naŋka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ neeni agdiyɔ moki bɛɛ, yeti Icɔ bala wiak te pyeg woŋgɛ, ɔci yɔṭi jyeka pwadin te weegɛnti moki bɛɛ.
58012018	Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ non waka ɛkkɛ yaakɛti yuartɛ, bala ba yɔrg ɛkkɛ ne bɛɛki Pom Cinati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn bɛɛn maña koldanti, ɔci nona miel ɔci ṭuuli wiew ɔci nona yiŋɛ tuol neeni.
58012019	Ɔci ɛkkɛn bɛɛn nona wiagi ṭuoŋ, ɔci non pwana gɔkiy. Ɔci maka tieŋŋin pwana neeniyɛ, kɛkkin agi naa ɛkkɛn tieŋdinti jwali gɛɛl moki bɛɛ.
58012020	Acaan ɛkkɛn buañi jyeka neeni. Jyeka neeni bala gɔki agi, “Kan mala ati te ciegɛn gɛɛl jokcin poomtiyɛ, ɛkɛ yeptan ma te gwoyi ne tuudi ɔɔn.”
58012021	Muuca buañi ne tolan ne ɛkɛ gɔrni poomtiy, ɔci ɛkɛ waanɛ gɔki agi, “‘Ya buay ne pɛñan, ɔci waru ḍiedan.”
58012022	Yeti ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ Pom Ciyɔnti ɔci ban Jwaŋa tɛɛtiti Urcaliimti ñaalɔ pɔliji i malɛɛkan coŋiny.
58012023	Ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ non yom ñɔɔn ñoowin kɛɛgin Juaŋ kɛɛgin a kɛɛgin, maka yengɛn a kiigin ñaalɔ pɔlijiy. Ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ Juaŋti mena noŋi godan ma waakɛnda, ɔci ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ moki non boŋki maka pwadgin naŋŋɛ Juaŋ aŋi maka awarɛy.
58012024	Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ Yaccuti mena a cuuda jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ wonkɛn neeniti. Ɛkkɛ bɛɛnɛ yimg Yaccuti yimga mieti ikin te bɔɔkin ikin bɔɔŋninti Juaŋ te nɔjiy. Yimg Yaccu neeni bala ba yimg Habiil yimga balkɛ jyek yoni waakɛn wanna bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ moki bɛɛnɛ yimga a gaagin jiekɛn a naŋgin ne pwadan te yimg Habiily.
58012025	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ, naa jyek mena gɔki neeni tuodɛ bɛɛ. Kan maka jyek mena gɔki ṭeyi ma waakɛn iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni tuoyɛ ɔci ɛkkɛn uni te ywobji Juaŋ bɛɛy, oŋ ikin uttin a ɔki, kan ikin jyek mena gɔki te ñaalɔ pɔliji neeni tuoññiny!
58012026	Pwan ɛkɛ te oŋŋa waayiyɛ, ṭɛɛr jiɛññɛyɔ. Yeti acca ɛkɛ gɔkkin moki agi, “‘Ya ‘uocca oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ moki ṭɛɛr jiɛdyɔ ɔci ‘ya ṭɛɛr jiɛdyɔ parɛ bɛɛ, yeti ‘ya pɔli daŋkun jiɛdyɔ.”
58012027	Jyeka gɔki agi “Oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ moki,” jyeka neeni nɔɔti te waka jieci waakɛn neeni ɛkkɛn uuttɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ. Ɛkkɛn a waka a cɔdgin. Ɔci waka waakɛn jiɛtan bɛɛ neeni aŋka ciya.
58012028	Dala ikin gɔktin a pwatcin Juaŋti acaan ikin mwokkin cyɛgja jieci warɛ bɛɛy. Dala ikin buayin Juaŋ ne ikin moṭin Juaŋti te malla buagi ɛkɛy.
58012029	Acaan Jwaŋ ikinyɛ, ɛkɛ a maña omiy.
58013001	Dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ ba maka a modin.
58013002	Naa ɛkkɛ ñingɔ yeya te ḍuat maka wɛlg bɛɛ. Te naŋka wannayɛ, ma gɛɛg malɛɛkan ḍuayɛ ne ɛkkɛn kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
58013003	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te maka ciyi ciginji bala ba ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ iki ɛkkɛn jiju ciginji ɔɔn, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te taab maka naŋtan ma ne yaayan neeni. Dala taab ɛkkɛn bala ba taab ɛkkɛ ɔɔn.
58013004	Dala ma waakɛnda poŋdi a ḍɛɛn neeni ɛkɛ a gena pwadan. Ɔci maka ‘uay i moongyɛ, naa ɛkkɛn noŋdi tomi maka pookɛnti bɛɛ. Juaŋ jiek oldɛ maka noŋi tomi wyetkɛnti.
58013005	Naa ɛkkɛ anɛ bilk bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yɔmdɛ te waka bala ɛkkɛti wanna doki. Acaan Juaŋ gɔki agi, “‘Ya i daldin bɛɛ, ɔci ‘ya i yiɛptin ɔntɔ bɛɛ.”
58013006	Dala ikin yomgɔ tɛya, ɔci gɔktin agi, “Ciɛggɔn a mena moki ‘yay. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ‘ya buay genga moki bɛɛ. Menga yaakinti ‘ya naŋda ɔŋka bɛɛ.”
58013007	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te maka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ te jyek Juaŋy. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te coodda cieki ɛkkɛn, ɔci te lyena tuuki ɛkkɛny. Dala jyeni ɛkkɛ bala ba jyeni ɛkkɛn.
58013008	Yaccu Kiṭɔ warɛ agdɛ oŋgati bɛɛ. Tɛɛnɔ, ɔci te oŋŋo, ɔci yuonginda ɔɔn ɛkɛ warɛ agdɛ bɛɛ.
58013009	Naa ɛkkɛ maaltɛ jyeka pookɛn gɛɛg ɔntɔ te jyeka awarɛti neeni bɛɛ. Pwatcin doki ne i yɔɔrdi war tɛɛn i yomuti te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolany. Yeti yom tɛɛna neeni yuara i te tiit jyek ganuun te jyek oomdin bɛɛ. Maka bala tieci jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn magɛ jyeka neeni bɛɛ.
58013010	Maka moṭi Juaŋti nona morki ma Juaŋti te baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛn omi waka ‘yɛrtan ɛkkɛn Juaŋti neeni, yeti ɛkkɛn yaakinti omdi genga te nona ɛṭin ikin waak a nona woonɛ neeniti bɛɛ.
