58013011	Gaciic tolan Ma Yahuud etti yimg maal Nona Pwadan Ne Tolanti neeni aŋka ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ Juaŋ te nɔjjo. Yeti yoŋgi waka ‘yɛri ma neeni tontan ma maañ baan ŋoyɛti bora aŋan.
58013012	Yaccu daŋkun tuun bora baan ŋoyɛti a ɔɔn aŋka ma pwaddi te yimg ɛkɛ.
58013013	Dala ikin gortin bora ɛkɛti baan ŋoyɛti aŋan aŋka ɛkɛ yoortin ikin te lɔɔno.
58013014	Acaan ikin balkin bana yɔɔd ne tɛyan gɛɛl iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni moki bɛɛ. Ikin kɛɛyin bana ikin ‘wontinti Juaŋ ne baaṭi neeni.
58013015	Acaan Yaccu tuun te ikinyɛ, dala jiɛta jieyin ikin Juaŋ oŋkanda neeni, bala ba waka ‘yɛrtin ikin Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci te jiɛta neeniyɛ, ikin mietin a ɛkɛ a Ciɛggɔn.
58013016	Naa ɛkkɛ yiedɛ te naŋka pwadin ɔci te moowin yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ, acaan Juaŋ yomɛ pwatcin te naŋka pwadan neeni bala ba ne ɛkkɛn akki waka ‘yɛrŋin ikin ɛkɛti no.
58013017	Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka wɛɛyi ɛkkɛ, ɔci noŋdɛ ba jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛtiy. Ɛkkɛn gɔṭi ɛkkɛ woodi bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn taadɛ Juaŋ te kanŋa ɛkkɛn neeni. Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋdi kanŋa ɛkkɛn te yoma ñɔyan. Kan ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋdi kanŋa te yoma pwadan bɛɛ, ɔci yɔɔrdi gena pwadan gɛɛl te naŋka neeni bɛɛ.
58013018	Dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ te ɔɔn oŋkanda Juaŋti. Çeejɔn ɔɔn ne pwadan paŋŋa bɛya te yomg ɔɔnti pwanna pwani, acaan ɔɔn buagɔn noŋdɔn a naŋka pwadan oŋkanda ɔɔn.
58013019	Ɔci ‘ya toocca ɛkkɛti moki ne tolan ka dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka ɛkɛ ‘ya cuonda dɔɔda ɛkkɛti moki ne pɛñan.
58013020	Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ luolnɛ Jwaŋ coodda pwadan ñaalɔ te lienti, Yaccu aŋi ḍɛɛnɔn kulin Ḍɛɛnɔn Tolan te lyen ɛkɛ. Ɔci te yimg ɛkɛyɛ, Juaŋ jiek naŋɛ iki mako. Jyeka naŋi ɛkkɛn neeni baadi bɛɛ.
58013021	Dala Jwaŋ naŋka pwadan ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ waka pwadin waka ɛkkɛ buagɛ waakɛnda aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba naŋka ṭagdɛ ɛkɛy. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ikinti te Yaccu ba naŋka ṭagdɛ ɛkɛy. Ɔci dala Yaccu Kiṭɔ jiɛtan ma yuonginda ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.
58013022	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jwalla ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ yoma pwadan, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ tɛya. Acaan worga kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeni beecin bɛɛ.
58013023	’Ya buaga dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ mod ikin Timutawuc pɔkkɛ ma te ciginji doki. Kan ɛkɛ bɛɛn ne pɛñan dokiyɛ, ‘ya baldin iki ɛkɛ oŋŋa ‘ya ɛkkɛ yuardiny.
58013024	Dala ɛkkɛ maka wɛɛyi ɛkkɛ ñiiptɛ iñɔ te ɔɔn, ɔci Ma Kiṭɔ waakɛnda. Modg ikin maka ban Itali ñiepi ɛkkɛ waakida.
58013025	Dala Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada a pwani ɛkkɛti oŋkanda.
59001001	Gena ‘ya Yaakub kɛɛngɔn Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci kɛɛngɔn Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Hay! Ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ Ma Yahuud maka cyɛnŋin jitin baan konɛ warda nɛ, ‘ya ñiep ɛkkɛ waakida.
59001002	Hay! Ɛkkɛ modg ɔɔn, kan taabn gɛɛg bala ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya ne tolan.
59001003	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya acaan taabn bɛya ɛkkɛti wannayɛ, gena Jwaŋa Yaayan poci ɛkkɛ a poccin, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn jyenna jyettɛ ɛkkɛ Juaŋti neeniyɛ, dala baadi. Yeti taabn neeniyɛ, etti yɔɔdda ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyany.
59001004	Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan oŋkanda ɔɔn aŋka ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te jyek Juaŋ ɔci coodi ɛkkɛ yɔmdi ne pwadan te jyek Juaŋo.
59001005	Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti buagɔn ñing tɛɛn te gengayɛ, dala ɛkɛ tootti Juaŋti ɔci ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ. Acaan Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ‘woñi ma te waak waakɛnda ne pwadan, ɔci ne ɛkɛ ma ‘wondɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘woñi ma te yoma ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci te yoma pwadan.
59001006	Ɔci ne ɛkɛ tootti Juaŋtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ jyeddi yomɛti a Juaŋ ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ. Naa ɛkɛ tieki yomɛti bɛɛ. Kan mena tieki yomɛti jyeni ɛkɛ niin te nona ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba pɔɔgi pieg galŋji ne eedi jwami amaam budany.
59001007	Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ba mena yomgɛ a yyɛɛwɔy, mena ooki jyek ɛkɛ waakɛn oŋkanday. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkɛ poŋdi gɔɔdi agi ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ genga bɛɛ.
59001009	Gɔṭṭɛ, Men Yaccu mena anan iñɔ wɛnniyɛ, dala ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya acaan ne ɛkɛ aŋŋi men Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ koomnɛ Juaŋ ñaalɔ aŋi mena pwadan ɛkɛ ñamɛti doki.
59001010	Mena cyɛgan, kan ɛkɛ warɛ dɔɔdɛ iñɔ Juaŋ ñamɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ yomɛ ñɔya daŋkun, acaan coodi ɛkɛ iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, tolcin bɛɛ, bala ba pɛɛppin luom jitin budan,
59001011	acaan ne oŋ waŋɛ toldi ɔci myɛldiyɛ, oŋ waŋɛ pɛɛppin amdɛ, ɔci pɛɛppin pwani ɛkkɛn bala moki bɛɛ. Ɔci ba jyek pɛɛppin neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek mena cyɛgan, acaan ne ɛkɛ baali lieṭi waka ɛkɛ buagɔn menyɛ, ɛkɛ tuwa amaam budan ɔɔn.
59001012	Kan mena balki taabyɛ, dala ɛkɛ yɔɔda ne tɛyan, ɔci kan ɛkɛ jyeni ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ gena pwadan, gena tɛɛtin. Ɛkɛ ‘wondɛ Juaŋ tɛɛtin neeni ba jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ñamu agi maka ani Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ tɛɛtin.
59001013	Kan men gɛɛl taabbin te genga ɔci buagɔn noŋdi ne yaayan te taab neeniyɛ, naa ɛkɛ gɔkti agi pɔɔta neeni bɛɛnɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan poci menga bɛɛ, ɔci menga yaakinti Jwaŋa Tolan pɔɔdɛ noŋdi ne yaayan bɛɛ.
59001014	Kan menga buagɔn noŋdi ne yaayanyɛ, gena yom ɛkɛ yoma buagɔn waak poci ɛkɛ neeni, ɔci yom ɛkɛ neeni ɛkɛ eedɛ ɔntɔ te Juaŋti, ɔci mugdɛ ne tɛyan ba yiicco. A Jwaŋa Tolan ba, a’a.
59001015	Ɔci kan ɛkɛ tieŋdi ba yoma poci ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ neeni a nɔjjo. Ɔci ne nɔji toldiyɛ, ɛkɛ etti lieno.
59001016	Modg ɔɔn modga ana ‘yay, naa menga ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ñin bɛɛ.
59001017	Waka bɛya te Jwaŋa Tolantiyɛ, ɛkkɛn waakɛnda pwadɔ, gena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a Wey waka dɛki pɔlijiy. Yeti ɛkɛ warɛ agdɛ ywongati bɛɛ.
59001018	Juaŋ buagɔn dala pwani ikin bala ñamu te pwani waka cɔnnɛ ɛkɛ waakɛnda. A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin jwali ɛkɛ jwalla awarɛ aŋka ikin jiɛtkinti ma te jiedda woonɛ te jwali ɛkɛ neeni.
59001019	Modg ɔɔn, modga ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka neeni ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyeka guaktan ma ɛkkɛti oŋkanda ne pwadan. Yeti naa gɔ ɛkkɛ lakun gɔkcɛ ne pɛñan bɛɛ. Ɔci naa gɔ ɛkkɛ lakun looñjɛ ne pɛñan bɛɛ.
59001020	Acaan loñkyɛ, yaakinti etti naŋka pwadan naŋka Juaŋ buagiti neeni bɛɛ.
59001021	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ naŋka yeyin ne coŋɔn neeni yiɛptɛ ɔntɔ waakɛnda. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ aŋka mugdɛ te yoma pwadan, acaan jyek Juaŋ neeni kan ḍuannɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yɔɔtɛ ɛkkɛn.
59001022	Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek Juaŋo. Naa ɛkkɛ tyeŋɛ jiek te jyetkɔ budan bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ tyeŋɛ Jiek te jyetkɔ budan ɔci noŋɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ dyetɛ waakɔ amaam budan.
59001023	Mena tyeŋi Jiek te jyetkɛ budan ɔci noŋdi ba jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ wanna pwatcin bɛɛ, yaayɛ. Ɛkɛ bala ba mena gɔṭi ñing ɛkɛ te yuar waŋɛ.
59001024	Ɔci kan ɛkɛ warɛ uuttɛ ɔntɔ te nona yuar waŋɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ ñingɛ yeya te ñing ɛkɛ doki.
59001025	Yeti jyek ganuun jyeka ma pɔktan neeni kan menga waŋɛ tiittɛ ɛkkɛnti ne pwadan ɔci ɛkkɛn tiidɛyɔ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ tyeŋi a tyeŋi budan bɛɛ, ɔci ñingɛ yeya te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋdi ba jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ magdɛ Juaŋ te naŋki ɛkɛ.
59001026	Kan mena poŋi agi ɛkɛ agjɛ men Juaŋ, yeti lɛmi ɛkɛ gɔki ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ dyeti war ɛkɛ budan. Ɔci jwalla guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ agi ɛkɛ agjɛ men Juaŋ neeni aŋi ba jwalla budan doki.
59001027	Kan men gɛɛl buagɔn aga men Kiṭɔ ne pwadan Wey ikin Juaŋ ñamɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkɛ moki kɛɛgin a ciek te taab ɛkkɛn, ɔci dala ɛkɛ moki moonga ciek te taab ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ woŋgɛ tiittɛ te naŋka pwadan. Naa ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋka yaayan gɛɛl ba naŋki maka iñɔ baanji wɛnni bɛɛ.
59002001	Modg ɔɔn, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ mati waakɛnda ba bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ, naa ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg aŋka naŋdɛ ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn aŋka naŋdɛ yaaldɛ a yaali bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena pwadan neeniti doki. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ jiek ne yyɛɛwɔ bɛɛ.
59002002	Gɔṭṭɛ, jwali ‘ya neeni bala a ɔŋŋi te naŋki ɛkkɛ, kan men gɛɛl ɛŋi tiŋkin naŋɛ ma te dahab ɔci bworŋin pwadinyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ bɛya nona ḍwoṭɛ ɛkkɛ wyetkɔ on Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ gena ɛkɛti ne pwadan agi, “Hay! Dala i bɛɛd coocca nona pwadanti neeni.” Yeti ne mena anan mena ɛŋi bworŋa yaayan, bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛ gɔkti ɛkɛti agi, “Hay, dala i bɛɛd yɔɔtca wɛnni,” walla agi, “Dala i bɛɛd coocca iñɔ ṭɛɛrji ɔɔn ñomgɔti wɛnni.”
59002004	Tieŋdɛ hay modg ɔɔn, kan ɛkkɛ noŋɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba ɛkkɛ yookɛ te ma gɛɛg no. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ ma kɛɛmmɛ jitin doki te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ amaamo.
59002005	Modg ɔɔn modga ana ‘yay, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ! Maka anin maka wak ɛkkɛn baawyɛ, ɛkkɛn lɔɔnnɛ Juaŋ bora ɔci aŋi ba maka cyɛgan te jyeni ɛkkɛn ɛkɛti ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ Juaŋ cyɛgji ɛkɛ ba jyeka naŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu agi maka ani ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ cyɛgji ɛkɛ.
59002006	Yeti ɛkkɛ aŋka noŋɛ ne yaayan maka ananti neeni. Ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba ne ɛkkɛn a waagga bɛɛ. Hay, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne maka cyɛgan ɛkkɛn a maka ñieyi te ɛkkɛ bɛɛ? Ɔci ɛkkɛn a maka ɛkkɛ eetɛ noŋtɛ godan bɛɛ?
59002007	Ɔci ɛkkɛn a maka ḍori yenti Yaccu yenta pwadan yenta bala ɛkkɛti neeni bɛɛ? Ɛɛ, gena ɛkkɛn woodgɛn.
59002008	Kan ɛkkɛ ganuun Ciɛggɔn tiidɛyɔ ne pwadan ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Dala anna i ani maka pookɛnyɛ, yoomdi i anna i ani war iy,” a ɔɔnyɛ, yɔmjin.
59002009	Yeti kan ɛkkɛ ma gɛɛg aŋka naŋdɛ ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkin pookɛn aŋka yaaldɛ a yaaliyɛ, naŋka neeni aŋka a nɔjjo. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ maka lɛɛwi jyek ganuun doki.
59002010	Kan men gɛɛl jyek ganuun jitkɛn tiiññɛyɔ waakɛnda, ɔci ɛka ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋka bɛɛnɛjiyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ ganuun pookɛn lɛɛŋŋɛ jitin waakɛnda daŋkun.
59002011	Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan mena gɔki agi naa ma noŋdɔ tomi bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔki moki agi naa ma nokkɔ maka pookcɛn bɛɛ. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ciya budan te naŋki tomi oŋ yeti kan ɛkɛ nokti mengayɛ, a ɔɔn ɛkɛ aŋi mena bɛɛyi jyek ganuun daŋkun.
59002012	Dala jyek ɛkkɛ ɔci naŋki ɛkkɛ bala ba naŋki maka godan bɛya ɛkkɛnti ba jyek ganuun ikin pɔŋninti Yaccu ḍɔɔggɔti neeni.
59002013	Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ ne ɛkɛ jiek oldɛ mena yomɛ ulan neeni wyeñɛti bɛɛ, yeti mena yomɛ pwadan matiyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka buayi jyek godan Juaŋ neeni bɛɛ.
59002014	Modg ɔɔn, kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ɛkɛ jyetci Juaŋti, ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋi ne pwadan maka pookɛnti bɛɛyɛ, oŋ a ɔɔn yɔmdi a ɔki? Jyenna ɛkɛ jyeti Juaŋti neeni yɔmjin boki? Ɛkɛ yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ a ɔɔn boki? Ɛkɛ yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ te jwali jyeni budan kan naŋka pwadan baaw ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
59002015	Kan mod ɛkkɛ gɛɛl walla kow ɛkkɛ gɛɛl bɛɛn nona ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔti, ɔci kan bworŋ ɛkɛ yaañi ɔci waka amdɛ ɛkɛ oŋkanda moki bɔɔnjin,
59002016	ɔci kan i ɛkɛ ‘woñga genga bɛɛyɛ, jyeka guaŋŋi i ɛkɛti agi dala ɛkta ciedɔ ne pwadan, ɔci agi naa ɛkta nogda jwami bɛɛ, ɔci agi naa ɛkta amda koñ bɛɛ neeniyɛ, a jyeka budan.
59002017	Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyenna ikin jyettin Juaŋtiy. Kan jyeni bala parɛ ɔci kan naŋka pwadin baawyɛ, jyenna neeni a jyeka budan.
59002018	Men gɛɛl kaapun kɛkti te jyeka guaŋi ‘ya neeni, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔkti kaapun agi ma gɛɛg a maka balki jyenno, ɔci maka pookɛn daŋkun a maka noŋi naŋka pwadin, kan men gɛɛl bala gɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, ‘ya ṭwokca ɛkɛti a ɔŋŋi daŋkun agi, “Dala i ‘ya myetta poca, men gɛɛl yaakinti jyeddi Yaccuti ɔci naŋka pwadin dɔki baaw ɛkɛti a ɔki? Yeti ‘yayɛ, naŋki ‘ya naŋka pwadin jyenna ‘ya jyetta lɛɛltan bora.”
59002019	Ne ɛkkɛ jyettɛ gɔkɛ agi Juaŋ baalɔyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin. Yeti jwali jyeni ɛkkɛ wanna yɔmdi parɛ te gena? Tieŋdɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeecɔn jɔkin yeyin daŋkun agi ɛkta baalɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn buayi waakɛn ḍiedan ne tolan.
59002020	Hay! Ɛkkɛ ñingɔ tɛɛcin boki? Tieŋdɛ, ɛkkɛ myettin ‘ya te jyenna jyetki may. Kan jyeni bala parɛ ɔci naŋka pwadin baawyɛ, jyenna neeni yɔmjin te genga bɛɛ.
59002021	Gɔṭṭɛ, poca te jyek Wey ikin Abrahim neeni. Wey ikin Abrahim pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te naŋka naŋŋi ɛkɛ oŋŋa ɛkɛ Juaŋ ‘wonnɛ kaci ɛkɛ Icaak ba gena ‘yɛrŋɛ ɛkɛ nona ɛrki ma waak bɛɛ?
59002022	Te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin jyeni bala parɛ bɛɛ. Yeti jyeni bala yaakkɛn i naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadan. Ne ɛkɛ noŋni naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bala ba jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti Juaŋti neeni bɛɛn bora ne pwadan doki.
59002023	Te naŋka naŋŋɛ Abrahim neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin worgaji bɛɛn bora doki, gena jyeka gɔki agi, “Abrahim jyeti Juaŋti, ɔci te jyenna ɛkɛ jyetti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti.” Ɔci ma boṭi Abrahim agi mug Jwaŋa Tolan.
59002024	Te jyeka neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin men gɛɛl pwada Juaŋ ñamɛti te jyeni ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ baltan naŋka pwadin daŋkun i jyenno.
59002025	Ɔci jyek Rahab ɛŋa toban bala a ɔɔn daŋkun. Wɔɔka gɛɛltiyɛ, maka cuuñɛ ma lɛɛl noon ban Jɛrikɔ bɛɛn on ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn maŋŋɛ ɛkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn cuuññɛ ɛkɛ te pɔya parɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛn mwoktan ma ɔci noktan bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ pwani Juaŋ ñamɛti te naŋki ɛkɛ neeni.
59002026	Bala ba kan boŋ tɛɛtin baaw mentiyɛ, mena neeni a tuuta doki. War ɛkɛ niin budan. Ɔci ba jyeka neeniyɛ, bala ba jyeni moki. Kan jyeni bala menti parɛ ɔci naŋka pwadan baawyɛ, jyenna neeni bala ba jyeka budan.
59003001	Naa maka coŋin ɛkkɛti aga maka loṭi ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan budan amaam ɔɔn bɛɛ. Acaan ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ikin maka loṭin mayɛ, kan ikin domtin jiekyɛ, jiek tɛya ikin wyetkɔti ne pɛñan.
59003002	Ikin ma baan waakida a maka domi naŋka coŋin. Kan men gɛɛl gɔki jyeka yeyin oŋgati bɛɛyɛ, mena neeni a mena domi naŋki gɛɛl bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ loonin ñamu doki. Kan ɛkɛ yaakinti lɛmi ɛkɛ mugdɛyɔ ne pwadan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti daŋkun war ɛkɛ mugdɛyɔ warda.
59003003	Jyek muŋi lɛmmu neeni bala ba jyek muntan. Kan jiŋgin wiɛntin ikin muntan tukɛti acaan ikin buagin dala muntan noŋdi ba jyek ikinyɛ, jiŋgin yaakinti muntan mugdɛyɔ warda ɔci noŋdi ba jyek ikin.
59003004	Ɔci jyek lɛmmu moki bala ba jyek murka tolan. Murkan ḍwaŋinyɛ, ɛkkɛn ati ne pɛñan ne jwamma tolan baaliy. Ɔci te gɔmña ṭwokki ma ɛkkɛn waakɛn ḍiɛran neeniyɛ, murkan ḍwaŋin ati ba yom maka nɛɛyi ɛkkɛn neeni.
59003005	Ɔci lɛmmu mokiyɛ, ɛkɛ ḍiɛr ḍyɛro, yeti ɛkɛ gɔki jyeka ḍwaŋin bala ba mena yyɛcan. Ɔci jyek lɛmmu moki bala ba jyek maaño. Gɔṭṭɛ poca, kan piilñan ṭɔɔlɛ maañ piilñan ḍiɛran tontan ma lwoma tolantiyɛ, lwoma tolan neeni amdɛ ɛkɛ warda.
59003006	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin waakɔyɛ, balki gena yaayan, gena lɛmmo. Ɔci waak ikin waakɛnda yiegdi te jyek lɛmmu neeni. Te jyek lɛmmu neeni ma buagɔn noŋdi ne yaayan, ɔci jyeka yeyin neeniyɛ, bɛya te bana maaño.
59003007	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ daŋkun te jyek waka bala bora luomji a ywobk neeni, ma yaakinti ɛkkɛn mwoktan, waagga da te kɛɛnɛn, ɔci waagga da te kɛɛnɛn, ɔci ɛkkɛn pirtan ma baanji, ɔci ɛkkɛn a ywobk moki bɛɛ. Waka neeniyɛ, gena leyi, ɔci ḍiirg, ɔci kogi, ɔci waka bala pietin waakɛnda.
59003008	Yeti lɛmmuyɛ, ɛkɛ yaayɛ a yuom ne tolan hay! Menga yaakinti lɛmmɛ agdiyɔ aŋka jyeka yeyin neeni baadi bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ gɔki ne yaayan amaam budan, ɔci jyek ɛkɛ bala ba jan lieno.
59003009	Gɔṭṭɛ, te lɛmi ikin neeniyɛ, ikin gɔkin ne pwadan te Wey ikin mena Ciɛggɔn neeni. Ɔci te lɛmi ikin moki lɛmma ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, ikin ḍorin maka pookɛn waakɛn. Gena maka aŋŋɛ Juaŋ ba bolji ɛkɛy.
59003010	Jyeka pwadin neeni ɔci jyeka yeyin neeni ɛkkɛn bɛya bora te tuka ne cyɛɛlɔ neeniti. Modg ɔɔn, naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ naŋka neeni a ɔɔn bɛɛ! A’a, yaayɛ a ɔɔn.
59003011	Jina piegɛ pwadin ɔci jina piegɛ yeyinyɛ, ɛkkɛn piegɛn bɛya bora te nona ne cyɛɛlɔ boki? A’a.
59003012	Jan ŋuami yaakinti jieda toon ṭɔlgɛ boki? A’a. Ɔci luutkin yaakinti jieda ŋuami ṭɔlgɛ boki? A’a. Ɔci jina piegɛ bala ba eeñanyɛ, pyega pwadin bɛya bora te ɛkɛti boki? A’a.
59003013	Kan ma ɛkkɛ gɛɛg ñingɛn tɛy tɛy ɔci kan ɛkkɛn jiek ŋeecɔn ne pwadanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka pwadin te yoma pwadan, naa ɛkkɛn noŋi ba maka yyɛcin bɛɛ. Te naŋki ɛkkɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeettan ma naŋka neeni bala ba naŋki maka ñingɛn tɛyan awarɛ.
59003014	Yeti kan ɛkkɛ korkɔ cyɛy cyɛy ɔci korkɔ modɔ ne pɛñan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛ ṭiewɛ te waak a ɔɔnyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔki agi ñing tɛɛn bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkkɛ yookɛ te jyeka awarɛ no.
59003015	Ñing tɛɛn guaŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, bɛɛn te ñaalɔ bɛɛ, bɛɛn te iñɔ ṭɛɛrji a ñing tɛɛn ma baan budan. Ɔci ɛkɛ a ñing tɛɛn Juaŋ bɛɛ, gena ñing tɛɛn Jwaŋa Yaayan.
59003016	Kan ma korkɛn modɔ, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn ṭiewɔ te waakyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn a jyek laño, ɔci naŋka yeyin bala coŋɔ.
59003017	Ñing tɛɛna bɛya te ñaalɔyɛ, da parɛ. Maka balki ñing tɛɛn neeniyɛ, poŋi jyeka yeyin bɛɛ. Coodi ɛkkɛn pwad pwado. Ɛkkɛn ṭiewɔ te waak bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn wyetkɛn yeyɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki ne pɛñan mati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn tyeŋi jiek ne pwadan. Yomg ɛkkɛn bala mati ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋi ne pwadan oŋkanda. Jyek ɛkkɛn a cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ma ñingɛn bɛɛ.
59003018	Ɛkkɛn a maka yɔŋi jiek maka pookɛnti aŋka ma cootɛ te pwaniy, ɔci te naŋki ɛkkɛn mati neeniyɛ, ma noŋdi naŋka pwadin naŋka Juaŋ buagɛy.
59004001	Jyek lañ ɔci jyek ṭiewin bɛɛn te aŋɛ ɛkkɛti? Jyeka neeni bɛɛn te yomg ɛkkɛti, acaan yomg ɛkkɛ noowɔ jiju te jyek bwakti waako.
59004002	Ne ɛkkɛ buagɛ waak ɔci waak baaki ɛkkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ nokkɛ ma te bwakti waako. Acaan ne ɛkkɛ korkɔ motki te wak maka pookɛn ɔci ne ɛkkɛ yaakɛti genga eedɛ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ ṭiewɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ noowɛ wanna. Yeti waak gɛɛg baaw ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ toonnɛ Juaŋti te ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
59004003	Ɔci oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ toocɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti te waakyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛ buagɛ waka neeni te yomg ɛkkɛ pookɔ budan.
59004004	Hay ɛkkɛ maka jyetcin ɔntɔ nɛ, ŋeejɛ agi ne mena ani jyeka iñɔ baanji wɛnni naŋki ɛkɛ yaayɛ Juaŋti ne pɛñan bɛɛ? Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, mena ani jyeka iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mug Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a mena yoyi ñin i Juaŋo.
59004005	Ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi jyeka worgaji neeni a jyeka budan ne Jiek gɔkki agi, “Boŋa ikin ‘wonninti Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ konɛ motcin ne pɛñan.”
59004006	Yeti yom pwani ikin ‘wontinti Juaŋ neeni, ɛkɛ aŋka tɛɛcin ne tolan te kon monno. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ te ñamu agi, “Kan ma kooŋi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, Juaŋ kɛkti te ɛkkɛn. Yeti maka poŋi yomgɛnti agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍyɛrinyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada pwani gena ɛkkɛnti.”
59004007	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda, ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan kaaktɛti ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kwaya te ɛkkɛti.
59004008	Dala ɛkkɛ ortɛti Jwaŋa Tolanti ɔci ɛkɛ daŋkun ortiti ɛkkɛti. Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛ agɛ nɔɔtko, ɔci naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkkɛ yaayanyɛ, dala lɛgdɛ ɛkkɛ jitin. Hay! Ɛkkɛ maka noŋi waakɛn te ma ñingɛn budan nɛ, dala ɛkkɛ nɔji daldɛ te naŋki yomgɔti.
59004009	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakti awarɛ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi te nɔji ɛkkɛ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ wiaktɛ! Naa ɛkkɛ lɛɛṭɛ bɛɛ, yeti dala ɛkkɛ wiaktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔyɔ bɛɛ, yeti dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi te nɔji ɛkkɛ!
59004010	Naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba maka yomgɛn ḍwaŋin Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba maka yomgɛn ḍyɛrin, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ magdɛ Jwaŋa Tolan.
59004011	Modg ɔɔn, naa ɛkkɛ woowɛ yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl wooki mod ɛkkɛn men Kiṭɔ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ gɔki agi naŋki ɛkta neeni yaayɔyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ɛkɛ wooki jyek ganuun, ɔci a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkɛ gɔki agi jyek ɛkɛ aŋka pwadgɔ te jyek ganuun. Kan i noŋja a ɔɔnyɛ, i tiec jyek ganuun waakɛn bɛɛ, yeti i waru naŋŋi a mena jiek oldɛ ma wyetkɛnti.
59004012	Ciɛggɔn godan gɛɛl bala ne cyɛɛlɔ. Gena Jwaŋa Tolan mena ma ‘wonnɛ jyek ganuun. Ɔci gena ɛkɛ aŋka yaakinti gɔkti mati agi dala men uddɔ walla agi dala ɛkta tuudɔ. Oŋ i gɔk i aŋka a menɛ yeti ne i wooki mod ɛkkɛ a ɔɔn wan hay, muka maam?
59004013	Gɔṭṭɛ wɛnni poca, ɛkkɛ maka gɔki agi, acca walla ne liidɔ ɔɔn ooddɔn bana parɛti, ɔci ciedɔn aŋan ywoni ne cyɛɛlɔ aŋka ɔɔn cɔtɔn waak aŋka bilk bɛya ɔɔntiy.
59004014	Naŋka bɛya ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti ne liidɔ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ? Coodi ɛkkɛ bala a ɔki? Coodi ɛkkɛ bala ba wiew ne baali ne ḍyɛṭ ṭɔɔlɛ ɔci baadi dokiy.
59004015	Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka gɔktɛ agi, “Kan Juaŋ buagɔn ɔɔn ciedɔn noŋdɔn a ɔɔn ne liidɔyɛ, ɔɔn noŋdɔn a ɔɔn.”
59004016	Naŋki ɛkkɛ yeti bala ba naŋki maka yyɛcin. Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ amaam budan bala ba ne ɛkkɛ jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki no. Ɔci yyɛji ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, pwatcin bɛɛ, yaayɛ.
59004017	Kan men gɛɛl jyeka pwadin ŋeejɛ oŋ yeti ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn gena nɔjjo.
59005001	Tieŋdɛ hay! Ɛkkɛ maka ciyi baan konɛti maka waakɛn coŋin, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ wiakti te taab bala bɛya ɛkkɛti ne baaṭi neeni.
59005002	Wak ɛkkɛ waka coŋin neeni yiegin doki. Bworŋin ɛkkɛ amɛ ḍillan doki.
59005003	Ɔci dahab ɛkkɛ ɔci bil pɔdda moki, ɛkkɛn aŋi dalŋaañan doki. Ɔci te oŋ godan ɛkkɛyɛ, jyek dalŋaañan neeni bɛya bora, ɔci jiek tɛya acaan waak ḍuaññɛ ɛkkɛ amaam budan. Ɔci te oŋŋa bɛya wannayɛ, jiek pɛñ pɛñ ɛkkɛti bala ba maaño.
59005004	Gɔṭṭɛ! Maka ɛṭi pok ɛkkɛyɛ, bilk ɛkkɛn ammɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Ɔci jyek bilka neeni waakɛn coktan bɛɛ, bɛya bora. Jyek maka ɛṭi pok neeniyɛ, tieŋnɛ Ciɛggɔn Tolan doki.
59005005	Iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, wak ɛkkɛ kɔɔna kɔɔnno, ɔci oŋkanda ɛkkɛ balgɛ lieṭɛ waka ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔtɛy, ɛkkɛ waakɔ caaŋŋɛ te waak balgɛ ba moldin oomi ma aŋka noktan te iidy.
59005006	Ɛkkɛ maka pwadin neeniyɛ, jomnɛyɔ ɛkkɛ nonk godan agi ɛkki yiegɔ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋŋɛ ɛkkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yaakinti kɛkti genga ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
59005007	Yeti hay, modg ɔɔn! Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ kɛɛddɛ Ciɛggɔn te yoma ñɔyan ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Gɔṭṭɛ! Maka dwoki waakyɛ, te ñamu ɛkkɛn kɛɛy ñal ḍuoŋ tukɛ, ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkkɛn kɛɛy ywakṭi moki. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ciyi kɛɛy pok te yoma ñɔyan ne pok ḍwaŋti ɔɔn.
59005008	Ɔci ɛkkɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun ciedɛ te yoma ñɔyan. Naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ genga bɛɛ. Acaan oŋŋa Ciɛggɔn bɛɛdiyɛ, cɔɔllin doki.
59005009	Modg ɔɔn, naa ɛkkɛ woowɛ yɔtin pookɔ bɛɛ. Kan mena wooki mena parɛyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkɛ wyeñɛti. Ciɛggɔn Godan Tolan bala bɛya, bala pɔy tukɛti doki.
59005010	Dala ikin poŋtin te taab maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan maka bala gɔki mati te yenti Ciɛggɔnyɛ, taab ɛkkɛn tol tolo, yeti ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔyɔ men ɔɔn.
59005011	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan maka yɔɔd ne tɛyanyɛ, ikin boṭin ɛkkɛn agi ɛkkɛn a maka yomgɛn ñɔyin. Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ jyek Ayuub ne ɛkɛ baali yɔɔdi ne tɛyan ne taab baali ɛkɛti ne tolany. Ɛkɛ dalnɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ maŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ Juaŋ yomɛ a pɔkɔn mati, ɔci ɛkɛ ani ikin ne tolan.
59005012	Modg ɔɔn, jwalla tolan bala, ɔci ɛkɛ gɔki agi, “Naa ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ genga te yenti pɔlla ñaalɔ ɔci te yenti ṭɛra iñɔ ɔci te yenti menga bɛɛ.” Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ te jwali gɛɛlyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ ne pwadan agi, “Ɛɛ.” Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te jwali gɛɛlyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ kɛktɛ ne pwadan agi, “A’a.” Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, jiek bɛya ɛkkɛ wyetkɔti bɛɛ.
59005013	Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti balki taabyɛ, dala ɛkɛ cɔkti Juaŋti oŋkanda ɔɔn. Kan men gɛɛl yomɛ ñɔy ñɔyyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ‘ualdi ɔɔlg agi Juaŋ pwadɔ.
59005014	Ɔci kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti warɛ yaayɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ borti cyekin kaniicati aŋka ɛkkɛn bɛya. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ñɔɔn oltan ɛkɛ wyeñɛti, ɔci ɛkkɛn cɔkti Jwaŋa Tolanti te ɛkɛ.
59005015	Ɔci te jyenna jyetki Ma Kiṭɔti ne ɛkkɛn cɔkki ɛkɛti a ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ yaakinti mena warɛ yaayan neeniy ywaŋdɛ. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ balki nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɔɔktɛ Juaŋo.
59005016	Dala ɛkkɛ nɔji ɛkkɛ lɛɛldɛ bora modgɔti pookɔ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ cɔktɛ Juaŋti te maka pookɛn, ɔci dala ɛkkɛn daŋkun cɔkti Juaŋti te ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ waakɔ pwaddi. Acaan kan men gɛɛl pwani Juaŋti doki ɔci kan ɛkɛ cɔkti Juaŋtiyɛ, Juaŋ yaakinti noŋdi naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka tɛyan.
59005017	Gɔṭṭɛ poca, te jyek cɔŋi neeniyɛ, bala ba jyek Iliiya. Iliiyayɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba ikin daŋkun ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala cɔki Juaŋti ne tolan te jyek ñaal agi naa ñaal bɛɛdɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci ñaal yɔɔni yuong ne ḍoogɔ ɔci ponk ne dɔɔyɔ wilin ne cyɛɛlɔ.
59005018	Ɔci ɛkɛ cɔkcin Juaŋti moki, ɔci ñaal bɛɛn ne tolan, ɔci waka amtin bɛɛn moki.
59005019	Modg ɔɔn, kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti jyetcin ɔntɔ te jyeka awarɛtiyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ dɔɔnɛti mena parɛ gɛɛlyɛ,
59005020	mena men dɔɔnɛti neeniyɛ, dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan mena neeni yɔɔññɛ Juaŋo, ɔci ɛkɛ ḍakti moki bɛɛ, ɛkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Juaŋ te nɔji ɛkɛ nɔjja coŋin neeni doki.
60001001	Gena ‘ya Butruc Cuuda Yaccu Kiṭɔ kiewan worga ɛkkɛti neeni. Ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔ Ma Yahuud maka bala ciyi a wɛlg bonka pookɛn neeni jitiny. Gena ban Buntɔc, ɔci ban Galatiya, ɔci ban Kapadociiya, ɔci ban Ecya, ɔci ban Bitinnya.
60001002	Ne ɛkkɛ baagɛ menyɛ, ɛkkɛ ŋeejɛ Wey ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora. Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ ywaŋŋɛyɔ yomgɔti doki te Boŋ ɛkɛ. Acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ oŋkanda, ɔci dala yimg Yaccu ɛkkɛ ywaŋtɛ yomgɔti te nɔji ɛkkɛ. Dala Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwada pwani ɛkkɛti oŋkanda, ɔci dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ coodi pwanno.
60001003	Jwaŋa Tolan Jwaŋ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci Wey Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Ɛkɛ yomɛ pɔŋnɛ ikinti ne tolan. Ɔci ikin jiennin ɛkɛ te jiedda woonɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, ikin jyettin kɛɛyin naŋki Juaŋ naŋka bɛya ikinti a naŋka pwadin neeni. Ikin yaakinti kɛɛyin a ɔɔn acaan Yaccu Kiṭɔ jɔŋŋin ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti moki, ɔci ɛkɛ lien buannɛ.
60001004	Ɔci ba naŋki ma baan ne maal baali weegɛntiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ kɛɛgin wɛɛddɛ maalo, ɔci bala ba naŋki Juaŋ daŋkun. Mala ma ‘wondɛ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ñaalɔ pɔliji daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn ḍuannɛ Juaŋ te ɛkkɛ. Mala aŋan neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yiegdi bɛɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn aga donk bɛɛ.
60001005	Te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti neeniyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan bala yuoci ɛkkɛ oŋkanda te war tɛɛn ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ɛkɛ oŋkanda ne oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Ɔci ne oŋŋa ookti bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛya, ɔci jyek yɔɔd baadi doki, ɔci ɛkkɛ dɛttɛ coodda pwadan doki.
60001006	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ciyɛ te yoma ñɔyan acca ne taabn balki ɛkkɛti ɔɔn. Taabn neeniyɛ, jitkɛn a ḍiɛkan bɛɛ. Yeti taab neeni bala oŋkanda bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ yiegdi te taab neeni wɔɔka ne ḍuulan ṭɔɔlɛ budan.
60001007	Taab bala ɛkkɛti neeni poci jyeni ɛkkɛ a poccin, ne jyeni ɛkkɛ agi jyenna awarɛ boki no. Ɔci naŋka neeni bala ba ma ne pocki dahaby. Dahab piɛltan ma maccu aŋka ɛkkɛn gɔrti ne ɛkɛ pwadi awarɛ boki no. Dahab ɛkɛ a gena iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni budan, ɔci jyeni ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka pwatcin ne tolan nɔñji Juaŋti te dahab. Yeti bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, Juaŋ poci jyeni ɛkkɛ te taab neeni. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ne oŋŋa Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛdiyɛ, jyeka pwadin bɛya ɛkkɛti, ɔci ɛkɛ jieddi ɛkkɛ ɔci ɛkɛ andi ɛkkɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ɛkɛ pwaddɛ a pwadgin.
60001008	Yaccu yuarŋɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ anɛ ɛkɛ ne tolan. Yeti ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ yuartɛ te woŋgɔ acca bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ jyettɛ ɛkɛti men ɔɔn. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne tolan te yom ñɔɔna menga yaakinti konɛ gɔɔdɛ bora ne pwadan bɛɛ neeni.
60001009	Ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔyɔ a ɔɔn acaan ɛkkɛ jyettɛ te baaṭi doki agi ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ Yaccu, ɔci acca ɛkɛ yuarnɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ baali yuoci ɛkkɛ dokiy.
60001010	Maka a bɔwan bala gɔki te baaṭi te jyek yɔɔta yuoci Juaŋ ɛkkɛy. Ɛkkɛn ma myetkɛ agi Juaŋ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛti yom pwanno. Ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te jyeka neeni, ɔci bala tooci agi ma yɔɔdda Juaŋ te pɔya bɛ?
60001011	Boŋ Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala gɔki ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti te Kiṭɔ agi ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, taab ɛkɛ bala. Ɔci ne taab baadiyɛ, naŋka pwadin oŋ bɛya oŋo. Ɔci bɔwan neeni bala tooci te jyek Kiṭɔ mena bɛya yuoci ma neeni agi ɛkta agi menɛ katan, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tooci agi ɛkta bɛɛdɔ ne tua?
60001012	Ɔci jiek lɛɛlnɛ Juaŋ bora maka bɔwan neeniti, agi naŋka neeni bɛya ne cwakanti ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ, yeti agi bɛɛdɔ ne baaṭi te yuonga ciyɛ ɛkkɛ neeni. Ɔci acca jyeka neeni bɛɛn bora ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛ lalkɛ ma te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin neeni. Ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ lalkɛ te war tɛɛn Boŋ Juaŋo. War tɛɛn Boŋ Juaŋ cuonnɛ Juaŋ ɛkkɛnti te ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci acca jyek yɔɔd Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan. Malɛɛkanyɛ, ɛkkɛn buagɔn yɔɔta neeni jiñɛ yuartan daŋkun.
60001013	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te paŋŋa paŋdɛ ɛkkɛ oŋkanday. Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ tiidɛ ne pwadan aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa Juaŋti. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ oŋkanda te jyek naŋka naŋdɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɛkkɛti, ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdi ɔɔn. Naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadan neeniyɛ, naŋdɛ ɛkɛ te yom ɛkɛ parɛ yoma bɔwan.
60001014	Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolan acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin ɛkɛ woodgɛn. Naa ɛkkɛ moki noŋdɛ ba naŋka yeyin naŋka yomg ɛkkɛ buagɛ te baaṭi ne wona ɛkkɛ men Juaŋ kwoyɛ wanna bɛɛ. Te ñamu ne Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ men bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ naŋka yeyin naŋka yomg ɛkkɛ buagɛ ne tolan te baaṭi neeni.
60001015	Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkkɛ bornɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ da parɛ. Ɛkɛ pwad pwado. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala naŋki ɛkkɛ pwadɔ oŋkanda daŋkun.
60001016	A ɔɔn bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Acaan ‘ya pwadyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun pwaddɛ.”
60001017	Oŋkanda ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ cɔkɛ Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ boṭɛ ɛkɛ agi Wey ɛkkɛ, ɔci acca a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ ṭɛɛr wyeñɛti a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ ne pwadan te naŋki ɛkkɛ. Mena bardɛ ɛkkɛ a Wey ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ noŋdi godan ɛkkɛti, menga da te naŋki ɛkɛ, ɔci menga da te naŋki ɛkɛ. Ɛkɛ jiek gwaldɛ jitin ne pwadan waakɛnda.
60001018	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te naŋki ɛkkɛ a ɔɔn acaan te baaṭi ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba ganuun yɔrg ɛkkɛ, ɔci ba naŋki yɔrg ɛkkɛ moki. Yeti ɛkkɛ koonɛ Juaŋ bora te naŋka budan neeniti. Ɛkkɛ wonnɛ Juaŋ bora te coodi yɔɔrti te bil pɔdda walla te dahab bɛɛ. Waka neeni baadi budan.
60001019	Ɛkkɛ wannɛ Juaŋ te yimg Kiṭɔ yimga pwadin. Ɛkɛ nogɛ ma te ikin bala ba kalŋ ṭɔɔlɛ pwadan Kalŋ ṭɔɔlɛ ‘yɛri ma te nɔjiy. Ɛkɛ bala ba kalŋa balkɛ gena yaayan gɛɛl warɛti bɛɛy.
60001020	Jyek lyen Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te baaṭi ne ṭɛɛr baawi meny. Ɔci acca jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛn bora doki ne pwadan. Ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ɛkkɛti doki te ninka ṭɛɛr noŋi wyeñɛ baldi neeni.
60001021	Te naŋki Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolan mena ɛkɛ luolnɛ ñaalɔ te lienti ɔci ‘wonnɛ pwani neeni. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Juaŋti ɔci balgɛ kɛɛyɛ pwanna bɛya ne baaṭiy.
60001022	Ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba jyek Juaŋ awarɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka yomg ɛkkɛ pwatki te naŋka neeni wanna. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala yomg ɛkkɛ pwadɔ modg ɛkkɛti. Dala ɛkkɛ andɛ ɛkkɛn ne tolan.
60001023	Acaan ɛkkɛ jiennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te jiedda woonɛ doki. Jiedi ɛkkɛ jiedda woonɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ maka wonkɛn. Jiedda neeniyɛ, a jiedi ma baan bɛɛ. Jiedda ma jiettiti ma te jiedi ma baanyɛ, ma baadi. Yeti jiedda ma jieddɛ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ma baadi bɛɛ. Jyek Jwaŋa Tolan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka tɛɛtki may. Ɔci jyeka neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
60001024	A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Ma baan waakɛndayɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba luom budan, ɔci ɛkkɛn pwanna pwani ba pɛɛppin luom jitin budan. Luomyɛ, iwa, ɔci pɛɛppin ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ.
60001025	Yeti Jyek Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka bala yuonginda ɔɔn.” Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin jyeka ɛkkɛ lalkɛ may.
60002001	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ mwondɛ te yom yoñ waakɛnda, ɔci te jomi jiek waakɛnda, ɔci te naŋka noŋi ɛkkɛ ma ñingɛn waakɛnda, ɔci te kon moni waakɛnda, ɔci te waaŋi jiek waakɛnda.
60002002	Ba bolji kɛɛgin jiettan ma wonkɛn ne ɛkkɛn buagiti aak ne pɛñanyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ daŋkun bwagdɛ jyek Juaŋ a ɔɔn, acaan jyek ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, pwadɔ. Gena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. Ɔci te jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ ‘uottɛ ñamu te jyek yɔɔt Juaŋ yɔɔta ɛkɛ yuoci ma neeniy.
60002003	Ɛkkɛ dɛnnɛ jyek ɛkɛ doki. Ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ Juaŋ pwad pwado.
60002004	Dala ɛkkɛ ortɛti Yaccuti. Ɛkɛ tɛɛti. Ɛkɛ bala ba guonan tuotan maka cɔti oorgy. Yeti ɛkɛ a mena muonɛ Juaŋ boray. Ɛkɛ pwad pwad Juaŋti ne tolan.
60002005	Ɔci ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba gwoyya cɔti Boŋ Juaŋ on Jwaŋa Tolany. Ɛkɛ buagɔn ɛkkɛ agdɛ gaciicin Jwaŋa Tolan ɔci noŋdɛ kanŋa gaciicin. Ɔci jwalla neeni kon ɛkɛ agi ɛkkɛ Juaŋ ‘wondɛ waka ‘yɛrdɛ ɛkkɛ a wak naŋki Boŋ Juaŋo. Juaŋ ‘wondɛ ɛkkɛ waka neeni te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci gena naŋka Juaŋ buagɛ wanna.
60002006	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, jyeka kiigin gɔki te Yaccu Kiṭɔ agi, “‘Ya guonan ḍuacca ban Urcaliimji. Gena guonan mwowwan ‘ya bora a guonan cɔtki ma on pwadany. Maka jyeddi guonan neenitiyɛ, ɛkkɛn lɔɔddi bɛɛ.”
60002007	Ɛkkɛ maka jyettɛ Yaccutiyɛ, Yaccu pwanna pwani ɛkkɛti. Yeti maka jyeti bɛɛyɛ, jyek Yaccu pwad pwad ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Guonan guaktan maka cɔti oorg agi ɛkta yaayɔ neeniyɛ, agi ɛkta aŋŋɔ guonan pwadɔ on wardanti.”
60002008	Ɔci jyeka kiigin gɔki moki agi, “Guonan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn twordɛ awarɛ. Ɔci ma gɔkti agi ɛkta yaayɔ.” Ma twordɛ guonan neeni acaan ɛkkɛn jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ tiitanyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci te tworŋa ɛkkɛn twordɛ guonan a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ te ɛkkɛn te baaṭi dokiy.
60002009	Yeti ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛ muonɛ Juaŋ bora naŋŋɛ a kɛɛna ne cyɛɛlɔ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ gaciicin Mena Ciɛggɔn Tolan ñaalɔ. Kɛɛn ɛkkɛ da parɛ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ ma Jwaŋa Tolan woodgɛn. Ɛkkɛ muonɛ ɛkɛ bora a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ maka pookɛn myettɛ te naŋka pwadin naŋki mena ɛkkɛ bornɛ neeni. Ɛkkɛ oonɛ ɛkɛ bora te nona mielti. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ ciyɛ non ɛkɛ nona bɔwan ne yaajan neeniti.
60002010	Te ñamuyɛ, ɛkkɛ agɛ maka budan, ɔci acca ɛkkɛ aŋŋɛ ma Jwaŋa Tolan. Te ñamu yom pɔkkin Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ bɛɛ. Yeti acca yom pɔkkin ɛkɛ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki.
60002011	Maka ana ‘yay, ɛkkɛ balgɛ ciyɛ acca iñɔ baanji wɛnni ba maka wɛlgo! Dala ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te naŋki maka pookɛn ne ɛkkɛn noŋki ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagiti noŋti ne pɛñany. Naŋka neeniyɛ, ma yomgɛn lɛɛktan te ɛkkɛn.
60002012	Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan bonk maka ciyi budan jyek Juaŋ kuokɔn neeni jitin. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛn wooki ɛkkɛ ne pɛñan agi naŋki ɛkkɛ yiegɔyɛ, dala naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka pwadan yuartan ɛkkɛn te woŋgɛn, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ne oŋŋa godan Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛn jieddi Juaŋo.
60002013	Acaan ne ɛkkɛ agɛ Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka naŋɛ ma a maka ḍwaŋin akuumati neeni waakɛnda. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ḍuaŋa akuuma ḍuaŋa tolan, acaan ɛkɛ bala ñamu te ma akuuma waakɛnda.
60002014	Ɔci maka ḍuaŋan ṭɔlgɛnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkkɛn daŋkun. Ḍuaŋan ṭɔlgɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn cundɛ ḍuaŋa tolan bonk jitin aŋka goddan maka naŋki yeyiny. Ɔci maka naŋki ɛkkɛn pwadinyɛ, ḍuaŋan ṭɔlgɛn gɔkti ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti.
60002015	Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan oŋkanda. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka wooki ɛkkɛ amaam maka jiek kwoyɔn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti gɔkti genga ɛkkɛti moki bɛɛ.
60002016	Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ ba maka pɔŋnɛ Juaŋy, naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ gɔkɛ agi ɛkkɛ pɔŋnɛ Juaŋ aŋka ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba yomg ɛkkɛ budan pookɔ bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛnk Juaŋo. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ɛkɛ.
60002017	Dala ɛkkɛ andɛ ma waakɛnda. Dala ɛkkɛ andɛ modg ɛkkɛ Ma Kiṭɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ buattɛ Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɔci dala moki ɛkkɛ buattɛ ḍuaŋa ɛkkɛ ḍuaŋa tolan ma Ḍɔɔm neeni.
60002018	Maka kɛɛnko, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek weyi ɛkkɛ. Kanŋa weyyɛn, kan ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwadɔ ɛkkɛti, ɔci walla kan jyek ɛkkɛn tɛy tɛy ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ buattɛ ɛkkɛn ɔɔn.
60002019	Kan taab bala mena kɛɛngɔn mena pwadanti amaam te naŋki weegɛn ne ɛkɛ noŋŋi gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan kɛɛngɔn neeni bala poŋi te Juaŋ men ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ yomɛ pɔktɛ ɛkɛti.
60002020	Kan i ḍuati ma te naŋka naŋŋi i yaayan neeniyɛ, ɔci kan i yomu tieŋni te ḍuana i ḍuakiti ma neeniyɛ, yom tiekin i neeni a genga boki? A’a. Yeti kan i baal noŋ ne pwadan, ɔci i eekti ma taab te naŋka naŋŋi i pwadin neeniyɛ, kan i yomu tieŋni men ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pɔktɛ iti.
60002021	Ɛkkɛ bornɛ Juaŋ ɔci ‘wonnɛ ɛkɛ coodda tɛyan neeni aŋka coodi ɛkkɛ bala ba coodi Yaccu daŋkun. Ɛkɛ warɛ eejjin te ɛkkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ lɔktɛ ba coodi ɛkɛ daŋkun. Dala ɛkkɛ boottɛ ɛkɛti.
60002022	Yaccuyɛ, ne ɛkɛ baalɛ ciyi ṭɛɛrji wɛnni menyɛ, naŋka yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Jyeka jomgin bala ɛkɛ tukɛti oŋgati bɛɛ.
60002023	Ne ma balki ḍorki ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ men gɛɛl ḍaarŋiyɔ bɛɛ. Ɔci moki ne ma balki noŋki ne yaayan ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkɛ gɔkcin jwali gɛɛl ne yaayan bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ yomɛ ḍuannɛ aŋa Jwaŋa Tolanti mena noŋi godan ne pwadany.
60002024	Nɔji ikin eññɛ Kiṭɔ kakanti, aŋka ikin yaakinti mwontin te nɔji ikin, ɔci ikin yaakinti cietin noŋtin naŋka pwadin. Te taab bɛɛn ɛkɛ warɛti neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛ ywaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ doki.
60002025	Te ñamu ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba kulin ne jyecki ɔntɔy. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ dɔɔnɛti Kiṭɔ mena gɔṭi ɛkkɛ ba Ḍɛɛnɔn ɛkkɛ neeni.
60003001	Maka moongo, dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛ. ‘Uay ɛkkɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg jyeti jyek Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
60003002	Yeti kan ɛkkɛn gɔrti naŋka pwadan ɛkkɛti ne ɛkkɛ waakɔ dɔɔdɛ iñɔ buayɛ ɛkkɛn oŋkandayɛ, ɛkkɛn buagdɛ jyek Juaŋ daŋkun. Ɛkkɛn dita jyeddi te jyeka guagdɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkkɛnti a jyek Juaŋ te tuggɔ wanna bɛɛ. Yeti ɛkkɛn gɔrti gena naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛn jyeddi.
60003003	Naa ɛkkɛ anɛ ywaŋi waaka bora budan aŋka ma gɔṭi ɛkkɛ pwannɛ a pwadgin a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Gena waka ba pani jyeyi, ɔci waka ‘yɛŋgan ma a waka naŋɛ ma te dahab, ɔci bworŋin pwadin.
60003004	Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka pwaddɛ a pwadgin aŋa yomgɔti. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ agdɛ maka tuggɛn luyan. Waka yɔŋki ma waakɛn ba dahab ɔci pani jyeyi ɔci bworŋin neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn baadi. Yeti yoma pwadan neeni, ɛkɛ baadi bɛɛ. Yoma pwadan neeni pwad pwad Juaŋti ne tolan.
60003005	Te baaṭi moonga pwadin maka jyeti Juaŋtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn pwanna pwani te tuk luun te yom pwani ɛkkɛn neeni. Ɔci ɛkkɛn bala tyeŋi jyek ‘uay ɛkkɛn ne pwadan.
60003006	A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba naŋki Caara ɛŋ Abrahim. Ɛŋ Abrahimyɛ, ‘war ɛkɛ barŋɛ ɛkɛ agi, “Ciɛggɔn.” Ɔci ɛkkɛ hay moongo, kan ɛkkɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki Caara, ɔci kan ɛkkɛ buayɛ genga bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛ agdɛ moonga pwadin Juaŋ ñamɛti ba Caara awarɛ.
60003007	Ɔci ɛkkɛ maka ‘uay daŋkun, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ ne pwadan te moong ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛn waakɛn tɛɛcin ba ɛkkɛ bɛɛ, yeti ɛkkɛ agɛ maka ne cyɛɛlɔ te tɛɛtin ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan tɛɛtin baadi bɛɛ neeniy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ andɛ moong ɛkkɛ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, aŋka cɔŋi ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ Juaŋo.
60003008	Ɛkkɛ waakidayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te paŋŋa ne cyɛɛlɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te modg ɛkkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwada mati. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ tuggɔ luya.
60003009	Kan men gɛɛl noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ɛkɛti ne yaayan bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛ ḍardɛyɔyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ yettɛ ḍardɛyɔ bɛɛ. Kan men gɛɛl ḍor ɛkkɛyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔktɛ Juaŋti aŋka Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkɛti, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan buagɔn dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn. Ɔci kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔnyɛ, Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti daŋkun.
60003010	Jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Kan men gɛɛl buagɔn ciyi tɛɛti te yoma ñɔyan ɔci kan buagɔn coodda pwadanyɛ, naa jyeka yeyin bala ɛkɛ tukɛti bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkɛ jomi jiek bɛɛ.
60003011	Dala ɛkɛ warɛ yaldɛ ɔntɔ te naŋka yeyinti neeni. Dala ɛkɛ noŋdi naŋka pwadin. Dala ɛkɛ lieṭi pɔya ɛkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Ɔci ne ɛkɛ pɔy yuardɛyɛ, dala pɔya neeni mugdɛ ɛkɛ ne pwadan.
60003012	Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan bala gɔṭi maka pwadin. Ɔci ɛkɛ jyetkɛ a pɔggin, ɔci ɛkɛ tieŋdi ne ɛkkɛn cɔkti ɛkɛti. Yeti Jwaŋa Tolan yooktan te maka yeyin.”
60003013	Kan ɛkkɛ yomgɔ buagɔn naŋka pwadin ne pɛñany, a menɛ noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛtiy?
60003014	Yeti kan taab bɛya ɛkkɛti te naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka pwadinyɛ, Juaŋ noŋdi ne pwadan ɛkkɛti. Naa ɛkkɛ buayɛ maka noŋi ne yaayan ɛkkɛti neeni bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ poŋɛ jiek yomgɔti bɛɛ.
60003015	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ naŋki Kiṭɔ yomgɔti agi ɛkta agdɔ Ciɛggɔn Tolɔ. Dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ ywaŋdɛ oŋkanda aŋka ɛkkɛ yaakɛti ṭwoktɛ mena tootti ɛkkɛti te jyek kɛɛna kɛɛyɛ ɛkkɛ Juaŋ yomgɔti neeni. Yeti dala ɛkkɛ ṭwoktɛ maka neeniti te yoma pwadan ɔci ne maalan.
60003016	Naa jwalla yaayan gɛɛl niindi ɛkkɛ ḍɔɔggɔti bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, kan ma wooki ɛkkɛyɛ, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn gɔrtɛ coodda ɛkkɛ ciyɛ te jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeniyɛ, ne baaṭi waaŋi ɛkkɛn neeni aga lɔɔn ɛkkɛnti.
60003017	Kan men gɛɛl balki taab te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadin neeni ba yom Juaŋ a ɔɔnyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin ne tolan te taab bɛya ɛkɛti te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka yaayan neeniy.
60003018	Taab Kiṭɔyɛ, bala a ɔɔn daŋkun, ɛkɛ balki taab te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka pwadan. Ɛkɛ tuun oŋi ne cyɛɛlɔ te nɔji ma waakɛnda. Mena pwadan neeni tuun te maka yeyin, aŋka ikin ootin ɛkɛ Juaŋti. War ɛkɛ tuun yeti boŋ ɛkɛ aŋka bala tɛɛti men.
60003019	Ɔci te boŋ ɛkɛyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ɔci ‘yeeñga bala ciyi ciginji bana maañ neeni lallɛ te jyek Juaŋo.
60003020	’Yeeñga bala ciginji neeni, gena ‘yeeñg maka jyek Juaŋ bɛɛyɛji te baaṭi ne Nɔwa baali cɔti murka tolany. Jwaŋa Tolan bala kɛɛy ɛkkɛn. Ɛkɛ looñi ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan bɛɛ. Nɔwa bala noŋi murka. Ɔci ma gɛɛg tieŋŋin jiek ne ḍiɛkan ṭɔlgɛn budan ba ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne ḍoogɔ. Ɛkkɛn aŋka yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ te piego.
60003021	Bala ba Nɔwa ne unni te piegyɛ, bala a ɔɔn daŋkun te ɛkkɛ ne oŋŋa ɛkkɛ buulkɛ mayɛ, ɛkkɛ unnɛ doki te yɔɔta ɛkkɛ yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ ne ɛkɛ jɔŋni ñaalɔ te koolji tɛɛti mokiy. Jyek bulti neeniyɛ, gena jyek lɔŋ ma waakɛn te giikin bɛɛ. Ne ma bultiti mayɛ, a ɔɔn bala ba ɛkkɛn gɔkti Juaŋti agi dala ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwaddɔ.
60003022	Ne Yaccu jɔŋni ñaalɔ te lientiyɛ, ɛkɛ ati ñaalɔ pɔliji. Ɔci acca ɛkɛ bala ciyi Jwaŋa Tolan taaŋɛti taaŋŋa byerɔn. Ɔci malɛɛkan waakɛnda bala noŋi ba jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci war tɛɛn boŋki ɔci jɔkin waakɛnda bala ɛkɛ bieŋɛti.
60004001	Kiṭɔ warɛ taabbin ne tolan te ɛkkɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ yooktɛ te taab bɛɛ. Dala paŋi ɛkkɛ bala ba paŋi Kiṭɔ, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ waakɔ tɛya. Kan men gɛɛl taabbin ne tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ mwonnin te nɔji ɛkɛ awarɛ.
60004002	Acca a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɔci oŋkanda ne ñamu ɔɔnyɛ, dala coodda ciyɛ ɛkkɛ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni neeni ‘wondɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bieŋɛti, naa ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ba naŋka ma baan yomgɛn buagiti bɛɛ.
60004003	Te baaṭiyɛ, ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ ba naŋki maka ciyi budan Juaŋ kwoyɔn neeni. Naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ a ɔɔn moki bɛɛ. Naŋki ɛkkɛ te baaṭi neeniyɛ, gena jyek paŋi tomi ɛkkɛ yomgɔti, ɔci nooŋi mooyo, ɔci naŋki tomi waakɛnda. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛ balgɛ noŋɛ naŋka yeyin jitkɛn ne coŋɔn te mali jɔkin yeyin neeni.
60004004	Ɔci acca ma korkɛn buañi, acaan ɛkkɛ yookɛ te naŋka yaayan neeni iki ɛkkɛn. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn wooki ɛkkɛ.
60004005	Yeti ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyek naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni ootan bora Jwaŋa Tolan mena noŋi godanti. Mena neeni noŋdi godan maka ciyi ñaalɔ acca, ɔci maka tuutan daŋkun.
60004006	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, aŋka maka tuun te baaṭi lalkɛti ma te jyek Juaŋ jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin wanna. Waak ɛkkɛn ḍakcin ba lyen ma waakɛnda. Yeti boŋ ɛkkɛn bala tɛɛti men te tɛɛtin Juaŋo. Ɔci Juaŋ noŋdi godan ɛkkɛnti waakɛnda.
60004007	Oŋ coodda iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, wyeñɛ noŋi cɔɔldi doki. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ paŋi ɛkkɛ ywaŋdɛyɔ ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te coodi ɛkkɛ aŋka ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti cɔktɛ a cɔŋi oŋkanda ɔɔn.
60004008	Naŋka pwadan te naŋka pookɛnyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ oondɛ yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda ne tolan. Mena ani mayɛ, ɛkɛ ma bɔɔktɛ te nɔji ɛkkɛn nɔjja naŋtan ɛkkɛn coŋin neeni.
60004009	Dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwadɔ Ma Kiṭɔ maka wɛlgti, naa ɛkkɛ korkɔ ŋuurŋan te waka amtan ɛkkɛn bɛɛ.
60004010	Ɛkkɛ waakida ‘wonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan kanŋan jitkɛn ne coŋɔn, menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ, menga da te kanŋa ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala naŋka ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni kandɛ ne pwadan aŋka dala ɛkkɛ moowɛ yɔtin pookɔ te yom pwani ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni.
60004011	Gɔṭṭɛ poca, kan men gɛɛl ɛkkɛti loṭi mayɛ, dala ɛkɛ gɔkti mati te jyeka Juaŋ buagiti ɛkɛ loṭi may. Ɔci kan men gɛɛl moki ma te kanŋa parɛ gɛɛlyɛ, dala ɛkɛ noŋdi ba war tɛɛn Juaŋ daŋkun. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ naŋki ɛkkɛ waakɛnda te war tɛɛn Juaŋo, ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ma jieddi Juaŋ te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Dala ɛkɛ jiɛtan ma yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn. Ɔci dala ɛkɛ aga mena tolan yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn. Amɛɛn.
60004012	Maka ana ‘yay, naa ɛkkɛ korkɔ buaya noon ne taab pɛñan ba maañ neeni gɛɛl bɛɛdɛ ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Naa ɛkkɛ toottɛ agi taab neeni bala a ɔki a ɔɔn bɛɛ. Taab neeni bala aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan gɔrti ɛkkɛ, ne ɛkkɛ yomgɔ balki a ɔkiy.
60004013	Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka yomgɔ ñɔya ne ɛkkɛ ñoowɛ iki Yaccu te taab ɛkɛy. Kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɔci ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ yuartan ma ne ɛkɛ pwanni a pwaniy, ɔci ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ñɔya a ñɔɔn ne tolan.
60004014	Kan ma wooki ɛkkɛ te yenti Kiṭɔyɛ, Juaŋ ɛkkɛ magdɛ, ɔci Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa pwadan neeniyɛ, bala ɛkkɛti.
60004015	Kan taab ɛkkɛ balayɛ, naa taab neeni bala ɛkkɛti te naŋki ɛkkɛ naŋka yeyin bɛɛ, ɔci walla te nooŋi ma bɛɛ, ɔci walla moki te kali waak bɛɛ, ɔci walla moki te luupcin menga tukɛ luuptɛ jyek maka pookɛnti bɛɛ.
60004016	Yeti kan men gɛɛl balki taab acaan ɛkɛ a men Kiṭɔyɛ, naa ɛkɛ yomɛ wiakti poŋi agi taab neeni a lɔɔn bɛɛ. Dala ɛkɛ gɔkti mati te yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni men ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ jieddi Juaŋo.
60004017	Oŋŋa Jwaŋa Tolan noŋdi godan mati bɛɛn doki. Ɛkɛ bala noŋi godan acca ma ɛkɛti ñamu. Ɔci kan godan ɛkɛ tɛɛcin ikin Ma Kiṭɔtiy, oŋ maka yookɔn te jyeka wonkɛn jyeka pwadin pɔya yooŋti ɛkkɛn ɔntɔ te ywobji ɛkɛti bala boki? A’a.
60004018	A ɔɔn bala ba jyeka kiigin ne gɔkki agi, “Maka pwadinyɛ, kan jyek yɔɔt ɛkkɛn tɛy tɛyyɛ, oŋ maka yookɔn te Juaŋ ɔci maka noŋi ne yaayan pɔya ɛkkɛn yɔɔdɛ Juaŋ bala wɛnɛ?”
60004019	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan ma balki taab ba yom Juaŋyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn noŋdi naŋka pwadin. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛn waak ɛkkɛn ‘wontan Juaŋ bieŋɛti, acaan Juaŋyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena oki waako, ɔci ɛkɛ wak ɛkɛ daldɛ bɛɛ.
60005001	Cyekin kaniica, ‘ya ṭey ɛkkɛ. ‘Ya a ciɛggɔn kaniica ba ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci ‘ya a mena Kiṭɔ yuarŋɛ ne taab baali ɛkɛtiy. Ɔci moki ne ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ naŋdɛ Juaŋ pwada pwanno, ɔci pwani ɛkɛ neeni bɛya ‘yati daŋkun.
60005002	Maka bala kaniican ɛkkɛtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ gɔṭɛ ɛkkɛn ne pwadan. Ɛkkɛn bala ba kulin Juaŋo. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ kanŋa neeni te yoma pwadan, naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa te yoma baaw ba ɛkkɛ iirkɛ ma a iirŋ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ noŋɛ kanŋa neeni te waka bɛya ɛkkɛti a bilk a waka budan neeni bɛɛ. Naŋka neeni a lɔɔno. Dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ acaan ɛkkɛ buagɛ ma magdɛ a maŋŋo.
60005003	Naa ɛkkɛ menga iirdɛ a iirŋ kaniicaji te coodi ɛkkɛ byeŋkɔti bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan mati aŋka ɛkkɛn lɔkti ba naŋki ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ ba ḍɛɛnin kulin.
60005004	Kan ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ne pwadan Ma Kiṭɔti a ɔɔnyɛ, ne mena tolan mena a Ḍɛɛnɔn Kulin bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ waka pwadin. Yeti waka ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ ɛkɛ neeni bala ba waka ‘wontan ma maka ḍwaŋin iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnni bɛɛ. Wak maka iñɔ wɛnni ɛkkɛn baadi lakun. Yeti Yaccu ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ pwani ɛkɛ pwanna baadi bɛɛy.
60005005	Ɔci ɛkkɛ maka kaalko, dala ɛkkɛ tieŋdɛ jyek maka ḍwaŋin. Ɔci ɛkkɛ waakidayɛ, dala ɛkkɛ nooŋdɛ yɔtin ne pwadan te yoma ḍiɛran. A ɔɔn, jyeka kiigin gɔki agi, “Kan ma kooŋi waakɛn agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍwaŋinyɛ, Juaŋ kɛkti te ɛkkɛn. Ɔci maka poŋi yomgɛnti agi ɛkkɛn aginti maka ḍyɛrinyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad ɛkkɛnti.”
60005006	Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ ḍyɛrdi. Ɛkkɛ balgɛ Juaŋ bieŋɛti ɔci ɛkɛ tolla tollo. Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛlti a oŋŋa pwadan ɛkɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛ naŋdɛ ɛkɛ agdɛ maka ḍwaŋin.
60005007	Jyeka lildɛ ɛkkɛ yomgɔti te jyek coodiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛn oldɛ ɛkkɛ ɛkɛ bieŋɛti waakɛnda, acaan ɛkɛ tieci waŋɛ te ɛkkɛ.
60005008	Woŋgɔ pɔktɛ, hay! Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ! Acaan Jwaŋa Yaayan mena yookɔn te ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ buagɔn muowi ɛkkɛ bala ba jyɛl ne ati wiagi lieṭi gena amdɛ ɛkiy.
60005009	Dala ɛkkɛ kɛktɛ te ɛkɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan te jyenna ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti neeni. Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ modg ɛkkɛ baan konɛ wardayɛ, ɛkkɛn balki taab ba ɛkkɛ ɔɔn.
60005010	Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwad pwad mati te jiek waakɛnda. Ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ muonɛ bora te naŋki Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Ɔci ne baaṭi ɛkkɛ ciedɛ iki ɛkɛ yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn. Yeti accayɛ, taab bala ɛkkɛti ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ men. Dala ɛkkɛ magdɛ Juaŋ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ tɛya te jyek ɛkɛ, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan oŋkanda.
60005011	Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena tolan te waak waakɛnda. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala yuonginda yuonginda ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.
60005012	Cilayɛ, ɛkɛ aŋi ba mod ɔɔn. Ɛkɛ a mena tieci jiek waakɛn. ‘Ya maŋŋa ɛkɛ te kiin worga ṭɔɔlɛ ḍuulan neeni. Ɔci te worga neeniyɛ, ‘ya baal ṭey ɛkkɛ. Jyeka ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te yom pwani Juaŋ neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka awarɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔdɛ ne tɛyan te jyeka neeni.
60005013	Ma kaniica wɛnni ban Baabilyɛ, ɛkkɛn ñiepi ɛkkɛ. Ɛkkɛn muonɛ Juaŋ bora ba ɛkkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci kaci ‘ya Markyɛ, ɛkɛ ñiepi ɛkkɛ daŋkun.
60005014	Dala ɛkkɛ ñiebdɛ yɔtin pookɔ ne pwadan te yoma pwadan. Ɛkkɛ waakida maka bala Kiṭɔtiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ yomgɔ pwada a pwanno. Bawwin.
61001001	Gena ‘ya Cimaan Butruc kiewan worga ɛkkɛti neeni. ‘Ya a kɛɛngɔn Yaccu Kiṭɔ, ɔci ‘ya a Cuuda ɛkɛ moki. Ɛkkɛ maka kiegan ‘ya worga nɛ, ɛkkɛ a maka balki jyek jyenna pwadan ba ɔɔny. Ikin balkin jyek jyenna neeni te naŋki Jwaŋ ikin ɔci Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena Yuoci ikin neeni. Ɛkɛ pwad pwado.
61001002	Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccuyɛ, dala ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ magdɛ ne tolan yomgɔti. Ɔci dala yom pwani ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan. Dala naŋka neeni bala ɛkkɛti te ŋeejin ɛkkɛ jyek Juaŋ ŋeejɛ ne pwadan i jyek Yaccu Kiṭɔ Ciɛggɔn ikin daŋkuny.
61001003	Te war tɛɛn Juaŋ ikintiyɛ, ikin yaakinti cietin ne pwadan, ɔci noŋtin ba naŋki ɛkɛ. War tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala ikinti acaan ɛkɛ ŋeecin ikin doki. Ɛkɛ ikin bornin acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ikin pwattin ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Ɔci ɛkɛ buagɔn dala war tɛɛn ɛkɛ bala ikinti ne tolan.
61001004	Ikin myennin ɛkɛ te naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ ikintiy. Jyek naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, pwanna pwani ne tolan hay! Ɔci te jyek ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti kootin bora te naŋka yeyinti, naŋka bala iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy. Nɔji tol tol iñɔ ṭɛɛrji acaan ma bala noŋi ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagiti ne pɛñan neeni. Ikin yaakinti kootin bora te naŋka neeniti, acaan ikin ‘wonnin Juaŋ yom ɛkɛ waanɛ ikin yomgɔti.
61001005	Ɛkkɛ jyettɛ Jwaŋa Tolanti doki, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ lieṭɛ naŋka pookɛn naŋka pwadin ne pɛñan daŋkun. Naŋka pookɛn neeniyɛ, gena coodda pwadan ɔci ŋeejjin jiek ŋeettiti ma,
61001006	ɔci muŋŋa ma mwokki waakɛn, ɔci yɔɔdda ma yɔɔtti ne tɛyan,
61001007	ɔci yom pwanna ma yomgɛn pwatki Juaŋti, ɔci yom pwanna ma yomgɛn pwatki maka pookɛnti, ɔci anna ma anki maka pookɛny.
61001008	Naŋka guaŋi ‘ya neeniyɛ, kan ɛkkɛn bala ɛkkɛti ne tolan waakɛnda, ɔci ŋeejin ɛkkɛ Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeennɛ neeniyɛ, bala ɛkkɛti budan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ aarŋɛ kanŋa Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɔci naŋka pwadan baaw ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
61001009	Maka naŋka neeni baaw ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba maka ñingɛn ulan. Ɛkkɛn yaakinti jiek jitkɛn yuartan ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn poŋi te oŋŋa nɔji ɛkkɛn eññɛ Juaŋ ɔntɔ neeni bɛɛ.
61001010	Modg ɔɔn, acaan naŋka neeni bala matiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ aŋka poŋdɛ te naŋki Juaŋ ne pwadan, acaan dala naŋki Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan ne ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ bornɛ ɔci muonɛ boray. Ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛ ḍɛɛmdɛ iñɔ oŋgati moki bɛɛ.
61001011	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ne oŋŋa ɛkkɛ kaattɛ cyɛgji Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔti bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkkɛ kaattɛ Juaŋ ne pwadan ban ɛkɛ. Ɔci cyɛgji ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, bala yuonginda ɔɔn.
61001012	Jyeka neeni jitkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan, ɔci ɛkkɛ balgɛ yɔdgɛ ne tɛyan te jyeka neeni. Yeti a oŋkiyɛ, ‘ya baal gɔk ɛkkɛti aŋka dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ jyeka neeni.
61001013	’Ya poŋ gɔk ka ne ‘ya baala ciya men te wara neeni ɔci kan ‘ya gɔkka ɛkkɛti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ yiedɛ te jyeka neeni bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn pwatcin.
61001014	’Ya poŋ a ɔɔn acaan ‘ya myenna Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ agi oŋŋa ‘ya tuudjɔ cɔɔlnɔ doki.
61001015	Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya ne pwadan te jyeka neeni aŋka ne ‘ya baada wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛ yaaktɛti poŋdɛ jyeka neeni oŋkanda.
61001016	Ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya te jyek war tɛɛn Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔci te jyek bɛɛna ɛkɛ bɛɛdi dɔɔkti iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniy. Jyeka ɛkkɛ myennin ‘ya neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a jyeka budan jyeka naŋŋɔn ɔɔn te ñing tɛɛn ɔɔn bɛɛ. Pwani Yaccu yuarnɔn ɔɔn te woŋgɔ ne ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛlnɛ bora ba mena tolany.
61001017	Ɔɔn balgɔn i ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ poom wyeñɛti te oŋŋa ɛkɛ naŋŋɛ Wey ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ne pwadany. Te oŋŋa wannayɛ, pwan gɔkkin ɛkɛti te ñaalɔ Mena Tolanti agi, “I a Kaci ‘ya Kacca ana ‘yay. ‘Ya yomu pwanna pwani iti.”
61001018	Ɔɔn tieŋnɔn pwana neeni ne ɛkɛ gɔŋni te ñaalɔ pɔliji ne ɔɔn balgɔn poom wyeñɛti iki ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔy.
61001019	Çeejɔn ɔɔn jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan a jyeka awarɛ. Ɔci te naŋka yuarnɔn ɔɔn poom wyeñɛti neeniyɛ, jyek ɛkkɛn ŋeejɔn ɔɔn ne pwadan ‘wota ne ɛkkɛn akki jyeka awarɛy. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan neeni, acaan jyek ɛkkɛn bala ba dyɛka ne nona ulan dyɛgdɛy. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te jyeka neeni oŋkanda ne noon bɔɔdi ɔɔn, ɔci moki ne jiek jitkɛn yuartɛji ɛkkɛ ne pwadan ɔɔn.
61001020	Dala ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne pwadan jyek bɔwan jyeka guagɛ ɛkkɛn te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, jiek jitkɛn neeni ŋeejɛ menga te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ parɛ bɛɛ.
61001021	Jyeka guagɛ bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔ neeniyɛ, guagɛ ɛkkɛn te paŋi ɛkkɛn pookɛn bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn gɔki ba jyeka guaŋŋɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛnti neeni.
61002001	Ɔci maka pookɛn gɛɛg te baaṭi maka gɔki amaam agi ɛkkɛn aginti bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɛɛg bala mati daŋkun. Yeti ɛkkɛn a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan woodgɛn bɛɛ, ɛkkɛn a maka jomi jiek budan. Ɔci ma bɛya ɛkkɛti daŋkun, ɔci ɛkkɛn loṭi ma amaam te jyek ɛkkɛn jyeka pookɛn neeni. Jyeka lorki ɛkkɛn ma neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn lɛɛwi jyek Jwaŋa Tolan jitkɛn. Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn yookɔn ne pɛñan te Ciɛggɔn ɛkkɛn mena ɛkkɛn wannɛ neeni. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ywobji bɛya ɛkkɛnti ne pɛñan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍakti.
61002002	Maka coŋin bootti ɛkkɛnti, ɔci lɔkti ba naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋki tomi neeni. Ɔci te naŋki maka loṭi ma amaam neeniyɛ, jyeka awarɛ aga ba jyeka budan mati.
61002003	Ɔci acaan yomg ɛkkɛn buagi waak ne tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ naŋtɛ ñin te jyeka jomgin. Te baaṭi jyek ywobja bɛya ɛkkɛnti naŋŋɛ Juaŋ doki agi ɛkki ḍaktɔ.
61002004	Malɛɛkanyɛ, ne ɛkkɛn noŋki nɔjiyɛ, ɛkkɛn dalnɛ Juaŋ te ywobji bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn yiemnɛ ɛkɛ iñɔ bana maañti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn olnɛ ɛkɛ nona ulan, ɔci ɛkkɛn ciyi aŋan ne oŋŋa godan Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
61002005	Ɔci moki maka bala te baaṭi dalnɛ Juaŋ bɛɛ. Gena Nɔwa mena loṭi ma te naŋka pwadiny. Ɛkɛ iki maka pookɛn gɛɛg ne dɔɔyɔ wyetkɛn ne yyɛɛwɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn aŋka yɔɔññɛ Juaŋ te oŋŋa wanna. Tol bɔrda oonɛ Juaŋ ɔci maka yeyin ṭɛɛrji eññɛ ɛkɛ.
61002006	Ban Caduum ɔci ban Gamɔɔra ḍakcin te ywobji Juaŋ moki. Ɛkkɛn ammɛ maaño. Juaŋ noŋi a ɔɔn aŋka dala maka ciyi budan te ɛkɛ poŋdi te naŋki ɛkkɛn.
61002007	Mena pwadan yenti Lutyɛ, aŋka yɔɔññɛ Jwaŋa Tolan. Lut bala wiak yomɛti ne pɛñan te naŋki maka yeyin noŋi tomi neeni.
61002008	Ne Lut baali ciyi ban maka neenitiyɛ, ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɛ ne pɛñan te naŋka yuarŋɛ ɛkɛ mati ɔci te jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkɛ te ɛkkɛntiy. Ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagitiy.
61002009	Kan Juaŋ yaakinti naŋka tɛyan neeniyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti ma ɛkɛ magdɛ te taab ɛkkɛn. Ɔci moki ɛkɛ yaakinti ywobji ɛkɛ oldɛ maka yeyinti, ɔci ywobji bala ɛkkɛnti oŋkanda ne oŋŋa godan bɛɛdi ɔɔn.
61002010	Maka ani naŋki tomi maka paŋi ɛkkɛn yiegin te naŋka neeni, ɔci maka yookɔn te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ywobji Juaŋ bɛya ɛkkɛnti ne tolan. Ɛkkɛn buayi menga bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn budan. Ɛkkɛn buayi te waaŋi malɛɛkan bala ñaalɔ bɛɛ.
61002011	Maka noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, war tɛɛn ɛkkɛn tol tol ba war tɛɛn malɛɛkan bɛɛ. Yeti malɛɛkanyɛ, ɛkkɛn wooki jwali gɛɛl Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti bɛɛ.
61002012	Maka noŋi ne yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn baali ba kulin mwoktan ma ɔci noktan may. Maka neeni bala gɔki ne yaayan te jyeka kwoyɔn ɛkkɛn neeni, ɔci ba leyi ne ḍaktiyɛ, ɔci ɛkkɛn daŋkun ḍakti a ɔɔn.
61002013	Taab dɔɔkti ɛkkɛnti daŋkun ba naŋka naŋi ɛkkɛn yeyin maka pookɛnti wanna. Ɛkkɛn poŋi gɔki agi kan ɛkkɛn ciyinti te coodda milan coodda noŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin a lɔɔn ma ñomgɛnti oŋkanda neeniyɛ, agi a ɔɔn pwadɔ ɛkkɛnti. Ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔy ñɔy poŋi agi ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ naŋŋɛti ñin te naŋki ɛkkɛn neeni. Ɔci nonk iidn yaakɔn ɛkkɛn ne ɛkkɛn balki omi iki ɛkkɛy. Ɛkkɛn yomgɛn ñɔy ñɔy ne ɛkkɛn poŋki te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin, ɔci ne ɛkkɛn ɛkkɛ naŋkɛ ñin neeniy.
61002014	Kan ɛkkɛn jyɛyi iki moongyɛ, paŋi jyek tomi bala ɛkkɛnti doki. Ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala poŋi te jyek tommo. Ɔci ɛkkɛn maka moong maka ñingɛn tɛyan bɛɛyɛ, maaltan ɔci naŋtan ñino. Oŋkandayɛ, yomg ɛkkɛn buagɔn waka coŋin. Jwaŋa Tolan noŋdi ne yaayan ɛkkɛnti.
61002015	Pɔya pwadan dalji ɛkkɛn. Ɛkkɛn jyetcin ɔntɔ, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala noŋi ba naŋki Balaam kaci Biyɔr. Balaamyɛ, ɛkɛ ani ami bilka bɛya te kanŋa ɛkɛ kanŋa yaayan neeniy.
61002016	Juaŋ bala ṭeyi ɛkɛ te naŋki ɛkɛ naŋka yaayan neeni. Tɔɔrɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ a gena kookinti jieko. Yeti ɛkɛ gɔkcin Balaamti te pwan men baano. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, bɔwa neeni naŋka naŋdɛ ɛkɛ te wyeña yaayan neeniyɛ, dalnɛ ɛkɛ doki.
61002017	Maka noŋi ne yaayan neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala ba jiidg ne ɛkkɛn iiki ɔci menga motti pyeg ɛkkɛn moki bɛɛy. Ɔci moki ɛkkɛn bala ba wiew ne eedɛ peedɛ jwami ɔntɔ amaam ɔci etti ñaal gɛɛl yelk jitin bɛɛy. Noon gɛɛl ywaŋŋɛ Juaŋ doki te ɛkkɛn. Gena nona iñɔ nona mielo.
61002018	Ɛkkɛn gɔki jyeka coŋin jyeka budan. Ɔci te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋki tomiyɛ, maka pookɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ. Gena maka kooyin bora te naŋka yeyintiy. Ɛkkɛn ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ ne pɛñan moki te naŋki maka neeni.
61002019	Maka loṭi ma amaam neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki mati agi ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋi ba yomg ɛkkɛn pookɛn oŋkanda. Yeti maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛnk naŋka yeyin. Kan men gɛɛl buannɛ gengayɛ, ɛkɛ a kɛɛngɔn gena ɛkɛ buannɛ neeni.
61002020	Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci mako. Ɔci kan ma kooyin bora te nɔji ɛkkɛnti te ŋeejin ɛkkɛn Yaccu ŋeeckiti ɔci kan ɛkkɛn dɔɔdi nɔjiti moki ɔci kan ɛkkɛn bwandɛ nɔjja neeniyɛ, coodda ne ŋoyɔ neeni yaayɛ ne tolan te coodi maka jyeti Yaccuti bɛɛy.
61002021	Kan te pɔya pwadan ŋeeckiti ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔn aŋka pwatcin. Kan pɔya pwadan ŋeecɔn ma, ɔci kan ɛkkɛn oŋ ganuun pwadan ganuun ɛkkɛn ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni daltanyɛ, a ɔɔn yaayɛ ne tolan.
61002022	A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jwali ṭɔɔlɛ awarɛ jwalla gɔki agi, “Gɔɔŋyɛ, kan ɛkɛ ŋɔktiyɛ, ɛkɛ dɔɔdi waka ŋɔŋnɛ ɛkɛ neeni amdɛ moki.” Ɔci jwalla parɛ gɔki agi, “Kuciyɛ, kan ɛkɛ lwaktan mayɛ, ɛkɛ dɔɔdi cotinti moki ne pɛñan.”
61003001	Maka ana ‘yay, worga kiewan ‘ya ɛkkɛti neeniyɛ, gena worga akki ne yyɛɛwɔ. Ɔci te worgan yaakkɛn neeniyɛ, ‘ya gɔkkan ɛkkɛti ka dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka guagɛ maka a bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan te naŋka bɛya ne ŋoyɔy.
61003002	Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyek bɔwan Jwaŋa Tolan jyeka te baaṭi, ɔci te jyek Ciɛggɔn ikin Mena Yuoci ikin neeni. Dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te jyeka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ ikinti te tugi ɔɔn Cuudan ɛkɛy.
61003003	Jwalla bala ñamu te jyeka pookɛnyɛ, gɔki agi ne oŋŋa bɛya ne ŋoyɔyɛ, maka lɛɛṭi jyek Jwaŋa Tolan bɛya. Ɔci ɛkkɛn noŋdi ba naŋka yomg ɛkkɛn buagiti ne pɛñan neeni.
61003004	Ɔci ɛkkɛn gɔkti agi, “Ɛkkɛ gɔkɛ agi Yaccu bɛɛdɔ, oŋ ɛkɛ bala wɛnɛ?” Ɔci agi, “Yɔrg ikin ɛkkɛn tuun te baaṭi doki, ɔci naŋka parɛ gɛɛl bɛɛn mati men bɛɛ. Naŋki waakɛnda bala ba bolja oŋŋa Juaŋ okki noon warday.”
61003005	Maka neeni jyeka naŋŋɛ Juaŋ okki ɛkɛ waak neeni ñalɛ a genga bɛɛ. Acaan te baaṭi ma yaayanyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin te jwali tukɛ agi dala pɔli ɔci ṭɛɛr bala, ɔci ɛkkɛn bala doki. Šɛɛr oonɛ ɛkɛ bora te pietin, ɔci pieg bala te nonk ɛkkɛn.
61003006	Ɔci oŋ gɛɛlti te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ṭɛra wanna jaadɛ piego, ɔci maka bala ciyi ṭɛɛrji i maal jitkɛn waakɛnda ḍakcin.
61003007	Ɔci te jyek Juaŋ mokiyɛ, pɔli ɔci ṭɛɛryɛ, ɛkkɛn bala oŋkanda ɔɔn ne oŋŋa ɛkkɛn amdɛ maañ ɔɔn. Gena oŋŋa Juaŋ noŋdi godan maka yeyinti, oŋŋa ɛkkɛn ḍakti neeni.
61003008	Jwali gɛɛl bala, ɔci naa ɛkkɛ ñingɔ yeya te jwalla neeni bɛɛ! Jwalla neeni gɔki agi Juaŋ poki nink bɛɛ. Oŋ jiñɛ ne cyɛɛlɔyɛ, bala ba bolja yuonga coŋin ɛkɛti ba yuong a alp ne cyɛɛlɔ (1,000) ɔɔn. Ɔci moki yuonga a alp (1,000) neeniyɛ, bala ba bolja oŋ jiñɛ ne cyɛɛlɔ ɛkɛti.
61003009	Ma ɛkkɛ gɛɛg poŋi gɔki agi Ciɛggɔn ikin kwaci te naŋka guaŋŋɛ ɛkɛ agi noŋjɛy. Yeti ɛkɛ kwaci bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ bala poŋi te ɛkkɛ, ɔci kɛɛy ɛkkɛ, acaan ɛkɛ buagɔn naa men gɛɛl ḍakti bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ buagɔn dala ma waakɛnda waakɛn yaltan te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin ɔci bɛya ɛkɛti.
61003010	Yeti ne Ciɛggɔn ikin bɛɛdiyɛ, ɛkɛ bɛya lieda ba mena ɛɛno. Ɔci te oŋŋa wannayɛ, pɔli baadi ɔci joon ɛkɛ tolla tollo. Ɔci waka bala ñaalɔ amdɛ maaño. Ɔci ṭɛɛr ɔci waka bala ṭɛɛr konɛtiyɛ, ɛkkɛn amdɛ maañ waakɛnda daŋkun.
61003011	Acaan waka neeni ḍakti ne baaṭiyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ poŋdɛ te coodi ɛkkɛ! Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadan. Dala ɛkkɛ ciedɛ te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda.
61003012	Dala ɛkkɛ kɛɛddɛ oŋŋa oŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdiy. Ɔci dala ɛkkɛ kandɛ ne pwadan aŋka dala oŋŋa neeni bɛya ne pɛñan. Oŋŋa oŋ Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛdi neeniyɛ, pɔli kola maañ ɔci waka bala ñaalɔ waakɛnda amdɛ maaño.
61003013	Te Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ ikintiyɛ, ikin kɛɛyin oŋŋa pɔlla woonɛ bɛɛdi ɔci ṭɛra woonɛ bɛɛdiy. Ɔci ṭɛra woonɛ neeniyɛ, naŋka pwadin bala pookɛn oŋkanda ɔɔn.
61003014	Maka ana ‘yay, acaan ɛkkɛ kɛɛyɛ naŋka neeniyɛ, dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ te yomg ɛkkɛ aŋka dala ɛkkɛ mɔktɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ne ɛkkɛ ciedɛ ne pwadany. Naa gena yaayan gɛɛl mɔktɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, menga yaakinti gɔkti agi gena yaayan gɛɛl bala ɛkkɛti bɛɛ.
61003015	Dala Juaŋ ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ ne ɛkɛ loomgɛ tɛɛki ikintiy. Acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, pɔya ɛkɛ yuoci ikin bala. A ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba jyeka kiinɛ mod ikin Buuluc ikintiy. Ikin anin Buuluc. Ɛkɛ bala gɔki te jyeka neeni daŋkun te worga kienɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛti neeniy. Ɛkɛ bala gɔki jiek te ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ ‘wonnɛ Juaŋ neeni.
61003016	Ɛkɛ bala gɔki te jyek oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiy. Jyeka kiinɛ ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, jitkɛn gɛɛg tɛy tɛyo. Ɔci jyeka tɛyan neeniyɛ, aktanyɔ ma gɛɛg. Maka noŋi a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn jiek ŋeecɔn ne pwadan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn ñingɛn tɛy tɛy bɛɛ. Ɔci ɛkkɛn ḍakti te naŋka neeni. Ɛkkɛnyɛ, jyeka kiigin jyeka pookɛn daŋkun aktanyɔ.
61003017	Ɛkkɛ maka ana ‘yay, jiek ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ aŋka naa ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ maka yeyin ɔntɔ bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ yɔɔddɛ ne tɛyan.
61003018	Dala ɛkkɛ aŋka ‘uottɛ ñamu te yom pwani Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci te ŋeejin Ciɛggɔn ikin Yaccu Kiṭɔ ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ neeni. Ɛkɛ a Mena Yuoci ikin neeni. Dala ma jieddi Yaccu acca ɔci yuonginda ɔɔn ne ṭɛɛr baadi ɔɔn! Amɛɛn.
62001001	Ɔɔn kieyɔn worga ɛkkɛti acca te jyek Mena bala te ñamu. Ɛkɛ a Mena jiekɛ tieŋnɔn ɔɔn te tuk ɛkɛti. Ɔci ɛkɛ a Mena yuarŋɔn ɔɔn te woŋgɔ, ɛɛ, ɔɔn balgɔn gɔṭɔn ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɔɔn moki tomnɔn ɛkɛ warɛti te byeŋki ɔɔn. Mena guagdɔn ɔɔn neeniyɛ, gena Kiṭɔ mena tɛɛtki may.
62001002	Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ ɔɔn lɛɛrnɔn Mena tɛɛtki ma neeni, ɔci ɔɔn balgɔn lwokɔn ma te jyek ɛkɛ. Ɔci acca ɛkkɛ myettɛ ɔɔn daŋkun te jyek ɛkɛ. Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyek Mena tɛɛtki may. Ɛkɛ bala i Weegɛn te ñamu ɔci oŋkanda ɔɔn. Ɔci tɛɛtin ɛkɛ baadi ywongati bɛɛ. Ɔci acca ɛkɛ lɛɛlnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bora ɔɔnti.
62001003	Ɔɔn gɔktɔn ɛkkɛti moki ka Mena ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn neeniyɛ, gena Mena yuarŋɔn ɔɔn ɔci tieŋnɔn ɔɔn. Ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ɔɔn te jyeka neeni aŋka jyek ikin aga jyeka ne cyɛɛlɔ iki ɔɔn, acaan ɔɔn jyeyɔn i Jwaŋa Tolan i Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
62001004	Ɔci ɔɔn kienɔn jyeka neeni ɛkkɛti aŋka ɔɔn yomgɔ ñɔya ne pɛñan.
62001005	Gena jyeka tieŋnɔn ɔɔn te Kaci ɛkɛti aŋka ɛkkɛ myetkɛ ma neeni. Jyeka neeni gɔki agi Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ dɛki bɔɔna bɔɔno. Nona miel gɛɛl bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
62001006	Kan ikin gɔkin agi ikin jyeyin iki Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci yeti kan ikin ciyin te nona mielti menyɛ, a ɔɔn ikin jomin jieko, ɔci naŋka naŋtin ikin neeni a naŋka awarɛ bɛɛ.
62001007	Jwaŋa Tolan ciyi te nona bɔwan. Ɔci kan ikin da ciyin te nona bɔwan ba ɛkɛ ɔɔnyɛ, ikin yaakinti jyeyin waakida, ɔci yimg Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ nɔji ikin eedɛ ɔntɔ te ikin yomgɔti waakida oŋkanda ɔɔn.
62001008	Kan ikin poŋin gɔkin agi nɔji ikin baawiyɛ, ikin poŋin amaam budan, ɔci jyeka awarɛ bala ikin yomgɔti bɛɛ.
62001009	Kan ikin nɔji lɛɛltin borayɛ, ɛkɛ ikin bɔɔktin te nɔji ikin waakɛnda. Jyek bɔɔkin ɔci jyek eñña ɛkɛ nɔji eedɛ ɔntɔ neeni daldɛ ɛkɛ budan bɛɛ, tiidiyɔ ɛkɛ. Naŋki ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, pwatcin.
62001010	Kan ikin gɔkin agi ikin noŋŋin nɔji bɛɛyɛ, a ɔɔnyɛ, bala ba ikin gɔkin agi Jwaŋa Tolan a mena jomi jieko. Kan ikin gɔkin a ɔɔnyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ bala ikin yomgɔti bɛɛ.
62002001	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ‘ya kiey jyeka neeni ɛkkɛti aŋka naa ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ nɔji bɛɛ. Yeti kan men gɛɛl ikinti noŋdi nɔjiyɛ, ɔci Men gɛɛl bala ikinti, ɔci ɛkɛ yaakinti gɔkti Wey ikinti te ikin. Gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ Mena domi jiek bɛɛy.
62002002	Ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te nɔji ikin aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanni ikinti neeni. Ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te ikin pookɔ bɛɛ, ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te ma waakɛnda baan warda.
62002003	Kan ikin noŋin ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkandayɛ, ikin aktin ma ɛkɛ woodgɛn ne pwadan.
62002004	Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ɛkɛ Juaŋ ŋeejjɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyeka guagdɛ Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a laaban, ɔci jyeka awarɛ bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
62002005	Kan mena noŋi ba jyek Juaŋyɛ, anna ani ɛkɛ Juaŋ neeni yɔmjin doki. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeettin ikin ikin balkin ɛkɛti.
62002006	Kan mena gɔki agi ɛkɛ balginti i Juaŋ oŋkandayɛ, dala ɛkɛ ciyi ba Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
62002007	Modg ɔɔn, ‘ya kiey jyeka wonkɛn gɛɛg ɛkkɛti bɛɛ. Gena jyeka te baaṭi jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamuy.
62002008	Yeti jyeka neeni bala ba jyeka wonkɛn ɛkkɛti oŋkanda. Yaccu bala noŋi ba jyeka neeni, ɔci acca ɛkkɛ daŋkun noŋɛ ba jyeka neeni. Acaan nona miel noŋi baadi, ɔci Mena dɛki awarɛ bala doki.
62002009	Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ɛkɛ baaljɛ ciejjɛ nona bɔwanti, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɛ mod ɛkkɛnti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ bala te nona mielti men.
62002010	Kan mena ani mod ɛkkɛn oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka bala ciyi te nona bɔwanti oŋkanda, ɔci ma ḍɛɛmdi iñɔ te jyek ɛkɛ bɛɛ.
62002011	Mena yomɛ yaayan mod ɛkkɛnti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ bala te nona mielti, ɔci ɛkɛ ati te nona mielti men. Ɔci nona ooddi ɛkɛyɛ, ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ bɛɛ acaan ɛkɛ noon yuartɛ te woŋgɛ bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ uullɛ nona miel ñingɛti doki.
62002012	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ Jwaŋa Tolan te nɔji ɛkkɛ doki. Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ bɔɔŋnɛ acaan yenti Yaccu Kiṭɔ bala ɛkkɛti.
62002013	Weyi ɔɔn, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti, acaan mena bala te ñamu ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Kaalko, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti moki, acaan ɛkkɛ Jwaŋa Yaayan buannɛ ɛkkɛ doki.
62002014	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan Wey ikin ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ. Weyi ɔɔn, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti, acaan Kiṭɔ Mena bala te ñamu ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Kaalko, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ agɛ maka yɔdi ne tɛyan ɔci jyek Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti oŋkanda, ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan buannɛ ɛkkɛ doki.
62002015	Naa ɛkkɛ anɛ wak ṭɛɛr wyeñɛ bɛɛ. Ɔci naa ɛkkɛ anɛ waka bala baan jiñɛti iñɔ wɛnni bɛɛ. Kan mena ani baan jiñɛ iñɔ wɛnniyɛ, ɛkɛ yaakinti ani Wey ikin bɛɛ.
62002016	Acaan waka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a wak Wey ikin bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛn a waka baan jiñɛti iñɔ wɛnni budan. Waka baan jiñɛti iñɔ wɛnni neeniyɛ, gena waka yomg ma baan buagiti ne pɛñan, ɔci waka gwaltan ma baan te ñingɛn ɔci pwanna pwani ɛkkɛnti, ɔci ma buagiti ne pɛñan, ɔci jyeka yomg ma baan buagiti akti maka ḍwaŋin.
62002017	Ɔci ne oŋ gɛɛltiyɛ, baan jiñɛ baadi, ɔci waka yomg ma baan buagiti ne pɛñan neeniyɛ, baadi daŋkun. Yeti mena noŋi ba jyek Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ aŋka ciyi oŋkanda a ñaccu ɔɔn, baadi oŋgati bɛɛ.
62002018	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, wɔɔka neeni noŋi baadi doki! Ɛkkɛ tieŋnɛ agi “Mena Yookɔn Te Yaccu Kiṭɔ” baali bɛɛdɔ. Ɔci acca maka yookɔn te Yaccu gɛɛg bala kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Gena maka jyek ɛkkɛn bala ba Mena Yookɔn Te Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeniy. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeecin ikin wɔɔka neeni noŋi baadi doki.
62002019	Maka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ikin dalkin, ɛkkɛn a ma ikin awarɛ bɛɛ. Kan ɛkkɛn te akki ma ikin awarɛyɛ, te ɛkkɛn balkin iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ men. Ɛkkɛn kaaccin bora te ma ikinti aŋka ŋeettan ma ɛkkɛn a ma ikin bɛɛ.
62002020	Ɛkkɛ waakidayɛ, jyeka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ, acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ.
62002021	’Ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni kwoyɛ bɛɛ. ‘Ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti acaan jyeka neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ doki. Jyeka neeni etti jyeka jomgin bɛɛ.
62002022	Kan menga gɔki agi Yaccu neeni agɔ Kiṭɔ mena cuonda Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena jomi jieko. Kan mena gɔki agi Kaci Weegɛn baawiyɛ, ɔci Kaci moki baawiyɛ, ɛkɛ a Mena Yookin Te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
62002023	Kan mena yookɔn te Kaciyɛ, ɔci Kaci Weegɛn da bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Kan mena jyeti Kacitiyɛ, ɔci Kaci Weegɛn da bala ɛkɛti.
62002024	Ba jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamu neeniyɛ, dala jyeka neeni bala ɛkkɛti oŋkanda, ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, Kaci Weegɛn bala ɛkkɛti oŋkanda yaakkɛn i Kaci ɛkɛ.
62002025	Ɔci gena guagdɛ ɛkɛ agi ikin ‘wontintiyɛ, gena tɛɛtin, ɔci tɛɛtin neeni baadi ywongati bɛɛ.
62002026	’Ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti te jyek maka noŋi ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ wanna.
62002027	Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ ɛkkɛ ‘wonnɛ ñing tɛɛn ɛkɛ te ñamu te Boŋ ɛkɛ. Ɔci ɛkɛ bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti men acca. Ɔci kan mena loṭi ɛkkɛ baawyɛ, noŋdi genga bɛɛ, ɛkkɛ laldɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan te jiek waakɛnda. Jyeka loṭi Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ neeniyɛ, a jyeka awarɛ. Jyeka neeniyɛ, a jomi jiek bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ ciyɛ iki Yaccu oŋkanda ba jyeka ɛkkɛ lallɛ Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan neeni.
62002028	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, dala ɛkkɛ baldɛ ɛkɛti oŋkanda, ɔci kan a ɔɔnyɛ, kan ɛkɛ warɛ lɛɛldɛ bora ikintiyɛ, ɔci ikin yaakinti gɔwwin iki ɛkɛ ne pwadan. Ne oŋŋa ɛkɛ bɛɛdiyɛ, ikin buatin ɛkɛ yooŋtin ɔntɔ te ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
62002029	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔ pwad pwado, ɔci kan ma noŋi ne pwadan ba ɛkɛ ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin ɛkɛ awarɛ.
62003001	Anna Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan ani ikinyɛ, da parɛ, acaan ɛkɛ boṭi ikin agi kɛɛgin ɛkɛ. Awarɛ, ikin balkin a ɔɔn. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, maka iñɔ ṭɛɛrji wɛnniyɛ, ɛkkɛn ikin ŋeeckin bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan kwoyɔn daŋkun.
62003002	Gɔṭṭɛ mung ɔɔn, ikin akin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan acca, yeti ne baaṭi kan ikin baltin a ɔki ŋeecin ikin ne pwadan men bɛɛ. Yeti oŋŋa Yaccu bɛɛdiyɛ, ikin waakɔ aktin baltin ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn, acaan ikin ɛkɛ yuartin ne pwadan te woŋgi ikin.
62003003	Maka bala jyeti kɛɛy jyeka neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn jyeka yeyin daltan niin ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn buagɔn ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pwaddi ba Yaccu Kiṭɔ ɔɔn.
62003004	Kan men gɛɛl noŋdi nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ jyek Juaŋ lɛɛŋŋɛ jitin doki, acaan nɔjiyɛ, ɛkɛ a gena lɛɛwi jyek Juaŋ jitkɛn.
62003005	Çeejɛ ɛkkɛ Yaccu aŋi men baan aŋka nɔji ikin eedɛ ɛkɛ ɔntɔ. Ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ moki nɔji ɛkɛ bala bɛɛ.
62003006	Kan men bala ciyi iki Yaccu oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ noŋi nɔji a ñaccu bɛɛ. Mena noŋi nɔji a ñaccuyɛ, ɛkɛ Yaccu yuarŋɛ oŋgati bɛɛ. Yaccu kwoyi ɛkɛ.
62003007	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, naa men gɛɛl ɛkkɛ jyɛttɛ ɔntɔ te jyek Yaccuti bɛɛ. Kan mena noŋi ne pwadan oŋkandayɛ, naŋki ɛkɛ pwad pwad bala ba naŋki Yaccu daŋkun.
62003008	Kan mena noŋi nɔji oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ a men Jwaŋa Yaayan, acaan Jwaŋa Yaayan bala noŋi nɔji te baaṭi doki. Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn aŋka ɛkɛ kanŋa Jwaŋa Yaayan neeni lɛgdɛ jitin.
62003009	Kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi nɔji a ñaccu bɛɛ, acaan tɛɛtin Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti oŋkanda, baadi bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn yaakinti noŋi nɔji a ñaccu bɛɛ, acaan ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan.
62003010	Ma Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn ŋeecin ikin te naŋki ɛkkɛn, ɔci ma Jwaŋa Yaayan moki ŋeecin ikin te naŋki ɛkkɛn. Kan mena noŋi ne pwadan bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ a men Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɔci kan mena ani mod ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ daŋkun a men Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ.
62003011	Jyeka neeni bala ba jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamu doki agi dala ikin ooncinyɔ pookɔ.
62003012	Naa ikin baltin ba ‘wana yenti kɛɛn ɔɔn bɛɛ. Ɛkɛ a men Jwaŋa Yaayan, ɔci ɛkɛ mod ɛkkɛn noŋŋɛ. Ɛkɛ moodɛn noŋŋɛ ogo? Ɛkɛ moodɛn noŋŋɛ acaan moodɛn bala noŋi ne pwadan, ɔci kɛɛn bala noŋi ne yaayan.
62003013	Modg ɔɔn, kan maka baan jiñɛti iñɔ wɛnni yomgɛn yeyɔ ɛkkɛti oŋkandayɛ, naa ɛkkɛ jitkɔ buaya noon te jyeka neeni bɛɛ.
62003014	Te ñamu ikin balkin ba maka tuutan, ɔci acca ikin baallin ba maka tɛɛtan. Çeecin ikin a ɔɔn acaan ikin anin modg ikin. Kan mena ani modg ɛkkɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba mena tuuta men.
62003015	Kan mena yomɛ yaayɛ mod ɛkkɛnti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ bala ba mena noki mako, ɔci ŋeejɛ ɛkkɛ maka noki mayɛ, tɛɛtin Juaŋ bala ɛkkɛn yomgɛnti bɛɛ.
62003016	Jyek anna ani Juaŋ ikin neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin doki te naŋki Yaccu oŋŋa ɛkɛ warɛ ‘wonninti ikiny. Ɔci ikinyɛ, dala yomg ikin bala ba ɛkɛ ɔɔn. Dala ikin anin modg ikin ba anna ani ɛkɛ ikin neeni.
62003017	Mena balki waak iñɔ baanji wɛnniyɛ, kan ɛkɛ gɔrti mod ɛkkɛn ancinyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yomɛ baaw mod ɛkkɛntiyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yookɔn te maŋi ɛkɛyɛ, oŋ anna ani ɛkɛ Juaŋ neeni ciyi ɛkɛ yomɛti a ɔki?
62003018	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, naa ikin anin ma te jyek tuggɔ budan bɛɛ. Dala ikin anin ma te yoma awarɛ, ɔci dala ikin noŋtin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti.
62003019	Ɔci kan ikin anin ma te yoma awarɛ ɔci noŋtin ne pwadan ɛkkɛnti a ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeettin ikin jyeka bala ikinti neeniyɛ, a jyeka awarɛ. Ɔci ŋeettin ikin yomgɔti ne pwadan Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛti.
62003020	Ɔci kan ikin poŋin gɔkin agi ikin yiekin Jwaŋa Tolan ñamɛtiyɛ, jyeka neeni yaakinti ciyi ikin yomgɔti bɛɛ. Acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ tol tol te yomg ikin, ɔci waak waakɛnda ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ.
62003021	Ɔci kan jiek ŋeecin ikin yomgɔti a ikin noŋŋin gena yaayan gɛɛl bɛɛyɛ, ikin yaakinti ortinti Jwaŋa Tolanti ne pwadan, ɔci ikin buayin ɛkɛ bɛɛ.
62003022	Ɔci kan ikin toottin ɛkɛti te gengayɛ, ɛkɛ ikin ‘wontin, acaan ikin noŋin ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkanda, ɔci naŋki ikin neeni pwanna pwani ɛkɛti.
62003023	Gena jyeka ɛkɛ buagiti ikin noŋtin neeni. Ɛkɛ gɔki agi dala ikin jyetcin yenti Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔti, ɔci agi dala ikin ooncin yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda. Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyeka ikin myenninti ɛkɛy.
62003024	Kan mena noŋi ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ ciyi i Jwaŋa Tolan a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkɛ yomɛti daŋkun. Çeecin ikin Juaŋ bala ikin yomgɔti, ɔci ikin da balkin ɛkɛti acaan Jwaŋa Tolan ikin ‘wonnin Boŋ ɛkɛ.
62004001	Modg ɔɔn, kan jyeka pookɛn bala, ɔci kan ma gɔki agi jyeka neeni agi jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, naa ɛkkɛ men jyeddɛ jyeka guaktan ma coŋin neeni men budan bɛɛ. Ɛkkɛ gɔrtɛ te ñamu parun aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ kan jyeka neeni a jyek Juaŋ awarɛ boki no. Acaan maka loṭi ma gɛɛg dɛndi bora ɔci jomdi jiek mati.
62004002	Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ bɛɛnɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti, ɔci aŋŋi men baanyɛ, paŋŋa neeni bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, jiek ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ jyeka neeni a jyek Boŋ Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ.
62004003	Kan men gɛɛl kɛki agi Yaccu bɛɛnɔ te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛyɛ, paŋi ɛkɛ bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti bɛɛ. Paŋi ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, gena paŋi Mena Yookɔn Te Yaccu Kiṭɔ mena tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te ñamu agi bɛɛdɔy, ɔci acca ɛkɛ bɛɛn doki.
62004004	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, ɛkkɛ agɛ kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan. Maka gɔki ba jyeka pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn buannɛ ɛkkɛ doki, acaan Mena bala ɛkkɛ yomgɔti neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ tolcin te mena bala iñɔ baanji wɛnni.
62004005	Maka gɔki jyeka pookɛn neeniyɛ, ɛkkɛn a ma Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛ. Ɔci acaan a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkkɛn gɔki te jyeka bala iñɔ baanji wɛnni, ɔci maka a ma Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, tieŋdi jyek ɛkkɛn.
62004006	Ikin akin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan. Maka Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeecɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ikin. Ɔci maka a kɛɛgin Juaŋ bɛɛyɛ, ɛkkɛn tieŋdi jyek ikin bɛɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeettin ikin jyeka bala mati neeniyɛ, kan a jyeka awarɛ, walla kan a jyeka jomgin.
62004007	Modg ɔɔn, dala ikin oontin yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanda, acaan jyek anna neeniyɛ, bɛɛn te Jwaŋa Tolanti. Maka ani ma a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ɛkkɛn Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeecɔn.
62004008	Mena ani ma bɛɛyɛ, ɛkɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ŋeejɛ bɛɛ, acaan Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ani may.
62004009	Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan bala ne cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan Kacca neeni cuonnɛ iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji aŋka ikin tɛɛttin te ɛkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ɛkɛ ikin myennin te anna ɛkɛ ani ikiny.
62004010	A ikin aŋka anin Juaŋ ñamu bɛɛ. A’a, gena Juaŋ aŋka ani ikin ñamuy. Ɔci ŋeecin ikin anna Juaŋ ani ikin neeniyɛ, a anna awarɛ, acaan Kaci ɛkɛ cuonnɛ iñɔ baanji wɛnni aŋka ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te nɔji ikin aŋka Jwaŋa Tolan yomɛ pwanni ikinti neeni.
62004011	Modg ɔɔn, kan Jwaŋa Tolan ani ikin a ɔɔnyɛ, dala ikin da oontin yɔtin pookɔ.
62004012	Men gɛɛl Jwaŋa Tolan yuarŋɛ bɛɛ. Yeti kan ikin oonnin yɔtin pookɔ oŋkandayɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan ciyi ikin yomgɔti. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin anin Juaŋ awarɛ.
62004013	Çeecin ikin ikin balkin Jwaŋa Tolanti ɔci ɛkɛ da bala ikinti. Jyeka neeni ŋeecin ikin te Boŋ ɛkɛ Boŋa ikin ‘wonninti ɛkɛy.
62004014	Yaccu yuarŋɔn ɔɔn te woŋgɔ aŋka ɔɔn lwokɔn ma te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan Wey Yaccun neeni. Ɛkɛ Kaci ɛkɛ cuonnɛ iñɔ wɛnni aŋka ɛkɛ warɛ ‘yɛrŋɛ te nɔji ma baan baan warda.
62004015	Kan mena jyeti ɔci gɔki agi Yaccu a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan bala ciyi ɛkɛ yomɛti oŋkanda, ɔci ɛkɛ da bala Jwaŋa Tolanti oŋkanda daŋkun.
62004016	A ɔŋŋiyɛ, anna Juaŋ ani ikin neeniyɛ, ŋeecin ikin ne pwadan, ɔci ikin jyettin yomgɔti Juaŋ ani ikin. Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena ani may. Kan mena ciyi ani Juaŋ bala ɛkɛ yomuti oŋkandayɛ, ɛkɛ ciyi iki Jwaŋa Tolan oŋkanda, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan da ciyi ɛkɛti oŋkanda.
62004017	Oŋkanda ikin anin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ŋeettin ikin ne pwadan yomgɔti ikin buayin oŋ godan Juaŋ moki bɛɛ, acaan ne ikin balkin ciyin iñɔ wɛnniyɛ, ikin balkin ciyin ba Yaccu ɔɔn, ɔci acaan ikin anin Juaŋ awarɛ.
62004018	Kan anna i ani Jwaŋa Tolan bala itiyɛ, ɔci bwajja i buayi genga bala moki bɛɛ. Acaan jyek bwaji ɔci jyek ani yaakinti ñoodi nona ne cyɛɛlɔ bɛɛ. Bwaji bawwin doki. Jyek bwaji bala mati acaan ma buayi jyeka bɛya ɛkkɛn wyetkɛnti te naŋki ɛkkɛn naŋka yeyin. Ma Kiṭɔyɛ, kan men gɛɛl buayiyɛ, bala ba anna ɛkɛ ani Juaŋ neeni bɔɔnjin men.
62004019	Ikin anin ɛkɛ acaan ɛkɛ ani ikin te ñamu doki.
62004020	Kan men gɛɛl gɔki agi ɛkɛ anji Juaŋyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ yomɛ yaayɛ moodɛnti mena cieki iki ɛkɛ a cyɛɛlɔ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena jomi jiek budan. Ɔci kan ɛkɛ ani mod ɛkkɛn mena yuartɛ ɛkɛ te woŋgɛ neeni bɛɛy, oŋ ɛkɛ yaakinti ani Juaŋ mena yuartɛ ɛkɛ te woŋgɛ bɛɛ neeni a ɔki?
62004021	Gena jyeka ikin myenninti Juaŋ neeni, agi kan mena ani Juaŋyɛ, dala ɛkta ani mod ɛkki daŋkun.
62005001	Maka jyeti agi Yaccu a Kiṭɔ Mena Muonɛ Juaŋ Borayɛ, ɛkkɛn a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan waakɛnda. Kan maka ani kɛɛgin weegɛnyɛ, ɛkkɛn ani kɛɛgin ɛkɛ daŋkun.
62005002	Kan ikin anin Juaŋ, ɔci kan ikin noŋtin ba jyeka ikin myettinti ɛkɛyɛ, ŋeettin ikin ikin anin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan awarɛ.
62005003	Kan ikin anin Juaŋyɛ, ikin noŋin ba jyek ɛkɛ oŋkanda, ɔci jyeka ikin myettinti ɛkɛ neeniyɛ, yeyɔ ikinti bɛɛ.
62005004	Kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn waka iñɔ wɛnni baanji bwantan ɛkkɛn. Te jyenna ikin jyettin Juaŋti neeniyɛ, ikin yaakinti naŋka iñɔ wɛnni ṭɛɛrji bwantin.
62005005	Kan menga jyeti Yaccuti agi ɛkta agi Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, mena neeni yaakinti waka bala iñɔ baan konɛti wɛnni bwandɛ.
62005006	Yaccu Kiṭɔ neeni ɛkɛ a mena cuonnɛ Jwaŋa Tolany, ɛkɛ a Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan. Ɛkɛ ŋeecin ikin ne ɛkɛ agi Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan acaan Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkkin a ɔɔn te ñaalɔ agi ɛkta agɔ Kaci ɛkɛ. Jwaŋa Tolan gɔkcin a ɔɔn te wɔɔka Yaccu buulkiti may, ɔci moki ne Yaccu tuuni men bɛɛ te oŋŋa ɛkɛ ŋaapkiti may. Ɔci Boŋ Juaŋ daŋkun gɔki mieti ikin te Yaccu a ɔɔn moki. Ɔci jyeka guaktan ɛkkɛn neeni bala bolja ne cyɛɛlɔ ɔci awarɛ.
62005009	Kan men baan lwoki ikin te jyek men gɛɛlyɛ, jyeka neeni pwadɔ ikinti ne ḍiɛran ṭɔɔlɛ. Ɔci kan Jwaŋa Tolan lwoki ikin te Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, jyek ɛkɛ neeni aŋka pwad pwad ne tolan.
62005010	Kan mena jyeti jyek Kaci Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, jyeka guagdɛ Juaŋ te Kaci ɛkɛ neeni ŋeejɛ ɛkɛ yomɛti doki. Kan mena jyeti Kaci Juaŋti bɛɛyɛ, bala ba ɛkɛ poŋi gɔki agi Jwaŋa Tolan a mena jomi jieko. Jyek ɛkɛ bala a ɔɔn acaan ɛkɛ jyeti jyeka guaŋŋɛ Juaŋ te Kaci ɛkɛ neeni bɛɛ.
62005011	Jyeka guaŋŋɛ Jwaŋa Tolan ikinti neeni bala a ɔki? Ɛkɛ gɔki ikinti agi ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonninti tɛɛtin, ɔci agi tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, baadi ywongati bɛɛ, ɔci agi tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, bala Kaci ɛkɛti.
62005012	Ɔci kan mena Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan bala yomɛtiyɛ, tɛɛtin bala ɛkɛti. Kan mena Kaci Juaŋ baaw ɛkɛ yomɛtiyɛ, tɛɛtin bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ.
62005013	Ɛkkɛ maka jyeti yenti Kaci Jwaŋa Tolantiy, ‘ya kiey worga ɛkkɛti aŋka ŋeeddɛ ɛkkɛ tɛɛtin bala ɛkkɛti acca doki, ɔci tɛɛtin neeniyɛ, baadi oŋgati bɛɛ.
62005014	Çeecin ikin ne pwadan Juaŋ ñamɛti kan ikin toottin ɛkɛti te gengayɛ, ɔci kan gena ikin toottin ɛkɛti neeni bala ba jyeka ɛkɛ buagitiyɛ, ɔci ɛkɛ tieŋdi.
62005015	Ɔci kan Juaŋ tieŋdi a ɔɔnyɛ, ŋeecin ikin daŋkun ɛkɛ noŋi ba jyek cɔŋi ikin.
62005016	Kan men gɛɛl mod ɛkkɛn men Juaŋ gɛɛl yuartɛ bala noŋi naŋka yaayan gɛɛl a naŋka ɛkɛ eedɛ non lienti bɛɛyɛ, dala ɛkɛ cɔkti Juaŋti te mena neeni, ɔci Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkɛ mena neeni bɔɔktɛ ɔci ‘wondɛ tɛɛtin. Jyeka neeniyɛ, gena jyek maka mwondi te jyek Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛy. Yeti nɔji gɛɛl bala a nɔjja men eedɛ non lienti. Ɔci ‘ya dɛyi ma te cɔŋŋa ma cɔkti te mena nɔŋdi nɔjja neeni bɛɛ.
62005017	Waka naŋŋin ikin yeyin ɛkkɛn waakɛnda a wak nɔjjo. Yeti naŋki gɛɛg etti lien bɛɛ.
62005018	Çeecin ikin maka a kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolanyɛ, ɛkkɛn noŋi nɔji a ñaccu bɛɛ, acaan Kacca jiennɛ Jwaŋa Tolan bala gɔṭi ɛkkɛn, ɔci Jwaŋa Yaayan yaakinti noŋdi genga ɛkkɛnti bɛɛ.
62005019	Çeecin ikin ikin akin kɛɛgin Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci ŋeecin ikin moki maka yeyin baan wardayɛ, bala byeŋ mena yaayan neeniti.
62005020	Çeecin ikin Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan bɛɛn doki, ɔci ɛkɛ ikin ‘wonnin ñing tɛɛn aŋka ikin mena awarɛ ŋeettin. Ɔci mena awarɛ neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ bala ciyin iki ikin a cyɛɛlɔ, ɔci Kaci ɛkɛyɛ, gena Yaccu Kiṭɔ. Jwaŋa neeniyɛ, ɛkɛ a Jwaŋa awarɛ, ɔci tɛɛtin ɛkɛ a tɛɛtin awarɛ, baadi bɛɛ.
62005021	Kɛɛgin ‘ya, dala ɛkkɛ waakɔ uuttɛ ɔntɔ te jɔkin yeyin jɔkin maltan ma amaam neeniti. Amɛɛn.
63001001	Ɛɛŋo, i a mena muonɛ Juaŋ boray. Gena ‘ya ciɛggɔn kaniica kiey worga iti ɔci kɛɛgin iti daŋkun neeni. Ɛkkɛ a maka ana ‘ya acaan te jyeka bala ikinti a jyeka awarɛ neeniy. ‘Ya an ɛkkɛ paru bɛɛ, maka jyeka awarɛ neeni ŋeecɔnyɛ, ɛkkɛn da ani ɛkkɛ.
63001002	Jyeka awarɛ neeniyɛ, ciyi ikin yomgɔti, ɔci bala ikinti yuonginda ɔɔn.
63001003	Jwaŋa Tolan, ɔci Kaci ɛkɛ Yaccu Kiṭɔyɛ, ɛkkɛn ikin ‘wontin yom pwanno, ɔci ɛkkɛn yomgɛn pɔktan ikinti, ɔci ikin ‘wontin coodi pwanno. Ɛkkɛn ikin ‘wontin waka neeni awarɛ te anna Jwaŋa Tolan ani ikiny.
63001004	’Ya yomu ñɔɔna ñɔɔn ne kɛɛgin i gɛɛg yuarŋa ‘ya balki cieki ne pwadan te jyeka awarɛ ba jyeka ikin myenninti Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan agi naŋcin ikiny.
63001005	Hay, ɛɛŋo, ‘ya gɔk iti te jyeka wonkɛn gɛɛg bɛɛ. ‘Ya gɔkka iti te jyeka bala ikinti te ñamu dokiy. Gena jyeka agi ikin ooncin yɔtin pookɔ oŋkanday.
63001006	Kan mena ani Juaŋ awarɛyɛ, ɛkɛ jyek Juaŋ tiidiyɔ oŋkanda. Jyek Juaŋ gɔki agi dala ikin ooncin yɔtin pookɔ. Gena jyeka tieŋnɛ ɛkkɛ te baaṭi neeni, ɔci dala ɛkkɛ noŋdɛ ba jyeka neeni oŋkanda ɔɔn.
63001007	Maka noŋi ma ñingɛn te jyek Juaŋyɛ, ɛkkɛn bala bonk jitin kɔɔna kɔɔnno. Ɛkkɛn gɔki agi Yaccu Kiṭɔ aŋŋi men baan bɛɛ. Kan men gɔki a ɔɔnyɛ, ɛkɛ a mena noŋi ma ñingɛn, ɔci ɛkɛ moki a mena yookɔn te Yaccu Kiṭɔ.
63001008	Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ ne pwadan te waak ɛkkɛ aŋka jyeka laldɔn ɔɔn ɛkkɛti neeni aga jyeka budan bɛɛ. Dala ɛkkɛ woŋgɔ tiittɛ aŋka ne baaṭi Jwaŋa Tolan ɛkkɛ ‘wondɛ waka pwadin te kanŋa ɛkkɛ.
63001009	Kan men gɛɛl loṭi ma te waka loṭi Kiṭɔ ma neeni pookɛn bɛɛyɛ, ɔci kan ɛkɛ jyeka neeni uottɛtiyɛ, Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkɛti bɛɛ. Yeti mena loṭi te gena jyeka loṭi Kiṭɔ ma pookɛnyɛ, Wey ikin Jwaŋa Tolan bala ɛkɛti, ɔci Kaci Jwaŋa Tolan da bala ɛkɛti moki.
63001010	Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, kan mena loṭi ma bɛya on iyɛ, ɔci kan jyek ɛkɛ bala ba jyeka loṭi Yaccu ikin bɛɛyɛ, naa i ɛkɛ kaacca on i bɛɛ, ɔci naa i ɛkɛ ñiiba bɛɛ.
63001011	Kanŋa mena neeniyɛ, yaayɛ. Kan i ɛkɛ ñiibayɛ, bala ba naŋki ɛkkɛ a naŋka ne cyɛɛlɔ yaakkɔ.
63001012	Jiek bala ‘yati kɔɔna kɔɔnno, yeti ‘ya buaga kiewa jyeka neeni waakɛnda bɛɛ. ‘Ya aŋka buaga bɛɛd ban ɛkkɛ, ɔci ikin yɔɔrtin iki i ban ɛkkɛ. Ɔci a ɔŋŋiyɛ, ikin jiɛtin, ɔci jiɛn mila millo.
63001013	Kɛɛgin kow ɛkkɛ mena muonɛ Juaŋ bora neeniyɛ, ñiepi i daŋkun. Bawwin.
64001001	Mug ɔɔn Gayac, gena ‘ya ciɛggɔn kaniica kiewan worga iti neeni. I a mena ana ‘ya te jyeka bala ikinti a jyeka awarɛ neeniy.
